Ihe a na-atụ anya n’aka ya bara ụba dịka ọke ọnụahịa ngwaahịa na-anyụ ndị mmadụ ịkpakwụ.
Ndị otu pati Conservative na-echekwa maka ọdị n’ihu ha.
Otu onye otu Tory gwara onye ntaakụkwọ na “ọ bụrụ na anyị mee ka ọkụ bụrụ anyụanyụ, mara na anyị ga-anọ n’ọchịchị, mana ọ bụrụ na ha nweteghị ya, mara na nsogbu dị”.
Kedụ ihe meburu anyị jiri rute ebe a? N’ụbọchị asaa nke ọnwa Julaị ka Boris Johnson sị na ya ga-arịda n’ọkwa dịka onyeisiala mba ahụ.
Nke a bịara dịka ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ya tinyere akwụkwọ arụkwaghị na gọọmentị maka amaghị eme ya.
Ndị pati ya bụ Tory egbughị oge n’ịkpọ oku ka ndị mmadụ malite ịpụta maka ịzọ ya bụ ọkwa onyeisiala, ozugbo Boris Johnson tinyere akwụkwọ.
Na mbụ, mmadụ assatọ pụtara maka ya bụ ntụlịaka nke mbụ ebe a nọ kụchapụ Chancellor Nadhim Zahawi na onye bụbụ ọdeakwụkwọ ọrụ ahụ ike bụ Jeremy Hunt dịka ha nwetere obere vootu na-erughị iri atọ na patị Tory.
E meela ọtụtụ ntuliaka ndị ọzọ rụọ mere ka ọnụọgụ ndị na-azọ ya bụ ndọrọndọrọ jiri si asatọ gbadata abụọ – Rishi Sunak (nwoke) na Liz Truss (nwaanyị).
Liz meriri penny Mordaunt iji pụta ebe Sunak meriri ọtụtụ ndị pati ha bụ Tory iji pụta.
Ọtụtụ ihe agbanweela kemgbe ọnwa gara aga dịka ọ bụ ndị otu Tory mmadụ 160,000 ka ọ dị n’aka ịtụ vootu ga-ewepụta otu onye n’ime mmadụ abụọ a.
Ọ teela aka ọbaozi bookies gbara afa na ọ bụ Liz truss ga-emeri..
Ị mụta nwa nwoke n’ezinụlọ dị oke mkpa n’ala Igbo.
Igbo kwenyere na ama ọbụla na-amụtaghị nwa nwoka ga-echi.
Ya mere ha jị agụ nwoke aha dịka Obiechina, Amaechina na ndị ọzọ.
Ọtụtụ ezinaụlo akụsaala maka amụghị nwa nwoke.
Ya bụ, ọ dị ezigbo mkpa ịmụta nwa nwoke n’ezinaụlo, ya mere anyị ji ede akụkọ a.
Onye dọkịnta na-ahụ maka ahụike ụmụnwaanyị bụ Kingsley Ekwuazi tinyere ọnụ n’ihe ụfọdụ di na nwunye nwere ike ime maka ọnọdụ a.
Oge e ji enwe mmekọ nwoke na nwaanyị (Billings Method) Nke a bụ nchọputa na-egosi na o nwere oge nwoka na nwaanyị ga-enwe mmekọrịta ha enwee ike mụta nwoke maọbụ nwaanyị.
Usoro na-ekwu na ọ bụrụ na nwaanyị nwee mmekọrịta mgbe akwa ya na-apụta (Ovulation), na ọ ga-ama otu ụbọchi n’izụahụ akwa nwoke ya ga-apụta.
Ọ na-akọwa na ina enyocha ka mmiri ahụ nwaanyị (vaginal mucus) g si dị mgbe niile ga-enyere gi aka ịmata mgbe gị na onye nke gị ga-eji mee aramara.
Ọ bụ site na-iji ihe e ji enyocha ya bụ mmiri ahu nwaanyị ka ị ga-esi amata.
Onwere ihe a na-ere na famasi ị ga-eji elele ya kwa mgbe.
Nwaanyị nwekwara ike iji nghọta nke ya maka mgbe o ji anọ nso amata ya.
N’aka nke ọzọ, nwoke ọ bụ ya na nwaanyị ahụ agaghị agbọncha (masturbation) ihe dịka abali abụọ tupu oge ahụ ha ga-enwe mmekọrịta.
Nwoke ahụ ga-agbanwekwa ụdị nrị ọ na-eri nakwa otu o si ebi ndụ nke ga-enyeaka ka uhe (Sperm) ya nwee ume.
Ọ dị mkpa ime ka uhe nke nwoke gị gbasie ike maọbụrụ na ị chọrọ nwanwoke.
Ụdị nri ị na-eri Ọ bụ eziokwu na ezigbo nri na-edozi ahụ mana ọtụtụ amaghị na ụdị nri ị na-eri nwere ike ịme ka ị mụta nwoke maọbụ nwaanyị.
Mmụta na-egosikwa na nwaanyị iri nri nwere “alkaline” ga-enyeaka ime ka imeahụ nwaanyị (cervics) ebe uhe nwa na-anọ nwee ike ị nọ n’ụdị ga-enye aka ka uhe nke nwoke (male sperm) nwee ahụike ito nke ọma.
  Uhe nke nwoke anaghị anọlị n’ahụ nwaanyị nwere asidi karịrị akarị dịka nchọpụta a kwuru.
Nri dịka tomato na nri ndị ọzọ nwere ike ime ka “alkaline” dị nwaanyị n’ahụ karịa “acid” ya.
Ọzọ nwere ike ịtụ mmadụ na-anya ma ghara ịtụkpọ ya bụ oge mmadụ ji eri ihe nwere ike ikwu ka ọ bụ nwoke ka ọ bụ nwaanyị ka onye ahụ ga-amụ.
Nchọpụta na-egosi na nwaanyị iri nri nwere nnukwu “calorie” n’ụtụtụ nwere ike ịme ka ọ tụrụ ime nwoke.
Ya bụ nchọpụta sịkwa na i ri nri nwere “potassium” na “sodium” nwekwara ike inyeaka ka nwaanyị tụta ime nwa nwoke.
Mana dọkịta Kingsley Ekwuazi sị na okwu gbasara “alkaline” agbasaghị ndị ọrụ ahụike Bekee.
Aha onyonyo, Fertility Boosters: Ihe ise nwaanyị kwesịrị ịme iji tụrụ afọ ime N’otu aka ahụ, iri nri “calcium” akarịghị na ya ga-enyekwa aka dịka ya bụ nchọpụta kwuru.
Ya mere mgbe gboo, ụfọdụ ndị ọcha na-ata nnu nkiti ka o nyere ha aka ịtụ ime nwa nwoke.
Ụfọdụ na-eche na ebe ịta nnu nkiti adịchaghị mma, nchọcha na-egosi na “sodium” (nnu) na-enyeaka ịtụta ime nwanwoke.
Infertility in women: ‘A na-akpọ m osisi amịghị mkpụrụ’- Nwaanyị chọgoro nwa ọtụtụ afo Ịnwe mmekọ ụbọchị akwa nwaanyị kacha apụta (Pick ovulation day) – Shettle Method Nchọcha na-akọwa na nwaanyị ịnwe mmekọ mgbe akwa nwaanyị pụtasiwere ike nwere ike ịme ka ọ tụta ime nwoke ngwa ngwa.
A na-eji akụrụnga nnyocha Bekee kpọrọ ‘home ovulation detection kit” amata oge a.
Ọzọ dịkwa na usoro a bụ ka nwoke dumisie amụ ya ike n’ahụ nwaanyị nke ga-enyere uhe nke nwoke (male Sperm) aka ịgbapụ ọsọ ozugbo were buru uzo rụrọ ebe akwa nke nwaanyị dị.
Uhe nke nwoke na-aka mpe ma na-agbakwa ọsọ karịa uhe nke nwaanyị bụ nke ka ya ibu.Udo Nchọpụta gosikwara na nwaanyị ibu ụzọ “bịa” na-enyeaka ịme ka “alkaline” ju n’ime ahụ ya nke ga-enyere uhe nke nwoke aka ịgbapụ ọsọ ngwangwa.
N’ime ka Shettle na Billings methods dị ire, nwaanyị kwesiri ịmata mgbe nso ya nakwa akwa ya ji apụta.
Itinye uhe n’efere akwa (Sperm spinning and Pre Implant Genetic Testing)   Usoro ọzọ na-arụ ọrụ ngwa ngwa bụ iji usoro IVF na nke Bekee kpọrọ “Sperm spinning”.
Usoro a bụ nke ana amịta uhe nwoke tinye na mmiri akwa nwaanyị.
Ihe ị ga-ahụ ọzụgbo bụ na uhe nke nwoke ga-eji ọsọ gakwuwe nke nwaanyị.
Nke ahụ ga-enyeaka ịmata nke bụ uhe nwoke na nke nwaanyị mezia ka ewepụta nke nwoke were sie nke nne.
A na-etinyekarị usoro a na IVF n’ọrụ otu mgbe, agbanyeghị na ọ dị okeọnụ..
Ọtụtụ mgbe ndị mmadụ nụ maka ọrịa mmekọ nwoke na nwaanyị a na-eche na ọ bụ naanị mgbe ihe nwoke jiri bụrụ nwoke metụtara nke nwaanyị.
Mana ndị ọrụ ahụike ekwuola ugboro ugboro na mmadụ nwereike ibute ọtụtụ ọrịa site n’ịmị ọnụ maọbụ iji ọnụ tinye n’akụkụ ahụ nwoke maọbụ nwaanyị dịịrị onye ahụ.
Ọrịa na-ebutekarị site n’ụzọ ọnụ a bụ ọrịa ‘gonorrhea’ na ‘syphilis’.
Otu onye dọkịnta aha ya bụ Udodi Okoli kọwara ndi ntaakụkọ ihe dị mkpa banyere etu e si egbochi ọrịa ndị a.
Gonorrhoea: Ọrịa a so n’ọrịa ndị mmadụ nwereike ibute ma nwoke na nwaanyị maọbụ nwoke na nwoke nwee mmekọ na-ejighị okpu nna bụ enyị mana mmekọ a gụnyekwara ịmị ọnụ maọbụ itinye ọnụ n’akụkụ ahụ ma-enyeghị okpu nna bụ enyị.
Nnyocha ụlọọrụ NOIPolls mere n’afo 2020 gosiri na naanị pasentị iri atọ na anọ ndị tozuru oke mmekọ na-eji okpu nna bụ enyị n’oge mmekọ ha.
Okoli kọwara na ọrịa a na-arị elu aghara aghara na Naịjirịa ma kwuo “Ndị ntorobịa na-eleghara ihe ga-echekwa ha anyị” O kọwakwara na njiri mmara ọrịa a n’ahụ mmadụ gụnyere isi n’amụ maọbụ otu na-anyụpụta mmiri na-acha edo edo maọbụ ka akwụkwọ nrị.
Ihe ndị ọzọ gụnyekwara oke mgbu ma mmadụ na-anyụ mmarị nakwa nwaanyị ịgba ọbara n’oge ọ nọghị na nsọ ya, ọkọ n’ime ike mmadụ.
Mana o kwukwara “Njiri mmara ọrịa a naghị egosi onwe ya n’utu nwaanyị maọbụ n’ike onye bu ya”.
Dịka Okoli si kwuo, mmadụ hapụ ọrịa a n’ahụ ya ma ghara ịlebara ya anya ruo oge dị anya, o nwereike ibutere onye ahụ ọnọdụ amụghị nwa, nakwa ọrịa ọzọ a na-akpọ ‘pelvic inflammatory disease’.
Dọkịnta Oderinde Wunmi kọwara na ụzọ mmadụ nwereike isi chekwawa onwe ya n’aka ọrịa a bụ: Nwoke kwesịrị iyi okpu nna bụ enyị n’oge mmekọ ma ọ bụrụ na onye nke ya ga-etinye ọnụ n’utu ya.
Syphilis: Ọrịa a sokwa na ọrịa mmadu nwereike bute site na mmekọ eji ọnụ eme.
Oderinde kọwara na njirimara ọrịa a gụnyere ọnya ịwụkasị mmadụ n’akụkụ ọnụ maọbụ n’akụkụ utu nwoke maọbụ nwaanyị, ike ọgwụgwụ, isi ọwụwa na ahụ mgbu nakwa ahụ mmkpomọkụ.
Oderinde kwusiriike “Ndị mmadụ kwesịrị ima na a na-ebute ọrịa a aghara aghara site n’itinye ọnụ n’akụkụ utu nwoke maọbụ utu nwaanyị” “Ụfọdụ chere na ma ọ bụrụ na ihe nwoke jiri bụrụ nwoke abanyeghị ahụ ha na agbalahụla ọrịa a mana nke a bụghị eziokwu”.
Okoli tinyekwara ọnụ n’okwu a gbaa ama ihe Oderinde kwuru.
Ọ gara n’ihu kọwa na mmadụ ghara ịlebara ọrịa anya n’ahụ ya ruo oge dị anya, onye ahụ nwereike ifeba n’ụbụrụisi onye ahụ ma butekwa ọnwụ.
Dịka ọrịa Gonorrhoea, ụzọ mmadụ nwereike isi chekwawa onwe ya n’aka ọrịa a gụnyere: HPV: Ọrịa a nke aha uju ya na Bekee bụ ‘human papillomavirus’ sokwa n’ọrịa ndị mmadụ nwereike ibute site n’iji ọnụ mee mmekọ nwoke na nwaanyị.
Ọrịa a anaghị ebutekarị njirimara n’agba n’ọha ọ bụla – mana o nwereike ịkpata ihe dịka otutu (warts) n’akụkụ utu nwoke maọbụ utu nwaanyị, n’ime ọnụ  maọbụ n’aka nakwa ụkwụ.
Nke a mere na ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ agaghị ama na ha bu ọrịa a.
Otu ihe dị mkpa bụ na ọrịa a, n’ọtụtụ oge n’eji aka ya ala n’ahụ mmadụ mana ụdịrị ọrịa a nke dị njọ nwereike ibutere mmadụ ọrịa akpụ (cancer).
Otu ahụike ụwa bụ WHO ekwuola na pasentị 90 ụmụnwaanyị nọ n’ọnọdụ ọrịa akpụ nke utu (Cervical cancer) na mba ndị na-enweghị ka ọ hara ha butere ya site n’ọrịa HPV.
A na-akacha ebute ọrịa a na-efe efe nke ukwuu site na mmekọ ejighi okpu nna bụ enyi mee.
Okoli kwuru na nwoke ọbụla marala nwaanyị maọbụ nwaanyị ọbụla marala nwoke enwerela ike ibu ọrịa a.
O kwukwara na e nwere ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa a mana a na-enyekarị naanị ya ụmụ ntorobia na-agafebeghị afọ iri na asatọ.
E nwere ụdịrị okpunna bụ enyị dịịrị ụmụnwoke nakwa ụmụnwaanyị mmadụ kwesịrị iyi n’oge mmekọ.
Herpes: Herpes so n’ọrịa a na-ebute site na mmekọ nke gụnyere nsusu ọnụ nakwa itinye ọnụ n’akụkụ utu nwoke na nwaanyị n’oge mmekọ.
E nwere ụdịrị Herpes dị iche iche nke gunyere “Herpes Simplex virus type 1 (HSV-1) na “Herpes Simplex virus type 2 (HSV-2).
Oderinde kwuru: “Anaghị agwọ ọrịa herpes agwọ mana enwere ọgwụ ndị bu ya ga-esi nyere onwe ha aka.” I jị maa atụ , HSV-1 na-emekarị n’ọnụ ebe HSV-2 na-eme n’ike, ọtụ maọbụ amụ.
O kwukwara na “mmadụ were ọnụ ya metụ onye bu HSV-2, HSV-2 nwereike ime ya n’ọnụ”.
“Eziokwu bụ na ọbụghị iwu na mmadụ ga-edina mmadụ tupu o bute ọrịa herpes”.
WHO kọwara na ọrịa a nwereike ịghara igosi onwe ya n’ahụ onye bu ya mana njirimara ya gụnyere: Ọnya n’akụkụ ọnụ maọbụ n’akụkụ utu.
Mana Okoli kwuru, “Ọ bụghị kwa iwu na mmadụ ga-ahụ ọnya tupu ị mara na ị bu ọrịa Herpes n’ihi na onwere ike izo n’ahụ mmadụ”.
“ Ime nnyocha ime ahụ kwa mgbe kwa mgbe maka ọrịa enwereike isi n’aramara bute dị ezigbo mkpa” Ọ gara n’ihu kwuo: “nchọpụta ọrịa ndị a n’oge n’ahụ mmadụ dị mkpa maka ịmalịte ọgwụgwụ nke ga-azọ ndụ mmadụ”.
Na nchịkọta, o kwuru na ọrịa ndị ọzọ mmadụ nwereike isi na mmekọ eji ọnụ eme bute gụnyere: Chlamydia, Hepatitis A, B na C, HIV , Monkey Pox wdgz.
Oderinde kwuru na “Umụnwoke na-edịna ụmụnwoke na-adanyekarị n’ọnwụnwa ịghara iji okpu nnabụenyị mee mmekọ maka ha anaghị atụ ụjụ ituru ime.” “Ọzọ kwa bụ na mfesa ịṅụ ọgwụike n’etiti ndị ntorobịa arịala elu nke mere ka ha ghara itinye uchu n’ịchekwa onwe ha etu ha kwesiri n’oge mmekọ”..
Gọvanọ Abubakar Sani Bello nke Niger steeti dị na North Central Nigeria, enyela iwu ka emechie ụlọ ọrụ ahụike adịghị mma dịka akụkụ nke usoro na-eme ka ụlọ ọrụ nlekọta ahụike na steeti ahụ dịkwuo mma.
                                                                                                                                                                Gọvanọ ahụ kwuru nke a na Tọzdee na Minna, isi obodo steeti ahụ n’oge a na-ekesa nkesa ahụhụ 3.7m na ụgbụ a na-agwọ.
                                                  “Enyere m kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ahụike na ndị otu ya iwu ka ha mechie ụlọọgwụ quack na ebe ahụike dị na steeti ahụ.                                                        ” Gọvanọ ahụ kwuru na gọọmentị steeti etinyela nnukwu ego na nkwa n’ịkwalite ọrụ ahụike n’ime afọ ndị pụtara ìhè na mbelata nke nta nke nta nke ịba na steeti ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  “Anyị ga-aga n’ihu na-etinye nlebara anya na nnyefe ahụike ka ọ gbasie ike na uru anyị dekọrọ na ngalaba ahụ.
                                                                       “Anyị eguzobela ụlọ ọrụ ahụike ọhụrụ ma nwekwuo ikike nke ndị dị ugbu a iji gboo mkpa ndị mmadụ na-abawanye.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               ” Gọvanọ Abubakar Sani Bello bụ onye gakwara n’ihu kwuo na ụlọ ọrụ ahụike Primary Health Care Development Agency na-agbasi mbọ ike iji gboo mkpa ahụike ndị mmadụ na steeti ahụ, kwukwara na gọọmenti Niger steeti na-agbasi mbọ ike ịhụ na ndị niile bi na steeti ahụ nwere ohere,ọrụ nlekọta ahụike dị oke ọnụ yana dị ọnụ ala na ọkwa niile.
                                                                                                                                                                                       Ka ọ na-agwa ndị mmadụ n’ofe steeti ahụ mkpa ọ dị iji ụgbụ anwụnta ekesara nke ọma wee belata ihe egwu nke ọrịa ịba, Gọvanọ Sani Bello gwara ndị mmadụ n’ofe steeti ahụ ka ha gbasie mbọ ike na ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi COVID-19 iji gbochie ntiwapụ ọzọ.
                                                                                   Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ahụike nke Naijiria, Dr Osagie Ehanire, nke Dr Usman Abubakar nọchitere anya ya, onye nlekọta ahụike (MD), Federal Medical Center, Bida, kwuru na Federal Ministry of Health na mmekorita ya na gọọmentị steeti Niger na ndị mmekọ Roll Back ịba etinyela usoro.
na ebe iji nweta mgbasa ozi ITN na-aga nke ọma na steeti.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Ka ọ na-ekele ndị niile metụtara ya n’ọgụ a na-alụso ịba ọgụ, onye ozi ahụ arịọrọ ndị omenaala na okpukperechi ka ha nyere aka n’ịgba ndị mmadụ ume ka ha na-ehi ụra n’ime ụgbụ ọ bụla, na-ekwu na aka niile ga-adị n’elu elu iji hụ na ọrịa ịba na-adịghị na Naijiria.
Atụmatụ maka mgbake, nkwụsi ike na mmepe akụ na ụba ogologo oge nke mpaghara North-Eastern nke Nigeria, ekpughere ma kwado ya.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Ewubere atụmatụ a nke afọ iri n’ogidi iri na otu nke mejupụtara akụkụ ndị dị mkpa maka nlọghachi azụ na mmepe na-adigide na mpaghara ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         N’ikpughe atumatu a, na Abuja Nigeria, odeakwụkwọ nke Gọọmenti etiti bu, Boss Mustapha kwuru na a chọrọ ihe karịrị puku ijeri naira iri atọ na otu iji mejuputa ọrụ a.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        SGF kwuru na ọ dị mkpa ka ndị niile na-etinye aka na ngalaba ọha na nkeonwe, ndị mmekọ mmepe, ọkachasị ndị na-enye onyinye, ka ha nweta ego na itinye ego nke ọma na mpaghara ndị nwere nnukwu ego, mana ndị North-East Region na-erigbu obere ihe.
                                                                      “N’ịga n’ihu na ihe ngosi ndị e mere na mbụ ebe a, ọ bụ ihe kwesịrị ịrịba ama na Commission, site na ndụmọdụ dị iche iche na ntinye aka dị iche iche nke ọ na-eme, achọpụtalarị ndị dị mkpa ya dị oke mkpa bụ ndị ọ ga-eji tinye NESDMP.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  “Iwu NEDC nyere iwu ka Kọmịshọn ahụ jikọọ na Ministries Federal, Ngalaba na Ụlọ Ọrụ, States na Development Partners na mmejuputa usoro niile kwadoro na Master Plan maka nkwụsi ike na mmepe nke North-East Mpaghara site n’aka gọọmenti etiti.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Ọ chọkwara NEDC ka ya na ndị mmekọ mmepe obodo ma ọ bụ mba ụwa na ndị na-abụghị ndị gọọmentị na-emekọrịta ihe iji hụ na ha na ndị ọzọ metụtara na-emekọrịta ihe kwekọrọ na atụmatụ Master.                                                                                                                                                                            ” Boss Mustapha gbakwụnyere na nzọụkwụ e ji wughachi mpaghara North-East na-esochi ọgbaghara ndị Boko Haram na-adịghị mma, bụ mmezu nke nkwa mkpọsa nke President Buhari kwere ndị North-East Geo-Political Zone.
                                                                                                                                    “Obi abụọ adịghị ya, anyị nwere ike ikwu n’atụghị egwu na NEDC aghọwo otu n’ime ọrụ dị mkpa nke nchịkwa a,” ka o kwusiri ike.
Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ọdịmma mmadụ, njikwa ọdachi na mmepe mmekọrịta ọha, Sadiya Umar Farouq kwusiri ike na atụmatụ a bụ ihe akaebe sitere na ya.                              “Aghọtara m na usoro nkọwapụta nke nnukwu atụmatụ a kwesịrị ịbụ ihe niile na-etinye aka ma gbasaa iji hụ na ndị NEDC na-ewepụta Mmemme ahụ, na-egbo mkpa nke ndị ọ metụtara na mpaghara,” Farouq kwuru.
Onye na-anọchite anya Onye Nchịkọba Mba, National Social Investment Programme, Dr Umar Bindir, Minista ahụ kpọrọ oku maka mmekọrịta yiri nke ahụ na usoro mmejuputa.
                                                                                                      Gọvanọ nke Borno State na onyeisi oche, North-East Governors’ Forum, Babagana Umara Zulum kwuru na Master plan bụ ihe kacha pụta ìhè nke NEDC kemgbe mmalite, ya mere ọ dị mkpa ka Commission tinye ego na atụmatụ atụmatụ na mgbanwe.
                                                                                     “Nke a bụ n’ihi na ọ bụrụ na etinyere ya nke ọma na n’ụzọ ziri ezi, ọ bụghị nanị na ọ ga-emeju ihe ndị Gọvanọ na-eme na steeti, site n’itinye ego na ọrụ mgbanwe, ma na-ejekwa ozi dị ka ihe ntinye aka maka mgbanwe nke mpaghara.
                                                            “Ọ ghaghị ịbụ atụmatụ iji chọpụta na akụrụngwa o nwere nwere oke na pasent dị ịrịba ama bụ oge agbụ n’ihi na ọ nwere nanị afọ 7 ịga.
Ntinye ego na oru NEDC na-akwado ga-eto ihe Gọọmenti steeti na-eme ma zere ikwughachi ugboro ugboro ka anyị wee nweta mmetụta mmekọ.
Ntinye ego ndị a bụ iji jeere mpaghara ahụ ozi.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          “Ịkwesịrị ka gị na ndị ọchịchị steeti na-emekọrịta ihe mgbe niile ka ị na-akọ akụkọ banyere ihe ị na-eme, mana ọ dị mkpa na ọkwa dị mkpa maka ndụmọdụ, na ịgha mkpụrụ nke echiche na n’agbanyeghị nrụgide ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị niile, ị ghaghị itinye ego na mpaghara ndị dị oke atụmatụ, mgbanwe mgbanwe, ma nwee mmetụta ogologo oge n’ịgbanwe akụ na ụba nke mpaghara ahụ.                                                                                                  “Dị ka nnukwu okporo ụzọ, na-ejikọta isi obodo steeti na mba ndị ọzọ na mba ụwa, netwọk ụgbọ okporo ígwè, na-ejikọta na mba ndị ọzọ na mba ụwa, ụlọ ọrụ gas gas pipeline, mpaghara nyocha ọrụ ugbo na ụlọ ọrụ ọzụzụ, atụmatụ mmepe obodo mmadụ,” Gọvanọ Zulum kọwara.
                                             Onye isi nchịkwa, North East Development Commission, Mohammed Alkali kwuru na atụmatụ Master nwere ihe karịrị 500 Atụmatụ, ọrụ na mmemme.
Alkali kwuru, “Obi dị anyị ụtọ nke ukwuu ịnye gị akwụkwọ nchịkọta maka atụmatụ, mmemme na ọrụ ndị dị mkpa, na-adịgide adịgide, nke ndị niile metụtara nwere ike ịbanye,” Alkali kwuru..
Ngalaba Gọọmentị Imo Steeti na-ahụ maka obodo ịdị ọcha bụ Environmental Transformation Commission (ENTRACO) ekwuola ihe mere ha ji ekpochapụ ndị e chere bụ ndị ara na ndị arịrịọ juru n’okporoụzọ dị n’Owerri.
Onyeisi ngalaba a bụ Nkem Frank Nzenwodo gwara nhdi ntaakukọ na ọtụtụ ndị ha chere bụ ndị ara nọ n’okporoụzọ Owerri abụghị ndị ara.
“Mgbe anyị chụpụchara ndị na-ere ahịa n’okporoụzọ Douglas Owerri, anyị chọpụtara n’ụfọdụ ndị e chere bụ ndị ara kwụcha n’ụzọ ahụ bụcha ndị isi zuru oke.
“Ụfọdụ n’ime ha mere ka ndị ngwọrọ na ndị kpuru isi na-arịọ arịrịọ, mana e nweghi ihe ọbụla mere ha” “Nke tụrụ m n’anya bụ mgbe anyị chọrọ inwuchi otu onye, onye ngwọrọ ọzọ nọ na ‘wheel chair’, biliri n’ụkwụ ya abụọ ma rie mbọmbọ ọsọ.” “M wee tie mkpu na ihe ịrịbaama emeela na Douglas”.
Nzenwodo gara n’ihu kwuo na nnyocha ọzọ ha mere gosiri na ọtụtụ n’ime ndị a na-eche na ha bụ ndị ara, bụcha ndị ohi na-akpa ike n’Owerri.
Ọ sị na mgbe ha na-achụ ndị a ọsọ, na ha hụrụ ngwa egbe na akpa ọgwụ bụ nke ha ji akpa ike.
Ọ gara n’ihu kwuo na ọ bụ ọtụtụ ndị okenye a sị na ara na-ayị ha n’okporoụzọ na-atụwa ụmụnwaanyị ime.
Kedụ ebe a na-ebuga ndị ha nwuchiri? Nzenwodo sị n’ime ụfọdụ ndị ha jiderela, ha chọpụtara na isi zuru ha oke.
“Ndị niile anyị nwuchirila ahụ dịcha ha mma site n’ajụjụ anyị jụrụ ha.
“O nwere nke sị na ọ bụ onye Mbaitoli na ọ bụghị onye ara.
Anyị na-akpọla ha obodo ha si bịa.” O kwukwara na ha ga-esi n’Owerri bụ isi obodo Imo Steeti zachaa ma kpochapụ ndị ara niile banye n’obodo ndị ọzọ..
Ndị agha nke Headquarters 82 Division na Nigerian Army, chụpụrụ ndị agha abụọ bụ Proscribed Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB) na ndị agha ya bụ Eastern Security Network (ESN) n’okporo ụzọ Eke Ututu – Ihitte Nansa dị na Orsu Local Government Area nke Imo steeti.
                                             Ndị agha ahụ bụ 34 Artillery Brigade, yana ndị agha nke ndị agha mmiri Naijiria, Air Force na ndị ọrụ nchekwa ndị ọzọ mejupụtara.
                                 Dịka nkwupụta sitere n’aka onye isi mgbasa ozi ọha na eze ndị agha, Brigadier General Onyema Nwachukwu wepụtara; “Ha zutere ndị ahụ na-enupụ isi ka ha na-eme mwakpo gburugburu mpaghara izugbe nke Orsu Ihitte Ukwa na Ihitte Nansa.
                                                                                               “Ndị otu a nọpụrụ iche ewerela ọnọdụ ịmalite otu n’ime ndị na-ebu egbe rọketi, mgbe ndị agha na-amụ anya bupụ ha.
                                                     “Ndị agha ahụ na-atụghị egwu ahụ merụrụ ahụ, ka Mmprovised Explosive Devices (IED) nke ndị otu tinyere gbawara n’ahịa Eke Ututu, mebie ụfọdụ ụlọ ahịa dị n’ahịa ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  “Ahịa Eke Ututu aghọọla ihe na-awụ akpata oyi n’ahụ n’oge na-adịbeghị anya maka na ndị na-enupụ isi na-ezutekarị ndị agha na-eji ogbunigwe na egbe egbe sitere n’ime na gburugburu ahịa ahụ, ebe ndị agha na-eme nchegharị oge niile.
                                                                                                               “Mgbe ihe ahụ mechara, ndị otu Explosive Ordnance Device (EOD) nwetara ọtụtụ ngwa mgbawa arụrụ arụ (IED) nke a kụrụ n’akụkụ okporo ụzọ, yana ndị na-ebupụta rọketi ndị obodo.”                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Ndị agha ahụ kwughachiri nkwa ha iji hụ na enweghị ebe nchekwa maka ndị omempụ niile na-arụ ọrụ na steeti ahụ..
Site na mgbe mgbo, ndị Igbo bụ ndị a ma ama na-agbasi mbọ ike n’ụzọ dị iche iche gụnyere azụmaahịa, ọrụ ugbo na ihe ndị ọzọ.
Nke a mere ka ha bụrụ ndị nwere oke mmasị n’ịkwụrụ onwe ha na-adabereghi na onye ọbụla.
N’ihi ya, ọtụtụ ndị Igbo si n’obodo dị iche iche siri ọnwụ ma lụọ ọgụ oge ndị ọcha chọrọ ịbata obodo ha ịchị ha.
E meriri ha n’ụfọdụ agha ndị a nke mere ndị ọcha jiri nwee ohere bata ma were ọnọdụ.
Ụfọdụ agha ndị a gụnyere; Agha Ekumeku Nke abụ agha ndị mba Briten na ndị obodo Anioma nke dị na Delta steeti lụrụ oge gboo.
NDị Anioma gbochiri ndị Briten site n’afọ1883 ruo 1914.
Emeka Esogbue bụ onye ọnụ na-eru n’okwu maka akụkọ ihe mere eme kwuru na ọ bụ mgbe ndị mba Briten hiwere ụlọọrụ nke gbanwere etu ndị Igbo si ebi ndụ butere ya bụ agha.
Ndị Anioma ji ube na ụta lụọ ya bụ ọgụ ebe ndị Briten ji egbe.
Ọ bụ ụfọdụ obodo dịka Kwale, Ubulu-Uku, Ọgwashị-Uku, Asaba na Igbuzo bụ ụfọdụ ndị soro lụọ ya bụ ọgụ.
Ugwu Ntijiegbe –  Ndị obodo Achị Onye ọnụ na-eru n’okwu maka akụkọ ihe mere eme bụ Dọkịnta Mcgregor Ibeneme kọwara maka agha ndị obodo Achi na ndị ọcha lụrụ.
Ibeneme kwuru sị, “ Ndị obodo Achị chụpụrụ ndị ọcha site n’ọgụ oge mbụ ha chọrọ ịbata ala ha”.
O kwuru na dịka akụko ndị obodo Achị na-akọ na ndị Briten mechara lọhachi were kpọọ ụmụnwoke obodo Achị nzụkọ.
Ibenem kwuru sị, “ Mgbe ndị ụmụnwoke Achị bịara nzụkọ a ka ndị ọcha gbara ha gburugburu, napụ ha ngwa egbe, tijiesie ha ma gbuo ọtụtụ ụmụnwoke ndị a”.
Ya mere ndị obodo Achi jiri nwee ugwu ha na-akpọ ‘ugwu ntijiegbe’ ruo taa.
Agha ndị Arochukwu Nke a bụ agha ndị Arọchukwu na ndị mba Briten lụrụ site n’afọ 1901 ruo afọ 1902.
Ndị Arochukwu lụrụ ya bụ agha dịka ha chere na ndị mba Briten chọrọ ịnapụ ha ikike ịchị onwe ha dịka obodo kwụụrụ onwe ya.
Ngagharịiwe Ụmụnwaanyị Aba   Ụmụ nwaanyị Aba mere ngagharịiwe nke wuru ewu n’ebe niile oge ahụ.
N’afọ 1928, ndị ọcha mba Ịngland na-achị Naịjirịa malitere ịnakọ ụmụnwoke ụtụisi.
Ha na-ezipu ndị mmadụ ka ha kpagharịa n’ụlọ n’ụlọ gụkọọ ụmụnwoke.
Mana n’afọ 1929, ndị ọchịchị nyere iwu na ụmụnwaanyị nakwa anụ ụlọ ga-eso n’ihe a na-agụkọ iji gbakọọ ụtụisi.
Nke a ekweghị ụmụnwanyị odidi chaa chaa n’ihi na ihe siri ike oge ahụ; ha wee foro ntutu taa, gbakọọ ọnụ wee malite ngagharịiwe.
Otu n’ime ndịisi ụmụnwaanyị ahụ so hazie ‘Aba Women Riot’ bụ nwaanyị a kpọrọ Nwanyeruwa.
Dịka akụkọ si kwuo, Nwanyeruwa wụ onye Ngwa mana ebe a lụrụ ya wụ n’Oloko.
Ndị ọzọ bụ Ikonnia, Nwannedia na Nwugo.
Onye nke ọzọ bụ Mary Okezie nke a sị bụ nwaanyị Ngwa mbụ gụrụ akwụkwọ.
Okezie esoghị mee ngagharịiwe ahụ mana ọ bụ ya dere akwụkwọ degara otu e hibere ka ha nyochaa ihe kpatara ya bụ ngagharịiwe.
Ngagharịiwe a rukwara obodo dịka Ikot-Abasi nke dị n’Akwa Ibom Steeti.
Ọ bụ eziokwu na ihe karịrị ụmụnwaanyị iri ise nwụrụ na ya bụ ngagharịiwe ka ndị uweojii bịara jiri egbe chụsasịa ha ma gbaa ha egbe, mana ọ mịtara mkpụrụ.
O mere ka ndị ọcha na-achị oge ahụ mata na ụmụnwaanyị abụghị ofe nkupu.
Ngagharịiwe ahụ mekwara ka otu ụmụnwaanyị siwanye ike na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa niile..
Ndị Gọvanọ Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naijirịa ekwuola ihe ha ga-eme iji kekpọọ ọnọdụ nchekwa dị ọjọọ na mpaghara ahụ.
Nke a dị n’akwụkwọ ozi ha wepụtara bụ nke onyeisi ha bụ Dave Umahi, gọvanọ Ebonyi Steeti gụpụtaara ndị ntaakụkwọ.
Ha mere mkpebi a n’ọgbakọ ha nwere n’Enugwu Steeti n’ụbọchị Sọnde iji leban anya n’okwu banyere nchekwa nakwa ihe ndị ọzọ metụtara mapaghara a.
Ndị bịara ọgbakọ ahụ gụnyere; Gọvanọ Enugwu Steetị bụ Ifeanyi Ugwuanyi, Gọvanọ Okezie Ikpeazu nke Abia Steeti, Gọvanọ David Umahi nke Ebonyi Steeti ma bụrụkwa Onyeisioche ndị Gọvanọ Ọwụwa Anyanwụ, ebe a ndị osote Gọvanọ Anambra na Imo Steetị bụ Onyekachukwu Ibezim na Placid Njoku, nọchitere anya Gọvanọ Chukwuma Soludo na Gọvanọ Hope Uzodinma.
Ihe ndị gbara ọkpụrụkpụ ha kwuru Cheta na ndị Gọvanọ a nwere ọgbakọ n’ọwa Eprelụ afọ 2021 ha ndị ọrụ nchekwa dị iche iche bụ ebe ha nọ hiwe ngalaba nchekwa a kpọrọ ‘Ebuagu’.
Ọrụ Ebubeagu bụ ichekwa mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ site n’aka ndị ohi, ndị ekperima ndị ntọrị, ndị ọchịehi na-egbu ndị mmadụ nakwa ndị ọzọ.
Kamgbe ahụ rute ugbua, a ka na-anụta akụkọ ntọrị nakwa ogbugbu ndị mmadụ na mpaghara dị iche iche maka ọ dizi ka ọ ka njọọ ugbua..
Onye ndu ndị ekpe na Brazil Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva emeriela obere ntuli aka onye isi ala na-emeri onye nọ n’ọchịchị Jair Bolsonaro.
                    Dabere na ikike ntuli aka nke obodo ahụ, Courtlọikpe Kasị Elu Electoral (TSE), Lula nwetara 50.9% nke ntuli aka megide 49.1% Bolsonaro.
           Onye isi aka nri Jair Bolsonaro ekwenyebeghị imeri na-ebuli nchegbu na ọ nwere ike ịgba aka na nsonaazụ ahụ.                                                                       “Rula ruo ugbu a, Bolsonaro akpọghị m ka m mata mmeri m, amaghịkwa m ma ọ ga-akpọ ma ọ bụ na ọ ga-amata mmeri m,” Lula gwara iri puku kwuru iri puku ndị na-akwado jubilant na-eme ememe mmeri ya na Sao Paulo’s Paulista Ave.
                                                                                              N’afọ gara aga, Bolsonaro kwurịtara n’ihu ọha ịjụ ịnakwere nsonaazụ votu ahụ, na-ekwu na-enweghị isi na usoro ntuli aka eletrọnịkị Brazil nwere ike ịghọ aghụghọ.
Emebere nraranye Lula dị afọ 77 maka Jenụwarị 1.
                                                                                                                                                         Ọ bụ nlọghachi dị egwu maka onye bụbu onye isi ala aka ekpe na ntaramahụhụ nye Bolsonaro, onye mbụ nọ n’ọchịchị Brazil meriri ntuli aka onye isi ala.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Onye isi ala US Joe Biden kelere Lula maka imeri “ntuli aka n’efu, nke ziri ezi na ntụkwasị obi,” isonye na otu egwu otuto sitere n’aka ndị isi Europe na Latin America.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Ndị na-ahụ maka ntuli aka mba ụwa kwuru na emere ntuliaka ụbọchị Sọnde nke ọma.
                                                                                                                 Otu onye nleba anya kwuru na ndị na-enyocha ndị agha ahụghị ntụpọ ọ bụla na ule iguzosi ike n’ezi ihe ha mere na usoro ịtụ vootu.
                                Mmeri Lula na-eme ka “omiri pink” ọhụrụ na Latin America, ka mmeri ndị aka ekpe dị ịrịba ama na Colombia na ntuli aka Chile, na-ekwupụta mgbanwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mpaghara afọ iri abụọ gara aga nke webatara Lula na ọkwa ụwa.
                                                                                                   O kwela nkwa ịlaghachite n’ụba akụ na ụba steeti na atumatu mmekọrịta ọha na eze nyere aka mee ka ọtụtụ nde mmadụ pụọ na ịda ogbenye n’oge okwu abụọ dị ka onyeisi oche site na 2003 ruo 2010.
                                                                                                                                                                                          Ọ na-ekwekwa nkwa ịlụso mbibi nke oke ọhịa Amazon ọgụ, ugbu a ọ dị elu afọ iri na ise, ma mee Brazil onye ndu na mkparịta ụka ihu igwe zuru ụwa ọnụ.
Onye bụbu onye ndu otu nke amụrụ na ịda ogbenye, Lula haziri ọgụ megide ọchịchị ndị agha Brazil na 1970s.
                                                    Ọganihu akụ na ụba nke ngwa ahịa na-ebute n’ọkwa ọchịchị ya bụ oge abụọ wee hapụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ewu.
                                                                     Agbanyeghị, ndị ọrụ ya mechara daa site na nnukwu nlaazu na nrụrụ aka na-emebi emebi nke tụrụ ya mkpọrọ ọnwa 19 maka ikpe iri ngo, nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu kagburu n’afọ gara aga..
Ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị nwụrụ n’àkwà mmiri daa na ọdịda anyanwụ steeti India dị na Gujarat eruola 132.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Ebutere ịja mma nke Minista ahụ na nkwupụta nke onye isi ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Naijiria (NCC) na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi ọha, Reuben Muoka.
                 Bah, bụ onye duru ndị nnọchi anya Gambian, gụnyere ndị na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ na nleta nkwanye ugwu na njikwa nke Nigerian Communications Commission (NCC) na Abuja 3 kwuru na nleta ahụ mere ka ọ bụrụ ihe ịga nke ọma, nke Nigeria gbara akaebe na ngalaba na mkpa Gambia.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         O kwuru na ọ bụ ya mere mba ọdịda anyanwụ Afrịka ji mechaa hazie ka e hiwe kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi dị ka NCC nke Naijiria.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               “Ọnụ ọgụgụ ụlọ ọrụ dị ugbu a bụ ihe akaebe na Naijiria na-emezu ebumnuche ya nke iji digitization nke akụ na ụba ya.”                Ọ chọrọ nkwado ndụmọdụ nke Commission na imekọ ihe ọnụ iji mee ka ọganihu akụ na ụba dịkwuo elu ma melite arụmọrụ na mba abụọ ahụ ma mee ka akụkụ niile dị na mpaghara Afrịka dị ike.
                                                                                                                                                                                              Onye isi na-ahụ maka ọrụ iwu na iwu na NCC, Josephine Amuwa, bụ onye natara ndị nnọchiteanya ahụ n’aha onye isi oche onye isi oche nke NCC, Prof.
Umar Danbatta, gosipụtara mmetụta nke Nigerian Communications Act (NCA) 2003.
                                                                                                            O kwuru na NCA 2003 na-enye Kọmishọna ikike ịrụzu ọrụ iwu ya nke ọma, otu n’ime ha bụ imepụta ọnọdụ na-enye ohere maka asọmpi n’etiti ndị na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, yana ịnye ọrụ mgbasa ozi dị mma na nke ọma na mba niile.
                                                                                                                      Amuwa kwuru maka ọrụ Commission a na-ahụ maka ịhụ na ikike nke Universal Service Provision Fund (USPF), mezuru na nke mere ka e nwee mmemme dị iche iche na-abara ndị Naijiria uru.
                                                                                                                                                                                    “NCA 2003 hiwere USPF iji hụ na agbasawanye ọrụ n’ime ime obodo iji hụ na ọrụ telecom dị na mpaghara enweghị ọrụ na enweghị nchekwa, ọbụlagodi n’ime obodo mepere emepe, iji mezuo ebumnuche gọọmentị.”                                                                            Amuwa kpọpụtakwara usoro ndụmọdụ na imekọ ihe ọnụ n’usoro n’usoro ekwentị dịka otu n’ime ihe na-eme ka Kọmịshịa nwee ọganiihu.
   “Komishọna ahụ na-anakwere usoro ntinye iwu na-ekere òkè ebe a na-akpọ ndị isi na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ka ha bịa na nnọkọ ọha na eze maka nyocha ọzọ iji hụ na a na-atụle echiche nke ndị na-eme ihe n’ịmepụta ụkpụrụ nduzi ndị a,” ka o kwuru.
                                   Amuwa gbara ndị nnọchi anya ahụ ume ka ha gaa na webụsaịtị Commission ka ha mụọ ntuziaka usoro iwu ebipụtara maka ihe niile dị mkpa.
                Ọ kọwara na ntuziaka a na-enye mmetụta zuru oke na ndokwa na nchịkwa nke NCA 2003..

                                                                                                                                                                 vNdị nnọchite anya otu ahụ, Mazị Solomon Asuquo na Prọfesọ Offiong Ani Offiong, bụ otu n’ime ndị kpọkọtara ọnụ ụlọ obodo ebe enwere nghọta, kwusara mkpa ọ dị maka ịdị n’otu na ntinye aka nke ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
                                                                                                                                   N’okwu ya, onye nhazi otu ahụ, Maazị Asuquo kwuru na a kpọkọtara ụlọ nzukọ obodo ahụ nke nwere isiokwu “For A Purposeful, Inclusive and United Southern Cross River” iji leba anya n’okwu nke ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị “Back to South” welitere.
                                                                                          “Laghachite na ndịda” bụ okwu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, nke ụfọdụ ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị sitere na mpaghara ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Cross River steeti chepụtara ma gbadoro ụkwụ na ‘zoning’ ma ọ bụ ngbanwe ọchịchị karịsịa ike ọchịchị gọvanọ, ruo ndịda Cross River.
                                                 Ntinye aka Asuquo chere na PDP, nke nwere onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke steeti etiti steeti ahụ, ga-abụrịrị ezinaụlọ gbasoo mgbakasị ahụ “Back to South” wee depụta usoro nke njikọta ma ọ bụrụ na pati ahụ ga-ebutere mmeri na 2023.
                                                                                                                 Dị ka Asuquo si kwuo, “a na-akpọ nzukọ a ka anyị nyochaa ịdị adị anyị n’ozuzu ya wee nyochaa yardstick a na-etinyekarị na ikesa ike ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọkwa n’etiti mpaghara geo-political.”       Ọ gara n’ihu kwuo, “Nke a bụ n’ihe gbasara ị nweta nkwa ka ukwuu site n’aka ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị iji nweta nkwado siri ike na ọchịchị iji mee ka udo dịrị n’etiti obodo ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na agbụrụ anyị.”                                                                                                                                                                                                                            N’ikwu ya n’ụzọ ọzọ, onye nhazi ahụ, Prọfesọ Offiong Ani Offiong gwara ndị otu ahụ ka ha tinye uche n’ikike nke onye nyocha ahụ, iguzosi ike n’ezi ihe ya na ntinye aka ya iji wepụta ezi oke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya dị ka ịmepụta ọrụ, ịmaliteghachi ego nke ọtụtụ ijeri naira na inye ego.

                                                                                                                                                                                                          CP Ayodeji bụ onye weghaara ọrụ dị ka Kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii nke iri atọ na isii na steeti ụbọchị ole na ole gara aga, kwuru na “site n’ịrụsi ọrụ ike, ndị ọrụ uwe ojii ga-achọpụta ndị nwere oke mkpa na ha ga-arụkọ ọrụ, n’ịlụso mpụ ọgụ na mpụ ọgụ ruo obere ntakịrị”.                          Kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii bụ onye kwusiri ike na nchịkọta ọgụgụ isi nyere ndị ọrụ uwe ojii Divisional, (DPO) iwu maka mkpa ịgbasa tent ha maka ozi n’ime mpaghara ọrụ ha dị ka akụkụ nke ngwa ngwa.
                                                                                                                                                                               “Niger Steeti bụ steeti kachasị ukwuu na mba ahụ, si otú a na-eme ka ọ bụrụ ngwa ngwa maka ihe ịma aka nke mpụ na mpụ.”  CP bụ onye ji ohere ahụ chọọ ndị isi ọrụ isii ọhụrụ a kwalitere na Command mma, kwuru na nkwalite bụ ihe ọṅụ na ụdị nkwenye maka ịrụsi ọrụ ike na ntinye aka n’ọrụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Audu n’aha ndị ọrụ ahụ e buliri elu kelere Inspector General of Police, Commissioner Service Commission na Commissioner of Police, Niger State Command.

Gọọmenti etiti ebidola mgbasa ozi n’ichepụta ihe egwu dị n’iji ọgwụ mgbochi Antimicrobial Resistance (AMR) na ọgwụ ndị ọzọ metụtara eme ihe na mpaghara mpaghara anụ ụlọ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọgwụgwọ ọrịa anụmanụ nke Nigeria (CVON), Dr Maimuna Habib, kwuru nke a n’oge mmeghe nke mmega ahụ na Karu, Abuja.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     O kwuru na ebumnuche ahụ bụ iji gboo nsogbu na-eto eto nke iguzogide ọgwụ nje na ọgwụ nje ndị ọzọ.
                                                                                     O kwuru na mmega ahụ a bụ iji kparịta na ikpughe ihe egwu dị na AMR, na-agbakwunye na a na-eme emume mkpọsa a n’ụwa niile n’ebumnobi ịbawanye mmata maka nguzogide mgbochi nje n’ụwa niile.
                                                                                                                                                               Habib, onye bụkwa onye isi ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọgwụgwọ anụmanụ na mgbochi pest, Federal Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development, kwuru na AMR bụ otu n’ime anụ ọhịa ndị zoro ezo na-egbu egbu kpatara ọnwụ nke ọtụtụ nde mmadụ na anụmanụ n’ụwa niile, gụnyere Nigeria.                        Onye dibia bekee kọwara na ọgwụ mgbochi bụ ọgwụ ma ọ bụ ihe arụpụtara iji gbuo ma ọ bụ gbochie uto nke ụmụ nje na-ebute ọrịa dịka nje bacteria, fungi, protozoans na ndị ọzọ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  O kwuru na mmata a bụkwa iji kwalite omume kacha mma n’etiti ọha mmadụ, ndị ọrụ ugbo, anụmanụ, ndị ọrụ ahụike mmadụ na gburugburu ebe obibi.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   “Onye na-agwọ ọrịa anụmanụ site na ọdịdị nke ọzụzụ ya nwere ihe ọmụma zuru oke nke ntụziaka maka ọgwụgwọ ọrịa ma ọ bụ ọrịa dị iche iche,” ka o kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                             O kwuru na onye na-agwọ ọrịa anụmanụ nwere ike ịkwado oge ọgwụgwọ na doses dabere na ihe akaebe kachasị mma maka ikpe ọ bụla.
                      Itinye ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa ndị a site n’aka ndị na-enweghị ikike na-eduga n’iji ya eme ihe n’ụzọ na-ezighị ezi, iji ya eme ihe ma ọ bụ mebie ya na nsonaazụ ndị bịaranụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  “N’ụwa nile, iji ihe na-ezighị ezi na iji ọgwụ nje eme ihe n’ụzọ gabigara ókè bụ isi ihe na-akpata mmepe nke mgbochi nje,” ka o kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Ọ kọwara na nke a pụtara na ọgwụ ndị emepụtara ma ọ bụ mepụta iji gbuo ma ọ bụ gbochie uto nke ihe ndị na-akpata ọrịa ma ọ bụ nje enweghịzi ike imegide ha n’ihi na ha amalitela iguzogide ọgwụ ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                             Habib kwuru na ihe si na nkwụsi ike ọgwụ a pụta gụnyere mfu nke ndụ na ego, ọnwụ dị elu, ọdịda ọgwụgwọ na ọnwụ n’etiti ndị ọzọ.
                                      O kwuru na isiokwu nke World Antimicrobial Awareness Week (WAAW) 2022 bụ “Igbochi antimicrobial resistance together”.
                  N’okwu ya, Dr Tochi Okowor, onye nhazi mba, Antimicrobial Resistance and Infection Prevention and Control, Nigeria Centre For Disease Control (NCDC), gwara ndị na-ahụ maka anụ ụlọ ka ha na-echekwa gburugburu ebe obibi ha iji gbochie ọrịa.
                                                                                         “Ọ dị mkpa ka ị debe usoro mgbochi niile ọ bụghị naanị maka onwe gị, kama maka anụmanụ ndị ị na-egbu.
                                                                                Ọ sịrị, “Ọ dịkwa mkpa ka ị na-edobe ịdị ọcha nkeonwe mgbe ị na-ahazi anụmanụ maka igbumma.”                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Okowor bụ Dọkịta Chinedu Okoroafor, nke NCDC nọchitere anya ya.

Ha malitere tiwe mkpu maka ajọ ọchịchị..
Praịm Mịnịsta ọhụrụ mba United Kingdom bụ Liz Truss, arịtuola n’ọkwa ọchịchị.
Truss nọrọ naanị abalị iri anọ na ise n’ọkwa ọchịchị tupu ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm.
Nke a mere ya Praịm Mịnịsta ọchịchị ya kacha dị nta na UK.
“Achọpụtala m na n’ihi etu ihe si kwụrụ ugbua, agaghị m enwe ike imezu ihe ndị m kwere na nkwa oge a họpụtara m dịka onyeisi otu ‘Conservative Pati’,” Truss kwuru.
“N’ihi nke a, agwala m ‘His Majesty’ Eze na aga m aritu dịka onyeisi ‘Conservative Pati.” A na-atụ anya na a ga-eme ntuliaka iji họpụta onye ndu ọhụrụ n’ime izuụka na-abịanụ, mana Truss ga-anọgid n’ọkwa ruo mgbe a ga-ahọpụta onye ga-anọchi ya.
Ihe Liz Truss kwuru oge ọ rituru n’ọkwa PM “Aga m na-arụ ọrụ dịka Praịm Mịnịsta ruo mgbe a ga-ahọpụta onye ọhụrụ ga-anọchi m.” – Liz Truss Liz Truss mere mgbasaozi n’ụbọchị Tọzde n’ihu ụlọọrụ Praịm Mịnịsta bụ 10 Downing ‘Street’.
O kwuru sị: “Abatara m n’ọchịchị n’oge ọnọdụ akụnụba na-ama jijiji na mba ụwa dị icheiche.” “Ezinụlọ na ụlọahịa dị icheiche nọ na nchekasị etu ha ga-esi kwụọ ụgwọ dị icheiche ha ji.” “Agha ọjọọ Putin na-aluso Ukraine amajaala ọnọdụ nchekwa nke mpaghara Europe niile.” “Ọnọdụ akụnụba na-anaghị eto eto dọghachiri mba anyị azụ nke ukwuu.” “Pati Conservative họpụtara m dịka onye ndu ka m gbanwee ihe ndị a, anyị gbalịkwara n’ihe gbasara ‘Energy’, nakwa iwetu ‘National Insurance’.” “Anyị malitekwara atụmatụ ibutu ụtụisi ma mee ka ọnọdụ akụnụba gbalie, n’isoro nnwereonwe nke Brexit wetara.” “Mana achọpụtala m na n’ihi etu ihe si kwụrụ ugbua, agaghị m enwe ike imezu ihe ndị m kwere na nkwa oge a họpụtara m dịka onyeisi otu ‘Conservative Pati’.” “N’ihi nke a, agwala m ‘His Majesty’ Eze na aga m aritu dịka onyeisi ‘Conservative Pati.” “N’ụtụtụ taa, mụ na onyeisi ‘1922 committee’ bụ Sir Graham Brady nwere mkparịtaụka, ebe anyị nọ kwekọrịta na a ga-enwe ntuliaka iji họpụta onye ndu ọhụrụ n’ime izuụka na-abịanụ.” “Nke a ga-eme ka anyị nọsie ike n’ụzọ iwulite ma kwadosie ọnọdụ akụnụba nakwa nchekwa obodo anyị ike.” “Aga m na-arụ ọrụ dịka Praịm Mịnịsta ruo mgbe a ga-ahọpụta onye ọhụrụ ga-anọchi m.” Etu nsogbu si malite Truss na ndị omeiwu nwere nrụrịtaụka kporo ọkụ n’ụlọ omeiwu n’ụbọchị Wenezde Nsogbu bidoro oge Truss chụturu Kwasi Kwarteng, bụ Chancellor UK, n’ọkwa ya n’ihi ụfọdụ atụmatụ o tinyere nke mere ka ọnọdụ akụnụba mba ahụ kawanye njọ.
Ka nke a mechara, ụfọdụ ndị omeiwu nọ na pati ‘Conservative’ gwara Truss ka ọ rituo n’ọkwa Praịm Mịnịsta n’ihi na ndị mmadụ enwekwaghị ntụkwasị obi n’atụmatụ ndị ọ na-ewepụta.
Omeiwu Jill Mortimer so na ndị wepụtara akwụkwọ nkatọ ma kwuo na ya enweghị ntụkwasị obi n’ọchịchị Truss.
N’ụbọchị Wenezde, enwere nrụrịtaụka kporo ọkụ n’ụlọ ọgbakọ ndị omeiwu dịka n’etiti Liz Truss na ndị pati Labour.

COAS kwuputara nchekwube n’otu aka ahụ na na njedebe nke mmega ahụ, ha gaara ewelite ọnọdụ udo na ịdị n’otu maka yuletide na omume nke ntuli aka na-eme ihe ike.                                                                             Otú ọ dị, ọ dọrọ aka ná ntị na ndị agha ahụ aghaghị ịnọgide na-enwe ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma ghara ikwe ka e megharịa onwe ha.                                      Na mbụ, onye isi ndị agha na-ahụ maka ọrụ, Major General Tunde Akinjobi, kwuru na ọ ga-agbaso ma usoro nka na nke na-adịghị mma iji mee ka ọ bụrụ enyi na enyi na ụmụ amaala na-erube isi n’iwu.                                                                                                                                                                                    Ọ kpọrọ oku ka ndị otu ọha na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji kwalite mmezu nke steeti njedebe chọrọ.                                                                                                         Onye isi ndị agha na-ahụ maka ndị agha nke 6 Division Nigeria, Major General Olufemi Oluyede, onye ngalaba ya kwadoro ọkọlọtọ ahụ, mesiri ya obi ike na ngalaba ahụ ga-esi ike n’ịchụso ọrụ ya, iji nweta ebumnobi nke ịkwado ọnọdụ kwesịrị ekwesị maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze.
Onye na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala nke pati na-achị Naijiria na, All Progressives Congress, (APC), bụ Maazị Bola Tinubu akpọkuola onye ya na ya na-agba n’otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị People’s Democratic Party (PDP) Atiku Abubakar ka ọ kwado ya.                                                                                                Tinubu kwuru nke a na steeti Kaduna na nzụkọ ya na ndị isi ọtụtụ otu ugwu nwere.
Dị ka APC Flagbearer si kwuo, ọ kwadoro onye na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala nke PDP, Atiku Abubakar mgbe ọ zọọrọ n’elu ikpo okwu nke Action Congress of Nigeria na 2007.                                                                            Mgbe ọ na-ekwu na ọ bụ “oge nkwụghachi ụgwọ”, Maazị Tinubu gbara Atiku ume ka ọ meghachi omume ahụ site n’ịkwado ọkwa ya (Tinubu).                “Atiku si Uyo malite ugbu a na Kaduna, ị na-agwa ndị North na ị bụ ezigbo onye na-azọ ọkwa North; kedu ka anyị ga-esi mee nke ahụ? Ị furu efu nhoputa ndi ochichi.
“Ọ bụ oge nkwụghachi ụgwọ.                                                                                                                                                                                   Ka Atiku kwadoro m kama ịhazi nnọkọ na Kaduna, ebe m na-agwa ndị ama ama na Kaduna okwu.
” Onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi APC onye kpughepukwara ihe ngosi ya nye ndi isi Northern kwere nkwa ime ka North hub nke ahia Agric na Sub-Shara Africa.                           Ọ gara n’ihu kpebisie ike ịkwalite “Naijirịa na-enweghị ike ịkewa na ọganiihu” na ịlaghachi ụmụaka ‘na-anọghị akwụkwọ’, n’ụlọ akwụkwọ.
“Ya mere, ọ bụghị ihe ndabara na na nnwere onwe, e debere ọhụụ a ma tinye ya na ukwe mba mbụ anyị.
Ọ na-ekwu, sị: ‘Ọ bụ ezie na ebo na asụsụ pụrụ ịdị iche, anyị guzo n’òtù ụmụnna.’                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        “Nke a bụ nkwupụta siri ike nke na-ekwenye na anyị dị iche iche, ya mere, ịdị adị nke echiche na mmasị dị iche iche, na otú nke ahụ ekwesịghị isi n’ụzọ nke ịdị n’otu anyị dị ka ụmụnna.                                                                                                                                                                                                                  “Ndị na-ede abụ a, bụ́ Chineke na-ezuru mkpụrụ obi ha, ga-ama jijiji ịmara na afọ 62 gachara, mmadụ ga-abịa n’elu ikpo okwu a dị nsọ ime mkpọsa dabere n’ebo ma ọ bụ ebe ndị ọzọ si.                                                                                                                                                                                                                “Nrọ nke ndị nna nna ahụ, ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụ nwanyị, bụ maka mba ‘ebe a na-emegbu mmadụ, mba’ nwere udo na, ndị a – ịdị n’otu dị iche iche, udo na ọganihu – bụ mmezu nke ozi m na asọmpi a.                                                                                                                                                                                        Ha na-abụkwa nnukwu adreesị m nye gị n’ehihie taa, n’ụzọ kwekọrọ na mpaghara ndị haziri ahazi chọrọ ka m kwuo okwu” Tinubu kwuru.
Onye na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala APC kwere nkwa na ọ ga-eme ka ihe ndị ọchịchị Muhammadu Buhari rụpụtara n’akụkụ niile.                                                                            O kwuru na ọchịchị ya, ga-emejuputa atumatu a na-arụ ọrụ nke ga-eme ka enweghị nchekwa na nwa osisi na North na n’ofe mba ahụ.

National Population Commission na Naijiria ebidola ikpe Post Enumeration Survey, PES, tupu ngụkọ ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na ụlọ na Eprel 2023 na Naịjirịa.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                A ga-eme nyocha a site na 18th ruo 29th nke Ọktoba 2022 na mpaghara 127 ngụkọ n’otu mpaghara ọchịchị dị na steeti ọ bụla n’ime mpaghara geo-political zone isii n’ofe mba ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Onye isi oche kọmịshọn ahụ Mr Nasir Kwarra kwuru na “Post Enumeration Survey, PES, bụ nyocha nnochite anya ọnụ ọgụgụ nke National Population Commission ga-eji lelee izi ezi nke ọnụ ọgụgụ nnwale emere na Julaị 2022.
“PES ga-ekwe ka kọmịshọn ahụ chọpụta mmadụ ole furu efu, gụnyere n’amaghị ama, ma ọ bụ gụọ n’ebe na-ezighi ezi.”                                                                                        Onye isi oche ahụ kwukwara na omume nke “Ọnwụnwa PES bụ akụkụ dị mkpa nke mmemme nkwado maka omume nke ọnụ ọgụgụ na-aga nke ọma na 2023.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Kọmịshọn ahụ na-etinye oke mkpa na mmemme a “Ngụkọta ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ bụ ọnụ ọgụgụ gọọmentị nke mmadụ niile nọ n’otu obodo n’otu oge yana na ọ gụnyere nchịkọta, nchịkọta, nyocha, nyocha, mbipụta na mgbasa ozi gbasara ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ, mmekọrịta ọha na eze na akụ na ụba metụtara ndị mmadụ.”                                                                                                                                                 Ọ kọwara na e mere PES iji mezie njehie enwere ike na usoro ngụkọ ọnụ na-agbakwụnye na a na-eji nsonaazụ ntụnyere a na-ejikarị iji tụọ mkpuchi na njehie ọdịnaya n’ọnọdụ ọnụ ọgụgụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                      Mmega ahụ Ọnwụnwa PES a dabara na ụkpụrụ na ndụmọdụ nke United Nations maka ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ na ụlọ nke na-enye ntụkwasị obi na nsonaazụ ngụkọ ma na-ebute ntụkwasị obi na nnabata nke ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị ọrụ data.
                                                                                                                                           O toro ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Commission maka otu siri ike na ọrụ aka ha na-agbakọba aka n’ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ wee gbasaa ozi ma kụziere ọha mmadụ ihe, karịsịa na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị mmadụ na ụlọ 2023..
Ndị ọrụ nchekwa obodo na Naịjirịa bụ NSCDC anwụchiela mmadụ isii a na-enyo enyo maka idina nwata nwoke dị afọ asaa na otu nwata nwaanyị dị afọ ise n’ike.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Onyeisi ụlọ ọrụ steeti ahụ, Muhammad Saleh Dada, bụ onye kpugheere ndị nta akụkọ ihe a mere n’isi ụlọ ọrụ Command na Sokoto steeti kọwara na a kọsara ya na ngalaba ọchịchị ime obodo Sokoto South nke Corp n’abali iri na asaa nke onwa Ọktoba 2022.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 O kwuru na ndị niile a na-enyo enyo bụ Nasiru Garba, Umar Aliyu, Mustapha Bara’u, Sai’du Dahiru na Rilwanu Usman bụ ndị tozuru oke wee dụkọta ọnụ n’etiti onwe ha iji dinaa nwa nwoke dị afọ asaa na-erubeghị afọ asaa.
                                                                                                                                           Ọ gbakwụnyere, “Ihe kacha wute n’ihe a mere bụ na nwanne nna ya so na ndị ahụ mere nwa nwoke ahụ, ma kpọkuokwa ndị enyi ndị ọzọ ka ha mee otu ihe ahụ na nwata ahụ n’otu ụlọ a na-ewuchabeghị,” ka ọ gbakwụnyere.
                                                                                   N’otu aka ahụ, onye ọchịagha ahụ gara n’ihu kwuo na ikpe ọzọ gbasara idina mmadụ n’ike megide Suleiman Ahmad na Suleiman Hussaini, bụ nke a kọrọ na ngalaba ọchịchị ime obodo Sokoto North n’abalị iri na isii n’ọnwa Ọktoba 2022.
                                                                                                            Dada kwuru na ndị a na-enyo enyo rata ma dina nwa agbọghọ dị afọ ise Dịka onye ọchịagha siri kwuo, ndị niile a na-enyo enyo ekwupụta ma kweta na ha mere mpụ ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Ọ gwara ndị ụlọ ikpe ka ha kwado ikpe ndị a na-enyo enyo ozugbo enwere ike ịhụ na ikpe ziri ezi nye ndị a metụtara.
                                                               Dada kpọkukwara ndị ọkaiwu ka ha mee ihe niile ha nwere ike ime iji chebe ikike ụmụntakịrị dịka ndị Naijiria.

Kpọmkwem, o depụtara mba ndị na-etinye ego kwesịrị ịtụle gụnyere Nigeria, Angola, South Africa na Egypt.                                                                                                                                                           “Taa, anyị na-ekwu maka ahịa oke ala na ihe m na-agwa ndị mmadụ bụ na ka ị na-aga n’ihu na-eche banyere ohere uto na ụwa ma na-ele Africa anya, ị ga-eche echiche banyere ụfọdụ nnukwu akụ na ụba na Africa.                                                                                                                                                            “Nigeria, Angola, South Africa na Egypt bụ akụ na ụba ị kwesịrị ichebara echiche.

Afọ Africa maka uto na mmepe.                                                                                                                                                               “Anyị apụghị ime nke a nanị anyị; anyị ga-anọgide na-achọ nkwado nke ụwa ndị ọzọ.                                                                                                                     Mana enwere m ike mesie anyị niile obi ike na ka ị na-eme nke a, ohere dị ebe ahụ na ị gaghị akwa ụta na ị were ohere ahụ.
Enwere m ike ịga n’ihu na-ekwu ka anyị nye nkwado Africa ka anyị nye nkwado Nigeria.                                                                                                                                 Anyị niile kwesịrị ịga n’ihu na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ maka uto, ọ bụghị naanị maka mba anyị n’otu n’otu kamakwa maka Africa n’ozuzu ya,” Gọvanọ CBN kwukwara.

“Ọtụtụ ala ebe ndị mmadụ kọrọ nri alakwaala n’iyi, ndị mmadụ karịrị nde 1.3 enweghịzi ebe obibi n’ihi ọdachi a,” ka Umar Farouk kwuru.
Ọ gakwara n’ihu kwuo na ya bụ ọdachi abịabeghị n’isi njedebe maka na a na-atụ anya na ide mmiri a ka ga-abịa karịa n’izuụka ndị di n’hu.
Ngalaba gọọmentị na-akọwa maka ihu eligwe bụ ‘Nigeria Meteorological Agency’ na-adọ aka na ntị na ide mmiri a ga-adigide ruo ngwụcha ọnwa Nọvemba na steeti dịka Anambra, Delta, Rivers, Cross River, Bayelsa, na Steeti ndị ọzọ.
Mịnịsta ahụ kwuru na gọọmentị etiti dọrọ aka na ntị maka ọdachi ide mmiri a, “mana ọtụtụ gọọmentị steeti emeghị ihe ọbụla iji kee nkwụcha maka ya, nke kpatara ọtụtụ mbibi nakwa ọnwụ anyị na-ahụ ugbua”.
Ọ gara n’ihu kwuo na gọọmenị amalitela ikesa ọtụtụ ihe enyemaka dịka nri nakwa ihe e ji ebi ndụ, nye ndị ọdachi ide mmiri a metụtara.
Ihe kpatara ọdachia bụ oke mmiri ozuzo nakwa mmepe e mepere ebe a na-eche mmiri a kpọrọ ‘dam’ na mba Kamerun, mana ndị ọkacha mara na-ekwu na ọ bụ adịghị nkwadebe nakwa na gọọmentị etinyeghị ihe mgbochi mere ọdachia ji ka njọ..

Nkwekọrịta mbupụ ọka: Russia rịọrọ UN maka mmejuputa ya.
Russia enyela akwụkwọ ozi nwere mkpesa banyere mmejuputa nkwekọrịta mbupụ ọka n’ oke osimiri na United Nations.
Gennady Gatilov, onye nnọchi anya Russia na United Nations, kwuru na Russia dị njikere ịjụ imeghari nkwekọrịta ahụ n’ọnwa na-abịa  ma anabataghị ihe ọ chọrọ.
“Ọ bụrụ na anyị ahụghị ihe ọ bụla na-eme n’akụkụ Russia nke nkwekọrịta – mbupụ nke ọka Russia na fatịlaịza – mgbe ahụ gbaghara anyị, anyị ga-ele ya anya n’ụzọ dị iche,” ka o kwuru.
A jụrụ ma ọ bụrụ na Russia nwere ike igbochi nkwado maka mmeghari ohuru nke ọka n’ihi nchegbu ahụ, o kwuru, sị: “Enwere ike ime… Anyị anaghị emegide nnyefe nke ọka mana nkwekọrịta a kwesịrị nhata, ọ kwesịrị ịbụ nke ziri ezi na n’ụzọ ziri ezi site n’akụkụ niile.” Ndị ọrụ UN ga-abịa na Moscow na Sọnde iji kparịta mmelite nke nkwekọrịta ahụ.
Ndị ọrụ gọọmentị Russia dọrọ aka ná ntị banyere Agha Ụwa nke Atọ ma ọ bụrụ na Ukraine sonyeere NATO.
Ọ bụrụ na anabatara Ukraine n’ime njikọ ndị agha NATO na-edu US, mgbe ahụ, esemokwu dị na Ukraine ga-abawanye na Agha ụwa nke Atọ, onye ọrụ nchekwa nchekwa Russia kwuru na Thursday.

Ọfọ bụ osisi pụrụiche maka na ndị Igbo na-akwanyere ya ugwu nke ukwuu.
Ndigbo nyere ọfọ ikike dị egwu dịka ikike e ji ekwu eziokwu, ikike e ji ahụ na anaghị emegbu mmadụ.
Ọfọ bụ ihe a na-ahụ anya a na-eji na-egosipụta eziokwu maọbụ nkwekọrịta n’etiti ndị Igbo..
Ihe ọzọ ọtụtụ ndị mara ndị Igbo bụ azụmahịa.
Ha na-ekwu na ụmụ Igbo chị ọkụ n’azụmahịa.
Ọ na-agba ndị mba ọzọ gharịị etu onye Igbo nwere ike ịbata obodo na enweghị ihe ọbụla karịa obere ngwaahịa mana e nye ya oge ọ tụtụjuo akpa ya.
Ọtụtụ na-eji ya ama ndị Igbo njakịrị na onye Igbo nwere ike iresị ndị Eskimo akụ mmiri igwe.
Nke bụ Eziokwu: Ịzụ na ire ahịa mara ndị Igbo ka ego mara Ojukwu.
Nke mere ọ bu ha bu ọka ibe n’Ahịa Ọnịcha, Arịrịa Aba, Mgbuka Nnewi, Nkwo Igbo, Ogbete Enugwu, Alaba Legọọsu dgz..
N’oge gboo mgbe elu bụ ala osa,mgbe ezi di n’ukwu ụkwa,o bu nzu ka eji agwọ ọrịa ụfọdụ n’ala igbo dǃka arụbala nakwa oria mmacha ahụ.Ọ bụkwa nzu ka eji eme pauda n’oge gboo.

Cameroon bụ ndị tụfuru ohere iji nyee goolu ha niile malitere nke ọma n’isi mmalite n’ịkwanye ndị Switzerland nke ukwuu ma majaa ha mana ha ejighi ohere ha nwere mepụta ihe.
Ha tụfuru ohere mbụ ha na nkeji iri ka onye na-eche goolu Switzerland kụchiere bọọlụ, onye Cameroon ọzọ gbakwara bọọlụ n’elu n’elu.
Na mba Cameroon gbanarị ntakiri goolu n’aka onye ọkpọ mba Switzerland ka enyechara Offside na nkeji iri abụọ na abụọ megide Switzerland.
Mgbe ahụ Cameroon tụfuru ohere ọla edo ọzọ iji nye goolu na nkeji iri abụọ na anọ.
Asọmpi a kwụsịrị enweghị goolu na ọkara mbụ.
Nkeji abụọ: n’ime nkeji nke abụọ onye ọkpọ Switzerland, Breel Embolo nwetara goolu mmalite were bute ụzọ.

Onye osote onye isi ala Naijiria, Prọfesọ Yemi Osinbajo na-ekwu na karịa mbelata nke ikuku ikuku  gas na-ekpo ọkụ n’ụwa nile, mgbalị ndị a na-eme iji dozie mgbanwe ihu igwe kwesiri ka eleba anya, karịsịa maka ndị ogbenye na ndị na-adịghị ike.
Prọfesọ Osinbajo, kwuru nke a na Wednesde na Nkuzi Ọha o nyere na “Africa na Climate Justice” na Mahadum Queen’s, Kingston, Canada na ụkwụ ikpeazụ nke ụbọchị 3 ọrụ nlekọta ọrụ na mba North America.
“Echiche nke ikpe ziri ezi nke ihu igwe na-ekwusi ike na na mgbakwunye na mkparịta ụka banyere ikuku gas na-ekpo ọkụ na mkpa ọ dị ibelata ha, anyị na-aghọtakwa na mgbanwe ihu igwe bụ ihe gbasara mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na ihe dị mkpa na-emetụta ọha mmadụ.”.
Onye ndọrọ-ndọrọ ọchịchị nke All Progressives Congress APC, Ahmed Bola Tinubu ekwela nkwa imeziwanye akụnụba Naijiria ma ọ bụrụ na a họpụta ya dị ka onyeisiala nke mba ahụ na ntuli aka na-abịanụ.
Mazị Tinubu kwere nkwa a n’oge a na-achụ nta vootu n’Abakaliki bụ isi obodo steeti Ebonyi.
Onye na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala gwara ndị ndịda-ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria ka ha kwado ya na ndị ọzọ na-azọ ọkwa ọchịchị n’aha All Progressives Congress (APC) .
“Ọ bụrụ na ụnụ kwadoro anyị ka anyị nweta mmeri n’APC, ọchịchị anyị ga-eme ka ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Nigeria bụrụ Taiwan nke Africa” “A ga-eme ka ọkụ latrik dịghachite n’ihi na a gaghị enwe ego ọkụ mmafe maka ndị Naijiria.” Ọ gbakwụnyere.
Agụmakwụkwọ O kwuru na agụmakwụkwọ bụ ngwa ọgụ siri ike iji lụso ụbịam ọgụ, yabụ na gọọmentị ya ga-elekwasị anya na agụmakwụkwọ maka ndị Naijiria niile.
Ọrụ O kwere ndị Ebonyi na-enweghị ọrụ nkwa itinye ha n’ngalaba dị iche iche nke akụ na ụba Nigeria.
Onye isi oche APC n’Naijiria, Abdulahi Adamu, nke onye nọchitere anya bụ Emmanuel Enukwu gosipụtara ntụkwasị obi o nwere na ndị Naijiria ga-akwado ndị ga-azọ ọkwa ọchịchị na pati ahụ.
Gọvanọ steeti Ebonyi bụ Engr David Umahi kwuru na ndị Ebonyi adịla njikere ịtụrụ Tinubu na APC vootu.
Ọzọkwa, onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ na pati ahụ, Mr Francis Nwifuru na ndị ọzọ na-azọ ọkwa ọchịchị na steeti ahụ bụ ndị e nyere ọkọlọtọ nke pati ahụ.
Ihe pụtara ihe na mmemme ahụ bụ nnabata nke ndị otu ndọrọndọrọ People’s Democratic Party (PDP) gafere n’APC.
Onye jiri aha PDP zọọ ọkwa sinetị PDP n’Ebonyi Central Zone, Ambassador Franklin Ogbuewu, bụ onye kwuchitere ndị ọzọ kwere nkwa na ya ga-erubere pati ahụ isi.
Ekele Onye bụbu Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ọkụ na igwe, Chiifu Godwin Ogbaga kelere onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ahụ maka nkwa niile o kwere ndị ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ na ndị Naijiria n’ozuzu.
Ogbaga rịọrọ ya ka o were nkwado ndị Ebonyi nyere ya mee ihe.
Ọtụtụ ndị Gọvanọ nke pati APC bịara nzụkọ a.
Onyeisiala Naijiria, Muhammadu Buhari ga-anọ n’ụbọchị Tọzdee, Nọvemba 24, 2022 mee njem gọọmentị na Niamey, Rịpọblik nke Niger iji gaa ọgbakọ otu mba Afrịka na-ahụ maka nrụpụta ọrụ na mgbanwe akụ na ụba, yana nnọkọ pụrụiche n’azụmahịa mba Afrịka (African Continental Free Trade Area, AfCFTA).
Onyeisiala nke ga-apụ n’ụtụtụ Tọzdee, ga-agakwa na mmalite akwụkwọ nke akpọrọ; ”Muhammadu Buhari: The Challenges of Leadership in Nigeria” nke e degharịrị n’asụsụ French, nakwa mmepe ”Muhammadu Buhari Boulevard” nke gọọmenti Rịpọblik Niger jiri aha ya hibe.
Mmepe Boulevard na mmalite akwụkwọ French ahụ nke John Paden dere bụ n’ụbọchị Tọzdee ebe ọgbakọ AU bụ na Fraịde, Nọvemba 25, 2022.
A na-atụ anya na Onyeisiala Buhari ga-ekwu okwu n’ọgbakọ African Union nke isi okwu ya gbadoro ụkwụ na “Industrialising Africa: Renewed Commitment Towards an Inclusive and Sustainable Industrialization and Economic Diversification.” Ọgbakọ ahụ dị elu, nke a na-enwe kwa afọ bụ nke a na-atụ anya na a ga-enwe mkpebi, na-akọwapụta mkpa mmepụta ihe na mgbanwe akụ na ụba n’mba Afrịka.
Abalị iri abụọ nke ọnwa Novemba afọ ọbụla bụ ụbọchị ncheta mmepụta ihe nke Afrịka, nke ọgbakọ ndị isi obodo na gọọmentị nke Afrịka kwekọrịtara n’ọnwa Julaị afọ 1989 na’Addis Ababa mba Ethiopia.
Ndị ga-eso Onyeisiala Buhari mee njem a bụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara mba ofesi, Geoffrey Onyeama, Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka nchekwa, Major-Gen.
Bashir Magashi, Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ, azụmaahịa, Adeniyi Adebayo; Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ego, Zainab Ahmed; Onye ndụmọdụ nchekwa obodo, Major-General Babagana Monguno na onyeisioche, National Intelligence Agency, Ahmed Rufai Abubakar.
Onyeisiala ga-alaghachi n’Naijiria na Fraịde, Nọvemba 25.
Onye ji aha Labour Party (LP) azọ ọkwa onyeisiala bụ Maazị Peter Obi ekwuola na ya ga-aga n’ihu ịchụ ndụ ya n’aja karịa ịda ada n’ọrụ dịka onyeisiala Naijiria.
Mazị Obi bụ onye ọbịa n’ọgbakọ Editors Forum na Lagos kwuru na ọ dịla njikere ịchị ọchịchị ndozi ihe.
Dị ka o si kwuo, “Ọ bụrụ na ndị Naijiria goro m n’ọrụ, agam akọrọ ha akụkọ ọma, agaghị m echetara ha akụkọ ihe gara aga.
ị naghị ewe onye ọhụrụ n’ọrụ ka o chetara gị ihe gara aga.
Agaghị m enye ihe ngọpụ ma ọ bụ mkpesa.” Ịgbaso Ọrụ Nchekwa Onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Labour Party ahụ kwuru na ọchịchị bu ihe nile na ya ga-anọ n’isi mee ngwangwa inye ọrụ nchekwa ọnọdụ kwesịrị.
O kwukwara na ya ga-eji teknụzụ mee ihe gbasara ọrụ nchekwa, ọkụ latrik iji mee ka Naijiria si na mba oriri gafee bụrụ mba na-arụpụta ihe.
“Agam ebuso enweghị ọkụ latrik agha, ọrụ onye ndu abụghị ngọpụ ma ọ bụ mkpesa.” Onye ndọrọ-ndọrọ ọchịchị LP ahụ  kwere nkwa ibelata tigbuo-zọgbuo, ịla ihe gọọmenti n’iyi na oke ọnụ ahịa ihazi ọchịchị, weta ezigbo usoro iji mee ka ihe gaa nke ọma.
Ọ dụrụ ndị Naijiria ọdụ ka ha nyochaa ihe omume gara aga nke ndị na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala iji chọpụta ma ha ekwesịrị ekwesị maka ọrụ ahụ “Ọrụ onyeisiala chọrọ ezi agwa, ime ihe nke ọma, ịdị uchu na ịdị ike iji mee ihe ziri ezi.
Ọ chọrọ ikike uche na nke anụ ahụ.” Ntuli aka nke afọ 2023 dị ka o si kwuo, ekwesịghị ịdabere n’agbụrụ, ekpemekpe ma ọ bụ asambodo kama o kwesịrị ịdabe n’agwà onye na-azọ ọkwa.
Ọ gbakwụnyere na ya bụụrụ gọvanọ site n’amara na ya agaghịkwa emetọ amara ahụ.
Minista na-ahụ maka ọdịmma mmadụ, njikwa ọdachi, na mmepe mmekọrịta ọha na eze, Sadiya Umar Farouq, enyefeela atụmatụ mmefu ego afọ 2023 nke Mịnịstrị n’ụlọ omebe iwu.
Mịnịsta, nke onye odeakwụkwọ Nasir Sani-Gwarzo so n’oge nnyefe atụmatụ ahụ kwuru na ngụkọta ego dị N35, 595,233,430.00 bụ ego ekenyerela isi ụlọ ọrụ nke Mịnịstrị ahụ n’afọ 2022.
Atụmatụ mmefu ego ahụ nwere mkpokọta mmefu ugboro ugboro nke dị N1,073,705,755.00 yana isi ego maka ọrụ a fụrụ anya dị N34,510,760,413.00.
Na arụmọrụ nke mmefu ego afọ 2022, Mịnịsta ahụ gosiri na nchịkọta ego dị N291,652,083.36 ma ọ bụ pasent 58.3 ka e wepụtarala ruo 30th Septemba 2022 ebe nchịkọta ego dị NI,810,565,093.45 ma ọ bụ pasent 48.00 nke isi ego bụ maka ọrụ a fụrụ anya maka otu oge ahụ.
Ọ gara n’ihu kwupụta na ego dị N288,041,185.32, ma ọ bụ pasent 98.76 n’ime ego e wepụtara maka Overhead bụ nke e tinyere n’ọrụ, ebe pasent 99 nke ego ewepụtara, ma ọ bụ ego dị N1,799,286,437.81 bụ nke e jiri rụpụta Capital project nke mịnịstrị.
Na atụmatụ mmefu ego nke afọ 2023, ego ọrụ nke Mịnịstrị bụ nke e wenitere site na N499,975,000 na afọ 2022 ruo na N512,474,375 na afọ 2023 nke gosiri mgbago elu pasent asaa.
Farouq, kwuru na ọ dị mkpa ịmara na mmụba pasent asaa n’ego Overhead adabaghị adaba na mmụba ọnụ ahịa ego nke nọ pasent 20.77.
N’aka nke ọzọ, e wedara ọnụ mmefu ego site na N3,749,510,414.00 gaa na N1,083,017,733 nke na-anọchi anya mbelata pasent 71 na ọnụ mmefu ego nke afọ 2022.
“Ọ dị mkpa iburu n’obi na mbelata pasent 71 na ego Capital na mgbago pasent 7 na ego Overhead dị ntakiri iji rụọ ọrụ mịnịstrị n’ime otu afọ”.
Na-agbakwụnye na maka mịnịstrị ahụ ịrụ ọrụ n’ozuzu oke, ma mezuo mkpebi ya nke dị oke mkpa maka mmepe obodo dum, mịnịstrị ahụ na-arịọ maka mmụba ma ọbụ mwelite ego nke Capital na Overhead Na mbụ n’okwu ya, Onye isi oche kọmitii sineeti na-ahụ maka ọrụ pụrụ iche, SịnetọYusuf Yusuf, n’aha ndị otu kọmitii ahụ toro Mịnịsta na ndị otu ya maka ịrụ ọrụ mmefu ego nke afọ 2022 ma gwakwa mịnịstrị ahụ ka ọ gbatịkwuo mbọ ya n’ịrụ ọrụ enyemaka ya n’obodo.
Ọtụtụ oge ka ndị mmadụ na-arụ ọrụ ndị mmadụ na-akpọ n’imi, ọrụ ndị e nwereike ịsị “tụfịakwa, ọ bụghị m ga-arụ nke a”.
Mgbe a na-eto, a jụọ “kedụ ihe ị chọrọ ịbụ mgbe i toro?” ọtụtụ ndị na-ekwu na ha chọrọ ịbụ dọkịta, injinia, ọkaiwu, onye nkuzi, ọgbabọọlụ, onye uweojii maọbụ onye agha wdgz.
Mana ọrụ ndị anyị na-ekwu maka ha n’akụkọ a bụ ọrụ ndị ọtụtụ ndị na-arụ ha arọghị nrọ ịmetụ aka n’ụwa ha, mana ọnọdụ tinyere ha n’ime ya.
Ọrụ ndị ahụ bụ ọrụ ndị dị ezigbo mkpa n’ụwa, nke ọtụtụ ndị na-elelị anya.
Lee ọrụ ndị ahụ ị na-arọghị nrọ ịrụ mana ndị ọzọ na-arụ: 1) Ịsa na ịwa ozu (embalmer): Ọrụ onye bekee kpọrọ ’embalmer’ gụnyere ịsa na ịwa ozu ma kwado ya maka olili.
Ọrụ a bụ ọrụ ndị ọ kara obi n’ihi na ọ gụnyere ịgbapụ ọbara n’ahụ ozu, ịgbanye ya mmiri ndị e ji echedo ozu nakwa itechi ozu ka ọ dị mma ile anya.
Ndị na-arụ ya bụ ndị na-edili ọnwụ na ihe ndị na-eso ya.
Ọ bụ ndị ahụ na-ahụ na ozu atọgbọghị ma na-esigbu ndị dị ndụ, ọrụ ha na-arụ na-emekwa ka ozu nọtetu obere aka tupu o rekasịa.
Gị na-agụ akụkọ a, a sị gị bụrụ ọsa ozu ị ga-ekwe? Mana e nwere ndị na-arụ ya ma rụta ya ọfụma.
2) Oburu nsị (sewage cleaner/disposer): Ọrụ a abụghị ọrụ ‘nwa mummy’, ọ bụ ọrụ onye obi kara n’ihi na enweghi ihe na-asọ oyi ka ịhụ nsị onye ọzọ anya, ọkachasị ebe o juru eju bara abara.
Ọrụ ha gụnyere ikpocha nsị dị na ya bụ soakaway nakwa ịsachapụ ya mmiri.
Mkpa ọ dị bụ na ọ bụghị na ha ekpochaghị ‘soakaway’ gị, nsị ga-etofe ya ma pụtawazie ebe ọ ga-anọchi ụzọ.
Nke a nwereike ibute nsogbu gụnyere ọrịa na ihe ndị ọzọ.
3) Ịgba ozu ọkụ (cremators): Ọrụ ndị a dị ka ọrụ onye na-asa ozu, mana kama ọ na-asa ozu, ọ na-agba ozu ọkụ.
Ọ na-amasị ụfọdụ ndị ịgba ozu ọkụ kama itinye n’akpati kwaa ya akwaa ma lie ya eli.
N’ihi ndị ahụ na-achọghị ili ozu ka e ji nwee ndị na-agba ozu ọkụ.
A gbachaa ozu ọkụ e fesaa ntụ ahụ n’ikuku maọbụ na mmiri, dịka ndị nwe ozu ahụ si chọọ.
Ọrụ ha dị mkpa n’ihi na ọ na-eme ka e belata etu e si egwu ala, nke nwereike ịkpata ka e gbutuo osisi na-enyere ihuigwe aka.
Mana ọ na-ere isi abụọ n’ihe gbasara ihu igwe n’ihi na ịkpọ ihe ọkụ na-emebikwa ihu igwe.
4) Ndị na-akpa alumi (recyclers): Ndị na-akpa alumi (aha ha si na aluminium) bụ ndị na-agagharị na-atụtụ igwe, plastik na ihe ndị ọzọ na-emeju atịtị.
Ọtụtụ ndị na-elelị ha anya, na-ahụ ha ka ndị enweghi akaọrụ, mana ọrụ ha dị oke mkpa n’ihi na a na-ejikarị ihe ndị ha tụtụtara wee na-arụgharị maọbụ rụpụta ihe ọhụrụ ọzọ.
Mkpa ọzọ ọ dị bụ na ọrụ ha na-enyere ihuigwe aka n’ihe Bekee kpọrọ ‘climate change’.
Nke a bụ n’ihi isi ọrụ ha bụ nke Bekee kpọrọ ‘recycling’.
Ọzọ bụkwa na a hapụ ihe ndị ahụ mebiri emebi ị na-atụpụta n’ụlọ gị ka ha nọrọ ebe a tụsara ha, ọ pụtara na ọ ga na-eme ka ikpo atịtị buo nnukwu ibu ma na-anọchi ụzọ.
5) Ikpo atịtị: Enweghi onye ọ bụ nrọ ya ịbụ okpo atịtị, mana ndị mmadụ na-arụ ya.
Ọ bụ ha na-ahụ na ihe ndị ị tụpụtara n’ụlọ gị anọchighi gị ụzọ ma butere gị nsogbu gụnyere ọrịa.
Ọ bụghị ọrụ gị na-atụpụta atịtị ga-achọ ịrụ n’ihi na ọ gụnyere ịtụtụrụ na ịmetụ atịtị na-abụghị nke gị, nke ga-enwecha ihe ndị na-asọ oyi, aka.
N’ihi ndị na-ekpofu ahịhịa, atịtị anaghị atagbu gị n’ụlọ gị.
6) Ilekọta ndị agadị: Ọ bụ ekpere onye ọbụla ibi ogologo ndụ, kaa nka tupu a nwụọ, mana ọ bụghị ekpere onye ọbụla ịrụ ọrụ dị n’ilekọta onye merela agadị.
Ọ bụghị onye ọbụla ga-arụnwu ọrụ a n’ihi na ọ na-aratu ahụ ịrụ.
Nke a bụ n’ihi na e nwere ndị ọ na-ara ahụ ilekọta onye na-abụghị ọbara ha (onye ezinaụlọ ha).
Ọrụ a bụ ọrụ ndidi; ọ dịghịkwanụ mfe inwe ndidi ebe ndị merela agadị nọ n’ihi na ụwa na-arazị ụfọdụ n’ime ha ahụ n’agadị (ndị na-akpabu ike oge ha nọ .
Ọrụ a dị mkpa n’ihi na ụfọdụ ezinaụlọ enweghi ndị na-anọnyere ndị agadị ha nwere n’ụlọ ka ha nwee ohere gara mkpa ha; ndị na-arụ ọrụ a na-egbo mkpa a.
Ọ bụ ndị a na-elekọta ndị agadị ahụ, hụ na ha sara ahụ ma na-ekpocha na-azacha ebe ha nọ wdgz.
7) Ndị na-eke nri (waiter/waitress): Ọrụ onye na-eke nri bụ ọrụ ndidi n’ihi na ọ bụghị mmadụ niile na-akwanyere ha ugwu.
Ọ bụghịkwanụ ọrụ mmadụ na-arọ nrọ ịrụ oge ọ dị na nwata.
E nweela ọtụtụ mgbe ndị iwe ọkụ wụrụ ha nri, mmanya maọbụ mmiri n’ahụ n’ihi mmehie so ihe ha ‘tụrụ order’ ya na ihe e wetere ha.
Iwu ji ụlọọrụ ha anaghị ekwekarị ha bọgwọrọ ọbọ ma ụdịrị ihe a mee ha n’ọrụ, nke bụ na ị ga-elo iwe ya bụ ihe ga-akpalite.
Ọzọ bụ na e nwere ndị nke na-arụ ọrụ ebe a na-ebikarị ma na-etichara ha aka; ihe dị ka ndị na-arụ n’ebe a na-aṅụ mmanya nke Bekee kpọrọ ‘beer parlour’.
Mana ị ma etu ha si dịrị ezigbo mkpa? Ọ bụ gị ga-ejiri aka gị enye onwe gị nri n’ụlọ oriri na nkwari? Ọ bụ ọrụ ha ịhụ na nri na mmanya ị chọrọ rutere gị aka.
Ụfọdụ oge ọ bụkwa ọrụ ha ịhụ na ebe ị nọ eri nri dịkwa ọcha, ka ị ghara ibute ọrịa ebe ị gara iri nri.
8) ‘Vulcanizer’: Ọrụ onye ‘vulcanizer’ bụ ịgbanye ikuku na taya ụgbọala maọbụ ọgbatumtum ma ọ daa afọ.
Ọrụ a abụghị ọrụ a dị ọcha arụ n’ihi na unyi na atịtị ga-emechurịrị gị.
Ya mere, ụfọdụ oge ị ga-ahụ na ndị na-arụ ya nwere otu akwa ruru unyi ha na-eyi arụ ọrụ ha tupu ha agbanwee ya yiri nke dị ọcha laa.
N’agbanyeghi na a na-amụ ya bụ ọrụ amụ dịka ịgba bọyị, enweghi onye na-arọ nrọ iji ya mere akaọrụ mgbe ọ bụ nwata.

Ọrụ ha na-emepekwa ohere ikuru anwụrụ na-eso mmanụ ụgbọala (fumes) ụfọdụ oge, nke na-adịghị mma n’ahụ mmadụ.
Ọtụtụ ndị ọ bụ ọrụ ha ugbua arọghị nrọ ịhụ onwe ha n’ọnọdụ a, mana ha ji obi ha na-arụ ya.
Ọrụ ha dị mkpa ọkachasị na mpaghara ụwa ebe ndị ọ bụ mmanụ ka ụgbọala na-eji aga.
Mana mara na e nwere ụfọdụ mba dị n’ụwa ebe ọ bụ gị na-akwọ ụgbọala ga-eji aka gị agbanye mmanụ n’ụgbọala gị.
10) Igwu ili: E nwere onye ọ bụ nrọ ya ịrụ ọrụ a? Mana ndị mmadụ na-arụ ya tinye ‘jara’.
Ọ bụ ọrụ e ji ike na ndidi arụ n’ihi na ọ dịghị ofele igwubanye ala n’ime ebe ọ ga-eru fiti isii.
Ọ bụrụ na ndị na-arụ ya arụghị ya, ọ pụtara na ozu na akpati ozu ga na-adọ n’elu ala.
Mana marakwa na e nwere mpaghara ndị e ji igwe traktọ egwu ala ili.

A jaara ndị uweojii Naịjirịa mma maka ịzọpụta mmadụ asatọ a tọọrọ na steeti Cross River dị na ndịda ugwu Naịjirịa.
Gọvanọ steeti ahụ bụ Ọkammụta Ben Ayade kelere ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa ngalaba nke Cross River maka ịnapụta mmadụ asatọ n’ime mmadụ itoolu a tọọrọ.
N’abalị iri na ise n’ọnwa Nọvemba nke afọ 2022, ndị omekome tọọrọ ndị njem itoolu n’ụgbọala abụọ na-eme njem n’okporo ụzọ si Calabar gaba Ikom na steeti ahụ.
Gọvanọ Ayade, onye nwere ọmịiko ebe ndị ahụ anapụtara nọ, katọrọ mwakpo na ntọrọ ndị njem ahụ,ma kwupụta na ya katọrọ nke ukwuu mwakpo na ntọrọ ndị njem n’okporo ụzọ si Calabar jee Ikom.
Ọ gara n’ihu kwuo, “Anyị nwere ekele maka ọrụ nnapụta emegoro, nke ka na-aga n’ihu.
Anyị agaghị ekwe ka omume mpụ dị otú a gbanye mkpọrọgwụ na steeti anyị ebe anyị kpebisiri ike ịhụ na ihe a mere bụ nke ikpeazụ ya n’ala anyị.
Obi mwute anyị na-eru ebe ndị mmadụ ndị a na ndị ezinụlọ ha nọ n’ihi ajọ mpụ a dakwasịrị ha.” Gọvanọ Cross River kwuru na dịka steeti hụrụ udo n’anya, gọọmentị na-agba mbọ iji chekwaa ụmụ amaala ya ma kwalite nnyocha ime oke ọhịa nile dị na gburugburu ya, bụ nke jezuru okpuru ọchịchị dị asatọ na steeti ahụ.
Ịkwalite Ọrụ Nchekwa Ayade gosiri na ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa a kpọrọ Homeland Security bụ nke steeti hibere ebe ndị na-achụ nta ga-eso nye aka nlekọta ime ọhịa Uyanga.
Ọ sịrị, “Anyị arịọọla gọọmentị Naịjirịa arịrịọ ka ha tinyekwuo ndị agha n’ime ọhịa Uyanga nke dị n’okpuru ọchịchị Akamkpa yana itinye ụgbọ elu Tucano n’ọrụ.
Ọ gbakwụnyere na steetị ahụ ga-azụtakwa egbe ụgbọ mmiri na ụgbọ ala iji chekwaa elu mmiri na okporo ụzọ dịka ha tinyere igwe nchekwa (Automatic Security System) n’ụzọ batara Calabar.
