Ngalaba World Health Organisation wepụtara ụbọchị 14 Nọvemba afọ ọbụla dịka ụbọchị ncheta ọrịa shuga n’ụwa a kpọrọ ‘World Diabetes Day’.
Ha kpọrọ emume nke afọ a “access to diabetes education” nke gbadoro ụkwụ n’ikuziri ndị mmabụ ihe banyere ọrịa shuga iji chekwaa onwe ha.
Ya mere akụkọ ga-eleba anya n’ihe ọrịa shuga bụ nakwa ụzọ e nwereike iji egbochi ya.
Gịnị bụ ọrịa shuga (Diabetes)? Ọrịa shuga bụ nnukwu nsogbu ahụike na-ata nchara n’ahụ nke na-egbu ihe karịrị otu nde mmadụ kwa afọ- o nweghị onye e nweghị ike ịrịa ya.
Ihe na-ebute ya bụ ahụ mmadụ enweghị ike igweri shuga dị n’ọbara (glucose).
Ọrịa shuga taa nchara n’ahụ, o nwere ike ibute ọrịa obi, mkpọnwụ ahụ, ikpu isi, mmebi akịrị (kidney failure) na ibe ụkwụ onye na-arịa ọrịa ahụ.
Nsogbu ọrịa shuga na-aga n’ihu – Dịka WHO siri kwuo, ihe ruru nde mmadụ 422 na-arịa ya n’ụwa niile- nke a bụ mmaaji anọ ndị na-arịa ya n’afọ 40 gara aga.
Na agbanyeghị ka o siri jọọ njọ, ọkara ndị na-arịa ya amaghị na ha na-arịa ọrịa shuga.
Mana mmadụ Igbanwe ka o si ebi ndụ nwere ike igbochi ọrịa a.
Lee etu i nwere ike isi mee ya: Gịnị na–ebute ọrịa shuga? Mgbe anyị riri nri mgbadoume (carbohydrate), ahụ anyị na-egweri ya ka ọghọ shuga.
Mmiri ahụ (hormone) nke a kpọrọ insulin na bekee nke a na-emepụta na anyịnya (pancreas) na-enye ahụ iwu ka ọ mịkọrọ shuga maka inye ike.
Ọrịa shuga na-abịa ma ọ bụrụ na ahụ anaghị emepụta ‘insulin’ maọbụ na ọ naghị arụ ọrụ nke nwere ike ime ka shuga dọrọ n’ime ọbara.
Kedụ ụdị ọrịa shuga? E nwere ụdị ọrịa shuga dị iche iche.
Na nke a kpọrọ ‘type 1‘, anyịnya na-akwụsị imepụta ‘insulin’, nke na-eme ka shuga gbalite n’ọbara.
Ndị ọkachara mara sayensị amaghị ihe na-ebute nke a mana ha kwenyere na o si n’ọbara maọbụ nje na-ebute ọrịa nke na-emebi ọwọ (cell) na-emepụta ‘insulin’.
Ihe dịka pasent mmadụ iri nwere ọrịa shuga nke ‘Type 1’.
N’ọrịa shuga nke ‘type 2‘ , anyịnya anaghị emepụta ‘insulin’ zuru ezu maọbụ nke emepụtara anaghị arụ ọrụ.
Nke a na-emekarị na ndị gbaliterela n’afọ, ndị na-eto eto, ndị buru ibu, ndị na-anọkarị na-emegharịghị ahụ, nakwa ndị si mba ndịda Asia na-enwekwa ya.
Ụmụnwaanyị dị ime nwekwara ike ịria ọrịa shuga nwaanyị dị ime( gestational diabetes) ma ọ bụrụ na ahụ ha enweghị ike imepụta insulin ga-ezuru ha na nwa ha.
Ọtụtụ nchọpụta na-ekwu na ihe dịka pasent isii rue iri na isii ụmụnwaanyị dị ime ga-enwe ọrịa shuga.
Ọ dị mkpa ka ha lebe anya n’ihe ha na-eri, na-emegharị ahụ iji gbochie ọrịa shuaga type 2.
Mmadụ nwekwara ike inwe ọnọdu na akwado ịbanye ọrịa shuga- ọnọdụ shuga dị n’ọbaara igbalite elu nke nwere ike ịdaba n’ọrịa shuga.
Kedụ njịrịmara ọrịa shuga? Njirimara ọrịa shuga gụnyere: Dịka ngalaba ahụike mba Birten a kpọrọ British National Health Service, njirimara ọrịa shuga ‘type 1’ na-esosị onwe ya ọsọ ọsọ n’ụmụaka na ndị na-eto eto.
Ndị nke ‘type 2 na enyekarị nsogbu bụ ndị karịrị afọ 40 (maọbị ndị sị ndịda Asia ruru afọ 25); ndị ndị mụrụ ha maọbụ nwanne ha nwere ọrịa shuga; ndị buru oke ibu; nakwa ndị sị China, na ndị isiojii.
Nke mbụ, gbaara nri na mmanya nwere shuga ọsọ.
Kama achịcha ọcha(white bread), na-eri nrị zuru oke.
Shuga na nri eghere eghe ezụghị oke inye ezi ihe n’ahụ n’ihi na akwara(fibre) nakwa vitamin dị na ha emebiela.
Iji maa atụ: Hapụ achịcha ọcha(white bread),eghere eghe osikapa ọcha, mmanya ọtọbịrịbịrị, ịhe ọṅụṅụ ụtụtụ ( breakfast cereals) nwere shuga.
Kama hara nrị nwere akwụkwọ nrị, mkpụrụosisi, agwa na mkpụrụ nrị zuru oke.
Ezi nrị ndị ọzọ gụnyere dịka mkpụrụ kashu, ọpapa, nakwa azụ nwere mmanụ omega-3 dịka azụ nwankata, azụ ahụekere (markerel) Ọ dị mkpa irichi nrị anya mana erifele afọ.
Mmegharị ahụ dị mkpa na-ewetu shuga dị n’ọbara.
National Health System (NHS) na-enye ndụmọdụ ka a na-enwe mmegharịa ahụ dịka ịgasi ije ike, ịrị ụlọelu, na egwuregwu ndị ọzọ awa abụọ na ọkara kwa izuụka..

Okeite bụ oke ọgwụ nke e ji ọbara anụmamụ maọbụ nke mmadụ agwọ.
“Okeite bụ oke ọgwụ, ọ bụghị ọgwụ ụmụaka.
Okeite e ji mmadụ agwọ dị oke njọ nke bụ na ndị mmadụ ekwesighị ịna etinye aka n’ụdị ihe ahụ.
Eji Okeite enweta ihe n’aka chi.
Okeite nwere ozi zoro ezo n’ime ya nke bụ na a si na “Ajọ ọgwụ a na-eji nkụ sirike esi”.Dibia sị na “a ga-eji osisi ọjị sie ọgwụ a, ihe ọ pụtara bụ na a ga-eji ọkpụkpụ mmadụ sie ya bụ ọgwụ”.
Awele Ike, ihe ọ pụtara bụ na ahụ mmadụ ga-abariri na ya bụ ọgwụ”.
Okeite abụchaghị maka ịnwe ego ka, mana mgbe ụfọdụ ọ na-abụ ihe gbasakwara ịsata ike “maka na anaghị aza dike na nkiti”.

NAFDAC dọrọ aka ná ntị megide iji ọgwụ na-adịghị mma.
(NAFDAC) adọọla aka na ntị megide iji ngwa ahịa adịgboroja na-adịghị mma.
Dị ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ si kwuo, ngwaahịa adịgboroja na nke na-adịghị mma abụghị nanị na o na-emebi ahụ ike mmadụ kamakwa na-anọgide na-abụ otu n’ime ihe mgbochi ndị na-egbochi uto akụ na ụba na mmepụta ihe.
Mazị Muyiddin Suleiman, onye nhazi, NAFDAC, na Steeti Kebbi  kwuru nke a na mkparịta ụka na Birnin Kebbi,Steeti Kebbi  na Fraịde.
Agbanyeghị, o kwuputara na a naghị ahụkarị kemịkalụ na ọgwụ adịgboroja na steeti Kebbi n’ihi na steeti ahụ abụghị nnukwu ahịa maka ọgwụ, Onye nhazi ahụ kọwara na dabere na nyocha ndị e mere na mpaghara ahụ, ha enweghị nnukwu nsogbu nke ngwaahịa adịgboroja..
Gọvanọ Soludo toro atụmatụ imegharị Naira nke CBN.
Gọvanọ steeti Anambra, ma bụrụkwa onyeisi ụlọ akụ ukwu nke Naijiria n’oge gara aga, bụ Charles Soludo, ekwuola na steeti ahụ ga-emezigharị ma soro n’usoro iwu nhazigharị naira ọhụrụ nke CBN.
Soludo sị  n’ ọdị mma ka ụlọ ọba ego  ukwu na-emezighari ego kwa mgbe ọ bụla.
O kwuru nke a mgbe ọ na-aza ajụjụ na mmemme telivishọn.
N’ọnwa gara aga, Gọvanọ CBN kwuputara na a ga-emegharịgharị akwụkwọ nde naira 200, 500 na 1000.
Ọ gbakwụnyere nke a,  “n’oge nke m,  emegharịrị ya.
E megharịrị N5, N10, N20, na N50..
Japan na-achọ ka ya na Naijiria nwee mmekọrịta azụmahịa  bụ akwaa akwụrụ Onye isi njikwa, Japan n’ihe gbasara azụmụ ahia nke ndi mba ọzọ , Takuma Taninami, ekwuola na mmekọrịta azụmahịa dị n’etiti Nigeria na Japan ugbu a nwere ike gbasaa iji kwalite ego nke mba abụọ ahụ..

Sinetọ Shettima kwuru nke a n’Abuja n’ọgbakọ  ndị  Okammụta  nke APC  haziri, bụ nke lekwasịrị anya n’ịkwasa ihe ngosi nke onye isi otu pati ahụ bụ onye ji ya azo okwa ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchi Maazị Bola Tinubu.
Dị ka onye ndọrọndọrọ osote onye isi oche APC si kwuo, n’ihi ụkọ ihe  zuru ụwa ọnụ nke ndị ọkachamara buru amụma, Naijiria ga-eche oge ihe siri ike n’ ihu n’ime afọ ndị na-abịanụ, ya mere ọ dị mkpa maka ndị kwesiri ekwesi dika  Mr.

Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe mberede na-enye ihe oriri nye Steeti  Kwara ihe onyinye .
Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe mberede na mba (NEMA) enyefela gọọmentị Steeti Kwara  nri na ihe enyemaka ndị ọzọ.
Enyere nke a n’okpuru enyemaka pụrụiche gọọmentị Naijiria kwadoro ikesa nri dị iche iche na ihe enyemaka nye ndị idei mmiri 2022 metụtara na ọdachi ndị ọzọ sitere n’okike na nke mmadụ.
N’ikwu okwu na mmemme ahụ n’Ilorin isi obodo steeti a, onye isi ụlọ ọrụ NEMA, Mustapha Ahmed kwuru na obi dị ya ụtọ ..
Naijiria, UN na-agba mgbo ikwalite na iwusie ụlọ akwụkwọ dị afọ 30 ike.
Otu omebe iwu nke obodo a na Tọzdee nabatara ndị na-eme ihe n’akụkụ ụwa niile, gụnyere ndị ọrụ UNESCO, ka ha na-achọ nkwado iwu iji guzobe National Institute for Educational Planning and Administration (NIEPA), nke dị na Ondo State, ọdịda anyanwụ Nigeria.
E hiwere ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na 1992 site n’aka gọọmentị Naijiria na mmekorita ya na UNESCO/International Institute for Educational Planning (IIEP) dị ka Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Ndị Ọrụ Maka Ndị Nhazi na Ndị Nlekọta na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ Naijiria na mpaghara ọdịda anyanwụ Africa..
Otu kọmitii e hibere maka ịgbata ụgwọ nke e ji ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe onwunwe nke Naijiria nke a kpọrọ Asset Management Corporation of Nigeria (AMCON), tụrụ aro na site ugbu a gaa n’ihu, a gaghị ekwe ka ndị niile ji ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ụgwọ soro n’azụmahịa ma ọ bụ soro ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị ọbụla nweta nkwado ọbụla, ma e wezụga inweta akwụkwọ ikike sitere n’AMCON.
Onye isi oche nke kọmitii ahụ, Prof.
Bolaji Owasonoye tụrụ aro a na Tuzdee mgbe o du ndi otu ya inyefe osote onye isi ala, Yemi Osinbajo, ozi nchọpụta.
N’ịgba ume ka e mejuputa iwu ndị dị mkpa gụnyere iwu AMCON, Owasonoye siri ọnwụ na e kwesịghị ikwe ka ndị ji ụgwọ na-erite uru n’ọrụ ngo nke gọọmentị ma e wezụga inweta akwụkwọ ikike nke AMCON.
“N’agbata afọ 2020 na 2021, AMCON gbatara ụgwọ nke ukwuu nke e gosipụtara na akwụkwọ ozi nchọpụta ahụ.
N’ime oge a na-enyocha, AMCON hụrụ uto mgbata ụgwọ pasent iri”.
“Dịka ọmụmaatụ, n’afọ 2020, enwetara ego ruru ijeri otu narị naira na iri anọ na isii, ebe n’afọ 2021 nwetakwara ego ruru ijeri otu narị naira iri isii na otu.
E nwere ezi olileanya igbata nnukwu ụgwọ n’afọ 2022 ebe kọmitii ahụ agaghịkwa ada mba n’ọrụ.
” Onye isi oche ahụ gara n’ihu kwupụta na kọmitii ahụ malitere ọrụ ozugbo eguzobere ya, mana ọbịbịa nke ọrịa Covid-19 zuru ụwa ọnụ mere ka ọ nwee ihe mkpọbi ụkwụ.
Ka ọ na-anabata akwụkwọ ozi ahụ, Ọkammụta Osinbajo kwuru na gọọmentị ga-enyocha ma tinye ya n’ọrụ.
Ọrụ dịịrị kọmitii a, nke eguzobere na Septemba afọ 2019 gụnyere nnyocha ọnọdụ ụgwọ e ji AMCON, ịchịkọta ozi
Ịtụgharị uche, atụmatụ na usoro nke iwu kwadoro maka ịgbata ụgwọ na ndị ọzọ.
Ndị otu Kọmitii a mejupụtara ndị nnọchiteanya sitere na ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị dị iche iche gụnyere Independent Corrupt Practices and Other Related Offences Commission; Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe onwunwe nke Naijiria bụ Asset Management Corporation of Nigeria, Mịnịstrị Ikpemkwụmọtọ nke Naijiria, Nigeria Financial Intelligence Agency, Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation, Central Bank of Nigeria, Department of State Services nakwa Economic and Financial Crimes Commission.
Onye Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ntụliaka ọchịchị, Resident Electoral Commissioner (REC) na steeti Kwara, Maazị Attahiru Madami, akwaala arịrị banyere omume ọjọọ nke ndị mmadụ maka ịbịa nara kaadị ntụliaka, Permanent Voters Cards, (PVC) na steeti ahụ Mgbe ọ na-ekwu okwu na ọgbakọ ha mere n’Ilorin, isi obodo steeti ahụ na Wenezde maka nkwadebe ntuliaka izugbe nke afọ 2023 na steeti ahụ, onye isi INEC kwuru na kọmishọn ahụ ka na-enwe ọtụtụ ihe iche aka mgba na steeti ahụ n’ihe gbasara ikesa PVC.
Dị ka o si kwuo, n’ime PVC ọhụrụ puku iri anọ na isii, narị isii na abụọ, enwetara n’isi ụlọ ọrụ INEC dị na steeti ahụ, ọ bụ naanị puku iri na asatọ, narị asatọ na iri asatọ na ise ka e kesagoro ebe puku iri abụọ na asaa, narị isii na abụọ fọdụrụ.
“Site na afọ 2011 ruo 2019 steeti ahụ nwere ọnụọgụ PVC 233, 856 nke anarabeghị, gbakwụnye na ọ bụ naanị 20,752 ka a naaragolu n’ime ọnwa Ọktoba nke afọ a ebe ihe karịrị 193,000, fọdụrụ, Madami kwuru.
O kwukwara na steeti ahụ nwere ndebanye aha 43,008 na-ezighi ezi, otu n’ime ndị kacha nta n’obodo Naijiria.
Madami kwuru na steeti ahụ nwere ndebanye aha 1,689,288 ka ọ dị ugbu a, ebe e nwere ndebanye aha dị 1,401,895 n’afọ 2019.
Ọ gbakwụnyere, “ọnụọgụ ndebanye aha emeruru n’isi bụ 330,401 ma ọnụ ọgụgụ ndebanye aha ziri ezi bụ 287, 393.” N’uche nke ya, Kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii na steeti ahụ, Paul Odama, dọrọ ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị aka na ntị ka ha ghara inye ndị na-akwado ha anwụrụ ike.
Kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii ahụ gbara ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ume ka ha malite mgbasa ozi sitere n’ihe a chọrọ achọ na abụghị ihe ma ọbụ ozi dabeere na mmadụ.
Odama kwusiri ike mkpa ọ dị ndị na-achọ ọrụ ọchịchị ịhụ na ndị na-eso ụzọ ha bụ ndị omume ha ziri ezi oge niile.
“Dịka e debere n’iwu ntuli aka, ịzụrụ votu na ire votu” bụ nke iwu akwadoghị”.
“N’akụkụ nke anyị, anyị ga-eme ike anyị niile iji kwado ma hụ na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya gbanyere mgbọrọgwụ n’obodo a.
Onye isi ndị uwe ojii dọkwara ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị aka na ntị ka ha gbanarị omume ndị omekome ma hapụ imebi bọọdụ mgbasa ozi nke paati ndị ọzọ.

Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka njem na Naịjirịa bụ Ademola Adegoroye kwuru na a ga-arụcha ọrụ okporo ụzọ na mpaghara South West.
O mesiri ndị steeti Ondo na Ekiti  ka  obi sie ha ike na gọọmentị ahapụbeghị mwugharị okporo ụzọ Akure-Ado Ekiti.
Mịnịsta a kwuru nke a mgbe ndị nnọchi anya ụlọ omebe iwu Ondo steeti, nke onye isi oche ha bụ Bamidele Oleyelogun, letara ya n’ụlọọrụ ya n’ụlọ ọrụ Federal Ministry of Transportation n’Abuja.
O kwuru na a na-enye Dantata na Sawoe ọrụ abụọ a,.
Ihe karịrị njem ụgbọ elu iri abụọ na anọ bụ ihe a kagburu ebe puku kwuru puku ndị njem tọrọ atọ dị ka ndị na-anya ụgbọelu na Kenya Airways PLC (KQNA.NR), otu n’ime ụlọ ọrụ njem ụgbọelu n’Africa malitere abụbụ ọrụ na Satọde, n’agbanyeghị gọọmentị na-agba ha ume ka ha kwụsị ya.
Abụbụ ọrụ ahụ malitere n’elekere isii nke ụtụtụ (0300 GMT) ga-emetụta azụmahịa na ndị njem ntụrụndụ n’otu n’ime ọdụ ụgbọ elu kacha mkpa n’Africa.
Otu ndị na-anya ụgbọ elu na Kenya, KALPA n’aha mkpirisi, kwuru na ndị nlekọta ụlọ ọrụ ahụ jụrụ ige ntị n’atụmatụ ha maka otu ha ga-esi dozie mkpesa ha.
“Ọ dịghị ụgbọ elu ọbụla siri n’ọdụ ụgbọ elu Jomo Kenyatta nke onye otu KALPA kwọọrọ, malite n’elekere isii nke ụtụtụ taa,” Ndị otu ahụ kwupụtara.
“Abụbụ ọrụ a ebidogo n’uju ya” Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ rịọrọ ndị na-eme njem mgbaghara wee kwuo na ọ ga-eme ike ya niile ibelata ihe mgbu, nke nwere ike ịgụnye idegharị ha na ụgbọ elu ndị ọzọ.
Na mbido, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwuru na atụmatụ abụbụ ọrụ ahụ bụ nke megidere iwu ma dọọ aka na ntị na o nwere ike idọghachi ha azụ na mgbake ihe mgbu nke COVID-19 butere.
Ha kwukwara na ha nwere ike itufu opekata mpe narị nde Shilling atọ (nde Dollar abụọ na ọkara) kwa ụbọchị.
“Ndị na-anya ụgbọ elu achọghị ịhụ ezi ebumnuche ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ebe ha nọ,” Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka njem, Kipchumba Murkomen kwuru n’ụlọ ọrụ telivishọn mnwere onwe nke NTV.
“Ọ bụ ihe dị ka ndị njem puku iri bụ ndị nke a metụtara ruo ugbu a ma ọ bụrụ na ọnọdụ a na-aga n’ihu ọnọdụ njem nlegharị anya ga-adị njọ,” onye mịnịsta ahụ kwuru ma na-agbakwunye na ihe karịrị njem ụgbọ elu iri abụọ na anọ ka a kagbugoro.
Akụkọ na-eru anyị ntị ugbua na-ekwu na ọkụ na-agba n’ahịa Ogbo ogwu dị na ‘Headbridge’ Onitsha.
Ndị hụrụ ebe ihe mere na-ekwu na ọ bụ kemịkalụ gbapụrụ dịka ogbunigwe mana amabeghi nke bụ eziokwu.
E kwukwara na ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ nwụrụ na ya bụ ọdachi mana amabeghi ezi ọnụọgụgụ ndị nwụrụ.
Ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị uweojii n’Anambra steeti bụ Tochukwu Ikenga ekwuola na ndị ọrụ mmenyụọkụ kwụ chịm n’ebe ahụ.
N’ime ihe onyonyo ndị na-efegharị na soshal midia, ị nwereike ịhụ ebe ọkụ na-agba n’ebe akpọrọ ‘Gọvernment Line’ n’ahịa ahụ.
Ndị ime ahịa ahụ na-ekwukwa na ọkụ ahụ malitere ịgba kemgbe etiti ụbọchị bụ elekere iri na abụọ.
Kedụ ihe kpatara ọkụ ahụ? Mgbe ndi ntaakụkọ garuru n’ahịa ahụ, ụfọdụ ndị na-azụ ahịa n’ebe ahụ gwara onye ntaakụkọ anyị na ọ bụ ebe edobere Kemikal ka ọkụ ahụ si bịa.
O kwuru na ha gwara ya ebe adọsara kemịkal n’ahịa ahụ gbapụrụ dịka ogbunigwe were malite ịgba ọkụ.
Otu onye hụrụ ebe ihe mere gwara ndi ntaakuko na ọkụ ahụ si n’ime ụlọ mapụ otu nwaanyị.
Ha kwukwara na ọ kụrụ nwaanyị ọzọ n’ala ma dọwaa ntị ya.
Mana onyeisi ndị ọrụ mmenyụọkụ apụtabeghi kwuo ihe ọ bụ butere ya bụ ọkụ.
Kepu kepu na-ekwukwa na ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ nwụrụ na ya bụ ọdachi mana amabeghi ezi ọnụọgụgụ ndị nwụrụ.
Ka ihe si kwụrụ ugbua, emenyụọla ọkụ ahụ na-agba ebe ndị ọdọ ahịa ha dị nso n’ebe ahụ ka na-azọpụta ngwa ahịa ha ndị fọrọnụ..
Ọkammụta Barth Nnaji bụbụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ọkụ latrik na Naijiria n’oge ọchịchị aka chịbụrụ Naịjirịa bụ Goodluck Jonathan akọwaala na ọ bụ ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị enyi ha achọghị ka ya gbasoo ụsoro ziri ezi na nhọrọ ndị ga-azụ ụlọọrụ latrik ndị gọọmentị resịrị ndị nkịtị mere ya ji tinye akwụkwọ arụkwaghịm.
Nnaji bụ onye hazirị atụmatụ ire akụkụ dị iche iche metụtara ọkụ latrik na Naijiria tupu ọ gbaa arụkwaghịm n’ike n’afọ 2012 nke tụụrụ ọtụtụ ụmụ Naijirịa.
                                                                                                 Na mkparịtaụka ya na ndi ntaakụkọ nwere na nsonso a, Barth Nnaji, onye rụbụrụla ọrụ inginia ọkaibe na mba Amerịka tupu ọ lọta rụwa ọrụ mịnịsta na Naịjirịa kwuru  na ya na-azọ isi onwe ya oge ahụ nke mere ka o tinye akwụkwọ arụkwaghịm ahụ n’ihi na ya achọghị imetọ aha ya.
Nwa afọ a bụbụkwa Minista na-ahụ maka Sayensị na Naịjirịa kwukwara na ihe abụọ mịnịstri ya mapụtara maka itozu ịzụ ụlọọrụ na-ekesa ọkụ latrik a kpọrọ ‘discos’ na Bekee bụ na ụlọọrụ ọbụla ga-azụta ya ga-enwe akatamkpo ego n’akpa iji tinye n’ịrụzi ihe ndị dị mkpa.
Nke a abụọ bụ na ụlọọrụ ahụ ga-abụ nke ihe gbasara ọkụ latrik doro anya nke ukwu .
O kwuru na ọ bụ n’ihi na ya kweciri n’ịhụ na ọ bụ naanị ụlọọrụ ndị nwere ihe abụọ a bụ ndị ga-azụtali ụlọọrụ latrik nke Gọọmentị Naijiria chọrọ ire oge ahụ mere ka ndị anya ha dị n’izụ ụlọọrụ ndị a mana ha enweghị ihe a chọrọ jiri kpawara ya nkata ọjọọ.
O sịri na ọ bụrụ na ya gbara isi akwara ghara itinye akwụkwọ arụkwaghịm, a kara igbu ya.
“Ọ bụrụ na nọrọ dịka Mịnịsta , ọ ga-abụ na ha ka egburu m maọbụ na m kwetara soro ha na-emetọ aka etu ha chọrọ.” Nnaji kwuru na ọ bụ n’ihi  na emeghị atụmatụ ahụ a kpọrọ ‘Privatatsation’ etu o kwesịrị mere na Naijiria ka na-enwe nsogbu inwe ọkụ latrịk rue ugbua.
O meela ihe karịrị afọ 10 e resịrị ndị nkiti akụkụ ụlọrụ latrik dị iche iche na Naịjirịa.
N’okwu ụlọọrụ Aba Geometric power plant, o kwupụtara ọnọdụ ọkụ dị na mpaghara Aba oge ha zere ya ma kọwa nsogbu ha nwere na ime ka atụmatụ ahụ nke o kwuru ruola pasent 97 ịbịa na mmezu.
Na nchịkọta Nnaji kwupụtara ihe mmepe ụlọọrụ ghara emere ndị bi na mpaghara ahụ ma ọ bụrụ na obido ọrụ n’ọnwa ole na ole na-abịa..
Ọgbaghara dapụtara n’otu pati All Progressives Congress, APC nke Kano steeti dị na mgbago ugwu Naijiria bụ aka na-achị steeti ahụ bụ Dọkịta Abdullahi Umar Ganduje doziri ya.
Nnukwu onye isi ndị ụlọ omebe iwu, Alhassan Ado Doguwa kwupụtara nke a n’ụbọchị Tuzde na steeti Kano.
Otu ahụ nọ n’ọgbaghara, n’oge na-adịbeghị anya, dịka Ado Doguwa na-anọchite anya Tudun bụ ngalaba gọọmenti etiti Wada/Doguwa, na Murtala Sule Garo, onye na-azọ ọkwa osote gọvanọ n’APC nọrọ n’ọgụ ịkọ ọnụ.
“Ndị nọ na nzukọ a bụ Nasiru Aliko Koki na onye isi oche APC steeti, Abdullahi Abbas.
Nzukọ a malite n’elekere iri na otu nke abalị Mọnde ruo elekere anọ nke ụtụtụ taa.
O gosiri onye ọ bụla n’ime anyị ebe anyị mejọrọ.
O nyere ndụmọdụ ma kwuo na ya weere anyị abụọ ka ụmụ ya.”
Agam aga n’ihu na ịkwado APC na ntụli aka 2023.
Agam aga n’ihu na-akwado Gawuna/Garo, Tinubu/Shettima, na APC na ọkwa niile na 2023.” Doguwa kwuru na ya agbagharala Garo na ndị otu pati ndị ọzọ mejọrọ ya.
Ọ kpọkuru ha ka ha gbagharakwa ya gụnyere ndị Kano niile na ndị na-akwado APC na steeti ahụ.
Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọkụ eletrik n’ime obodo, Rural Electrification Agency( REA), na-ekwu na ha ebinyela aka na nkwekọrịta nke dị narị abụọ iri isii na asaa nke ọnụ ego ya ruru ihe dị ka nde narị dollar atọ iri itoolu na ise, iji nye ọkụ eletrik maka ndị Naịjirịa n’okpuru amụma Nigeria Electrification Project,(NEP).
Dị ka ụlọ ọrụ ahụ si kwuo, amụma NEP, nke e ji ego mbite sitere ụlọ akụ mba ụwa (World Bank) ya na Africa Development Bank (AfDB) akwado bụ nke nyerela nde mmadụ ise ọkụ eletrik.
Ihe dị ka nde dollar iri isii na anọ na ụma asatọ bụ ego enyeferela n’aka ndị nnọrọonwe maka itinye n’ọrụ a.
Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ REA, Ahmad Salihijo Ahmad kwuru na a na-atụ anya na amụma a ga-enye puku ezinụlọ asaa na ise, ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche dị puku iri itoolu, na ụlọ nlekọta ahụike dị iche iche dị na mpaghara obodo a ọkụ eletrik.
Ọ kọwara na n’ime afọ ndị gara aga, REA esila n’ịbụ onye na-emejuputa atumatu nke ọrụ gọọmentị etiti na mpaghara ahụ wee bụrụ ebe na-enye aka na azụmaahịa.
“REA nwere ikike iwegara ụmụ amaala Naijiria ọkụ eletrik.
Etu esi eme nke a dabeere n’ebe ego si abịa.
Dịka atụmatụ itinye ọkụ n’ime obodo siri dị, anyị nwere ebumnuche na ọkụ ga-erute ndị Naijiria niile, a na-ekwukwa na ọnụọgụgụ ha ugbu a ruru nde mmadụ iri asatọ,” Ahmad kwuru.
O kwuru na a chọrọ nnukwu ego iji were mee nke a.
Ọ kọwara na site na ego a na-akpọ Rural Electrification Fund, bụ atụmatụ nke ụlọ ọrụ nnọrọonwe, REA na-enye aka ịhụ na ego na-abịa site na mpaghara dị iche iche iji nyere ya aka ịrụ ọrụ ya.
Onye isi oche otu The Nigeria Governors’ Forum (NGF) na Gọvanọ Sokoto Steeti, Aminu Tambuwal ekwughachila na “Ahụike ka bụ ihe kacha anyị mkpa dịka ndị gọvanọ na-elekwasị anya n’iwulite usoro nlekọta ahụike na-agbanwe agbanwe, na-agba mbọ ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi oge niile na ikpochapụ polio na mba ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                              O kwuru nke a mgbe ọ gara nleta nkwanye ugwu na Minista na-ahụ maka ahụike (FMOH), Dr.
Osagie Ehanire na Abuja ma gosipụta nchegbu maka ndị dọkịta na-achọ ahịhịa ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ na mba ọzọ, na-emerụ obodo ahụ.
                                                                                                                              Na nkwupụta nke Mhuhammad Bello, Onye Ndụmọdụ Pụrụ Iche Tambuwal, Mgbasa Ozi na Ọha na Ọha na Sọnde na Abuja, Gọvanọ ahụ kpọrọ oku ka e mee ihe ngwa ngwa iji gbochie ihe egwu ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                           “Anyị na-ahụ ka ụbụrụ na-agbapụta kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ.
Ma, ekwere m na ọ nwere ihe jikọrọ ya na ọdịmma ndị ọrụ ahụike.
                                   “Ana m arịọ gọọmentị etiti ka ọ mee ihe gbasara nke a ngwa ngwa,” ka o kwuru.
Onye isi oche NGF nyekwara Gọọmenti Federal ka ọ kwalite nkwalite maka mmezu nke pasent 25 dị mkpa iji hụ na mkpuchi ahụike zuru ụwa ọnụ maka ndị Nigeria niile, n’okpuru Basic Healthcare Provision Fund (BHCPF).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Dị ka ya si kwuo, Ọ bụ ezie na ndị gọvanọ na-achọsi ike iwulite usoro nlekọta ahụike na-adịgide adịgide, na-agba mbọ na ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa oge niile na ikpochapụ polio, na mmekorita ya na ndị mmekọ ụwa na mpaghara, mbọ ha ga-abụ ihe efu ma ọ bụrụ na usoro ahụ dị egwu na-aga n’ihu na-ejighị n’aka.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     “Enwere ihe ịma aka mana enwere ọtụtụ ihe, ọkachasị na mbọ a na-agba iji gbochie ọrịa COVID-19, nke mere Nigeria ka ọ bụrụ nke anọ, n’ime mba 54 dị n’Africa, n’okpuru Index Health Security Index maka 2021.
                                                                                                                                                           Mgbe ọ na-aja Gọọmenti Federal mma maka ntinye nke ịtọlite ​​​​BHCPF, Tambuwal kwusiri ike na ọkụ ọkụ nke ime ka ego ahụ bụrụ eziokwu, ekwesịghị ibelata.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 O mekwara ka gọọmentị na FMOH kwenye na ha nwere nghọta na nleba anya na njikwa ego site n’aka steeti, ma rụtụ aka na ego nke ọgbakọ ahụ ga-adabere na arụmọrụ nke steeti ndị nnata.
                                                                                                                                                                                            Ehanire, n’okwu ya, Gọvanọ n’okwu gbasara ịgbapụta ụbụrụ, na-ekwupụta na ndị dọkịta 3000 na-agụsị akwụkwọ kwa afọ na mba ahụ.
                               Dị ka onye ozi si kwuo, n’ime ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ, 1000 na-ahapụ obodo ahụ kwa afọ.
                                                                                                                                O kwuru na nke a bụ n’agbanyeghị mbọ Gọọmenti etiti na-agba n’ịmepụta ohere ka ukwuu iji were ndị ọrụ a n’ọrụ n’agbanyeghị ihe na-arị elu maka ụgwọ ọrụ dị elu.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             “N’ime ndị dọkịta ahụike, ndị na-enwechaghị ike ịlaghachi na mba ahụ, na ndị mkpali ime ya dị njọ, bụ ndị ndụmọdụ nwere ahụmahụ.
                                “Ha bụ ndị anyị na-enwe nchegbu karị n’ihi na ọ na-ewe nnukwu ego iji zụọ ha, ọ na-esikwa ike imezu ihe ha tụrụ anya ya.”            Mịnịsta a gwara ndị gọvanọ steeti ndị ọzọ ka ha ṅomie Gọọmenti Sokoto steeti, bụ́ ndị dịka o siri kwuo, na-enye nnukwu ego n’ịzụ ndị dibia bekee, bụ ndị gọọmenti na-emesịa were ha n’ọrụ..
Onye ndu ntakiri nke ulo omebe iwu, Ndudi Elumelu, ga-etinye ihe karịrị puku dollar 200,000, nke ya na nde naira 100, n’okpuru ego nke Constituency Project iji kwado atụmatụ ndị a na-akwado maka nkwado akụ na ụba na mpaghara ya.
                                                                        Ekwuputara nke a na mmemme ncheta afọ iri nke Foundation for Effective Leadership and Development (FELD), ebe osote onye isi oche onye isi oche nke Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) na Gọvanọ Delta State, Ifeanyi Okowa, na onye ndu ntakiri ka a kpọrọ aha ndị Patrons.
                      Elumelu, onye na-anọchite anya Aniocha/Oshimili Federal Constituency, kwupụtara nkwado nkwado N100m na ​​FELD emume emere na Ogwashi-Uku, Delta State, na Satọde.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            O kwuru na ego ahụ bụ akụkụ nke ọrụ mpaghara ya tupu ọnwa Mee 2023.
Elumelu, onye akpọrọ onye nkwado nke Foundation ahụ n’ihi nnochite anya ya dị elu, mmemme inye ike na-adịghị ahụkebe, na mmasị ọ na-eme maka ndị obodo ya bụ Federal Constituency, kwuputara mmezu nke Gọvanọ Okowa ma na-eto ma na-ekele Chineke maka ihe ndị Chief Adigupu rụzuru.
n’imetụ ndụ aka na iwetara ndị na-enweghị ihe ùgwù, ndị ogbenye na ndị ọ na-adịghị ike.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 “Ana m ekele Chineke maka inye gị (Chief Adigupu) amara icheta ndị nwere obere ohere na mkpa ọ dị imeziwanye ọnọdụ ha.
                                       Anyị aghaghị ịgbalị imetụ ndụ aka, n’ihi na gọọmenti enweghị ike ime ya naanị ya.
                                                                                                                       Ndị mmadụ n’otu n’otu nwere ike ịkwado, n’agbanyeghị obere, biko.
      Metụ ndụ aka; nye ndi mmadu, ngozi Chineke dikwasiri gi ma i nye.
             “Ka m kwuo n’aha ụlọ ọrụ m na tupu m apụ n’ọfịs na May 2023, dịka onye ndu nta, m na-agbanye N100 nde iji kwado FELD Foundation.

                                                                                                                         N100 nde emetụtaghị n’okpuru ego e kenyere m site na Constituency Project iji lekọta ndị m,” Elumelu kwuru.
                                                                      O mesiri ndị mmadụ obi ike na ego ahụ ga-adị n’etiti February na Eprel 2023 na a ga-enye ndị ga-erite uru na Ogwashi-Uku ma ọ bụ Asaba, isi obodo Delta steeti.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     N’ịkwado nhọpụta ahụ, osote onye na-ekwuchitere ụlọ omebe iwu steeti Delta, Ochor Christopher, bụ onye nọchitere anya Gọvanọ Okowa, kwughachiri na Gọvanọ ahụ hụrụ ndị Delta niile n’anya, nke na-akọwa mbọ ya na-adịghị agwụ agwụ na ntinye aka ya maka ọdịmma ndị mmadụ na mmepe obodo.  Hon.
Ochor kwuru na ya ga-agwa Gọvanọ Okowa maka nhọpụta ahụ ma na-ekwe nkwa nkwado ya na Foundation.
                                                            “M ga-akọ ihe niile mere ebe a na Gọvanọ, amakwaara m na ọ ga-eweta nkwado ya na FELD,” Ochor kwuru.
                                         Na mbụ n’okwu nnabata ya, onye isi oche kọmitii nhazi mpaghara FELD, Maazị Godwin Okoh, kwuru na mmemme ahụ bụ emume nke ọhụụ e nyere Adigupu, bụ onye hụrụ ma na-enwe mmetụta n’ahụhụ ndị ntorobịa, ndị obere ihe, na ndị okpuru ọchịchị.
ndị okenye na-adịghị ike, ya mere ntinye aka ya n’achọghị ọdịmma onwe ya.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       O mere ka ọ pụta ìhè na n’ime afọ iri nke ọrụ ya, FELD emetụla ma gbanwee ọtụtụ ndụ n’agbanyeghị agbụrụ, okpukperechi, ma ọ bụ mmekọrịta ọha na eze.
Okoh kwuru na ihe karịrị ndị okenye 225 na ụmụ akwụkwọ karịrị 60 na mpaghara ọchịchị Anịocha South ritere na mmemme mmụta na ime obodo FELD.
N’okwu ya na mmemme ahụ, onye hibere na onye na-akpọkọta FELD, Maazị Paul Adigupu, kwuru na otu Foundation ahụ ji otu olu họpụta Gọvanọ Okowa ka ọ bụrụ onye nkwado n’ihi ihe ọ rụpụtara pụtara ìhè na nke a na-enwetụbeghị ụdị ya n’ihe gbasara akụrụngwa, ego mmadụ na mmemme inye ike na steeti ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Ha wepụrụ nde naira iri na abụọ n’ụzọ dị nro nye ndị ga-erite uru na ngalaba iri abụọ na abụọ nke FELD, ebe ụmụ nwanyị di ha nwụrụ 300 natara puku naira ise na otu akpa osikapa.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Ihe ngosi mmemme ahụ gụnyere egwu egwu ọdịnala nke ndị otu FELD n’ofe ngalaba iri abụọ na abụọ gara aga.

Ward 6B meriri asọmpi ịgba egwu iji nweta ihe nrite ego ruru puku naira ise.
                                        Wards 4 na 9A bịara nke abụọ na nke atọ wee nweta puku naira atọ na narị puku abụọ, n’otu n’otu..
Onye na-ekwuchitere otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị All Progressives Congress (APC) bụ Maazị Femi Fani-Kayode na-ekwu na pati ya na-achọsi ike ịme mkpọsa gbadoro ụkwụ na Naịjirịa.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Fani-Kayode, onye isi ọrụ mgbasa ozi pụrụ iche na mgbasa ozi ọhụrụ maka ọgbakọ mkpọsa nke Tinubu/Shettima, kwuru nke a na nkwupụta mgbasa ozi.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Okwu a bụ mmeghachi omume n’ebubo ndị mmegide Peoples Democratic Party, PDP, kwuru na onye isi ya bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala APC bụ Maazị Bola Tinubu erughị eru ịbụ onyeisiala.
                                                                                                                                                                                        Fani-Kayode, mgbe ọ na-akọwa na Maazị Tinubu “dị mma dị ka onye na-agba ọsọ,” gbara ndị mmegide ume ka ha lekwasị anya n’ihe ndị na-emetụta Naijiria kama ịgha ụgha na ụgha.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    “Anyị chọrọ mkpọsa nke gbadoro ụkwụ na nsogbu.
Maka anyị, okwu a bụ obodo anyị hụrụ n’anya bụ Nigeria na naanị onye nọ n’ọsọ nke anyị nwere ike ịtụkwasị obi na ọdịnihu nke nde mmadụ 200 bụ Bola Tinubu,” Fani-Kayode kwusiri ike.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Ọ gbakwụnyere na Maazị Tinubu nwere àgwà kacha mma ọ ga-eji na-edu Naijiria, dịka iguzosi ike n’ihe na ikike nke uche na nke anụ ahụ..
Ụlọ ọrụ mpaghara Naijiria nke United Nations Children Fund (UNICEF) etoola Gọvanọ Adamawa Steeti, Ahmadu Fintiri maka ibinye aka n’akwụkwọ iwu nchekwa ụmụaka.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Otuto a dị n’ime nkwupụta nke Nwada Cristian Munduate, onye nnọchite anya UNICEF na Nigeria.
                                                                                         Dị ka ya si kwuo, “UNICEF toro Gọvanọ Adamawa steeti, Ahmadu Fintiri maka ibinye aka n’akwụkwọ iwu nchekwa ụmụaka.” Iwu nchekwa ụmụaka bụ ọnọdụ gọọmentị Adamawa steeti na-eleghara ikike ụmụaka anya bụ ihe a na-anabataghị na ntaramahụhụ.
                                      Oriakụ Munduate kwuru na “Iwu a bu n’obi ichekwa ikike ụmụaka site n’igbochi na ikwado ogbugbu na imerụ ụmụaka, ọrụ ụmụaka, ịtọrọ ụmụaka, ime ihe ike megide ụmụaka na iwere ụmụaka na iji ụmụaka eme ihe site n’aka ndị agha, na nnukwu mmebi iwu ndị ọzọ.
maka ikike ha.”                                                                                                                                                                                                                             O kwuru na UNICEF nwere olile anya na iwu ọhụrụ a na steeti Adamawa ga-arụ ọrụ nke ọma nakwa na a na-akwado ụmụaka ndị na-adịghị ike ka ha dị ndụ, na-eme nke ọma ma bụrụ ndị na-eme nke ọma na ọha mmadụ.
Ọ gbakwụnyere, “Site na ntinye aka na ntinye iwu nke gọọmentị Adamawa steeti mbinye aka n’akwụkwọ iwu nchekwa ụmụaka, ọ bụ naanị Kano, Bauchi na Gombe steeti ka na-emebe Iwu ikike ụmụaka,” UNICEF kpọkuru gọọmentị steeti ndị a ka ha mee ihe ndị dị mkpa dịka ntinye aka na nkwanye ugwu ha maka ikike ụmụaka.
                        O mesikwara nkwa ya ike na ya na gọọmentị Adamawa steeti na-arụkọ ọrụ iji mee ka iwu ahụ rụọ ọrụ ma weta ndị na-eme ihe ọjọọ na ndị na-emebi iwu.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Ka ọ dị ugbu a, onye ndụmọdụ UNICEF Education na steeti Adamawa, Joel Jutum na mkparịtaụka ya na Voice of Nigeria toro ezigbo mmekọrịta Gọvanọ steeti ahụ na UNICEF.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Jutum kwuru na UNICEF na mmekorita ya na gọọmentị Adamawa steeti ewepụtala nkwado nke 2023 ruo 2025 State Education Sector Operational Plan ebe ndị na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ na steeti ahụ, sonyere nke ọma wee wepụta akwụkwọ ga-eduzi ha n’inweta ogo na idowe ụkpụrụ agụmakwụkwọ bụ isi na steeti ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                           Gọvanọ Fintiri n’akụkụ nke ya etoola UNICEF maka nkwado ọ na-enye steeti ahụ, na-ekwe nkwa na ọchịchị ya ga-enye onyinye ọ bụla ogbo ya na ngalaba niile UNICEF na-akwado..
Ndị uweojii Abịa steeti ekwuola na ha na ọnwụ ụmụakwụkwọ mahadum ‘Michael Okpara University of Agriculture’ (MOUAU) Umudike, Abia Steeti abụọ nwụrụ n’ụzọ edobeghị anya na ngwụcha izuụka a.
Edeh Chinonso Mordecai, a ma dịka ‘Decency’ na ogbo ya a kpọrọ Victor Ụkpai labara ụra, ha eteghị dịka a hụrụ ozu ha na mgbede Satode, abalị ise nke ọnwa Novemba afọ 2022.
Mordecai nke ngalaba ‘Animal Science and Animal Production’ na Victor nke ngalaba ‘Environmental Management’ bi na ebe obibi ụmụakwụkwọ a kpọrọ Wisdom Lodge dị n’Umudike.
Ndị nọ ebe ihe mere kwuru na ọ bụ ka mmadụ chọtara otu n’ime ndị ahụ nwụrụ anwụ ka hụrụ ozu ha.
Otu nwata akwụkwọ mahadum ahụ gwara ndi ntaakụkọ sị, ” Otu onye metụtara otu n’ime ha kpọrọ ya n’ekwentị ugboro ugboro, ọ zaghị.” “Ọ chọọrọ ya gaa ebe o bi, kụọ aka mana ọ kpọpeghị ụzọ.” ” O siri na mpịọ ụlọ nyoo ma hụ ozu ha abụọ, were tiwe mkpu, onye nlekọta ụlọ ahụ na ndị agbataobi gbatara.” “Ha bekuru ndị nche mahadum ahụ, ha gbawaa ụzọ.” Akụkọ na-efegharị na soshal midia na-ebo ebubo na e tinyere ha nsi na nri.
Dịka akụkọ ahụ siri kwuo, mmadụ abụọ ahụ richara nri nke ha zigara onye ọkada ha zụtara ha, laba ụra mana ha eteghị.
Ebe akụkọ ọzọ na-ekwu na ọnwụ ha metụtara ntuliaka otu ụmụakwụkwọ mahadum ahụ a ga-eme n’izuụka na-abịa nke a si otu onye n’ime na-azọ ọkwa .
Mana ọnụ na-ekwuru mahadum ahụ MOUAU bụ Adamma Odefa, onye gwara ndi ntaakuko n’ekwentị na ụmụakwụkwọ ha nwụrụ n’ezie kwuru na ha amaghị ihe gburu ụmụakwụkwọ ha nke ha na-ama etu ha siri nwụọ.
Odefa sịrị : “Anyị amaghị ihe mere.” “A hụrụ ozu ha n’ebe obibi ha, ndị uweojii ebugala ozu ha ụlọozu.” “Anyị ga-ezigara ndị ezinaụlọ ha ozi.” N’aka nke ọzọ, ọnụ na-ekwuru otu na-achịkọta ụmụakwụkwọ mahadum(SUG) bụ Chijioke Emmanuel kwuru na o nweghị eziokwu dị n’akụkọ ahụ dịka a ka na-eme nnyocha ihe mere.
Emmanuel kwuru sị,” Ndị na-efesa akụkọ ahụ amaghị ihe ha na-ekwu.” ” Otu ọbaozi kwuru na ọnụ na-ekwuru otu na-achịkọta ụmụakwụkwọ MOUAU anwụọla, ọ bụghị eziokwu, ọ bụ m bụ ọnụ na-ekwuru otu ụmụakwukwọ mahadum anyị , adị m ndụ.” ” Nwa amadi ahụ nwụrụ bụ Mordecai Edeh bụ ọnụ na-ekwuru ụmụakwụkwọ ngalaba ‘College of Animal Science and Animal Production'(CASAP) bụ ihe ọ na-agụ na mahadum anyị.
Echeghịdị m na ọ na-azọgharị ọkwa ọnụ na-ekwuru CASAP.” Ndị uweojii na steeti ahụ kwuru na ha na ndị ọrụ ha eburula ozu ụmụakwụkwọ abụọ ahụ, ebe nnyocha na-aga n’ihu.
Ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị uweojii Abịa steeti bụ Geofrey Ogbonna gwara ndi ntaakụkọ na onye gbara ndị uweojii ama ihe mere bụ onyeisi ndị ọrụ ncheta mahadum ahụ.
O kwuru na “Ozu mmadụ abụọ ahụ nọ n’ụlọ ebe a na-echekwa ozu.” “Nnyocha ebidola.” ” Nnyocha ahụ nwere ike ịgwa anyị ma ọbụ anwụrụ si n’igwe na-enye ọkụ ka ọ bụ ihe ha riri ahụ n’ihi na o nwewre ihe a na-eriiri fọdụrụ ebe ahụ.”.
Odeakwụkwọ ugwu nke ọgbakọ United Nations adọọla aka na ntị maka ajọ mgbanwe eligwe chere ụwa n’ihu ugbua nke ọ sị na-akawanye njọ.
Antonio Guterres dọrọ ka na ntị a n’ọgbakọ COP27 malitere na Ijipt bụ ụka nke ndị isiala mba dị otu narị na iri abụọ (120) ga-abịa itinye ọnụ n’okwu etu a ga-esi kwụ ya bụ onye ukwu wara.
Guterres sị a ekpomọkụ nke afọ asatọ gara aga kacha njọ.
Mba ndị a ga-etinye ọnụ n’okwu gbasara ihe ha ga-eme iji gbochie ya bụ ajọ ihe nke mmetọ ihu eligwe nwereike ibutere mmadụ.
Onyeisi ya bụ ọgbakọ COP27 bụkwa minista ndị Ejipt na-ahụ maka mba ofesi bụ r Sameh Shoukry rịọrịọ ndị bịara ya bụ ọgbakọ ka ha ghara ikwe ka oke agụụ na ụkọ ọkụ nke agha Ukren na Rọshịa butere bụrụ ọgbauhie nye mkpebi gbasara nkwa ha nwere maka idozi ihu eligwe.
Ọ sị, “ọ dịara anyị niile bịara ọgbakọ a na Sharm el-Sheikh igosi na anyị maara ọrụ cheere anyị n’ihu nakwa mkpebi anyị imezu ya”.
UN’s World Meteorological Organization gbara ihe niile ọtụ nke gụnyere ehi niile e kwesiri ịme ka ihe dị mma.
Maazi Guterres zipuru ozi n’ihe onyonyo ebe ọ kpọrọ ya bụ akwụkwọ nchọpụta Global Climate Report 2022 “Usoro ọdachị nke ihu eligwe”..

Otu onye aha ya bụ Abdul Nuri nọ n’ọdọụgbọelu ahụ na-eche ịlaghachi n’obodo Dar es Salaam,hụrụ ụgbọelu ahụ ka na-etinye isi na mmiri ezu ahụ kachasị n’Afrịka.
Egwu jidere ndị mmadụ, ụfọdụ na-ebe akwa, ụfọdụ na-eti mkpu.” “Na mpaghara ebe e si abata abata, ndị mmadụ nwekwara obi mmapụ – ọtụtụ n’ime ha bịara ịnabata ndị nke ha na-alọta.” Nuri na ndị ọkụazụ bụ ụzọ rute ebe ọdachi ahụ mere kpakwara.
Ha gwara ya na ha gbalịị banye n’ime ụgbelu ahụ oge otu n’ime ndị ọrụ ụgbọelu ahụ gbapere ụzọ azụ.

ỤFỌDỤ CHERE NA NDI IGBO ENWEGHļ  AKWỤKWỌ AGỤMAGỤ?.
Lee ụfọdụ akwụkwọ agụmagụ ndi Igbo.
1)Nka okwu nke J.C Mmaduekwe dere.
2)Isiakwu dara n’ala nke Tony Ubesie dere.
3)Mmiriọkụ eji egbu mbe nke Tony Ubesie dere.
4)Uwa na-eme ntughari nke Ogbonnaya Mark Okoro dere.
6)Mbediogu nke F.C Ọgbaalu dere.
Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi na omenala Naijiria, Lai Mohammed kwuru na ụlọ nchekwa obodo nwere ike ijikwa ọrụ ọjọọ nke ndị na-eyi ọha egwu na ndị ohi na-arụ.
Mohammed kwuru nke a na Fraịde na steeti Kaduna n’oge ngosi nke steeti afọ 2022 nke abụọ ya na nkeji nke atọ maka ọnọdụ nchekwa.
Dị ka o si kwuo, ọ dị mkpa ime ka ntụkwasị obi dị n’etiti ụmụ amaala na gọọmentị.
N’ozi nchekwa nke ụlọ ọrụ nnọchi anya mba Amerika nyere ụmụ amaala ya n’oge na-adịbeghị anya maka mwakpo ụjọ nwere ike ime n’mba ahụ, ọkachasị n’mpaghara Federal Capital Territory (FCT) Abuja, Minista ahụ kwuru na nkwalite nchekwa na steeti Kaduna gosiri na Naijiria nwere ihe ọ ga-ewe iji kpochapụ ndị omekome.
Agbanyeghị, ọ kpọkuru ndị mgbasa ozi ka ha dozie echiche na usoro nke akụkọ gbasara iyi ọha egwu.
Na akụkọ nke kọmishiona na-ahụ maka nchekwa etiti, Samuel Aruwan mere, ọ gosipụtara na e nwere mgbatu anị na ọnụ ọgụ ndị e gburu n’ihi iyi ọha egwu.

Xi kpọrọ oku ka ha na-emekọ ihe ọnụ n’etiti mba abụọ ahụ maka udo ụwa.
“Ugbu a, ọnọdụ mba ụwa dị mgbagwoju anya ma na-agbanwe agbanwe,” Xi kwuru na-ekwu.
Scholz gwara Xi na ọ dị mma na ndị isi abụọ ahụ na-ezukọ n’onwe ha n’oge nsogbu ma kwuo na mbuso agha Russia na Ukraine na-ebute nsogbu maka usoro iwu zuru ụwa ọnụ.
Scholz kwukwara na ha abụọ ga-ekwurịta okwu ndị metụtara mmekọrịta Europe na China, ọgụ megide mgbanwe ihu igwe na agụụ zuru ụwa ọnụ, na otu a ga-esi zụlite njikọ akụ na ụba China na Germany, yana isiokwu ebe mba abụọ ahụ nwere echiche dị iche iche..

Ndị na-ahụ maka ntụliaka nke Naijiria, Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC), amapụtala ego karịrị nde dollar narị asatọ maka ntuliaka izugbe nke afọ 2023 na mmefu ego nke afọ ahụ.
Onye isi oche INEC, Mahmood Yakubu, mere ihe ngosi a n’ihu ndị Kọmitii nke sineti na-ahụ maka nkesa ego ka ụlọ omeiwu abụọ kwado ya n’ụbọchị Tuuzde.
Ka ọ dị ugbua, ụlọ omebeiwu akwadola ijeri narị naira atọ na ise maka ntụliaka izugbe afọ 2023.
Agbanyeghị, INEC rịọrọ ka e nyekwuo ya ijeri naira iri ise maka mmefu ego n’afọ 2023.
Dịka Yakubu siri kwuo, ijeri narị naira atọ na ise bụ ego maka ntuliaka dị iche na ijeri naira iri anọ nke bụ ego mmefu kwa afọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.
N’ime mmefu ego 2023 nke e wegara na kọmitii Sineti na INEC ka ha lebaa anya, edoro ijeri naira abụọ na ụma isii maka ntuliaka gọvanọ nke dapụrụ n’oge na steeti Kogi, Imo na Bayelsa.
Ntuli aka maka steeti atọ a ga-eme na Nọvemba 11, 2023.
Dị ka INEC si kwuo, ijeri naira abụọ na ụma isii ga-egbo mkpa maka ntụliaka, referenda, na mmefu dị ka ụgwọ ngalaba ọrụ, mbipụta akwụkwọ ntuliaka, mpempe akwụkwọ mpụtara, ibipụta fọm na envelopu, na mmefu ndị ọzọ.
N’ime mmefu ego 2023, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ga-emefu nde naira iri ise zụta ngwa mgbanyụ ọkụ na ụgbọ ala.
Nde 150 na nde naira 250 ga-abanye na ndozi ụlọ ọrụ na ụlọ obibi.
Onye isi INEC kwuru na ka ha wepụtara otu narị ijeri naịra n’ụlọ ọrụ ahụ n’ime ego ha ga-emefu, na ọ gaghị ezu maka nkwadebe zuru oke maka afọ 2023.

Sinetọ Suswan kwukwara ihe na-ewute ọtụtụ ndị omeiwu, na ọtụtụ ihe ọkụ eletrik arụnyere n’ofe obodo Naijiria enwebeghị ike.
Ọ gwara ndị na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọkụ eletrik n’ime ime obodo ka ha dozie nsogbu ahụ, ma nyere aka dozie nsogbu ọkụ eletrik n’etiti ndị bi n’ime ime obodo.

Akụ na ụba Naijiria,” ka o kwusiri ike.

Ụlọ ọrụ Federal Capital Territory (FCT), Kọmitii Nchebe ewebatala ụkpụrụ omume na-egbochi ndị otu Vigilante na-arụ ọrụ n’ime obodo dị iche iche na Territory iji ngwa agha amachibidoro.
                                                                                                           Agbanyeghị, ndị otu Vigilante nwere ikike ịnwe ma jiri ngwa ọgụ maka nchekwa onwe ha ma ọ bụ ebumnuche iwu ndị ọzọ dịka DPO kwere.
                      Ndị a bụ ụfọdụ mkpebi ndị kọmitii nchekwa FCT mere na nzukọ nke iri na otu ya, nke Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka isi obodo Federal, Malam Muhammad Musa Bello nọ n’Abuja.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  N’otu aka ahụ, koodu ọhụrụ ahụ akwadoro chọrọ ka onye ọ bụla so na otu ahụ, na-anata ngwa agha dị ize ndụ n’aka onye a na-enyo enyo na-atụ anya idobe nkọwa zuru ezu ma kọọrọ ndị uwe ojii maka nyocha ọzọ.
                                                                                                                                                      Kọmiti ahụ nyere ndị otu vigilante ikike ijide onye ọ bụla, bụ onye mebiri iwu obodo dịka enyere ikike n’okpuru nchịkwa nchịkwa ikpe mpụ, 2015.
        O kwetara na Community ọ bụla chọrọ iguzobe otu Vigilante kwesịrị itinye akwụkwọ ma nweta nkwado nke DPO n’ime mpaghara ahụ.
                         Na nbanye nke ndị òtù nke vigilante, Kọmitii Nchebe FCT, bụ ndị na-eme mkpebi kachasị elu n’ihe gbasara nchekwa kpebiri na a ga-elekọta usoro ahụ site na Community Accountability Forum (CAF) / Kọmitii Nchebe nke obodo metụtara.
                                                                                                                  CAF bụ ịhụ na nnochi anya ziri ezi nke akụkụ niile nke ọha ma zere nkweta okpukpe, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na agbụrụ.
                                                             Nzukọ ahụ kwekọrịtakwara na ndị niile a ga-ewe n’ọrụ ga-abụrịrị ndị isi obodo na ndị ọrụ nchekwa na-akọwapụta ha nke ọma.
                            Gọọmenti FCT na-agba ndị obodo ume ka ha guzobe otu ndị nche iji kwado ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa, ọkachasị n’ịchịkọta ọgụgụ isi na ịkwalite ọgụ megide ndị omempụ..
Arụchala ọrụ Lekki Deep Seaport $1.5billion ma nyefee ya n’aka ndị nkwalite, Tolarams Group nke China Harbor Engineering LFTZ Enterprise (CHELE).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Ewuchara ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ, nke malitere na June 15, 2020 na Ọktoba 24, 2022, onye ọrụ ngo, CHELE kwuru.
                                                                  N’ikwu okwu na mmemme mmecha ahụ n’ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Lekki dị na Legọs steeti Southwest Nigeria na Mọnde, Gọvanọ Lagos Steeti, Maazị Babajide Sanwo-Olu kwere nkwa ịgbasa okporo ụzọ na-eduga ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri gaa n’ụzọ isii iji hụ na a ga-ebupụ ibu n’enweghị nsogbu.
       Sanwo-Olu kwukwara na site na atụmatụ 1.2million Twenty Equipment Unit, (TEUs), ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ ga-eme ka Naijiria bụrụ ebe azụmahịa dị mkpa n’oké osimiri na mpaghara West Africa dum.
                                                                                                                                                                                  Ọ kpọkuru ndị obodo nọ n’ime ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ka ha nye nkwado niile dị mkpa ka ọ na-ewepụta ọrụ karịrị 200,000 n’ime obodo gburugburu mpaghara ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Sanwo-Olu gara n’ihu kwuo, sị, “Anyị agaghị akwụsị n’enweghị ihe ọ bụla iji rụchaa okporo ụzọ ndị na-aga n’ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri, a ga-ekpochapụ ụlọ niile dị n’akụkụ okporo ụzọ iji nye ohere maka mgbasawanye nke okporo ụzọ.                                                                                                                                      “Site n’ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ emechara yana atụmatụ 1.2million TEUs, Lagos aghọwo ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri.”                                                   Ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri dị mkpa N’otu aka ahụ, onyeisi oche Board of Ports, Legọs steeti, bụ Maazị Abiodun Dabiri kwuru na gọọmenti dị njikere imezu nkwa ha kwere ime ka Naijiria bụrụ nnukwu ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri na West Africa.
Dabiri kwusiri ike na obi dị ndị bọọdụ ahụ ụtọ ime emume arụchachara nke ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ yana nyekwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nke ọma site n’aka Lekki Port n’aka ụlọ ọrụ Contractor, China Harbor Engineering LFTZ Enterprise (CHELE), onye enyemaka nke ụlọ ọrụ China Harbor Engineering Company.
“Ọ bụla ogologo njem nke ọtụtụ nzọụkwụ.
                                                        Malite n’oge Tolaram nke Pa Mohan Aswani duziri chọrọ ịmepụta ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri miri emi maka uru nke Mpaghara Free Lagos, na n’ezie niile Lagos State na Nigeria; inweta nkwado site n’aka ndị na-ahụ maka ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke Nigeria maka ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri pụrụ iche nke ọha na eze; Inweta ihe nbinye ego sitere na China Development Bank na ntinye ego nha nha $ 221m site na China Harbor Engineering Company na mmalite nke owuwu n’etiti ọrịa na-efe efe zuru ụwa ọnụ na-enwetụbeghị ụdị ya.
                                                                                                                                                                     Ọ bụla njem n’ezie.” N’ịbụ onye na-ezisa ozi obi ụtọ n’aha Tolaram Group, onye isi nchịkwa nke Lagos Free Trade Zone, Mr.
Dinesh Rathi, kwupụtara obi ụtọ na mmecha nke ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ n’oge.
                                                                                                                                                                                   O kwuru na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ ga-edobe mpaghara Free Lagos ka ọ bụrụ ebe ọzọ maka itinye ego na Naijiria ma mee ka itinye ego na mba ofesi na steeti Lagos na Nigeria n’ozuzu ya..
Gọọmenti Naijiria na-ezube imekọ ihe ọnụ na ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo na usoro nhazi amụma dị mkpa na njikwa ụlọ ọrụ nka na mba ahụ iji mechie oghere nka nke ọma.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Osote onye isi ala Yemi Osinbajo kwuru na Mọnde a na nzukọ nke National Council on Skills, ebe e kpebiri inyekwu ọrụ na Organized Private Sector (OPS) dị ka ụzọ isi mechie oghere nka na mba ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                         Dabere na nkwado nke Kansụl, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ a haziri ahazi, nke ndị Nigeria Economic Summit Group (NESG), Association of Manufacturers Association of Nigeria (MAN), National Association of Chambers of Commerce, Industry, Mines and Agriculture (NACCIMA) nọchitere anya ya.
                            Njikọ nke obere ụlọ ọrụ dị nta na nke ọkara, n’etiti otu ndị ọzọ, ga-ejikọta na mmemme nke NCS.
                                                                                        Nzukọ ahụ, nke onye isi oche onye isi oche, kpebikwara na, tinyere ihe ndị ọzọ; gbaa ume ka e guzobe kansụl steeti na nka iji kwado na megharịa mbọ a na-eme n’ọkwa mba, iji kwado nke ọma okwu nke oghere nka n’ofe mba ahụ.

Osinbajo kwuru na o doro anya na ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo nwere ọrụ dị oke mkpa iji mee ka ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ nkà dị iche iche dị na mba ahụ, na-ekwu na mpaghara ahụ dị mma iji chọpụta mkpa nke ụlọ ọrụ.
                                                                                                                      O kwusiri ike na ọ dị mkpa ịmepụta ohere maka inweta nkà dijitalụ yana nkà ndị ọzọ dị mkpa n’ofe mpaghara dị iche iche, na mmekorita na-arụsi ọrụ ike n’etiti ọha na eze na nkeonwe.
                                                                                                                                                                                                        “Enwere ike nweta nke a site n’iso ndị na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ nkeonwe na-arụkọ ọrụ iji nweta data ziri ezi na oghere nkà dị na mba ahụ na otu esi edozi ya nke ọma.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       “Iwube na ịrụ ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ nka dị iche iche kwesịrị ịbụ ndị ọrụ nkeonwe, e kwesịghị ịhapụ ya naanị gọọmentị ka ọ na-elekọta.
Ndị egwuregwu ụlọ ọrụ maara ebe oghere dị.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                O kwuru na “A na-ejikwa ụlọ ọrụ Skills Acquisition Center na mmekorita ya na Dangote Foundation, dịka ezigbo ihe atụ nke imekọ ihe ọnụ na ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo.

Tupu e kwuo okwu ọgwụgwọ, Akinde nyere ndị mmadụ ndụmọdụ ịgba mbọ debe onwe ha ọcha.
“Ị debe ebe ahụ ọcha bụ naanị ihe kachasị mma ga-egbo nsogbu ibute ọrịa a” ka o kwuru.
A bịazie n’okwu ọgwụgwọ, ọ kwuru na ọ dị mkpa ka ndị mmadụ gaa n’ụlọogwụ, nyochaa onwe ha ọfụma ma ṅụchaa ọgwụ niile e nyere ha.
“Ndị mmadụ na-emekaarị ha nwete ọgwụ ṅụọ ya abalị abụọ, ọrịa mee ka ọ lawala, ha akwụsị ịṅụ ọgwụ” Ọ kọwara na agwa a jogburu onwe ya n’ihi na nje butere ọrịa ahụ ka dị ndụ na-enye nsogbu.
O kwukwara na agwọghị ọrịa a ọfụma ga-eme ka ọ dịrịzịa ka ọrịa ala ala mana o kwesighi ị dị etu ahụ..
Mgbe ọbụla ị gafere n’ahịa, ị ga-anụ ebe ndị na-ere ọgwụ mgbọrọgwu na-ekwu okwu ịgwọ ọrịa a sị na-esi n’ụlọ mposi a kpọrọ a kpọrọ ‘toilet infection’.
Dịka ha si akọwa, ọrịa a metụtara ọrịa niile gụnyere ọkọ, isi ọjọ, ụfụ ma ọrịa ịnyụ mamịrị na ihe ndị ọzọ.
Ihe ọzọ a na-echekwa bụ na ọ bụ naanị ụmụnwaanyị na-ebutekaarị ọrị a.
Mana ọ bụ eziokwu na ọ bụ n’ụlọmposi ka e si ebute ọrịa ndị a? Anyị jụrụ otu dọkịnta pụrụiche bụ ‘Gynaecologist’ na Bekee maka nke a.
Gụrụ gawa ka ị hụ ihe ndị dị mkpa ọ kọwaara.
Dọkịnta Akinde Joseph kwuru hoo haa na o nweghi ihe dị ka ‘toilet disease’ a na-ebute n’ụlọmposi.
Ọ kọwara na ọrịa ahụ bụ ‘vaginal candidiasis’ nakwa nje na-akpata ya bi n’akụkụ ike mmadụ bụ ‘genital tract’ na Bekee.
O kwuru sị “ndị mmadụ na-akpọ ya aha a n’ihi na ha cheere na ọ bụ n’ụlọmposi ka ha na-ebute ụdịrị ọrịa a”.
Akinde Joseph kwuru na ọtụ na ike nwaanyị nọketere onwe ha nso nke mere na ọ bụrụ na nwaanyị akpachaghị anya debe onwe ya ọcha, ọ ga-adị mfe ka nje ahụ si n’ime ike fere n’ime ọtụ nwaanyị.
Ọ kọwara na ọ bụrụ na nje ahụ buru n’ime ike ebe o kwesiri ị nọ, ọ gaghị enye nsogbu ọbụla mana ọ banye n’ọtụ, ọ ghọọ ọrịa.
Ihe ọzọ tụrụ n’anya Dọkịnta Akinde kwuru bụ na nwoke nwereike ị sị na mmekọ nwoke na nwaanyị bute ọrịa a.
Ọ sị “ọ bụrụ na nwoke zutere nwaanyị bu ọrịa ahụ, o ga-ebute ya bụ ọrịa.
O nwekwara ike ibunye nwaanyị ọzọ site n’ụzọ mmekọ” Nke a pụtara na ọrịa a bụ vagina candidiasis nwereike iso n’ọrịa ‘Sexually Transmitted Infections’ mana ụzọ nke ya pụrụiche.
Ndị ọrụ ahụike kọwara na ọ ga-ara ezigbo ahụ tupu mmadụ ebute ọrịa ndị a dị aṅaa.
Nnyocha sanyesị gosiri na nje ndị na-akpalite ọrịa ndị a n’ahụ ndị mmadụ anaghị enwe ike dị ndụ maọbụ dị ire ma ha ebighi n’ime ahụ mmadụ.
Nke a pụtara na nje ndị a agaghị enweike dị ndị mmadụ kpalitere mmadụ ọrịa site n’ụlọipo nsi n’ihi na ọ bụ site na mmekọ ahụ na ahụ ka ha na-esi awụfụ n’ahụ otu onye ma wụba n’ahụ onye ọzọ.
Agbanyeghị nke a, mmadụ nwereike ibute ọrịa  ‘trichomoniasis’ site n’oche ụlọipo nsi mana ọ bụ naanị ma onye ọzọ nọrọ n’oche ahụ ngwa ngwa onye bụ ọrịa a si n’oche ahụ pụọ.
Mmadụ nwekwaraike ibute ọrịa Hepatitis B site n’oche ụlọipo mana ọ bụ naanị ma ọ bụrụ na onye nọrọ n’oche ahụ nwere ọnya maọbụ apa mepere emepee.
Nke a ga-adị ere naanị ọ bụrụ na onye nọbu n’elu oche ahụ gbaa ọbara ọhụrụ maọbụ nyụsa uhe n’elu ya bụ oche nke metụtara ya bụ ọnya mepere emepee..

Ndị na-ahụ maka ndị ọrụ ugbo obere n’ala Naijiria, ActionAid, kọmitii mmefu ego na Kogi, akpọkuola Gọọmenti Kogi steeti ka ha kwalite oke ego na-enye ego maka ngalaba ọrụ ugbo.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Otu a mere ihe a n’oge ọgbakọ ndị nta akụkọ na nso nso a iji nyochaa mmefu ego steeti Kogi steeti 2023, na Lokoja.
                                                                Ha kpọkuru oku ka ewepụtara ndị ọrụ ugbo nọ na steeti ahụ ego ọrụ ugbo ngwa ngwa ka ha wee rụọ ọrụ ugbo ha n’oge ọrụ ugbo kwesịrị ekwesị.
Onye isi oche nke Initiative for Grassroots Advancement na onye so na kọmitii Budget Kogi, Hamza Aliyu, kwuru na ntinye ego nke ijeri N9.5bn maka ngalaba ọrụ ugbo maka 2023, nke na-anọchite anya pasent 5.3 nke mkpokọta mmefu ego, ezughị oke, na-agbakwụnye na mkpa a chọrọ.
Pasent mmefu ego maka ọrụ ugbo ekwesịghị ịbụ n’okpuru pasenti iri nke oke mmefu ego, ebe ọ bụ na mmefu ego ọrụ ugbo bụ isi ego karịa mmefu na-eme ugboro ugbo Okwu ya: “Inye ego maka ọrụ ugbo nke ọma dị mkpa karịa ngalaba ọ bụla ọzọ nke akụ na ụba n’ihi ọrụ ọ na-ekere na nchekwa nri na imepụta akụ na ụba.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Ọ na-agbawa obi na n’ime ijeri naira 172 Kogi, e kenyere ọrụ ugbo naanị pasentị 5.3, otu n’ime ngalaba kacha nta.”                       Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ọ jara Gọọmenti mma maka mmụba n’itinye ego na mpaghara dịka ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọrụ ugbo, ntinye ọrụ ugbo, ọrụ ịgbatị ọrụ ugbo, na mfu mgbe owuwe ihe ubi gasịrị.
                                                                                                                                                                                                              Aliyu gụpụtakwara aro ndị otu ahụ dị ka ndị a: mkpa ọ dị inyocha atumatu na usoro ọrụ ugbo dị adị, ịbawanye ego maka ngalaba ahụ iji mezuo nkwupụta pasenti iri, imeziwanye ọrụ ugbo azụmahịa, ọrụ mgbasa ozi, mfu mgbe owuwe ihe ubi, mwepụta nke oke ego maka umunwanyi ndi oru ugbo, zuta ihe eji etinye ugbo, nleba anya nleba anya nke ulo omebe iwu, oru ugbo na-adigide ihu igwe yana nyocha na mmepe..

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Mutawwifs bụ ndị ọrụ Saudi Arabian nke Hajj họpụtara, na-ahụ maka ilekọta ndị njem ala nsọ si Africa na mba ndị na-abụghị Arab.

nhazi nri na ogo ọrụ enyere n’oge oge.

Onye isi ala Naijiria, Muhammadu Buhari enyefela iwu gbasara ego ọhụrụ, 2022 n’ụlọ ndị omebe iwu.
                                                                                     Ụgwọ ahụ na-achọ inye nkwado maka ego mpata na mmefu nke 2023.
 Ọkà okwu nke Ụlọ Nnọchiteanya, Honorable Femi Gbajabiamila gụpụtara nzikọrịta ozi Onye isi ala na-ebufe ụgwọ ahụ abali iri na itolu nke onwa Disemba, 2022, na nnọkọ.
                                                                                                Onye isi ala ahụ kpọrọ oku maka nleba anya ngwa ngwa na ntinye akwụkwọ iwu gbasara ego ego 2022, kwuru na mgbe etinyere ya n’iwu, ụgwọ ahụ ga-enye nkwado ego maka mmejuputa mmefu ego gọọmentị etiti 2023.
                                                                                                                                                   O kwuru na ọ dabere na ngalaba iri ise na asato na iri ise na itolu nke iwu 1999 (dị ka emezigharịrị).
                                                                           Akwụkwọ ozi ahụ na-agụ, sị: “Ana m arịọ arịrịọ maka nlebara anya na ịbanye n’ime iwu site n’aka Ụlọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya, Bill Finance, 2022.
             The Finance Bill, 2022 na-achọ ịkwado mmejuputa nke 2023 Federal Budget of Fiscal Consolidation and Transition site n’ịtụpụta mgbanwe ndị bụ isi.
maka ụtụ isi, kọstọm, excise, fiscal na iwu ndị ọzọ dị mkpa.
Kpọmkwem, atụmatụ Bill a: “a) kwalite nha nhata ụtụ isi site n’iwebata ngalaba akụ na ụba n’ime ụgbụ ụtụ isi na ịhụ na nkesa nnata ego n’ụzọ ziri ezi na ọkwa gọọmentị niile; “b) Zaghachi ihe ịma aka mgbanwe mgbanwe ihu igwe site na mkpali iji kwado ojiji nke gas dị ka mmanụ mgbanwe mgbanwe, yana ihe na-adịghị mma maka ọkụ ọkụ na ikuku gas; “c) Kwado ọrụ ịmepụta site na ọganihu akụ na ụba na-adịgide adịgide, na mmekorita ya na isi mmepe mmepe mba ụwa na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ; “d) Mejuputa mgbanwe mkpali ụtụ isi ụlọ ọrụ; “e) Mee ka ndị na-enweta ego nweta ego na nchịkwa ụtụ isi site na usoro mmefu ego dị iche iche na usoro ndị ọzọ.
“Ọ bụ olileanya m na a ga-atụle Iwu ahụ site na National Assembly, maka ịbanye n’ime iwu iji nye nkwado mmefu ego dị mkpa maka mmejuputa nke 2023 Federal Budget.” O kwukwara..
Otu jikọrọ ndị dọkịnta ekwuola na ha ga-aga abụbụọrụ n’ebe na Naịjirịa niile maọbụrụ na gọọmentị Abia steeti akwụghị ụgwọ e ji ha.
Ha kwuru na gọọmentị steeti ahụ ji ha ụgwọ ọnwa iri abụọ na anọ putara afọ abụo ma jụ ịkwụ ha ụgwọ.
Onyeisi otu ahụ bụ Emeka Innocent Orji gwara ndi ntaakuko sị “Ọ bụrụ na gọọmentị Abia steeti akwụghị ụgwọ a, ya atụna onye ọbụla n’anya na anyị ga-akwụsị ọrụ ileta ahụike na Naịjirịa niile maka ya.
Ọ bụ ya mere anyị ji nwee otu a jikọrọ anyị, njọ e mere otu bụ njọ e mere anyị niile.” Orji kwukwara na gọọmentị ekwebuola ha nkwa ịkwụ ụgwọ ọnwa abụọ mgbe ha meburu abụbụọrụ nwa oge mana ha tụgharịrị azụ kwuo na “ego adịghị”.
Gịnị ka gọọmentị na-ekwu? N’aka nke ha, gọọmentị Abia gwara ndi ntaakuko na o nweghi onye ha ji ụgwọ na steeti ahụ.
Kọmịshọna mgbasaozi bụ Eze Chikamnayo sị “o nweghi onye ọrụ gọọmentị ọbụla e ji ụgwọ”.
Ọ sị na ọ bụ ndị na-erụ n’okpuru ngalaba dị icheiche na-enwe nsogbu iji ụgwọ na steeti ahụ.
“Anyị nwere ndị dọkịta na-arụrụ gọọmentị ọrụ site na ngalaba ahụike, o nweghi ụgwọ e ji ndị ahụ” ka o kwuru.
Chikamnayo kwukwara na ọ bụghị ọrụ gọọmentị ịkwụ ndị ahụ nọ na ngalaba ụgwọ ọnwa n’ihi na nwere iwu ndị hibere ha ma nyekwa ha ikike ịkpata ego nke ha ịkwụ ndị ọrụ ha ụgwọ ebe gọọmentị nwereike ị na-enyere ha aka site n’inye onyinye.
Nke a pụtara na Abia state University Teaching Hospital and Health Management Board bụ ụdịrị ngalaba ahụ kwesiri ịkpata ego nke ha gụnyere ịkwụ ndị dọkịta ụgwọ..
Ụlọakụ etiti akọwala ihe njirimara dị icheiche mmadụ ga-eji mata ego naịra ọhụrụ nke ezigbo na nke adịgboroja.
N’akara websaịt CBN, ha dere sị: “E nwere njrirmara pụrụ iche nke mmadụ nwereike ịhụ n’anya maọbụ metụ aka iji mata nke bụ ezigbo ego naịra.
“Nke mbụ bụ na etu e si bipụta ya ga-eme ka mmadụ mata nke bụ ezigbo na nke adigboroja ngwangwa o metụrụ ya aka.
“Enwekwara ihe dịka eriri gara ogologo n’akwụkwọ ego ahụ, ọ ga-abụ mmadụ lee ya anya n’ọkụ, ọ ga-ahụ ka e ji kịrịkịrị mkpụrụedemede dee CBN n’ahụ ya.
Ihe ndị ọzọ gụnyere etu pụrụ iche e si dee ihe n’akwụkwọ ego ahụ.
Ha kọwakwara na akara njirimara akwụkwọ naịra ọbụla n-eji oji ma e were anya nkịtị lee ya, mana e tinye ya n’ọkụ, ọ ga-acha ndụndụ.
Ha gara n’ihu kwuo na ha na-agbanwe njirimara dị n’akwụkwọ naịra kwa mgbe kwa mgbe iji gbochie ndị na-akụ nke adigboroja.
Gịnị mere ụlọakụ ka ji enye ndị mmadụ ego naịra ochie? Gịnị mere ụlọakụ ka ji enye ndị mmadụ ego naịra ochie? Nkesa akwụkwọ ego naịra ọhụrụ nke ụlọakụ etiti Naịjirịa wepụtara kwesịrị ịmalite n’ụbọchị iri na ise nke ọnwa Disemba 2022, mana ruo taa, Disemba 2020, ụlọakụ dị icheiche na Naịjirịa ka na-enye ndị mmadụ akwụkwọ naịra ochie.
Nke a emeela ka ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ na-eti mkpu ma na-ajụ sị, kedụzi ebe naịra ọhụrụ a dị? Ekwesịrị ịmalite ikesa ego naịra ọhụrụ a n’abali iri na ise nke onwa Disemba Otu onye aha ya bụ Oluchi Alabi gwara ndi ntaakuko na ya gara ụlọakụ n’ụbọchị Mọnde ịdọrọ puku naịra iri na ise n’ọbaego ya, mana ọ bụ ego ochie ka e nyere ya.
“Oge m jụrụ ha ihe kpatara nke a, onye ụlọakụ ahụ nyere m naanị otu puku naịra nke ọhụrụ, nyezie m puku naịra 14 n’ego ochie, lefuo anya,” Oluchi kwuru.
Onye ọzọ bụ Halima kwuru na ya gara ịdọrọ ego n’ụlọakụ dị n’Ilorin, Kwara steeti, mana ọ bụkwa ego ochie ka ha na-akwụ.
“N’ihi na onye ahụ na-akwụ ụgwọ bụ nwanne m nwaanyị, o nyere m puku naịra ise n’ego ọhụrụ.
Mgbe ndị mmadụ hụrụ na o nyere m ego ọhụrụ, ha malitere ịgbata n’akụkụ nke ya, mana ọ gwara ha na ọ bụ naanị ego ọhụrụ puku naịra iri ka ụlọakụ nyere ya ka o nye ndị mmadụ,” Halima kwuru.
Ndị na-ere ego na mmemme nwere ego ọhụrụ a n’uju Ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ ekwuola na ha ahụla ebe ndị na-ere naịra ‘mint’ na mme bu ego ọhụrụ a n’uju.
Otu onye aha ya bụ Adeleke Opeyemi na Twitter tinyere onyonyo ebe otu onye na-ere ego bu ego ọhụrụ ahụ na-ere ya n’otu mmemme.
Opeyemi dere sị: “Ụmụ Naịjirịa ga-achọtarịrị ụzọ ha ga-esi mebie iwu.
Lee ego ọhụrụ nke ụlọakụ na-anaghị enye ndị mmadụ, ya ka ndị na-atụ mgbere na-ere n’uju na mmemme.” Chetakwa na ịre naịra bụ ihe megidere iwu dịka ụlọakụ etiti si kwuo, mana ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ ka na-ere naịra ‘mint’ na mmemme n’ebe dị icheiche na Naịjirịa na-enweghị mmachi ọbụla.
Muyiwa Adejobi, bụ ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị uweojii, ndị ọ bụ ọrụ ha ijide ndị na-ere naịra, azaghị oku nakwa ozi anyi zigaara ya ka o tinye ọnụ n’okwu a.
Ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ na-ebokwa ebubo na ihe mere naịra ọhụrụ a ji akọ ụkọ bụ na ndị ide ego na-ebukọrọ ya na-edebe.
Mana ndi ntaakuko agaghị ekwunwu ugbua na nke a bụ ihe na-eme eme.
Ọtụtụ na-ekwukwa na ndị ekperima ewepụtala adịgboroja akwụkwọ naịra ọhụrụ a, nke mere na ndị mmadụ amakwaghị nke bụ nke ezigbo na nke bụ nke adigboroja.

“Ndị ụlọakụ ga na-enye ndị mmadụ ego ọhụrụ dịka ha si enweta ya n’aka CBN.
“O nwereike ịbụ eziokwu na ụfọdụ ndị na-arụ n’ụlọakụ nwereike ijichi ụfọdụ ego ọhụrụ ndị a iji nye ya ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị maọbụ resi ya ndị na-ere ego, mana ọ bụ ọrụ dịịrị ndị ọrụ nchekwa inyochapụta nke a, kwụsị ya, ma nye ndị aka ha dị na ya ntaramahụhụ kwesịrị ekwesị.” Ihe CBN kwuru CBN kwuru na a ga na-eri ego naịra ochie ruo abali iri ato na otu nke ọnwa Jenụwarị 2023.
Ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị CBN bụ Isaac Okoroafor azaghị oku ekwentị ndi ntaakuko kpọrọ ya ugboro ugboro.
Mana ozi dị n’akara Twitter CBN kwuru na a ga na-eri ego ochie ruo ụbọchị ikpeazụ nke ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2023..

Kingsley Uyammadu ekwuola na ọ bụrụ na a họpụta ya n’ọkwa ọchịchị dịka onye omebe iwu, isi ihe ọ ga-elekwasị anya ga-abụ ịmepụta gburugburu dị mma iji kwalite azụmahịa na mmepụta ihe.
O kwuru nke a oge ọ na-agwa ndị otu Nigerian Union of Journalists (NUJ) okwu n’ọgbakọ kwa ọnwa ha nwere n’ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Godwin Ezeemo International Press Centre dị n’Awka Uyammadu kwuru na kamgbe afọ 1999, ọchịchị ime obodo Awka North ewepụtala naanị otu onye ụlọ omebe iwu.
O kwuru na ya sonyeere ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ka ọ gbanwee akụkọ ahụ ma ugbu a bụ oge Chineke.
“Ihe mbụ m ga-eme dị ka onye omebe iwu bụ ime ka gọọmentị dozie ikike ọrụ ugbo n’Awka North.
“Ọ dịghị ihe ga-akwalite akụ na ụba karịa mmepụta ihe, ma nsogbu bụ na anyị enweghị gburugburu na-enyere aka.
Anyị enweghị akụrụngwa dịka ọkụ eletrik na ezigbo okporo ụzọ,” o kọwara.
Ndị Ndu Zuru Ezu “Anyị nwere ọtụtụ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị mana ole na ole bụ ndị ndu.
Ọtụtụ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị enweghị ezi ebumnuche.
Anyị chọrọ ndị ndu zuru ezu bụ ndị nwere ike ichepụta ezi echiche.
Anyị enwebeghị ezigbo nnọchite anya na etiti.
“Dịka ndị nta akụkọ, olile anya obodo dị ụnụ n’aka.
Ogo gọọmenti nile bụ nke na-ezughị oke n’ọrụ ma ọbụ ndị mgbasa ozi nwere ike iweta olileanya n’ọnọdụ a.
Ụnụ nwere ikike itinye ndị ọrụ ahọpụtara na nlele.
Ụlọ ọrụ nta akụkọ bụ akọ na uche obodo ọ bụla.
Kwuo ya otu ị na-ahụ ya ma atụla egwu ikwu eziokwu n’ihi na nke ahụ bụ nanị ihe nwere ike ime ka obodo dị mma.
Ka anyị jikọọ aka napụta obodo a n’aka ndị ajọ omume,” ọ dụrụ ha ọdụ.
Ụlọ ọrụ ego mba ụwa (IFC) na Microsoft ejikọtala ọnụ iji kwado mgbanwe dijitalụ na mpaghara ọrụ ugbo nke Africa.
                                                           Na nnọkọ n’oge Adaptation na Agriculture Day na COP27 na Egypt, IFC na Microsoft site na Africa Transformation Office (ATO) gosipụtara mmekorita ha iji kwado mgbanwe dijitalụ na mpaghara ọrụ ugbo nke Africa iji kwado mmezu nke ebumnuche a.
                                                               IFC na Microsoft na nkwupụta nkwonkwo kwuru na mmekorita ahụ na-ebuga ngwaahịa ọrụ ugbo dijitalụ na-akwado azụmahịa agriculture nke Africa iji mee ka nchekwa nri sikwuo ike na ịzụlite nnukwu nkwụsi ike megide mgbanwe ihu igwe.
                                                                                            “Mmekọrịta a na-eme ka ngwaọrụ dijitalụ na akụrụngwa ọzụzụ nweta ohere maka ndị ọrụ ugbo obere na obere azụmaahịa metụtara ọrụ ugbo.
Site na mmekorita, ngwaọrụ dijitalụ dị ka Microsoft’s AgBot na Community Training ngwa jikọtara ya na IFC’s Agribusiness Leadership Programme iji nye ozi ka mma, teknụzụ ọhụrụ, na ọzụzụ ikike njikwa nye ndị ọrụ ugbo, ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị na-arụkọ ọrụ, “ka ha kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                         Onye isi IFC maka nrụpụta, Agribusiness na Ọrụ n’Africa, Henrik Elschner Pedersen, kwuru, sị: “Teknụzụ dijitalụ nwere ike imeziwanye ọrụ nke ụdọ ọkọnọ na usoro nri site n’ịkwalite mmepụta, ịkwalite omume azụmahịa, ịkwalite traceability na ịba ụba ịnweta ego.
                                                        Agbanyeghị, iji ngwaọrụ dijitalụ na mpaghara ọrụ ugbo Africa ka nwere oke, ọtụtụ mgbe n’ihi akụrụngwa, ikike, mmata na ihe gbasara iwu.
                 “IFC na Microsoft na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji gbanwee nke a, ya mere ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ ugbo n’Africa nwere ike itinye ike nke akụ na ụba dijitalụ,” ka o kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Onye isi nchịkwa maka Microsoft ATO, Kunle Awosika, kwuru na ihu igwe na-agbanwe agbanwe na-enye ndị ọrụ ugbo ohere ọhụrụ n’ọdịnihu n’ihe metụtara ahịa ndị na-apụta maka kredit carbon, ọrụ ugbo na-emegharị ahụ, na itinye ‘Ọrụ dabeere na okike’.
                                                                      Otú ọ dị, o kwuru na ohere ọhụrụ ndị a kwesịrị ịkwado site na njikwa siri ike na usoro mkpesa, na-agbakwụnye na ndị a bụ kpọmkwem usoro ndị a na-akwado site na ụlọ ọrụ ọhụrụ nke ngwaọrụ dijitalụ na-akwado Awosika..

Ụlọọrụ ‘Independent National Electoral Commission’ (Inec) ekwuola na ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na-egoro akwụkwọ ikike ịtụ vootu n’aka ndị mmadụ, n’ụzọ iji were ya mee nrụrụaka na ntuliaka 2023, na-egbu onwe ha oge.
Ọ bụ ọnụ na-ekwuru Inec bụ Festus Okoye kwuru nke a n’abalị ụbọchị Sọnde na mkparịtaụka ya na ndị Channels TV.
Okoye kwuru na igwe ọgbaraọhụrụ a kpọrọ ‘Biomodal Voter Registration System (BVAS) nke Inec ga-eji hazie ya bụ ntuliaka agaghị ekwe ka nrụrụaka ọbụla gaa n’ihu.
“Onweghị onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ọbụla ga-aghọgbunwu BVAS.
Ọ gaghị ekwe omume,” Festus Okoye kwuru.
“Onye ọbụla na-azụ PVC na-egbu onwe ya oge.
Naanị ihe ọ ga-emeli bụ na onye nwe PVC ahụ agaghịzi atụ vootu, mana onweghị onye ga-ejinwu PVC onye ọzọ wee tụọ vootu n’ụbọchị ntuliaka, maka na BVAS agaghị anabata mkpịsịaka onye ahụ.” Festus Okoye bụ onyeisi mgbasaozi n’ụlọọrụ InecImage caption: Festus Okoye bụ onyeisi mgbasaozi n’ụlọọrụ Inec Festus Okoye nyere nkọwa a dịka akụkọ na-ekwu na ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na-azụrụ PVC ndị mmadụ.
Otu abụọ welitere isi na Naịjirịa etiela mkpu maka nke a, ma kpọọ oku ka ndị ọrụ nchekwa jichie ndị na-eme ihe dị otu a.
Otu ndị a bụ ‘Northern Elders Forum’, na ‘Socio-Economic Rights and Accountability Project’.
Okoye kọwakwara na ọ bụ ihe megidere iwu mmadụ iji PVC onye ọzọ chọọ ịtụ vootu, onye dara iwu a nwereike ịga mkpọrọ maọbụ a daa ya nha.
O kwuru na Inec nwere BVAS ga-ezu maka ọgbọ ntuliaka 176,000 dịna Naịjirịa, ma nwekwaa ụfọdụ e dopuru iche ,aka adịghị ama ama.
“Anyị nwekwara ndị ọrụ nwere ọzụzụ maka ime ngwangwa mezie BVAS ọbụla nwere nsogbu n’ụbọchị ntuliaka,” Okoye kọwara..

                                                       Onye isi ala Buhari, bụ onye metụrụ aka na nku onye isi ala nke ọdụ ụgbọ elu Nnamdi Azikiwe International Airport nke dina Abuja natara onye minista na-ahụ maka isi obodo Ramatu Tijjani, onye Inspector General of Police, Usman Alkali na ndị isi nke ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa ndị ọzọ.
                    Onye ndu Naijiria apụọla na Washington DC ka ọ gaa nzụkọ a, nke gọọmentị US haziri maka ndị isi Africa.
                                                                            Na nzụkọ ahụ, onyeisiala mba Amerịka bụ Joe Biden kelere onyeisiala Buhari maka ime ka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Naịjirịa na Africa pụta.
Ọ gwakwara mba Afrịka ka ha na-eme ntuliaka n’afọ na-abịa, ka ha hụ na ha mere ntuliaka n’udo na nke doro anya.

Argentina ebulila iko mbaụwa 2022 dịka ha gbanyere goolu ikpeazụ ha site na pentarịtị.
France riri ụfọdụ penariti ha nke nyere Argentina ohere imere.
Mkpu na ọṅụ na-akpọtụ n’akụkụ ụwa niile dịka a na-efe ọkọlọ mba Argentina ebe niile.
Ụwa niile kpụ aha Messi n’ọnụ ugbua dịka o mere ihe dịka dike n’egwu ikpeazụ a.
Kylian Mbappé tara ahịhịa gbara ọkụ dịka mbuli iko mbaụwa 2022 mere ya ọ nọ nso eru aka.
Otu na-elekọta egwu bọọlụ ụwa bụ Fifa zipụtara ozi n’akara Twitter ha kwuo na nke a bụ ‘egwu ikpeazụ n’iko mbaụwa kacha ibe ya’.
Nke a na-abịa dịka otu a ejighi ọchị n’ihu gbaa ya bụ asọmpị.
France gosiri Argentina na ha abụghị mmanwụ a na-akwa aka n’egwu bọọlụ dịka Mbappe ji otu ọkpụ goolu chara acha manye Argentina aka n’anya nke mere tinyere ngụkọ goolu asọmpị a n’ọnọdụ goolu atọ, goolu at     Etinyela nkeji iri nke mgbanwunye n’elu oge egwuregwu ikpeazụ a dịka Messi gbanyere goolu nke abụọ ya nke tinyere otu bọọlụ Argentina n’ọkwa kacha elu ugbua.
Argentina agbanyela goolu atọ ebe France gbanyere abụọ.
Anya ụwa na-ele ịma onye ga-ebuli iko mbaụwa 2022 a ugbua.
N’elekere iri asato na otu nke egwu a chi ọkụ, France ji otu goolu ọzọ chara acha zaghachi mba Argentina.
Kylian Mbappé gbanyere penariti tinyere ha na mba France ndị jibu goolu abụọ malite igosi ha nkarị na nhata nha tupu Messi e mecha saa ya n’oge mgbanwụnye etinyere Lionel Messi na Anghhel Di Maria gbanyere mba Argentina otu goolu otu goolu ebe Kylian Mbappe kwụrụ ụdọ ma gbaa isi akwara gbanyere France goolu abụọ chara acha.
Mkpu na-akpọtụ n’ime ama egwuregwu Lusail nke mba Qatar dịka enyi abụọ na-asọkọta mpị ọnụ ebe ahụ.
N’egwu ikpeazụ nke asọmpị ikomba ụwa 2022 a, ndị egwu bọọlụ mba France nakwa nke ndị mba Argentina eforola ntutu taa ịhụ na ha abaghị aka laa.
Ajentịna na Fransị ga-ezute n’asọmpi ikpeazụ nke iko mbaụwa 2022 Asọmpi ikpeazụ nke iko mbaụwa, Qatar 2022, nke dị n’etiti mba France na Argentina, dịzị ka ọ dị n’etiti Kylian Mbappe na Lionel Messi.
Otu n’ime ha ka na-amalite ndụ amalite dịka ọgba bọolụ, onye nke ọzọ na-akwadozi ịla ezumike.
Otu ka a na-ele anya na ọ ga-abụ ọkaibe n’egwuregwu bọọlụ n’ọdịnihu, mana onye nke ọzọ ka ụfọdụ na-ekwu na ọ bụ ya kacha bụrụ ọkaibe kamgbe egwuregwu bọolụ malitere.
Otu ebuolarị iko mbaụwa nke mbụ ya, na-achọ nke abụọ, onye nke ọzọ na-arịọ chi ya ka aka ya metụ n’iko ọlaedo a, ọbụladị otu ugboro tupu ọ wụsa ọwa.
Mana n’elekere anọ nke ehihie taa bụ abali iri na asato nke onwa Disemba, ka ya bụ ekeremgba ga-amalite, onye ga-eturu ugo? Ajentịna ebubeghị iko mbaụwa kamgbe 1986 Oge ikpeazụ Ajentịna buliri iko mba ụwa bụ afọ iri atọ na isii gara aga; amụbeghị Lionel Messi oge ahụ.
Mana ugbua, anya mmadụ niile dị n’isi nwa amadị a dị afọ iri ato na ise ka o lụọ ọgụ ka dike ma nye mba ya mmeri.
Nke a bụ nke ugboro abụọ Messi na Ajentịna na-eru agba ikpeazụ nke iko mbaụwa, dịka ha rukwara ya n’afọ 2014 na mba Brazil, mana mba Jamani ji otu ọkpụ goolu merie ha.
N’asọmpi nke afọ a, Messi enyelarị goolu ise, ma sorokwa na ndị nwereike irite nturuugo onye kacha gbaa bọolụ, mana onye ọbụla ma na naanị nke ahụ agaghị eju ya afọ.
Emiliano Martinez bụ ochee bọọlụ ndị Ajentịna kwuru na obi ha siri ha ike.
“Ọtụtụ na-ekwu na ọ bụ Fransị ga-emeri, mana obi siri anyị ike n’ihi na anyị nwere ọkaibe n’ịgba bọọlụ n’ụwa niile,” Martinez kwuru.
