Pope Francis gbara afọ iri asatọ na isii n’ụbọchị Satọde,abali iri na asaa nke onwa Disemba afo 2013                                                                                Pope Francis gbara afọ iri asatọ na isii n’ụbọchị Satọde,abali iri na asaa nke onwa Disemba Onyeisi ụka Katọlik n’ụwa niile bụ Pope Francis ekwuola na ya dere akwụkwọ ịgba arụkwaghị m n’afọ 2013 ma binye ya aka, maka ikekwe ọ bụrụ na ahụike ya enyeghị ya ohere ịrọ ọrụ ya etu o kwesịrị dịka Pope.
Pope Francis kwupụtara nke a na mkparịtaụka ya na ndị ntaakụkọ bụ nke e bipụtara taa bụ Sọnde, dịka o mere ncheta ọmụmụ ya nke afọ iri asatọ na isii n’ụbọchị Satọde, Disemba 16, 2022.
O kwuru na onye o nyere akwụkwọ arụkwaghịm ahụ n’aka bụ Kadịnal Tarcisio Bertone, onye ji ọkwa odeakwụkwọ na Vatican n’oge ahụ.
Pope Francis ekwuola ugboro ugboro na ọ gaghị egbu oge ọbụla iritu n’ọkwa ‘Pope’ ma ọ bụrụ na ọnọdụ ahụike ya dị njọ ma gbochie ya ịrụ ọrụ ya dịka o kwesịrị.
“Edeela akwụkwọ arụkwaghịm, binye ya aka.
Tarcisio Bertone bụ odeakwụkwọ n’oge ahụ.
Enyere m ya akwụkwọ ahụ sị ya: ‘ọ bụrụ na ahụike maọbụ ihe ọbụla egbochie m ịrụ ọrụ m, lekwa akwụkwọ arụkwaghị m,” Pope Francis kwuru na mkparịtaụka ahụ.
“Amaghị m onye Kadịnal Bertone nyefere akwụkwọ ahụ, mana enyerem ya oge o ji ọkwa Odeakwụkwọ Obodo.” Pope Francis kwukwara na nke a bụ nke mbụ ọ na-ekwupụta ya bụ ihe.
Onye nọbụ n’ọkwa Pope bụ Benedict XVI, dị afọ 95 ugbua, bụ Pope mbụ n’ime ihe karịrị afọ narị isii, rituru n’ọkwa n’ihi na ahụ esichaghị ya ike, na 2013.
Tupu oge ahụ, onye ọbụla bụ Pope ga-ejigide ya bụ ọkwa ruo n’ọnwụ.
Pope Francis ka gbasiri ike ugbua, mana ọ na-enwe nsogbu ihe mgbu n’ikpere ya, nke na-eme ka ọ na-eji mkpọ maọbụ igwe ‘wheelchair’ wee na-akpagharị.
Kamgbe ọnwa Julaị afọ a, Pope Francis agaala njem nleta na mba Kanada, Kazakstan, na Bahrain, ọ na-elekwa anya ịga mba DR Congo nakwa Saụt Sudan n’ọnwa Jenụwarị na Febrụwarị afọ 2023..
Agbaala ndị Naijiria ume ka ha na ibe ha na-ebikọ ọnụ na ịdị n’otu n’agbanyeghị agbụrụ ma ọ bụ obodo ha.
Ọ bụ onye ji ọkọlọtọ APGA were zọọ ọkwa onyeisiala n’oge gara aga, Major General John Gbor (Rtd) kwuru nke a n’oge ngosi akwụkwọ ọhụrụ n’Abuja isi obodo Naijiria.
General Gbor na ngosipụta akwụkwọ aha ya bụ “Nigeria: A nation yearning for Moral Regeneration and unity” kpọkuru ndị ntorobịa Naijiria ka ha bute Naijiria ụzọ ma gbanarị esemokwu agbụrụ ma ọ bụ okpukpe dị iche iche.
Major General John Gbor lara ezumike nka bụ onye zọrọ ọkwa onyeisiala Naijiria n’afọ 2019 n’ọkọlọtọ paati APGA.
Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka nchụta ego n’ime Kogi steeti enwetala ego ruru ijeri naira iri na asatọ dịka ego nchụta n’ime ya bụ steeti nke a kpọrọ Internally Generated Revenue (IGR).
Steeti ahụ mere atụmatụ mmefu ego dị ijeri naira iri abụọ na atọ dịka ego a ga-enweta n’ime afọ a, mana ọ bụ naanị ijeri naira iri na asatọ ka ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka nchụta ego na steeti ahụ nwetara n’ihi ụkọ nnweta ego n’afọ a.
Onye nnọchite anya onye isi oche ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ego na steeti ahụ bụ Maazị Sule Salihu Enehe kwupụtara nke a n’ụbọchị Fraịde ka ọ na-ewepụta ozi ngwụcha afọ 2022 gbasara iji igwe electronics anakọ ụtụ site n’aka ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka nchụta ego na steeti ahụ.
Mazị Enehe, bụ onye nyere nkọwa gbasara usoro ịnakọta ụtụ, ihe ndị ọ rụpụtara na ihe ọhụrụ n’ịchịkọta ụtụ isi na steeti ahụ, nyere ọha na eze akwụkwọ ikike ọrụ iji kwalite ọrụ nlekọta ụtụ isi n’okpuru ọchịchị ya.
Onye isi oche ahụ kwuru na akwụkwọ ikike ọrụ ahụ na-enye ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ na ọha na eze ụkpụrụ ọrụ iji nweta nkwalite n’ọkwa ego iji nweta nrube isi n’ụtụ isi, na-agbakwunye na, “anyị na-anabata ihe ndị mmadụ chọrọ.” Onye isi nchịkwa ụtụ isi steeti ahụ kwupụtara na ndị ọrụ na-arụrụ aka bụ ndị ụlọ ọrụ ahụ chọpụtala ma gbaa ha akwụkwọ n’ụlọikpe maka akwụkwọ ikike Tax Clearance Certificates (TCC) adịgboroja ma gbakwụnye na TCC adịgboroja bụzi akikọ ochie na steeti ahụ.
Maazị Enehe, kwuru na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ewepụtala e-platform maka ịkwụ ụtụ isi niile nke bụ maka ọdịmma ndị ahịa na maka usoro nlekọta ụtụ isi dị ire.
Eguzobela ụlọ ikpe na-ahụ maka ụtụ isi nke e tinyegoro n’ọrụ izu ụka atọ gara aga site n’aka odeakwụkwọ gọọmenti steeti Kogi bụ Dọkịnta Folashade Ayoade n’aha Gọvanọ Yahaya Bello nke Kogi steeti.
Enehe depụtara ihe ndị ọ rụpụtara n’oge ọchịchị ya nke gụnyere:
Osote onyeisiala Yemi Osinbajo na nwunye ya bụ Dolapo ekelela Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari na mmemme ncheta ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya nke iri asatọ ya taa.
N’ime ozi obinyere aka n’onwe ya nke ọnụ na-ekwuchitere ya bụ Laolu Akande wepụtara, osote onyeisiala dere: “Obi ụtọ ncheta ụbọchị ọmụmụ nke iri asatọ”, Maazị Onyeisiala! “Ndụ gị pụrụ iche nke ijere obodo ozi na-enweghị ntụpọ dịka onye agha, onye Gọvanọ, Minista, Onye isi ndị agha na Onyeisiala ugboro abụọ na-egosi na ọ ga-ekwe omume ijere obodo na ndị mmadụ ozi n’eziokwu, na n’achọghị ọdịmma nke onwe” .
“Mụ na Dolly, na ezinụlọ anyị na-ekpere gị ekpere ogologo afọ, obi ụtọ na udo na ezi ahụ ike n’aha Jizọs.
Ụlọomeiwu Naịjirịa n’ụbọchị Wenezde kwadoro nhọpụta Oriakụ Aishah Ahmad na Edward Lametek Adamu dịka osote gọvanọ nke Central Bank of Nigeria, CBN maka oge nke abụọ n’ọchịchị.
                                                                                                                                                                                          Nkwenye nhọpụta ha sochiri nkwuputa nke kọmitii sineti na-ahụ maka ụlọ akụ, inshọransị na ụlọ ọrụ ego ndị ọzọ nke Sinetọ Uba Sani nọ n’isi ya.
A ga-echeta na mbụ a họpụtara Oriakụ Ahmad na Mazị Adamu dịka osote gọvanọ CBN na-ahụ maka Financial System Stability and Corporate Services Directorate n’otu n’otu na Maachị 2018.
                                                                                                                                                                                                        Dị ka akwụkwọ ozi nke President Buhari degara ndị sinetị, Aisha Ahmad dị ka osote Gọvanọ na-ahụ maka Financial System Stability, bụ onye na-eduzi mgbalị iji kwalite usoro ego nke ọma na Nigeria; otu n’ime ihe ndị bụ isi nke ụlọ akụ dịka akọwapụtara n’ime iwu CBN.
                                                           Na ọrụ a, Ahmad bụ onye so na Kọmitii Na-achị Isi na Kọmitii Gọvanọ na CBN na Onye isi oche nke Financial Institutions Training Center (FITC) – otu na-adịghị akwụ ụgwọ na-enye ọzụzụ, ndụmọdụ na ọrụ nyocha maka ngalaba ọrụ ego.
                                                                                                                      Ọrụ ụlọ akụ na itinye ego ya gbagoro ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ego gụnyere NAL Bank Plc, Zenith Bank Plc na Stanbic IBTC Bank Plc, na ndị ọzọ.
                          Ọzọkwa, Edward Adamu malitere ọrụ ya na Unified Public Service (UPS) na 1983 na Bauchi State Civil Service.
Ọ nọrọ afọ 35 na UPS, 25 n’ime ha nọrọ na Central Bank of Nigeria, CBN.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    N’ime afọ ọ nọ n’ụlọ akụ apex, e chiri ya na Gombe State Civil Service site na 2008 ruo 2010 dị ka onye enyemaka pụrụ iche na onye isi, njikwa ịzụ ahịa na ụlọ ọrụ ruru eru.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Ọ laghachiri na CBN n’afọ 2010 wee họpụta ya onye isi ngalaba na-ahụ maka njikwa atụmatụ n’afọ 2012, ka emechara usoro nhọpụta ya.
                         E mechara kpọga ya na ngalaba ọrụ mmadụ nke ụlọ akụ na afo 2016 dị ka onye isi, ọnọdụ ọ nọrọ ruo mgbe ọ lara ezumike nka na ọrụ ụlọ akụ na abali iri9 na ano nke onwa Febuwari afo 2018.
                                                                                                                                                                                                Oke mwepụ ego Ndị Sineti tụpụrụ oke ya n’azụ oke mwepu ego nke CBN nwere ụbọchị mmejuputa iwu nke edobere maka abali itolu nke onwa Jenụwarị , 2023.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Ndị omebe iwu kwuru na Central Bank of Nigeria kwesịrị imeziwanye oke nkwụghachi ụgwọ maka nzaghachi ọha na eze na amụma ahụ;                     “Na kọmitii ahụ kwesịrị ịnọgide na-amalite nlekọta siri ike nke Bank na ntinye aka ya na mgbanwe mgbanwe nke nkwụsị nkwụsị ma na-akọ akụkọ kwa oge na Senate;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       “Na ndị Sineti kwesịrị ịkwado ụlọ akụ ahụ n’ịga n’ihu na mmejuputa ego mgbanwe mgbanwe na atụmatụ ụlọ ọrụ ego n’ụzọ kwekọrọ n’iwu ya dị ka iwu CBN si dị.”.
Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ego, mmefu ego na atụmatụ mba Naịjirịa, Dr Oriakụ Zainab Ahmed, akọwaala amụma ịfụfụ dị ka otu n’ime ụzọ dị irè e si alụso omume rụrụ arụ ọgụ na mba ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                         Gọọmenti Naijiria webatara amụma igbu ọchụ n’ọgụ ọ na-ebuso nrụrụ aka na Disemba afo 2016.
                                                                                                  N’ikwu okwu site n’ozi ọma n’oge ọgbakọ Zonal Day Two na ‘Whistle Blower Policy in Nigeria for the South East’, nke e mere n’Awka  isi obodo Anambra Steeti, o kwuru na amụma a ga-ewusi ikike ndị Anti Graft Agencies ike ikpochapụ nrụrụ aka.
                                                                              Mgbe ọ na-akọwa isiokwu nke ogbako ahụ “Implementation of The Whistle Blower Policy In Nigeria: Challenges and Way Forward” dị ka ihe kwesịrị ekwesị, ọ kwughachiri na ọ dịghị ihe ga-egbochi gọọmenti imezu ọhụụ ya nke ịkwalite ịza ajụjụ, ntụkwasị obi ọha na eze na nghọta.
                                    Na mbụ, Gọvanọ steeti ahụ, Professir Charles Soludo, mgbe ọ na-ekwupụta na ogbako ahụ meghere, gbara ndị niile na-eme ihe ike ume ka ha nweta usoro iwu site n’ikpughe nrụrụ aka na ịnye ozi bara uru.
                                                                                                                                                               Gọvanọ nke onye isi ọrụ steeti ahụ nọchitere anya ya bụ Oriakụ Theodora Igwegbe kwenye ndị na-afụ ụfụ maka nchekwa gọọmentị zuru oke dịka amụma a ga-eme n’ụzọ zuru ezu na steeti ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                           O kwuru na eziokwu bụ isi, ma gbakwụnye na a ga-enyocharịrị ozi tupu ekpughere ọha..
Ndị omebe iwu Taraba steeti enyefela mmefu ego nke afọ 2023 karịa ijeri naira 173.
                                                                                                                        Nke a na-abịa n’ihe na-erughị izu abụọ ka Gọvanọ Taraba steeti bụ Darius Ishaku nyefere ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti ahụ atụmatụ mmefu ego nke afọ 2023.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Bọjetị ahụ nke gọvanọ kpọbatara na mbụ na N172, 734, 537,459.40, a chọpụtara na ọ bụ nde N500 jigoro.
                                                                                A hụrụ ụgwọ ahụ na Wednesde na-esote nnabata nke akụkọ nke Kọmitii Houselọ na-ahụ maka ego na ntinye ego n’oge plenary.
                                           N’ịza ajụjụ sitere n’aka ndị nta akụkọ n’oge na-adịghị anya ka akụkụ ahụ gasịrị, ọkà okwu, Joseph Albasu Kunini, kwuru na mmụba ahụ adịla mkpa iji na-aga n’ihu na State Independent Electoral Commission, SIEC.
                                                                                                                                                     Ọkà okwu ahụ kwuru na e jirila nde naira 500 mụbaa bajetị ahụ, chọpụtara na ọ dịghị ego ekenyela SIEC na bọjetị nke Gọvanọ steeti ahụ butere Ụlọ Nzukọ Alaeze na mbụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Ego agbakwunyere, dị ka ndị otu a tụrụ anya ya, ga-enyere ndị isi SIEC aka ime ntuli aka ime obodo n’ofe ọchịchị ime obodo iri na isii nke steeti ahụ.
N’ihe mere e jiri mee ngwa ngwa n’ibe n’ike n’ike n’akwụkwọ mmefu ego nke onye ntaakụkọ anyị chọpụtara na e wepụtara ya n’ụlọ ahụ n’izuụka abụọ gara aga, ebumnuche dịka onye isi okwu kwuru bụ ime ka gọọmentị nwee ike ịga n’ihu na ọrụ mmepe ya.
                                                                           N’ịkọwakwa yuletide na-abịanụ, nke a o kwuru na ọ dị mkpa iji mee ka ndị otu ahụ nwee ike ịmalite ezumike..
Na mkparịtaụka mgbasa ozi n’Awka, ụbọchị Wenezde, abalị nke iri na anọ ọnwa Disemba, onye nhazi otu kansụl achumnta vootu Atiku/Okowa na steeti Anambra, bụ Chiifu Obiora Okonkwo, kwupụtara usoro njem Atiku oge ọ ga-anọ n’isi obodo steeti ahụ.
“Na irute Awka n’elekere iri nke ụtụtụ Tọzdee, onye na-azọ onyeisiala na ndị otu ya ga-ezute Gọvanọ Chukwuma Soludo n’obi gọọmenti dị n’Awka.
Ngwa ngwa ka ya na Gọvanọ mechara, Atiku, ndị otu ya na ndị eze ọdịnala ga-enwe mkparịta ụka”, O kwuru.
Chiifu Okonkwo kwuru na onye ji ọkọlọtọ PDP azọ ọkwa onyeisiala ga-aga n’ihu gbaghee ụlọ achumnta vootu dị na Kwata Junction n’Awka.
Site n’ebe ahụ ọ gaba na Senator Uche Ekwunife Event Center maka ịhụ ndị nhazi nke paati ahụ.
Ọ gbakwụnyere na a ga-eji mmemme mmalite achumnta vootu onyeisiala n’Alex Ekwueme Square weta njem ahụ na njedebe .
Ndị Kọmitii achumnta vootu Atiku/Okowa na ndị otu paati ndị ọzọ n’ime steeti ahụ; Chiifu Dan Ulasi, Sinetọ Uche Ekwunife, na ndị ọzọ kwupụtara ihe ndị mere PDP ga-eji nweta mmeri n’Anambra steeti.
Ndị otu Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) dị njikere ịmalite achumnta vootu Atiku-Okowa na steeti Anambra maka ntuliaka izugbe afọ 2023.
“Mmalite achumnta vootu onyeisiala n’Awka n’ụbọchị Tọzdee ga-egosi na steeti Anambra abụrụla steeti PDP, ma na-agakwa n’ihu ime otu a,” Ka o kwuru.
Dịka onye nhazi achumnta vootu siri kwuo, “PDP bụ steeti Anambra, Anambra bụkwa PDP.
Otu paati a na-enweta mmeri na steeti Anambra na ntuliaka onyeisiala ọ bụla.
Ekwenyerem na nke afọ 2023 agaghị adị iche.
“PDP na-akwado ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ karịa mpaghara ndị ọzọ.
Nke a bụ n’ihi na pasentị iri itoolu na ise nke ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ nọ n’ọgbakọ omebe iwu mba ahụ nọ n’otu paati PDP, ọ dịkwa otu a kemgbe afọ 1999.” Ọ gara n’ihu kwuo na ọ ga-abụ ihe ize ndụ maka ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ ilepụ anya na PDP na ntuli aka izugbe 2023 n’ihi ihe ọ bụla,” o kwughachiri.
O jikwa ohere ahụ mee ka o doo anya na otu paati ahụ ewepụtala otu ga-ahụ maka ma dozie ọgbaghara na-aga n’ihu metụtara otu gọvanọ G-5 na otu paati ahụ, ma kwupụta nchekwube ya na a ga-ebinyụ ọgbaghara ahụ ngwa ngwa.
Ekwuwapụtala mmeghe akwa mmiri Niger nke abụọ ruo otu ọnwa maka mmemme oge Yuletide.
Mịnịsta Naijiria na-ahụ maka ọrụ, Maazị Babatunde Fashola, nyere iwu ka e meghee akwa mmiri ahụ site n’elekere iri na abụọ nke abalị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Disemba mgbe ọ nyochachara ihe enyemaka etinyere iji mee ka okporo ụzọ ahụ dị mma ụgbọ ala ịgba n’elu ya.
Ịdọ Aka Na Ntị Maka Ịgba Oke Ọsọ Fashola, bụ onye mere njem gburugburu akwa mmiri ahụ mgbe ọ na-enyocha ya, dụrụ ndị na-agba n’okporo ụzọ ọdụ ka ha jiri nwayọọ na-anya ụgbọ ala n’enweghị nsogbu ka ha wee ghara imebi ebumnobi e ji rụọ akwa ahụ.
Mịnịsta a mere ka ọ pụta ihe na ebumnobi Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari ji rụchapụ akwa mmiri ahụ bụ ịzọpụta ndụ na ibelata ụbịam na-esite na ịla ọtụtụ awa n’iyi n’ihi mkpọchi ụzọ a na-enwe n’akwa mmiri Niger mbụ.
O kwuru na mmeghe akwa mmiri Niger nke abụọ ga-ebelata nhụjuanya nke ndị na-anya ụgbọ ala bụ ndị na-enwekarị mkpọchi ụzọ n’oge Yuletide.
O kwuru na ọ ga-abụ ihe ịla n’iyi ma ọ bụrụ na ndị na-eme njem n’elu akwa mmiri a akpachapụghị anya ma dọtara onwe ha ihe ọjọọ na-enweghị isi.
“Mpụtara ya bụ ihe anyị na-ahụ mgbe ndị mmadụ na-ekwu banyere ụbịam; akụkụ kasị ukwuu na ya abụghị ubịam ego; kama ọ bụ ịda ogbenye multidimensional.
“Iji ụbọchị abụọ ma ọ bụ atọ na-agbalị ịgafe akwa mmiri bụ ịda ogbenye.
Nke a kwesịrị iwe naanị nkeji ole na ole ka ị nwee ike ịga mee ihe ndị ọzọ bara uru”.

Onye isi ala Naijiria, Muhammadu Buhari kwuru na ndị ntorobịa Naijiria bụ nkwa ha maka ọdịnihu dị mma na idozi nsogbu ha bụ ihe gọọmentị kacha mkpa.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             N’ikwu okwu na Washington DC ka ọ na-anabata onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Abu Dhabi Forum, Sheikh Al-Mahfoudh Bin Bayyah na osote ya, Pastor Bob Roberts nke US bụ ndị gara leta ya, President Buhari kwuru na ọrụ ntọala ahụ n’ịkwalite multi- Mkparịta ụka okwukwe dịịrị ụwa mkpa dịka ọ dị Naịjirịa.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 O kwuru banyere mkpa ọ dị ịzụlite ọgbọ nke ndị ntorobịa na-enweghị mgbagha okpukpe na ịkpọasị, na-agba ndị otu ahụ ume ka ha gaa n’ihu na-agba ndị na-eto eto bụ nkwa nke ọdịnihu.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                “Ọrụ gị dị ezigbo mkpa n’inyere aka, karịsịa ndị ntorobịa, ịghọta ibe ha na n’otu oge ahụ, na-anya isi maka ihe nketa ha.
                                                 Nnukwu atụmatụ a sitere n’aka gị ga-enyere ndị ọgbọ n’ọdịnihu aka ịhazi nke ọma na ibikọ ọnụ n’udo.
                                                                                    N’akụkụ anyị, anyị ga-aga n’ihu na-edozi nsogbu anyị, karịsịa ka ha na-emetụta ndị ntorobịa.
                                                                                                          Anyị buru ibu na nha na ọnụ ọgụgụ mmadụ, na-eche ọtụtụ ihe ịma aka ihu, mana n’ọtụtụ mpaghara, anyị na-agbalị.
                                                                N’ime afọ asaa na ọkara, emewo m ike m,” ka Onye isi ala kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                  Onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke Foundation kwuru na ha bịara ịgwa Onye isi ala, na ịkpọ ya òkù ka ọ bịanye aka n’akwụkwọ ozi ahụ, ihe nrite Abu Dhabi Foundation iji kwado ihe ndị pụtara ìhè ọ rụzuru n’ịkwalite udo na nchekwa.
                                                                                                                                  Ha kwuru na nkwekọrịta a dabara na ọrụ Foundation ahụ na-arụ n’ịlụso oke egwu okpukpe ọgụ na ịkwalite ịdị n’udo na mkparịta ụka n’etiti okpukperechi niile..

N’asọmpi na-awụ akpata oyi n’ahụ n’ọgbọ egwuregwu Lusail, Lionel Messi nke Argentina na Julian Alvarez jikọtara ọnụ na-egbu egbu ka ha rutere n’ikpeazụ nke Iko Mbaụwa nke isii na mmeri ha meriri Croatia.
                                                                                                                                                       Messi enwetala ohere ikpeazụ iji nweta mpempe ọla ọcha nke gbanahụrụ ya n’ọrụ ya nwere iko mana onye ọkpọ Manchester City dị afọ iri abụọ na abụọ Alvarez kwuru na opekata mpe nha nha nke ụgwọ kacha elu ka Argentina hụ na ha ga-alọghachi ebe a na Sọnde.
ihu ma France ma ọ bụ Morocco.  Messi dị ka ọ na-alụ ọgụ maka nsogbu ọkpụ ụkwụ n’isi n’isi mana ọ gbakere nke ọma iji mebie nkwụsị ahụ site na penariti ka nkeji iri atọ na anọ na-eso goolu Croatia Dominik Livakovic mejọrọ Alvarez.
                                                                                                                                                                                 Alvarez gbagoro ụzọ Argentina okpukpu abụọ ka nkeji ise gachara mgbe o were isi Messi dị n’ime mpaghara Croatia wee malite ịgba ọsọ, na-enyere aka site n’ịgbapụ Josip Juranovic na Borna Sosa, tupu ọ merie Livakovic.

Ndị ụlọ omeiwu mba Saụt Afrịka nọ n’ọgbakọ ha pụrụiche taa bụ Tuzde tụọ vootu ma jụ usoro mmalite nchụpụ onyeisiala Cyril Ramaphosa na ọkwa onye.
E boro Ramaphosa ebubo ikpuchi izufu nnukwu ego e chee na e zuru ezu gaa mba ofesi site n’ụlọọrụ ugbo ya n’afọ 2020.
Cheta na a hụrụ ụfọdụ nnukwu ago a ebee zoro ya n’ime akụkụ oche.
Nrụrịtaụka a e mere na-abalị dịka ntuliaka ọkwa onyeisiala mba a na-abịa nso dịka ndị ụlọomeiwu a tinyere anya n’akwụkwọ mpụtara nnyocha n’okwu nke na-ekwu na Ramaphosa nwereike ịda iwu.
Ramaphosa, onye na-akwado ịzọ ọkwa ọzọ dịka n’aha pati African National Congress (ANC), na-ekwu na ọ nweghị ihe ọjọọ ọbụla o mere.
Pati ANC gwara ndị omeiwu otu pati ha ka ha gbochie usoro nchụpụ a – n’agbanyeghị na ndị otu ha ole na ole enweghị kwadoo a nke a ma na-akwado ka a nabata ihe a akwụkwọ nnyocha ahụ kwuru nke ghara ịbụ mmalite nchụpụ Ramaphosa n’ọkwa oche ya.
Ugbua Ramaphosa lanarịrị nchụpụ n’ọkwa a, a na-eche na ọ nwereike inweta mmeri na ntuliaka ọzọ dịkaANC ga-eme ntuliaka ime ụlọ n’ụbọchị Fraịde.
Nke a mee, ọ ga-aga n’ịhụ ịbụ onye ga-azọrọ pati ahụ ọkwa onyeisiala na ntuliaka na-abịa n’afọ 2024.
Ndị uweojii na Benue Steeti akọwaala ihe gbasara akwụkwọ ego naịra merela ochie nke a hụrụ n’ogige ndị ndị uweojii dị na mpaghara Wadata na steeti ahụ, bụ nke onyonyo ya na-efegharị na soshal midia ugbua.
Ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị uweojii Benue Steeti bụ Sewuese Catherine kọwara na ọ bụ n’ụbọchị Tuzde, abalị iri na atọ nke ọnwa Disemba ka ha nwetara ozi ahụ ma ziga ndị nnyocha ha ịga mata ebe akwụkwọ ego naịra ochie ndị ahụ si.
“Ndị nnyocha anyị chọpụtara na ọ bụ n’otu ụlọahịa dị n’ogige ‘barracks’ Wadata ka a hụrụ ego ochie ndị ahụ juru n’ọtụtụ akpa.
“Oge anyị kpọrọ onye nwe ụlọahịa ahụ bụ Isah Solomon ka ọ bị zara ọnụ ya, o kwuru na o nwere ikike site n’aka ụlọakụ etiti inyere ha aka jikwaa ego ndị merela ochie.
“Nwoke ahụ gosikwara anyị akwụkwọ ikike (license) nke ụlọakụ etiti nyere ya, ma kọwaa na akwụkwọ ego ndị ahụ merela ochie ma mebie so n’akụrụngwa nke ha na-emegharị iji nweta ọgwụ e ji achụ anwụnta,” Sewuese Catherine kọwara.
Ọ gara n’ihu kwuo na ha ezigarala ndị ụlọakụ etiti ajụjụ iji mata n’ezie ma ihe Isah Suleiman kwuru ọ bụ eziokwu.
Onyonyo a na-efegharị ugbua abụghị nke mbụ ndị mmadụ na-egosi ego naịra mebirila emebi nke a na-achọ ịga kwọrịe.
Ndị mmadụ na-ekwu na ọ bụ ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị zoro ego ndị ahụ ma gbachi nkịtị ka ha mebie kama ha ga-eji ya enyere ndị nọ na mkpa aka.
N’ọdị nso a, onyonyo fesakwara nke gosiri ebe otu nwoke na-asụ asụsụ hausa na-ekwu na ya nụrụ ọtụtụ ego naịra rere ure nke jupụtara n’ime otu nnukwu ụgbọala ‘trailer’ nke a na-aga ịkwọri akwọri.
Kedu etu e si emebi akwụkwọ naịra merela ochie? N’ọnwa Febrụwarị afọ 2020, ụlọakụ etiti kwuru na ha ga-akwụsị ịgba ego ochie mebirila emebi ọkụ, kama ha ga-achọ ụzọ ọzọ sayensị kwadoro iji jiri ego ochie ndị ahụ mepụta ihe ọzọ, nke bekee na-akpọ ‘recycling’.
Ha kwuru na ego ochie karịrị otu narị tonne ka ha mebiri site n’imunye ha ọkụ, mana ugbua, ha ga-akpọ oku ka ụlọọrụ ndị nwereike iji ihe ochie rụpụta ihe ọhụrụ bịa tinye akwụkwọ iji nweta ikike ị na-emegharị akwụkwọ ego naịra merela ochie.
“Anyị achọpụtala na ‘recycling’ bụ ụzọ kacha mma iji wepụ akwụkwọ ego ndị merela ochie, karịa ịkpọ ha ọkụ.
Maka na ịkpọ ego ọkụ na-ewulite mmebi ihu eligwe, mana iji ego ochie ndị a emepụta ihe ọzọ ga-aka mma maka okirikiri anyị, bịakwa nye aka na mwulite ọnọdụ akụnụba obodo anyị,” CBN kwuru..
Otu ụlọikpe ukwu dị n’Ilorin, Kwara Steeti, amaala mmadụ atọ ikpe ọnwụ dịka e kpebiri na ha wakporo nwata akwụkwọ aha ya bụ Blessing Omowumi n’ike ma mechaa gbuo ya.
Ọkaikpe Yusuf Adebayo nyere mkpebi a n’ụbọchị Tuzde n’ebubo e boro ụmụ okorobịa asatọ maka izu ohi, ịwakpo nwaanyị n’ike nakwa igbu mmadụ.
Ndị a mara ikpe ọnwụ bụ Abdulazeez Ismail, Ajala Oluwatimileyin na Oyeyemi Omogbolahan, dịka ọkaikpe Adebayo kwuru na a ga-eji ụdọ kwụgbuo ha.
Ụlọikpe ahụ tọhapụrụ mmadụ atọ n’ime ndị e boro ebubo ahụ, ha bụ Abdullateef Abdulrahman, Daudu Bashir Aderayo na Akande Taiye Oladoja, ma kwuo na aka ha dị ọcha.
Mmadụ abụọ ndị ọzọ ka a tụrụ mkpọrọ afọ atọ maka izu ohi.
Ụmụ okorobịa niile ndị e boro ebubo a bụchakwa ụmụ akwụkwọ na Mahdau Ilorin.
Gọvanọ Kwara Steeti bụ Abdulrahman Abdulrazaq kwuru sị: “Ụdị omume ọjọọ a abụghị ihe anyị ga-anabata n’obodo anyị.
Anyị niile kwesịrị ijikọ aka ọnụ ma buso agwa ọjọọ dị otu a agha.” Etu mwakpo ahụ si mee Ndị uweojii kwuru na ọ bụ nwanne nwaanyị Blessing Omowumi hụrụ ozu nwanne ya n’ime ụlọ ha oge ọ si ọrụ lọta n’ụbọchị ahụ, ọ hụkwara na e kechiri ya aka.
Ihe a mere n’ụbọchị abụọ nke ọnwa June afọ 2021.
Ndị ekperima ahụ hapụkwara otu akwụkwọ ozi n’ebe ha nọrọ gbuo nwa agbọghọ ahụ nke e dere “Unilorin anaghị agbaghara”.
Otu n’ime ndị ezinụlkọ nwa agbọghọ ahụ e gburu aha ya bụ Omolara Kuteyi, gwara ndị ntaakụkọ na ọ tụrụ ha n’anya maka na ụfọdụ ndị so gbuo nwa ha nwaanyị bụcha ndị ha ma nke ọma.
“Oge a kpọbatara ha n’ụlọikpe, anyị amaghị na ọ bụ ha mere ihe ahụ.
Atọ n’ime ha bụ ndị anyị na ha bi n’otu okirikiri.
Ụfọdụ n’ime ha bụkwa ụmụ akwụkwọ na mahadum ahụ,” Kuteyi kwuru.
Ọ kọwara na ọ bụ site n’ekwentị nwaagbọghọ ahụ e gburu egbu ka ndị uweojii si nwụchie ndị kpara arụ ahụ.
“Ha weere ekwentị ya resi onye ọzọ, ọ bụ site n’ekwentị ahụ ka ndị uweojii si chọta ha,” ka o kwuru..
Otu narị mmadụ na-eche nche n’ofe ogige dị iche iche na Naịjirịa enwetala ngwa mmalite n’aka gọọmentị etiti.
Kọmishọna Federal, National Commission for Refugees Migrants and Internal Displaced, Imaan Suleiman-Ibrahim bụ onye kesara ngwa Start up kwuru na ya bụ nzọụkwụ iji hụ na ịdabere na onwe ya maka ndị mmadụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                       Ndị nwere nchegbu gụnyere ndị gbara ọsọ ndụ, ndị na-achọ ebe mgbaba, ndị lọta, ndị na-enweghị obodo, ndị chụpụrụ n’obodo (IDP) na ndị mbata.
Dị ka ya si kwuo, ndị erite uru enwetala mmemme ọzụzụ ọzụzụ nka n’akụkụ dị iche iche nke mmasị iji nyere aka n’ịgbasa ọnọdụ ndị mmadụ na-eche echiche.
“…Maka ọzụzụ a, a zụrụ mmadụ out nari n’ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ azụmaahịa iri dị iche iche.
                                                                                       Ị nwere ike ịhụ na ha niile nwere obi ụtọ, ọ bụghị nanị na a na-azụ ha, ma a kwadoro ha.
                                                                                                        N’ime ha bụ ndị na-ese foto nwere ikike, ha agabigala NABTEB, enwere ndị ọkachamara tye & dye agbaziri agbaziri, enwere ndị na-esepụta ejiji.
Ya mere, a na-akwado ha n’ubi a zụrụ ha, “ka o kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                   “Ihe anyị na-achọ bụ nkwado, ọ bụghị naanị ngwọta na-adịgide adịgide.
Ya mere, Gọọmenti Etiti na-agba mbọ n’ụdị kachasị elu nke ngwọta na-adịgide adịgide maka ndị niile nwere nchegbu.
“                                                                                                                                        “Ọtụtụ n’ime ọzụzụ anyị dabara adaba, anyị na-achọ mmasị, anyị na-achọ nkà na nkà okike na mgbe ụfọdụ okwu ọnụ, ọzụzụ ndị a abụghị ihe nzuzo na-atụfu ha, ya mere ndị nwere mmasị ga-ekwupụta mmasị.
                                                                                                                                                                         Anyị nwere nchekwa data anyị nke na-egosikwa onye chọrọ ime ihe, “Suleiman-Ibrahim kọwara Na atụmatụ gọọmentị ịpụ n’ogige IDP n’ofe mba ahụ, o kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Isi ọrụ nke Agencylọ Ọrụ ahụ bụ inye ndị mmadụ nsogbu na-adịgide adịgide, anyị na-agba mbọ wulite nkwụsi ike ha, usoro nnabata ka ha wee nwee ike ịkpata, kwalite akụ na ụba obodo a ma nwee ike ịlaghachi azụ.
” O kwuru na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ewepụtala ọtụtụ ihe enyemaka nke chọrọ nkwado..
Atiku Abubakar, bụbu osote onyeisiala Naịjirịa, ekwuola etu ọ ga-esi kwụsị ndị mmadụ na mpaghara Naịjirịa dị icheiche na-achọ nnwereonwe, nke gụnyere ndị otu ‘Indigenous People of Biafra’ (Ipob).
O kwuru nke a na mkparịtaụka pụrụ iche nke ụlọntaakụkọ Channels TV hibere maka ndị na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala Naịjirịa na ntuliaka 2023.
Atiku kwuru na ya kwenyere na ihe ndị bi na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ Naịjirịa chọrọ bụ inwe ohere iji ihe dị na be ha na-ewulite mpaghara ha n’ụzo o kwere ha.
“O doro m anya na ihe ndị IPOB na-achọ bụ Biafra, mana ọ bụ ihe kwere omume inweta Biafra taa? Kedụ ụzọ a ga-esi nweta ya? Ọ bụ site na mkparịtaụka ka ọ bụ site n’ịlụ agha ọzọ? Anyị a ga-emenwu ịlụ agha ọzọ?” Atiku jụrụ.
“Ekwenyere m na anyị ga-enwe ike ịkpọ ndị a na-azọ nnwereonwe na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ oku maka mkparịtaụka.
Anyị kwenyere na ihe ha chọrọ abụghị ịpụ na Naịjirịa kpamkpam kama ọ bụ inwetụ ohere ime ihe n’onwe ha.
“Ọ bụ ya mere anyị ji ekwu na anyị ga-ahazigharị usoro ọchịchị Naịjirịa, site n’inyekwu mpaghara dị icheiche ike nakwa nlekọta akụ ọnatarachi ha.
“Iji maa atụ, e nwere mpaghara ‘Eastern Nigeria’ n’ọchịchị Rịpọblik nke mbụ.
Ha jikwa aka ha were ihe ọnatarachi ha nwere na-ewetara onwe ha mmepe etu ike si kwe ha.
“Etu m si hụta ya, ndọrọndọrọ nnwereonwe niile a bụ maka na ndị mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ na-ahụta na a na-agụpụ ha agụpụ n’usoro e si enye ike ọchịchị na Naịjirịa, ebe anyị na-ekwu na anyị nọ n’ọchịchị inye kwuo uche ya.
“Onweghị mpaghara ọbụla na Naịjirịa ga-emeri ike ọchịchị ma ọ bụrụ na ha agafeghi akwa mmiri Niger, maọbụ kwee ka ha na mpaghara ndị ọzọ jikọọ aka.
“Otu a ka anyị kwesịrị isi na-eche echiche: Olee ụzọ anyị na mpaghara ndị ọzọ ga-esi jikọọ aka iji nweta ike ọchịchị anyị na-achọ maọbụ iji chọta ihe ndị anyị na-achọ? “Otu a ka m che ndọrọndọrọ kwesịrị isi dị, ọ kachasị dịka o si metụta Ipob.” N’okwu nke ya, Gọvanọ Delta Steeti bụ Ifeanyi Okowa, onye na-azọ ọchịchị dịka osote Atiku, kwuru na e lee anya etu ihe dị ugbua, a ga-ahụ n’ezie na ọ dị ka a na-akpachapụ ndị si mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ n’akụkụ.
“I lee anya na nhazi ndị isi ọrụ nchekwa Naịjirịa ugbua, ị gaghị ahụ ọtụtụ ndị Ọwụwa Anyanwụ ebe ahụ.
Ya mere ha ji ahụta onwe ha dịka ndị a gụpụrụ agụpụ na Naịjirịa,” Okowa kwuru.
“Mana nke a abụghị ụdị gọọmentị Atiku ga-ahazi ma ọ bụrụ na o merie ọchịchị.
Ọ ga-agụnye onye ọbụla nakwa mpaghara ọbụla na Naịjirịa iji mee ka onye ọbụla na-ahụta onwe ya dịka otu mba.”.
Bola Ahmed Tinubu, onye ji ọkọlọtọ ndị ‘All Progressives Congress’ (APC) azọ ọkwa Onyeisiala Naịjirịa ekwuola na ya ga-eweta nsogbu mwakpo ndị ekperima ‘bandits’ n’isi njedebe na Kaduna Steeti, ma ọ bụrụ na ya merie na ntuliaka 2023.
Tinubu kwere nkwa a oge ọ gara n’obieze Emir nke Birnin Gwari bụ Mallam Zubairu Maigwari, dịka ụgbọ achụmnta vootu ndị APC garuru na Kaduna n’ụbọchị Mọnde.
Birnin Gwari bụ mpaghara Kaduna steeti ebe ndị badit wakporola aghara aghara n’afọ a.
Tinubu gwara Emir ahụ sị: “Akwụ m n’ihu gi iji kwe gị nkwa na ohere ọma na-abịa.
Nkwa anyị na-ekwe bụ na anyị agaghị ezu ike ruo mgbe anyị kpochapụrụ nsogbu ndị ‘bandit’.

Zubairu Maigwari, bụ Emir Birnin Gwari, kelere Tinubu maka ịbụ onye mbụ na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala nke katara obi bịa ileta ha na mpaghara ahụ iji kasie ha obi.
I ji kelee ya nke ọma, Maigwari chiri Tinubu echichi ma kpọọ ya ‘Dakare nke Birnin Gwari’, ma chikwaa gọvanọ Kaduna Steeti bụ Nasir El-Rufai echichi ‘Sadaukin Birnin Gwari’.
Ụlọọrụ na-ahazị ntuliaka na Naịjirịa bụ ‘The Independent National Electoral Commission (Inec)’ zipụtara ozi na ha ga-amalite inye ndị debanyere aha inweta akwụkwụ ikike ịtụ vootu nke a ana-akpọ Permanent voters card (PCV) taa bụ Mọnde, ụbọchị 12 nke ọnwa Disemba.
Inec kwụsịrị ndebanye aha n’abali iri ato na otu nke ọnwa Julaị, 2022 iji hazie ma bịpụta akwụkwọ ikike ndị a.

Otu onye bịara ị nara akwụkwọ PVC bụ Obioma Onyeaghala gwara onye ntaakụkọ anyị na o werughị ya nkeji iri ịnata ya.
O jikwa ohere ahụ kpoku ndị mmadụ ha ga were nke ha.
Gladys Chukwu bụ onye nwetakwara nke ya negbughị oge kwukwara na ọ dị mfe inweta ya ma gwa onye ntaakụkọ anyị na ya ejikerela maka ntuliaka na-abịa.
Anambra steeti: A kpọchiri ụlọọrụ Inec akpochi Igwe ndị mmadụ gbakọtara n’akụkụ Anambara dị iche iche dịka ha pụtara inweta akwụkwọ ikike ịtụ vootu ha.
Ndi ntaakuko gara n’ụlọọrụ Inec ndị dị n’Awka bụ isi obodo Anambra steeti.
N’okpuruọchịchị Njikoka, Awka South, Oyi nakwa Dunukofia, enweghị ndị ọrụ Inec a hụrụ dịka ebe niile tọgbọọ chakoo ma a gbachiri ụlọọrụ ahụ niile agbachi.
Ụfọdụ na-eche na e nwereike ịbụ na nke a mere maka iwu onye nọrọ n’ụlọ nke otu Indigenous People of Biafra (Ipob) tinyere bụrụ kwa ụbọchị Mọnde ma mechaa kagbuo ya.
Kemgbe afọ 2021 ya bụ iwu ka na-aga n’ihu n’akụkụ Ọwụwa Anyanwụ dị iche iche dịka ụfọdụ ndị otu ojiegbe amabeghị ndị ha bụ na-amanye ndị mmadụ ya bụ iwu.
Imo steeti: Ndị bu egbe kụsara ụlọọrụ Inec n’Owere Ọsọ tara n’ụlọọrụ Inec n’Owere bụ isi obodo Imo steeti n’ụtụtụ taa dịka ndị bu egbe wakporo isi ụlọọrụ Inec dị ebe ahụ.
Ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị uweojii steeti ahụ bụ Michael Abattam kwuru na ndị uweojii gburu mmadụ atọ n’ime ndị bịara mwakpo a ebe otu onye uweojii tụnyere ndụ ya dịka ha kwarịtara mgbọ.
Otu onye uweojii ọzọ merụkwara ahụ.
Abattam gara n’ihu kọwaa na ndị ekperima ahụ si n’ogige ebe a na-ere mmanụ ụgbọala iji tụbanye ogbunigwe ahụ n’ime ụlọọrụ ndị Inec.
           O kwuru na ọ bụ ụlọ abụọ nakwa otu ụgbọala dị n’ogige ụlọọrụ Inec ka ọkụ ahụ metụtara.
                                                                                            Ọ gara n’ihu kwuo na ha bụ ndị uweojii anaghị arahụ ụra gbasara ọnọdụ nchekwa n’Imo steeti iji hụ na ntuliaka 2023 ga-agarịrị n’ihu dịka e si hibe ya.
                                                                                                          Cheta na ndị ojiegbe wakporo ndị ọrụ Inec ma gbuo otu onye ọrụ Inec n’okpuruọchịchị Ihitte Uboma n’Ọnwa Eprel, 2022 mgbe a na-eme ndebanye aha maka inweta ikike ịtụ vootu.
                                                  E chere na ndị mere mwakpo a bụ ndị na-amanye ndị mmadụ iwu onye nọrọ n’ụlọ dịka ndị mmadụ ụjọ gbaa ọsọ ebe ahụ.
Ebonyi steeti: Ndịọrụ Inec apụtaghị Isi ụlọọrụ Inec n’Abakalili, Ebonyi steeti tọgbọ chakoo dịka enweghị onye ọrụ Inec ọbụla a hụrụ ebe ahụ.
E nweghịkwanụ ndị a hụrụ bịara inweta akwụkwọ ịtụ vootu ha mana ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ nchekwa wụjuru n’akụkụ ogige ụlọọrụ Inec niile ebe ahụ.
Cheta na ndị ojiegbe amabeghị ndị ha bụ wakporo akụkụ Ebonyi steeti dị iche iche n’ụtụtụ taa bụ Mọnde.
Akụkọ kwuru na ndị ojiegbe ahụ mụnyere akụkụ ahịa Ishieke ọkụ ma gbakwa otu ụgbọala ọkụ n’ahịa New Market dị nso okporoụzọ si Abakaliki gawa Enugu.
Onye ntaakụkọ BBC Igbo ji anya ya hụ etu ebe niile siri tọgbọ chakoo dịka ndị mmadụ ji ụjọ gbabasia be ha.
Kọmịshọna mgbasaozi na steeti ahụ bụ Uchenna Orji kwuru na enweghi onye maọbụ akụnụba onye ọbụla ya bụ mwakpo metụtara dịka ọ gbarụrụ ihu nye iwu nọrọ n’ụlọ ahụ.
O gwara ndị mmadụ ka ha gawa mkpa ha ma ghara ịnọ n’ụlọ taa bụ Mọnde.
Ndị bi na Keffi Local Government Area na Nasarawa State, North Central Nigeria etoola gọọmentị etiti maka ọsọ na ịdị mma nke okporo ụzọ Keffi-Lafia nke na-aga ugbu a ma na-atụ anya na a ga-arụcha ya na mbido 2023.
                                                                                                                                        N’ajụjụ ọnụ ya na ndị nta akụkọ nwere, ha kwuru na ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ okporo ụzọ, China Harbor Engineering Company (CHEC) abụghị nanị na ọ na-arụ ọrụ dị mma kamakwa ọ na-anabata ọrụ mmekọrịta ya na ndị mmadụ.
                                                                                                                                        Ọzọkwa ndị mmadụ toro mbọ nke mịnịstrị na-ahụ maka ọrụ, nke onye minista bụ Babatunde Fashola na-edu, maka itinye aka ya n’imepụta ọrụ okporo ụzọ ahụ bụ nke bara ndị obodo steeti ahụ n’ihe gbasara uto akụ na ụba na mmepe.
                                                                                                                      Onye ndu akpọrọ na Keffi, Mohammed Agwai, toro ụlọ ọrụ CHEC maka ịrụ ọrụ ya nke ọma na-akpọku ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-ewu ụlọ ka ha ṅomie otu ahụ n’ebe dị iche iche ha na-arụ ọrụ na Naijiria.
                                                                                                                                                                                                “Anyị nwekwara ozi maka Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ọrụ bụ Babatunde Fashola.
Anyị maara na a ga-arụcha ọrụ a ma nyefee ndị mmadụ.
Anyị na-ebugara gọọmentị ekele anyị niile maka otu o siri mee ka ndụ anyị dịkwuo mma, “o kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Onye isi ọzọ na Keffi bụ Alhaji Sefiu Rafiu, onye nwekwara ekele maka gọọmentị kwuru na kemgbe ọchịchị dị ugbu a malitere ịrụ ụzọ ahụ, ndị obodo ahụ enwetala uru n’otu ụzọ ma ọ bụ ọzọ n’ihi na ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ were ụfọdụ n’ime ha n’ọrụ.
                                                                                                    “Okporo ụzọ a abụwo ihe na-adịghị mma kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ.
Anyị nwere ọtụtụ nsogbu n’ụzọ a.
                                                                                                    Mkpọchi, okporo ụzọ, mgbe ụfọdụ okporo ụzọ na-adịru otu ụbọchị dum.
Mana obi dị anyị ụtọ ugbu a, ụzọ a na-aga ngwa ngwa, anyị nwekwara obi ụtọ na gọọmentị na ụlọ ọrụ na-ewu ụlọ.
Ha nwere ezigbo enyi Anyị na ha enwebeghị nsogbu”, ọ gbakwụnyere.
                                                                             Alhaji Rafiu kwusiri ike na ọ dị mkpa ka ụlọ ọrụ niile na-ewu ihe na Naijiria na-etinye aka na ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ na mpaghara ha dị iche iche, karịsịa n’akụkụ ọrụ.

Ọ na-asụ asụsụ dị iche iche nke gụnyere English, Swahili, Arabic, Igbo, Yoruba, Hausa, French na ndị ọzọ.
O nwekwara ike ikpasa mmadụ nkata ma rụọ ụfọdụ ọrụ dị iche iche nke gunyekwara itughari asụsụ.

“Onye ọkwọ ụgbọ ala ahụ na nkwupụta ya, kwuru na ekwere ya nkwa ihe karịrị otu nde naira mana e nyere ya otu puku naịra dịka ugwo mbụ” DSC Abdullahi kwuru.
Onye isi izugbe ndị ọrụ nchekwa ahụ, Dọkịta Ahmed Audi enyela ndị isi steeti niile iwu ka ha mesoo onye ma ọbụ ndị ọ bụla ejidere na-emebi ngwongwo ọha na eze na mba ahụ..
Otu ndị nta akụkọ nke Naigjiria na nke mbụ ghọtara ma mee ememe akụkọ akụkọ mgbasa ozi, bụ ndị nyere aka n’ụzọ dị ukwuu na uto nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Akụkọ akụkọ mgbasa ozi ndị a na Naijiria bụ ndị a matara na mbipụta mbụ nke nnabata ihe ngosi mgbasa ozi kwa afọ nke emere na Lagos, South-West Naijiria.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               N’ikwu okwu na mmemme ahụ, Onye isi ala Nigeria Union of nta akụkọ, Maazị Chris Isiguzo toro akara ngosi mgbasa ozi ndị a maka ntinye aka ha na-enye maka uto nke nta akụkọ n’ime afọ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                    “Akara ngosi mgbasa ozi ndị a arụ ọrụ iji kwalite nnwere onwe mgbasa ozi, ịbụ isi ihe na-akpata ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya.”      Maazị Isiguzo kọwara nnabata otu otu ahụ dị ka ụzọ isi gbaa ndị nta akụkọ ndị ọzọ ume ka ha na-agbasi mbọ ike mgbe niile na ịkwado ụkpụrụ omume nke ọrụ ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Onye isi oche nke mmemme ahụ, onye bụbu aka na-achị steeti Ogun, bụ Chief Olusegun Osoba dụnyere ndị nta akụkọ ka ha malite ime onwe ha ọnụ ugbu a ka ha na-eme ememme ndị ọzọ.
Taa ga-abụ mmalite nke nnukwu ihe maka NUJ.
                                                                                                  Ka anyị nwee webụsaịtị maka ime ndị nta akụkọ Naịjirịa n’ihi na anyị kwesịrị ịkwụsị ndị na-esoghị n’ọrụ anyị dị oke mma, “Chief Osoba kwuru.
Ụfọdụ ndị ama ama na mmemme ahụ gụnyere onyeisi oche na onye mbipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Vanguard, Maazị Sam Amuka; Onye bụbu Gọvanọ Ogun State, Aremo Olusegun Osoba; Onye na-ebipụta akwụkwọ akụkọ Thisday, Prince Nduka Obaigbena; na onyeisi oche nke Daar Communications (AIT TV), Chief Raymond Dokpesi, onyeisi oche otu mgbasa ozi Channels, Mazị John Momoh tinyere ndị ọzọ ndị otu Nigerian Union of Journalists, NUJ, nyere ugwu na Legọs.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          N’ịzaghachi n’aha ndị nwetara onyinye NUJ, onyeisi oche nke Daar Communications (AIT TV), Chief Raymond Dokpesi kwuputara ekele ya nye ndị otu NUJ maka nkwanye ugwu e nyere ha dịka ọ na-enye ndị nta akụkọ Naijiria nsọpụrụ.
                                                                                                                 “Ndị nta akụkọ na Naijiria achụọla ihe n’àjà ma n’ọtụtụ ọnọdụ na-atụfu ndụ ha iji hụ na Naijiria na-aga n’ihu.
                                                                         “Ọ bụrụ na enwere ọrụ ọ bụla a na-akwụghị ụgwọ, ọ bụ ndị nta akụkọ mana ha na-aga n’ihu na-emeri n’agbanyeghị ihe niile.
                                               Ọrụ mgbasa ozi atawo oke ahụhụ.
Ọ nwetaghị nlebara anya kwesịrị ekwesị site n’aka ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, mana ọ bụ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ịhụ na a ga-aza ajụjụ, ” o kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Na ntuliaka 2023 na-abịa, Chief Dokpesi gbara ndị Naijiria ume ka ha dịrị n’otu ma gbasie mbọ ike n’ịhọpụta onye ndu kacha mma maka obodo ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Ndị isi anyị emela ihe niile achọrọ ka obodo a dịrị n’otu.
Onye ọka ikpe Anambra steeti dị na ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria bụ Jọstis Onochie Anyachebelu akwadola ka e guzobe ụlọikpe dị elu maka ụmụaka, mmejọ mmekọahụ na nwoke na nwanyị ka e hiwere ụlọ ikpe pụrụiche maka ụmụaka, mmebi iwu metụtara mmekọahụ na nwoke na nwanyị.

                           Ụlọ ikpe ahụ họpụtara “Ụmụaka, Mmekọahụ na Mmekọahụ Na-adabere na ime ihe ike Court Holden” Awka bụ ụdị mbụ n’ime akụkọ ihe mere eme nke steeti ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Ụlọikpe dị elu ga-anwale nke ọma mpụ pụrụ iche nke na-emetụta ụmụaka ma ọ bụ ime ihe ike dabere na nwoke na nwanyị dị ka idina mmadụ n’ike, mmetọ ụmụaka, mpụ ime ihe ike dabere na nwoke na nwanyị na mmejọ ndị ọzọ metụtara ya.
                                                                                                Ebumnobi a bụ inye ọsọ ọsọ ịnụ ihe yana ịhụ na a na-enweta ikpe ziri ezi ngwa ngwa n’ụdị ikpe ahụ.
                                                                                       Onye ọka ikpe mbụ ya bụ Justice Peace Otti, nke nwere ụlọikpe ukwu ato dị ka onye isi oche ya.
                                                                                                   A kpụpụrụ ndị a na-enyo enyo n’ụlọ ikpe na ihe karịrị ikpe ise bụ ndị metụtara idina n’ike na mmetọ ụmụaka n’ụbọchị mbụ e kpere ikpe n’ụlọ ikpe.
       Emegharịrị ikpe ụfọdụ ka ọ bụrụ abali iri na ato nke onwa Jenụwarịafo, 2023 ebe onye a na-azara ọnụ kpọpụtara ya n’ụlọ ikpe na Amawbia Correctional Center.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Ka ọ dị ugbu a, n’ụlọ ikpe ụmụaka, mmekọ nwoke na nwoke na nwoke na nwanyị nke ụlọikpe majisteetị dị n’Awka, etinyela ihe karịrị ikpe iri abụọ na ise n’ụlọikpe ukwu..
Onye isi ndị ọrụ ụgbọ elu bụ Air Marshal Oladayo Amao, ekwuola na ịdị ebube Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari nyere ndị agha ikuku Naijiria (NAF) ohere ọhụrụ na nke ọgbara ọhụrụ iji mee ka ojiji ha na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma n’ọgbọ agha enyerela aka ruo n’ọkwa.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                          O kwuru nke a mgbe ọ na-eme njem nlegharị anya nke 205 Combat Search and Rescue Group, Kerang Plateau Steeti na 22 Quick Response Wing, Lafia na Nasarawa Steeti, North-Central Nigeri Dị ka CAS si kwuo, obi abụọ adịghị ya na ụfọdụ n’ime ikpo okwu ọhụrụ na NAF’s.
Order nke Agha, karịsịa JF-17 Thunder ugbo elu, A-29 Super Tucano ugbo elu na Unmanned Combat Aerial Vehicles (UAV) bụ otu n’ime ọtụtụ ihe mere, n’okwu ya, ‘Anyị na-emeri agha megide iyi ọha egwu na.

                         Ọ dọkwara aka na ntị na inwe afọ ojuju n’oge a ga-emebi ọrụ na-aga n’ihu ma kpọkuo ka e tinyekwuo uche, ịmụrụ anya na ịkpachara anya.
                     Onye Air Marshal Amao gwakwara ndị ọrụ ahụ na NAF na-atụ anya ịnyefe usoro ọhụrụ ọzọ nke Onye isi ala kwadoro maka NAF.
Igwe ikpo okwu ndị a gụnyere 2 CASA-295 ụgbọ elu ikuku, 2 Beechcraft King Air 360, 4 Diamond DA-62 ụgbọ elu onyunyo, 3 Wing Loong II UCAVs na 6 T-129 ATAK helikopta.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Nnweta ndị ọzọ na-aga n’ihu gụnyere 2 Agusta 109 Trekker helikopta multi-role, 12 AH-1Z ọgụ helikopta na 24 M-346 ụgbọ elu ọgụ iji kwalite ọrụ ike ikuku nke NAF na ike amụma yana ọzụzụ ọzụzụ ikuku.
                                                                                                                                                                             A na-atụ anya ịnyefe ole na ole n’ime usoro ikpo okwu ndị a na NAF tupu njedebe nke nkeji mbụ 2023.
                                                                                  Na nhoputa ndi ochichi nke na-abia, CAS kwuru na ka ha na-eji ikike nke iwu kwadoro ịtụ vootu maka onye ọ bụla masịrị ha, ha ga-akwụsịrịrị itinye aka n’ụdị ọ bụla nke ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
                                                                                                                                                                                                    Dị ka onye isi ụgbọ elu si kwuo, ‘Anyị aghaghị ịnọgide na-eguzosi ike n’ezi ihe na nnọpụiche anyị dị ka Ọrụ.
                                                                             “Ị ga-echetakwa na dị ka ndị na-elekọta iwu Naijiria, anyị aghaghị ịhụ na echiche ọha na eze banyere NAF na ndị agha nke Nigeria nọgidere na-adị mma na nke na-adịghị mma.”                                                                                                                                                      Ụfọdụ ndị isi alaka ụlọ ọrụ, Air Officer Commanding Special Operations Command, na ụfọdụ ndị nduzi so ya..
Onye isi ndị ọrụ obodo nke Federation Dr.
Folasade Yemi-Esan, CFR agbaala ndị ọrụ obodo ume ka ha na-achọ ọrụ ga-akwalite udo, ịdị n’otu na ndidi maka ibe ha maka ọdịmma Naijiria.
                                                                                                                                                                                                             O kwuru nke a n’isi ọrụ otu ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị etiti e wuru ọhụrụ, bụ nke akpọrọ aha ya na Yola, Adamawa Steeti, Northeast Nigeria.
                                   O kwusiri ike na a na-arụzi ụlọ ọgbakọ ndị ọrụ gọọmentị etiti, nke dị n’akụkụ dị iche iche nke mba ahụ n’ihi mkpa gọọmentị etiti na ụlọ ọrụ nke onye isi ndị ọrụ obodo na-etinye na ọdịmma ndị ọrụ obodo.
                                                                                                                                                                                 Dị ka ya si kwuo, ndị ọrụ obodo, bụ ndị na-arụsi ọrụ ike iji hụ na ọganihu na mmepe nke mba ahụ, chọrọ ezigbo ụlọ ọrụ, yana gburugburu ebe obibi dị mma iji zuru ike ma na-emekọrịta ihe n’etiti onwe ha mgbe ha rụchara ọrụ, n’ihi ya, nkwado maka ịrụzigharị na iwulite, ebe ọ dị mkpa.
                              Ọ gara n’ihu kwuo na ọgbakọ ndị ọrụ obodo na-achọkwa ịkwalite onyonyo nke ọrụ ahụ, ebe ha na-enye ndị ọrụ obodo mmetụta nganga na enyi, bụ nke a maara maka ya mgbe ọ na-agba ndị ọrụ obodo ume ka ha nọgide na-enwe ntụkwasị obi ha site n’ịga n’ihu na-emeziwanye onwe ha, site n’ịbụ ndị a ma ama.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Dọkịnta Yemi – Esan gakwara n’ihu gwa ndị na-ahụ maka otu ndị ọrụ obodo dị na Yola ka ha hụ na ọrụ dị n’ime ọgbakọ ahụ dị mma, ka e wee dọta ọtụtụ mmadụ dị ka o kwere mee maka ịba ụba nke nkwado ga-eme ka gọọmentị etiti nweta ego ha nwetara.
                                                                             Ọ gbakwụnyere na ndị ọrụ obodo kwesịrị iche echiche site na igbe ma soro ndị ụlọ ọrụ dị na steeti ahụ na-arụkọ ọrụ, ka ha wee nọgide na-enwe, yana mee ka ọgbakọ ahụ nwee mmetụta.
                                                                                                                                                                                                             Na mbụ, onye odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide, Ụlọ Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Ọrụ, kwupụtara na mwughachi nke Club ahụ na-egosi ịmaliteghachi ọrụ nlekọta nke OHCSF, na-agbakwụnye na site na mgbalị nke HoCSF, Ụlọ Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Ndị Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Ndị Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Ụlọ Ọrụ, na mba nile, ugbu a nwere mmefu ego.
                                                                                                                                                                          Mgbe ọ na-akpọ ndị njikwa nke klọb ka ha bụrụ ndị ọhụrụ, ọ rịọrọ ndị ọrụ gọọmentị etiti na Adamawa State ka ha were ọrụ ahụ, na-echekwa ma kwado ya.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Onye isi oche, Federal Civil Service Club, Adamawa State, Mr, Mohammed Aminu Sambo, kwupụtara na ntinye aka nke onye isi ọrụ ahụ bụ nke a na-enwetụbeghị ụdị ya, nke mere ka a kpọọ ọgbakọ ahụ aha ya.
                                                                                                                                                                      Ka ọ dị ugbu a, Dọkịnta Folashade Yemi-Esan akpọọla oku ka e tinyekwuo mbọ maka ịnye ọrụ na ndị ọrụ gọọmentị etiti.
                                                      A kpọrọ oku a na Nzukọ iri ano na ano nke National Council on Establishments na-eme na Yola, Adamawa steeti na North-East Nigeria.
  Ndị ọrụ nke Council nke mejupụtara ndị odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ na ihe ndị metụtara ya sitere na steeti iri atọ na isii (36) nke Federation, gụnyere Federal Capital Territory nọ ya ka ha kparịta ụka gbasara ọrụ ọha na eze maka ebumnuche ịga n’ihu.
ihe kpatara Ọrụ ahụ n’ịhụ na mmepe mba accelerated.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Onye isi ọrụ nke onye odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide, Amụma Service na Strategies Office (SPSO) nọchitere anya ya, Ọfịs nke onye isi ndị ọrụ obodo, Mazị Okokon Ekanem Udo, kwusiri ike na ọrụ dị n’ịkwado ọrụ ahụ maka ezi ozi na ịdị mma.
                                                                                                         “Ọ bụ ọrụ dịịrị anyị ikwado mkpebi ndị ezi uche dị na ya na ụlọ ọrụ na ihe ndị ọzọ metụtara ya iji kwalite nkwekọ n’ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, nnyefe ọrụ nke ọma na nke dị irè maka ọdịmma ụmụ amaala, na ịkwado uto na mmepe akụ na ụba na-adigide.
         Ọ bụ ọrụ anyị ichekwa onyonyo na mmasị nke ma ndị ọrụ ọha na ndị ọrụ ọha,” ọ gbakwụnyere.
                                                                         Mazị Udo, gbara ndị steeti ume ka ha tinyekwuo oge, mbọ na akụrụngwa ndị ọzọ n’ịkwalite nkwalite ikike na njikwa nka site na ọzụzụ na ịzụghachi ndị ọrụ, njikwa onye isi na nhazi ọkwa; nhazi usoro njikwa arụmọrụ iji dochie APER yana nkwalite na Integrated Personnel Payroll Information System (IPPIS) – Modul Human Resource (HR) iji nweta ụgwọ ọrụ dị ọcha.
Ndị ọzọ bụ institutionalization nke ọhụrụ; osooso nke digitalization nke ọrụ ọdịnaya iji melite usoro ọrụ na ime mkpebi ngwa ngwa; nkwalite nke uru atụmatụ maka ndị ọrụ ọha site na ngwugwu zuru oke nke mmemme ọdịmma ndị ọrụ dị ka mbinye ego ụlọ, atụmatụ njem, nhazi ụgwọ ọnwa, ụgwọ ọrụ na nnabata, nke Federal Civil Service na-eme ugbu a iji kwalite uto na mmepe obodo.
  Mgbe ọ na-ekwupụta nchekwube na ọkwa dị elu nke Technocrats nwere ahụmahụ nọ na Nzukọ ahụ, odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide, gbara ndị sonyere ume ka ha leba anya n’ihe ncheta ahụ nke ọma ma mee ka ndụmọdụ ndị na-adịghị mma ga-eduzi Council n’ime mkpebi ndị a maara nke ọma ga-agbanwe ọrụ ahụ..
Osote onye isi ala Naijiria, Prọfesọ Yemi Osinbajo ga-ekwu okwu isi okwu na nzuko dị elu nke Rockefeller Foundation kwadoro na New York, na nnukwu nkwado maka ego na nkwado teknụzụ maka Atụmatụ Ntugharị Energy Nigeria.
                                                                                                                                 Nkwupụta nke Senior Special Assistant to the President on Media and Publicity (Office of the Vice President), Laolu Akande kwuru na ụlọ ọrụ zuru ụwa ọnụ na ndị nwere ike itinye ego ga-aga nzukọ ahụ iji kwado ọrụ nke Voluntary Carbon Market na Nigeria na na Africa.
                                             Akande kwuru na ndị sonyere na nzukọ a gụnyere Global Energy Alliance for People and Planet, GEAPP; UN-Ustainable Energy maka mmadụ niile, SEforALL; UN’s Economic Commission for Africa na UN Climate Change High-Level Champions, ndị niile na-akwado ma na-arụsi ọrụ ike na-eme atụmatụ maka Initiative Market Carbon Africa.
                                                                                                                                  Ọ na-ekwu, “Nzukọ ahụ dị elu nke na-eme na Fraịde ga-abụkwa ndị isi sitere na gọọmentị US ga-enyocha ohere ndị nwere ike ime nke ahịa carbon na-enye iji mepụta ihe onwunwe maka mgbanwe ike dị ọcha ma na-eme ka ọganihu akụ na ụba na Nigeria na mba ndị ọzọ dị n’Africa.
“Tupu nzukọ ahụ dị elu na Fraịde, Prọfesọ Osinbajo ga-emekọrịta ihe echi (Thursday) na ụfọdụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị gọọmenti Naijiria na-etinye aka na Energy Transition Plan na ntinye nke Ahịa Carbon Voluntary gụnyere GEAPP na Bloomberg Philanthropies.
                                                                                                                                                                    “Otu kọmitii na-ahụ maka mba ụwa na-eme ka ahịa Carbon Africa rụọ ọrụ n’Africa, n’okpuru nkwado nke African Carbon Market Initiative.
                                                                                                                             Ndị otu kọmitii ahụ gụnyere osote onye isi ala Naijiria, onye bụbu onye isi ala Colombia, Ivan Duque Marquez, ndị isi nke United Nations, United States Agency for International Development, USAID; Gates Foundation n’etiti ndị ọzọ.
                                                                                                                                   Akande chetara na Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari ekwuputala ‘Njikere Naijiria na net-zero site n’afọ 2060 n’ihi usoro ngbanwe Energy Transition Plan (ETP) zuru ezu,’ na nkwupụta ya bụ COP26.
                    “Na COP27 n’okwu onye isi ala Nigeria, Mohammed Hassan Abdullahi, bụ Minista na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, Mohammed Hassan Abdullahi, kwuru, o gosiri na ‘ego ọha na eze dị mkpa ngwa ngwa iji kwado mgbanwe ume ike na omume ihu igwe adịghị ụkọ – ọnọdụ jikọtara ya na nhụjuanya ụgwọ na-emetụta ọtụtụ ndị dị ala na.
                                                                            Ya mere, anyị na-eme ihe nkwuwa okwu iji sụọ ụzọ ngwa ngwa ego ihu igwe dị ka ụgwọ maka mgbanwe ihu igwe; ma na-akwado mmepe nke atụmatụ ahịa ahịa carbon nke Africa,” ka o kwuru.
                              Dị ka ACMI si kwuo, nke ewepụtara n’ọnwa gara aga na COP27 na Egypt, e nwere ihe doro anya na-egosi “na Nigeria nwere ike ịchịkọta $600 – 800 nde kwa afọ na isi obodo site na 2030 (na-eche na ọnụahịa dị ugbu a nke $ 20 kwa ton nke carbon) site na Ahịa Carbon afọ ofufo na nwere ike ịkwado ọrụ nde 3-5 n’ime oge mgbanwe ike.
                                                                                                                                           Osote onye isi ala Osinbajo bụ Onye isi oche nke FG’s Energy Transition Plan Working Group, otu ọtụtụ ndị ozi nke President Buhari guzobere iji mejuputa ETP.

                                                                                                                                                                    Ọzụzụ a bụkwa ka onye isi obodo, kansụl ndị isi na ndị isi obodo niile dị na Becheve dị na Obanliku LGA ka ha kwụsị omume “nwanyị ego”.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                “Enwekwaghị ihe ngọpụ nke ‘omenala’ iji chebe ime ihe ike na omume ndị na-emerụ ahụ.
                                                                                                             Achọrọ m ịja ndị isi nke Council of Traditional Leaders nke Africa na ndị otu niile maka imeghe ụzọ maka Nigeria na n’ezie kọntinent Africa na nke a.
  Iji mezuo nke a, United Nations site na UN Women na ndị ọzọ na-eme ihe ngosi Spotlight ga-aga n’ihu na-akwado maka ikike mpaghara nke ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ n’ihu iji hụ na ndị lanarịrị FGM na ndị nọ n’ihe ize ndụ nke omume a na-enweta nchebe, ịnweta ikpe ziri ezi na nkwado.
                 Obi dị anyị ụtọ na anyị na Council of Traditional and Religious Leaders in Africa (COTLA) na-aga n’ihu na-emekọ ihe, iji wulite ngwa ọrụ nkwado nke ga-eduzi ọrụ na ụzọ ndị isi a na-akwanyere ùgwù na-ekpochapụ omenala ndị na-emerụ ahụ gụnyere alụm di na nwunye na ụmụ nwanyị di ha nwụrụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Ọ gbakwụnyere na ogbako a bụ ihe kwesịrị ịja mma ma gosi na ebe enwere ọchịchọ na mgbanwe nwere ike ime.
                                                                      Cheta na steeti iri atọ na abụọ agafeela iwu ime ihe ike megide mmadụ mmachibido iwu (VAPP) 4, na Naịjirịa.
                                                                    Onye isi ngalaba mmekorita nke EU, Oriakụ Cecile Tassin Pelser, ekwupụtala na EU na-etinye ego n’ịkwalite ndị ntorobịa iji gboo mmetụta na-emebi emebi nke omume ọjọọ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     O kwuru na omume ndị na-emerụ ahụ na-emetụta ndị mmadụ n’otu n’otu na ezinụlọ.
                                                                                                                       “Iji mebie usoro ahaghị nhata a, agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị bụ isi.
Nke a bụ ya mere EU ji etinye ego na mmemme mmụta ọhụrụ na inye ndị ntorobịa ruru nde EUR 40, nke ezubere iji kwalite ohere inweta agụmakwụkwọ dị mma na nke ziri ezi maka ụmụ agbọghọ nọ n’ime ime obodo na obodo ndị na-enweghị enyemaka”, o kwuru.
                                                                                                                 Onye nkpọkọta, Council of Traditional Leaders in Africa, Oba Aderemi Adedayo, onye na-achị Ido Osun, gbara ndị otu ya ume ka ọ gbasie mbọ ike iji kwụsị ime ihe ike metụtara nwoke na nwanyị.
                                                                                                                                                                                             “Ọ bụrụ na ịchọrọ ịga ebe dị anya, ị ga-emerịrị ọnụ.
Dịka ndị na-eme ihe ike, achọrọ m ịrịọ gị ndị ọrụ ibe m na anyị enweghị oge dị ukwuu n’akụkụ anyị.
  Anyị nwere ogologo ụzọ na ọtụtụ ihe anyị ga-eme.
                                                                                                                                                                                     Anyị ga-akwado ma na-agbasi mbọ ike nke ahịhịa ahịhịa megide FGM na n’ezie nha anya nwoke na nwanyị, na-eme nyocha na-anabata nwoke na nwanyị nke iwu ọdịnala na ileba anya ịnweta ikpe ziri ezi maka ndị ihe metụtara “, o kwuru.

Onyeisiala Naijiria bụ Muhammadu Buhari enyefela ndị ụlọ omebe iwu 2023 atụmatụ mmefu ego nke Federal Capital Territory (FCT) maka nleba anya na nkwado.
Idris Wase, bụ onye chịburu ọgbakọ ọgbakọ ahụ, gụpụtara ozi sitere n’aka onyeisi oche nye ndị omeiwu na Tuzdee.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       N’akwụkwọ ozi e dere ụbọchị 29 nke ọnwa Nọvemba wee degara onye isi okwu, Hon.
Femi Gbajabiamila, Onye isi ala kwuru na mmefu ego FCT dabara na atumatu mmepe mmefu ego nke gọọmentị etiti.
                                                                                                                                                                                    Akwụkwọ ozi ahụ gụrụ na akụkụ: “Nbufe nke FCT 2023 mmefu ego iwu; N’ikwekọ na ngalaba 121 nke iwu Federal Republic of Nigeria 1999 ka emegharịrị, m na-ebuga ebe a atụmatụ mmefu ego nke Federal Capital Territory maka ụdị nleba anya nke Ụlọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya.
                                      N’ime nkwadebe nke mmefu ego iwu nke FCT, nchịkwa isi obodo Federal kwadoro na atumatu mmepe mmefu ego nke gọọmenti etiti a na-asọpụrụ.
N’ihi ya, atụmatụ mmefu ego nke FCT 2023 butere ụzọ nkwalite ahụike, imepụta ọrụ, ọrụ ọdịmma ọha, agụmakwụkwọ na ịba ụba nke ọrụ ugbo, iji wepụta ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ukwuu nke ụmụ amaala anyị na ịda ogbenye.
                                                                                                                                                           Na-atụ anya na nrubeisi ga-enweta na mbụ ngwa ngwa nlebanya nke Ụlọ.
Kwupụta mmesi obi ike nke nlebara anya kacha elu” akwụkwọ ozi ahụ gụrụ..

Nwoke a bụ onye kwesịrị ịhazi ọgbakọ achụmnta vootu ọkwa onyeisiala nke Labour pati n’Owerri.
Ọ nwụrụ nkeji olemole ọ gwachara nwunye ya ka o tinyere ya nri.” N’agbanyeghị ọnwụ Irouno, ọgbakọ achụmnta vootu ndị Labour Pati gakwara n’ihu, mana ndị mmadụ ji otu nkeji kwanyere ya ugwu na ya bụ ọgbakọ.

Gọọmenti Legọs steeti enyela ihe karịrị puku mmadụ abụọ nwere ahụ ike na steeti ahụ.
Gọọmenti nyere ha ngwá ọrụ enyemaka na ihe inyeaka maka ncheta ụbọchị mba ụwa nke ndị nwere nkwarụ, PWD, maka ịkwalite azụmahịa ha dị iche iche.
                                                                                                     Mgbe ọ na-ekwu okwu na mmemme ndị nwere nkwarụ, DEEP, dị na Legọs bụ nke ụlọ ọrụ Lagos State Office for Disability Affairs, LASODA haziri, Gọvanọ Babajide Sanwo-Olu kwuru na mmegharị ahụ bụ iji kwalite ọnọdụ ndị na-adịghị mma, nye ha ike ịdabere na onwe ha na nke a.
mee ka ha nwee ike ịnagide ihe ịma aka ndị a na-enwe kwa ụbọchị yana ime ka mmegharị ha na itinye aka na ọha mmadụ dị mfe.
                                                                  Gọvanọ nke onye Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ndị ntorobịa na mmepe mmekọrịta ọha na eze nọchitere anya ya, bụ Maazị Olusegun Dawodu kwuru na ego inyeaka ahụ ga-eme ka ikike nke azụmahịa ndị PWD dị ugbu a yana ndị na-amalite n’ikwekọ n’usoro ọchịchị ọchịchị ya nke itinye aka na imepụta ọrụ.
Ihe omume ahụ nwere isiokwu ya:                                                                                                                                                                                                            “Ngwọta mgbanwe maka mmepe gụnyere: Ọrụ nke Innovation na Ịkụnye Ịnweta Ịnweta na Equitable World,” dị ka Gọvanọ si kwuo kwesịrị ekwesị, dịka nchịkwa ya emepụtala atumatu na ntinye aka iji nye ndị na-adịghị ike nke ọha mmadụ echiche.
nke sitere na usoro mmepe ya.                                    “Ndị ọchịchị anyị gara n’ihu na-emeziwanye ọnọdụ ndị PWD na steeti ahụ ma na-enyekwa ha ike ịdabere na onwe ha iji nagide ọtụtụ ihe ịma aka ndị ha na-eche ihu.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                “Ihe ntinye aka bụ iji nyere ha aka site na ngwa enyemaka dị iche iche iji mee ka mmegharị ha na nsonye ha dị n’ime ọha mmadụ,” na-agbakwụnye na akwadokwara ego inye ike iji kwalite ikike nke azụmahịa ndị dị ugbu a yana ndị na-amalite.
                                                                                                            “Ego ndị ahụ na-achọ inye ha ohere ịnọrọ onwe ha ma mesịa ghọọ ndị na-arụ ọrụ, si otú ahụ belata ọnụ ọgụgụ nke ndị na-enweghị ọrụ na obodo nkwarụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            “Ndị gara aga erite uru na mmemme a na-enye onyinye ugbu a maka ezinụlọ ha na ọha mmadụ.”                                                                 Nnwere onwe ego Gọvanọ Sanwo-Olu bụ onye mesiri ha obi ike na ọ na-akwado ya mgbe niile sị na ya ebidola atụmatụ dị iche iche iji hụ na ndị PLWD nwere onwe ha n’ego bụ ihe dị oke mkpa n’ịkwalite atụmatụ itinye na steeti ahụ.
                                                                                                                             Dị ka ya si kwuo “Ntụziaka amụma nke nchịkwa a dị ugbu a bụ ịmepụta gburugburu ebe obibi na-adịgide adịgide maka onye ọ bụla na-eme nke ọma na ibi ndụ bara uru n’agbanyeghị ikike mmadụ ma ọ bụ ọnọdụ nkwarụ.
                                                                                                                                                Site na mmalite ya, gọọmentị Legọs steeti lekwasịrị anya na atumatu na mmemme ahaziri maka ịhapụ onye ọ bụla.
                                                        “Ịmekọrịta ọnụ bụ ihe dị mkpa maka ezigbo ọchịchị, ọchịchị a dị ugbu a agaghị ezu ike ruo mgbe anyị mere nnukwu mgbanwe na ọdịmma nke ndị nwere nkwarụ na Lagos State.”                                                                                                                                                                     Iwu nkwarụ Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Lagos State Office for Disability Affairs LASODA bụ Maazị Oluwadamilare Ogundairo kwuru na mmemme a so na mmejuputa iwu nkwarụ na Legọs.

Onye isi ndị ọrụ ụgbọ elu (CAS) Air Marshal Oladayo Amao enyela ndị ọrụ nke Nigerian Air Force (NAF) ebubo ka ha nọgide na-eme ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ka mba ahụ na-aga n’ihu na ntuli aka 2023.
                                                                                                                                                                                  Ndị CAS kwuru nke a mgbe ha na Air Warrant Officers (AWOs) na Regimental Sergeant Majors (RSM) nke ngalaba NAF niile gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ ọrụ atọ emere na Headquarters, NAF Abuja.
                                                                                                                                                                                                            Onye isi ụgbọ elu bụ onye nyekwara ha iwu ka ha nọgide na-enwe ọkwa dị elu nke ịdọ aka ná ntị na ịkwado usoro nhazi kwuru na nzụkọ a bụ iji mee ka ndị isi ọrụ ndị isi na-abụghị ndị ọrụ nwee mkparịta ụka siri ike na n’ezoghị ọnụ n’ihe metụtara ndị agha ikuku maka ịkwalite arụmọrụ ọrụ.
                          O kwuru na ndị NAF edepụtala nnukwu ihe ịga nke ọma n’ọgụ a na-alụso ọgbaghara na ndị na-eyi ọha egwu na ụlọ ihe nkiri dị iche iche na-arụ ọrụ na mba ahụ, bụ nke o kwuru na àjà ndị ọrụ na-agba n’ihu agha na ntinye aka nke gọọmentị Naijiria iji kwado ọrụ ahụ.
                                                              Mgbe ọ na-echetara ha ọrụ ha dị ka njikọ dị n’etiti cadre ndị uwe ojii na ọkwa ndị ọzọ, Air Marshal Amao kwuru na NAF na-atụ anya ịnyefe nyiwe ndị ọzọ iji kwado ndị dị ugbu a nke o kwuru na ọ ga-eme ka ikike ọrụ ahụ dịkwuo elu na mgbochi na-aga n’ihu.
                                      Ọ dụrụ ha ọdụ ka ha gaa n’ihu na-enye ndị ọchịagha ha dị iche iche nzaghachi dị mkpa iji kwalite mmejuputa atumatu yana ịkwado ọganihu nke ndị agha ikuku.
N’okwu nke enweghị ịdọ aka ná ntị nke Absent na-enweghị Nhapụ (AWOL) mere na ịgbahapụ, CAS gwara AWOs na RSM ka ha dọọ ndị ọrụ ha aka na ntị ka ha gbasoo iwu na ụkpụrụ ndị e debere maka ikewapụ na Ọrụ dịka akọwapụtara na Usoro na Ọnọdụ Ọrụ (TACOS).
Dị ka ya si kwuo, NAF agaghị agọnahụ onye ọrụ ọ bụla ikike ya nkewapụ ma ọ bụrụhaala na ọ dị na TACOS, na-agbakwụnye na ọ gaghịkwa ala azụ ime usoro ịdọ aka ná ntị kwesịrị ekwesị megide ndị ọrụ dị otú ahụ n’agbanyeghị ogologo oge ọ ga-ewe n’agbanyeghị ogologo oge ọ ga-ewe.
          Na ntuli aka izugbe nke 2023 na-abịa, Onye isi ụgbọ elu ahụ boro ndị ọrụ agha ka ha nọgide na-eme ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma na-ekwu na ọ bụrụhaala na ọ ka bụ ikike ha na-enweghị ike ịhọpụta onye ọ bụla ha họọrọ, e kwesịghị ịhụ na ha na-etinye aka kpọmkwem ma ọ bụ tinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọ bụla.
                                                                                                                                                                                                  Ndị CAS mesiri ha obi ike na ndị NAF agaghị alaghachi azụ n’ịhụ na ndị ọrụ niile na-anabata ndị ọrụ nke ọma, na-aga ọgwụ na-enye ha ihe ndị dị mkpa iji rụọ ọrụ ha nke ọma ebe a ga-aga n’ihu na-enye ha ikike dị iche iche dị ka oge ruru.
                                                                                                                 Nzukọ ahụ, nke nwere ihe dị ka 9 AWOs na 120 RSM na-abịa, nyere ndị bịaranụ ohere ịkọrọ ndị CAS ihe omume ha na ihe ịma aka dị na Iwu na Ngalaba ha dị iche iche.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     N’oge nnọkọ mkparịta ụka ahụ, ha jụrụ ajụjụ, nye onyinye bara uru na nkọwa gbasara otu esi eme ka ọrụ ahụ gaa n’ihu iji rụọ ọrụ ya n’usoro iwu nke ịgbachitere ókèala obodo..
Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari akpọkuola ndị otu njikwa ọhụrụ na ECOWAS Commission nke Dr Omar Alieu Toure na-edu ka ha mechaa nyocha na imekọrịta mgbanwe na-aga n’ihu iji wusie òtù mpaghara ike ike.
Onyeisiala Buhari kwuru nke a n’ụbọchị ụka n’Abuja n’okwu nnabata ya na nnọkọ nkịtị nke iri isii na abụọ nke ECOWAS Authority of Heads of State and Government.
                                                                                                                   “Ya mere, Kọmishọna ga-agba mbọ na-arụsi ọrụ ike iji mechaa nyocha na nkwekọ nke Protocols on Good Governance and Democracy, n’ihi na nke a ga-enyere ndị okpuru ọchịchị anyị aka ịkwado mbọ anyị na-agbakọba n’ọ bụghị naanị ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya kama oke ya site na ezigbo ọchịchị nye ndị Ụmụ amaala obodo.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                           “N’ihe metụtara nke a bụ mkpa ọ dị ngwa ngwa iwebata n’ụzọ zuru ezu, atụmatụ atụmatụ mpaghara na ọgụ megide iyi ọha egwu na omume mpụ ndị ọzọ na mpaghara dị ka nchekwa nchekwa ga-akwado mbọ ọchịchị mba nke ga-ahụ na ọganihu na ọganihu nke mpaghara anyị, ”                                                  ” Onye isi ala kwuru.
N’ịnabata ndị isi mpaghara ibe ya, President Buhari kwuru na Mgbakọ nke afọ a bụ nke 8th nke Nigeria, n’okpuru ọchịchị ya kwadoro; “Oge ndị ahụ niile, gụnyere nke a, ewetara obodo m nsọpụrụ na nkwanye ùgwù ka Naijiria na-aga n’ihu na etiti nkwado nkwado na nkwado nkwado iji bulie mmekọrịta anyị na-aga n’ihu iji gboo nsogbu niile na mba anyị na ụmụ amaala obodo.
                                                                                      ” Nduzi Onye ndu Naijiria turu ugo nye President Kuffour Addo-Nana nke Ghana, onye isi oche n’oge gara aga maka ọrụ ya ma kelee President Umaro Embalo nke Guinea Bissau n’inweta onye isi nke otu mpaghara mpaghara, na-ekwupụta obi ike ya na ikike nke ikpeazụ.
                                                   ka; “Wepụ ọrụ ya na mpaghara mpaghara, yana izute atụmanya nke ụmụ amaala Community.”                                                                                    Nzaghachi COVID Onye isi ala Buhari kelere ndị isi ibe ya maka nkwado ọ nwetara dị ka onye mmeri mpaghara na COVID-19 n’oge ọrịa ahụ mebiri ụwa niile, na-akọwa ihe ịga nke ọma e dekọrọ na mpaghara ahụ na nkwado ha.
                                                                                                                                 “Ka m kelee gị kpọmkwem, nwanne ndị isi obodo na ndị ọchịchị, maka obi ike ị nwere n’ime m ka m bụrụ onye mmeri mpaghara na COVID-19, ohere nke mere ka mụ na ndị minista ngalaba, ECOWAS na West na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ.
Healthtù Ahụ Ike Africa iji mepụta usoro mpaghara nke belatara nsonaazụ COVID-19.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   “Obi abụọ adịghị ya, ntinye aka nke ndị otu steeti gosipụtara rụpụtara ezigbo nsonaazụ ka West Africa pụtara dị ka otu n’ime mpaghara nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ ọnwụ kacha nta, ọ bụghị naanị na kọntinent, kamakwa n’ụwa niile,” o kwuru.

Ndị ekperima amaghị ndị ha bụ awakpola ụlọeukpere ndị ụka alakụba dị n’obodo Funtua, na Katsina steeti ma tọrọ ọtụtụ ndị na-ekpe ekpere ebe ahụ.
Akụkọ kwuru na nke a mere n’abalị ụbọchị Satọde dịka ndị mmadụ gbakọrọ na ‘mosque’ ahụ ikpe ekpere abalị.
Ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị uweojii Katsina steeti bụ Gambo Isah gwara ndi ntaakuko na onyeisi ‘mosque’ ahụ na otu onye ọzọ so na ndị merụrụ ahụ na mwakpo ahụ, mana ha esila n’ụlọọgwụ ebe ha gara ịnata ọgwụgwọ laa.
Isah kwuru na ndị uweojii na ndị agha gbara mbọ ma zọpụta ụfọdụ n’ime ndị ahụ a tọọrọ, mana ihe ruru mmadụ iri na atọ ka na-efu efu.
