Aka chịburu Anambra steeti ma bụrụkwa onye na-azọ ọkwa Onyeisiala Naịjirịa n’otu ‘Labour Party’ bụ Peter Obi ewepụtela akwụkwọ ihe o bu n’obi ime ma o merie ya bụ ọkwa ọ na-azọ.
Nke a na-abịa dịka ọtụtụ katọrọla ndị Labour Party maka na ha ewepụtabeghị ‘manifesto’ ha, n’agbanyeghị na ndị ọzọ welitere isi na-azọ ọkwa Onyeisiala ewepụtechaala nke ha.
Bola Ahmed Tinubu nke pati ‘All Progressives Congress’ (APC) wepụtara manịfesto nke ya ọ kpọrọ ‘Renewed Hope’ n’ụbọchị 21 nke ọnwa Ọktoba, n’Abuja; Abubakar Atiku nke ‘Peoples Democratic Party’ (PDP) ewepụtakwala manifesto nke ya nke ọ kpọrọ ‘My Covenant with Nigerians’; ebe Omoyele Sowore nke pati African Action Congress (AAC) wepụtara manịfesto nke ọ kpọrọ ‘A People’s Manifesto for Total Liberation’.
Mana n’ụbọchị Satọde, abalị anọ nke ọnwa Disemba 2022, ka Peter Obi kwupụtara n’akara Twitter ya, na ha ewepụtela ya bụ akwụkwọ manifesto.
Ọkpụrụkpụ ihe dị na Manịfesto a Labour Party kwuru na ha chịkọtara ihe niile ha bu n’obi ime n’isiokwu asaa, iji weta ezi ọchịchị na Naịjirịa.
Ụlọọrụ na-ahazi ntuliaka n’ala Naijiria bụ Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) ekwuola na ndị ekperima wakporo ụlọọrụ ha dị n’okpuru ọchịchị Oru West n’Imo steeti.
Dịka Inec si depụta n’akara Twitter ha, mwakpo a mere n’ebe elekere anọ nke isi ụtụtụ taa bụ Sọnde.
Nke a na-abịa dịka ndị ekperima wakpokwara ụlọọrụ Inec dị n’Ọrlu Imo steeti.
Inec kwuru na nke a na-eme ya ụlọọrụ ha nke asaa a na-awakpo n’ime ọnwa anọ gara aga na steeti ise dị na Naịjirịa.
Akwụkwọ ozi ahụ nke ọnụ na-ekwuru Inec bụ Festus Okoye zipụtara taa bụ Sọnde kwuru na ọ bụ onyeisi ha n’Imo steeti bụ Sylvia Uchenna Agu gbara ama mwakpo ahụ.
Ha kwuru na ebe ndị ekperima ahụ gbara ọkụ bụ ‘conference room’ nke mebiri oche, tebulu na ihe ndị ọzọ dị ebe ahụ, mana ọkụ ahụ emetụghị ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ dị mkpa Inec ji arụ ọrụ.
Inec kwukwara ọzọ na mwakpo ndị a nke a na-awakpo ụlọọrụ ha na steeti dị icheiche na Naịjirịa nwereike imetụta nhazi ntuliaka nke 2023 ma ọ bụrụ na o mere na-aga n’ihu.
Ha kwukwara na ha emeela ka ndịọrụ nchekwa mara maka mwakpo nke a Ọnọdụ nchekwa ọjọọ agaghị akwụsị ntuliaka 2023 – Inec Na mkparịtaụka Festus Okoye na ndị ntaakụkọ Channels nwere n’ọdị nso a, o kwuru na ntuliaka 2023 ga-aga n’ihu n’agbanyeghị mwakpo ndị a niile.
O kwuru sị: “Achọrọ m ime ka onye ọbụla mara na enweghị akụrụngwa ndị dị mkpa a ga-eji mee ntuliaka dị n’ụlọọrụ anyị ndị a na-awakpo.
“Anyị echekwaala akụrụngwa BVAS nakwa ihe ndị ọzọ.
Ntuliaka 2023 ga-agarịrị n’ihu dịka anyị si akwado ya.
“Mana ọ bụrụ na mwakpo ndị a na-aga n’ihu dịka ntuliaka na-abịawanye nso, o nwereike isiwanye ike iwetaghachi ihe niile ndị e mebiri emebi.
“Ya mere o ji dị mkpa ichekwa ụlọọrụ anyị ma gbochie mwakpo ndị a.” Enweghị nchekwa na-arị elu n’Imo steeti Ọnọdụ enweghị nchekwa na-akawanye njọ na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naịjirịa ebe Imo Steeti dị.
Mana ọ kawanyere njọ mgbe gọọmentị Naịjirịa nwụchiri ma jichie Nnamdi Kanu bụ onyeisi otu ‘Indigenous People of Biafra’ (Ipob), ndị na-alụ ọgụ maka nnwereonwe Biafra.
Ndị ọrụ nchekwa Naịjirịa na-ekwu na ọ bụ ndị Ipob nakwa ndị ọgụ ha kpọrọ onwe ha ‘Eastern Security Network’ (ESN), na-akpa ike ọjọọ a na mpaghara ala Igbo, mana Ipob na ESN kwuru na ọbụghị ha.
N’ọdị nso a, enweela mwakpo n’ụlọọrụ ndị uweojii nakwa ụlọ gọọmentị dị icheiche na steeti ise dị na mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ.
Iji wulite ọnọdụ nchekwa, gọọmentị Imo steeti hibere otu nche nke ha a kpọrọ ‘Ebube Agu’, bụ ndị ọrụ ha bụ inyere ndị ọrụ nchekwa aka ma gbochie mpụ.
Mana ọtụtụ mmadụ ebola ndị ‘Ebube Agu’ a ebubo aka ike nakwa ịkpagbu na igbu ndị aka ha dị ọcha..
Ngalaba gọọmentị na-ahụ maka njem ụgbọ oloko bụ Nigeria Railway Corporation ekwuola na njem ụgbọ oloko Abuja-Kaduna ga-amalite ọzọ n’ụbọchị Mọnde, abalị ise nke Disemba 2022.
Ọ bụ ọnụ na-ekwuru ụlọọrụ a bụ Fidet Okhiria kwuru nke a site n’akwụkwọ ozi o wepụtara n’ụbọchị Satọde.
Cheta na njem ụgbọ oloko a kwụsịburu dịka ndị ekperima bandit wakporo ya n’abali iri abuo na asato nke ọnwa Maachị afọ a.
Mmadụ asatọ nwụrụ na mwakpo ahụ ebe ndị ekperima ahụ tọọrọ ihe ruru mmadụ iri isii na abuo, ọtụtụ n’ime ndị a atọọrọ nọgidere n’aka ndị ekperima ahụ ruo ụbọchị isii nke ọnwa Ọgọst 2022.
Okhiria kwuru na dịka njem ga-amalite ọzọ n’okporo ụgbọ oloko a, ndị mmadụ ga-enwe ike ịgbata tiketi ha site n’ọbaozi ịntanetị ndị NRC, maọbụ site n’ịdọtụ akụrụngwa ‘mobile app’ n’ekwentị ha.
Ịgbata tikeeti ga-amalite n’elekere asatọ nke ụtụtụ taa bụ Sọnde.

Osote onyeisiala Naijiria, Ọkammụta Yemi Osinbajo, na-ahapụ Abụja na Satọde gaba Rịpọblik nke Vietnam maka njikọ aka mba na mba.
Ọnụ na-ekwuchitere osote onyeisiala, Laolu Akande bụ onye kwuru nke a n’ozi o zipụtara, o kwuru na ọrụ Osinbajo na mba Vietnam ga-agụnye nzukọ ya na Onyeisiala mba Vietnam, Nguyễn Xuân Phúc; Osote onyeisiala, Vo Thi Aah Xuan, Prime Mịnịsta, Pham Minh Chinh, ndị ọrụ gọọmentị na ndị azụmahịa.
Akande kwuru na njem nke osote onyeisiala na Vietnam ga-eme ka azụmahịa na mmekọrịta dị n’etiti mba abụọ ahụ siwanye ike.
Dị ka Akande si kwuo, onye bụbu osote Prime Mịnịsta mba Vietnam, Vuong Hue, bịara ala Naijiria n’ọnwa Ọktoba afọ 2019, wee zute Ọkammụta Osinbajo, ndị isi gọọmentị ndị ọzọ ma sorokwa ndị otu azụmahịa mba abụọ ahụ kpakọrịta maka nkwalite azụmahịa na mmekọrịta dị n’etiti mba abụọ ahụ.
“Dịka Osote Prime Mịnịsta n’oge ahụ, nke ndị isi gọọmentị na ndị oji ego achụ ego mba Vietnam so bịa Naijiria, kwuru na Nigeria bụ nnukwu onye otu azụmaahịa mba Vietnam n’ime Afrịka niile.
N’ezie ọnụ ego ahia dị n’etiti mba abụọ ahụ guzoro na narị nde dollar abụọ na iri asatọ n’afọ 2014 wee rute ihe karịrị narị nde dollar ise n’afọ 2019.
“Ọ bụ ezie na Naijiria na Vietnam nọgidere na-enwe mmekọrịta mba na mba ogologo oge kemgbe afọ 1976, Osote Onyeisiala Osinbajo ga-abụ onye isi gọọmenti Naijiria nke abụọ na-aga mba ahụ ka Onyeisiala Olusegun Obasanjo gachara na afọ 2005.
“Mgbe ọ nọ na mba Vietnam, a na-atụ anya na osote onyeisiala ga-ebinye aka n’akwụkwọ nkwekọrịta itinye ego azụmahịa n’etiti Naijiria na Vietnam.
“Ọ ga-enwekwa mkparịta ụka dị elu ya na ogbo ya nke Vietnam, Vo Thi Aah Xuan na Prime Mịnịsta maka okwu azụmahịa, ọrụ ugbo, nkanụzụ na ndị ọzọ.” Ọnụ na-ekwuchitere osote onyeisiala kwukwara n’ozi ahụ na Osinbajo ga-emesịa sonye na nzukọ azụmahịa nke ndị nnọchiteanya si mba abụọ ahụ nọ n’ime ya.
“Site na ohere dị n’ọrụ ugbo na nkanụzụ n’ime Naijiria na Vietnam, mkparịta ụka ga-elekwasị anya n’uru sitere na mmekorita na mpaghara ndị a iji mee ka mmekọrịta enyi na enyi na azụmahịa nke mba abụọ a mikwuo emi.” Akande kwuru na osote onyeisiala ga-eweta njem nleta na Vietnam na njedebe n’ụbọchị Wednezde.
Naijiria ga-ekpughe Robot mbụ n’Afrịka nke aha ya bụ Omeife.
Ihe mkpughe a ga-ewere ọnọdụ na Fraịde abalị abụọ nke ọnwa Disemba 2022 n’Abuja, isi obodo Naijiria.
Robot ahụ nke ogologo ya dị 6-feet bụ ihe yiri mmadụ ma na-asụ asụsụ dị iche iche bụ Uniccon Group, ụlọ ọrụ nkanụzụ Naijiria nwere isi ọnọdụ ya n’Abuja, rụpụtara ya.
Uniccon Group bụ otu n’ime ụlọ ọrụ nkanụzụ ọhụụ na-eto ngwa ngwa n’ime Naijiria nke na-enye ụsa aka mgba nkanụzụ maka azụmaahịa nakwa ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị n’ime Afrịka.
Ngalaba nkanụzụ n’ime Naijiria na-etowanye eto ma na-eme inweta na ikesa ozi, atụmatụ na azụmahịa ịdị mfe karịa.
Omeife bụ Robot mbụ nke Afrịka nke nwere ọdịdị dị nso na mmadụ, ikike asụsụ, mmegharị na omume ọgụgụ isi site na iji Artificial Intelligence na Computer Vision capabilities.
Ọ bụkwa Robot na-enye aka ime ọtụtụ ihe dị ka e mebere ya ka ọ nwee nghọta miri emi banyere omenala na ụkpụrụ omume Afrịka.
Omeife nwere ike ịsụ asụsụ asatọ dị iche iche ma ewezuga asụsụ Bekee.
Asụsụ ndị a gụnyere Yoruba, Hausa, Igbo, French, Arabic, Kiswahili, Pidgin, Wazobia na Afrikaans.
Ebu ụzọ kpughee Omeife na Gulf Information Technology Exhibition (GITEX) na Dubai, site n’aka Mịnịsta Naijiria na-ahụ maka nzikọrịta ozi na akụnụba ọgbara ọhụụ, Prọfesọ Isa Pantami, bụ onye toro mbọ Uniccon Group na ịkwalite amụma nka na ụzụ n’Afrịka.
Pantami kwuru na Naijiria na-enye ohere ọma iji kwalite amụma ọhụrụ na gburugburu azụmaahịa na mba ahụ.
N’ikwu okwu ya maka ịrụpụta Omeife, onye isi Uniccon Group of Companies, Maazị Chucks Ekwuene kwuru na achọpụtara Afrịka maka mbọ ya na nkanụzụ mba ụwa.
O kwuru, “Site na Omeife na ọrụ anyị ndị ọzọ , anyị nwere obi ụtọ isonye n’inyere ndị azụmaahịa na ndị mmadụ n’Afrika niile aka imezu ike ha niile site n’inye ohere nkanụzụ kachasị ọhụrụ maka ịrụ ọrụ nke ọma”.
Mmemme mkpughe ahụ nke akpọrọ “The Future of Artificial Intelligence in the African Tech Ecosystem” ga-egosipụta ndị isi nkanụzụ, ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị, na gọọmentị n’ịhazi ọdịnihu nke nkanụzụ n’Naijiria dịka ekpughere Robot mbụ nke Afrịka n’Naijiria.
Ọ ga-ebulitekwu akara ngosi ọganihu nke nkanụzụ na mba ahụ..

Ulo orua mere ka amata nkea site n’onu na ekwuru ha bu, Mazi.

Na ogea, enwetara ubara ogwuike cocaine na cannabis na ulo ha abuo ha.
“Ndi ulo orua gbachiri ulo oriri abuo,ulo obibi abuo,otu ebe ana eri nrinakwa ugbo ala ato ebe ana agba mbo ikuchi oba ego ha nakwa otutu akuluba ha.” Ka emere ka amata.
Ozia mere ka amata na umunne abuo malitere itu mgbere ogwuike kamgbe afo 1990na ime obodo ha,ebe ha nwekwa ndi omekome na eche ulo ha nakwa ebe ha na ere ogwuike.

Ndi Federal Executive Council akwadola ka ana akuzi asusu ala anyi na ulo akwukwo primaryi gba gburugburu ala anyi.

Onyeisiala Buhari anabatala ụbọchị iri ọzọ maka mgbanwe ego.
Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari akwadola ịgbatị mgbanwe ego na-aga n’ihu site na ụbọchị  Jenụwarị 31, 2023 ruo February 10, 2023.
Onye isi ala Buhari nyere nkwado ahụ na nzụkọ ya na Gọvanọ nke Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), Godwin Emefiele mere, Ọ na-agba ume ka e nwekwuo oge, ezi uche na usoro iji mee ka ndị Naijiria nwee ike ịgbanwe ego ha nke ọma .
N’ịkọwa ndị nta akụkọ ozi ka ha nwechara nzukọ ahụ na Daura, Katsina steeti n’ụbọchị Sọnde, Gọvanọ CBN kwuru na mgbanwe ego ejirila ihe ịga nke ọma karịa pasentị iri asaa na ise nke ijeri naira 2.7 e mere na mpụga ụlọ akụ, na-egosi na ọ na-agbadata ọnụ ahịa, karịa.
Ihe e ji ọmụ eme Ebe ọbụla e kere ọmụ maọbụ tinye n’ala na-egosi na a na-azọ ala ahụ azọ.
  Ọmụ na-egosi ebe mmụọ si apụta .
Ọmụ e kere n’ukwu osisi na-egosiputa na osisi ahụ dị nsọ n’omenala Igbo.
E kee ọmụ n’ụgbọala, ọ na-egosị na ụgbọala ahụ bu ozu.
Onye mmadụ bịara nye ọmụ n’aka, dịka ịsị onye ahụ na ya “kpachara anya” n’ebe onye ahụ nọ; ya bụ ịdọ aka na ntị.
Ndị otu Ọkọnkọ na-eji ọmụ ekewapụta onwe ha na ndị ọzọ na-abụghị ndị otu ha.
  Ọmụ n’egosị ihe dị nsọ n’ala Igbo.
N’ebe dị ka Ibeku, Ụmụahịa, n’ala Igbo, igbubi ọmụ na-egosi na e mechaala mmemme ahụ dịka ekpe.
N’Ọhafịa, ndị na-agba egwu ikpirikpi ọgụ na-akpụrụ ọmụ n’ọnụ.
Ha agaghị ewepụ ya tupu agbachaa egwu a.
N’agba ọhụrụ a, ndị ụka ji ọmụ eme ụkaọmụ bụ ‘Palm Sunday’ na Bekee..
Alụmdi na nwunye mgbanwe batara na ya.
Ihe gbanwere n’ihe alụmdi na nwunye dị ọtụtụ mana nke kachasị nke bụ na a malitere ịga n’ụlọụka mee agbamakwụkwọ karịa ịkụ aka, idebe ego na ịdọ mmanya a na-emebu na mbụ.
Nke ka nke bụ na ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ malitere ịhụ agbamakwụkwọ e mere n’ụlọụka ka ọ ka mkpa karịa omenaala e kwesiri imere ezinaụlọ.
  N’oge mbụ, a na-eme ihe ndị a: A ga-edopu nwaanyị a chọrọ ịlụ ka o dochie ahụ tupu ọ laa n’ụlọ di ya mana mmekọ si n’aka ndị ọcha mere na a naghị emezi nke a n’ụwa taa.
Nwaanyị chọrọ ilu di na-agabu n’ezinaụlọ nwoke chọrọ ịlụ ya ka ya na nne dị ya nọrọ ka a marakwa ma a zụrụ ya azụ.
Ụfọdụ mmadụ ka na-emekwa nke a mana ọtụtụ anaghị emezi ya.
N’oge a, nwaanyị ahụ na-alụ di ga-eme ihe niile iji gosi nne di ya na a zụrụ ya azụ.
N’ụfọdụ omenaala, nwaanyị gaa ije di, nwoke ga-aga rụọrọ ndị ọgọ ya ọrụ dịka ịkọrọ ha ji maọbụ ihe ọbụla ha chọrọ.
Ọ ga-enyere nna nwunye ya aka rụọ ọrụ a ga-eji ama ma ọ dịkwa ike ọrụ ọ ga-eji zụọ nwa ha nri nke ọma ka ọ bụ onye ume ngwụ.
N’oge a, nwoke ahụ ga-agbalịsị ike ịhụ na o mepụtara ezinaụlọ ya ihu ka ihere ghara ime ya maọbụ a gwa ya na ọ gaghị alụzi nwaanyị ya.
Ọtụtụ ka na-etinye uche na nke a, ọ ga-abụ nwoke na nwaanyị lụchaa onwe ha, ezinaụlọ nwaanyị aga n’ezinaụlọ nke nwoke ka e lee ha ọbịa, ka ha mara ebe nwa ha nwaanyị na-aga.
A ka na-emekwa nke a n’ọtụtụ ebe mana oge a ọtụtụ ndị bizi n’obodo mepere emepe, ndị mmadụ anaghị etinyezi ya uchu mana oge a bụ oge ndị ọgọ ji ama ndị ọgọ ha ọ ga-abụ ha zute na mba, ha amara onwe ha.
Omenaala Igbo ndị ọcha gbanwere.
Egwuregwu ụmụaka n’egwu mgbe gboo na oge a.
A na-eji ya eme nwale ọ ga-emeri ibe ya ọkachasị ụmụnwaanyị.
Otu onye jide n’otu isi, onye ọzọ ejide n’isi nke ọzọ, ndị mmadụ e si n’ihu mana azụ na-abanye.
Ọ naghị adị mfe isi n’azụ banye mana ebe ahụ ka ọ na-aka mma maka ụfọdụ oge, iwu na-abụ na ị ga-esiriri n’azụ febanye, ị melighi ya, ị pụọ.
Ọ bụ nke otu ụkwụ, ka ọ bụ nke ụkwụ abụọ na-akacha gị mma ịtụ? Ọ bụ nke a na-aka anọ kaọbụ ise “Tịnkọm tịnkọm, tịnkọm tịnkọm, tịkalika alịka, dalin nke m o, dalin nke m ooo” I nwereike imezuo nke a.
Ebe a ka a na-ama ụmụnwoke nwere akọnauche gbasara ịrụ igwe.
Bọres bụ ihe ụmụnwoke ji osisi arụ tinye ya ụkpụrụ ọ ji abụ a kwa ya, ọ gbapụ ọsọ.
Ụmụnwoke mere nke a nke ọma maka na ọ bụ ha na-agbakarị bọọlụ mana ụmụnwaanyị mekwara ya.
Ịgba bọọlụ na-amasịkwa ụfọdụ ụmụnwaanyị n’ezie.
  Ihe ụmụaka jizi egwu egwu taa.
Eziokwu bụ na etu e siri mee ya n’oge gboo dị mma, etu e si emekwa taa amaka.
Ọ dịkwa mma ma ọ bụrụ na nne na nna ga-akụziri ụmụ ha nke gboo tinyere nke ọgbara ọhụrụ taa n’ihi na nke ndị gboo na-eme ka ụmụaka nwee ezi mmekọrịta n’etiti onwe ha iji mara etu ha si eme omume na ihe na-adị nwanne ha mma karịa ịkpa icheiche.
Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari enyela mmesi obi ike na gọọmentị ga-ahụ na ụmụ amaala enweghị ihe mkpọbi ụkwụ n’azụmahịa ha nakwa na ọ nweghị ihe ọgbaghara ga-apụta site na mgbanwe ego.
N’ịzaghachi na akụkọ banyere ogologo ahịrị ndị mmadụ na-echere ọtụtụ awa iji tinye akwụkwọ ego ochie wee nweta nke ọhụrụ, na-ebute iwe ọha na eze na nkatọ mmegide, Onyeisiala Buhari kwughachiri na mgbanwe ego a bụ maka ịkwakọba ego na-ezighị ezi, ọ bụghị ndị nkịtị, na na ọ dịla mkpa igbochi adịgboroja, nrụrụ aka na ego ndị na-eyi ọha egwu.
Nke a, o kwere na nkwa, ga-eme ka akụ na ụba kwụsie ike ma wusie ike.
Ka ọ na-arịba ama na mpaghara ọha mmadụ kacha daa ogbenye na-enweta ihe isi ike n’ihi ha na-edobekarị ego siri ike n’ụlọ maka mmefu dị iche iche, Onyeisiala Buhari kwenyesiri ike na gọọmentị agaghị ahapụ ha n’aka nke onwe ha.
Ọ kwughachiri na ọtụtụ atụmatụ nke ụlọ akụ etiti na ụlọ akụ azụmahịa niile na-aga n’ihu iji mee ka ikesa akwụkwọ ego ọhụrụ ahụ gaa ngwa ngwa iji gbochie mkpakọ ego na ọgbaghara..

“AKỤKỌ IHE MERE EME GA-ADABARA ANYị” – ONYEISI ALA -Buhari Muhammadu Buhari kwuru na ya kwenyere na akụkọ ihe mere eme ga-adị mma n’ọchịchị ya, na-aga n’ihu na ọnọdụ e ketara na nchekwa na akụ na ụba, na ihe dị iche e mere.
O kwuru nke a na steeti Katsina na Tọzdee, mgbe ọ gara njem ọrụ na steeti ahụ.
Onye isi ala Buhari, onye nyochara ma meghee, ọrụ mmepe na ahụike, agụmakwụkwọ, na akụrụngwa okporo ụzọ, toro Gọvanọ, Aminu Masari, maka iji nwayọọ na-eto steeti ahụ, na-eji njikwa ihe onwunwe dị irè..
NLC kwadoro ndị Sineti n’ịgbatị amụma Naira ọhụrụ.
  Otu Naijiria Labour Congress (NLC), na-ekwu na ya na ndị ụlọomeiwu ukwu sinetị na-akwado oku a ga-eleba anya n’oge ikpeazụ nke Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), kwadoro iwepụ akwụkwọ nde naira ochie na mba ahụ.
Ụlọ omeiwu Naijiria n’ụbọchị Tuzdee, rịọrọ CBN ka ọ gbatịa ọnwa isii n’iwu ha gbasara iwebata ego obodo e hazigharịrị bụ ‘Naira’, bụ nke ga-ewepụ ego ochie n’ikesa n’abalị iri atọ na otu n’ọnwa Jenụwarị afọ 2023.
Na nnọkọ mkparịta ụka ya na ndị otu Labour Correspondent Association of Nigeria (LACAN), na Abuja na Tọzdee, Onye isi NLC, Ayuba Wabba kwuru na iwepụ akwụkwọ ochie n’ime oge nke Central Bank of Nigeria nyere agaghị abụ naanị ihe na-ezighị ezi.

Otu achumnta vootu Onyeisiala nke Labour Party agaala Steeti Gombe ịchụ nta vootu n’aka ndị bi na steeti ahụ, ma kwe ha nkwa iwulite Naijiria ọhụrụ nke ndị mmadụ ga-eji na-anya isi.
Onye na-azọ ọkwa Onyeisiala na paati ahụ Mazị Peter Obi na onye osote ya, bụ Maazị Yusuf Datti, gwara ndị Naijiria ka ha ghara iji echiche mmenyere mmadụ na atụm vootu Onyeisiala n’ọnwa Febụwarị, kama ịtụ vootu maka mbawanye ọdịmma nke mmadụ nile.
Onye na-azọ ọkwa Onyeisiala na Labour Party, Mazị Peter Obi, mgbe ọ na-agwa ndị nkwado ụmụ nwanyị na Gombe okwu, kwuru na ịtụ vootu dabere n’echiche mmenyere abaghịrị ụmụ amaala obodo ahụ uru, ma gbaa ha ume ka tụnyere ndị nwere ike idozi nsogbu Naijiria.
Mazị Obi kpọkukwara ndị na-atụ vootu ka ha pụta n’igwe ịtụ vootu maka ndị ziri ezi ma nwee ikike.
“Ị na-azụta achịcha dị ọnụ ala karịa ebe ọ bụla n’ihi na i si mgbago ugwu ma ọ bụ ndida? Yabụ, gwa ha na ọ bụghị ihe agbụrụ.
Ka onye ọ bụla ghara ịgwa gị na ọ bụ gbasara okpukpere chi.
Onye ọ bụla nke na-agwa gị gbasara okpukpere chi, gwa ha, sị, ‘Gosi m ebe ndị Alakụba na-azụta nri dị ọnụ ala, ka m bịa ebe ahụ zụọ.
Nke ahụ bụ ihe ha gwara gị ma ghọgbuo gị n’oge gara aga.
“Ndị otu Kraịst anaghị azụ achịcha dị ọnụ ala, ndị Alakụba anaghị azụta achịcha dị ọnụ ala.
Otu achumnta vootu Labour Party nọ na Pantami Township Stadium na Gombe, bụ ebe ọ malitere achumnta vootu Onyeisiala na steeti ahụ.
Onye na-azọ ọkwa osote Onyeisiala, bụ Maazị Yusuf Datti Baba-Ahmed, kọwara Obi dị ka nwoke nwere agwa dị mkpa iji weta Naijiria ọhụrụ.
Maazị Baba-Ahmed nyere mmesi obi ike na ọ bụrụ na enyere ya ohere ije ozi dị ka Onyeisiala Naijiria, Maazị Obi agaghị emetu ndị Naijiria obi, n’ihi na o nwere iguzosi ike n’ezi ihe ma ọ ga-emezurịrị nkwa ndị e kwere.
“O nwere iguzosi ike n’ezi ihe na ihe ọ bụla o kwuru na ọ ga-eme, ọ bụkwa ya mere m na ya ji nọrọ.

Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari ga-amalite njem nleta ọrụ ụbọchị abụọ na Katsina Steeti dị na mgbago ugwu Naijiria na Tọzdee.
N’oge njem nleta ahụ, Onyeisiala Naijiria ahụ ga-emeghe ọtụtụ ihe nrụpụta nke ọchịchị Aminu Masari rụpụtara.
Ọrụ ndị a ma ama gụnyere Kofar Kaura Underpass, Kofar Kaura Water Works, Katsina State Internal Revenue House, Meteorological Institute, Darma Rice Mill, Batagarawa na Katsina State General Hospital na ndị ọzọ.
Ihe nrụpụta ndị a gbasara n’ime Senatorial Districts atọ e nwere na steeti ahụ.
Gọọmenti steeti ahụ ewepụtala Tọzdee ụbọchị iri abụọ na isii na Fraịdee 27th Jenụwarị ka ụbọchị ezumike ọha iji mee ka ụmụ amaala steeti ahụ nabata Onyeisiala Buhari bụ nwa afọ steeti Katsina a ma ama.
Onyeisiala rutere steeti ahụ n’abalị Wenezde site na Dakar nke Senegal, ebe o sonyeere na 2nd Darkar Agricultural Summit.
Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka njem ụgbọ elu na Naijiria, Hadi Sirika arịọla ndị njem na ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu arịrịọ, ndị njem ha na ọrụ ha mebiri n’ụbọchị Mọnde site n’abụbụ ọrụ nke ndị ọrụ Nigeria Aviation Handling Company, NAHCO, Plc, malitere.
Ndị ọrụ NAHCO bidoro abụbụ ọrụ iji chọọ ntinye ego n’ụgwọ ọnwa ma mee ka ndị njem tọ n’ọdụ ụgbọ elu.
Sirika, onye gwara ndị nta akụkọ State House okwu na Wenezde, kwuru na ụdị abụbụ ọrụ a agaghị eme n’ọdịnihu, na-arụtụ aka na ụlọ ọrụ njem ụgbọ elu bụ ọrụ dị oke mkpa.
Ọ gbakwụnyere na iwu Federal Airports Authority of Nigeria, (FAAN ACT), machibidoro abụbụ ọrụ na ọgbaghara na gburugburu ọdụ ụgbọ elu ebe gọọmentị ga-eji iwu gbochie ọgbaghara n’ọdịnihu.
“Ya mere, anyị ga-eme ya dịka iwu siri dị: anyị ga-ahụ na ọ nweghị ọrụ dị oke mkpa nke onye ọ bụla ga-akpaghasị n’agbanyeghị oke iwe” .
“E nwere ụzọ ndị ọzọ a na-esi eme okwu mgbe ha bilitere mana a naghị ekwe ka ha gbaa abụbụ ọrụ n’ihi na njem ụgbọ elu bụ ọrụ dị oke mkpa nke iwu kwadoro ugbu a” .
“Chee ma ọ bụrụ na e nwere onye ọrịa n’ụgbọelu ahụ, were ya na mmadụ na-aga okwu dị oke mkpa ma ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ na-aga ule ma e mesịa mmadụ anwụọ n’ihi iwe onye ọzọ.” N’ịdụ ndị ọrụ ọdụ ka ha were ohere ha nwetara na gọọmentị dozie esemokwu, Sirika siri ọnwụ na ọgbaghara n’ọdụ ụgbọ elu adịghị mma na agaghịkwa anabata ya ọzọ.
“Ntị anyị ghe oghe mgbe niile, gọọmentị na-ege ntị na mkpesa ọbụla yana enwere usoro maka ime ụdị mkpesa a.
“Ha kwesịrị ịkwụsị na nke a, ọ bụ ihe ọjọọ, anabataghị ya” .

O kwuru na ngụkọta ego akwadoro maka ọrụ a bụ N7,482,071,196.56.

Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari nọrọ Tuzdee mepee okporo ụgbọ oloko Lagos Blue Rail Line agba nke izizi ya, ma gbaa ụgbọ oloko site n’ọdụ ụgbọ Marina gaa nke National Theatre.
Onyeisiala nọ na njem ahụ, ya na Gọvanọ Lagos Steeti, Babajide Sanwo-Olu, osote ya bụ Dọkịnta Obafemi Hamzat, ndị otu Federal and State Executive Council, ndị otu Federal and State Legislative Assemblies, Onyeisi nke China Civil Engineering Construction (CCECC), Chen Sichang, ndị nta akụkọ na ndị ọzọ.
Akụkụ nke mbụ nke ọrụ a, nke Gọọmenti steeti mere, ogologo ya dị kilomita iri na atọ ma nwee ọdụ ụgbọ ise – Mile 2, Suru-Alaba, Orile Iganmu, National Theatre, na Marina.

Onyeisiala Naijiria, Muhammadu Buhari ga-aga njem ụbọchị abụọ na steeti Kano, ebe ọ ga-agbaghe ihe nrụpụta ọkụ latrik na nnukwu ụlọ ọgwụ ọrịa cancer.
Kọmishọna steeti ahụ na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi na ihe gbasara ime obodo bụ Mohamed Garba kwuru nke a na mkparịta ụka ya na ndị nta akụkọ nwere na Kano steeti.
O kwuru na ọrụ ọkụ latrik na ụlọ ọgwụ ọrịa cancer so n’ihe nrụpụta asaa a na-atụ anya na Onyeisiala ga-agbaghe na njem nleta abalị abụọ ọ ga-eme na steeti ahụ malite n’abalị iri atọ ruo na abalị iri atọ na otu nke ọnwa a.
Dị ka o si kwuo, ọrụ ngo Tiga dam ga-eme ka ọkụ dịkwuo mma n’ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche, ọrụ mmiri na steeti ahụ ọkachasị ụlọ ọrụ mmiri Tambrawa ma kwalite nchekwa, n’ihi na a ga-eji ya na-enye ife n’okporo ụzọ n’ime steeti ahụ.” O kwuru na nnukwu ụlọ ọgwụ ọrịa cancer ahụ bụ nke kachasị na West Africa, ga-eme ka ọ dị mfe ịnweta ọgwụgwọ ọrịa cancer n’ọnụ ala na mpaghara steeti ahụ ma gụnyekwa mba ndị agbata obi.
Ọ sịrị, “Ọ ga-ebelata njem ahụike maka ndị Naịjirịa na-aga mba ofesi maka ọgwụgwọ ọrịa cancer ma chekwaa ego mba ofesi maka obodo,” Onye isi ala Buhari ga-agbaghekwa ụlọ obibi nke ndị nkuzi iji belata ihe ịma aka ụlọ ebe obibi.
Ihe ndị ọzọ a ga-agbaghe n’oge njem nleta ahụ gụnyere: Dangote ultra-modern Skills Acquisition Center, Dala Dry Inland Port na ụlọ ọrụ ọkụ latrik enwetara n’anyanwu..
Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari akwadola imeghari n’ọkwa nke Maazị Aliyu Abubakar na Mazị John Asein dịka ndị Directors General otu Legal Aid Council of Nigeria (LACON) na Nigerian Copyright Commission, n’otu n’otu.
Nke a dị n’ozi nke Director Press and Public Relations Federal Ministry of Justice, Oriakụ Modupe Ogundoro wepụtara na Sunde n’Abuja.
Ogundoro kwuru na e megharịrị nhọpụta Abubakar maka oge nke abụọ na nke ikpeazụ ya ga abụ afọ anọ site n’akwụkwọ ozi Ref: PRES/97/HAGF/174 nke abalị iri na abụọ ọnwa Jenụwarị, 2023 dịka akụkụ nke 3 (1) na (2) nke Legal Aid Act, CAP.
N’otu aka ahụ, e megharịkwara nhọpụta Asein maka oge nke abụọ na nke ikpeazụ nke afọ anọ site na akwụkwọ ozi Ref: PRES/97/HAGF/175 nke abalị iri na abụọ ọnwa Jenụwarị, 2023 gbadoro ụkwụ na ngalaba 36 (1) na (2) nke iwu Nigerian Copyright Commission, CAP C28.
Ozi ahụ kwuru na mmeghari nke nhọpụta mmadụ abụọ bụ n’ihi ọrụ ọma nke ụlọ ọrụ abụọ ndị a.
N’otu aka ahụ, onyeisiala kwadokwara nhọpụta Mazi Abiodun Aikomo ka ọ bụrụ odeakwụkwọ ngalaba na-ahụ maka ikpe ziri ezi (Administration of Criminal Justice Monitoring Committee,ACJMC) maka ọchịchị mbụ nke afọ anọ (4) n’usoro nke 471 (2) nke iwu Administration of Criminal Justice Act (ACJA) 2015 site n’akwụkwọ ozi Ref: PRES/97/HAGF/173.
Nhọpụta nke Abubakar na Asein malitere dịba ire site n’abalị iri na abụọ onwa Jenụwarị, ebe nhọpụta nke Aikomo malitere ịdị irè site n’abalị iri na isii Jenụwarị 2023.
Dị ka ozi ahụ si kwuo, ụgwọ ọnwa ha na ọnọdụ ọrụ ndị ọzọ bụ ihe amapụtarala n’okpuru iwu Certain Political Office Holders Salaries and Allowances Act 2008.

Abum onye nchọcha omenala na omenkà lekwasịrị anya n’akụkọ ihe mere eme na ịma mma omenala Igbo.
Ana m akuzi akuko omenaala na nka nka Uri/Uli, nke bu ihe eji achọ mma oge ochie nke umu nwanyi igbo mebere n’ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria ugbua.
M na-eji ọrụ m dị ka olu maka nka Igbo nakwa dị ka ihe na-aga n’ihu n’ichepụta omenala Igbo na ịchọ mma, nke dị mwute ikwu na ọ fọrọ nke nta ka ọ laa n’iyi.
Obi dị m ụtọ na etinyere m aka na Equiano.Stories Project – ihe nkiri nwere ogologo ogologo na Instagram na Tiktok gbasara nna ochie Igbo bụ Olaudah Equiano- ebe m mere omenala Igbo na uri/uli na Ukara Ohuru.
Obi dịkwa m ụtọ na m malitere ọrụ “Ikenga Ọhụrụ” bụ ihe na-aga n’ihu n’usoro ọmụmụ mmụọ nke ndị Igbo bụ ndị Ikenga.

Ihe oru ngo a gosikwara n’ime mbipụta dịka akwụkwọ akụkọ Gida, na na fim.

Ihe mere nwanyi ji alu nwanyi n’ala IGBO.
1)Nwaanyị di ya nwụrụ ma ha amụtaghị nwa.
2)Nwaanyị ya na di ya enweghị ike ịmụta nwa.
3)Nwaanyị e merela omenala ka ọ bụrụzie nwoke.
4)Nwaanyị chiri echichi pụrụ iche..
Oria nkuchi akpo.(Diptheria) Ihe ụfọdụ mmadụ ga-eji ama na o nwere ọrịa gụnyere: ahụọkụ, azụzụ, ọnya akpịrị, ụkwara , anya ọbara ọbara nakwa akpịrị ịza aza.
Etu ọrịa Diphteria si efesa Onye nwere ike ibute ọrịa a? Ozi ịdọ aka na ntị NCDC dọrọ ndị nne na nna aka na ntị ka ha gbaa mbọ hụ na ha gbara ụmụ ha ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa diphtheria ugboro atọ dịka ọ dị n’usoro agbamụ ụmụaka ọgwụ mgbochi nke Naijiria.
Ụlọọrụ ahụ dụkwara ndị ọrụ ahụike ọdụ ka ha kee ngwụcha ma bere ebrer enyo ọrịa ọbụla yiri ‘diphteria’.
Onye ọ bụla na-arịa ahụ nwere njiri mara ọrịa ‘diphteria gddopụ onwe ya iche ma wegara ndị ọrụ ahụike n’okpuru ọchịchị ya ozi maọbụ bekuo ụlọrụ ha.
Onye isi oche Kọmịshọn na-ahụ maka ọnụọgụgụ mmadụ na Naijiria (National Population Commission, NPC), bụ Nasir Kwarra ekwela ụmụ amaala nkwa na ọnụ ọgụgụ nke afọ a ga-abụ nke doro anya ma na-enweghị wuru wuru.
Onye isi oche NPC, bụ onye nyere mmesi obi ike mgbe ọ na-agwa ndị nta akụkọ okwu na State House, mgbe ya na Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari zutere n’ụlọ obibi Onyeisiala dị n’Abuja, na Friday, kwukwara na nka-na-ụzụ ga-eme ka o siere onye ọ bụla ike imetọ ihe omume ahụ.
N’ajụjụ ọnụ sitere n’aka ndị nta akụkọ, Kwarra kwuru na mmemme ahụ ga-adị iche na nke ndị gara aga nke nghọtahie mebiri n’ihi na kọmishịon ahụ ga-eji teknụzụ dị egwu, gụnyere Global Positioning System (GPS) na onyonyo satịlaịtị, ma kwupụta na ụlọ ọ bụla dị n’ime mba ahụ enwetalarị code maka mmemme a.
“Ngụkọta ọnụ ọgụgụ a ga-adị iche na ngụkọ ndị gara aga.
Ozizi na omume bụ otu ihe ahụ, mana anyị na-eji teknụzụ dị elu na-eme ọnụ ọgụgụ a ebe mmadụ agaghị enwe ike imebi ọnụ ọgụgụ ọ bụla.
Ọ dịghị onye a ga-agụ karịrị otu ugboro.

Anyị aghaghị ịdị n’otu iji hụ na ihe ndi a dị ize ndụ agaghị eweta ọnọdụ ndị na-eyi ntuli aka na-abịanụ egwu.

Ọrụ a bụ isi na nkwekọrịta dị n’etiti gọọmentị na ụmụ amaala.
Dịka ndị ọchịchị n’ime obodo na mpaghara anyị dị iche iche, anyị ga-emerịrị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ziri ezi.
Anyị ga-ahụkwa na okwu anyị na omume anyị bụ nke agaghị ebute enweghị nchekwa ma ọlị.
Nke a bụ ọrụ iwu kwadoro nke anyị agaghị esi na ya pụọ”.

Onye isi otu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, Mallam Mele Kyari, kwupụtara nke a mgbe Gọvanọ steeti ahụ bụ Maazị Abdullahi Sule duuru ndị nnọchi anya ụmụafọ steeti ahụ ama ama na njem nkwanye ugwu na NNPC Ltd dị n’Abuja wee kwuo na nsonaazụ mnyocha na-egosi na e nwere nnukwu akụrụngwa mmanụ n’ime ala na steeti ahụ.
Ọ kpọrọ oku ka e mee ngwa ngwa na ọrụ a n’ihi na enweela mbelata na ntinye ego na mmanụ ọkụ n’ụwa gbaa gburugburu.
“Aghaghị ịrụ ọrụ a ngwa ngwa n’ihi na ụwa dum na-apụ na mmanụ ọkụ n’ihi mgbanwe ike, ma ọ bụghị etu a, afọ iri site ugbu a, ọ dịghị onye ga-ekweta itinye ego na azụmahịa mmanụ belụsọ na ọ na-abịa site n’akpa ego gị” Mallam Kyari kwuru.
Ọ gbakwụnyere na nkwado obodo na gburugburu dị mma bụ isi ihe na-eme ka ọrụ na-aga nke ọma na mpaghara ahụ iji zere ahụmahụ nke e nwetara na Niger Delta.
Na nzaghachi ya, Gọvanọ Sule kelere GCEO maka ezi mmalite mmepụta mmanụ na ọrụ mmepe nke Kolmani Integrated nke Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari bidoro na Nọvemba afọ 2022.
“Achọrọ m ikele ụnụ, ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ NNPC na gọọmenti etiti maka ihe ụnụ mere na Kolmani, maka ndị na-amaghị ihe ụnụ meere Naijiria, aha ụnụ adịghịzị nchezọ.” Gọvanọ Sule kwuru.
Ọ jara Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari mma maka nkwado ya ma kwe NNPC nkwa gburugburu dị mma.
Ndị sonyere Gọvanọ ahụ na njem nleta ahụ bụ osote Gọvanọ, Dọkịta Emmanuel Akabe, onye isi oche otu All Progressive Congress na onye isi ọchịchị mbụ nke steeti ahụ, Senator Abdullahi Adamu, onye bu ya ụzọ, Senator Tanko Almakura, Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi, Mohammed Hassan Abdullahi, Emir of Lafia, HRH Justice Sidi Bage Muhammad, na ndị isi ndị ọzọ..
Aka na-achị Osun steeti bụ Ademola Adeleke etoola Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari maka inye nkwado ya na iwu ntuliaka ọhụrụ maka Naịjirịa.
Gọvanọ ahụ nyere ekele ahụ n’Abuja n’ụbọchị Fraịde, mgbe ọ na-agwa ndị nta akụkọ State House okwu mgbe ọ gara njem nleta nkwanye ugwu nye onye ndu Naijiria.
Gọvanọ ahụ, bụ onye nọ n’ụlọ ọrụ Onyeisiala nke mbụ ya kemgbe ọ malitere ọchịchị n’ọnwa Nọvemba afọ gara aga, kwuru na iwu ahụ nyere ohere maka nhọpụta ziri ezi nke butere nhọpụta ya dịka Gọvanọ steeti Osun.
Gọvanọ Adeleke kwuru na mwepụta nke iwu ntuli aka ọhụrụ a agbanweela echiche zuru ụwa ọnụ gbasara Naijiria.
Ọ sịrị: “Kemgbe nhoputa m, ọ dị m ka m bịa kelee Maazị Onyeisiala ma kelee ya maka ibinye aka n’akwụkwọ iwu ntuli aka n’ihi na m ritere uru na ya.
“Ụzọ ahụ emeghere maka ntuli aka n’efu na nke ziri ezi na mba ụwa na-eto Naijiria na a kwadoro Naijiria maka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya.
“Ya mere m ji nọrọ ebe a taa; ịhụ ya, kelee ya ma na-arịọ maka ọdịmma ya n’oge fọdụrụ n’ọchịchị ya.” O kwuru na steeti Osun na-atụ anya nkwado n’aka gọọmenti etiti, ka ọ gara njem nleta a.
“Ọ dịghị ihe anyị kwurịtara nke ukwuu, nke ahụ bụ isi ihe kpatara ya.
Anyị kelere ụfọdụ ihe ndị ọzọ m nyeferela, a ga m ahụ onye isi ndị ọrụ ka anyị kparịta maka ụzọ gọọmentị etiti ga-esi nyere steeti Osun aka,”  ọ gbakwụnyere..
Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu dị n’Abuja-Nigeria akagbuola mkpegharị ikpe abụọ nke otu onye na-achọ ịzọ ọkwa gọvanọ People’s Democratic Party (PDP) n’ihu ya bụ Otunba Jimi Lawal.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Otunba Jimi Lawal Ọkaikpe Kudirat Kekere-Ekun kagburu mkpegharị ikpe abụọ a ka onye ọkaiwu onye mkpegharị ikpe, Chukwudi Enebeli kwụsịrị.
Lawal na onye isi otu PDP na steeti Ogun bụ Maazị Oladipupo Adebutu nọ n’okwu ikpe siri ike maka onye ga-efesa ọkọlọtọ pati ahụ na ntuliaka gọvanọ na-abịa.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Otú ọ dị, a kwadoro nkwado Adebutu ka ọ kwụsịrị ikpe Jimi Lawal n’Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu na Ụlọikpe Mkpegharị.
                                                                       N’otu oge ahụ, Lawal etinyela akwụkwọ mkpesa abụọ a na-ama aka iji akwụkwọ ndekọ ụlọ ikpe nke ndị ọzọ na-ebufe na usoro usoro ịnakwere na iji ndekọ a na-ese okwu.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     N’okwu ikpe nke Wenezde, otu ndị ọka ikpe ise nke ndị ọka ikpe nke ụlọikpe kacha elu mere ka ndụmọdụ onye na-arịọ arịrịọ na-ajụ ajụjụ banyere ọchịchọ nke ịchụso mkpesa mkparịta ụka na-efunahụ isi okwu ahụ.
                                                                                                                                               Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Ọkaikpe Kudirat Kekere-Ekun nọ n’isi ya gwara ndị ọkaiwu ahụ na ụlọikpe ahụ enweghị oge okomoko ọ ga-eji na-etinye akwụkwọ na mkpegharị ikpe tupu ya abịa n’okwu ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                            Ha dọtara uche nke onye ọka iwu n’eziokwu ahụ bụ na mkpesa nke onye na-arịọ arịrịọ na-ewe oge na a ghaghị ime ya n’ogo dị mkpa kama ịgbasa ume na ndị na-emekọrịta ihe.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Enebeli onye kwuru na ya nwetara ma ghọta ihe ndị ọkaikpe mechara tinye akwụkwọ maka iwepụ akwụkwọ mkpesa ahụ.
                                                 Ụlọ ikpe kacha elu gwara onye ndụmọdụ ka ọ gaa n’ihu ka a ga-esi weta isi okwu ahụ n’ụlọ ikpe n’ime oge iwu nyere..
Otu Union of African Shippers’ Council (UASC) na Nigerian Shipper’s Council (NSC) ga-eme ụbọchị ndị na-ebu ụgbọ mmiri ụbọchị atọ malite abali iri na isii ruo abali iri na asato nke onwa Jenụwarị.
                                                                                                                                                                                 Ememe a, bụ nke Federal Ministry of Transportation na-akwado bụ onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari ga-emepe emepe.
                                                    Isiokwu ọmụmụ ihe ọmụmụ a bụ “Agreement Trade Free Trade Agreement Africa Continental Free Trade Agreement (AfCFTA): Ọ bụ ezigbo ikpo okwu maka ndị na-ebu ụgbọ mmiri n’Afrịka ka ha na-abanye n’ahịa zuru ụwa ọnụ.”                                                                                                                                   N’oge mmemme ahụ, a na-atụ anya na ndị otu UASC ga-enyocha AfCFTA na iwepụta usoro ụzọ maka otu esi edozi nsogbu ndị ahụ..
Ihe karịrị ụlọ ọrụ ọgwụ puku ato na-arụ ọrụ karịrị usoro n’ofe Naịjirịa ka ndị otu Kansụl Na-ahụ Maka Ọgwụ Naijirịa kwaturu.
Onye na-edeba aha nke Council Pharmaciutical Of Nigeria, PCN, Pharmacist Ibrahim Ahmed bụ onye kwuru nke a n’oge nleta nkwanye ùgwù na Gọvanọ nke Niger State Abubakar Sani Bello, kwuru na Kansụl amalitelarị ndụmọdụ maka imechi ahịa ọgwụ na-emeghe na mba ahụ.
                                                                       “Ndị kansụl ahụ zubere iji dochie anya ahịa ọgwụ ndị mepere emepe na ụlọ ọrụ a na-achịkọta ọnụ ebe ọha na eze na ndị na-ere ahịa nwere ike ịnweta ọgwụ ndị a na-achịkwa,” ka o kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                  Gọvanọ steeti Naịja, Abubakar Bello bụ onye nwere ekele maka nleta ndị ọrụ PCN, jara ha mma maka itinye ụkpụrụ omume ha n’ọrụ ha n’iwepụ ire ọgwụ na-edeghị akwụkwọ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Ọ gara n’ihu kpọkuo kansụl ahụ ka ha na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma ụkpụrụ omume ha ruo na nke ikpeazụ n’ihi na iji ọgwụ ọjọọ eme ihe n’etiti ndị mmadụ karịsịa ndị ntorobịa eruola ọnụ ọgụgụ dị egwu.
                                                                                                                                                                                                        “Achọrọ m ịrịọ kansụl a ka ọ manye iwu na iwu gị n’ihi na ugbu a, onye ọ bụla nwere ike ịga ụlọ ahịa ọgwụ ọ bụla zụta ọgwụ ọ bụla ọ chọrọ.
                          “Achọrọ m ikwere na Kansụl a bụ ọrụ ịhụ na a na-eme ụkpụrụ omume nke ndị na-ere ọgwụ niile dịka akwụkwọ si kwuo.
                                                     N’oge na-adịbeghị anya, anyị enweela ọtụtụ ndị na-ere ọgwụ na gburugburu ebe ha na-etinyekwu aka n’ịre ndị ntorobịa anyị ọgwụ,” ka o kwuru.
      Gọvanọ bụ onye kelekwara onye na-edeba aha ọhụrụ na onye isi oche nke Council Pharmacists Ibrahim Ahmed na nhọpụta ya, gwara onye na-edebanye aha ọhụrụ ka ọ mee Niger State mpako ma bụrụ onye nnọchiteanya kwesịrị ekwesị nke sitere na steeti Niger.
                                                   Onye isi oche mba PCN na onye isi ndị nnọchiteanya ahụ, Pharmacist Ahmed Morah kwuru na ha nọ na steeti Niger iji kelee Gọvanọ maka nhọpụta onye Nigerlite, Pharmacist Ibrahim Ahmed, dịka onye na-edeba aha na onye isi ụlọ ọrụ nke kansụl ọgwụ na Nigeria.
                                                             O kwuru na ya bụ onye mbụ na-ere ọgwụ sitere Niger steeti a họpụtara dịka onye na-edeba aha na onye isi oche nke PCN.
                                                      Ọ jakwara ndị na-ahụ maka ọgwụ na steeti ahụ mma maka ịbụ ndị a ma ama n’ọrụ ahụ.
                                                                                                             Onye isi oche PCN mba ahụ kelekwara gọọmentị steeti maka nnukwu onyinye na nkwado ọ na-enye n’ọrụ ahụ..
Ọtụtụ ndị ọnụ n’eru n’okwu na pati APC Enugwu abịaghị achụm nta votu maka onye isi ala Naijiria nke Sinatọ Bola Ahmed Tinubu mere ụnyịahụ bụ wed 11th January 2022.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Isi okwu bụ na nsogbu dị ukwuu ebutela nkewa na APC Enugwu, nke na ọtụtụ n’ime ha ekwenyeghị na nhọpụta emere wepụta Ọka ikpe Ugo Agballa dịka onye isi pati ahụ n’Enugwu nakwa ọtụtụ nsogbu ndị ọzọ.
Ndị a iwe dị n’obi kewapụrụ onwe ha gụnyere, Minister n’ahụ maka Mba ọzọ bụ Geoffrey Onyeama, onye bubu Senate President, Ken Nnamani, Aka chiburu Enugwu bụ Ọka Ikpe Sullivan Chime, onye ndụmọdụ President Buhari na ihe gbasara Ikpe bụ Juliet Ibekaku, onye jibu ọkwa onye is pati APC n’Enugwu bụ Ben Nwoye, Emperor Baywood Ibe n’ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ.
Nsogbu APC n’Enugwu dịzị ka ihe dị ime ma kwọrọ nwa n’azụ n’ihi na ọbụghị nani na ndị nwere agba akwadoghị nhọpụta Ugo Agballa dịka onye isi Patị n’Enugwu, ha bokwara ya ebubo na orela ụlọ ejiri mara APC na GRA Enugwu ma kwaga ndị ọrụ ebe ọzọ.
                                                                   Ebubo ọzọkwa na ebute nnukwu nsogbu na pati Ahụ bụ ka ha siri kee ego karịrị out ijeri dollar bụ ego ha nwetara n’aka pati.
Okpara Square ejughị eju Ndị gbakọrọ n’Ọkpara Square, Enugwu maka achụmta vootu Bola Tinu ehighị nne Ndị otu pati APC pụtara ịnabata ma kwado Seneto Tinubu mana ha ejughị eju ka a tụrụ anya n’ihi na ha ofu obi anọghịzị.
N’okwu ya, Gọvanọ Hope Uzodimma yọrọ Tinubu mgbaghara na ndị mmadụ apụtaghị etu ha kwesiri.
Uzodimma kwuru na site taa gaba na ya ga atinyesi aka ike ịhụ na ndị mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ n’enye nkwado ha.
Ndị ozo kwugasịrị okwu na ya bụ mme mme were yọ ndị igbo ka ha tinyere Tinubu votu gunyere Gọvanọ Ebonyi Dave Umahi, APC governorshi candidate Ebonyi, Ognonna Nwifuru, onye na azọ gọvanọ Enugwu Uche Nnaji, Sinato Andy Uba, Adams Oshiomale, Abike Dabirj na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ..
Otu na-ahụ maka ntuliaka nke Naijiria, Independent National Electoral Commission, INEC akatọọla ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ala maka ịnakọta akwụkwọ ikike ịtụ vootu na-adịgide adịgide, PVC na Cross River State, South-south Nigeria.
                                                                                                                                         Onye isi ngalaba na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ na-agụ voter na mgbasa ozi n’ụlọ ọrụ kọmishọna dị na Calabar, Anthonia Nwobi kwuru na ka ụbọchị Sọnde, Jenụwarị 8, 2023, enwetala PVC erughị puku iri n’afọ 2019.
                                                                                                                                                     Nwobi, onye nyere nkọwapụta nke PVC ndị anakọtara ugbu a na ndị ka nọ na kọmitii ahụ, gosiri na ihe ịma aka dị na usoro nkesa nwere ike jikọta ya na mkpu na-adịgide adịgide maka INEC ka ọ na-ekesa kaadị ndị ntuli aka na ọkwa ntuli aka kama.
                                                                  “Dịka na Jenụwarị 8 2023, ọnụ ọgụgụ nke kaadị ndị ntuli aka na-adịgide adịgide nke afọ 2019, PVC, anakọtara bụ naanị 8,045 n’ime 97,381 ndị kọmishọna natara.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Ọzọkwa, site na ndebanye aha ọhụrụ nke PVC dị n’afọ 2021/2022 anyị mere na Cross River steeti ngụkọta kaadị 233,481 bụ naanị 68,073 ka ewetere.
    Dị ka ya si kwuo,”anyị nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ala maka nchịkọta PVC maka ndị mmadụ, bụ ndị na-enyefekwa.
Kọmishọna ahụ nwetara ngwa 70,474 maka mbufe na 2021/2022.
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, naanị PVC 17,824 ka anakọtara.
                                                                                                                                              Nke a dị oke ogbenye n’agbanyeghị mbọ niile anyị na-agba na ime ka ọha na eze mara.”                                                                                                              Ihe ịma aka Onyeisi ngalaba mmụta gbasara ntuliaka na mgbasa ozi kwuru na kama ịga ngalaba dị iche iche dịka INEC siri kwupụta, ndị mmadụ na-etiku ka kọmishọna were nkesa PVC gaa na ngalaba ntuliaka.
                                                                                                                                                          “Ndị mmadụ anaghị apụta nke ọma n’agbanyeghị mmata na mgbasa ozi siri ike.
                                                                                                                            N’akụkụ ahụ, anyị agaala n’ókè nke ibunye ndị na-eti mkpu n’obodo n’ime ebe obibi iji gwa ndị mmadụ.
                                                                        N’agbanyeghị nke ahụ, ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị bịaranụ adịghị agba ume ma ọlị,” ka ọ kwara n’arịrị.
                                                                                                             Ọ gbakwara n’ihu sị, “Enwere mkpu maka INEC ka wepụrụ ebe a na-anakọta PVC na ngalaba ntuli aka n’agbanyeghị na anyị akwagala na ngalaba.   Ihe ịma aka ọzọ anyị na-enwe bụ nrụgide ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ na-etinye na ndị ọrụ nkesa INEC ka ha hapụ PVC di ha, ụmụ ha, ndị enyi ha na ihe ndị ọzọ, nke megidere amụma INEC.”                                                                                                                                                                                                                         N’ịkọwa n’ihu, “Ọ bụrụ na a na-ahụ anyị ka anyị na-emebi iwu nke anyị gbasara nchịkọta PVC, ndị mmadụ ga-atụgharị na-ebo ndị ọrụ ahụ ebubo imebi ma ọ bụ na-agbalị ime ka ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị kwadoro.
                                                                                                                                                                 Ya mere, kama ịrapagidesi ike na iwu, ndị mmadụ na-enwe nrụgide siri ike na ndị ọrụ nkesa ka ha na-anakọta PVC ndị ikwu ha.
                                        Ọ gaghị ekwe omume.
“N’ikpeazụ, ndị mmadụ enweghị ndidi na ha agaghị achọ ịgbaso usoro nchịkọta PVC na centres.
                                                         Ugbu a, anyị na-arịọ ndị anyị ka ha soro anyị rụọ ọrụ, kwado mbọ anyị.
Anyị nwere kaadị ndị sitere na 2019, 2021 na 2022 ndebanye aha ọhụrụ dị njikere maka nchịkọta.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    “Ndị mmadụ kwesịrị, biko gaa na ngalaba nkesa ward maka ịnakọta.
                                                                                                                                                   Ọ bụrụ na ha na-agbaso usoro ahụ, a ga-aga ha n’ime nkeji iri na ise ma ọ bụ ihe na-erughị ya, ha ga-enwekwa ike ịlaghachi n’ihe ọ bụla ha na-eme.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       E wezụga nke ahụ, anyị na-eme ihe ndị a niile ka anyị wee ghara inwe ọgbaghara, “ka ọ gbakwụnyere..
Ndị ọrụ mbata na ọpụpụ Naijiria NIS na-ekwu na ha na-agba mbọ ịnye akwụkwọ ikike ngafe n’etiti izu atọ na isii ka ejidechara biometric, ebe enweghị ọrụ nka ma ọ bụ mmejọ ngwa.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Onye nkwuchite ọnụ NIS, Maazi.
Tony Akuneme, na nkwupụta na Abuja, kwuru nke a Comptroller-General, NIS, Maazị Isa Jere, na-ekwu nke a na mmeghe nke ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta e-Passport kwalitere na Kano na Wednesday.
                                                                                                                                Jere, onye nọchitere anya na mmemme ahụ site n’aka onye enyemaka Comptroller-General, Passport, Sadat Hassan, kwuru na a ga-enweta oge izu atọ ruo isii, naanị mgbe enweghị nkwekọrịta na NIN nke ndị na-achọ akwụkwọ.
                                                                                                                                     C-G, bụ onye gosipụtara afọ ojuju maka nzaghachi dị mma sitere na ụlọ ọrụ paspọtụ dị iche iche na mba ahụ, kwuru na nke a gosiri na ndị Naijiria nwere ekele maka atụmatụ ọhụrụ ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                          O kwusiri ike na NIN ka bụ iwu maka inye akwụkwọ ikike ngafe na ozi dị n’akwụkwọ abụọ ahụ ga-adakọrịrị.
                                                                              “Anyị na-ekwughachi ọnọdụ anyị na ndị na-achọ paspọtụ kwesịrị biko zere iji ndị ọzọ mana gaa na ntanetị mee ngwa / ịkwụ ụgwọ ha onwe ha ka ọ bụrụ paspọtụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  O kwuru, “Anyị ga-aga n’ihu na-anagide ihe ịma aka nke ndị na-enupụ isi yana akwa ọjọọ ole na ole n’etiti ndị ọrụ na-agba mbọ imebi usoro mgbanwe ahụ,” ka o kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                               O ji ohere ahụ dọọ ndị ọha na eze aka na ntị maka arụrụ arụ arụrụ arụ nke otu òtù raket a bụ ndị gara n’ihu na-ekesa ozi adịgboroja nke mmemme mbanye ndị mbata na ọpụpụ mbata na ọpụpụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                               O kwuru, “Ọrụ ahụ anaghị ewe ndị ọrụ n’oge a, ọ ga-ebipụtakwa ụdị ọrụ a dịka ọ na-adị, oge ọ bụla anyị nwetara nkwado gọọmentị etiti maka mbanye,” ka o kwuru.

Gọọmenti Ogun steeti dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naijiria ewepụtala akwụkwọ mmefu ego nke afọ 2023, na-ekwu na a ga-eji ma Internally Generated Revenue, IGR na oke nke ọnwa ọ bụla sitere na akaụntụ gọọmenti etiti.
                                                                                                                                          Gọọmenti steeti ahụ gbakwara ọchịchị ime obodo abụọ dị na steeti ahụ maka ịchọgharị mmanụ dịka akụkụ nke ụzọ ha ga-esi na-enweta ego n’ụgwọ mmefu ego ya.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ego na steeti ahụ bụ Dapo Okubadejo kwuru nke a n’Abeokuta bụ isi obodo steeti ahụ n’oge ọgbakọ mgbasa ozi na-eme nrụrụaka gbasara nbibi ego.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Okubadejo kwuru na atumatu gọọmentị iji kwụọ ụgwọ mmefu ego nke afọ a bụ N472b, kwuru na “ijeri naira 210 ga-esi n’ụlọ ọrụ Internally Generated Revenue; N128bn sitere na nnata isi obodo na ego nke kọmitii na-ekenye akaụntụ Federal ka a na-atụpụta ego maka mmefu ego.
                               “IGR anyị, oke nke gọọmentị etiti na-aghọ nke a na-apụghị ịdabere na ya na akwụkwọ nnata ego anyị ga-eji kwụọ ụgwọ mmefu ego anyị.
                      Anyị ga-eji mmanụ anyị eme ihe na Tongeji Island na Ogun waterside area nke steeti ahụ,” Kọmishọna kọwara.

                    Profaịlụ Dept Okubadejo kwuru na steeti ahụ nwere nnukwu ụgwọ ụgwọ n’ihi na steeti ahụ nwere ike n’ụzọ akụ na ụba ibu ibu ụgwọ.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Okubadejo bụ onye jikwa okpukpu abụọ dịka onye ndụmọdụ aka na-achị steeti Ogun bụ Dapo Abiodun kwuru na ịnata mbinye abụghị nsogbu, mana ọ bụrụ na a ga-eji mbinye ego ahụ mee ihe nke ọma maka ọdịmma ụmụ amaala.
                                                                                                                        Okubadejo kọwara na, ọnụ ahịa mgbanwe na-abawanye amụbaala ọkwa ụgwọ steeti ahụ, na-ekwu na ọchịchị gara aga ekwupụtaghịkwa ụgwọ ezumike nka na ụgwọ gratuity nke steeti ahụ, bụ nke o kwuru na nyekwara aka n’ịbawanye ọkwa ụgwọ steeti ahụ.

Dịka ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị uweojii Edo Steeti bụ Chidi Nwabuzor si kwuo, “ọ bụ ndị na-eche ịbanye ụgbọ oloko si Benin aga Warri na Delta Steeti ka ndị ọchịehi a wakporo.
Nwabuzor kwuru na ya bụ ihe mere n’ebe elekere anọ nke ehihie ụbọchị Satọde,abali asaa nke obnwa Disemba.
“Ndị ọchịehi bucha AK47 wakporo ọdọ ụgbọ oloko ma bido ịgbali egbe elu.
Ha tọọrọ ụfọdụ n’ime ndị njem banye n’ime ọhịa,” ka Nwabuzor kwuru n’akwụkwọ ozi ahụ nke ntaakuko hụrụ.
“Ndị uweojii abanyela n’ime ọhịa ahụ ugbua iji chọta ndị ahụ a tọọro.” Mgbe ndi ntaakuko kpọrọ Chidi Nwabuzor n’ekwentị n’ụtụtụ Sọnde, o kwuru na ọ bụ ya zipuru ozi ahụ iji mee ka ndị mmadụ mata ihe merenụ, ka obi ha dajụọ maka na ọtụtụ akụkọ ụgha na-efesa.
“Mana anyị ka na-eme nnyocha, anyị ga-ezipụta ozi nke zuru oke n’oge adịghị anya,” ka o kwuru.
Nwabuzor kwuru na amabeghị ọnụọgụgụ ndị mmadụ a tọọrọ na mwakpo a, “mana onyeisi ndị uweojii na mpaghara Irrua, onyeisi ụlọọrụ ndị uweojii dị n’Igueben, ndị otu nche ‘Edo State Security Network, ndị nche ime obodo, nakwa ndị dinta agaala n’ebe ya bụ ihe mere kpọmkwem iji mee ka nchekwa laghachi n’ebe ahụ”.

Atiku kwuru nke a n’ụbọchị Sọnde site n’akara Twitter ya dịka akụkọ pụtara na ndị ọchịehi tọọrọ ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ ma merụkwa ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ ahụ n’ọdọ ụgbọ oloko dị n’Igueben, Edo Steeti.
“Mwakpo a egosila ihe o ji dị mkpa ka anyị mee ọsịsọ hazigharịa atụmatụ nchekwa obodo anyị iji chekwaa ndụ na akụnụba ndị mmadụ,” Atiku kwuru.
“Otu ụzọ anyị nwereike isi mee nke a bụ imegharị iwu anyị iji nye ohere ka steeti dị icheiche nwee ndị uweoji nke ha.
“Ọ jọgburu onwe ya na ndị oyi ndụ egwu ka enwe atụmatụ ịwakpo ndị mmadụ, kpaa ya bụ nkata ma hazichaa ihe niile ha ga-ahazi iji hụ na mezuru atụmatụ ha, na-enweghị otu ọbụla ndị ọrụ nchekwa ga-esi gbochie ha.” Atiku kwuru na ọ dị mkpa ka Naịjiria nweta akụrụngwa Tekịnụzụ ọgbara ọhụrụ iji gbochie ụdị mwakpo ọjọọ a.
“Anyị kwesịkwara ịgba mbọ wetuo ọnụọgụgụ ụmụaka na-anaghị aga akwụkwọ bụ ndị na-awagharị n’ime obodo anyị, iji gbochie ha isonyere ndị otu oyiegwu.” “Ekwenyere m na ọ bụrụ na anyị tinye ihe ndị a niile n’ọrụ, ọnọdụ nchekwa obodo anyị ga-aka mma, mekwaa ka ọnọdụ akụnụba anyị gbalite.” Ihe mere mbụ emeela ọzọ Ime ụgbọ oloko Abuja-Kaduna dịka ndị ojiegbe wakpochara ya na Maachị 2022 Mwakpo nke a na-abịa n’ihe erubeghị otu afọ ụdị mwakpo a mere n’Abuja, n’ọnwa Maachị afọ 2022.

Ha ji ogbunigwe gbarie okporo ụgbọ oloko ahụ nke mere ka ya bụ ụgbọ oloko daa, ha wee malite ịkwa ya mgbọ.
Tupu ndị agha abịaruo ebe ahụ, ndị ekperima ahụ emchaala ihe ha chọrọ ime ma chịkọrọ ndị mmadụ gbakpuo n’ime ọhịa.
Ụfọdụ n’ime ndị ahụ a tọọrọ nọrọ ihe ruru otu afọ n’aka ndị omekome ahụ tupu a gbapụta ha.
Mmadụ iri abuo na ato ikpeazụ a tọọrọ na mwakpo a nweere onwe ha Akụkọ kwuru ndị ntọrị ahụ nara otu narị nde naịra maka otu onye n’ime mmadị 63 ha tọọrọ na mwakpo ahụ.
Naanị otu ọnwa gara aga,abali ise nke onwa Disemba  2022, ka njem malitekwara ọzọ n’okporo ụgbọ oloko Abuja-Kaduna..
Onyeisiala mba Senegal etinyela iru uju abalị atọ n’ihi ihe mberede nke tara isi mmadu iri ano,ma meruo otutu mmadu ahu.
Ihe ruru mmadụ iri ano allala mmụọ dịka ụgbọala bụs abụọ takọtara isi na mba Senegal.
Nnyocha ndị ọrụ nchekwa okporoụzọ gosiri na ọ bụ ụkwụ taya otu n’ime ụgbọala ahụ gbara nke mere ka ụgbọala ahụ tụgharịa ma kụọ ụgbọala nke na-abịa n’ihu ya.
Ihe ruru mmadụ iri asato na asaa merụkwara ahụ n’ụzọ dị icheiche n’ihe mberede a bụ nke ndị ọrụ nchekwa na-ekwu na ọ bụ ihe mberede kacha njọ n’ime ọtụtụ afọ.
Onyeisiala Macky Sall etinyela abalị atọ iji ruo uju maka ndị nwụrụ n’ihe mberede a ma kwe nkwa na gọọmentị ga-etinye atụmatụ dị icheiche maka nchekwa ndị njem.
Ụlọakụ etiti nke ala Naịjirịa ekwuola na akụkọ na-efegharị n’igwe nzirikota ozi soshal midia nke na-ekwu na naịra ọhụrụ ha wepụtara na-aṅacha aṅacha bụ asị ọcha.
Ha kwuru nke a site n’akwụkwọ ozi nke otu onye isi ha bụ Ahmed Halilu wepụtara, ma kọwaa na ọ bụkwa usoro ha si ebipụtabu naịra nke ochie ka ha sikwa pipụta nke ọhụrụ a.
Halilu kọwara sị: “Anyị chọrọ ịkọwara ụmụ Naịjirịa niile na…naịra nke ọhụrụ a na nke ochie dịbu mbụ, e nwereike ịkpọ ha otu ihe, ọ bụrụ na i were ha tee n’akwa ọcha, ị ga-ahụ ụcha ‘intaglio ink’, mana ọ pụtaghị na ọ na-aṅacha aṅacha.” “Otu njirimara ‘intaglio ink’ bụ na ọ naghị agbaze agbaze na mmiri, ọ na-etesakwa n’ihe ọbụla na-acha ụcha n’ihi etu e si rụpụta ya.” “Ihe a bụ njirimara akwụkwọ ego niile iji mee ka ha dị iche n’ego adịgboroja.
“Naịra bụ akwụkwọ ego anyị ma bụrụkwa otu n’ime njirimara Naịjiria.
N’ihi nke a, anyị na-akpọku ụmụ Naịjirịa ka ha kwụsị iji ego naịra eme nnyochapụta iji chọpụta ma ọ na-aṅacha ka ọ bụ ọnaghị aṅacha.”.
Ọnwa Jenụwarị abịala ọzọ ka ihe mberede nye ụfọdụ.
Oriri na aṅụrị so ezumike ekeresimesi alaala n’ike.
Mbido afọ na-abụkarị oge ọtụtụ ji eche echiche maka ndụ ha ma malite itinye usoro ga-agbanwe ihe ndị ha achọghịzị na ndụ ha.
Nlebanya n’ahụike ọkachasị n’okwu igbasiike na-esokarị n’ihe dị mkpa ndị mmadụ na-ezubekarị ime kwa mbido afọ ọbụla mana ọtụtụ na-ahapụ ya bụ atụmatụ tupu ọnwa Jenụwarị agwụ.
Lee ihe ga-enyere gị aka ichuso ma nweta atụmatụ igbasiike nakwa ụdịrị ahụ ị chọrọ n’afọ 2023 a.
Nlebanya na nrị: Ndị ọkamụta n’ihe gbara nri ekwuola nrị bụ Ọ’ gwọ m n’ọrịa’ kacha mkpa karịa ọtụtụ ọgwụ.
Otu nwaada bụ ọkaibe n’okwu nri na etu o si edozi ahụ (Dietician) bụ Rose Okafor gwara ndi ntaakuo “Ọ bụrụ na ị chọọ ịbu ibu maọbụ ịtalata ahụ, nrị bụ ụzọ kacha mfe iji mee nke a” O kwuru “Nlebanya na nrị na-edozi ahụ(nutritious food), nri ọnatara chi (organic food), ị hapụ nrị ndị emegharịarị emegharị ma gbaa na mkpọ (processed/canned food) so n’ụzọ mmadụ ga-esi hụ na ọ belatara oke ibu.” Okafor gakwara n’ihu kwuo “Iri oke shuga nakwa nnu bụ ihe dị mkpa ịtọgbọ ma ọ bụrụ na ị chọrọ ịgbasi ike maọbụ talata ahụ.” Ọ kọwara na oke ibu na-akpara mmadụ ọtụtụ ọrịa dịka ọrịa shuga, ọrịa obi, ọrịa akpụ bụ kansa nakwa ndatu ahụike ndị ọzọ.
O gara n’ihu kwuo “Ezigbo nri ọkachasị nke ọnatarachi na-ahụ na ndị mmadụ gbasiri ike ma nweta ụdịrị ahụ ha chọrọ.
Ma ndị chọrọ ịbu ibu maọbụ ịta ahụ.” Iri nri zuru oke dịka “Carbonhydrate”, “Fat and Oil” nakwa “Protein” bụ nri ndị ọzọ dị mkpa n’okwu a.
Ihe ọzo o kwuru dị mkpa bụ ịṅụ mmiri, dịka Igbo si ekwu ‘mmiri bụ ndụ’, Okafor kọwara na kwa ụbọchị mmadụ kwesiri ịṅụ ihe dịka iko mmiri asatọ iji kwalite ahụike ya.
Mmegharị ahụ: Etu ụwa dị ugbua, ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ anaghị emegharị ahụ kwa ụbọchị, e si n’ụgbọala pụta, e wụbala ụgbọ ọzọ, e ruo n’ụlọ ọrụ a nọrọ n’oche malite na mbido ọrụ ruo ngwucha ya.
Nke mere na ndị mmadụ anaghị enwe ike mee ka ọbara gbazuo ha gburu gburu n’ahụ etu ọ kwesịrị.
Mmeghị ahụ bụ ụzọ dị mkpa ị ga-enwe ike si nweta ahụike zuruoke ma nwetakwa ụdịrị ahụ ị chọrọ maọbụ inwewanye ahụ maọbụ ịbela ịbu nọ gị n’ahụ.
Mmegharị ahụ abụghị naanị site na ị ga ụlọ mmegharị ahụ nke a na-akpọ gym.
Dịka otu onye ọkaibe n’ihe gbasara mmegharị ahụ bụ Yakubu Adebayo siri gwa ndi ntaakuko “Ịga ije ruo ihe dịka nkeji 20, ịwụ ụdọ, ịgba ọsọ n’ime ụlọ, iji ụzọ ‘stairs’ rigoro ụlọ ma ridata ugboro ugboro kwa ụbọchị zuruoke ime ka mmadụ gbasie ike ma belatatu ịbu nọ ya n’ahụ.” Yakubu kwukwara ịkpụ ụzọ na-enyere ezigbo aka n’okwu mmadụ inwe ahụ ma gbaa abụba nakwa n’okwu mmadụ ibelatu ibu.
Etu ị nwereike isi nyere onwe gị aka n’atụmatụ ndị a:.
Gọvanọ Legọs steeti bụ Maazị Babajide Sanwo-Olu akpọkuola Gọọmenti etiti ka ha na steeti ahụ gbakọọ aka ka ha na-ebufe nnukwu osimiri ndị dị n’ofe mba ahụ iji gbochie idei mmiri.
                                                                                                                                                                                                        Gọvanọ ahụ kwuru, mgbe ọ natara ndị otu Kọmitii Nkà na ụzụ Onye isi ala na njikwa ide mmiri na Lagos na Thursday.
                                                    Onye nọchitere anya ya bụ Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka gburugburu ebe obibi na mmiri mmiri na steeti ahụ, Maazị Tunji Bello, kwuru na kọmitii ahụ amalitela imepụta atụmatụ zuru oke nke ọrụ iji gbochie idei mmiri na Naijiria.
                                                                                                                                  “Oge eruola ka Gọọmenti etiti hụ na a na-akpachapụ nnukwu osimiri ndị dị na mba niile na ọ dị mkpa ka e nwekwuo mmekorita n’etiti ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị etiti na steeti iji hụ na nnukwu mkpamkpa ide mmiri na-ebelata ka opekempe.
                                                                                                   “Ikpochapụ osimiri ndị bụ isi ga-ebelata ohere nke steeti ndị dị n’ụsọ osimiri na nsogbu idei mmiri dị ka ọtụtụ steeti nwetara n’afọ gara aga ma FG kwesịrị ịghọta eziokwu ahụ bụ na Rivers Niger, Benue, na Ogun n’etiti ndị ọzọ na-ejupụta na steeti ndị dị ha nso ozugbo ha nwere.
bilie.”                                                                                                                                                                                                     Onyeisi kọmitii nka nka nke onye isi ala, Dr Godstime James, kọwara na kọmitii ahụ e hibere n’afọ 2021 nyere iwu ka ileba anya n’iwu steeti ọ bụla gbasara ide mmiri, wepụta ihe na-ebute ide mmiri na iwepụta ihe ngwọta na atụmatụ iji belata mmetụta ọ na-enwe na ụmụ amaala..
Onye isi oche ndị omebe iwu nke Nigeria, Femi Gbajabiamila, akọwawo ọnwụ nke onye ọkà mmụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị a ma ama, Prof.
Ayo Olukotun, dịka mmepe dị mwute.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maazị Gbajabiamila kwuru na Prof.
Olukotun bụ onye Naijiria nyere amamihe ya kacha mma maka mmepe obodo.
                                                          Ọkà okwu ahụ chetara otú Prof.
Olukotun si jiri nkà Chineke nyere ya nye onyinye bara uru maka iwuli obodo site na kọlụm akwụkwọ akụkọ na ikpo okwu ọha ndị ọzọ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              O kwuru na ọnwụ Prof.
Olukotun ahapụla oghere dị oke ike imeju, na-ekwupụta na a ga-atụfu onye sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke nwụrụ anwụ, karịsịa maka onyinye ya na agụmakwụkwọ.
                                                                                                                                                                                  Gbajabiamila kpere ekpere ka Chineke nye Prof.
Ayo Olukotun ezumike ebighi ebi ma nye ezinaụlọ ya obi ike idi ọnwụ ahụ.

                                                                                                                       N’oge ndụ ya, Prof.
Olukotun kụziri nkuzi na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria, Mahadum Lagos na Lagos State University.
                                                     Ọ bụ ọkammụta nleta mba ụwa na Mahadum Obafemi Awolowo, Ile-Ife na Oba Sikiru adetona Professorial Chair in Governance, Department of Political Science, Olabisi Onabanjo University, Ago-Iwoye, Ogun State.
                                                                                                                                              Ọ bụkwa onye isi ngalaba na-ahụ maka sayensị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na onye isi ngalaba, ngalaba mmụta mmekọrịta ọha na eze na mahadum Lead City, Ibadan.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              N’oge dị iche iche, ọ bụ onyeisi oche nke Editorial Board nke Daily Times ma dee kọlụm kwa izu maka akwụkwọ akụkọ yana akwụkwọ akụkọ The Guardian, The Punch na Compass..
Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ọrụ ugbo na ihe ndị sitere n’okike nke Kano steeti bụ Dọkịnta Yusuf Jibrin Rurum ekwupụtala na gọọmentị steeti etinyela nnukwu mbọ iji hụ na mgbasawanye ọrụ ugbo hibiscus na steeti ahụ.
Kọmishọna a mere ka a mara nke a n’oge ọ gara n’ụlọ ọrụ fumigation hibiscus kasị ukwuu n’Africa, nke dị na steeti ahụ ma bụrụ nke Mumin Foods and Drugs Limited nwe ya.
                                                                                                         O kwuru na steeti ahụ nwere obi ụtọ ịhụ ka ndị na-etinye ego na-eme nke ọma na mbupụ ifuru hibiscus, na-agbakwụnye na gọọmentị steeti ga-enye aka n’ịhụ na a na-enweta nnukwu mgbasawanye na azụmahịa n’oge na-adịghị anya.
                                                                                                                             “Ọ bụ ihe na-adọrọ mmasị ịhụ ka ndị amaala na-achịkọta nnukwu ego dị otú ahụ.
                                                                                                                           Anyị ahụla ka ewebata teknụzụ ọhụrụ yana usoro ndị metụtara.
O kwuru, “Nke a bụ ihe anyị chọrọ ịhụ ka obodo azụmaahịa anyị na-eme, anyị ga-ahụkwa na mgbasawanye azụmahịa na-adịgide adịgide dịka steeti,” ka o kwuru.
                                                                                     A na-atụkwa anya ịkwado nnukwu mbupụ ifuru iji nweta ego mba ofesi maka ndị ọchụnta ego n’otu n’otu na steeti..
Na mba Sudan, ọtụtụ narị ndị ngagharị iwe gara n’okporo ụzọ isi obodo, Khartoum, na Tọzdee, na-arịọ ndị ọchịchị mba ahụ ka ha hapụ ọchịchị.
        Ndị ngagharị iwe ahụ jụkwara nkwekọrịta ha mere izu ole na ole gara aga maka iji nwayọọ nye ndị isi obodo ikike.                                                       Mwakpo ndị agha na Ọktoba 2021 na mberede kwụsịrị nkwekọrịta mgbanwe ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na ndị isi ngagharị iwe.
                              “Njegharị a bụ ngosipụta n’ezie na n’eziokwu na ike bụ ike ndị mmadụ.
Akụrụngwa bụ ihe ndị mmadụ nwere.
                                                                       Ndị agha kwesịrị ịlaghachi n’ogige ahụ, na Janjaweed (Rapid Support Forces, Ed.) ga-agbasasị ma ọ dịghị ohere maka ụlọ ọrụ agha na ikike ma ọ bụ akụ na ụba na na a ga-edozi nsogbu niile nke steeti dịka ọhụrụ.
           Iwu nwere echiche ọhụrụ nke na-ekenye ọrụ na ikike maka ndị agha ichebe oke na usoro ochichi onye kwuo uche ya, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, Khaled Soliman kwuru.
                                                                                                                   Mkpesa Tọọzde bụ ndị kọmitii ndị na-emegide onwe ha, otu ndị na-agba mbọ jụ mkparita ụka ọ bụla na ndị isi agha Sudan, General Abdel-Fattah Burhan na General Mohammed Hamdan Dagalo.
                                                                                                                                                                            “Anyị apụwo taa iweghachi obodo ndị nkịtị, anyị na-akpọkwa nke ọma maka ndị agha ka ha laghachi n’ogige ndị agha na Janjaweed (Rapid Support Forces, Ed.) ka chụsasịa”, onye mkpesa Othman al-Hady rịọrọ.
                                                                                N’ọnwa gara aga, ndị isi agha abụọ ahụ bịanyere aka na ” nkwekọrịta nkwekọrịta “na ndị isi na-akwado ọchịchị onye kwuo uche na Sudan.
Nkwekọrịta dị n’etiti ndị agha na ndị isi obodo zerekwa okwu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-emetụ n’ahụ gbasara ikpe ziri ezi n’oge mgbanwe na imegharị ndị agha, amụma na-ekwe nkwa ịhụ akụkụ dị iche iche nke ndị agha na Sudan na-abanye n’otu agha..
Otu nsdorondoro Labour Party Gubernatorial Campaign Organisation na-ekwu na ha na-atụpụta atụmatụ iji nweta ntuliaka ọkwa gọvanọ na steeti ahụ wee wetuo Gọvanọ nọ n’ọchịchị, Abdullahi Sule na All Progressives Congress APC.
                                                                                                                        Ndị otu ahụ nke onye isi-isi-mmadụ nke Mgbasa Ozi Organisation Sir.
Haruna Ubandoma mere ọgbakọ n’ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi nke ndị Labour Party’s Gubernatorial Candidate’ n’akụkụ Jos road Lafia iji dozie atụmatụ dị mma na Tọzdee.
                                                                                                                     Mgbe ya na ndị nta akụkọ na-ekwu okwu mgbe nzukọ ahụ gasịrị, Sir.
Ubandoma kwuru na a haziela ọgbakọ mgbasa ozi nke ọma ugbu a na nke ọma iji were “ihe bụ nke anyị na Nasarawa”.
                                                                                                                                                                                                               O kwuru na Ewuga egosipụtala ikike na ikike ya maka ezigbo ọchịchị n’ihi ya, ọ na-achọsi ike ka ọ rụgharịa ọrụ ya site na ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo na Nasarawa, na-agbakwụnye na ndị obodo ahụ na-agụsi agụụ ike maka onye ga-abịa ma gbanwee steeti ahụ.
                                                                                                DG kwuru na pati LP ga-aga n’ihu na-esiwanye ike na Nasarawa bụ isi ihe mere ha ji hazigharịa otu mkpọsa gọvanọ.
                                                             O siri ọnwụ na LP ga-aga n’ihu na-eweghara ụlọ gọọmenti Lafia site n’inweri na ịgbachitere votu ya.
                                                                                            Onye isi nchịkwa ahụ dụrụ ndị otu ahụ ọdụ ka ha na-elekwasị anya karị, mechie ọkwa ha ma na-adọtakwu ndị mmadụ maka agha dị n’ihu..
Ndị Labour a haziri ahazi na Naịjirịa agbapụla ihe karịrị ijeri naira atọ nke gọọmentị etiti gbabara n’ụlọọrụ ọkụ latrik n’ụlọọrụ ndị mmadụ nwere n’onwe ha, na-enweghị mmụba nke nhata n’ike ọkụ n’ime afọ iri gara aga.
Onye odeakwụkwọ ukwu nke National Union of Electricity Employees (NUEE), Comrade Joe Ajaero kwupụtara nchegbu ahụ n’oge a na-anụ okwu ọha na eze na Bill na-emezigharị Ụlọ Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Ike eletriki, 2005 iji nye usoro iwu na ụlọ ọrụ maka mmejuputa na nhazi nke oru ngo nke ime obodo.
                                                                                                                                Iguzobe nke National Power Training Institute na usoro iwu iji wusie ngalaba ahụ ike maka nnyefe ọrụ dị mma yana maka ihe ndị metụtara ya, nke e mere n’ihe atụ nke Kọmitii Ụlọ na Ike nke Hon.
Comrade Ajaero bụ onye rụrụ ụka na nchụpụ nkeonwe abawanyela nsogbu akụ na ụba, kwusiri ike na e mere atụmatụ ịwepụta onwe ya ka ọ daa site na mmalite.
                                                                                                                                           Ọ gara n’ihu na “enwebeghị ọganihu ma ọ bụ onyinye dị ugbu a site n’aka ndị na-etinye ego ugbu a 9 afọ ka privatization na 17 afọ ka Electric Power Sector Reform Act, 2005 bịanyere aka na iwu.”                                                                                                                                   Mgbe ọ na-ekwusi ike na ọ dị mkpa ka a nyochaa mmega ahụ nkeonwe, NUEE Scribe kwuru, sị: “Ọnọdụ anyị na privatization doro anya, mana anyị na-echegbu onwe anyị ma mgbanwe gị na-adabere na ahịa ọha na eze ebe anyị nọ ugbu a.
                                                                                                                 “N’ịbụ onye nwara privatization maka afọ iri, anyị na-eme naanị mgbanwe nke akụkụ nke iwu na ọbụna ndokwa nyocha na omume nke na-enye ndokwa maka nyochaa nke ngalaba mgbe afọ ise gasịrị, anyị na-edekwa akwụkwọ mgbe niile ma ọ dịghị eme.                                                                             “Iwu a, ànyị na-erubere ya isi n’ezie? Ọ bụrụ na enwere ndokwa maka nyocha ka afọ ise gachara, ndị Naijiria na-asụkwa ude, ndị Naijiria na-eme mkpesa mgbe niile ma anyị na-ekwu na privatization dabeere na eziokwu ahụ bụ na gọọmenti enweghị azụmahịa ọ bụla na ya na gọọmenti na-ebunye ego n’otu n’otu na-azụ ahịa.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              “Ka anyị na-ekwu ugbu a, ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ijeri naira atọ ka agbabatara n’ọrụ ọkụ na-anọghị ya mgbe gọọmentị nwe ya.
                                     Yabụ kedu ihe ezi uche dị na ya ịsị Gọọmenti enweghị azụmahịa na azụmaahịa na gọọmentị ugbu a ga-agbapụta ma kwado azụmahịa nke nwoke ọzọ.
Anyị kwesịkwara ịnọdụ ala hụ ihe na-abara anyị uru.
“Ọ bụ ya mere anyị ji bịa ebe a ikwu iwu ndị anyị mere n’onwe anyị, anyị nwere ike kwụsịtụ leba anya na ya wee gaa n’ihu.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Ebe ọ bụ na ọ dịghị onye ga-ekwu maka mweghachi nke privatization, mana ka anyị hụ otú ọ ga-esi chụpụ anyị.
                                                                        “Dịka anyị na-ekwu taa, okwu tarifụ dị, ọ bụrụ na gọọmentị na-ebunye puku kwuru puku ijeri na ndị Naijiria na-amanye ịkwụ, ị ga-ahụ ihe na-eme, obodo na-ata ahụhụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        “Ọ bụrụ na i tinye trillion abụọ (naịra) na akụ na ụba Naijiria taa ọ ga-eme nke ọma, mana a na-etinye ya na azụmaahịa nke ndị mmadụ n’otu n’otu nwere.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Kedu ihe bụ nyocha uru ego nke nke a ma ọ bụrụ na anyị ga-ewere ego anyị gaa lelee ndekọ, ihe dị ka afọ iri tupu privatization, gọọmenti etinyeghị pasent iri nke ego ahụ na ngalaba ahụ mana ọ na-etinye ya ugbu a.
                                                                                                                                                         “N’ihi na afọ iri ọzọ, ọ dịghị abawanye na ọgbọ, ọ dịghị maara master plan, ọ dịghị atụmatụ na mba na n’afọ ọzọ ụlọ ọrụ ike ga-abata n’ime usoro.

                                                                                                                                                                              “Echiche nkịtị bụ otu nde mmadụ na otu puku Megawatt, na anyị nwere obodo nke nde mmadụ 200 nwere ano ruo ise puku Megawatt, ọ dịghị onye na-ekwu maka ya.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     “N’oge Babangida enwere ọmụmụ ihe gbasara Mambila nke nwere ikike inye ihe anyị na-enwe na obodo a taa na site n’oge ahụ ruo ugbu a ọ dịghị ihe merenụ.

Njikọ ahụ achọghị ịma jijiji nke inwe ụlọ ọrụ 19, 19 MD na ED na 4,000 Megawatts.
“Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nke otu ED nweburu ga-amụba ugbu a.

Aha nwa ntoroọbịa bụ Carney Chukwuemeka na-ada ebe niile na soshal midịa dịka ndị Chelsea na otu Manchester City zutere onwe ha n’ụbọchị Tọọzde.
Agbanyeghị na Mancity ji otu ọkpụ goolu asataghị nchancha merie Chelsea, etu Chukwuemeka onye na-agbara ndị Chelsea bọolụ siri gbaa mbọ na ya bụ asọmpị nyere ndị mmadụ obi ụtọ.
Agbanyeghị na osoghị bido ya bụ asọmpị, ihe mgbanwe gosiri dịka ewebatara ya.
