Puku kwuru puku ndị mmadụ apụtala maka ịkwanyere onye bụbu Poopụ bụ Benedict XVI ugwu ikpeazụ na Vatican Akwamozu onye bụbu poopu bụ Benedict XVI bụ ihe na-emetụbeghị n’ogologo oge n’ụka Katọlịk nke ụwa bụ na nke a ga-abụ oge mbụ otu Poopu ga-akwaozu Poopu ọzọ.
Akwamozu a nke na-aga n’ihu taa bụ Tọọzde n’ụka Saint Peter Basilica nke Rome.
Nke a bụ ụka a na-ahụta dịka otu n’ime ndị kacha dị nsọ n’ụka Katọlịk nakwa otu n’ime ebe ndị njem na-aga ala nsọ na-akacha aga.
Poopụ Francis bụ onye na-achị ụka Katọlịk ugbua ga-anọ n’isi emume akwamozu onye bụbu Poopu bụ Benedict XVI, nke nwụrụ na ngwụcha afọ gara aga n’afọ 95.
A mụrụ Joseph Ratzinger na mba Germany dịka a họpụtara ya n’ọnwa Mee 2005 dịka Poopu ga-anọchite John Paul nke abụọ onye n’ọkwa ya nwụọ.
Cheta na n’ọnwa Febụwarị 2013 na Benedict XVI gbara arụkwaghịm n’ọkwa ya ihe na-emebeghị n’ọchịchị ụka Katọlịk kemgbe ihe ruru afọ 600.
E nwebeghị Poopu ọzọ rituru n’ọkwa kemgbe Gregory XII mere nke a n’afọ 1415.
Benedict na-eso Celestine V onye mbụ mekwara otu ihe dị etu a n’afọ 1294.
Nrịtu n’ọkwa Ratzinger bụ maka okwu ahụike ya nakwa ịka nka nke mere akamozu ya ji bụrụ ihe pụrụiche.
Ọnụ na-ekwuru Vatican bụ Matteo Bruni kọwara na “Dịka Benedict XVI si chọọ, akwamozu ya ga-adị jụụ ma bụrụ nke obi ume ala.” N’ime ihe ndị niile, ile ihe atọ mere akwamozu onye bụbu Poopu a jiri bụrụ ihe pụrụ ezigbo iche..
Cape Verde abụrụla obodo mbụ na-akpọ ámá egwuregwu mgbe Pele na-esochi FIFA President, Gianni Infantino na-akpọ oku ka mba ọ bụla mee ya.
Mịnịsta ala mba Afrịka kwuru na ha ga-akpọ ámá egwuregwu mba ha – Estadio da Varzea – aha onye ukwu Brazil, onye nwụrụ n’afọ agbata afo iri asato na abụọ n’abali abuo nke onwa Disemba.
                                                                                                                                                                                                 Cape Verde, nke mebere otu agwaetiti dị na ọdịda anyanwụ nke isi kọntinent Africa dị n’Oké Osimiri Atlantic, na-ekerịta Portuguese dị ka asụsụ ọnụ na Brazil.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Onye isi ala Ulisses Correia e Silva kwupụtara na Brazil na Cape Verde nwere akụkọ ihe mere eme na omenala nke “na-aga n’ihu, na-atụle na ha bụ obodo ụmụnne nwanyị abụọ, jikọtara site na asụsụ na site na njirimara yiri ya”.
                                                                                              Ọ gbakwụnyere, “Pele ga-abụ akwụkwọ ntụaka mgbe niile na Brazil yana ụwa ndị ọzọ ruo ọgbọ.”                                                                Webụsaịtị gọọmentị Cape Verde gọọmentị kwuru na onye isi ahụ agwala FIFA ebumnuche ya ịgbanwe aha ama egwuregwu ahụ.
                                  Infantino kwuru, “Anyị ga-arịọ obodo ọ bụla n’ụwa ka ha kpọọ otu n’ime ama egwuregwu bọọlụ ha nke nwere aha Pele.”.
Gọọmenti Naijiria na-achọ nkwado nke World Bank, Google na Space Exploration Technologies Corporation (Space X) na mmejuputa iwu nke National Digital Economy Policy and Strategy (NDEPS).
N’ịgbaso nke a, Minista Nkwukọrịta Ozi na Digital Economy, Prọfesọ Isa Pantami, nwere nzukọ na isi ụlọ ọrụ Space X na Hawthorne, California, na n’isi ụlọ ọrụ World Bank na nzukọ ọzọ na Google Corporation iji wusie mmekọrịta maka mmepe akụ na ụba dijitalụ nke Nigeria.
                                                                                                                                                                                                         A nabatara Pantami na Space X site n’aka Samuel (Chad) Gibbs IV, osote onye isi oche nke azụmahịa, n’aha Elon Musk, onye nchoputa na CEO nke Space X.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              N’oge nleta ahụ, akụkụ abụọ ahụ tụlere ka Space X ga-esi gbasaa ọnụnọ ya na Nigeria, na-esote ịbanye n’ahịa Naijiria site na ọrụ mgbasa ozi Starlink.    Ọ gwara ndị otu Space X ka ha chee echiche ị nweta ụfọdụ ndị injinia ya na ọdọ mmiri dijitalụ nke Nigeria.
                                                                           Onye ozi ahụ na ndị otu ya gara njem na SpaceX Rocket Manufacturing Facility, Starlink Assembly Line, na Product Development Facility.
                   Ọ hụrụ mgbọrọkete Space X dị ndụ nke satịlaịtị telecom abụọ n’ime orbit.
Ọchịchị dijitalụ Na ọkpụkpọ oku nke World Bank Group, onye ozi ahụ nwekwara nzukọ na ndị isi nke ụlọ akụ zuru ụwa ọnụ, gụnyere Vyjayanti Desai, Onye Nlekọta Ọrụ nke World Bank’s Identification for Development (ID4D) na Digitizing Government to Person Payment (G2Px) Mmemme.
Nakwa na nzukọ ahụ bụ Director of Infrastructure, World Bank West African Region, Franz Drees-Gross, na World Bank’s Digital Development Practice Manager maka Africa na Middle East, Michel Rogy.
                       Ndị otu ụlọ akụ ụwa toro Pantami maka onye ndu ya, nke butere nnukwu mmepe na ngalaba akụ na ụba dijitalụ nke Nigeria.
                                          Nzukọ a tụlekwara ka ụlọ akụ ahụ ga-esi nwetakwuo aka na Naijiria iji mee ka usoro akụ na ụba dijitalụ sikwuo ike n’akụkụ dịka akụrụngwa, nkà, cybersecurity, na njirimara dijitalụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                          Onye ozi a nwekwara nzukọ na osote onye isi ala, ihe gbasara gọọmentị na amụma ọha na Google, Karan Bhatia.
                                                           Maazị Bhatia juputara na otuto maka onye ozi maka ọganihu dị ịrịba ama nke emere na mgbanwe dijitalụ nke akụ na ụba.
                                                  O tokwara mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mmalite mmalite nke Naijiria, na-ekwupụta ikike iwu a nwere iji rụọ ọrụ dịka ihe na-akwalite mmepe ngwa ngwa nke gburugburu ebe obibi azụmaahịa na Naijiria na mpaghara ndị ọzọ nke Africa.
                                                                                                                                 Onye osote onye isi oche Google tụlere nleba anya ụlọ ọrụ na-eto eto na Africa ma na-atụ anya ịgbasa mmekorita ya na Nigeria na mpaghara dịka nka, nchekwa cyber, na igwe ojii, n’etiti ndị ọzọ.
                                                                                                                                                                                        Federal Ministry of Communications and Digital Economy, n’okpuru Pantami, nọgidere na-agba mbọ ime NDEPS iji hụ na akụ na ụba dijitalụ nke Nigeria na-anọgide na-eduzi ìhè, ma n’Africa na n’ofe ụwa.
                                                                                                                                                             Emere nzukọ ndị a n’akụkụ US-Africa Leaders Forum (USALF), bụ nke mere na Washington DC, US, ebe nleta Space X na-esochi ihe omume na USALF..

                                                                                                                                                       Ọ sịrị: “Ị ga-ahụ na NNPP bụ pati nwere otu ebumnobi na-anapụta Naijiria; anyị nọ ebe a nwere echiche ọhụrụ na nke ọhụrụ maka ọrụ mweghachi iji nye ụmụ anyị ọdịnihu ka mma.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                        “Ọ na-enyekwa anyị ohere igosi ndị mmadụ akwụkwọ akụkọ m.

                                                                                                                                                                                   ” O kwuru na oke nturuugo a mere bụ ihe na-egosi na ọ na-agụsi ndị okpuru ọchịchị aka ike maka mgbanwe, bụ nke o kwuru na ọ bụ naanị ndị NNPP nwere ike bute ya.

Ụlọ Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Nchịkwa na Mgbochi Ọrịa nke Nigeria, NCDC, na-ekwu na ngalaba ngalaba Covid-19 Omicron bụ akụkụ nke kpatara nje a na-abawanye na China, United States na United Kingdom, achọpụtabeghị na mba ahụ.
                                                                                                                    Ndị NCDC kwuru nke a n’ime mmelite gbasara Covid-19 genomic onyunyo nke onye isi ha bụ Dr Ifedayo Adetifa binyere aka na ya.
                        Mmelite ahụ gosipụtara na mpaghara Omicron na-ahụ maka ịrị elu nke ikpe na US na UK bụ XBB.1.5; ebe BF.7 na-ahụ maka ụbara ikpe na China.
Adetifa ka sɛ, “B.5.2.1 a ɛwɔ Nigeria a ɛwɔ July, afe a etwaam no.” O kwuru na mmachi njem nke Nigeria gbadoro anya, gụnyere arịrịọ maka ule PCR na-adịghị mma sitere n’aka ndị njem na-abata, enweghị mmetụta ma ọ bụ enweghị mmetụta na igbochi mgbasa ozi mmiricron zuru ụwa ọnụ na nke mba kemgbe mmalite nke variant na ndị ikwu ya nwere obere oge nnabata ha.
                                                                                                            Adetifa kwuru; “Covid-19 Emergency Operations Centre nke NCDC na-eduzi na-enyocha usoro na China, United States, United Kingdom, South Africa, India, na obodo ndị ọzọ nwere nnukwu okporo ụzọ na-ebuga Nigeria.
                                                                                                                                  “Nke a gụnyere mweghachi nke Covid-19 na China na-eso izu ike nke amụma efu-Covid nke obodo, yana mmụba nke ukwuu nke ikpe Covid-19, nnabata, na ọnwụ na UK na US n’ime izu gara aga, nke kpatara akụkụ ya.
ọrịa iku ume na-emebu n’oge oyi.”           Dị ka ya si kwuo, “Tupu okwu ikpe na-adịbeghị anya na China, US, UK na mba ndị ọzọ, nyocha mkpụrụ ndụ ihe nketa egosila na ụdị Omicron SARS-CoV-2 na usoro ọmụmụ ya na-aga n’ihu na-achịkwa ọrịa na-efe efe n’ụwa niile.
                                                                                                                                  “Otú ọ dị, ịrị elu nke ọhụrụ Omicron sub-lineages XBB.1.5 na UK na US, na BF.7 na China na-ewelite nchegbu n’ihi na ọ nwere ike gbasaa ngwa ngwa karịa Omicron sub-lineages (dịka XBB ma ọ bụ BQ) na ha bụ.
                                                                                                                                                                N’otu akụkụ maka mmụba ugbu a na ikpe, ụlọ ọgwụ, na ọnwụ.
“Agbanyeghị, usoro ọmụmụ a hụrụ na ikpe na China, B.5.2.1, na BF.7 bụ maka ịwa ahụ na China na ọ pụtaghị na ọ na-abawanye na mba ndị ọzọ.” Adetifa kwere nkwa na NCDC ga-aga n’ihu n’ịgbasi ike nleba anya gbasara nje Covid-19 na Naịjirịa.
                                                                                                                                                                                                         Ọ sịrị; “Kamgbe achọpụtara ụdịdị Omicron na Disemba 2021, usoro ọmụmụ ya (BQ.1/BQ.1.1) na-achị na Naịjirịa.
                                                                   “Ọ dịghị nke ọ bụla n’ime ndị a na-achị achị na Nigeria nke na-ekesa n’ebe ndị ọzọ ejikọtala na mmụba ọ bụla na ọnụọgụ, nnabata, ma ọ bụ ọnwụ na mpaghara.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            “N’agbanyeghị ụdị COVID-19 dị n’akụkụ dị iche iche nke ụwa, ọrịa siri ike, nnabata na ọnwụ na-emetụta ndị a na-enyeghị ọgwụ mgbochi yana ndị nwere ihe ize ndụ dị ka ndị agadi, ndị nwere ọrịa na-efe efe, na ndị na-adịghị ahụkebe.”                                            Ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa Agbanyeghị, o kwusiri ike na ihe kacha mkpa ndị Naijiria ga-eme bụ ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi megide Covid-19 dịka ọgwụ mgbochi bụ ihe kacha mkpa maka igbochi ọrịa siri ike, ụlọ ọgwụ na ọnwụ.
Adetifa kwuru; “N’agbanyeghị na emela ka usoro iwu na mgbochi nke Covid-19 dị mfe, a na-adụ ndị nọ n’ihe ize ndụ maka ikpe siri ike ka ha gaa n’ihu na-agbaso usoro ọgwụgwọ anaghị akwadoro dị ka iji mkpuchi ihu, ezigbo aka na ịdị ọcha iku ume na izere igwe mmadụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                  “Covid-19 nwere ma na-aga n’ihu na-agbaso usoro ọrịa ọrịa dị iche iche na Nigeria na ọtụtụ n’ime Africa.
                                                                                Ndị ọzọ nke Omicron bụ ndị metụtara mmụba nke ikpe, nnabata na ọnwụ n’ebe ndị ọzọ emeghị otu ihe ahụ na Nigeria dịka nyocha nke genomics anyị kwadoro.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Nke a bụ n’ihi na a na-echebe ndị bi na nke ọma site na nchikota nke mgbochi eke na ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu na ụlọ ọgwụ, na ọnwụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             N’ịtụle anya, mmachibido njem ezubere iche nke obodo gụnyere arịrịọ maka ule PCR-adịghị mma sitere n’aka ndị njem na-abata enweghị mmetụta ọ bụla na igbochi mgbasa nke omicron zuru ụwa ọnụ na nke mba kemgbe mmalite nke ụdị a na ndị ikwu ya nwere obere oge nnabata ha.
”                         “NCDC ga-aga n’ihu na-aṅa ntị nke ọma na ọnọdụ Covid-19 na-aga n’ihu na mba ndị ọzọ ma na-achịkọta data nyocha ọzọ iji mee ka omume mara.

Tupu nke a emee, a kpọpụtala mpụtara ntuliaka n’okpuruọchịchị niile na Rivers steeti ọ fọdụ naanị abụọ – Obio-Akpor na Degema.
Mana Adias kwuru na ya agaghị agazi n’ihu ịkpọpụta mpụtara ndị a ruo mgbe Inec lebara anya n’ozi iyi egwu nke a na-ezitere ya na ezinụlọ ya..
Otu ndọrọndọrọ All Progressives Congress ekwuola na aka chịburu Naịjirịa bụ Olusegun Obasanjo bụ onye aghụghọ na onye ihu abụọ maka ịkpọ oku ka a kwụsị ngụkọ mpụtara ntuliaka ọkwa onyeisiala nke na-aga n’ihu ugbua n’Abuja n’ihi ebubo nrụrụaka.
Ọnụ na-ekwuru otu achụmnta vootu ndị APC bụ Dele Alake kwuru na ebubo a Obasanjọ boro bụ “ịchụpụ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n’ike”, ma kwukwaa na okwu Obasanjo nwereike ịdọghachi Naịjirịa azụ.
“Obasanjo na-ebubo, na-egosighi ihe akaebe ọbụla, na akpatụrụ igwe Bimodal Voter Accreditation System’ aka iji gbochie ya ịrụ ọrụ nke ọma, nakwa mpụtara ntuliaka nke Inec na-akpọpụta nwere nrụrụaka.
“Ọ bụ ihe mwute na ọ bụ onye bụrụla onyeisiala nakwa onye kwesịrị ịbụ okenye a na-akwanyere ugwu na-ekwu okwu dị otu iji tinye ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na nsogbu n’ihi mpako na iche naanị maka onwe ya.
“Onweghị ihe akaebe ọbụla iji kwadoo ebubo a na-atọ ọchị nke Obasanjo na-ebo megide ọrụ Inec na-arụ ugbua nke doro mmadụ niile anya,” Dele Alake kwuru.
Cheta na Obasanjo degaara Buhari akwụkwọ ebe ọ nọrọ kwuo na nrụrụaka abanyela n’usoro ntuliaka a n’ihi na mpụtara a na-akpọpụta ugbua egosighi ihe ndị mmadụ kwupụtara oge ha gara tụọ vootu.
Obasanjo kwuru na ụfọdụ ndị ọrụ Inec akwụbaghị aka ọtọ dịka ha megharịrị mpụtara ntuliaka n’ebe dị icheiche, nke mere ha ji jirizie aka nkịtị na-eziga mpụtara ntuliaka kama iji ịntanetị dịka iwu si kwuo.
Ọ kpọrọ Buhari ka o nye iwu ka a kagbu mpụtara ntuliaka n’ebe dị icheiche ebe o doro anya na e mere nrụrụaka.
Obasanjo kpọkukwara onyeisioche Inec bụ Mahmood Yakubu ka ọ gbaa mbọ iji mezie ihe niile e mehiere emehie na ntuliaka a n’ihi na “ọ bụrụ na ejighi BVAS rụọ ọrụ, ọ bụrụkwa na ejighi ịntanetị ziga mpụtara ntuliaka, onweghị onye ga-anabata mpụtara ntuliaka ọbụla ma a kpọpụta ya.”.
Aka chịburu Abia Steeti bụ Orji Uzor Kalu emeriela ntuliaka ịga n’ihu na-anọchite anya mpaghara Abia North n’ụlọ omeiwu ukwu Naịjirịa.
Kalu onye nọ na pati ‘All Progressives Congress’ nwetara vootu 30,805 iji merie Nnamdi Iroh nke Labour Party onye nwetara vootu 27,540, na Mao Ohuabunwa nke ‘Peoples Democratic Party’ onye nwetara vootu 15,175.
Onye kpọpụtara mpụtara ntuliaka a bụ Mazị Chinedu Nnamdi bụ onyeisi ụlọọrụ Inec haziri na mpaghara Abia North..
Ndị uweojii Naịjịrịa ewepụtala ozi nye ndị na-azọ okwa onyeisiala na-agwa ha ka ha dụọ ndị nkwado ha ndụmọdụ n’okwu mgbasaozi nwereike ikpata ọgbaghara n’oge a.
Ozi ha kwuru na dịka anya oha na-ele ngụkọ mpụtara ntuliaka ọkwa onyeisiala Naịjriịa na ndị ụlọomeiwu, na ha emeela nnyocha gosiri na mmụọ ndị mmadụ nwereike ịnụ ọkụ nke ukwuu n’oge, nke bụ na mgbasaozi ịkpa oke maọbụ nwereike ịkpata ọgbaghara ka amụnye ọkụ n’ime obi ndị mmadu ga-akpata ọgbaghara.
Ha gara n’ihu kwuo: “Dịka anyị na-eche n’oge a, ka ọha gba mbọ gbasoo agwa iwu Naịjirịa kwadoro, ọ bụ ọrụ anyị ime ihe niile dịịrị anyị ịhụ na ọgbaghara adapụtaghị n’oge a.” Ndị uweojii zipụtara ozi a nye ndị na-azọ ọkwa na pati APC, PDP, LP nakwa NNPP na chetere ha nbinyeaka n’akwụkwọ udo ha mere tupu amalite ntuliaka a.
Nke a na-abịa dịka ọtụtụ na-ekwu ma na-ebo ibe ha ebubo ndị pati ha kpọkọrọ ndị agboro ha ka mwakpo ndị agburu na ebe ọtụtụ ozi ikpa oke agbụrụ na-awụpụta na soshal midia ugbua..
Akwụsịla ntuliaka onyeisiala na ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu mba ọzọ n’ime ọchịchị ime obodo asaa n’ime 17 dị na Abia steeti ruo mgbe ọkwa ọzọ.
                    Ebe ihe metụtara bụ; Aba North, Aba South, Arochukwu, Obingwa, Osisioma, Ohafia na Umuahia North Local Government area.
                                       Na nkwupụta, onye isi na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ Voter Education and Publicity nke Independent National Electoral Commission, INEC na steeti ahụ, Oriakụ Rebecca Jim kwuru na a ga-ewepụta ụbọchị ọhụrụ mgbe oge ruru.
                                                                                                                        Oriakụ Jim kwuru sị: “Akwụsịla ntuliaka a chọrọ na ngalaba ntuliaka ebe ntuliaka enweghị ike ịme na Satọde, abalị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Febụwarị 2023 n’Abia nke e mere n’ụbọchị Mọnde, abalị iri abụọ na asaa nke ọnwa Febụwarị 2023.
                                                                                                             “A ga-agwa gị okwu n’oge na-adịghị na ụbọchị ọhụrụ.
“A na-akwa ụta niile na-adịghị mma.”                                                                                              Odeakwụkwọ nchịkwa na-ahụ maka Abia bụ Maazị Clement Oha gwara ndị nta akụkọ n’ime mkparịtaụka ụbọchị ụka gbasara ntuliaka a na-atụ anya na mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo ahụ metụtara.
                                                                                                                                                                                          Mazị Oha kwuru na ntuliaka ọhụrụ ahụ bụ n’ihi nhụsianya dị iche iche dị na usoro nke na-eme ihe ike ruo n’ókè ụfọdụ.
                                                         Ọ sịrị; “Commission a n’amamihe ya chere na ntụkwasị obi nke ntuli aka ekwesịghị imebi nakwa na e kwesịghị inwe onye meriri na ndabara.
            “Ya mere, ntuli aka ga-emerịrị na mpaghara ntuli aka emetụtara na Mọnde.”                                                                                                                              Voice of Nigeria na-akọ na nchịkọta na ọkwa ọkwa ga-amalite n’oge na-adịghị anya na Registration Area Centre, RAC na Umuahia North, Abia State..
Otu jikọrọ ndị ọrụ na Naịjirịa bụ ‘Nigeria Labour Congress’ (NLC) ekwupụtala mgbagwoju anya ha n’etu ngụkọ ntuliaka si aga, ma kwukwaa na ụjọ na-atụ ha maka ọgbaaghara ya bụ ihe nwere ike ibute na Naịjirịa.
Onyeisi NLC bụ Joe Ajaero kwuru nke a n’ime akwụkwọ ozi o wepụtara n’ụbọchị Sọnde ebe o kwuru sị: “anyị na-ekwupụta uche anyị maka ihe dịka nrụrụaka a na-eme na mpụtara ntuliaka nke Legọs na Rivers Steeti, ma na-akpọ oku ka amalita itinye mpụtara ntuliaka n’ọbaozi Inec n’egbughị oge ọbụla.
“Inec kwesịrị ịghọta na ọ bụrụ na ha etinyeghị mpụtara ntuliaka n’ọbaozi ‘server’, o nwereike ibute ọgbaaghara,” Ajaero dere.
“Anyị na-akpọ oku ka Inec nyochaa otu onye ọrụ ha na ngalaba tekịnụzụ onye aka ya nwereike ịdị n’ihe mere o ji sie ike iziga mpụtara ntuliaka site na BVAS gaa n’ọba ozi ‘server”.
NLC boro ebubo na nwoke na-elekọta ngalaba tekịnụzụ nke Inec “bụbu kọmishọna na Legọs steeti aha ya bụ Femi Odubuyi”.
“Anyị na-akpọ Onyeisiala Muhammdu Buhari ka o bilie ma dọọ Inec aka na ntị ka ha soro usoro niile dị n’akwụkwọ isu ntuliaka na ngụkọ vootu nke na-aga n’ihu ugbua.” “Naanị ime nke a ka onyeisiala ga eji mee ka ụmụ Naịjirịa mata n’ezie na aka ya adịghị na ejije a na-aga n’ihu ugbua.”.
Umar Ganduje bụ nwa Gọvanọ Kano steeti adaala na ntulika ụlọmeiwu nta o zọrọ.
Tijani Jobe nke NNPP meriri ya iji zọta ọkwa ịnọchị ndị Tofa/Rimin Gado n’ụlọomeiwu.

Onye meriri ya bụ ntuliaka bụ Mazi Okechukwu Eze a nke nọ na ‘Labour Party’.
Onye isi ụlọọrụ Inec haziri ntuliaka na mpaghara ahụ bụ Chukwuemeka Ubaka kpọpụtara mpụtara ntuliaka ahụ n’isi ụlọọrụ okpuru ọchịchị Nsukka n’ebe elekere ise na ọkara nke ụtụtụ taa bụ Mọnde.

Onye pati Apga gbara onye nke atọ dịka o nwetara vootu 6,816.
Gọvanọ Ebonyi Steeti Ndịda Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Nigeria, David Umahi nke All Progressives Congress, APC, ekwupụtala onye meriri na mpaghara Ebonyi South senatorial zone.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Umahi nwetara ngụkọta vootu 28,378 iji merie ndị na-eso ya bụ Linus Okorie nke Labour Party, LP, onye nwetara 25,496, bụ nke abụọ, ebe Eleje nke APGA nwetara 11,398 wee bịa nke atọ.
Onye na-ahụ maka ịlọghachite INEC, bụ Ọkammụta Augustine Egwu nke Alex Ekwueme Federal University, Ndufu Alike Ikwo, kwuputara nsonaazụ ya n’isi ụlọ ọrụ Afikpo North LGA.
                                                                                                                                Ọkammụta Egwu kwuputara na Umahi, ebe ọ bụ na ọ meriri onye iro ya, bụ onye a họpụtara dịka onye meriri na ntuli aka ndị sinetọ.
                         Egwu kwuru na Umahi mezuru ihe niile a chọrọ n’iwu, a na-ekwupụta na ọ bụ onye meriri n’oche Sinetọ Ebonyi South ma bụrụkwa Senator-Elect.
N’akụkụ nke ya, Gọvanọ Umahi nyefere Chineke mmeri ya ma kwe nkwa na ya ga-abụ onye sinetọ ndị Ebonyi niile.
                                                        Ọzọkwa, onye na-anọchite anya Afikpo North/South Federal constituency, Ebonyi State, n’ụlọ ndị nnọchiteanya, Iduu Igariwey emeriela ya All Progressives Congress, APC mgba, Eni Uduma Chima.
                                                                                                                                                                    Igariwey, onye omebe iwu PDP bụ osote onye isi oche, kọmitii na-ahụ maka ụlọ na-ahụ maka mmefu ego nwetara ngụkọta vootu 24,649 ebe Chima nwetara vootu 11,296.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Ndị ọrụ INEC kwuputara nsonaazụ ya n’isi ụlọ ọrụ ntuliaka dị n’Afikpo North.
Igariwey bụ onye omebe iwu oge abụọ na-achọ ịhọpụta ọzọ maka oge nke atọ na Ụlọ Ndị Nnọchiteanya.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                         N’otu aka ahụ, onye na-azọ ọkwa ụlọ omebe iwu Labour Party, bụ Maazị Nkemkanma Kama, na-azọ ọkwa ọchịchị steeti Ohaozara, Onicha, na Ivo nke gọọmenti etiti ekwupụtala nke ọma.
                                                                                                                                                                                                         Kama nwetara ngụkọta vootu 19921 iji merie onye ya na ya na-akpachi anya na APC bụ Maazị Fidelix Igboke bụ onye nwetara 14231, ebe onye na-azọ ọkwa PDP, Mr Mark nwetara 7506 ka ọ bụrụ nke atọ.
                                                                                                                                                                              Onye na-ahụ maka ịlọghachite INEC, Onu Omaka bụ onye kwuputara rịzọlt a, kwuru na Kama maka imeju ihe niile iwu chọrọ ka a na-akpọpụta onye meriri na ntuliaka ahụ..
Ụlọ ọrụ Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) yigharịrị nchịkọta na ọkwa ọkwa onyeisiala nke afọ 2023 n’elekere iri na otu nke ụtụtụ Mọnde,abali iri abuo na asaanke onwa Febụwarị.
                                                                                                                                                                              INEC n’ụbọchị ụka kwuputara nsonaazụ ntuliaka onye isi ala nke 2023 maka Ekiti Steeti na South-West Nigeria.
                                                             Onye na-ahụ maka ịchịkọta ntuliaka onyeisiala INEC maka steeti Ekiti bụ Ọkammụta Akeem Olawale Lasisi wepụtara rịzọlt a n’ụlọọrụ nchịkọta ntuliaka onyeisiala nke afọ 2023 na International Conference Centre dị n’Abuja.

Onyeisi oche INEC bụ Mahmood Yakubu kwuru na kọmishọna na-atụ anya nsonaazụ steeti iri atọ na ise ndị ọzọ na Federal Capital Territory n’ụbọchị Mọnde..

Muhammad nwale onye na-eche nche Mozambique jiri ọstụ atụ si n’ebe dị anya nwalee ka nkeji ise gachara iji gosi ebumnobi ndị Flying Eagles.
          Onye mgbaru ọsọ 20 nke sitere na Mozambique, Kimiss Zavala nọ n’ọnọdụ dị mma iji kpokọta mgbalị ahụ ka Young Os Mambas kwụsịrị nrụgide Flying Eagles nke mbụ.

                                                             Ndị Naijiria kere ohere ọkara site n’aka Sarki onye ọkara volley siri na onye mgbachitere Mozambique ka nkeji iri abụọ gachara.
                                  Zavala wepụrụkwa otu onye nwere amamihe iji gọnarị Ayuba Abubakarr inye ndị Flying Eagles ụzọ.
                                                                              Ọzọkwa, Muhammad na-ekpo ọkụ na-egwuri egwu na Abubakarr bụ onye jikwaa bọl na azụ ya tupu ọ gbapụ Zavala nke mere onwe ya nnukwu.
Naijiria gbawara ọgbaghara site n’aka Lawal ka nkeji iri atọ na abụọ jiri ọkpụ ọkpụ were were were were were gbapụ n’ebe dị anya wee merie Zavala na-enweghị enyemaka.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Onye na-aga n’ihu ahụ gbafere ọsọ ọsọ n’etiti onye na-agba ọsọ azụ Augustine Njoku na Sarki tupu ọ jiri ọkpụ ike tie Zavala.
                                            Ndị Flying Eagles ji okpukpu abụọ zọọ ụzọ ha nkeji anọ tupu ọkara oge site n’ịtụ egwu Muhammad sitere na mpụga mpaghara ahụ.
                           Muhammad Aminu si n’aka ekpe hapụ ya ka ọ hapụ onye na-agba Cartagena FC nke nwere mmetụ ka ọ guzobe onwe ya tupu ya emeri Zavala ka ọ mee ya 2-0.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Nkeji nke abụọ bụ asọmpi na Mozambique na-agba ọsọ na nkwụsịtụ ebe Nigeria gbanwere mgbanwe iji nye ndị otu ndị ọzọ oge egwuregwu.
                Jud Sunday onye nọchiri anya hụrụ mbọ ike ya nke Zavala na-arụsi ọrụ ike tụgharịrị nkeji iri n’ime ọkara nke abụọ.
                                                           Onye ọzọ nọchiri anya Naijiria, Olamilekan Adams, manyere nzọpụta site na Zavala ka ebubo Ladan Bosso mere ka ọtụtụ ndị nwoke gaa n’ihu.

                                                                                                  GỤKWUO GBASARA YA: Ọkụ ahịa Maiduguri: Gọvanọ Zulum kwupụtara ego enyemaka mberede N1bn Onye isi ala Buhari toro nzaghachi ngwa ngwa Gọvanọ steeti ahụ, Prọfesọ Babagana Zulum gọọmentị maka ihe ahụ merenụ wee nye ntụzịaka na nkwado dị mma n’etiti ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị etiti na steeti iji wetara ndị ihe metụtara enyemaka dị mkpa..
Ndị na-eme ntuli aka na steeti Bauchi, North East Nigeria, ekwuola na amụma enweghị ego nke Central Bank of Nigeria nyere aka mee ka usoro ntuli aka siri ike na mba ahụ dum.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Mgbe ha na-agwa Voice of Nigeria okwu ka ha tụnyechara vootu ha n’ụfọdụ ngalaba ntuliaka ahọpụtara ndị a na-eleba anya n’ime ọchịchị ime obodo Bauchi, ụfọdụ ndị ntuli aka kwuru na usoro a dị n’udo n’ihi na ọtụtụ ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị anaghị enweta ego ha na-enweta ndị omekome iji dọpụ uche na usoro ahụ.

Ihe a bụ ebe a ana-atụ anya na Atiku Abubukar na-azọrọ People’s Democractic Party (PDP) ọkwa onyeisiala ga-atụ vootu ya taa.
Onye bụbụ ụlọomeiwu Naịjriịa bụ Awwal Tukur nọkwa ebe ahụ dịka o kwuru na kwa afọ, ọ na-anọ na ya bụ ọgbọ atụ vootu.
O kwuru “Na ntuliaka ndị ọzọ, ndị mmadụ ekwesila iju ebe a ugbua.” “Ahụghịkwa m ụmụnwaanyị ọbụla ebe a” Ọtụtụ ndị ntaakụkọ juru ebe a dịka ndị obodo ahụ na-apụta ugbua isonye mee ntuliaka nke taa..
Ụlọ ọrụ Independent National Electoral Commission, INEC na steeti Nassarawa ezipụla akwụkwọ ntuliaka na Ward dị iche iche na steeti ahụ.
            Ka oji nkeji isii gbafee elekere asato nke ụtụtụ, n’oge ime obodo, a hụrụ INEC ka ọ na-ebu ụgbọ ala nwere ihe ndị na-adịghị emetụ n’ahụ na ụlọ ọrụ ndị isi na-aga ebe ntuli aka na Keffi.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Mpaghara ndị ọzọ anatakwala ngwa ntuliaka ha..
Ndị Naịjirịa taa ga-ekpebi onye ga-abụ onyeisiala ha afọ anọ na-abịa.
                                                                                                                                                    Ụlọ ọrụ Independent National Electoral Commission, INEC ewepụla mmadụ iri na asatọ ka ha sonye na ntuliaka onyeisiala na ndị mmadụ anọ tozuru oke dịka ndị ga-eso ụzọ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Ndị a bụ Bola Tinubu nke All Progrssives Congress, APC, Atiku Abubakar nke People’s Democratic Party, PDP, Peter Obi nke Labour Party, LP, na Rabiu Kwankwaso nke New Nigeria People’ Party, NNPP.
                                                                                                                                                                  Ngụkọta 93,469,008 ndị ndebanye aha n’akwụkwọ ntuli aka ga-ekpebi ọdịnihu ha n’ofe steeti 36 nke mba ahụ na Federal Capital Territory.
                     Dị ka INEC si kwuo, n’ozuzu, 44, 414,846 ndị debanyere aha votu bụ ụmụ nwanyị na 49,054,162 bụ ụmụ nwoke n’ime mkpokọta ndị debanyere aha nhoputa ndi ochichi.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Ọ na-ekwu, ndị na-eto eto nọ n’agbata afọ iri na asato na iri ato na ano guzoro na 37,060,399, na-anọchite anya 39.65% nke ngụkọta ndị ntuli aka edebanye aha ebe ndị agadi nọ n’agbata afọ iri ise na iri isii na itolu guzoro na 17,700,270 na-anọchite anya 18.94% nke ngụkọta ndị ntuli aka.
        Ụmụ amaala ga-atụkwa vootu n’ime ndị ha na-ahọrọ na Mgbakọ Mba..
Ulo oru National Council on Privatization (NCP) n’okpuru onyeisi oche nke osote onye isi ala, Prọfesọ Yemi Osinbajo akwadola ụlọ ọrụ itoolu ka ha mee ngwa ngwa ngwa ngwa nke mba niile nke NIPOST Properties and Development Company Limited.
                                                                                 Ụlọ ọrụ ndị e kewara na mpaghara isii-geo-political zone nke mba ahụ bụ, Oghogho Ayanru, Raji Adewale Associates, Alaba Odunlanmi, Law Field Barristers na ndị ọka iwu na B.A.
Wali & Associates, ndị ọzọ bụ, Aliyu Abubakar & Co, Bola Fabola, Tayo Osuntogun & Co na Primal Chambers.
Nkwupụta nke onye isi, Public Communications, Ibeh, Uzoma Chidi binyere aka, kwupụtara na nke a bụ otu n’ime isi ihe na nzukọ nke abụọ nke Council maka 2023.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Nkwupụta ahụ na-agụ, sị: “Ụlọ ọrụ ndị a ga-enye atụmatụ maka ịrụ ọrụ ahụ dabere na ịkwado aha nke ihe onwunwe ahụ, si otú a chọpụta ma ọ bụrụ na edebanye aha ihe onwunwe ndị ahụ n’akwụkwọ ndekọ aha nke ala dị mkpa, na-ekpebi ọkwa nwe nke ihe onwunwe ahụ yana ụdị, nha, na ọnọdụ nke akụrụngwa; na inye ozi ọ bụla ọzọ ga-eme ka nyocha nke akụrụngwa dịkwuo elu.
Ndị agha 13 Brigade Nigerian Army Calabar dị na Cross River State, ndịda-south Nigeria amụbaala mmekọrịta ndị agha na obodo na nguzobe ebe nchekwa nchekwa oche maka ụmụ amaala iji nye ozi gbasara omume nwere ike imebi ntuli aka ahụ.
                                                                                          Onye enyemaka onye isi ndị agha ọha na eze na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta, Captain Dorcas Aluko na nkwupụta gosiri na “na mgbalị iji mezuo nke ọma iwu iwu nke inye nkwado ndị ọchịchị obodo na ịrụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na ndị uweojii Naijiria iji hụ na nchekwa nke ndụ na ihe onwunwe n’oge a.
ntuli aka na-abịa n’afọ 2023, ndị agha Naịjirịa 13 Brigade akwadola oku ekwentị.”                                                                                                                                                          Dị ka Aluko si kwuo, ekwentị ahụ bụ ka ọha na eze “kọsaa ihe ọ bụla omume ma ọ bụ ihe ọgbaghara sitere n’aka ndị na-enweghị uche nwere ike ịkpaghasị omume udo nke ntuli aka izugbe 2023 nakwa omume ndị agha e tinyere maka nchekwa n’oge ntuli aka na Cross River.
Steeti.”                       Ọ gara n’ihu kọwaa na Brigade meghere “Operation Safe Conduct Complain Desk iji mee ka ọha na eze nwee oku maka ozi nchekwa ọ bụla n’oge mmega ahụ maka nzaghachi ngwa ngwa.”.
Onyeisiala Naijiria bụ Muhammadu Buhari akatọọla ogbugbu jọgburu onwe ya e gburu Oyibo Chukwu, onye na-akwado Labour Party na Enugu East Senatorial District na onye enyemaka ya, na South-East Nigeria.
                                                                                                                                                   Onye isi ala kwenyere na ndị na-eme omume mkparị a, n’Awkunanaw, ọchịchị ime obodo Enugu South nke steeti Enugu, enweghị nkwanye ùgwù maka ndụ mmadụ na ugwu, ya mere kwesiri iwe nke ikpe ziri ezi nke okike.
Na ozi, Onye isi ala kwuputara nkwa ya na ntuli aka nke na-enweghị ihe ike na ọgbaghara.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Ọ na-echetara ndị niile na-eme ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ọ bụ nhọrọ nke ndị ntuli aka bụ ihe dị mkpa, ya mere ndị Naijiria niile tozuru oke kwesịrị iji obi ike na-egosipụta ikike ụmụ amaala ha n’atụghị egwu egwu.
                                                                                                                                                                     Onye isi ala ahụ nyere ndị ọrụ nchekwa iwu ka ha chọwa ndị mere ajọ mpụ a, ọbụlagodi dịka ọ na-erute ezinaụlọ ndị a metụtara, ndị otu Nigerian Bar Association (NBA) na Labour Party.
                                                                                                                                                                                                             O kpere ekpere maka izu ike nke mkpụrụ obi nke onye ahụ nwụrụ anwụ na nkasi obi maka ndị na-eru uju..
Otu Association of Corporate Affairs Managers of Banks, ACAMB, na Naijiria, agọnarị asịrị na-ekwu na Central Bank of Nigeria na-emechi ọrụ ụlọ akụ n’ihi ntuli aka izugbe a na-eme na ngwụcha izu a na mba ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                          N’ozi nke onye isi otu ahụ binyere aka n’akwụkwọ, Maazị Rasheed Bolarinwa kwuru na onweghị eziokwu dị n’ozi nje a na-ekesa n’ụfọdụ soshal midia.
   O kwuru na onweghị ụlọ akụ Deposit Money Bank, DMB ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-enye ọrụ ego enwetala ntụziaka ma ọ bụ nzikọrịta ozi sitere na CBN ka ha mechie ọnụ ụzọ ụlọ akụ ha ma ọ bụ mechie nyiwe dijitalụ na ọwa ụlọ akụ n’ịntanetị megide ndị ahịa ha n’ihi ntuli aka.
                                             Maazị Bolarinwa kwuru na ụlọ akụ dị na Naịjirịa etinyela usoro iji hụ na ndị na-edebe ego nwere ike dị ka ọ na-adị, nweta ego na akaụntụ ha n’oge a.
“Nlebara anya nke otu Association of Corporate Affairs Managers of Banks (ACAMB), ndị nche anwụ nke ụlọ ọrụ na ndị na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi ahịa na-arụ ọrụ na ngalaba ụlọ akụ nke Naijiria, adọtala n’ozi mgbasa ozi na-ewu ewu nke na-ekwu na Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN).
nọ na-emechi ọrụ ụlọ akụ ụbọchị ise site n’abali iri abuo na ato Tọzdee,ruo Mọnde abali iri abuo na asaa February 2023 n’ihi ntuli aka izugbe a na-eme na Naịjirịa n’izu ụka abụọ na-abịa.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   “ACAMB si ugbu a na-achọ ịkagbu akụkọ adịgboroja n’ozuzu ya ma na-achọ ime ka ndị Naijiria na ọha ụlọ akụ kwenye na ọ nweghị eziokwu dị na ozi nje a na-ekesa.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Ruo ugbu a, ọ nweghị Deposit Money Banks (DMBs) ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-enye ọrụ ego enwetala ntụziaka ma ọ bụ nzikọrịta ozi sitere n’aka CBN ka ha mechie ọnụ ụzọ ụlọ akụ ha ma ọ bụ mechie nyiwe dijitalụ na ọwa ụlọ akụ n’ịntanetị megide ndị ahịa ha n’ihi nke a.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       ACAMB na-achọkwa imesi ndị ahịa obi ike na ụlọ akụ ha dị iche iche etinyela usoro iji hụ na ndị nkwụnye ego nwere ike dị ka ọ dị na mbụ, nweta ego na akaụntụ ha n’oge a.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Ọzọkwa, ndị ahịa chọrọ ịnyefe ma ọ bụ jiri ọrụ ụlọ akụ eletrọnịkị ga-enweta ọrụ ndị a n’enweghị ihe mgbochi tupu, n’oge, na mgbe ntuli aka gasịrị.
ACAMB na-agba ndị Naijiria ume ka ha ghara ịtụ ụjọ nakwa ka ha gbanarị mmefu a na-achịkwaghị achịkwa n’ihi akụkọ adịgboroja gbasara atụmatụ eboro ebubo imechi alaka ụlọ akụ na ọwa ụlọ akụ dijitalụ niile.
                                                                                                                                                             Ndị otu ọha kwesịrị ibelata ozi na-agbanwe agbanwe nke ndị odee ya na-enweghị ihu chịkọtara iji kpata enweghị mmasị n’etiti ụmụ amaala na ndị DMB.
ACAMB na-akpọku ụmụ Naijiria ka ha nọrọ n’udo na n’usoro n’oge ntuli aka ma na-achọ ka mba ahụ gaa nke ọma na nhoputa aka n’efu, nke ziri ezi na nke ziri ezi..
Onyeisi ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu Naịjirịa bụ Ahmad Lawan agwala ndị Naịjirịa ka ha mee onwe ha n’udo na ntuliaka izugbe na-abịa.
                              Sinetọ Lawan gbakwara ha ume ka ha bịa na ngalaba ntuli aka ha n’ụbọchị a kara aka ka ha jiri aka ha rụọ ọrụ dịịrị ha na ikike ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ha ịhọpụta ndị ọchịchị na ndị nnọchi anya ha n’ụlọ omeiwu na steeti na gọọmentị etiti.
                                                                                                                    Onye isi oche Senate, na nkwupụta ya n’onwe ya binyere aka, rịọrọ ndị mmadụ ka ha zere ime ihe ike kama mee ka ntuli aka ndị a bụrụ ememe ọchịchị onye kwuo uche na mba ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Ọ dọrọ ha aka ná ntị ka ha na-echeta mgbe nile na Naijiria bụ nanị obodo ha nwere ma gbaa ha ume ka ha na-ekere òkè ha n’ịkwado udo, ịdị n’otu na ọganihu ya mgbe niile.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 “Ndị Naijiria na-azọgharị ọzọ maka ntuliaka izugbe ọzọ, nke asaa kemgbe 1999 mgbe Republic nke anọ malitere.
                                                                   “Dịka anyị na-aga na ngalaba ntụli aka anyị dị iche iche isonye na ntuli aka nke onye isi ala ọhụrụ na ndị otu ọgbakọ omebe iwu nke iri na Satọde February 25, 2023; ka e wee na-esote ntuli aka nke ndị Gọvanọ steeti na ndị otu ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti na Satọde abali iri na otu nke onwa Maachị afo, 2023, a na m arịọ anyị niile ka anyị na-akpa àgwà ọma ma mee ka mmemme ahụ dị n’udo.”                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Onye isi oche Sineti nwere ọmịiko n’ebe ndị Naijiria nọ na ihe isi ike a na-enweta na mmejuputa iwu nhazigharị ego nke Central Bank of Nigeria na-ekwu “n’agbanyeghị na anyị niile kwenyere na uru nke amụma ahụ, ọdịiche mmejuputa ya wetara nnukwu ihe isi ike nye ụmụ amaala n’ofe obodo ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      “Agbanyeghị, achọrọ m imesi anyị obi ike na site n’itinye aka kwesịrị ekwesị nke gọọmentị na mmekorita nke ndị niile metụtara ya, ihe isi ike a ga-akwụsị n’oge na-adịghị anya ma weghachi ọnọdụ nkịtị na ndụ anyị kwa ụbọchị.”                                                             Sinetọ Lawan gwara ndị Naijiria niile ka ha hụ na e mere ntuliaka ahụ n’ụzọ udo na ezi uche..
Ndị na-azụ anụ ọkụkọ na steeti Gombe na-asụ ude maka mfu n’ugbo ha n’ihi ụkọ naira na-aga n’ihu na-enwe na mba niile.
                                                Dịka ha siri kwuo, ha na-arụ ọrụ n’efu kemgbe ụkọ ego naira malitere, na-ekwu na ndị na-azụ ahịa anaghị ebu akwa ha na-amị.
                           Mufeedah nke Ugbo ya dị na Kwadon obodo, ihe dị ka 20km site na obodo Gombe, nwere ihe dị ka nnụnụ 4,000 ma na-amịpụta akwa akwa 100 kwa ụbọchị.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Otu onye njikwa ugbo a, Abdul Hamman, kwuru na ha na-erezi otu ite akwa n’ọnụego N1,500 ka ha na-ere n’izuụka gara aga, tupu ego naira amataghị ụkọ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       O kwuru na n’agbanyeghị na ọnụ ahịa akwa dakwasịrị, ha ka na-azụta nri anụmanụ n’otu ọnụego puku naira asaa na karịa ka ha na-azụ ụmụ nnụnụ, si otú a na-eme ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ na ha anaghị arụ ọrụ n’efu.
“N’ezie, anyị adịghị ekwu ọbụna banyere ịkpata uru; Ihe kacha anyị mkpa bụ ire akwa, n’agbanyeghị ma anyị na-erite uru ma ọ bụ na anyị enwetaghị.
                                                                                                                                             Anyị na-ahapụ ọtụtụ narị igbe akwa n’ugbo anyị na-emebi kwa ụbọchị n’ihi na o nweghị ndị na-azụ ihe.
                                                                                       “Ihe gbagwojuru anya ọnọdụ anyị bụ na anyị ga na-azụ ihe karịrị nnụnụ 4,000 anyị nwere n’ugbo kwa ụbọchị, n’agbanyeghị ma anyị na-ere akwa ma ọ bụ na anyị ereghị,” Hamman kwukwara.
                                                                                                                                                                                                     N’akụkụ nke ya, onye njikwa ụlọ ọrụ Tuti Farms Limited, Dauda Mamman Muri, kwuru na ya na-enye ihe dị ka otu puku nnụnụ n’ugbo ya nri kwa ụbọchị, n’agbanyeghị na ọ naghị ere akwa akwa iri atọ ha na-amị kwa ụbọchị.
                                                                                                                                 “Nnụnụ m na-emepụta igbe iri atọ kwa ụbọchị nke anyị na-ere n’ọnụego N2000 tupu mbipụta a nke ụkọ naira.
Ugbu a ọnụ ahịa agbadala ihe dị ka N1,500.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Anyị kwesịkwara ịna-azụ ụmụ nnụnụ n’agbanyeghị na anyị anaghị ere àkwá.
                                                                                                                                   “Ọbụna mgbe anyị na-ere na N2000, oke uru dị ntakịrị.
Mana ugbu a anyị na-ere na N1,500, anyị na-arụ ọrụ na mfu.
                                                         Mana ihe na-enye nsogbu n’obi bụ na anyị anaghị ere akwa akwa,” ka o kwuru.
                                                                                                                           Muri kwubiri na na ọnụ ọgụgụ ihe na-aga, ọ bụrụ na agbanweghị ngwa ngwa, ọ ga-eziga ọtụtụ ndị nwe anụ ọkụkọ na azụmahịa, si otú ahụ na-abawanye ụba ọrụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               GỤKWUO: PAN na-achọ amụma na-adịgide adịgide iji kwado ngalaba anụ ọkụkọ.
Dịka ọ fọrọ naanị ụbọchị abụọ ka e mee ntuliaka ọkwa onyeisiala na ndị omeiwu Naịjirịa, ụloọrụ na-ahazi ntuliaka a bụ Inec ewepụtala ọnụọgụgụ ndị tozuruoke ịtụ vootu.
Ọnụọgụgụ ndị nwetere akwụkwọ ikike ịtụ vootu (PVC) – 87,209,007 Ndị enweteghi akwụkwọ ikike ịtụ vootu – 6,259,229 Cheta na ọnụọgụgụ ndị dabanyere aha maka iso tụọ vootu dị 93,469,008).
Ihe ndị mmadụ amaghị maka mmadụ anọ kachasị chapụta na ndị na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala Naijiria na ntuliaka 2023 bụ Atiku Abubakar nke PDP, Bola Tinubu nke APC ,Peter Obi nke Labour Party nakwa Rabiu Kwankwaso nke NNPP adịghị ọtụtụ n’ihi na ha anọ anọọla n’ ọkwa ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị mbụ.
Mana dịka Igbo na-ekwu, ọ bụ onye nọ mmadụ nso na-anụ isi ure eze ya, naanị ndị ezinaụlọ ha, ndị enyị ha na ndị ha rụkọrọ nwere ike ịkọwa kpọmkwem ụdị mmadụ ha bụ na ihe ọha ndị mmadụ amaghị maka ha.
Ọtụtụ ma Bola Ahmed Tinubu na-azo okwa onyeisiala n’aha otu APC dika onye ngukoego na aka chiburu Legos steeti malite n’afo 1999 rue 2007.
A makwa ya dịka onye tuchara ndi dika Okammuta Yemi Osinbajo, Rauf Aregbesola na Baba Tunde Fashola kwuba ha dika ndi okwu ha na-ada na Naijiria.
Mana Babatunde Fashola bụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ọrụ kọwara na nna ya ukwu bụ Bola Ahmed Tinubu bụ onye ga-abu o kpebie ihe ọ chọrọ ime, o mezu ya, “I kweteghị, o kwetara gị”.
Ọtụtụ Rabiu Kwankwaso na-azo okwa onyeisiala n’aha otu NNPP dika inginia na aka chiburu Kano steeti, mana ọtụtụ amaghị na odogwu a bụ onye ụburu na-acha ọkụ nakwa mmadụ nwere obi ọha.
Alhaji Bashir Nukkel kọwara Rabiou Kwankwaso dịka onye gụrụ akwụkwọ nakwa onye nwere omiko ebe ndị mmadụ nọ.
A ma Peter Obi na-azo okwa onyeisiala n’aha ‘Labour Party’, dika ojiegoachuego na aka chiburu Anambra steeti.
I ma ya dika onye okwu na-adị mma nọ ọnụ ọbụladị malite oge ọ nọ n’ụlọakwụkwọ sekọndrị na CKS Onitsha.ma ahazi okwu bu nka o nwere malite na sekondri.
Benjamin Uzoka nwa Klassi obi kwuru na obi bụ onye ma ahazi okwu nakwa onye anaghị emefu efo..
Onye isi oche Christian Association of Nigeria, Kano steeti Isi Bishọp John Namaza akpọkuola ụmụafọ Naịjirịa ka ha hụ na e mere n’udo na ntuliaka izugbe nke afọ 2023 ga-amalite n’ụbọchị ole na ole n’ofe mba ahụ.
                                                                                                                                               Namaza bụkwa Bishọp Katọlik nke Kano dayọsis kwuru nke a n’oge mkparịta ụka ndị nta akụkọ nwere na Ụka Saint Louis Catholic, Kano steeti North-Western Nigeria.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               O kwuru na omume udo n’oge ntuli aka dị mkpa maka steeti Kano na obodo n’ozuzu ya, n’ihi na ọ na-enye olileanya maka ọdịnihu dị mma, karịsịa maka ndị ntorobịa nke obodo anyị, bụ ndị ezi nnọchiteanya nke ọdịnihu.
                                                                                                                                           O kwuru na nhoputa ndi ochichi nke a na-akwalite site na ime ihe ike na nleghara anya nke udo, site n’akụkọ ihe mere eme adighi emeputa ihe ochichi onye kwuo uche ya n’ihi na ndi Naijiria di otua aghaghi inabata udo na nhoputa ndi ochichi nke mba na nke steeti nke ga-abia na 25th nke February na 11th nke March, 2023 n’otu n’otu.
, na-agba ndị mmadụ ume ka ha votu maka ndị ruru eru “Welite udo na votu maka onye nwere ikike, ikike, onye ghọtara nsogbu anyị ma sie ike ịrụ ọrụ maka obodo,” ka o kwuru.
                                                                                                                  “Ndị ntuli aka kwesịrị ịbụ obodo n’omume ha, ịtụ vootu n’oge, ma na-agbaso iwu na ụkpụrụ niile na-achịkwa usoro ntuli aka na-amalite site na nzere nzere ntozu, na-eji Bimodal Voters Accreditation System, BVAS, nke ewepụtara ọhụrụ, na-agụta na nkwupụta nke nsonaazụ iji hụ na udo na udo.
                                                                                                                              Ọ dụrụ ndị na-eme ntuli aka ka ha ziga mkpesa na ndị ọrụ nchekwa ma ọ bụ igwe etinyere kama ịmalite esemokwu yana ịnabata echiche ndị ọzọ n’agbanyeghị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, n’ihi na nkwanye ùgwù maka echiche nke ndị ọzọ bụ isi ihe na-eme ka mmepe obodo.
                                                      “Ndị mmadụ ekwesịghị ikwere ihe niile a na-ahụ na mgbasa ozi ọha na eze na-enweghị nkwenye kwesịrị ekwesị iji kwụsị mgbasa ozi adịgboroja nke nwere ike ịkpata nsogbu,” ka ọ dọrọ aka ná ntị.
                                                                                                                                        Ọ kpọkuru ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị na-eso ụzọ ha ka ha nabata nsonaazụ nke ntuli aka n’efu, nke ziri ezi na ntụkwasị obi mana ebe enwere obi abụọ ma dị mkpa, chọọ ụzọ ikpe kama iwere iwu n’aka ha, nke ga-emecha mebie udo.

Abuja Metropolitan Management Council (AMMC), ebidola mmanye siri ike nke iwu okporo ụzọ na gburugburu ebe obibi.
                                          Ka ọ na-ewepụ mmemme ahụ, onye nhazi, Abuja Metropolitan Management Council, AMMC, TPL Umar Shuaibu, kwuru na mmemme ahụ nke ga-aga n’ihu, malitere site n’ịkpachapụ anya ọha na eze na iso ndị na-anya ụgbọ njem na-aga n’okporo ụzọ.
                                                                                   Kansụl ahụ kwupụtara na site ugbu a gaa n’ihu, ọ bụghị naanị na a ga-agwa onye ọ bụla na-anya ụgbọ okporo ígwè ka ọ laghachi azụ, kama a ga-ejide ya ma kpọchie ụgbọ ala ahụ, dịka ọ dọrọ ndị ọrụ uwe ojii aka na ntị ka ha kwụsị imebi okporo ụzọ ahụ, dịka ndị mmanye megide mmebi iwu ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Ọ gbakwụnyere na, ọ dịghị ụgbọala a na-ahapụ ka ọ dọba ma ọ bụ na-adọba n’ebe a na-edeghị aha, n’akụkụ okporo ụzọ ọdụ ụgbọ elu a, ọ dịghị onye njem ọ bụla ga-eguzoro ọkọlọtọ ọkọlọtọ ụgbọ ala iji buru ya ma e wezụga ebe a họpụtara maka nke ahụ.
                                                                              Shuaibu kwuputara na enwere oghere zuru oke n’akụkụ okporo ụzọ, zuru ezu iji jeere ọha mmadụ ozi, mana ihe na-adịghị bụ ịdọ aka ná ntị, iji mee ka gburugburu ebe dị mma.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Ọ gbakwụnyere na, “Anyị tinyere ndị na-ahụ maka ya, bụ ndị na-anya ụgbọ njem n’okporo ụzọ a.
                                                                                           Anyị kpọrọ ha, anyị niile ekwetawokwa na ọrụ a dị mkpa, iji hụ na ahụ́ adịla mma.
                                                                                                                             “Ihe ọ bụla onyonyo ị na-ahụ n’okporo ụzọ ọdụ ụgbọ elu Abuja, bụ onyonyo Naijiria.
                                                                                                                        Ọ bụrụ na okporo ụzọ n’okporo ụzọ ọdụ ụgbọ elu bụ n’efu, okporo ụzọ Nigeria bụ n’efu; ma ọ bụrụ na okporo ụzọ ọdụ ụgbọ elu dị ọcha, Nigeria dị ọcha.
   Yabụ na anyị ga-agba mbọ hụ na ọ na-adị ọcha na n’efu mgbe niile, ka anyị wee nwee ọmarịcha onyonyo nke obodo anyị.
                                              “Nke abụọ, okporo ụzọ ọdụ ụgbọ elu bụ nke na-ebufe okporo ụzọ site na ugwu na ndịda n’okporo ụzọ Kaduna-Lokoja, ya mere ọ nwere ọtụtụ ọrụ.
Ọ bụ ya mere okporo ụzọ dị n’okporo ụzọ a ji dị arọ.
                                                                                                                                                                                          “Anyị maara na ọtụtụ n’ime mmebi iwu ndị a bụ ndị na-eyi uwe.
Yabụ na n’agbanyeghị ọkwa gị, mmanye megide mmebi iwu abụghị nkwanye ugwu.
Anyị ga-ahụ na anyị gosipụtara ihe atụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                        Ọ bụrụ na ị bụ nwoke yi uwe na-egosi ndị na-adịghị uwe.
Ya mere, onye ọ bụla, n’agbanyeghị oke oke, ga-asọpụrụ iwu anyị.
                                          “Ugbu a gaa n’ihu, a ga-ejide onye ọ bụla na-eme ka okporo ụzọ ọdụ ụgbọ elu adịghị mma na adịghị ọcha.
Ndị ọrụ na-ahụ maka mmanye a, anyị tụkwasịrị gị obi.
                                                                                      Anyị chọrọ nkwado gị, iji mee ka ọ rụọ ọrụ.
” N’akụkụ nke ya, osote onyeisiala mba ahụ, Chief Abubakar Sadiq, ndị ọrụ na-ahụ maka njem n’okporo ụzọ, bụ onye kọwara mmemme ahụ dị ka mmemme nnabata, kwuru na ha dị njikere nke ukwuu ịkwado n’ụdị ọ bụla, iji hụ na ọ ga-aga nke ọma.
          GỤKWUO GBASARA YA: FCTA hibere kọmitii na-ahụ maka ịgba mmiri iji kwalite ọrụ ugbo oge ọkọchị.
Dịka ntuliaka na-abịa n’abalị ole na ole, igwe mmadụ na-akwado ịga binyere onye masịrị ha aka.
Mana ị ma etu e si agụkọ vootu ndị atụrụ atụ iji họpụta onye meriri? Ozugbo emechiri ntuliaka, a gụọ vootu n’ihu mmadụ niile tụrụ vootu n’ọdọ ntuliaka ahụ nakwa ndị nnọchiteanya pati dị icheiche.
A na-akpọpụtakwa mpụtara ahụ ngwa ngwa n’ihu ndị tụrụ vootu ka ndị niile nọ ebe ahụ nweike mara onye meriri n’ọdọ ntụliaka ahụ Onyeisi ndị ọrụ Inec nọ ebe ahụ, ga-edetu mpụtara ahụ a kpọpụtara na Form EC8A bụkwa ‘results sheet’ na Bekee.
O mechaa nke a, o were otu n’ime form EC8A ahụ mapinye n’ahụ aja ka ndị mmadụ hụ otu ndọrọndọrọ meriri ma kesaa ndị nọchitere anya patị ha nọ ebe ahụ ya bụ akwụkwọ ka ha jide maka ihe akaebe.
Ọ bụghị iwu na otu niile ga-ewere ya bụ akwụkwọ EC8A mana ha ga-ebinye aka na ya dịka INEC si kwuo.
Ọzọ, ọ bụrụ na o nwere onye ntaakụkọ nọ n’ebe ahụ a tụrụ vootu, o kwesiri ka enye ya ya bụ akwụkwọ nke ya ọ ga-ebinye aka.
Na ngwụcha, onye ọrụ Inec ga-esezi mpụtara ahụ foto ma ziga ya n’igwe ‘iRev’ bụ Inec Result viewing portal ebe onye ọbụla nọ na Naịjirịa nwereike ịhụ ya ma ha chọọ.
A ga-eburuzi mpụtara ahụ gawa ebe a na-akpọ RAC centre bụ Registration Area Centres na Bekee bụ ebe a ga-agụpụta mpụtara wọọdụ niile ebe a tụrụ vootu (cheta na otu wọọdụ nwereike ịnwezu ọdọ ntuliaka iri na abụọ) n;’ime ha.
Ọ bụkwa ebe a ga-agụkọ mpụtara ntuliaka n’ọdọ ntuliaka niile.
A ga-enyekwa ndị nnọchite anya Pati dị icheiche ọhere ị nọ na RAC centre ahụ.
E mechaa nke a, ebe ọzọ a ga-aga bụzi n’ọdọ ngụkọ okpuruọchịchị bụ ebe a ga-agụkọ ma wepụta mpụtara ntụliaka wọọdụ dị icheiche.
A ga-ekenyekwa ndị nnọchianya otu dị icheiche akwụkwọ mpụtara ahụ mana agaghịzi ekenye ndị ntaakụkọ.
E mechazie ya ebe, e buru gawa n’isiụlọorụ Inec nke steeti ahụ bụ ebe ha ga-agụkọ ọkpụrụọchịchị dị icheiche.
Chetakwa na ebe niile emere ngụkọ ntụliaka, a ga-edepụta ya bụ mpụtara n’akwụkwọ ma mapinye ya n’aja ebe mmadụ niile ga-ahụ ya.
Ọ ga-adịgide ebe ahụ rue abalị ole na ole emechara ntuliaka.
Ihe ndị ọzọ ị ga-ama Ugbua, a na-ejizi teknụzụ ezipu mpụtara ọbụla n’akụrụngwa Inec iji kwụsị nrụrụaka.
Mana a ga-ebukwa ya gaa n’ụlọọrụ dị n’Abuja maọbụ nke dị na steeti ebe Onyeisi Inec ga-enyocha na ọnụọgụgụ akpọpụtara nakwa ọnụọgụgụ ezitere bụ otu ihe Ntuliaka ọkwa Gọvanọ, ụlọomeiwu nta, ụlọomeiwu steeti ga-akwụsị na isiụlọọrụ Inec dị na steeti ahụ.
Ọ bụ naanị mpụtara ntuliaka ọkwa onyeisiala nakwa nke ụlọomeiwu ukwu ka a na-eziga n’isiụlọorụ Inec dị n’Abuja iji gụkọ ma kpọpụta mpụtara ntuliaka a tụrụ..

                                                                                                                                                               O kwuru na mmasị ya n’ịzụ ahịa, mmepe ego mmadụ na inweta nka bụ ihe na-akpali ya n’ịkwalite ndị ntorobịa ike na mmepụta ọrụ.
                                O kwuru na ihe ngosi nke Ọlawunmi Akalusi mere gosiri na ọtụtụ ndị ama ama, na-akọwa na site n’ọdịdị ya, ọ mụtala ụkpụrụ ịkwa akwa na ịzụ ahịa ejiji n’aka Miss Chinedu Ahanonu.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Tinubu, bụkwa onye isi nchịkwa, LOATSAD Promomedia, kwuru na ịzụ ahịa bụ isi ihe na-eme ka akụ na ụba mba ahụ na-eto eto.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      “A na m eto onye nkuzi m taa, Miss Chinedu Ahanonu, onye hapụrụ ọrụ ụbọchị ya, ịzụ ụmụ nwanyị ndị ọzọ n’ịzụ ahịa ịkwa akwa.
                         “Chinedu azụla ihe karịrị ụmụ nwanyị 500 n’ịzụ ahịa na nkwụsi ike ya, ndidi ya na mmetụta dị mma nke ọrụ ya na ọha mmadụ kwesịrị ntụle.
               “Ewezuga mmasị m nwere maka ịzụ ahịa, mmepe ego mmadụ na ịzụrụ nka, ana m enwekwa mmasị na njem m dị ka onye na-akwado ọrụ ebere.
“Ụfọdụ n’ime ọrụ m na nke nzukọ m gụnyere mmezigharị nke ahịa azụ azụ na Victoria Island, Lagos, ọrụ Noella Foundation, nke na-elekọta ndị na-enweghị isi na ọha mmadụ.”                                                                                                                                                                           “O nyela ha ụdị nkwado dị iche iche kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ, na-emetụta ndụ ọtụtụ puku mmadụ n’ofe Nigeria.
                                                                              “Ihe ndị a niile, site na nnukwu, na-emetụta oghere ndị nta na ọkara (SME), na-akwado ịzụ ahịa ahịa ma melite ụkpụrụ ndụ,” Tinubu kwuru.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       “Emepụtara ihe ngosi a na 2012 wee gosipụta ndị ama ama n’ofe ọrụ ndụ niile ma na-agbasa ugbu a na OlahTv na YouTube,” ka o kwuru..
Ka ntuliaka Onyeisiala nke Satọde na-erute nso, National League of Veteran Journalists (NALVEJ) na Kwara State, akpọkuola ndị Naijiria ka ha na-akpakọrịta onwe ha n’usoro udo.
Otu ahụ kpọkuru ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị na-akwado ha ka ha gbanarị omume ọ bụla nwere ike ịkpaghasị mmemme ahụ, na-echetara ha na anya niile dị na Naịjirịa ugbu a.
NALVEJ na nkwupụta nke onye isi oche ya, Alhaji Tunde Akanbi na onye ode akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi, Alhaji Abdullahi Olesin binyere aka, kpọkuru ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọchịchị, Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) ka ọ nọgide na-abụ ezi onye nledo anya nye ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị niile na ndị na-akwado ha.
O nyekwara ndị ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa iwu agbam ume ka ha weta nchekwa zuru oke na mba ahụ, tupu, n’oge, na mgbe emechara ntuliaka ahụ.
“NALVEJ, otu ndị nta akụkọ na-eji ọgbakọ a na-arịọ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị anyị na ndị na-akwado ha ka ha gbasie mbọ ike inweta ntuliaka n’usoro udo na Satọde abalị iri abụọ na ise ọnwa Febụwarị, 2023,” ka o kwuru na nkwupụta ahụ.
Otu ahụ kpọkukwara ndị nne na nna na ndị nlekọta ka ha dọọ ụmụ ha aka na ntị ka ha ghara ime ihe ike n’oge ntuliaka ahụ.
“Anyị na-arịọ ka ntuliaka ghara ịbụ ihe tigbuo zọgbuo n’ihi na ọ bụ naanị Chineke na-enye onye ọ chọrọ ike.

                  Atumatu ihu igwe nke NiMet weputara na Sọnde na Abuja, buru amụma uzuzu uzuzu nke na-erughị 1,000m n’obodo North na North Central n’oge amụma.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Dabere na NiMet, a na-atụ anya uzuzu uzuzu na-agafeghị oke nke nwere ogologo ọhụhụ nke 2km ruo 5km n’ime ime obodo na n’akụkụ oke osimiri nke obodo ebe ọhụhụ mpaghara nke ihe na-erughị 1,000m abụghị ihe a na-atụghị anya ya n’oge amụma.
                                                                                          “Maka Tuzdee, a na-atụ anya oke uzuzu uzuzu nke na-erughị 1,000m n’obodo North na North Central n’oge amụma.
                                                          “A na-atụ anya uzuzu na-adịghị mma nke nwere ọhụhụ ụzọ kwụ ọtọ nke 2km ruo 5km n’akụkụ ime obodo na n’ụsọ oké osimiri nke mba ahụ.
                  O kwuru, “ọhụhụ mpaghara nke ihe na-erughị 1,000m agaghị ekwe omume n’oge amụma,” ka o kwuru.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   NiMet tụrụ anya uzuzu uzuzu na-agafeghị oke nwere oke ọhụhụ nke 2km ruo 5km n’ime obodo ndịda dị n’ime ala.

Libya ga-ejikọta ọnụ wee ghọọ otu obodo.” Rabie Imran, otu n’ime ndị ikom na-eme mmemme n’okporo ama Tripoli kwuru.
Emume ncheta ọgbaghara a na-abịa n’etiti ọgba aghara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nkewa gọọmentị na-aga n’ihu, ebe enweghị ike ịme ntuli aka kemgbe Disemba afọ 2021.
Gọọmenti obodo ahụ kewara ụzọ abụọ n’ihi ọgbaaghara a sochiri, nke ọbụla nwere ndị agha nnupu isi dị iche iche na gọọmentị mba ofesi na-akwado ya.
Onye nnọchi anya UN pụrụ iche maka Libya dọrọ aka ná ntị na njedebe afọ gara aga na ihe ịrịba ama nke nkewa apụtalarị ma gbaa mba ndị nwere mmetụta ume ka ha rụgide ndị ndu Libya ka ha mechaa usoro iwu ngwa ngwa maka ntuli aka.
N’abalị iri na asaa ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2011, Libya dabara n’ime ngagharị iwe yiri nke e nwere n’ọtụtụ mba Arab n’oge ahụ.
Ndị mmadụ malitere ọgbaghara nke kwaturu ọchịchị aka ike Colonel Moammar Gadhafi mana nchụpụ nke Gadhaffi na-echetakarị ntinye aka NATO.
NATO weghaara ikike mbuso agha n’ikuku Libya n’abalị iri atọ na otu ọnwa Maachị..
Ndịagha Naịjirịa ewepụtala ụlọikpe pụrụiche na Sokoto steeti.
Ndị agha Naịjirịa ewepụtala ọpụrụiche na ụlọ ikpe ndị agha General ka ha gbaa ndị ọrụ iri isii na asatọ (68) ikpe maka mpụ dị iche iche na Sokoto steeti, North-West Nigeria.
General Officer Commanding 8 Division Nigerian Army na Commander Join Task Force Operation Hadarin Daji, Major General Godwin Mutkut bụ onye mepere ụlọ ikpe pụrụiche na izugbe kwuru na e hibere ha iji hụ na eziokwu dị n’etiti ụlọ ọrụ na ndị ihe metụtara.
Ndịagha Naịjirịa ewepụtala ụlọikpe pụrụiche na Sokoto steeti.
Ndị agha Naịjirịa ewepụtala ọpụrụiche na ụlọ ikpe ndị agha General ka ha gbaa ndị ọrụ iri isii na asatọ (68) ikpe maka mpụ dị iche iche na Sokoto steeti, North-West Nigeria.
General Officer Commanding 8 Division Nigerian Army na Commander Join Task Force Operation Hadarin Daji, Major General Godwin Mutkut bụ onye mepere ụlọ ikpe pụrụiche na izugbe kwuru na e hibere ha iji hụ na eziokwu dị n’etiti ụlọ ọrụ na ndị ihe metụtara.
Ọchịagha Mutkut gwara ụlọ ikpe ewepụtara ọhụrụ ka ha nyochaa ihe akaebe niile dị n’ihu ha na ka ha kwekọọ n’ụkpụrụ ikpe ziri ezi n’ikpebi ikpe niile dabere n’ezi.
“Ihe mere e ji meghee ụlọ ikpe ndị agha agha taa bụ n’ihi nkwụsị nke mbipụta na nkwalite nke ndị òtù ụlọikpe mbụ..
Ndị na-ahụ maka omebe iwu mba ahụ kagburu asịrị a na-ekwu na ndị ọrụ ngalaba na-ahụ maka steeti ahụ bụ DSS nọchibidoro ogige ahụ.
                   Ihe onyonyo a na-egosighi na ọ na-apụta na soshal midia tweeted na Twitter aka akaụntụ nke otu @Chukwuebuka, boro ebubo nnọchibido nke National Assembly ogige nke Department of State Security, DSS.
                                                                                                                                                        Ndị omebe iwu mba ahụ kwuru na vidiyo ndị e degharịrị enyochabeghị bụ akụkọ mere na 2018 n’ọnụ ụzọ mbata na-abanye n’ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu nke mba, bụ nke a na-arụzigharị ugbu a.
                                                                                                                                                                                                           Na nkwupụta, Director, Information, National Assembly, Agada Rawlings, kọwara vidiyo dị ka ‘mmejọ’.
                                                                             Onye kwuru; “Ya mere, ọ bụ ihe na-akpali mmasị ịghọta ihe ebumnobi nke ihe nrịbama a na-eme ihe ọjọọ si malite iji nwetaghachi ya, na-atụle ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke mba ahụ na ntuli aka nke anọ na-abịa.
                                                                                                                                                        “N’otu aka ahụ, ndị otu National Assembly, Staff na ọha na eze ga-ewepụ ihe ọjọọ, ihe ọjọọ na nke na-eduhie eduhie e biputere vidiyo dị ka akụkọ adịgboroja n’ozuzu ya.
dịka ndị otu ọgbakọ omebe iwu mba nọ ugbu a na ezumike ma ndị ọrụ anọghị n’okpuru nnọchibido ọ bụla nke DSS.”                      O kwuru na onye odeakwụkwọ ọhụrụ nke National Assembly, Alhaji Sani Tambuwal na ndị ọrụ nchịkwa ya na-ahụ maka ọrụ zuru oke, na-elekwasị anya ma kpebisie ike imezu ebumnuche ha setịpụrụ n’ikwekọ na isi ọrụ ha iji kpalie ndị ọrụ iji nye ọrụ nkwado a na-atụ anya na National.
                      Ndị isi/ndị otu ọgbakọ, Gọọmenti Naijiria na ọha ọha.
                                                                                                                                                                               “Ndị njikwa ahụ na-achọkwa ịgbasa ekele ya nye ndị isi / ndị otu National Assembly, ndị isi gọọmentị, ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa na ọha mmadụ, bụ ndị site na oku ekwentị gosipụtara nchegbu na ịdị n’otu.
                                                                                                                                                                                             A na-atụ anya na ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa dị mkpa kwesịrị ịga n’ihu nyochaa onye ọrụ nke akaụntụ Twitter iji gbochie mmekpa ahụ n’ọdịnihu na ịgbasa ozi na-ezighị ezi n’ime oghere mgbasa ozi nwere ike ịmepụta ụjọ, ihe ọjọọ na nchekasị na-eduga n’imebi iwu na usoro dị ka nke a na-edegharị.
nwere ike ịbụ e bu n’obi,” ka nkwupụta ahụ na-agụ..

                                                                                                                                  Ụlọọrụ Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) kpụpụrụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri n’ụlọikpe n’ụbọchị Mọnde, abalị iri na atọ n’ọnwa Febụwarị.

                                                        Onye isi ọkaikpe nyere onye omere ahụ mgbapụta n’ego nde naira ise na otu onye n’aka.

Ụlọikpe ahụ nyere iwu ka kpọchie onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Kirikiri Correctional Facility ka ọ ga-agwụchaa oge mgbapụta ahụ tupu ebigharịa ikpe ahụ ruo abali ato nke onwa Eprel maka ikpe..

Onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi nke Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Atiku Abubakar, ekwela nkwa ịbawanye ohere ndị ọrụ ugbo na-enweta mbinye ego na ngwá ọrụ ugbo, iji mee ka mmepụta ihe na-emepụta ihe ọkụkụ, ma ọ bụrụ na a họpụtara ya onyeisi oche nke Nigeria.
                                                       Abubakar kwere nkwa a na ngosi nke All Farmers Association of Nigeria (AFAN) Tricycles, na mmekorita ya na FarinCiki Nigeria Ltd na Sanguo Mortors, South Korea, na Tuesday na Abuja.
Abubakar, onye nke Mr Ibrahim Bashir nọchitere anya ya kwuru na dịka onye na-ahụ maka ya nwere nghọta zuru oke n’ọrụ ugbo, o kwenyere na ngalaba ahụ bụ otu n’ime akụkụ kachasị mma maka mmepe akụ na ụba.
Abubakar kwuru na n’akwụkwọ ya akpọrọ “ọgbụgba ndụ na ndị Naijiria”, o kwere nkwa ịchụso amụma nke iche iche, kwado mmepe nke teknụzụ na-azụ ahịa, ọrụ ugbo zuru oke na ịma aka ọrụ ugbo.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Nke a, dị ka ya si kwuo, ga-ahụ maka nchekwa nri, na-eduga n’inweta ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị na-emepụta ihe maka ịnye ihe ndị na-emepụta ihe, oge a na-arụpụta ihe na asọmpi asọmpi.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                       O kwuru na njem dị otú ahụ ga-eduga n’ịmepụta ọrụ na ibelata ịda ogbenye.
                                                                                                                                    “Site n’amara Chineke, ọ bụrụ na a họpụtara ya ịbụ onyeisi oche, Abubakar ga-amụba mmepụta ihe ọkụkụ site na ọkwa dị ugbu a nke 41.13 trillion ruo ihe dị ka trillion 55 n’afọ 2030.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                   “Nke a na-egosi mmụba kwa afọ na mpaghara ọrụ ugbo site na pasent 2.1 ugbu a ruo 3.7 kwa afọ n’etiti 2023 na 2030.
                                                        “Ọ bụrụ na e nyere ikike ahụ, Abubakar kwere nkwa na ọ ga-eme ka ngalaba ọrụ ugbo nweta ọrụ ego site na NAISRA, na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mgbazinye ego na mpaghara site na ụlọ akụ na-azụ ahịa.
                                                                                                                                                        “Ebumnuche n’ozuzu ya bụ ịkwalite ikike ego nke ndị ọrụ ugbo na ndị na-emepụta ugbo ndị ọzọ iji nweta teknụzụ ọhụrụ nke ga-eme ka ihe ha na-amịpụta na nkwụghachi azụ na nsogbu akụ na ụba.”                                                                                                                     Obere ugbo Abubakar kwekwara nkwa ịkwado na itinye aka na ụmụ nwanyị site n’inye ego dị iche iche chọrọ maka obere ọrụ ugbo na usoro omenala dịka ego mgbazinye ndị mmadụ na-enweghị ego.
                                                                                                                                                                                       O kwere nkwa na ya ga-enye ụlọ ọrụ maka ịzụrụ igwe na akụrụngwa iji nyere aka guzobe ụlọ ọrụ na obere ụlọ ọrụ.
                                                                     “Nke a ga-enye aka nke ukwuu n’ịmepụta ohere ọrụ na ọkwa ward n’ofe ọchịchị ime obodo nari asaa iri asaa na ano n’ofe mba ahụ.”                                  O kelere gọọmentị na ndị South Korea maka njikọ aka ha na AFAN na FarinCiki Nigeria Ltd iji wuo ụgbọ ala ahaziri iche iji mee ka ndụ dị mfe maka ndị ọrụ ugbo Naijiria.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       O kwuputara olile anya na nmekorita a, ọkachasị igwe ọgbara ọhụrụ, ga-ewetara AFAN, ndị ọrụ ugbo Naijiria na ndị mmekọ South Korea obi ụtọ..
Ndị otu NPFL ga-ahụ ezumike ntuli aka ka ụbọchị iteghete gachara.
