China kwuputara nnukwu mmeri megide COVID-19.
  China ekwupụtala “mmeri dị ukwuu” na COVID-19, na-ekwupụta na mbọ ya mere ka ihe karịrị nde mmadụ 200 nweta ọgwụgwọ, gụnyere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka o rue 800,000 .
Ndị otu ọchịchị kacha ike nke China, Kọmitii Standing Politburo (PSC), mere nkwupụta a na nzukọ na Tọzdee.
PSC kwuru, “Site na mbọ na-aga n’ihu iji kwalite mgbochi na njikwa COVID-19 kemgbe Nọvemba 2022, nzaghachi COVID-19 nke China emeela mgbanwe dị mma n’ime obere oge,” PSC kwuru.
Ọ gbakwụnyere, “E nwetala nnukwu mmeri na mgbochi na njikwa ọrịa.” Nzukọ ahụ kwusiri ike na China ga-abawanye ọnụego ịgba ọgwụ mgbochi ọrịa maka ndị agadi, na-ewusi ntinye na mmepụta nke ngwaahịa ọgwụ ike.
PSC gbara ógbè na ngalaba niile ume ka usoro ọrụ ahụike sie ike, dịka akụkọ sitere na ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Xinhua.
Nkwupụta ahụ ekwughị mmadụ ole nwụrụ site na COVID, na-abịa izu ole na ole tupu China eme ọgbakọ omebe iwu kwa afọ yana ka ndị na-eme amụma na-ele anya ịmaliteghachi akụ na ụba nke mmachi COVID afọ atọ mebiri..
Sasakawa ga-emefu $19.3m maka ndị ọrụ ugbo 450,000 na Kano.
Otu Sasakawa Africa Association (SAA), na-emejuputa atumatu Kano State Agro-Pastoral Development Project, ga-enye aka ọrụ ugbo ruru nde dollar US $19.23 na steeti ahụ.
Onye nhazi oru ngo, Abdulrashid Kofar-Mata, kwuru nke a na Tọzdee mgbe ọ na-agwa ndị ọrụ ugbo ime obodo na mpaghara Kiru, Garun-Malam, Bunkure na Rano Local Government n’ime afọ atọ nke ntinye obodo na ime ihe ngosi nke ọrụ a.
“Ihe omume a gbadoro ụkwụ na ndị ọrụ ugbo na akwụkwọ nri 450,000 n’ofe mpaghara ọchịchị ime obodo 44 nke steeti ahụ, ruo afọ ise.
“Anyị akwadola ma kwadokwa ndị ọrụ ugbo 270,719 nwere obere ihe ọmụma gbasara ọrụ ugbo na ngwa ọrụ ugbo ọgbara ọhụrụ..
Ndị uweojii Naịjirịa na-enyefe ngwa ọgụ n’aka ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ngwa agha Ndị uwe ojii Naijiria na-ahụ maka inyefe ngwa agha dị 3,980 dị iche iche n’aka National Center for Control of Small Arms and Light Weapon (NCCSALW).
Inspector-General nke ndị uwe ojii IGP, Usman Alkali nyefere ngwa agha nwere egbe 265 akpaaka; 146 egbe ọrụ mgbapụta; 1,909 égbè ndị a kpụrụ akpụ; 1,500 egbe e mere otu barrel; 98 égbè gbọmgbọm abụọ emere n’obodo; 46 General Purpose Machine egbe (GPMGs); 16 ndị na-ebu egbe rọketi emere n’obodo; 2 egbe emere mgbochi ụgbọ elu (AA) mpaghara; na 7 Roket Propelled Grenades (RPGs)..
Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari taa ga-ahapụ Abuja ụbọchị Tọzdee gawa Addis Ababa, Etiopia, isonye na nnọkọ oriri na ọṅụṅụ nke iri ato na isii nke Assembly of African Union (AU).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Isiokwu nke Ọgbakọ AU bụ: ”Acceleration of the African Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) Implementation”’ Onye isi ala ga-esonye na nzukọ atọ dị elu maka udo na nchekwa, mgbanwe ihu igwe na ọnọdụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ụfọdụ mba West Africa.
                                                                                  Nke mbụ bụ ọgbakọ udo na nchekwa (PSC) nke ndị isi obodo na ndị gọọmentị gbasara ọnọdụ dị na Eastern Democratic Republic of Congo, nke Onye isi ala South Africa ga-edu ya, n’ikike ya dị ka onye isi oche nke Council maka ọnwa ahụ.
                                                                                     Nke abụọ bụ nzukọ ndị kọmitii nke ndị isi obodo na gọọmentị na-ahụ maka mgbanwe ihu igwe, nke onye isi ala Niger Republic na-achị ugbu a.
N’akụkụ nke ọgbakọ AU na-enwe kwa afọ, Onyeisiala Buhari ga-agakwa nzụkọ pụrụiche nke ndị isi obodo na gọọmentị ECOWAS.
                                                      Onye ndu Naijiria ga-ekwu okwu na mmemme ndị a ma gosipụta nkwupụta mba ya na nnọkọ mmeghe nke Summit, bụ nke na-achịkọta ndị isi sitere na mba ndị otu AU yana ọtụtụ mba na-abụghị AU na ụlọ ọrụ mba ụwa nyere ikike n’aka AU.
                                                                           Ụfọdụ ndị minista na ndị isi gọọmentị ndị ọzọ ga-eso Onyeisiala Buhari gaa njem ahụ.
Ọ ga-alaghachi Abuja ụbọchị Mọnde, abalị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị..
Ezigbo ndị enyi m, 1 Achọpụtara m mkpa ọ dị ịgwa ụnụ okwu taa, banyere ọnọdụ mba na ịza ajụjụ maka mbọ ọchịchị anyị na-agba iji kwado ma wusie ike akụ na ụba anyị, kwalite ọgụ megide nrụrụ aka na ịkwado uru anyị na ọgụ megide iyi ọha egwu na enweghị nchekwa nke metụtara ọtụtụ ihe.
Ọkachasị na m na-agwa ụnụ okwu dị ka Onyeisiala a họpụtara n’usoro ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, iji gosipụta ọmịiko m, maka ihe isi ike ndị a na-enwe ka anyị na-aga n’ihu na mmejuputa iwu ego ọhụrụ, nke ga-eme ka akụ na ụba anyị dịkwuo elu ma belata mpụ ego.
Ka m mesie ndị Naijiria obi ike, na ime ka akụ na ụba anyị sikwuo ike, na-eme ka nchekwa na mgbochi mpụ ego nke bụ ihe kacha mkpa n’ọchịchị anyị.
A gam anọgide na-agbasi mbọ ike na iyi m ṅụrụ ichekwa na ịkwalite ọdịmma nke mba na ndị Naijiria oge niile.
N’ime nkeji anọ nke afọ 2022, enyere m ikike ka Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) megharịa akwụkwọ ego N200, N500, na N1000 Naijiria.
Maka mgbanwe dị mma, akwadoro m n’otu aka ahụ na akwụkwọ ego ọhụrụ na ndị ochie ga na-ekesa n’otu oge ruo abalị iri atọ na otu ọnwa Jenụwarị 2023, tupu akwụkwọ ego ochie akwụsị ịdị ire.
N’inabata ihe isi ike nke e zutere n’oge mmejuputa ya na nzaghachi na arịrịọ nke ụmụ amaala niile, e nyere ikike ịgbatị ụbọchị iri ruo abalị iri ọnwa Febụwarị 2023 maka mmezu nke usoro a.
Ihe omume ndị a niile dabara n’iwu, n’okpuru iwu CBN Act 2007 ma gaa n’usoro ihe omume kacha mma n’ụwa niile.
Ụmụ amaala ibe m, dịka m na-achọ nghọta na ndidi ụnụ n’oge usoro mmejuputa, a na m eche na ọ dị m mkpa inye ụnụ isi ihe ole na ole dị mkpa na-akwado mkpebi iwu.
Ọ dị mkpa iweghachi ikike nke CBN iji nọgide ma na-achịkwa ego na-ekesa.
N’afọ 2015 mgbe ọchịchị a malitere, akwụkwọ ego nọ na nkesa bụ nanị N1.4trillion.
Ọnụego ego n’èzí ụlọ akụ tolitere site na 78% na 2015 ruo 85% na 2022.
Ka ọ dị n’ọnwa Ọktoba 2022, ego a gbagoro na N3.23 trillion; N’ime ya, naanị ijeri naịra narị ise dị n’ime usoro ụlọ akụ ebe N2.7 trillion nọgidere n’ezi; si otú ahụ na-agbagọ amụma ego na njikwa oke ọnụ ahịa.
Ọnụ ọgụgụ akwụkwọ ego buru ibu nke anọghị n’ime ụlọ akụ egosila na osoghi akwalite akụ na ụba kama ọ na egbochi ọganihu ya.
Ntụle uto akụ na ụba na-eme ka ọ dị mkpa ka gọọmentị gbasawanye itinye ego na mba ahụ site n’ibelata ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-enweghị ego n’ụlọ akụ.
N’iburu n’uche ọnọdụ nchekwa n’ime obodo anyị, nke na-aga n’ihu na-akawanye mma, na-adọrọ mmasị gọọmenti ịkwado ndị ọrụ nchekwa iji merie ndị ohi na ịnara ego mgbapụta n’ime Naijiria .
N’agbanyeghi ihe ndọghachi azụ mbụ enwetara, usoro nleba anya na nzaghachi ewepụtara egosila na uru apụtala n’atụmatụ ahu.
A gwala m nke ọma na kemgbe mmalite mmemme a, ihe dị ka ijeri naira abụọ na ụma ka e nwetarala.
Nke a na-anọchi anya ihe dịka pasentị iri asatọ nke ego ndị dị otu ahụ.
Ya mere, a na-atụ anya na a ga-enwe: a.
Nsiwanye ike nke akụ na ụba anyị.
Mbelata nke nnukwu ego na-eduga na mbelata nke ngwa ego na akụ na ụba nke kwesịrị ịkpata obere nrụgide na ọnụ ahịa.
Mbelata oke ọnụ ahịa n’ihi nbibi ego na-akata ya.
Mmebi nke omume akụ na ụba na-adabaghị n’iwu nke ga-enye aka ịkwụsị nrụrụ aka na inweta ego site n’ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị; e.
Ịnweta mgbazinye ego dị mfe na mbelata ọmụrụ nwa.
Mbawanye omume ego kwụ ọtọ nke ga-eweta nchịkwa iwu nrụrụ aka dị mfe.
Amaara m ihe mgbochi ndị a na-etinye n’ụzọ ndị Naijiria site n’aka ndị ọrụ n’ụlọ akụ, ndị a hanyere usoro mmejuputa iwu ego ọhụrụ.
Ọ na-ewute m nke ukwuu ma nwee ezi obi ọmịiko nye unu niile, maka nsonaazụ ndị a na-atụghị anya ya 12.
Iji gboo nsogbu a, enyela m CBN ka o wepụta akụrụngwa niile ziri ezi na ụzọ iwu iji hụ na a kụziiri ụmụ amaala anyị nke ọma maka amụma a; mee mwepụ ego n’ụzọ dị mfe site na ịnweta ego kwesịrị ekwesị; na ikike ime nkwụnye ego.
N’otu aka ahụ, enyewo m iwu ka CBN gbasie mbọ ike na ụlọ ọrụ na-emegide nrụrụ aka, ka e wee hụ na ụlọ ọrụ ọ bụla ma ọ bụ onye (ndị) hụrụ na ha gbochiri ma ọ bụ mebie mmejuputa a ga-eme ka ọ buru oke ibu nke iwu.
N’oge ogologo oge nke imecha maka mgbanwe ego, m na-ege ntị bara uru iberibe ndụmọdụ si ọma pụtara ụmụ amaala na ụlọ ọrụ gafee mba.
N’otu aka ahụ, m na ndị nnọchiteanya nke Gọvanọ steeti yana Council of State gbakọrọ ọnụ.
Karịsịa, dịka nchịkwa nke na-asọpụrụ iwu iwu, achọpụtakwara m na isiokwu a dị n’ihu ụlọikpe nke ala anyị ma kwuo ụfọdụ nkwupụta.
Iji mee ka nsogbu ndị a na-enye ndị mmadụ kwụsịlata karịsịa nye ụmụ amaala anyị, enyela m CBN ka eweghachite akwụkwọ ego ochie N200 n’ụlọ akụ ọzọ nakwa na e kwesịkwara ka ọ na-ekesa ya dị ka ihe nrịbama iwu na N200, N500 ọhụrụ.
na N1000 akwụkwọ ego maka ụbọchị 60 site na February 10, 2023 ruo Eprel 10 2023 mgbe akwụkwọ nde N200 ochie kwụsịrị ịbụ ihe iwu kwadoro.
N’ikwekọ na ngalaba 20(3) nke iwu CBN 2007, ndetu N1000 na N500 ochie niile dị adị ka enwere ike ịgbapụta na CBN na ebe a họpụtara.
N’iburu n’uche ahụike nke akụ na ụba anyị na ihe nketa anyị ga-enyefe ndị ọchịchị na-esote na ọgbọ ndị Nigeria n’ọdịnihu, a na m adụ onye ọ bụla ọdụ ka ọ gbalịsie ike na-etinye ego ha site n’iji ohere na ikpo okwu na windo ndị CBN na-enye.
Ka m mesie ndị Naijiria obi ike na nchịkwa anyị ga-anọgide na-enyocha mmejuputa atumatu iji hụ na ndị Naijiria anaghị ebu ibu na-enweghị isi.
N’akụkụ a, CBN ga-ahụ na ndetu ọhụrụ ga-adịwanye ma nweta ndị amaala anyị site na ụlọ akụ.

Ụmụ amaala ibe anyị, n’abalị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Febụwarị, afọ 2023, mba ahụ ga-ahọpụta onye isi oche na ndị otu ọgbakọ ọgbakọ ọhụrụ.
Amaara m na amụma ego ọhụrụ a nyekwara aka n’ụzọ dị ukwuu n’ibelata mmetụta ego na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
Nke a bụ ọpụpụ dị mma site n’oge gara aga ma na-anọchite anya nzọụkwụ siri ike nke ọchịchị a, iji tọọ ntọala siri ike maka ntuli aka n’efu na nke ziri ezi.
Ya mere, a na m arịọ nwa amaala ọ bụla ka ọ pụta ịtụ vootu ndị ha na-ahọrọ n’atụghị egwu, n’ihi na a ga-echekwa nchekwa na votu gị ga-agụta.

Onyeisi otu a bụ Harry Agbo, onye jikwa ọkwa Deputy Director n’ụlọakụ etiti’, na ụfọdụ ndị uweojii, ndị EFCC na ndị ICPC gara na mpaghara dị icheiche na Benue Steeti iji mata etu ya bụ atụmatụ si aga.

Gloria Orwoba bụ onye omeiwu mba Kenya ndị omeiwu ibe ya sị ya pụọ n’ihi na ihe dịka ọbara nsọ nwaanyị ya metọrọ uwe ya gwara ndi ntaakụkọ na obi dị ya ụtọ n’ihi na ọ na-alụ ọgụ megide “Ihere so nsọ nwaanyị”.
Orwoba kwuru na ọ hụrụ ya bụ mmetọ tupu ọ bata n’ime ụlọ ndị omeiwu.
” N’uche nke m, dịka m ba-alụ ọgụ megide nkatọ sitere na nsọ nwaanyị, echere m na m ga-eme dịka m sị ekwu”.
Kama ndị omeiwu ndị ọzọ nke gụnyere ụmụnwaanyị na-ekwu na ihe ọ mere bụ ihe mkparị.
Onye omeiwu bụ Tabitha Mutinda kwuru sị, ” Anyị amaghị ma ọ bụ ezigbo ọbara nsọ ka ọ bụ nke adịgboroja, ya bụ ihe adịghị mma maọlị”.
Mutinda kwuru na enwere ụzọ ọzọ ọ nwereike iji kwuo ihe ọ chọrọ ịkwụ ma sị na ọ bụghị ezigbo ihe ntụziaka nya ụmunwanyị ndị na-eto eto.
Ebe Orwoba na-ekwu na ihe ha kwuru ejughị ya afọ ma sị, “Ọ bụ ihe mberede nke sọ ahụ mmadụ…nsọ nwaanyị ịmetọ uwe”.
O kwukwara na ya yi uwe ziri ezi dịka iwu ndị omeiwu siri kwado.
” E nwere otu nwata nwanyị gburu onwe ya maka otu ihe a, ugbua ka m ghọtara n’ihi na ọ bụị ụmụ nwaanyị na-achọ ime ya ka ọ dị ka ọ bụ arụ”..

M ga-anọgide na-agbasi mbọ ike na iyi m nke ichekwa na ịkwalite ọdịmma nke ndị Naijiria na mba, oge niile.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     4.
N’ime nkeji iri na ise nke afọ 2022, enyere m ikike ka Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) chegharịa N200, N500, na N1000 akwụkwọ ego Naijiria.
Maka mgbanwe dị mma, akwadoro m n’otu aka ahụ na akwụkwọ ndekọ ego emegharịrị ga-ekesa n’otu oge yana akwụkwọ ndetu ụlọ akụ ochie, ruo 31 Jenụwarị 2023, tupu ndetu ochie, kwụsị ịdị nro nke iwu.
                                                                                                                                                                        6.
N’igosi maka ihe isi ike nke usoro na nke mmadụ zutere n’oge mmejuputa ya na nzaghachi na arịrịọ nke ụmụ amaala niile, e nyere ikike ịgbatị ụbọchị iri ruo 10th February, 2023 maka mmezu nke usoro a.
                                                                                                                                                               A na-eme ihe omume ndị a niile n’ime oke iwu iwu, iwu dị mkpa n’okpuru iwu CBN Act 2007 yana kwekọrọ na omume kacha mma n’ụwa niile.
Ụmụ amaala ibe m, ka m na-achọ nghọta na ndidi gị n’oge usoro mmejuputa a na-adịru nwa oge, a na m eche na ọ dị m mkpa inye gị isi ihe ole na ole dị mkpa na-akwado mkpebi iwu.
                                                                                                                                                                              Ọ dị mkpa iweghachi ikike iwu nke CBN iji nọgide na-achịkwa ego na-ekesa.
                                                                                                                                   N’afọ 2015 mgbe ọchịchị a malitere okwu mbụ ya, Ego-in-Circulation bụ nanị N1.4trillion.
                                                                                                             b.
Ọnụego ego n’èzí ụlọ akụ tolitere site na 78% na 2015 ruo 85% na 2022.
                                                                                                                                       Ka ọ dị n’ọnwa Ọktoba 2022, ya mere, ego a na-ekesa agbagoro na N3.23 trillion; N’ime ya bụ naanị ijeri naira 500 dị n’ime usoro ụlọ akụ ebe N2.7 trillion nọgidere na-adịgide adịgide n’èzí usoro; si otú ahụ na-agbagọ amụma ego na njikwa nke ọma nke onu oriri;                                                                c.
Ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ndetu ụlọ akụ n’èzí usoro ụlọ akụ egosila na ọ dịghị adị maka ọrụ akụ na ụba yana site n’itinye aka, na-akwụsị irute ọganihu akụ na ụba nwere ike;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          d.
Ntụle uto akụ na ụba na-eme ka ọ dị mkpa ka gọọmentị gbasawanye itinye ego na mba ahụ site n’ibelata ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị na-enweghị ụlọ akụ; na e.
N’iburu n’uche ọnọdụ nchekwa na-achị n’ofe mba ahụ, bụ nke na-aga n’ihu na-akawanye mma, ọ na-abụkwa ihe na-adọrọ mmasị gọọmenti ime ka nkwado ya na-aga n’ihu na-enye ndị ọrụ nchekwa iji merie ndị ohi na ịnara ihe mgbapụta na Nigeria nke ọma.
N’agbanyeghi ihe ndọghachi azụ mbụ enwetara, usoro nleba anya na nzaghachi ewepụtara egosila na uru esitela na atụmatụ amụma.
A gwala m nke ọma na kemgbe mmalite mmemme a, ihe dị ka ijeri naira 2.1 n’ime akwụkwọ ego ejiribu n’èzí ụlọ akụ, enwetala nke ọma.
Nke a na-anọchi anya ihe dịka 80% nke ego ndị dị otú ahụ.
N’okwu dị mkpirikpi ruo ọkara na ogologo, ya mere, a na-atụ anya na a ga-enwe:           a.
A ike nke anyị nnukwu akụ na ụba parameters;                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                b.

Amaghị m ihe mgbochi ndị a na-etinye n’ụzọ nke ndị Naijiria aka ha dị ọcha site n’aka ndị ọrụ na-enweghị isi na ụlọ ọrụ ụlọ akụ, nke e nyere usoro nke mmejuputa iwu ego ọhụrụ.
Ọ na-ewute m nke ukwuu ma nwee ezi obi ọmịiko nye unu niile, maka nsonaazụ ndị a na-atụghị anya ya.
Iji kwụsị ọgbaghara a, enyela m CBN iwu ka ha wepụta akụrụngwa niile ziri ezi na ụzọ iwu iji hụ na ụmụ amaala anyị tozuru oke..
Onyeisiala Naijirua bụ Muhammadu Buhari agbatiela ohere iji oge ochie azụ ahịa ruo abalị iri isii na-abịa.
Buhari nyere CBN ntuziaka ka ha wepụtakwa N200 ochie ọzọ iji belata ụkọ ego ma hapụ N200, 500 nakwa N1000 ọhụrụ ka e jiri ha ncha eme azụmachịa ruo abalị iri isii.
Buhari kwuru nke a na mgbasaozi o mere n’ikuku ụtụtụ Tọzde.
Ọ sịrị, “Iji mee ka ọ dịrị ụmụamala mfe, enyela m nkwado ka CBN wepụtakwa ego N200 ochie ka ya na ego N200,N500 nakwa N1000 ọhụrụ bụrụ ego a ga-eji azụ ahịa ruo abalị iri isii, malite na abali iri nke onwa Febụwarị rue abali iri nke onwa April,2023 bụ oge N200 ochie agaghị abụkwa ego ọzọ.” Buhari kwuru na ọ bụ ndị aka ha adịghị ọcha nọga n’ụlọakụ na-ekponye aja na garị nke mere na atụmatụ ịgbanwe ego agaghị ka e siri hazie ya.
“Ọ bụ ndị aka ha adịghị ọcha bụ ndị na-eme m ihe a.” Ọgbaghara tara isi mmadụ ole na ole ma merụọ ọtụtụ ahụ dara na ụfọdụ steeti ọkachasị Delta, Edo, Enugwu na nsonso a, dịka ndị mmadụ enweghị ike ịgbanwe oge ochie ha maọbụ nweta nke ọhụrụ.
Ya bụ tigbuo-zogbuo nke butere ọgbụgba ọkụ nụfọdụ ụlọakụ nakwa mmebi igwe na-enye ego rịị elu abalị 15/02/2023 dịka ụfọdụ ụlọakụ jụrụ ịnabata ego ochie dịka Ụlọikpe Kachasị si nye n’iwu.
Ụlọikpe Ukwu Naijiria, ebugara ikpe ụbọchị Wenezde, abalị iri abụọ na abụọ ọnwa Febụwarị maka mkpesa ikpe maka akwụkwọ nke steeti atọ dị na mgbago ugwu, Kaduna, Kogi na Zamfara gbara akwụkwọ, na-ama aka na-agbagha atụmatụ iwugharị Naira.
Ọka ikpe ukwu John Okoro, ka ọ na-edu ndị otu ọkaikpe dị mmadụ asaa kwụsịrị okwu a ka ọ nụchara arụmụka n’aka ndị ndụmọdụ abụọ ahụ.
N’okwu a n’ụbọchị Wenezde, gọọmentị steeti asaa nke Sokoto, Ondo, Lagos, Katsina, Cross River, Ogun na Ekiti site n’aka ndị ọkaiwu ha sonyeere ndị gbara akwụkwọ.
Ka ọ dị ugbu a Steeti abụọ; Bayelsa na Edo sonyeere n’ikpe ahụ dịka ndị na-azara ọnụ.
Ndị a gbara akwụkwọ nwere akwụkwọ mkpesa ex-parte a gbara n’abalị atọ ọnwa Febụwarị, kpesara Ụlọikpe ukwu ịkwụsị iwu nhazigharị naira nke ụlọ akụ etiti.
Ọkaikpe ukwu John Okoro, enyela ndị gbara akwụkwọ iwu ka ha megharịa usoro ha si malite iji gosipụta ndị sonyeere n’ikpe ahụ.
Cheta na Ụlọikpe ukwu na mkpebi ya n’abalị asatọ ọnwa Febụwarị nyere iwu nwa oge, machibido gọọmentị Naijiria, ụlọ akụ etiti (CBN) na ụlọ akụ azụmahịa imejuputa abalị iri ọnwa Febụwarị dị ka oge njedebe maka akwụkwọ ego naira ochie.
Ụlọ ikpe ahụ gara n’ihu kwuo na Gọọmenti etiti, CBN na ụlọ akụ azụmahịa agaghị aga n’ihu na oge njedebe ahụ ruo mgbe a ga-ekpebi ikpe gbasara okwu ahụ.
Ọkaikpe Okoro, yigharịrị ụbọchị Wenezde abalị iri abụọ na abụọ nke ọnwa Febụwarị maka ịnụrụ ikpe oge otu abụọ ahụ kwekọrịtara.
N’ikwu okwu n’ajụjụ ọnụ, onye ọka iwu nye onye na-agba akwụkwọ, Albdulhakeem Mustapha SAN na nke ndị a na-azara ọnụ, Kanu Agabi SAN, kwupụtara obi ike maka mkpebi dị nro nke okwu ahụ maka ọdịmma nke ndị Naijiria..
Ụlọakụ etiti wepụtakwara ụzọ etu ndị ka nwere ego ochie n’aka nwereike isi kwụnye ya n’ọbaego ha n’ụlọakụ, kama ọ ga-atọ ha n’aka bụrụzie akwụkwọ nkịtị.
Ọ bụ onyeisi Ụlọakụ Etiti nke ngalaba Bauchi Steeti bụ Haladu Idris Andaza kwuru nke a oge ya na ndị ntaakụkọ na-akparịta ụka na Bauchi.
Mana ọ bụ naanị n’ụlọọrụ Ụlọakụ etiti dị na steeti dị icheiche ka a ga-enweike ịkwụbanye ego ochie ndị a, ọ bụghị n’ụlọakụ nkịtị, dịka ndị CBN si kọwaa.
Ya bụ ọ bụrụ na ego ochie tọrọ n’aka, lee ihe ị ga-eme:                                                                                                                                                                                  Mperi atụmatụ a ga-eri Ọtụtụ ekwuola na usoro a CBN ga-esiri ọtụtụ mmadụ ike iji kwụbanye ego ha.
Ụlọọrụ ụlọakụ etiti na steeti dị icheiche na-adịkarị n’isi obodo steeti ahụ, iji maa atụ ụlọọrụ CBN n’Anambra Steeti dị n’Awka, nke Imo dị n’Owerri, nke Delta dị n’Asabba.
Ụfọdụ ndị bi na mpaghara ndị tere aka n’isi obodo steeti ga-enwe nhịahụ ịga kwụnye ego ha.
Ọmụmaatụ, onye bi na Warri maọbụ Sapele na Delta Steeti, ga-enwe nhịahụ ịga Asaba ga kwụnye ego ochie ya, ọ kachasị ụmụnwaanyị bi n’ime obodo.
Ọzọ bụ na ọ bụghị mmadụ niile ma etu e si eji igwe kọmputa, ekwentị ọgbara ọhụrụ, maọbụ ịntaneetị eme ihe.
Ọ gaghị adịrị ha mfe ịga na websaịt CBN, bịa gaa na ‘portal’ iji debanye aha ma nweta akara (code) ha ga-eji akwụnye ego ochie ha.
Onye ntaakụkọ gara lee anya na websaịt CBN, mana ọ hụghị ‘portal’ ọbụla e kepụtara maka ndị chọrọ ịkwụnye ego ochie ha.
Ọ bụrụ na e nwere ụdị ‘portal’ ahụ, onye na-amachaghị etu e si eji ịntaneetị eme ihe ga-enwe nnukwu nhịahụ ịchọta ya..
Ndị uweojii n’Anambra Steeti azọpụtala ndị otu ‘National youth Service Corps’ mmadụ iri na ise ndị ojiegbe tọọrọ n’ụbọchị Tuzde.
Ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị uweojii Anambra bụ Toochukwu Ikenga kwuru na ọ bụ n’ebe elekere iri na otu nke ụtụtụ ụbọchị iri na anọ nke ọnwa Febrụwarị, ka ha zọpụtara ndị a ji otu afọ efe ala Naịjirịa n’aka ndị omekome jichiri ha.
“Ndị NYSC a mechara ọzụzụ ha izuụka atọ n’ogige ha dị n’Eziama-Obaire, ‘okpuruọchịchị Nkwerre, Imo Steeti, ma na-alaghachi Legọs, oge ndị ojiegbe amaghị ndị ha bụ wakporo ha,” Ikenga kwuru.
“Ndị ojiegbe a buuru ha tinye isi n’okporoụzọ si Ihiala gawa Orlu ebe ha nọrọ jichie ha.
Mana oge ndị ekperima a chọpụtara na ndị uweojii na-esochi ha azụ, ha gbahapụụrụ ndị NYSC ha tọọrọ ma gbalaga ọsọ.” Ikenga kwuru na ha zọpụtara ndị ahụ na-efe ala nna, ma hazikwaara ha etu ha ga-esi malitekwa njem ha.
Mpaghara Ihiala n’Anambra steeti so n’ebe ọnọdụ nchekwa kacha dị njọ n’Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naịjirịa.
Ọ bụ n’okporoụzọ a si Ihiala gawa Orlu ka ndị ojiegbe nọrọ wakpoo ma gbuo ndị agha Naịjirịa abụọ dịka ha na-eme njem maka agbamakwụkwọ ha n’ọnwa Eprel afọ 2022.

Gọvanọ Chukwuma Charles Soludo nke Anambra steeti, ekwuola na ebe a na-ebupụ ụlọ ọrụ n’ime mpaghara Dunukofia, ga-eme ka akụ na ụba steeti ahụ dịkwuo elu.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Gọvanọ ahụ kwuru nke a mgbe ọ na-ebuli elu n’iwu okporo ụzọ Igwe Ezechi Okoye dị kilomita 2.14 na Dunukofia, Anambra steeti.
                                 Na nkwupụta nke Christian Aburime onye ode akwụkwọ mgbasa ozi nke Gọvanọ, Soludo kwusiri ike na ịnọ n’ocheeze ahụ gụnyere inye otu narị hectare ala ndị obodo ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                             N’ikwu okwu banyere okporo ụzọ Igwe Ezechi Okoye ka o nyochachara ọrụ a na-aga n’ihu, Gọvanọ Soludo gosipụtara afọ ojuju maka ọkwa na ọkwa ọrụ emere ugbu a.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Dị ka Gọvanọ si kwuo, ọnụ ahịa ala dị n’ebe ahụ ga-arị elu mgbe arụchara ọrụ ahụ, si otú ahụ mee ka ndị Dunukofia bara ọgaranya.

Ndị uweojii na Naịjirịa dị na Niger Steeti North Central Nigeria, ekwenyela na ogbugbu egburu otu onye uweojii bụ Divisional Police Officer (DPO), na Paikoro Division site n’aka ndị ohi a na-ebo ebubo n’oge agha egbe.
Nkwupụta sitere n’ọnụ ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị agha ahụ, DSP Wasiu Abiodun kwuru na DPO, SP Mukhtar Sabiu na ndị uweojii anọ ndị ọzọ tụfuru ndụ ha n’oge agha egbe.
                                                                                                                 Okwu a dịka DSP Wasiu siri kwuo mere mgbe ndị ohi nwara ịwakpo ahịa obodo Chibani site n’aka Sarkin-Pawa, na mpaghara ọchịchị Munya nke steeti ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      “Ndị otu ndị uwe ojii jikọtara ọnụ sitere na Gawu-Babangida Div.
na Paiko Div, ndị agha na ndị nche ka e debere n’ebe ahụ na ndị hoodlum na-etinye aka na egbe egbe wee chụpụ ọtụtụ n’ime ha, ebe ndị ọzọ gbanarị site na mmerụ ahụ”.
                                  Kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii, Niger State Command, CP Ogundele Ayodeji, bụ onye duuru otu ndị nkwado na ebe ihe a mere wee bupụta ozu ndị ọrụ nwụrụ anwụ, kasie ezinaụlọ ndị ọrụ ahụ obi.
                                                                                                                                                                                           Agbanyeghị, kọmishọna ndị uwe ojii mesiri ndị ọha na eze obi ike na ndị Command agaghị agbahapụ n’ọgụ megide ndị ohi na mpụ ndị ọzọ na steeti ahụ..
Ndị otu nchịkwa nke Central Bank of Nigeria ga-ezukọ n’ụbọchị Mọnde ka ha leba anya n’ọgba aghara nke atụmatụ ndezigharị nke naira kpalitere iji wepụta ihe ngwọta maka ụkọ ego dakwasịrị mba ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                            Nzukọ a ga-atụlekwa ndụmọdụ ndị otu National Council of State nyere na apex bank ga-ebipụta akwụkwọ nde N1,000, N500 na N200 emezigharịrị ọzọ ma ọ bụ kesaa ndị ochie ewepụrụ na mgbasa ozi iji mee ka nsogbu ego dị ugbu a belata.
                                                                                                             Nzukọ a nke ga-enwe n’isi ụlọ ọrụ CBN dị n’Abuja ga-agụnye ndị isi ụlọ akụ kacha elu, ma enwere ike ịnye iwu ọhụrụ na Deposit Money Banks maka ma ọ ga-anọgide na-anabata nkwụnye ego nke akwụkwọ ochie ma ọ bụ na ọ gaghị.
                                                                                                                                    Dị ka akụkọ si kwuo, CBN na-eche echiche ịnye ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ nkwekọrịta ka ha bipụta akwụkwọ nde naira nke emezigharịrị, mana ọ gbaghaara nkwupụta ahụ na-ekwu na ọ nwere ike ibipụta akwụkwọ ego ọhụrụ nke Naira.

Algeria akpọtụrụla onye nnọchi anya ya na France maka ndụmọdụ.
                                                                                                                                                   Nke a na-abịa na-eso mkparịtaụka ọhụrụ gbasara mpụ nke onye na-akwado onye Algeria bụ Amira Bouraoui onye Algiers na-achọ.
                                 Nkwupụta na-ekwu na Onye isi ala Abdelmadjid Tebboune nyere iwu ka echeta onye nnọchianya Said Moussi “na ozugbo.”                                                   E jidere Oriakụ Bouraoui na Tunisia na Fraịde ma tinye ya n’ihe ize ndụ ibuga Algeria, mana o mechara nwee ike ịbanye ụgbọ elu France na mgbede Mọnde.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               Ka ọ dị ugbu a, a mara onye France-Algerian ikpe na Algeria na May 2021 na mkpọrọ afọ abụọ maka “imejọ Islam” na maka ịkparị onye isi ala.
Agbanyeghị, ejidebeghị ya kemgbe ahụ ka ọ na-eche mkpegharị ikpe.
                                                                                                                                           Onye isi ala France Emmanuel Macron gara Algeria n’August 2022 iji mezie mmekọrịta mebiri emebi ka ogologo oge nke esemokwu gasịrị maka ncheta esemokwu nke agha nnwere onwe nke Algeria..
Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka mgbagha nke Naijiria bụ Economic and Financial Crimes Commission, EFCC, gbara akwụkwọ n’ihu Ụlọikpe Mkpegharị nke Abuja, na-arịọ ka a kwụsị njedebe nke ikpe nke Ụlọikpe ukwu Kogi State na Suit No: HCL/696/ 2022 n’etiti Ali Bello Commission, na ndị ọzọ, ewepụtara n’abali iri na abụọ nke onwa Disemba afo, 2022 yana iwu ga-esi na ya pụta n’abali isii nke onwa Febuwari afo, 2023.
                                     Ihe enyemaka ndị ọzọ achọtara na ngagharị iwe ahụ na ọkwa ọkwa, gụnyere Order of interlocutory injunction na-egbochi ndị na-achọ akwụkwọ ịnwa ime ma ọ bụ mee ka mkpebi nke Ụlọikpe ikpe na-echere mkpebi nke mkpesa ahụ.
                                                                                                                    N’akwụkwọ nkwado nke ngwa a nke Samuel Ugwuegbulam wepụrụ, o kwuputara na ndị na-arịọ arịrịọ nwere “ihe mgbakwasị ụkwụ siri ike, dị mma na nke nwere ike ịrụ ụka.”                                                                                                                                                                                                            Ọ gbakwụnyere na ụlọikpe enweghị ikike ịkwado okwu ahụ n’ihi na ebubo ebubo imebi oke ruru mmadu nke onye zara ajụjụ mere n’Abuja, ọ nweghịkwa ihe ọ bụla mere na Lokoja.
                                                                                                                                                                                                         O kwuru na ụlọ ikpe ikpe enweghị ikike ịga n’ihu ịnụ ikpe a, nke bụ eziokwu nke onye mkpegharị ikpe welitere n’ihu ụlọikpe ahụ.

Kamgbe oge ntuliaka a, otu okwu nke ọtụtụ nụrụla maka ya kwa mgbe kwa mgbe bụ BVAS nke bụ aha ịchafụ maka ‘Bimodal Voter Accreditation System’.
Dịka ụlọọrụ ‘Independent National Electoral Commission’ (Inec) si kwuo, Igwe BVAS a bụ ekwuchaa ọgwụ n’igbochi nrụrụaka na wuruwuru na ntuliaka n’ụdị ọbụla.
Ha kwuru na igwe BVAS ga-apụ iche n’igwe ‘smart card reader’, bụ nke e ji mee ntuliaka n’afọ 2015 na 2019.
Mana gịnị na gịnị ka e ji BVAS eme kpọmkwem, kedu etu o si arụ ọrụ, ọrụ ole ka ọ na-arụ? Ihe ndị a ka akụkọ a na-akọwa.
BVAS dịka akụrụngwa e ji edebanye aha n’akwụkwọ ntuliaka Tupu ụbọchị ntuliaka, BVAS bụ akụrụngwa nke a na-eji edebanye aha ndị mmadụ n’ime akwụkwọ ntuliaka.
Ọrụ ọ na-arụ n’oge ahụ bụ nke na-akpọ Voter Enrollment Device.
Ọ bụ ya ka a ga-eji debanye aha, were akara mkpịrịaka, ma sekwaa foto onye bịara idebanye aha ya n’akwụkwọ ‘voters register’.
BVAS dịka akụrụngwa e ji enyocha onye bịara ịtụ vootu N’ụbọchị ntuliaka BVAS bụ akụrụngwa a ga-eji nyochaa onye bịara ịtụ vootu iji chọpụta ihe ndị a: BVAS na-eme ihe ndị site n’ụzọ atọ: Mana ọ bụ site na mkpịsịaka nakwa foto ka e jikarị enyocha mmadụ n’ụbọchị ntuliaka n’ihi na ọ ka eme ngwangwa.
Ọ bụrụ na BVAS enyochapụtaghị mmadụ n’ụzọ atọ ndị a, onye ahụ agaghị enweike ịtụ vootu n’ụbọchị ntuliaka.
Ọtụtụ ekwuola na onye aha ya dị n’akwụkwọ ntuliaka, onye ahụ enwekwaa VIN, na onye ahụ ga-enwe ike ịtụ vootu n’ụbọchị ntuliaka, mana Inec ekwuola ugboro ugboro na nke abụghị eziokwu.
Onye na-ejighi PVC ya gaa n’ebe a na-atụ vootu n’ụbọchị ntuliaka agaghị enweike ịtụ vootu.
Ma PVC adịghị, ịtụ vootu agaghị adị.
BVAS dịka akụrụngwa e ji eziga mpụtara ntuliaka Ihe ọzọ e ji Igwe BVAS eme bụ iziga mpụtara ntuliaka gaa n’igwe kọmputa a na-akpọ ‘Inec Result Viewing Portal’ (Irev).
Dịka iwu Inec si dị, ọ bụrụ na atụchaa vootu n’otu ebe, onye ọrụ Inec ga-agụkọ vootu niile a tụrụ ebe ahụ ma kpọpụta mpụtara ya n’ihu mmadụ niile nọ ebe ahụ.
O mechaa nke a ọ ga-edeba mpụtara ntuliaka ahụ n’akwụkwọ, ma mapanye akwụkwọ ahụ n’ọgbọ ebe a nọrọ tụọ vootu, ebe onye ọbụla ga-ahụ ya.
Ọ ga-ejikwa igwe BVAS sere foto mpụtara ntuliaka ahụ ma ziga ya n’igwe IReV, ebe onye ọbụla nwere ịga hụ mpụtara ntuliaka ahụ ma dọtụkwaa ya n’ekwentị maọbụ na kọmputa ha, ma ha chọọ.
BVAS dịka ihe akaebe n’ụlọikpe Ọrụ ọzọ BVAS ga-arụ bụ iji ya gbaa akaebe n’ụlọikpe ma ọ bụrụ na enwee ebubo nrụrụaka na ntuliaka.
A ga-eweta igwe BVAS n’ụlọikpe ma nyochaa ya iji mata kpọmkwem mmadụ ole e nyochara ma nye ha ikike ịtụ vootu nakwa vootu ole a gụkọtara n’ụbọchị ntuliaka.

Ezra Yakusak kwuputara nke a na ogbako nke UK-Africa Trade and Investment Service haziri.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Dr.
Ezra kọwara na mmepe na nso nso a site na DCTS ga-eme ka azụmahịa na mba ndị na-emepe emepe kacha nta, LDC site na mbelata tarifu yana dị mfe Iwu nke Origin maka LDCs.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Ọ rụtụrụ aka na isi ihe dị na ntinye aka NEPC bụ ime ka ndị obodo Naijiria na-ebupụ mbupụ ka ha were ohere nke atụmatụ ọhụrụ a yana inye ozi ziri ezi nke ga-enye azịza maka nsogbu ọrụ aka na ọrụ nke ndị na-ebupụ Naijiria chere.
                                                                                                                      Dọkịnta Ezra kwuru na site na mmalite nke atụmatụ ọhụrụ a, Naijiria nwere ike ibulite mbupụ ya na UK site na 0.3% ruo 5% nke ahịa n’afọ 2030 na ọnụ ahịa ruru ijeri Pound iri na anọ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                            Dị ka ya si kwuo “Ohere maka Naijiria ịbawanye ibupụ mmanụ na-abụghị mmanụ na UK na ngalaba ebe ọkọnọ ugbu a karịrị ihe a chọrọ bụ koko, fatịlaịza, Sesame, Ginger, na Cashew nuts.
                                                                                                                                                                                                 Ndị ọzọ bụ rọba eke, owu, oyi kpọnwụrụ akpọnwụ, plantain, na tomato”.
Otú ọ dị, ọ kwara arịrị na ọtụtụ ihe ịma aka anọgidewo na-egbochi obodo ahụ ịghọta ikike ọ nwere.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         “Ndị a na-agụnye okwu gbasara ịnweta ahịa, ịnweta ego dị ọnụ ala, ọnụ ahịa na ọnụahịa, na usoro nchịkwa na-adịghị mma / usoro ụlọ ọrụ na-adịghị mma n’etiti ihe ndị ọzọ na-emepụta ihe ndị dị ka netwọk okporo ụzọ ọjọọ, ọkụ ọkụ, na ụlọ ọrụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri dara ada na-eduga n’ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri,” ka o kwuru.

Ndị ọkaikpe mmadụ asaa nke Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Ọkaikpe John Okoro nọ n’isi ya, nọọrọ na mkpebi ha

Nke a bụ akụkọ sitere na Centres for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) n’ụbọchị Mọnde.
“Isite n’akwara dị n’olu were tinye usoro ọgwụgwọ nke hemodialysis bụ ihe kacha ize ndụ dị mkpa, ma ọ bụghị naanị ya,” Ndị nyocha kwuru na CDC’s Morbidity and Mortality Report kwa izu.
N’iji data sitere na ọtụtụ ọba data mba ahụ anakọtara n’etiti afọ 2017 na 2020, e mere atụmatụ na ọrịa Staphylococcus nwere ike igbu egbu bụ nke nwere ike ịrịa ndị ojii dị 4,751 n’ime ndị ojii 100,000 ọbụla na-anata usoro ọgwụgwọ hemodialysis.
Ebe ndị Hispanik dị 4,500 n’ime 100,000 nwere ike inweta ya ma e jiri ya tụnyere ndị isi ọcha dị 3,006 n’ime 100,000 na-anata ọgwụgwọ a.

Kama mgbasaozi nke mba ahụ kwuru na ya bụ mgbaghara nke Ayatollah Ali Khamenei nyere ndị a nwere ihe so ya.
Nke a na-eme tupu emee emume eji echeta Islamic Revolution nke mere n’afọ 1979.
Cheta na ebidoro ngagharịiwe na mba Iran n’ọnwa Sepụtemba afọ 2023 dịkaotu nwaanyị nwụrụ n’aka ndị ọrụ nchekwa mama oyighị Hijab etu iwu siri kwuo.

Kama ndị a na-ebo ebubo ihe ndị ọzọ dịka ịrụrụ mba ndị ọzo ọrụ nyopụ na Iran, ndị eboro ebubo igbu mmadụ na ndị mebiri ihe gọọmentị agaghị agbaghara ha.
Ha kwukwara na mgbaghara a agaghị erute ndị nwere akwụkwọ ikike mba ọzọ..
Ụwa anyị bi n’ime ya ugbua adịghị etu ọ dịbụ na mgbe gboo.
N’oge gara aga, ndị mmadụ na-eji ụkwụ agagharị, na-aga ahịa, ọrụ ugbo, achụ nta, nakwa na-eme njem.
Ụwa ọgbara ọhụrụ a bụ nke na-akwado oke ịnọdụ ala, ma mmadụ a chọrọ ya ma ọ chọghị ya.
Ọtụtụ mmadụ na-anọ ala ogologo awa n’ime ụgbọala, n’ụlọakwụkwọ, n’ụlọọrụ, n’ụlọ ọkachasị oge anyị na-elele ihe onyonyo TV.
Ndị sanyesị nakwa ndị ọrụ ahụike enyopụtala na oke ịnọdụ ala nwereike ibutere mmadụ ọtụtụ ọnọdụ ahụike ọjọọ nke nwereike idula mmadụ mmụọ.
Ụfọdụ ọrịa nakwa ọnọdụ ahụike oke ịnọdụ ala nwereike ịbutere mmadụ gụnyere: Ọrịa shuga, ọrịa obi, ụfọdụ ọrịa kansa, oke ibu (nke na-akpata ọtụtụ ọrịa ndị ọzọ) nakwa ọnwụ.
Dọkịnta Emma Wilmot gbara ama nke a dịka ọ kọwara na nnyocha ha gosiri na ndị na-anọ ala ogologo oge na-ebutekarị ọrịa ndị a.
Nke bụ eziokwu bụ na e nyochapụtara na ịnọdụ ala ogologo oge na-emetụta mmepụta ihe na-enye ike n’ime ahụ mmadụ nke Bekee na-akpọ ‘Glucose’, nakwa akụrụngwa nke a na-akpọ ‘insulin’, bụ ihe na-enye aka ka Glucose na-adị n’ọbara mmadụ etu o kwesịrị.
  Mgbe ụfọdụ ọ na-abụ n’ime ụgbọala ka ndị mmadụ na-anọ ogologo awa n’ime ya.
Onye ọkachamara ọzọ, bụ Dọkịnta Udodi Okoli, kwukwara na “ịnọdụ ala ogologo awa nwere ike ịkpata nsogbu n’ọkpụkpụ azụ mmadụ, ọkachasị ma ọ bụrụ na onye ahụ anaghị anọdụ ala n’ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị, maọbụ na ọ naghị eji oche ahaziri maka ịnọdụ ala n’ụzọ dị mma” Ọ kọwara na ọ bụrụ na mmadụ na anọ ala ogologo awa n’ihu kọmpụta ya ma odobeghi isi ya maọbụ olu ya n’ụzọ ziri ezi, olu nwereike imalite igbu ya mgbu.
Okoli kwuru na ịgba mbọ kwụrụ ọtọ ma gagharịa nwereike inye aka belata ọnọdụ ndị a.
O kwukwara na mmadụ anaghị emegharị ahụ nwereike ime mmụọ ya daa mba maọbụ o nwereike ịmetụta ahụike echiche ya n’ụzọ ọjọọ..

Ayom Mlanga nwetara vootu 766 ma Maazị Terwase Orbunde nwetara vootu abụọ Sinetọ Basheer Lado kọwara na Ụkọchukwu Alia nwetara votu kachasị elu ka a chịkọtara mpụtara sitere kansụl iri na otu na mmegharị ahụ were tinyere ya mpụtara kansul iri na abụọ ndị ọzọ otu paati ahụ mere na mbụ were rute na nchịkọta ọnụ ọgụgụ ahụ.
Ọ jara ndị nnọchi anya ndị sonyere na ntuliaka ime ụlọ ahụ maka ezi akparamagwa ha n’oge mmemme ahụ ma gbaa ha ume ka ha jisie ike na paati ahụ ruo mgbe e nwetara mmeri na ntuliaka izugbe.
Na nzaghachi mpụtara si n’emume ahụ n’ọgbakọ pụrụ iche, Onye isi oche APC na Steeti Benue, Maazị Austin Agada kwughachiri mkpebi siri ike nke otu paati ahụ iji weghachi steeti Benue na ụzọ mmepe site na mkpọmkpọ ebe ọchịchị PDP debere ya.
Agada kwuru na ya ahụla akara mmeri a na-ahụ anya dị n’akụkụ APC na Benue steeti ebe Ụkọchukwu Alia nwetara mmeri ọzọ na mmegharị ntuliaka ahụ.
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, kọmitii mkpegharị ikpe nke ndị isi ọchịchị etiti nke APC hibere ga-amalite nzukọ otu ụbọchị na Fraịde iji nụrụ mkpesa gbadoro ụkwụ na mmegharị ntuliaka ahụ site n’aka ndị so zọọ ọchịchị..
Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari n’ụbọchị Fraịde gwara ụmụ amaala Naijiria ka ha nye ya ụbọchị asaa iji dozie nsogbu ụkọ akwụkwọ ego nke ghọrọ ihe iche aka mgba n’ime mba ahụ site n’atụmatụ nke ụlọ akụ etiti ịgbanwe akwụkwọ ego mba ahụ.
Mgbe ọ na-agwa ọgbakọ ndị gọvanọ okwu bụ ndị bịara n’ụlọ ebe obibi Onyeisiala ka ha chọọ ọgwụgwọ maka ụkọ akwụkwọ ego nke ha kwuru na ọ na-etetọ mbọ nke gọọmenti nọ ugbu a n’igbanwe akụ na ụba mba ahụ.
Onyeisiala Buhari kwuru na nhazigharị akwụkwọ ego ga-eme ka akụ na ụba dịkwuo mma ma na-enye uru dị ogologo oge ma na-egosipụta obi abụọ banyere ntinye aka nke ụlọ akụ karịsịa maka ọganihu nke amụma ahụ.
“Ụfọdụ ụlọ akụ adịghị arụ ọrụ ma na-eche naanị banyere onwe ha”, Onyeisiala ahụ kwuru, “ọbụlagodi na agbakwunyere otu afọ, nsogbu ndị metụtara ịchọ ọdịmma onwe onye na anyaukwu agaghị apụ.” O kwuru na ya ahụla akụkọ telivishọn gbasara ụkọ akwụkwọ ego na ihe isi ike nye ndị azụmaahịa obodo na ndị nkịtị ma kwe nkwa iji abalị asaa n’ime abali iri a ma mebie ihe ọ bụla na-egbochi mmejuputa mgbanwe akwukwo ego ahụ.
“M ga-alaghachi na ụlọ akụ etiti na ụlọ ọrụ mbipụta akwụkwọ ego.
A ga-enwe mkpebi n’otu ụzọ ma ọ bụ nke ọzọ n’ime ụbọchị asaa fọdụrụnụ n’ime ndọtị ụbọchị iri ahụ,” Onyeisiala kwere nkwa a.
Mkpesa Ndị Gọvanọ ahụ gwara Onyeisiala na, ebe ha kwekọrịtara na mkpebi ya maka imeghari akwụkwọ ego dị mma ma na-akwado ya nke ọma, mana mmejupụta ya bụzi ihe na-ebute nsogbu nye ndị mmadụ.
Ha gwara Onyeisiala na dịka ndị isi ọchịchị na paati na steeti ha dị iche iche, ha na-enwe nchegbu maka ndakpọ akụ na ụba na usoro ntuliaka na-abịa.
Onyeisiala ahụ kwuru na mgbe ọ tụlere inye nkwado na amụma ahụ, ọ rịọrọ ka ụlọ akụ etiti kwenye na ọ nweghị akwụkwọ ego a ga-ebipụta na mba ofesi ma nyekwa ya obi ike na e nwere ikike na akụrụngwa zuru ezu iji bipụta ego n’ime mba ahụ.
O kwuru na ọ dị ya mkpa ịlaghachi azụ iji chọpụta ihe na-eme n’ezie.
Onyeisiala Buhari gwara ndị gọvanọ na ka ọ na-adị ndị mmadụ nso, na ya anụla akwa ha na ya ga-eme ihe ga-eme ka ọ dị mma..
Kọmitii izugbe (National Working Committee) nke otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị People’s Democratic Party, (PDP), ewepụtala kọmitii nke mmadụ anọ mejupụtara nke ga-achịkwa paati ahụ na steeti Ekiti, n’ime Naijiria.
Osote onye isi oche PDP, Taofeek Arapaja, mebere kọmitii ahụ n’Abuja, isi obodo Naijiria.
Ọ kpọkuru kọmitii ahụ ka o dozie esemokwu dị n’etiti ndị otu paati ahụ e mejọrọ iji mee ka paati ahụ nweta ohere mmeri na ntuliaka na steeti ahụ.
Ọrụ dịịrị ụnụ ịhụ na ụnụ weere ohere a iji wetaghachi paati a ma wugharịa ya iji nweta mmeri a chọrọ.
Kọmitii a kwesịrị inye pati a nsonye ọhụrụ maka ndị otu ya niile’’.
“Anyị kwenyere site n’amara Chineke, nakwa site na nkwado gị, anyị nwere ihe niile ọ ga-ewe iji mee udo ma jikọta ndị otu anyị tupu ntuli aka na-abịa.” Steeti Ekiti, bụ otu n’ime steeti ndị Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC), na-eme ntuliaka adanyeghị n’oge na mba ahụ.
Gọvanọ Osun Steeti, Sinetọ Ademola Adeleke akwadola ngwugwu ọdịmma ndị ọrụ obodo na steeti ahụ.
Edemede ewelitere na nke a ma binye aka na ya K.N.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Akintọla n’aha onye isi ọrụ steeti; kwuru na ịkwụ ụgwọ ga-amalite ozugbo.
Edemede aha ya bụ ihe na-emetụta ndị ọrụ ọhaneze (ndị na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndị lara ezumike nka), kwuru na Gọvanọ Adeleke enyela iwu ịkwụ ụgwọ ụgwọ ọnwa ọkara nke ụgwọ ọnwa na nkwado ego nke mmemme nkwalite.
Akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ gara n’ihu kwuo na ngwugwu ọdịmma ahụ bụ maka ndị na-arụsi ọrụ ike na ndị lara ezumike nka n’ọkwa ọchịchị steeti na ime obodo.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Ntuziaka Gọvanọ dịka ndetu ahụ siri kwuo, nyere iwu ka a kwụọ ụgwọ ọnwa nke ọkara ụgwọ ọnwa maka Jenụwarị 2016.
                                                      Ọ tụkwara aka n’ịkwụ ụgwọ nke ọkara ụgwọ ọnwa otu ugboro na nkeji iri na ise, malite na nkeji nke abụọ nke afọ 2023.
                                                       Ntuziaka ndị ọzọ dị ka e depụtara na ndetu ahụ gụnyere: “Ụgwọ ọnwa nke ọkara ụgwọ ọnwa nye ndị na-atụnye ụtụ (State na Local) bụ ndị na-anataghị ụgwọ ọrụ ha.
                                                                                                                                                                                                   Ikwu ụgwọ mwepu pụtara ọnwa anọ (4) pụtara (Mee na June, 2019, Febụwarị, 2020 na Ọktọba, 2022) na-amalite site na ịkwụ ụgwọ mwepu nke May 2019 na atọ ndị ọzọ.
(3) mwepu ọnwa otu ugboro kwa nkeji iri na ise; na nkwado ego nke afọ 2019 ruo 2022 nkwalite mmega ”.
                                     Edere akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ na Senior Management Services, Onye odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide, Kọmitii Na-ahụ Maka Ndị Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Ndị Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Ọchịchị, Onye odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide, Ministry of Economic Planning, Budget & Development, The Permanent Secretary, Ministry of Local Government & Chieftaincy Affairs and Office of the Accountant General.
Onyeisi otu ndị nta akụkọ Naijiria (NUJ) bụ Chris Isiguzo enyela ndị nta akụkọ n’ofe mba ahụ ka ha bụrụ ndị ọkachamara na ndị na-ahụ maka ịrụ ọrụ ha n’ihu, n’oge na mgbe ntuli aka izugbe nke 2023 gasịrị.
                                                                                                                                                                      Mazị Isiguzo nyere nke a n’ememme ncheta ọmụmụ pụrụiche iji mee emume jubilii ọla edo ya na Abuja, isi obodo mba ahụ.
                                                  O kwuru na ndị nta akụkọ ga-agbarịrị ọrụ ha n’ụzọ ziri ezi na-enweghị isi n’okpukpe ma ọ bụ agbụrụ.
                                                                                         “A na-atụ anya na ndị nta akụkọ ga-emekọrịta n’etiti ndị na-asọ mpi na ụlọ ọrụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị site na ịkọ akụkọ ziri ezi na ohere ohere, ịkụziri ụmụ amaala banyere usoro ntuli aka na nhọrọ ndị dịnụ nke ndị na-eme ntuli aka, maka ọtụtụ mmadụ ime nhọrọ ziri ezi.”                                                                N’okwu ya na mmemme ahụ, Media Icon, Oriakụ Moji Makanjuola, kọwara onye isi oche NUJ dị ka onye ndu nwere amamihe, amamihe na obi umeala wee kpee ekpere ka Chineke gọzie ndụ ya.
                                                                                                                                                                                        Maka ndị isi oche, otu n’okpuru nduzi Isiguzo enweela “Udo, ịdị n’otu na ọganihu” Onye nhazi emume a bụ Maazị Amos Dunia toro ndị isi otu otu ahụ na-agbakwụnye na onye isi oche NUJ kwesịrị ka e mee emume dịka ọ kwụsiri ike n’ebe ndị otu nọ.
                                                                                                “Obi ụtọ ụbọchị ọmụmụ ọla edo nye enyi na nwanne nwoke, Chief Chris Isiguzo, ị bụ nwoke nwere mmụọ siri ike.”                                                             Onye isi oche otu FCT Council, Emmanuel Ogbeche kwuru na onye ndu Chris Isiguzo ewepụtala oge ọhụrụ maka ọrụ ntaakụkọ site na nyocha nke ọma nke akwụkwọ iwu otu.
Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ndị ntorobịa Naijiria, NYSC arịọla arịrịọ maka nchekwa zuru oke na Orientation Camps na Corps Lodges n’ofe mba ahụ.
Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ NYSC, ndị nta akụkọ na mmekọrịta ọha na eze, Mr Eddy Megwa na nkwupụta gosipụtara na onyeisi oche, nke National Governing Board, Fatima Abubakar rịọrọ nke a Wednesday mgbe o duuru ndị òtù ndị ọzọ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na nleta nkwanye ùgwù na Inspector General of Police.
Mazị Alkali Baba Usman n’ụlọ ọrụ Force Headquarters dị n’Abuja.
Onye isi oche ahụ, bụ onye jara ndị uwe ojii Naijiria mma maka enyemaka ya rịọkwara ka nchekwa ndị uwe ojii maka ndị otu Corps ga-esonye dị ka ndị ọrụ ad-hoc na ntuli aka izugbe 2023.
                                                                                              “Ndị uwe ojii enweela ike ichekwa ndị otu anyị.
Ị na-enye anyị ezigbo ndị ọrụ na-anọchite anya gị na NYSC National Governing Board.
                      Anyị na-arịọkwa ka ebuga ndị uwe ojii ọzọ n’ogige Orientation anyị.” Onye isi ndị NYSC bụ Brigadier General Yusha’u Dogara Ahmed n’okwu ya kpere ekpere maka nkwado siri ike n’etiti ụlọ ọrụ abụọ a.
                                                                                                                                                                                      Na nzaghachi ya, IGP toro onyinye NYSC Scheme maka mmepe obodo kemgbe ọ malitere ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ afọ iri ise gara aga.
Onyeisi ndị uwe ojii chetara ụbọchị ọrụ ntorobịa ya n’afọ 1985 n’Igbo-Ora dị n’Oyo steeti ochie, kwukwara na atụmatụ a bụ ngwa maka ịdị n’otu na njikọta obodo.   “ NYSC bụ atụmatụ dị oke mma, anyị ga-eme ihe niile anyị nwere ike ime iji hụ na atụmatụ a gara nke ọma.
                                                                         “Anyị ga-enye nchebe zuru oke maka ndị otu Corps ga-esonye dị ka ndị ọrụ ntuli aka n’oge ntuli aka izugbe 2023.”                        IGP kwere nkwa imeziwanye ike ndị Force na-ekere òkè na ntuli aka izugbe na-abịa ma tụlee arịrịọ Onye isi oche NYSC National Governing Board rịọrọ..
Aka na-achị Steeti Kaduna bu Nasir El-Rufai eboola ebubo na o nwere ndị nọ n’ọchịchị Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari achọghị ka pati ha bụ APC merie na ntuliaka.
El-Rufai kwuru nke n’ụbọchị Wenezde na mkparịtaụka ya na Channels TV nwere.
Ọ rụtụrụ aka na ibipụta ego naira ọhụrụ na ụkọ mmanụ ụgbọala nke mere ọtụtụ ụmụ Naijiria ha were eze ekpe ekwere ugbua na mpaghara dị iche iche n’ala Naijiria bụ ihe a ma ama eme ji wụnyere pati ha aja na garị na ntuliaka na-abịa.
Ọ sịrị, “Ekwenyere m na o nwere ndị nọ na Villa chọrọ ka e merie anyị na ntuliaka mana ọ gaghị agara ha.” ” Ha nwere onye ha chọrọ ka ọ bụrụ ya meriri na ntuliaka imeụlọ(APC) mana ọ garịghị ha ka ha siri chọọ.” “Ha na-agbalị ịhụ na anyị emerighị na ntuliaka, zoo n’azụ ebumnobi onyeisiala ime ihe o chere bụ ihe kwesịrị.” Ebubo El-Rufai na-abịa dịka ọ gachara otu izu, onye na-azọ ọkwa Onyeisiala n’aha APC bụ Bola Tinubu kwuru oge ọ gara achụmta vootu n’Abeokuta,isiobodo Ogun steeti na ụkọ mmanụ ụgbọala na ibipụta ego ọhụrụ bụ iji hụ na ya emerịghị na ntuliaka.
Tinubu na ndị nwere agba na APC dịka Ahmed Lawan bụ onyeisi Ụlọomeiwu Ukwu, Osote Onyeisiala bụ Ọkammụta Yemi Osinbajo, Mịnịsta na -ahụ maka ọrụ bụ Chris Ngige nakwa Mịnịsta njem bụ Rotimi Amaechi, Gọvanọ Ebonyi bụDave Umahi, nke Kogi bụ Yahaya Bello, nke Krọs Rivas bụ Ben Ayade, aka chiribu Imo steeti bụ Rochas Okorocha, Mịnịsta Teknụzụ bụ Ogbonnaya Onu , nke Agụmakwụkwọ bụ Emeka Nwajiuba na ndị ọzọ zọrọ ọkwa onye ga-efe APC ọkọlọtọ na ntuliaka imeụlọ ha mere mana Tinubu meriri.
N’okwu mbipụta ego ọhụrụ, El-Rufai kwuru na ụta adịghịrị onyeisi Ụlọakụ Etiti bụ Godwin Emefiele dịka Onyeisial Buhari mebuorola ụdị ihe a mbụ iji hụ na ọ kụrụ ndị zupuru ego ahịa.
“Ndị mmadụ na-ata onyeisi CBN ụta maka ibipụta ego ọhụrụ mana ndị mmadụ kwesịrị ị laghachi azụ hụ na Buhari meburu ya n’oge ọchịchị ya na Idiagbon bụ oge ọ gbanwere ego iji jide ndị zofuru ego ha nwetara n’ụzọ akwụghị ọtọ.”.
Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naijirịa ekwupụtala ngalaba nke Gọvanọ Edo steeti bụ Godwin Obaseki dịka ezigbo ndị ga-azọ ọkwa pati People’s Democratic Party (PDP) na ntuliaka izugbe maka steeti ahụ na-abịa.
                                                                                                                                                                  Mkpebi nke sitere na nchikota nke ikpe gbasara ọgbaghara ọchịchị ewepụtala nchegbu maka ndị kwesịrị ekwesị ịnọchite anya pati na ntuli aka.
          Isi ihe dị n’okwu a bụ onye nwere ikike na ntuli aka mbụ maka ịhọpụta ndị na-ebu ọkọlọtọ pati maka nhoputa ndi omebe iwu mba na ụlọ omebe iwu steeti.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             N’ịkpe ikpe na mkpegharị nke Omoregie Ogbeide-Ihama na ndị ọzọ gbara Maazị Mathew Iduoriyekemwen na ndị ọzọ, ụlọikpe Apex kwuru na ikpe onye mkpegharị ikpe ezighi ezi n’ihi na esiteghị n’ikpe ụlọikpe mkpegharị ikpe.
N’ime mkpesa ahụ ndị mkpegharị ikpe arịọla ka a kpụgharịa ikpe ụlọikpe dị ala na-ekwu na o mehiere n’iwu mgbe ha kwupụtaghị na ha bụ ndị PDP tozuru oke na ntuliaka.
                                                                         Mana ụlọikpe kacha elu n’ikpe ya nke Ọkaikpe Centus Nweze nyere, kagburu mkpegharị ikpe ahụ maka na o nweghị ike.
                                                        Dịka ikpe ahụ siri kwuo, mkpesa ga-adabere na okwu ndị a na-arụ n’ụlọ ikpe dị ala iji ruo eru maka nyocha.
                                                                         Ụlọ ikpe Apex kwuru na, “Mkpegharị ọ bụla nke na-adịghị agbagha okwu ndị e welitere n’ụlọikpe dị ala enweghị ike.
                                                                Ana m etinye ikpe maka ndị zara ajụjụ ahụ.
” N’ịzaghachi ikpe ahụ, osote aka na-achị Edo steeti, Philip Shuabu kọwara ya dị ka ‘onye enweghị mmeri agaghị emeri’, ikpe ụlọikpe kacha mara otu akụkụ nke Gọvanọ Godwin Obaseki bụ ezigbo onye na-azọ ọkwa pati People’s Democratic Party (PDP).
Ngalaba na-ahazi ntuliaka bụ Inec n’ịchafụ, ekwuola na ụkọ mmanụ ụgbọala nke dị ugbua na Naịjirịa nwereike imetụta ntuliaka a na-akwado n’ọnwa Febrụwarị na Maachị afọ a.
Mahmood Yakubu bụ onyeisioche Inec kwuru nke a n’ụbọchị Tuzde n’Abuja n’ọgbakọ nke ya na otu jikọrọ ndị ọrụ ụgbọala nwere n’isi ụlọọrụ Inec.
Otu abụọ sonyere n’ọgbakọ a bụ ndị ‘Nigerian Association of Road Transport Owners’ (NARTO), ndị ‘National Union of Road Transport Workers’ (NURTW), na ụfọdụ ndị ọzọ.
“Inec kwenyere n’ụjọ ụnụ na-atụ maka ụkọ mmanụ ụgbọala nakwa etu o nwere ike iji metụta njem ndịọrụ anyị n’ụbọchị ntuliaka,” Yakubu kwuru n’ọgbakọ ahụ.
“Nke bụ eziokwu bụ na ọ bụrụ na ahụghị mmanụ ụgbọala, ọ ga-emetụta atụmatụ anyị nwere maka ụbọchị ahụ.” “Nke a mere na mụ na ndị isi ụlọọrụ Nigerian National Petroleum Company (NNPC) ga-enwe ọgbakọ iji chọọ ihe anyị ga-eme maka ọnọdụ a nakwa etu anyi ga-esi gbochie ọdachi.” Yakubu rịọrọ ndị isi NURTW na NARTO ka ha rụọ ọrụ ha nke ọma hapụ imenyere otu onye hapụ onye nke ọzọ dịka ha ga na-ebugharị ndịọrụ Inec n’ụbọchị ntuliaka.

“Ịkụ mkpụrụ osisi dị ka groundnut na soya kwesịrị ịgbaso ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ozugbo a kụrụ ọka, na-ekwusi ike na ịgha mkpụrụ cowpea kwesịrị ịmalite na July 22.”                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Mana ọ gbakwụnyere na a ga-akụ cowpea na mbido Julaị n’ebe dịka Kano, Jigawa na mpaghara ugwu Bauchi steeti.

“Dịka ọmụmaatụ, savanna ndịda guinea, dị ka mpaghara ndịda nke steeti Kaduna, mmiri ozuzo kwụsịrị n’etiti abali ise ruo abali iri nke onwaOctoba, ebe n’akụkụ nkụ nke mba ahụ, mmiri ozuzo na-akwụsị n’abali iri ato nke onwa Septemba.
“Foto a dị n’elu ga-adịgide n’oge ọrụ ugbo nke afọ a ma e wezụga Jigawa, Kano na Katsina State ebe e buru amụma na mmiri ozuzo ga-akwụsị n’oge na-adịghị anya,” ka o kwuru.

                                                        Joshua, onye bụbu onye meriri n’agba n’otu oke arọ ụwa ugboro abụọ, akwadoro na mbụ ịlụso Tyson Fury ọgụ n’ọgụ mana emeghị ya n’ihi okwu nkwado.

“Anọghị m ebe a ịlụso ndị mmadụ ọgụ.
                                                                                                                 Ọ bụrụ na ndị mmadụ chọrọ ka m laa ezumike nka m ga-ala ezumike nka.
Agaghị m ịlụ ọgụ ma ọ bụrụ na ndị mmadụ achọghị ka m.

Nke ahụ bụ ihe dị mkpa, “ka o kwuru.

Onye na-ekwuchitere ụlọ omebe iwu Naijiria, Femi Gbajabiamila eulogized onye isi ala Nigeria họpụtara, Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu, na ụbọchị ọmụmụ ya nke afo iri asaa na otu.
                                                                                                                                                                                                             Gbajabiamila kwuru na Tinubu egosipụtala ikike ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ na ekwesịrị ka ndị Naijiria nwere ezi obi mee mmemme.
O kwuru na onye isi ala a họpụtara bụ onye nkịta nwere mkpebi siri ike na-alụ ọgụ maka ọha na eze na-eme ezi omume ọbụna dịka ọ kọwara Tinubu dị ka “onye mmadụ.”                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Onye ọnụ na-ekwu okwu Gbajabiamila nwere obi ụtọ na Tinubu emechaala mezuo ebumnuche ya ịbụ onyeisiala Naijiria, na-ekwu na mmeri ya na ntuli aka onye isi ala na nke mba ndị e mere n’abali iri abuo na ise nke onwa Februari bụ onyinye ụbọchị ọmụmụ kwesịrị ekwesị.
                              Ọbịbịa Tinubu dị ka onyeisi oche, Gbajabiamila kwuru, megidere ihe ọ bụla, na-ekwu na Chineke Pụrụ Ime Ihe Niile kwadoro n’ezie ma nye ya mmeri.
Gbajabiamila kwuru na dịka otu n’ime ndị nọ n’okpuru ụlọ akwụkwọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na nduzi nke Tinubu, ọ bụghị ihe ijuanya na onyeisi oche a họpụtara ahọpụta nọgidere na-elekwasị anya na enweghị mgbagha n’oge niile nke asọmpi onyeisi oche.
                                                                               “Ana m eme emume ncheta ọmụmụ onye isi ala anyị a họpụtara ahọpụta, Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu, ụbọchị ọmụmụ ụbọchị iri asaa na otu.
                 Tinubu egosila kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ na ọ bụ onye ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na-arụ ọrụ mgbe niile ka Naijiria bụrụ nnukwu.
                         “Anyị niile na-ekele Chineke maka ndụ onye isi ala a họpụtara ahọpụta, anyị na-ekpekwa ekpere ka ọ gaa n’ihu na-enye ya ahụike ka ọ nweta ọchịchọ ya maka ọdịmma Naijiria.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 “Akụkọ Asiwaju bụ nke onye Naijiria ọ bụla, nwata na okenye kwesịrị ịmụ nke ọma ma mụta ihe na ya.
                                                                                   Nke a bụ nwoke gbara mbọ megide ihe ọ bụla ịpụta dịka onye ga-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala nke APC.
Ọbụna ihe na-awụ akpata oyi n’ahụ bụ mpụta ya dị ka Onye-isi-nhọpụta a họpụtara.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      “Tụkwasị obi Asiwaju, ọ meriri oké ifufe ahụ wee gafere n’ihe mgbochi nile ka o wee nwee mmeri.
                                                                                          Nke ahụ bụ ụdị nwoke Naijiria nwere ihu ọma inwe n’oge a.
Maka ndị anyị maara Asiwaju ruo ọtụtụ iri afọ, anyị ji n’aka na ọ gaghị emechu Naijiria na ndị Naijiria iwe, “Onye isi okwu kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                            Tinubu, Gbajabiamila kwukwara, akpụpụtala onwe ya niche ọ bụghị naanị na Nigeria na Africa kamakwa n’ụwa dum, na-ekwupụta na ọtụtụ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na-emepe emepe ugbu a nwere ọrụ ịmụta site na nhọpụta onye isi ala.
                                                                                                          Onye isi okwu kwuru na n’okpuru Tinubu, Naijiria ga-ahụ ezigbo ọchịchị na-enwetụbeghị ụdị ya dị ka egosipụtara na Lagos, nke bụ ebe azụmaahịa azụmahịa nke Africa..
Onyeisiala mba Ghana bụ Nana Akufo-Addo kwuru na Mọnde na iwu megidere ụmụnwoke na-edịna ụmụnwoke ibe ha nakwa ụmụnwaanyị na-edịna ụmụnwaanyị ibe ha nke ndị ụlọomeiwu mba ahụ na-arụrụitaụka maka ya, abụrụla ihe ‘emegharịrị’ site n’aka gọọmentị ya.
O kwuru nke a n’ọgbakọ izinye ndị ntaakụkọ ozi nke ya na osote onyeisiala mba Amerịka bụ Kamala Harris mere n’ụbọchị ahụ.
O kwupụtara na iwu a na-ewu abụghị atụmatụ gọọmentị kama na ọ bụ ihe ụfọdụ ndị nkiti wetaara ụlọomeiwu ha.
O kwuru na ọkaikpe gọọmentị ya zigaara ndị kọmịtịị ụlọomeiwu ihe iwu mba ha kwuru nakwa ihe iwu akwadoghi banyere mkpesa a ndị mmadụ na-eme n’okwu ndị na-edịna ndị okike ibe ha.
“Ihe ma ghọtara bụ na akụkụ gbara ọkpụrụkpụ n’iwu abụrụla ihe agbanwere site n’ozi ọkaikpe gọọmentị wetere” mana ọ kwụghị ihe ọzọ n’uju banyere okwu a.” Onyeisiala Akufo-Addo ekweghị kwuo ihe ọ ga-eme ma ndị ụlọomeiwu binyeaka n’iwu a ga-emegide ndị na-edịna ndị okike ibe ha na Ghana dịka o kwuru na ọ ga-achọ ka ha tule ihe iwu nwereike isi metụta ikike dịrị ndị mmadụ.
Nwaada Harris kwuru na o gwaala Onyeisiala Akufo-Addo okwu maka ya bụ iwu ma kwuo na mba Amerịka na-eche n’iwu bụ metụtara ikike dịrị ndị mmadụ.
Ọ bụrụ na iwu a kpọrọ “Promotion of Proper Human Sexual Rights and Ghanaian Family Value Bill” dị ire, a ga-amalịte ịtụ ndị na-edịna ndị okike ibe ha nga dịka ikwado ikike dịrị ha ga-abụzị ihe megidere iwu na mba ahụ.
Ndị ụlọomeiwu mba Ghana mere okwu nrụrịtaụka n’ihu ọha banyere atụmatụ iwu a na 2021.
O dobeghi anya mgbe ha ga-eme ntuliaka banyere inabata maọbụ ikagbu ya bụ iwu.
Ka ọ dị ugbua, mmadụ ejidere na-edịna onye okike ibe ya na Ghana na-aga nga ruo afo atọ ebe ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ anaghị akwado ụdịrị echiche a ma ncha mana iwu a dị ire, a ga-amalịte ịtụ ndị a nga ogologo afo karịa.
Akufo-Addo ekwubuola okwu n’oge gara aga megide ụmụnwoke ịlụ onwe ha nakwa ụmụnwaanyị ịlụ onwe dịka o kwuru na iwu mba ahụ agaghị akwado atụmatụ a n’ụwa a maọbụ n’ụwa ọzọ..
Mịnịstrị nchekwa nke mba Germany ekwuola na ha ezigarala mba Ukraine ụgbọala na-atụ ogbunigwe a kpọrọ ‘Leopard 2 Tank’ nke ụdị ya bụ ọgbaraụwa gharịị.
Ụgbọala ndị a -dị abụọ n’ọnụọgụ – so na nkwa enyemaka Germany kwere Ukraine n’agha ha na-alụ iji chekwaa mba ha na mwakpo mba Rọshịa wakporo ha.
Mịnịsta nchekwa mba Germany bụ Boris Pistorius kwuru na ha nwere olileanya na ụgbọala ndị ahụ ga-enyere Ukraine aka nke ukwuu n’ihu agha.
N’otu aka ahụ kwa, ụgbọala abụọ na-atụkwa ogbunigwe a kpọrọ ‘Challenger 2’ erukwaala mba Ukraine aka site na mba UK.
Ugboro ugboro ka mba Ukraiane na-akpọku mba Europe dị icheiche maka enyemaka ngwaọgụ, ego, nri na ihe ndị ọzọ n’agha mba Roshia na-ebuso ha.
Gọọmentị Ukraine ekwubeghị ma ha enwetala ụgbọala ‘Leopard 2’ abụọ ahụ si mba Germany, mana ha kwuru na ụgbọala ‘Challenger 2’ abụọ si mba UK erutela ha aka.
Mba UK kwuru na ndị agha mba Ukraine bịara nweta ọzụzụ maka etu e si anya ụgbọala ‘tank’ ndị ahụ alaghachila na mba ha..
Gọọmentị etiti na ndị isi otu jikọrọ ndịọrụ Naịjirịa bụ Nigeria Labour Congress enweela ọgbakọ iji zeere abụbụ ọrụ ndị NLC sị na ha ga-agba ma ọ bụrụ na ụkọ ego ka na-aga n’ihu na Naịjirịa.
Ọ bụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ndị ọrụ bụ Chris Ngige kpọrọ ọgbakọ a n’ụbọchị Mọnde n’Abuja, nke onyeisi ụlọakụ etiti bụ Godwin Emefiele, na onyeisi ndị NLC bụ Joe Ajaero sonyere na ya.
Ndị NLC zigaburu akwụkwọ ozi nye Ngige ma na-ekwu na ụkọ ego dị na Naịjirịa ugbua emetụtala ndị ọrụ n’ụzọ dị ukwu, ma dọọ aka na ntị na ọ bụrụ na CBN emeghị ka ndị ụlọakụ nwee ego ha ga na-enye ndị mmadụ, na ha ga-amalite abụbụọrụ.
N’ọgbakọ ahụ, Emefiele, bụ onyeisi CBN kwuru na ha amalitelarị inye ndị ụlọakụ nnukwu ego ha ga na-akwụ ndị mmadụ iji belata ụkọ ego a.
O kwukwara na ha nyere ụlọakụ dị icheiche iwu ka ha rụọ ọrụ n’ụbọchị Satọde nakwa Sọnde iji na-akwụ ndị mmadụ ụgwọ.
N’okwu nke ya, Ajaero bụ onyeisi NLC kwuru na afọ juru ha maka nkọwa Emefiele nyere ma kwuo ha agaghị agazi n’iru ịgba abụbụ ọrụ..
Ihe anyị ma maka ọkụ gbara n’akụkụ ahịa ‘Balogun Market’ dị na Legọs steetiIhe anyị ma maka ọkụ gbara n’akụkụ ahịa ‘Balogun Market’ dị na Legọs steeti Ọkụ gbara akụkụotu ụlọ ebe ndị mmadụ na-echekwa ngwaahịa ha n’ahịa ‘Balogun Market’ dị na Legọs n’ụtụtụ Tuzde a.
Amabeghị ihe kpatara ọkụ a ugbua nke metụtaraụlọelu ogogo anọebe ndị mmadụ na-echekwa ngwaahịa ha n’ahịa a.
Ndị ọrụ mgbanyụ ọkụ Legọs steeti mechara bịaruo ebe ahụ awa olemole ka ya bụ ọkụ malitere ịgba.
Ọnụ na-ekwuru ha bụ Amodu Shakiru gwara ndi ntaakuko n’ehihe Tuzde na ha gbara mbọ mecha menyụọ ya bụ ọkụ dịka o kwuru na enweghi onye nwụrụ n’ihe ọdachị a dapụtara ebe ahụ.
N’okwu ya, ọ sị: “Naanị mmadụ ise merụrụ obere ahụ n’ebe ahụ ọkụ gbara mana enyela ha ọgwụgwụ ngwa ngwa.
Anyị na-eme nnyocha ịma ihe kpara ọkụ a.” O kwuru na ha ga-ezipụta ozi zuruoke banyere ihe a mere ebe ahụ n’oge adịghị anya.
Ụfọdụ ndị nọ ebe ahụ gwakwara onye ntaakụkọ garụrụ ebe ahụ okwu ebubo nke kwuru na ha ma na ọ bụ ndị mmadụ ma ụma mụnye ya bụ ọkụ iji megide otu agbụrụ ndị na-ere ahịa ebe ahụ.
Shakiru sara okwu a mgbe ya na ndi ntaakuko kwuru okwu ma kwuo: “Ebubo na ọ bụ ndị mmadụ munyere ọkụ a achịtaghị aja ugbua n’ihi enwebeghị ihe akaebe gosiri nke a.” O kwuru na agbanyeghi nke a, na ya bụ ebubo ga-eru ndị uweojii Legọs steeti ntị maka nnyocha zuruoke.
Nke a sokwa akụkọ ebubo ọzọ dapụtara n’oge ntuliaka 2023 mgbe ahịa Akere dịkwa na Legọs gbara ọkụ.
Ebubo olemole dapụtara na ụfọdụ ndị ma ụma mmunye ahịa ahụ ọkụ iji megide otu agbụrụ mana ndị uweojii steeti ahụ kụchapụrụ ya bụ akụkọ ma kwuo na enweghi ihe gosiri nke a dịka ha kwuru na ha na-enyocha ihe nwereike ịkpata ya bụ ọkụ.
A na-eche na ngwaahịa ndị mmadụ e che ruru nde kwuru nde gbara ọkụ n’ebe ahụ.
Nke a bụ maka na ọtụtụ ụlọ nọkọchara ọnụ na mpaghara ebe ahụ, ọzọkwa bụ na ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ nke ngwaahịa ndị mmadụ nọkwa n’ime ha..
Onyeisiala Naijiria, Muhammadu Buhari enwela ọñụ n’isi onyeisiala a họpụtara ọhụrụ, Bola Tinubu dịka ọ na-agba afọ iri asaa na otu n’abalị iri na itoolu ọnwa Maachị 2023, nakwa na nkwadebe idu obodo a site n’ọnwa Mee.
Onyeisiala sonyeere ndị ezinaụlọ onyeisiala ọhụrụ, ọ kachasị nwunye ya, Sịnetọ Oluremi Tinubu, ndị mmekọ azụmahịa na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-enwe aṅụrị ịgba afọ a dị ịrịba ama, nke jupụtara n’ọtụtụ afọ ahụmahụ na ihe ọ rụpụtara na ụlọ ọrụ nke onwe na nke ọha ma kwadebe ya maka mmeri nke ọnwa Febụwarị, 2023.
Onyeisiala Buhari kwenyere na ịhụnanya, enyi na mmesapụ aka nke Tinubu ewepụtala ụzọ maka mmekọrịta ndị enyi, n’ụlọ na mba ụwa, nke ga-eme ka ọchịchị ya duzie akụ na ụba ma kwado ihe mmepụta nke ndị ndu gara aga.
“Dị ka ọ na-akwado iweghara ikike nke onye ndu, Ọnyeisiala na-ekwusi ike na njirimara Tinubu na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị sitere na 90’s, ọ rụsiri ọrụ ike na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị paati, a họpụtara ya ka onye Sịnetọ emesiakwa dị ka Gọvanọ Lagos Steeti.
Ọdị uchu itinye aka na nhazi nke ndu na na ọkwa ndị omebe iwu ruo ọtụtụ afọ,” President Buhari prays for the wellbeing of Asiwaju and his family.
Onye isi ala Naijiria, Muhammadu Buhari na-eru uju maka ọnwụ Lt.
General Oladipo Diya, onye jere ozi dịka onye isi ndị ọrụ site na 1993 ruo 1997 na osote onye isi oche nke Provisional Ruling Council na 1994.
                                                                                                                                                            General Diya nwụrụ na ubochi Sọnde, Maachị abali iri abuo na isii, 2023.
Onye isi ala na-asọpụrụ ọrụ obi ike na obi ike nke General Diya na ndị agha Nigeria na ọrụ raara onwe ya nye obodo dịka General Officer Commanding, 82 Division, Commandant, nke National War College (1991-1993), Chief of Defence Staff and Military Governor of Ogun Steeti site na Jenụwarị 1984 ruo Ọgọst 1985.
                                                                                                   Onye isi ala ahụ na-echeta na amaara Diya maka ọkaibe, nka nhazi na ọzụzụ pụrụiche, ma gosipụtakwa omume ọma ndị a n’ọrụ dị mkpa ọ na-arụ n’ọkwa ọchịchị dịka onye ọrụ agha.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                Onye isi ala na-ekele onye bụbu Chief of General Staff maka ịhụnanya, nkwenye na iguzosi ike n’ihe nye obodo ọ hụrụ n’anya nke ukwuu wee lụọ ọgụ nke ukwuu n’ihu agha iji chebe ịdị n’otu ya.
                                                                                                                                                                                             N’aha Gọọmenti Naijiria, Onye isi ala na-enye ezinaụlọ, ndị enyi na ndị ọrụ ibe Diya akasi obi.
                                                                                                  Onye isi ala Buhari na-ekpe ekpere ka mkpụrụ obi General Diya nweta izu ike n’ebe Onye Okike ya nọ, ka echefukwala onyinye ọ na-enye mba.
           Ka ọ dị ugbu a, onye isi ụlọ omebe iwu nke Naijiria, Ahmad Lawan, ezipụla ezinaụlọ onye bụbu onye isi ndị ọrụ izugbe, Lt.
General Oladipo Diya, maka ọnwụ ya na Sọnde.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Sinetọ Lawan na-akasikwa gọọmentị na ndị steeti Ogun steeti dị na ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ Naịjirịa obi maka ọnwụ onye otu oge ọnụọgụ abụọ n’okpuru ọchịchị ndịagha nke General Sani Abacha nwụrụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                 Onye isi oche Senate kọwara General Diya dị ka onye ọrụ mara mma nke rụrụ ọrụ ya nke ọma n’oge ụfọdụ n’ime oge kachasị njọ nke Nigeria.
                    Dị ka Senator Lawan si kwuo, General Diya nọgidere na-asọpụrụ ya n’okpuru ọnọdụ ọjọọ nke kwụsịrị ọrụ agha ya ma nọgide na-asọpụrụ obodo ya ruo mgbe ume ikpeazụ ya.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Ọzọkwa, Onyeisi ụlọ omebe iwu Hon.
Femi Gbajabiamila ekwupụtala mwute maka ọnwụ Chief Oladipo Diya.
                                                                       Na nkwupụta nke Onye Ndụmọdụ Pụrụ Iche na Mgbasa Ozi na Ọha na Ọkà Okwu, Mr Lanre Lasisi, Gbajabiamila chetara nkwa na ọrụ Diya nye Nigeria n’oge ọ na-arụ ọrụ dịka CGS na ọrụ ndị ọzọ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                  Onye isi okwu ahụ kpere ekpere maka mkpụrụ obi onye nwụrụ anwụ General Diya zuru ike ma kpeekwa ekpere ka Chineke nye ezinụlọ ya, ndị mmadụ na gọọmentị Ogun steeti ike iji buo ọnwụ ahụ..
Ndị uwe ojii steeti Nasarawa amachiela ụdị ngagharị iwe na steeti ahụ.
                                                                                                                                             Na nkwupụta nke onye uweojii na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta ọha na eze, DSP, Ramhan Nansel, binyere aka na ya ma nye ndị nta akụkọ na steeti ahụ kwuru na a machibidoro ngagharị iwe niile a na-atụ aro n’okpuru uwe ọ bụla.
                                                                                                                                              Dị ka PPRO si kwuo, “E mere mkpebi ahụ iji gbochie mmebi nke iwu na iwu na ịkwado udo dị ugbu a na steeti ahụ; dị ka akụkọ nwere ọgụgụ isi na nchekwa enweghị ike ịkwado ụdị ọ bụla nke mkpesa na steeti ahụ”                                                                                           Ọ gakwara n’ihu gwa ndị nne na nna na ndị nlekọta ka ha hụ na ụmụ ha na ngalaba ha anaghị emebi iwu a maka na a ga-ejide onye ọ bụla ejidere ma kpee ya ikpe..
Ụmụ nwaanyị egbochiela ndị mmadụ ígafe n’okporoụzọ díka ha mere ngagharịiwe maka ogbugbu ha sị ndị ọchi ehi gburu otu onye n’obodo Ishiagu nke dị n’okpuru ọchịchị Ivo nke dị n’Ebonyio steeti.
Ọnụ na-akwuchitere ndị uweojii steeti ahụ bụ Onome Onovewakpoyeya kwuru na ya bụ ngaghariiwe mere dịka ha nwetara mkpesa maka ya ma sịkwa na ndị uweojii gbochiri ha.
O kwuru na ụmụ nwaanyị a ji ụkwụ ụgbọala ha mụnyere ọkụ na ihe ndị ọzọ mechie okporoụzọ eji eme njem dịka ha mebi kwara ụfọdụ ụgbọala.
O kwukwara na ụmụ nwaanyị a kwadoro ịme ya bụ ngharịiwe ụbọchị asaa maka ogbugbu e kwuru ndị ọchie ehi na-egbu ndị mmadụ na mpaghara ha.
Onovewakpoyeya kwuru sị, ” ụmụ nwaanyị dịka ha mechichara okporoụzọ, gara na nke Eze obodo ha, gaa nke kọmịshọna mgbasaozi, ma mebie ụgbọala, okoko osisi na ihe ndị ọzọ.
Ndị uweojii pụrụ iche gbochiri ha ịgba ụlo ndị nọ ebe ahụ ọkụ”.
Onovewakpoyeya kwukwara na ha ma ndị haziri ya bụ ntuliaka ma sị na akpọola ha ka ha na ndị uweojii nwee mkparịta ụka..
Ngabala ndị uweojii pụrụiche bụ The Department of State Services (DSS) adọọla ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ka ha gbaara nkesa okwu ikpọmasị ọsọ nakwa nkesa akụkọ ụgha nwereike ikpata ọgbaghara maọbụ nwereike itakọta isi ụmụafọ Naịjirịa na Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari maọbụkwanụ onye a họpụtara ịchị Naịjirịa bụ Bola Tinubu ọnụ.
N’ozi ọnụ na-ekwuru ha bụ Peter Afunanya zipụtara n’abalị Satọde o kwuru na ọgbaghara ndị na-achọ ịkpata tigbuo zọgbụ na-amụnye ọkụ ya ga-eregbukwa ha ma o suu.
Ozi a so mkpesa minista ọrụ bụ Festus Keyamo na-ekwukwara APC kwetere ha banyere okwu na Peter Obi nke LP na osote ya jụrụ ịnabata nhọpụta Bola Tinubu dịka onye ga-achị Naịjirịa.
Afunanya kwuru na ha ma maka atụmatụ ụfọdụ na-eme ịhụ na ọgbaghara dapụtara na Naịjirịa ugbua ma kwuo “ndị a tigbuo zigbụọ na-agụ gbaa mbọ wepụ aka na ya.” “Cheta na ụlọọrụ anyị dụrụ ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ọdụ ka ha rube isi n’iwu dịịrị okwu ma bugara ụlọikpọ mkpesa ha ma ọ bụrụ na a nwere akụkụ ntuliaka ha na-enyo enyo.” “Ọ bụ ihe doro anya na ụfọdụ na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị obi adịghị ma na-eso usoro ikpe a, nke a bụ ihe dị mma so usoro ọchịchị kwuo uche ya.
Usoro bụ ihe anyị masịike ga-akwado udo nakwa nchekwa, ka ọha niile nabata nke a.” “Mana ka o dokwaa ọha anya na ụlọọrụ DSS agaghị anabata ndị mmadụ maọbụ otu ọbụla ịme ha sọrọ ha bụ nke ga-akpata ọgbaghara.
Ndị niile na-ekesa okwu akpọmasị bụ ihe nwereike ikpata ọgbaghara mọabụ metụta ọchịchị a họpụtaara Naịjirịa maọbụ akụkụ ọchịchị nọ ugbua kwụsị ya ngwa ngwa.” “Ya mere, ndị ọrụ anyị jiaga n’ihu na-eme ihe ndị dị mkpa iji nyochaa ihe ndị mmadụ na-eme bụ nke na-achọghị ka mba anyị dị mma.
Nke a bụ iji hụ na e nyere ụmụ amaala na ndị bi na gburugburu mba anyị ndụ dị mma nakwa ikike iga mkpa ha.
Ka mmadụ niile nwere ire ya gụọ eze ha ọnụ.”.
Ngagharịiwe kpụ ọkụ n’ọnụ na-aga n’ihu ugbua na mba Israel n’ihi mgbanwe nke aka na-achị mba ahụ bụ Praịm Mịnịsta Benjamin Netanyahu chọrọ itinye n’usoro ikpe na mba ahụ.
Ihe kpatara ngagharịiwe nke a bụ ọchụchụ Netanyahu chụrụ Mịnịsta nchekwa mba Israel bụ Yoav Gallant, n’ihi na o kwuru okwu megide atụmatụ nhazigharị usoro ikpe ziri ezi na mba ahụ bụ nke Netanyahu chọrọ ime.
Mgbanwe a Netanyahu na-achọ itinye ga-enye ndị omeiwu ikike ịkụchapụ mkpebi ụlọikpe kachasị na mba Israel, mana ndị mmadụ na-ekwu na ọ bụrụ na nke a gaa n’ihu ọ pụtara na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na mba ahụ anwụọla.
Gallant kwuru na ọ dị mkpa ka Netanyahu gee ntị n’ihe ndị mmadụ na-ekwu ma hapụgodi mgbanwe ahụ ọ chọrọ ime, mana okwu ya mere ka Netanyahu chụọ ya n’ọrụ.
N’ihi nke a ka ọtụtụ mmadụ ji malite ngagharịiwe ma na-ekwu na ha anabataghị ọchịchị aka ike Netanyahu nakwa etu o si chọọ ịgbanwe usoro iwu ISrael naanị maka ọdịmma nke onwe ya.
Cheta na Netanyahu n’onwe ya nwere ebubo nrụrụaka nke ka na-aga n’ihu n’ụlọikpe.
Ndị uweojii ji egbe mmiri na ikuku ose chụsasịa ndị mmadụ gbakọrọ n’ihu ụlọ Netanyahu nakwa n’isi ụlọ omwieu mba Israel a na-akpọ Knesset.
N’ụtụtụ Mọnde, onyeisi otu jikọrọ ndị ọrụ n’Israel bụ Arnon Bar-David, akpọọla oke ka ndịọrụ malite abụbụọrụ na-egbughị oge.
Onyeisiala mba Israel bụ Isaac Herzog etinyekwala ọnụ kpọọ oku ka Netanyahu kwụsị mgbanwe ndị ahụ ọ chọrọ itinye n’usoro ikpe Israel..

Otu ụlọ ntaakụkọ a kpọrọ “Strenuous Blog” ziputara ozi na Tuzde, na-ebo Nnenna Oti ebubo na ọ tinyereaka n’imebi usoro ezi ntuliaka.
Ha boro ebubo na o kwuru: “Arụọla m ọrụ na ndụ m niile na-akwụdoro usoro ọchịchị ziri ezi, anyị ga-akwụdoro ụkpụrụ ziri ezi” “Dịka m bụ onye Pastọ nakwa nne mmadụ, mmụọ agaghị ekwe ka ma m mee ihe ga-emetụta ụmụ m n’ọdịnaihui, aga m eme ihe dị mma n’anya Chukwu nakwa n’anya ndị mmadụ.” “Aga m eme ihe ọha chọrọ” Mana odeakwụkwọ Inec bụ Rotimi Oyekanmi kụchapụrụ ihe a ụlọọrụ ntaakụkọ ahụ dere ma kwuo na mkpebi ịkwụsịtu ntuliaka esighị Oti n’aka kama o kwupụtara ihe isiụlọọrụ Inec nke Abuja zitere.
Ozi Inec hụrụ na ngụkọ kwụsịrị nke mere isi ụlọọrụ Inec n’Abia jiri kwuo na a ga-akwụsịtu ya bụ ihe ruo mgbe emezuru ntuliaka n’isi.

Saatụ Afrika nabatara Eze Belgium.
Onye isi ala Saatụ Afrika, Cyril Ramaphosa anabatala Eze Philippe Belgium na Queen Mathilda n’ isi obodo Pretoria.
Ramaphosa kwusiri ike na ọrụ Belgium na-arụ n’ịkwado atụmatụ mbufe teknụzụ mRNA nke World Health Organisation hibere na South Africa iji kwalite ohere Africa na-enweta ọgwụ mgbochi na ọgwụgwọ.
“Achọrọ m igosipụta ekele anyị nye alaeze Belgium maka ọrụ ya na ọgụ zuru ụwa ọnụ megide COVID-19.
Belgium bụ ihe dị mkpa na-enye aka na njikọ ọgwụ mgbochi GAVI, maka ọrụ COVAX, atụmatụ COVID-19 Vaccines Global Access, “Ramaphosa kwuru na mkparịta ụka ya na eze Belgium.
O kwuru na Belgium enyela ihe dị ka nde ọgwụ mgbochi 10 n’oge ọrịa a, yana oke dị ukwuu na-aga mba Africa chọrọ ọgwụ mgbochi..
Nhọrọ: Ọkachamara ọrụ kpọrọ CBN ka ya na NLC rụkọọ ọrụ.
Onye isi nchịkwa, Michael Imoudu nke  National Institute maka  Labour Studies (MINILS), Ilorin, Comrade Issa Aremu, agbaala Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) ume ka ha na-arụ ọrụ a haziri ahazi karịsịa na mpaghara nke itinye mkparịta ụka mmekọrịta ọha na eze na amụma ego nke  enweghị ego a dị ugbu a.
O kwuru na itinye aka na mkparịta ụka ga-egbochi nkwụsị na-enweghị isi nke ọrụ ụlọ akụ na mba ahụ.
Aremu kpọrọ oku a n’Ilọrin na emume ncheta ekpere afọ iri anọ nke onye guzobere ụlọ akwụkwọ ahụ.
Aremu chọpụtara na oge eruola ịtụgharị uche n’atụmatụ nhazigharị Naira n’ihi ihe isi ike ndị obere ndị na-edebe ego na-ezute n’ihi nhụsianya na-adịgide  nke ọdịda netwọk, nke CBN kwetara.
O kwuru na ọ bụghị ihe a na-atụghị anya ya na NLC ga-ebili kwuo maka ndị otu ya, bụ ndị na-enweghị ike ịnweta ego maka ihe ha ga-eri kwa ụbọchị mana o kwuru na a ga-ezere ịhọpụta ma ọ bụrụ na CBN na-arụ ọrụ na-emesi obi ike na ọ ga-arụ ọrụ nke ọma..
Gọvanọ Lagos steeti toro ndị na-ahụ maka anya na Naịjirịa.
Gọvanọ Legọs steeti bụ Babajide Sanwo-Olu etoola ndị dọkịta anya na-eme ihe na Naịjirịa.
O gosipụtara afọ ojuju maka ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ndị dọkịta anya na mba ahụ, n’agbanyeghị na ufodu a gala mba ofesi.
Gọvanọ ahụ mere ka a mara nke a n’ụbọchị Tọzdee na ogbako nke Nigeria Optometric Association (NOA), nke Steeti Legọọsi, haziri iji mee emume kwa afọ nke ncheta ha.
  Nzukọ a, nke nwere isiokwu: “Onye na-ahụ maka anya: Na-enye ọhụụ maka mmadụ niile”, ewepụtara iji mee emume onye ọ bụla na-ahụ maka anya maka ọrụ ha na nlekọta anya.
Ụbọchị mmemme malitere na 1986 site na International Optometric and Optical League iji mata ọrụ na-eto eto nke Optometry n’ụwa na ọrụ dị mkpa ha na-arụ n’inye ndị mmadụ nlekọta anya..

Onye Naijiria Adekunle ghọrọ Injinia Robotics a kacha akwụ ụgwọ n’ụwa.
Silas Adekunle bụ onye injinia rọbọt a ma ama sitere na Naịjirịa, onye e nwetagoro n’ụwa niile maka nnukwu ihe o mepụtara n’ihe gbasara igwe rọbọt.
Ọ ghọrọ onye injinia robotics a kacha akwụ ụgwọ n’ụwa mgbe ọ dị afọ 31, n’ihi nka pụrụiche .
Na 2016, o mepụtara robot egwuregwu nwere ọgụgụ isi nke mbụ n’ụwa, Mekamon, nke nwetara nnukwu ewu ewu wee ree ihe karịrị nkeji 500.
Ntinye aka ya na ngalaba nke robotics enwetala ya ọtụtụ nkwanye ugwu na onyinye, gụnyere ebe na Forbes Europe’s 30 Under 30: Ndepụta teknụzụ na 2018, yana ọnọdụ na Financial Times ‘Top 100 Minority Ethnic Leaders in Technology list.
Mekamon bụ robot nwere ụkwụ anọ enwere ike ijikwa ya site na ngwa smartphone ma ahaziri ya maka egwuregwu.
O nwere ikike ịlụ ọgụ maka ndị Mekamon ndị ọzọ, mụta nka ọhụrụ na ịzụlite ụdị pụrụ iche nke ya site na ọgụgụ isi ya..
Maazị Gbadebo Rhodes-Vivour gwara Dọkịta Alex Otti maka mmepe n’Abia.
Onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke Labour Party na Legọs bụ Maazị Gbadebo Rhodes-Vivour ekelela aka ga-achị Abia steeti bụ Dọkịta Alex Otti maka mmeri ya na ntuliaka.
Rhodes-Vivour gwara ya aka ka ọ ghara igbu oge ọ bụla  ma tụgharị aka ya iji napụta steeti ahụ n’agbụ nke mmepe  na ọnọdụ ndụ na-adịghị mma, bụ nke bụ nnukwu  maka ndị mmadụ kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ.
Rhodes-Vivour kwuru na o nweghi obi abụọ n’obi ya na ndị Abia steeti emeela nhọrọ kacha mma ma  gwa ha na ha agaghi enwe ihe ihuju anya maka nke a Labour Party (LP)..

Eze ukwu a,  bụ Adeyeye Enitan Ogunwusi, nọ na Brazil na-aga n’ihu na njem nlegharị anya zuru ụwa ọnụ maka Agenda Udo na Ọganihu Ndị Africa yana ekpughere atumatu maka ichikota ihe karịrị 100 nde Afro-Brazil site na mmemme ya nke akpọrọ “LỌTA ỤLO.” O jiri nleta ahụ nwee ekele maka onyinye pụrụ iche nke ndị Afro-Brazil na-enye mba ahụ ma gbaa Onye isi ala Lula ume ka ọ ghara imebi nkwa ya maka ọchịchị na-akwado Africa.
