Ekweremadu, onye gbara afọ iri isii, nwunye ya, Beatrice, afọ iri ise na isii, na Dọkịta Obinna Obeta, afọ iri ise na otu, bụ ndị a mara ikpe maka ịkwado njem nke otu nwa okorobịa na Britain n’ebumnobi maka irigbu ya ka e kpechara ikpe were izu isii na Old Bailey.
Ha kpara nkata ịkpọta onye dị afọ iri abụọ na otu onye na-azụ ahịa okporo ụzọ Lagos na London iji rigbuo ya maka akụrụ ya, ka ndị juri chọpụtara.
“Nwoke ahụ, nke a na-enweghị ike ịkpọ aha n’ihi ihe gbasara iwu, e nyela ya ụgwọ ọrụ iwu na-akwadoghị ka ọ bụrụ onye nyere nwa nwanyị onye omebe iwu mgbe ọrịa akụrụ manyere ya ịhapụ nzere masta na ihe nkiri na Mahadum Newcastle,” ka ụlọ ikpe nụrụ.
Sonia Ekweremadu dị afọ iri abụọ na ise, ikpe amaghị.
N’ọnwa Febụwarị 2022, a kpọrọ nwoke ahụ ụgha n’ụlọ ọgwụ gbasara akụrụ nkeonwe n’ụlọ ọgwụ Royal Free dị na Lọndọn dị ka nwanne Sonia.

Onye ọka iwu Hugh Davies KC gwara ụlọikpe na Ekweremadus na Obeta ewerela nwoke ahụ na ndị ọzọ nwere ike inye onyinye dị ka “ihe a na-atụfu ihe – akụkụ ahụ maka ụgwọ ọrụ”.
Onye a tara ahụhụ, onye na-azụ ahịa okporo ụzọ si Legọs, bụ onye a kpọtara UK n’afọ gara aga ka ọ nye ya akụrụ.

Onye na-azọ ọkwa pati People’s Democratic Party PDP, Siminialayi Fubara emeriela ntuliaka gọvanọ steeti Rivers.
Onye na-ekwupụta mpụtara nke National Electoral Commission (INEC) na steeti Rivers, na onye isi nke Federal University of Petroleum Resources, Prọfesọ Akpofura Rim-Rukeh, kwupụtara nsonaazụ na Tuzdee na Port Harcourt, isi obodo steeti ahụ.
Rim-Rukeh kwuru na Fubura jiri vootu dị 302,614 were merie ndị so sọọ mpi ahụ.
Onye na-esochi ya anya, Tonye Cole nke All Progressives Congress (APC), nwetara vootu 95,274 ebe Magnus Abe nke Social Democratic Party (SDP) nwetara vootu 46,981 na Beatrice Itubo nke Labour Party (LP) nwetara vootu 22,224.
Voice of Nigeria kọwara na steeti ahụ nwere mmadụ 3,537,190 debara aha ịtụ vootu, 496,852 ndị e nyere ikike ịtụ vootu, vootu 494,604 ka a tụrụ atụ ebe vootu 483,934 ziri ezi.
“Mụ, Prọfesọ Akpofura Rim-Rukeh, onye isi Federal University of Petroleum Resources, na-ekwupụta ugbu a nsonaazụ ntuli aka gọvanọ 2023 emere na 18th nke Maachị, 2023.
Rim-Rukeh kwuru, “Na Fubara Siminialayi nke PDP nwetara vootu kachasị elu yana nweta pasentị akwadoro, ma mejupụta ihe iwu chọrọ ka a na-ekwupụta na ọ bụ onye mmeri ma weghachi ya,”.

Ụlọ ọrụ Independent National Electoral Commission, INEC ekwupụtala Mazị Babajide Sanwo-Olu nke All Progressives Congress (APC) dị ka onye meriri na ntuliaka Gọvanọ steeti Legọs e mere n’abali iri na asato Maachị, 2023.
                                                                                                                         Maazị Sanwo-Olu bụ onye na-achọ ịzọ ọkwa ọzọ dịka onye na-ahụ maka ntuliaka si kwuo, meriri iri na itolu n’ime ọchịchị ime obodo iri abụọ na vootu 762,134.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Ka ọ na-ekwupụta nke a n’ụlọ ọrụ Yaba nke Commission, onye na-ahụ maka nlọghachi nke kọmishọna ahụ, bụ Ọkammụta Nike Oladiji, kwuru na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị debanyere aha n’akwụkwọ ntuli aka bụ 7,060,195 ebe ndị e nyere ikike ịtụ vootu dị 1,180,620.
                                                                            Ọladiji kwuru na Gọvanọ a họpụtara chiri anya bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa Labour Party (LP) bụ Maazị Gbadebo Rhodes-Vivour bụ onye nwetara 312,329 ebe Azeez Adediran nke People Democratic Party PDP nwetara 62,449.
                                                                                                                                              Dị ka ya si kwuo, ngụkọta vootu ziri ezi na Legọs bụ 1,155,678 ebe ndị a jụrụ ajụ bụ 17,953 nwere vootu dị 1,173,631.
                                                                Ka ndị INEC kwuchara ọkwa gọọmentị, Gọvanọ a họpụtara ahọpụta, bụ Maazị Babajide Sanwo-Olu, kwuru na mmeri a bụ ngosipụta nke mkpebi ọchịchị ya iji kwalite steeti ahụ maka ọdịnihu.
                                                                                                                                                                                           Mgbe ọ na-ekwu okwu n’ụlọ gọọmentị Marina, Gọvanọ a họpụtara ahọpụta kwere nkwa inyefe ndị niile bi na steeti ahụ oke nke ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya iji mezuo nkwa ntuli aka ya.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Sanwo-olu bụ onye zọọ ọkwa iri na ise ndị ọzọ kelere Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari na onyeisiala a họpụtara ahọpụta, Mr Bola Tinubu na ndị niile na-akwado ya maka ịhụ na ntuliaka kwesịrị ntụkwasị obi mere ka ọ laghachite n’oche ọchịchị.
                                                                                                     Otú ọ dị, ọ gbatịpụrụ ndị ya na ha na-asọmpi aka mkpakọrịta, na-akpọ ha ka ha na gọọmenti ya jikọọ aka iji wughachi steeti ahụ..
Inec akpọpụtala aha mmadụ iri meriri ntuliaka ọkwa gọvanọ na steeti ha dị icheiche na ntuliaka e mere n’ụbọchị Satọde,abali iri na asato nke onwa Maachị, 2023, na mpaghara dị icheiche na Naịjirịa.
N’ime mmadụ iri ndị a, asatọ bụ ndị All Progressives Congress, ebe abụọ bụ ndị Peoples Democratic Party.
Ha gụnyere: Babajide Sanwo-Olu (APC) nke Legọọs, Dapo Abiodun (APC) nke Ogun Steeti, Seyi Makinde (PDP) nke Oyo Steei, AbdulRahman AbdulRazaq (APC) nke Kwara Steeti, Inuwa Yahaya (APC) nke Gombe Steeti, na Mai Mala Buni (APC) nke Yobe Steeti.
Ndị ọzọ bụ Umo Eno (PDP) nke Akwa Ibom Steeti, Umar Namadi (APC) nke Jigawa, Dikko Radda (APC) nke Katsina, na Ahmed Aliyu (APC) nke Sokoto Steeti.
E mere ntuliaka ọkwa gọvanọ na steeti 28 n’ụbọchị Satọde, nke pụtara na ọ fọdụrụ steeti iri na asato ebe Inec ka na-agụkọ mpụtara ntuliaka.
A na-ele anya na a ga-akpọpụta mpụtara ndị a taa bụ Mọnde..
Aka chịburu Enugwu steeti bụ Chimaroke Nnamani adaala ntuliaka ọkwa Sinetọ na mpaghara Enugwu East.
Kevin Chukwu nke ‘Labour Party’ bụ onye tuuru ugo na ntuliaka ahụ dịka o nwetara vootu 69,136, ebe Nnamani, onye nọ na pati PDP nwetara vootu 48,701.
Cheta na ya bụ ntuliaka gaara adị n’abali iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Febrụwarị mana e bugharịrị ya n’ihi ọnwụ onye Labour Party na-azọbu ọkwa ahụ, bụ Oyibo Chukwu.
Ndị ojiegbe gburu Mazi Oyibo Chukwu dịka ọ fọdụrụ ụbọchị olemole tupu abali iri abuo na ise nke onwa Febrụwarị oge o si ebe ọ gara chụọ nta vootu na-alọta.
Kevin Chukwu, onye meriri ntuliaka a ugbua, bụ nwanne nwoke Oyibo Chukwu..
Ụlọ ọrụ Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) ekwupụtala onye ga-azọ ọkwa ọchịchị New Nigerian People’s Party (NNPP), Malam Abba Yusuf, dịka onye meriri na ntuliaka gọvanọ e mere na March 18 na Kano steeti.
                                                                                                                   Ọkammụta Ahmed Doko Ibrahim bụ onyeisi ndị na-ahụ maka ịlọghachi na ntuliaka ahụ bụ onye kwuputara nsonaazụ n’elekere isii:47 nke ụtụtụ n’isi ụlọ ọrụ INEC dị na Kano steeti kwuru na Abba turu vootu nde 1,019,602 iji merie onye ya na ya na-akpachi anya, bụ onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ nke otu pati All Progressive.
Congress, APC, Dọkịnta Nasiru Yusuf Gawuna nwetara vootu 890,705.                                                                                                        “Na Abba, Kabir Yusuf nwetara ọnụ ọgụgụ kasị elu nke votu na imezu ihe ndị a chọrọ n’iwu a weghachiri eweghachi ụbọchị taa 20, Maachị, 2023,” Prọfesọ kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                                           Onye isi ndị na-alọghachi azụ kọwara na ikpe e hiwere maka ime ihe ike na ntuli aka ahụ mere ka ntuli aka ahụ gasịrị n’ihi na ihe ndị dị otú a adịghị emetụta oke akwụkwọ dịka ntụziaka INEC 2 si kwuo.
                                                                                                                                                                           Ọdịiche dị na votu mmeri bụ 128,897 NNPP meriri n’ime okpuru ochichi iri ato n’ime ọchịchị ime obodo iri anọ na anọ dị na steeti ahụ, ebe APC meriri di iri na ano.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Ngụkọta ọnụ ọgụgụ votu ndị a tụrụ kwụrụ na 2,320,955 nwere ntuli aka dị 1,977,872 na votu 27,092 jụrụ.
                                                                             Onye nnochite anya pati NNPP na collation center bụ Dọkịnta Bappa Bichi gosipụtara afọ ojuju na nsonaazụ ya kwuru na anabatala uche ndị Kano site na nkwuputa nsonaazụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     “Ọ bụ nkwupụta nke ọchịchọ na ntinye aka anyị na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya.Ohere maka udo, ịdị n’otu na mmepe nke steeti Kano na Nigeria n’ozuzu,” ka o kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                              Onye nnọchite anya pati APC bụ Suleiman Bichi meghachiri omume n’ụzọ ọzọ na-ekwusi ike na pati ahụ ga-eleba anya n’ihe ndị e debere n’iwu wee mee ihe dị mkpa na-arịọ ndị Kano ka ha nọrọ jụụ.
                                                                                                                                                                              “Anyị na-ajụ ụkpụrụ nduzi nke abụọ nke onye isi ndị na-ahụ maka nlọghachi azụ tụgharịrị kama ịsụgharị nọmba isii.
                                                                Otú ọ dị, achọrọ m ndị Kano niile karịsịa ndị otu anyị kwesịrị ntụkwasị obi ka ha nọrọ jụụ.
                                                                                                      Ịmeri ntuli aka abụghị njedebe nke ndụ dịka enwere ụbọchị ndị ọzọ iji merie ọzọ, “ka ọ dụrụ ọdụ..
Onye ndọrọ-ndọrọ ọchịchị All Progressives Congress, APC, Dr.
Dikko Radda emeriela ntuli aka ọkwa gọvanọ nke abalị iri na asatọ ọnwa Maachị na Katsina Steeti, mgbago ugwu Naijiria.
Maazị Radda nwetara vootu 859,892 iji merie onye otu Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), Yakubu Lado, onye nwetara 486,620 vootu.
Onye otu ndọrọndọrọ New Nigerian Peoples Party, NNPP, Nura Khalil, nwetara vootu 8263, Imran Jino nke Peoples Redemption Party, PRP, nwetara vootu 4,226 ebe Ibrahim Zakari nke Social Democratic Party, SDP, nwetara vootu 1,049 ebe onye otu Labour Party, Abu Musawa.
Ndị ndọrọndọrọ iri na atọ sonyere na  ntuli aka ahụ.
Gọvanọ Aminu Masari nọ n’ọchichi ugbu a etozughị isonye n’ihi ọ nọ na ngwụcha ọchịchị nke ugboro abụọ iwu kwadoro.
Prọfesọ Abubakar kwuru; “ọnụọgụ ndị debanyere aha ịtụ vootu na steeti Katsina guzoro na 3,516,719 na ndị pụtara ịtụ vootu bụ 1,399,291.
Ngụkọta votu ziri ezi guzoro na 1,365, 848 ebe a jụrụ 20,579.
Ngụkọta votu e mere na ntuliaka gọvanọ bụ 1,386,427.”.
Ozi si n’aka ndị uweojii Kano steeti na-ekwu na ha anwụchiela ọtụtụ ndị omekome nwara iwakpo akụkụ ụfọdụ e mere ntuliaka na steeti ahụ n’ụbọchị Satọdee.
Nke a bụ n’oge ntuliaka ọkwa gọvanọ na ndị ụlọomeiwu steeti.
Ozi ha kwukwara na ha nwụchiri ụfọdụ ndị e jidere nwara ịzụ vootu ndị mmadụ n’akụkụ steeti ahụ.
Ntuliaka e mere gara siriri werere n’akụkụ ụfọdụ ebe dịka akụkụ ụfọdụ akụkụ ndị ọzọ zutere, nkụsa ntuliaka, nzuru ihe ọrụ ndị Inec, mwakpo n’aka ndị agboro.
Ụfọdụ ebe akụkọ ihe ndị etu a metụtara gụnyere Legọs, Anambra, Rivers, Delta, Ebonyi, Bayelsa, Imo, Cross Rịvas, Enugu, Ogun, Benue na Oyo.
Site n’ihe a hụrụ n’anya, ndị pụtara tụọ vootu na ntuliaka ibughi ibu ruo etu ọ dị n’oge ntuliaka ọkwa onyeisiala.
Ụfọdụ kwuru na egwu mwakpo si n’ihe mere ha apụtaghị tụọ vootu..
Inec akpọpụtala aha otu ndọrọndọrọ PDP dịka ndị nwetere mmeri na Oyo steeti.
Nke a pụtara na Seyi Makinde zọọrọ patị ahụ ọkwa gọvanọ ga-achịkwa steeti ahụ ọzọ n’afọ anọ na-abịa abịa.
Lee etu e siri tụọ vootu na steeti ahụ: Accord: 961 APC: 8,257 LP: 83 PDP: 17,693 Vootu ziri ezi: 27,492 Vootu ndị anabataghị: 457 Nchịkọta Vootu: 27,949.
Ụlọọrụ ebuso mpụ na nrụrụaka agha na Naịjirịa bụ Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) kwuru na ha nwụchịrị mmadụ iri isii na ise n’ụbọchị Satọdee oge e mere ntuliaka ọkwa gọvanọ na ndị ụlọomeiwu steeti na Naịjirịa.
Ha kwuru na ndị a nwụchiri bụ nọ na-agba mbọ inye ndị mmadụ ego ma zuru vootu ha.
Ha kwuru na ha nwụchiri mmadụ iri abụọ n’Illorin, iri na otu na Kaduna, nakwa mmadụ iri na abụọ na Port Harcourt oge ha nọ na-azụ vootu ndị mmadụ.
Ndị EFCC kwukwara na ha nwụchịrị mmadụ anọ na Calabar, Uyo steeti ebe ha nwụchiri ndị ọzọ n’akụkụ Gombe, Sokoto, Kebbi na Niger steeti.
EFFC kwuru na “N’oge anyị nọ na-agba ha ajụjụ ọnụ, ụfọdụ n’ime ha kwuru na ha bụ ndị nnọchiteanya ụfọdụ pati”..
Onye zọrọ ọkwa onyeisiala n’otu ‘Labour Party’ bụ Peter Obi ekwpụtala mwute ya maka ndị mmadụ tụfuru ndụ ha nakwa ndị merụrụ ahụ na ntuliaka ọkwa gọvanọ na ndị omeiwu steeti e mere na mpaghara naịjirịa dị icheiche n’ụbọchị Satọde,abali iri na asatonke onwa  Maachị, 2003.
Obi kwuru na ọ bụ nnukwu ihe mwute na ntuliaka, bụ ihe ekwesịghị isi oke ike, ka mmadụ ji anwụ ma na-emerụ ahụ na Naịjirịa.
“N’obi jupụtara na mwute, ana m echeta ezinụla ụmụ Naịjirịa ndị tụfuru ndụ ha nakwa ndị merụrụ ahụ n’ihi na ha sonyere na ntụliaka bụ ihe ekwesịghị isi ike,” Obi depụtara n’akara Twitter ya n’ụtụtụ ụbọchị Sọnde.
“Ana m ekpesi ekpere ike ka Chineke nyere Naịjirịa aka ma zọpụta anyị n’ọnọdụ ọjọọ a.”.
Onyeisi ndị uweojii na Legọs Steeti bụ Idowu Owohunwa ekwuola na ọgbaaghara mere n’ebe dị icheiche na steeti ahụ ebughị ibu dịka o si efesa na soshal midia.
O kwuru nke a na mkparịtaụka ya na ndị ntaakụkọ Channels TV n’abalị ụbọchị Satọde.
“Ana m enweta ozi si mpaghara Legọs niile.
Ndị ọrụ m nọ n’ebe niile na-ewetara m ozi kwa nkeji kwa nkeji.Ya mere m ji ekwu na ọgbaaghara a, n’ezie o mere n’ụfọdụ ebe, mana o meghị ebe niile dịka akụkọ si efesa,” Owohunwa kwuru.
“Ebe ụfọdụ ọgbaaghara a chọrọ ime, ndị uweojii gbochiri ya.
Ebe ndị o merela tupu ndị uweojii abịarute, anyị bịaruru n’oge ma weghachite udo ma mee ka ihe niile gawakwa n’anya ya.” Owohunwa gokwara na o nweghị ndị uweojii ọbụla tinyere aka n’ọgbaghara dịka ndị mmadụ si ebo ha ebubo na soshal midia.
Na mpaghara Ago dị n’Okota, ebe ndị bi ebe ahụ gbochiri ndị agboro bịara ikụsa ntuliaka, onyeisi ndị uweojii bụ owohunwa kwuru na o nweghị onye nwụrụ n’ọgbaghara ahụ dịka akụkọ si efesa.
“Ndị mmadụ kụturu otu n’ime ndị agboro ahụ, mana ọ nwụghị.
Ọ na-anata ọgwụgwọ ugbua n’ụlọọgwụ,” ka o kwuru..
Dịka Inec kagburu ntuliaka n’akụkụ mpaghara VGC na Legọs n’ihi ọgbaghara dapụtara ebe ahụ n’etiti ndị ọrụ ha na ndị bi ebe ahụ, a malitela n’ebe ahụ ugbua.
Ndị bi ebe ahụ pụtara n’oge dịka a malitere ntuliaka n’ebe elekere itoolu nke ụtụtụ Sọnde a.
Cheta na ndị na mpaghara jụrụ na ha agaghị ekwe ndị Inec duru ha gaa n’okporoụzọ tụọ vootu ha n’ihi na ha nwere ama sara mbara ha na-eji atụ vootu kemgbe ụwa.
Ndị ọrụ Inec gboro ebubo na e jichiri n’ime ogige mpaghara ahụ maka okwu nsogbu ngwa BVas dapụtara n’oge ntuliaka ọkwa onyeisiala.
Ndị Inec kwuru na ọ bụ nke a mere ha jiri yigharịa ebe ndị mpaghara ahụ ga-anọ tụọ vootu ha.
Nrụrịtaụka dapụtara ebe malite n’ụtụtụ Satọdee ruo ehihe nke mere Inec jiri kagbuo ntuliaka ebe ahụ ma mechazie hibe ya taa bụ Sọnde.
Ugbua, ndị ọrụ Inec nọzị n’ime ama ahụ sara mabara dịka ndị ọrụ nchekwa wekwara ọnọdụ ihazi ọrụ ebe ahụ..
Ụlọ ọrụ Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) na-ekwu na ha ga-amalite ịchịkọta rịzọlt maka ntuliaka gọvanọ na steeti iri abụọ na asatọ ebe mmadụ 837 nọchiri anya pati ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị iri na asatọ.
                                                                                                                                                        A ga-echeta na e meghị ntuliaka gọvanọ n’ụbọchị Satọde gara aga na steeti asatọ; Anambra, Bayelsa, Edo, Ekiti, Imo, Kogi, Osun na Ondo Otu na-ahụ maka ntuliaka kwupụtara na e yigharịrị ịchịkọta rịzọọtụ maka ntuliaka gọvanọ Legọs n’elekere iri na otu nke ụtụtụ ụbọchị ụka n’ihi enweghị rịzọlt ọ bụla sitere na mpaghara ọchịchị obodo (LGA) ụbọchị gara aga.
                                                                                                                                                                        A ga-eme mmemme ahụ na Lagos Collation Centre n’ime ụlọ ọrụ INEC.
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, INEC yigharịrị ntuliaka gọvanọ na ụlọ omebe iwu steeti na Satọde gara aga na mpaghara ntuliaka iri dị na Victoria Garden City.
                                                                                                                                              Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ntuliaka nke INEC, Segun Agbaje, kwuru nke a mgbe ya na ndị nta akụkọ na-agwa ndị nta akụkọ okwu ụbọchị Satọde n’ụlọ ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Dịka Maazị Agbaje siri kwuo, ndị otu corps e bugara dị ka ndị ọrụ oge na Satọde adịghị njikere ịbanye VGC estate ebe ha kwuru na a nwụchiri ha n’oge ntuli aka onye isi ala na nke ndị omebe iwu n’abali iri abuo na ise nke onwa Febuwari.
                                                                                                                Mazị Agbaje kwuru na ndị ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ kọmishọna na-arụ ọrụ n’ihu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ hibere ihe ịtụ vootu n’ihu ụlọ ahụ na Satọde mana ndị bi na ụlọ ahụ kwuru na ndị ọchụnta ego nwere ike imebi usoro ahụ, yabụ na ha enweghị nchekwa na enweghị ike ịtụ vootu ha na mpụga ụlọ.
                                                       O kwuru na ọnọdụ a siri ike ndị ọrụ nchekwa ijide, ya mere, ya na ndị otu ya ga-abịarute ebe ahụ.
                                                                                        “Anyị nwere ngalaba ntuli aka asatọ ebe a nwere ndị ntuli aka 6,024 na ndị mmadụ 5,624 nwere PVC ha,” ka o kwuru, na-agbakwunye na ngalaba ntuli aka abụọ ọzọ na nnukwu ọnụ ụzọ ụlọ ahụ metụtakwara.
                                                                                                                                                           “Asato ebe a (na ala ụlọ) na abụọ n’èzí “Mgbe anyị nwechara ndụmọdụ na ntụziaka ndị ọzọ sitere n’isi ụlọ ọrụ mba (anyị kpebiri) na anyị ga-emegharị ebe a echi (Sunday) ụtụtụ n’elekere 08:30 nke ụtụtụ iji mee ntuli aka.                                                                                                                                            “N’elekere 08:30 nke ụtụtụ echi (Sunday), anyị ga-ezukọta ebe a.” Ka ọ na-akwado na onye isi oche kọmitii nchekwa nke ụlọ akụ ahụ ekwela ndị ọrụ nchekwa nchekwa ndị otu na ndị ọrụ INEC na ndị ntuli aka, Mr Agbaje kwuru na onye ikpeazụ nọ n’ahịrị n’elekere 2.30 pm.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 N’otu aka ahụ, Kọmishọna Resident Electoral Commissioner (REC) Ogun (REC), Niyi Ijalaye, kwupụtara na a ga-akwụsị ịchịkọta nsonaazụ ntuliaka gọvanọ na ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu ruo elekere itoolu nke ụtụtụ ụbọchị ụka.                                                                                                                                            Ọzọkwa, INEC ekwupụtala ụlọ ọrụ mkpokọta na Cross River steeti bụ ọkwa gọvanọ na ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu steeti chịkọbara nsonaazụ ntuliaka ụbọchị ụka.
N’oge nkwuputa a, na mbubreyo Saturday na INEC Secretariat na Calabar, Prof.
Gabriel Yomere, Resident Electoral Commissioner (REC) maka Cross River, weputara Prof.

                                                                                 Odoh, onye gwara ndị ntaakụkọ okwu n’Abakaliki, sị na “Ewelitela m mkpu maka ihe na-eme na ntuliaka gọvanọ na ụlọ omebe iwu steeti na-aga n’ihu na steeti Ebonyi.”                                                                                                                                                                                                             Ọ sịrị; “N’ọchịchị ime obodo m, ọtụtụ ndị omekome, ndị ji egbe yi uwe ndị agha adịgboroja na uwe ndị uwe ojii mebiri usoro ntuli aka ahụ.
                    Ha nọ na-akpa ike kemgbe ụtụtụ ma na-esi n’otu ngalaba ntuli aka gaa n’ọzọ.
                                                                                                                                      “N’ime ngalaba m, n’Omege, ha bịara gbagbuo mmadụ atọ n’agbanyeghị na ha anwụghị.
                                                                                                             Ha eburula ngwa ntuliaka niile INEC ji bịa.
N’ime ụlọ ọrụ Nsurak, ka m na-agwa gị okwu ugbu a, ha na-agba ọsọ.
                                                                   Ha bịarutere ebe ahụ kpụrụ ihe ndị INEC na-eme ntuliaka ma gbaa ha ọkụ, na ụdị ọgbaghara niile na-eme na Ezza North LGA.
                                       Nke a bụ ọnọdụ anyị na-ahụ, a na-akpọtụrụ m ndị ọrụ INEC.
                                                                                         Naanị ihe ha mere bụ ịkpaghasị, ịkwụsị na mebie mmụọ nke ndị ntuli aka na-achọkarị ịpụta ịtụ vootu.
”                                                   “Anyị anaghị ada mbà, anyị ga-aga n’ihu na-agba ọsọ, n’agbanyeghị na INEC agwụla echiche nke ihe anyị ga-eme.
Akpọchiela ha ọnụ, ọbụnakwa ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa na-agba mbọ mana mbọ ha ezughị iji jide ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị omekome,” ka onye na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ kwuru.

                                                                        A hụrụ ka ndị ọrụ nchekwa wụkwasịrị n’okporo ụzọ n’akụkụ ụfọdụ nke okporo ụzọ dị na steeti ahụ.

Ndị bi na steeti Kano apụtala n’ọnụọgụ ha ịhọpụta ndị ha na ha ga-eme ntuliaka na ntuliaka Gọvanọ na Ụlọ Omeiwu.
                                                            Ebe ụfọdụ okporo ụzọ tọgbọrọ n’efu, na Tudun Wuzurchi na CHARARANCHI dị na Kano Municipal, ward nke All Progressives Congress, APC onyeisi oche, Abdulahi Abbas, enwere nnukwu ntuli aka, tụrụ anya.                                                                                                                                                                Voice of Nigeria na-akọ na a na-eleba anya na ntuliaka na mpaghara ahụ nke ọma n’ihi na ndị NNPP meriri ApC na ngalaba ahụ na ntuli aka onyeisiala gara aga.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Ọzọkwa, e nwere nnukwu ndị na-akwado pati APC na-azọ ọkwa gọvanọ bụ Yusuf Ganuwa, na Ganuwa, Nasarawa LGA nke Kano steeti.
                         N’otu ntụli aka ọzọ dị na Ganuwa, ndị mmadụ ruru iri abụọ na ise debanyere aha ha n’akwụkwọ, ndị ọrụ nchekwa ahụ erughị eru ka ndị otu ndị ọzọ..
Asambodo na ịtụ vootu ebidola n’ime moto park 001, Gudi polling unit, Akwanga Nasarawa state, maka nhoputa ndi ochichi nke Gubernatorial na State House of Assembly.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                A malitere ịtụ vootu n’ihe dịka elekere 9.08 nke ụtụtụ dịka ndị Independent Electoral Commission kwuru na ngalaba ntuli aka.                                        Aka na-achị steeti ahụ bụ Abdullahi Sule na-atụ anya ịtụ vootu ya na ngalaba ntuliaka.
                                                                                                                     Ndị ịtụ vootu na ngalaba ntụli aka adịghị mma, gburugburu ebe obibi dị jụụ na ọnụnọ nke Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corp na ndị uwe ojii Naijiria na-ahụ maka udo na udo..
Onye isi ala Naijiria bu, Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari atuola vootu ya na ntuliaka gọvanọ 2023.
                                                                                               O mere ikike ya na Satọde na Kofar Baru Polling Unit 003 nke Sarkin Yara ‘A’ Ward nke Daura Local Government Area, Katsina State.                          Ya na nwa ya nwoke bụ Yusuf na ndị ọzọ so na ezinụlọ mbụ.
Onye isi ala ahụ erutela na ngalaba ntuli aka na 08:53 GMT.
                                           Enyere ya ikike na nwunye ya, na-eji Bimodal Voter Accreditation System (BVAS).
                                                                                                                 Ngwa ngwa ka ha nwetachara ikike, e nyere ha akwụkwọ vootu ha, onye nke ọ bụla n’ime ha wee banye n’otu akụkụ nke ndị na-eme ntuliaka wepụtaara maka ntuliaka ahụ, bụ ebe ha na-eji mkpịsị aka na-ebipụta maka ndị ọ họọrọ.
                                                                                                                                     A ka na-eme ntuliaka n’udo n’akụkụ dị iche iche na steeti Katsina, ebe a na-atụ anya na ndị mmadụ ruru nde atọ, 459,945 ga-esonye.
                  N’ozuzu, agbadola nchekwa n’ofe steeti ahụ, ebe amachibidoro ngagharị nke ndị mmadụ na ụgbọ ala n’ikwekọ n’iwu nke Inspector General of Police Agbanyeghị, ndị uwe ojii na ndị ọrụ nchekwa ndị ọzọ na-agbagharị na steeti ahụ, iji hụ na nchekwa nke ndị ntuli aka na ndị ọrụ ntuli aka..
Ihe karịrị nde mmadụ iri itoolu na atọ na-atụ vootu na Naijiria na-ahọpụta ndị Gọvanọ na ndị omebe iwu steeti ọhụrụ n’ụbọchị Satọdee abalị iri na asatọ nke ọnwa Maachị hazigharịrị ntuliaka.
                                                                                                                                                                                           Ndị Independent National Electoral Commission, INEC, haziburu ntuliaka a maka ụbọchị iri na otu nke onwa Maachị, mana yigharịrị n’ihi nhazigharị nke Bimodal Voter Accreditation System webatara, BVAS.
                                                                                                                                                                     A ga-eji BVAS maka nzere ntozu, ịtụ vootu na nnyefe nsonaazụ.
Igwe a na-eji kaadị SIM arụ ọrụ na netwọk mkpanaka ọ bụla.
                                           Ndị otu obodo na-arụkọ ọrụ nke ọma na Commissionlọ Ọrụ Ntuli Aka Obodo Independent, INEC na ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka ịrụ ọrụ ya nke ọma.  Ndị na-eleba anya n’ime obodo na mba ụwa na-elebakwa anya na ntuliaka a na-eme na steeti niile.
                                                                                         Na mpaghara ntuli aka 176,846 n’ofe steeti iri abụọ na asatọ, ndị ntuli aka ga-ahọpụta ndị ndu ọhụrụ maka ọkwa nke abụọ nke gọọmentị n’okpuru nhazi usoro gọọmentị etiti.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Ntuli aka nke Gubernatorial agaghị eme na steeti asatọ n’ime steeti iri atọ na isii na Federal Capital Territory, FCT.
                                                           Ndị a bụ; Ekiti, Kogi, Edo, Bayelsa, Anambra, Ondo, Imo na Osun Steeti.
Ka ọ dị ugbu a, ntuli aka ndị omebe iwu steeti ga-eme na steeti asatọ ma ewezuga FCT.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị iri na asatọ nọ na ntuli aka.
Ọ bụ ezie na na steeti ụfọdụ, otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị enweela njikọ na nkwado maka ụfọdụ ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, All Progressive Congress, APC, na nnukwu mmegide Peoples Democrat Party, PDP, Labour Party, LP, New Nigeria Peoples Party, NNPP, Social Party.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Democratic Party, SDP na Young Peoples Party, YPP, bụ ndị erite uru.
N’ịga na nhọpụta ntuliaka onyeisiala gara aga, e degharịala map ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Naijiria n’ihi oke iwe na steeti dịka Lagos, Rivers, Nassarawa, Gombe, Katsina, Kebbi, Benue, Kano, Plateau, Osun na Oyo steeti.
                        Ndị Labour Party na NNDP weghaara ogige ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ọdịnala nke APC na PDP.
                                                                                                          Lagos, Katsina, Kaduna, Kebbi, Nassarawa, Plateau, na Gombe steeti, ebe APC siri ike gara na LP.
                                                                                            Kano dabara na NNPP na APC meriri na Benue, Oyo na Rivers steeti.
                                                                                                                                                   Ndị a bụ ezigbo ọgụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ntuli aka Gubernatorial na nke ọgbakọ steeti.
Ọgbaghara Intra Party n’ime nnukwu pati ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị bụ ihe atụ na akara maka nnukwu ọgụ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na Benue, Sokoto, Kano, Kaduna, Plateau, Delta Ogun na Oyo Steeti Ndị a bụ n’ime radar nke ndị ọkachamara ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị maka iwe iwe.
                                                                                                                                                                  N’ịga n’usoro ịtụ vootu ọdịnala na ntuli aka ndị gara aga kemgbe 1999, ndị ntuli aka na-enwekarị mmetụta site na arụmọrụ nke nsonaazụ ntuli aka onye isi ala, ịtụ vootu maka ndị na-achị achị na ọkwa Federal.
                                                                                                                                                              Abụ abụ abụwo mgbe niile “steeti anyị achọghị iso na mmegide.” Ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa N’agbanyeghị nkatọ nke ntuli aka onye isi ala ikpeazụ, ndị Umpire Electoral kwere nkwa na ha ga-eme ntuli aka nke Gubernatorial na Local Assembly n’efu, nke ziri ezi na ntụkwasị obi.
                                                   Onye odeakwụkwọ nchịkwa, nke INEC Sokoto steeti, Hauwa Aliyu kwuru; “Anyị arụla ọrụ na oghere wee tọọ maka ntuli aka Satọde.”                                 “Webụsaịtị INEC na-egosi na portal na-elele nsonaazụ ntuli aka na-agba ọsọ maka ntuli aka na Bimodal Voter Registration Systems, BVAS, ahaziri maka ntuli aka Satọde.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Ya mere, kọmitii ahụ kpebisiri ike imeziwanye arụmọrụ ya na mbụ.
Ihe anyị mere bụ ịmụta ihe ndị bara uru na ntuli aka gara aga nke anyị mere,” Onye isi oche NEC, Kọmitii Ozi na Mmụta Voter Education, Festus Okoye n’oge mkparịta ụka telivishọn.
                                                                                  Ọzọkwa, ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa malitere ihe ngosi okporo ụzọ na steeti niile iji gosipụta njikere maka nchekwa zuru oke n’oge na mgbe ntuli aka gasịrị.
Enwere mmachi na mmegharị ụgbọ ala n’oge awa ntuli aka Nsonaazụ ntuli aka Dịka iwu ntuli aka nke 2022 siri dị, a ga-ekwupụta nsonaazụ ntuli aka na ngalaba ntuli aka wee ziga na portal INEC ebe ndị Kọmishọna nhọpụta ndị obibi ga-ekwupụta nsonaazụ gọọmentị..
Ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị uweojii n’akụkụ Ihiala nke Anambra steeti bụ Tochukwu Ikenga ekwuola na ha wụchiri ndị omekome ise ma napụ aha egbe ‘Pump action’ anọ.
Nke a na-apụta dịka ntuliaka na-aga n’ihu na steeti ahụ ebe gọọmentị Naịjirịa machiri ngagharị ndị mmadụ n’akụkụ Naịjirịa niile malite n’elekere iri na abụọ nke isi ụtụtụ ruo elekere isii nke mgbede taa.
Ihiala so n’akụkụ steeti ahụ ebe akụkọ mwakpo na-apụtakarị dịka n’oge ntuliaka enweghi ezi nchekwa ebe ahụ mere emeghi ntuliaka ebe ahụ n’ụbọchị mbụ.
Inec mechara hazigharịa ntuliaka ebe ahụ.

Ikenga kwuru na ha na-eme nnyocha n’isi mmadụ ise a awụchiri ugbua.
Ndị uweojii Anambra zipụtara ozi na ha agaghị ekwe onye maọbụ otu ọbụla majaa ndị pụtara ịtụ vootu dịka ha kwuru ha kwụụ chim ichekwa ndị mmadụ.
Ikenga kwuru na ha na-eme nnyocha n’isi mmadụ ise a awụchiri ugbua..
Gọvanọ Osun steeti, Sinetọ Ademola Adeleke ewepụtala ezumike ọha n’ụbọchị Fraide tupu ha eruo nhọpụta ụlọ omebe iwu steeti ahụ nke a ga-eme n’ụbọchị Satọde.
Nke a dị n’akwụkwọ ozi nke ọnụ na-ekwuchitere Gọvanọ, Mallam Olawale Rasheed binyere aka nke onye ntaakụkọ anyị nwetara n’Osogbo na Tọzdee.
Dị ka ozi ahụ si kwuo, ezumike ahụ bụ iji mee ka ndị bi na steeti ahụ gaa na ngalaba ntuliaka nke ha iji tụọ vootu na Satọde.
Ozi ahụ gara n’ihu dụọ ndị bi ebe ahụ ọdụ ka ha nọrọ n’udo ma na-erube isi n’iwu ka ha na-akwado maka ntuli aka ahụ.
O kwukwara na Gọvanọ kwuru: “Ana m akpọku ndị Osun ka ha pụta n’igwe tinye akwụkwọ ma were ikike dịịrị ha.
“Ntuli aka a dị oke mkpa n’ihi na ụnụ ga-ahọpụta ndị omebe iwu ga-eso m rụọ ọrụ.
Ụnụ ga-emerịrị ntuli aka a etu o kwesiri”, Adeleke kwuru..
Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari akpọọla ya ihe na-awụ akpaata oyi n’ahụ, nloghachi mwakpo ndị na-eyi ọha egwu na igbu ọchụ nke ọtụtụ mkpụrụ obi aka ha dị ọcha na mpaghara ọchịchị Zangon Kataf na steeti Kaduna.
Ya mere ọ rịọla ka e jide ndị mere mpụ a ngwa ngwa ma taa ha ahụhụ.
Onyeisiala Buhari kwuru: “A na-alụ ọgụ ọnụ megide ụmụ amaala aka ha dị ọcha na steeti ahụ.
Ndị ọrụ nchekwa na ndị mmanye iwu ga-emerịrị ihe siri ike iji kwụsị nke a.
“Anam akasi ezinụlọ ndị e gburu na mwakpo a jọgburu onwe ya obi.
Òtù Ahụ Ike mba Ụwa (WHO) ekwuola na mba iri ato na asaa dị n’Afrịka na-eche ụkọ ndị ọrụ ahụike ihu na mba iri ise na ise na-erubeghịkwa ụkọ ndị ọrụ ahụike na-alụ ka ha na-aga n’ihu na-achọ ohere akwụ ụgwọ ka mma na mba ndị bara ọgaranya.
                                                                                               Ha na-aga n’ihu na-achọ ohere akwụ ụgwọ ka mma na mba ndị ka baa ọgaranya bụ ndị gbagoro mbọ iji were ha n’ọrụ n’etiti ọrịa COVID-19.
            GỤỌ KWESỊRỊ: UNICEF ga-azụ ndị ọrụ ahụike Adamawa steeti maka erighị ihe na-edozi ahụ “Ụkọ ndị ọrụ ahụike egwuwo ohere ha nwere inweta nlekọta ahụike zuru ụwa ọnụ site na 2030 – isi ihe mgbaru ọsọ Sustainable Development Goals.”                                                    A na-enyocha omume nke mba ndị bara ọgaranya nke Òtù Na-ahụ Maka Akụ na ụba na mmepe (OECD) na njikere WHO, n’etiti mpaghara ndị ọzọ.
“N’ime Africa ọ bụ nnukwu akụ na ụba na-emepụta ohere ọhụrụ,” Dr Jim Campbell, onye isi na-ahụ maka amụma ndị ọrụ ahụike na WHO kwuru na nkwupụta na ubochi Tuuzde.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                   “Ndị Gulf States na-adaberekarị na ndị ọrụ mba ụwa na ụfọdụ mba ndị na-akpata ego na OECD emeela ka ọrụ ha na ọrụ ha na-emeghachi omume na ọrịa a ma meghachi omume na ọnwụ nke ndụ, ọrịa, enweghị ndị ọrụ n’oge.
                                     Iji nyere mba dị iche iche aka ichekwa usoro ahụike ha na-adịghị ike, WHO ewepụtala ndepụta nkwado na nchekwa ndị ọrụ ahụike emelitere, nke na-egosipụta mba ndị nwere ọnụ ọgụgụ dị ala nke ndị ọrụ nlekọta ahụike ruru eru.
                                                                                                                             “Mba ndị a chọrọ nkwado kacha mkpa maka mmepe ndị ọrụ ahụike na iwusi usoro ahụike ike, yana ihe nchekwa ndị ọzọ na-egbochi ndị ọrụ mba ụwa na-arụsi ọrụ ike,” ka WHO siri ọnwụ.
                                                                                                                                            N’ịkwado oku maka nlekọta ahụike zuru ụwa ọnụ maka mba niile kwekọrọ na SDGs, Onye isi oche WHO, Dr Tedros Ghebreyesus, kpọrọ oku ka mba niile kwanyere ndokwa dị na ndepụta nkwado na nchekwa ndị ọrụ ahụike WHO.
                                                                                                                             Ọ gbakwụnyere, “Ndị ọrụ ahụike bụ ọkpụkpụ azụ nke usoro ahụike ọ bụla, ma mba iri ise na ise nwere ụfọdụ usoro ahụike kachasị njọ n’ụwa, enweghị ezuru ma ọtụtụ na-efunahụ ndị ọrụ ahụike ha na mbata mba ụwa,” ka ọ gbakwụnyere.
                                                              Ọ bụ ezie na ọtụtụ mba na-asọpụrụ ụkpụrụ WHO dị ugbu a banyere iwere ndị ọrụ nlekọta ahụike, ụkpụrụ a anaghị anabata n’ogbe, WHO dọrọ aka ná ntị.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Campbell kwuru, “Ihe anyị na-ahụ bụ na ihe ka ọtụtụ ná mba na-asọpụrụ ndokwa ndị ahụ (site na) na-adịghị arụsi ọrụ ike n’ọrụ site na mba ndị a (adịghị ike),” Campbell kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                 “Mana enwerekwa ahịa mbanye nkeonwe nke dị na anyị na-elekwa anya ka ha rute ụfọdụ ụkpụrụ zuru ụwa ọnụ nke a na-atụ anya n’ihe gbasara omume na omume ha.”                                                                                                                                                                         Usoro dịkwa maka gọọmentị ma ọ bụ ndị ọzọ iji gwa WHO ma ọ bụrụ na ha “na-echegbu onwe ha” maka omume nke ndị na-ewe ọrụ, onye ọrụ WHO kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Nkwado ndị ọrụ ahụike na ndepụta nchekwa nke WHO anaghị egbochi ọrụ mba ụwa mana ọ na-atụ aro ka gọọmentị ndị na-etinye aka na mmemme dị otú ahụ mara banyere mmetụta na usoro ahụike na mba ebe ha na-enweta ndị ọkachamara ahụike ruru eru..
Gọvanọ Nasarawa steeti bụ Abdullahi Sule akpọkuola ndị steeti ahụ ka ha gaa n’ihu na-anata akwụkwọ nde narị narị abụọ, narị ise na narị naira iri gara aga, na-agbaso ntuziaka ndị Central Bank of Nigeria, CBN.
                                                                                                                                                             Gọvanọ Sule mere mkpesa a obere oge ka ya na ndị njikwa ụlọ akụ zukọrọ n’ụlọ gọọmentị dị na Lafia, isi obodo steeti ahụ.
                                                     O kwuru na ọ bụ nkwuputa nke CBN wepụtara mere ka ọgbakọ a were nye iwu ka ụlọ akụ ka ha nabata ma nyefee akwụkwọ ochie narị narị naịra 500 na 1000, n’ikwekọ n’ikpe ụlọikpe ukwu.
                                                                                                                                                                                                            O kwuru, “ọchịchị ya nwere nchegbu maka mfu nke ndị ọrụ ugbo na steeti ahụ, bụ ndị enweghị ike ibuga ihe ha rụpụtara n’ahịa n’ihi ụkọ ego na-enwe.”                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Maka ma ụlọ akụ ndị na-arụ ọrụ na steeti ahụ nwere ego ochie nke narị naira abụọ, narị ise na narị naịra 1000 ha ga-enye, Gọvanọ Sule kwuru;                 “Ọ bụ oge iji chọpụta nke ahụ, mana ndị mmadụ kwesịrị ịmalite ịnara akwụkwọ nde naira ochie dị bụ nke ka dị n’iwu ruo December nke afọ a.
               “A na m eji ohere a kpọkuo ndị mmadụ n’ihi na ndị mmadụ ejighị n’aka, ha na-eche na ọ bụ akụkọ adịgboroja, ugbu a anyị kpọrọ ụlọ akụ ma ndị ụlọ akụ kwenye anyị na ntụziaka a sitere na Central Bank, ana m akpọku oku.
ndị anyị nọ na steeti Nasarawa ka ha gaa n’ihu na-anabata akwụkwọ ndetu ochie n’ihi na ha ka na-akwado iwu ruo Disemba afọ a,” ka o kwuru.
                               Gọvanọ ahụ gbakwụnyere na ya zutere ndị isi ụlọ akụ ka ha mata ma ha nwere akwụkwọ ochie 500 na 1000 ga-ekesa, iji belata nhụjuanya ndị mmadụ na-anọkarị n’ụlọ akụ..
Ụlọ akụ etiti bụ,Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) na-ekwu na N200 ochie, N500 na N1,000 akwụkwọ ego na-anọgide na-akwado iwu ruo abali iri ato na otu nke onwa December afo, 2023.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Onye na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi ụlọọrụ CBN bụ Isa AbdulMumin kwupụtara nke a na mgbede Mọnde,abali iri na ato nke onwa Maachị, 2023.
                   Nke a na-abịa mgbe Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu n’abali ato nke onwa March kpebiri na akwụkwọ nde naira ochie kwesịrị ịdị na nke ọhụrụ ruo na ngwụcha afọ.
  “N’ikwekọ na omenala guzosie ike nke nrubeisi nye iwu ụlọ ikpe na nri nke Iwu Iwu nke mara ọchịchị President Muhammadu Buhari, na mgbakwunye, ọrụ nke Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN), dị ka onye na-achịkwa, Deposit.
                                                                                                                  E nyela ndị ụlọ akụ ego na-arụ ọrụ na Naịjirịa ka ha mee ihe Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu kpebiri n’abali nke onwa Maachị, 2023.
                                                         “N’otu aka ahụ, CBN zutere ndị kọmitii ndị na-akụ ego ma nye iwu ka akwụkwọ ego ochie N200, N500 na N1000 ka dị n’akwụkwọ iwu n’akụkụ akwụkwọ ego ahụ emegharịrị ruo December 31, 2023.

                                                                                                                                                                                     GỤỌ KWESỊRỊ: Onyeisiala Buhari kwanyere iwu ụlọ ikpe ugwu – Ọnụ na-ekwuchitere                                                                                                                    A ga-echeta na CBN agbatịla oge maka ịgbanwere N200, N500, na N1,000 ochie site na Jenụwarị 31 ruo February 10 agbanyeghị na Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu, ka ndị steeti gbara akwụkwọ, kwuru na gọọmentị etiti, CBN, ụlọ akụ azụmaahịa agaghị aga n’ihu na njedebe nke February 10 na-echere mkpebi nke ọkwa gbasara okwu a..
Ọnụọgụgụ ndị  nwụrụla n’ihe mberede oke ifufe na mmiri ozuzo nke mere na mba Malawi na ngwụcha izuụka gara aga akarịala mmadu nari abụọ.
Nnukwu ide mmiri ka na-asọjukwa ọtụtụ obodo, na-akwatu ụlọ ndị mmadụ ma na-eburukwa ihe ọbụla nọchiri ya ụzọ, n’ihi ọdachi ọnatarachi a akpọrọ ‘Storm Freddy’.
Obodo Blantyre, nke bụ isi obodo azụmahịa nke mba Malawi bụ ebe ihe mberede a kacha metụta , ebe ahụ ka ndị mmadụ kacha nwụọ tinyere ọtụtụ ụmụ ntakịrị.
Ndị ọrụ enyemaka na-ekwu na oke ideimmiri a ga-eme ka ọrịa cholera nke na-efesabu na mba Malawi kawanye njọ.
Gọọmentị etinyela ọnọdụ gbatagbata na distrikt iri dị na mpaghara ndịda Malawi bụ ebe ọdachia ahụ kacha metụta.
“Anyị hụrụ ka osimiri juputara n’ọnụ na-awụfu, mmiri a na-eburu ma mmadụ ma ụlọ ọbụla nọ n’ụzọ ya,” onye ntaakụkọ Peter Kalaya kwuru.
Otu onye bi na Blantyre kwara ndi ntaakuko etu ya na ndị ọzọ si zọpụta otu nwatakịrị nwaanyị tọrọ atọ n’ime aja ụrọ.
“Aja ụrọ obere ka o kpuchie nwata ahụ isi.
Ọ nọ na-ebe akwa na-eti mkpu enyemaka.
N’agbanyeghị na idemmiri na-ebusi ike, anyị gbalịrị gafee ma zọpụta nwata ahụ.
Ọ dịghị mfe mana anyị jisiri ike mee ya,” nwoke ahụ aha ya bụ Aaron Ntambo kwuru.
Ndị ọrụ ahụike n’otu nnukwu ụlọọgwụ dị n’obodo ahụ sị na ọnụọgụgụ ozu mmadụ a na-ebubata n’ụlọọgwụ ahụ karịrị ha.
Otu enyemaka ahụike bụ ‘Doctors Without Borders’ kwuru na ihe karịrị ụmụaka iri ano ka e bubatara n’ozu n’ụlọọgwụ ahụ.
A na-eche na ọnụọgụgụ ndị nwụrụla n’ihe mberede a ga-agbago n’ihi na ndị ọrụ enyemaka enwebeghị ike ịbanye n’ọtụtụ mpaghara n’ihi na oke mmiri ozuzo na oke ifufe ka na-ebusi ike n’ebe ndị ahụ..
Onye nkwalite Anthony Joshua bụ, Eddie Hearn, na-ekweta na onye bụbu onye mmeri dị n’otu arọ efu efuola ụfọdụ mkpesa ụlọ ọrụ igbe ya, na-ekwusi ike na onye na-egwu egwuregwu ka nwere ike ịlaghachi azụ ka ọ bụrụ onye ọkpọ ọkpọ kacha mma.
                                                                                           Onye gbara afọ iri atọ na atọ gbara afọ abụọ n’ụwa ka na-ata ahụhụ site na mmeri azụ na azụ o meriri onye Ukraine, Oleksandr Usyk.
                                  Mana mgbanaka Jọshụa na-abịaru nso ma nwee olile anya na ọ ga-abụ ụzọ laghachi azụ na asọmpi aha ụwa, n’abali mbu nke onwa Eprel, na ngosipụta ga-emeri megide Jermaine Franklin na O2.
                                                                                                                                                                                   Agbanyeghị, n’agbanyeghị na Joshua erebuola ama egwuregwu na Wembley na Tottenham, a ka nwere puku kwuru puku tiketi a na-ereghị n’ọgbọ egwuregwu 20,000 East London.
                                                                                                                                                                                                               Na onye na-akwalite Matchroom ya Hearn na-eche na mfu na-aga n’ihu na Usyk emetụtala Joshua n’ahịa.
                                                                              Ọ gwara ESBR Boxing, “Ọ na-abịa na mmeri abụọ, yabụ n’ezie ị gaghị abụ otu nha na azụmahịa dịka ị dị mgbe ị meriri Wladimir Klitschko n’ihu 90,000.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             “Ma ọ bụ nnukwu onye agha, ọ bụ otu n’ime ndị arọ kacha mma n’ụwa.                                                                                                                    Ọ dị m ka ọ ka nwere ike ịbụ ibu arọ kacha mma n’ụwa.” Onye Britain-Nigerian na-achọ ịlaghachi n’ọgụ aha, agbanyeghị, ma na-amalite ihe na ọgụ dị ụtọ megide American Franklin, onye tụfuru mkpebi dị warara nye Dilian Whyte na njedebe ọdụ nke 2022, mana ọtụtụ chere na o mere nke ọma.
Ụlọ akụ etiti bụ Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) ekwuola na akwụkwọ ego N200, N500 na N1,000) ochie ga-adịgide ire ruo abalị iri atọ na otu ọnwa Disemba afọ 2023.
Onye na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi ụlọọrụ CBN bụ Isa AbdulMumin kwupụtara nke a na mgbede Mọnde, Maachị 13, 2023.
Nke a na-abịa dị ka Ụlọikpe etiti nọọrọ n’abalị atọ ọnwa Maachị kpebie na akwụkwọ ego naira ochie na nke ọhụrụ kwesịrị ịgakọrịta ruo na ngwụcha afọ.
“Na ndabanye irube isi n’iwu, enyela ndị ụlọ akụ na-arụ ọrụ na Naịjirịa ka ha mejupụta ihe Ụlọikpe etiti kpebiri n’abalị atọ ọnwa Maachị, 2023.
“N’otu aka ahụ, CBN ezutela ndị kọmitii ụlọ akụ ma nye iwu ka akwụkwọ ego N200, N500 na N1000 ochie ka dị ire n’akụkụ akwụkwọ ego ndị ahụ emeghariri emegharị ruo abalị iri atọ na otu ọnwa Disemba, 2023.
“N’ihi ya, a na-agwa ndị niile nke a metụtara ka ha tinye ndụmọdụ a n’ọrụ.”.
Ụlọ akụ etiti Naịjirịa kwuru na ọ naghị etinye aka na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị pati ma kọwapụta akụkọ e bipụtara n’akwụkwọ akụkọ Nation nke Mọnde, abali iri na ato nke onwa Maachị, 2023, na-ebo ebubo na Gọvanọ, Mazi.
Godwin Emefiele ewepụtala “akpa nkata ọhụrụ megide Onyeisi a họpụtara ahọpụta.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Nkwupụta nke onye isi oche, Corporate Communications, CBN, Isa Abdulmumin bịanyere aka na ya, kwuru na akụkọ ahụ e kwuru n’elu gara n’ihu na-ekwu na Gọvanọ enyela ego ụfọdụ n’aka onye na-achọ ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị tupu abali iri na asato nke onwa ọchị Maachị, 2023, ntuli aka gọvano Nkwupụta ahụ na-agụ: “Anyị chọrọ ịgwa ndị ọha na eze na akụkọ a bụ kpamkpam ụgha na obi ọjọọ n’ihi na Gọvanọ CBN amaghị na ọ dịtụbeghị mgbe ya na Maazị Gbadebo Rhodes-Vivour kparịtara ma ọ bụ kparịta ụka, ma n’onwe ma ọ bụ site na onye nnọchiteanya.
”                                                         “Anyị na-achọ ikwughachi na Gọvanọ CBN adịghị etinye aka na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, ya mere na-agba onye ọ bụla nwere ozi megidere iwu ka ọ gosi na Gọvanọ na-ezighị ezi site n’inye ihe ọ bụla.”                                                                                                                      “N’ihi ya, Gọvanọ na ndị otu ya nọ na CBN kwesịrị ikwe ka ha lekwasị anya n’ọrụ e kenyere ha n’uche iji nweta ikike nke ụlọ akụ.”.
Onyeisiala Naijiria bụ Muhammadu Buhari adọọla ndị ezinaụlọ, ndị enyi na ndị otu Senator Franca Afegbua, bụ nwanyị mbụ sinetọ nke Naijiria, onye njem nlegharị anya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị buliri elu ugegbe maka ụmụ nwanyị na ụlọ omebe iwu na Republic nke abụọ.
                                                        N’ịbụ onye a họpụtara n’okpuru National Party of Nigeria (NPN) ka ọ nọchite anya Bendel North ochie, President Buhari kwenyere na ọrụ akụkọ ihe mere eme gbanwere kpamkpam echiche na ọnọdụ nke ụmụ nwanyị, steeti ya na obodo ya, karịsịa na ntule nke àgwà nduzi kwesịrị nṅomi nke ọmịiko na nsonye.
, nke mere Afegbua ntụkwasị obi na nkwanye ùgwù.                                                                                                                                                               Onye isi ala na-eso gọọmentị na ndị Edo steeti na ndị obodo ya na-ekere òkè n’ihe mgbu nke ọnwụ, ebe ọ nọgidere bụrụ ihe mkpali nye ụmụ agbọghọ na-eto eto, na-ewepụ ọtụtụ n’ime enweghị olileanya site na nduzi na ịmepụta ohere maka ndị ọzọ iji mezuo nrọ ha na ọrụ dị iche iche.
                             Onye isi ala Buhari na-ekpe ekpere ka Chineke Pụrụ Ime Ihe Nile nata mkpụrụ obi nke onye ahụ nwụrụ anwụ ebe ọ na-agbakwa ezinaụlọ ahụ ume ka ha gbakọọ ọrụ ọma ya maka ụmụ ọmụmụ..
Satellite Communications Nigeria, Ltd, NIGCOMSAT, na-ekwu na ọ ga-aga n’ihu iji nweta uru na ohere dị na Mgbanwe Ụlọ Ọrụ nke anọ, 4IR.
         Nke a bụ mgbalị iji weghachite ọrụ nke NIGCOMSAT maka ezigbo ihe ịga nke ọma dị ka ndị ọrụ Board na Management kpebiri imezigharị ọhụụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ iji kwekọọ na eziokwu nke Volatility, Uncertainty, Complexity na Ambiguity na nke anọ 4IR chọrọ.
                                                                            N’okwu a na-agụ na njedebe nke nkwụghachi azụ ụbọchị abụọ a na-eme na Abuja, na isiokwu: ‘Re-defining NIGCOMSAT Road Map for Exponential Growth,’ nkwụghachi azụ ahụ kpebiri na isi ụkpụrụ kwesịrị igosipụta usoro nkwenye nke na-akpụzi omenala nhazi.
                                                    Nlaghachi azụ nke onye isi oche Board, Yusuf Kazaure, kwuru na ekwesịrị inwe nhazi nke omenala na atụmatụ NIGCOMSAT nwere usoro ndu dị irè iji nweta ọhụụ nhazi a tụrụ anya ya.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Ọ kwughachiri mkpa maka nnyefe ọrụ iji megharịa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ maka ọganihu dị elu site na ịmepụta otu na ntinye aka site na Management na ndị ọrụ nke nzukọ ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Ọzọkwa, nkwụghachi azụ ahụ kwusiri ike na ọ dị mkpa ka gọọmentị kwadoro Sistemụ njikwa arụmọrụ ka etinyere na omume NIGCOMSAT Human Resource (HR).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Ihe omume ahụ nke ndị isi nchịkwa sokwara gụnyere ndị ọrụ nchịkwa nke ụlọ ọrụ nke onye isi njikwa, Tukur Mohammed Lawal, kwusiri ike mkpa ọ dị maka nyocha na nkwalite akụrụngwa, inye nkwado ọzụzụ maka ndị nrụpụta, akpaaka usoro azụmahịa na ọrụ nkwado.
iji hụ na a tụlere ya nke ọma wee ruo na nnyefe ọrụ n’oge n’etiti ndị ọzọ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                    Lawal, onye gosipụtara akwụkwọ e ji christed ‘roadmap to excellence, nke e mere iji gboo na imeri ọtụtụ ihe isi ike na-eche NIGCOMSAT Ltd’, kọwapụtara ogidi ise dị mkpa n’ime nke a ga-agbaso usoro ụzọ ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                Onye isi NIGCOMSAT kwuru na ogidi ndị a bụ, mmepe ndị mmadụ, ndabere ọrụ, nnyefe ọrụ, nlebara anya ndị ahịa na nkwado.
                                         O kwuru na akwụkwọ ikike nkwado nke na-enye nkwupụta izugbe nke ntinye aka NIGCOMSAT maka omume azụmahịa na-adigide ka akwadoro maka mmejuputa.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   Nsonaazụ ndị ọzọ dị mkpa nke nlọghachi azụ bụ; lekwasị anya n’ịkwalite ahụmịhe nke ndị ahịa, ọrụ na nzute ọkọlọtọ ụlọ ọrụ, usoro dị n’ime dị ka Automated Network Operations Management (ANOMIS), kwalite mgbasa ozi ahịa na ika nke ụlọ ọrụ na-enyekwu ohere na mgbasa ozi ọdịnala na nke ọhụrụ iji kwalite visibiliti na mmụba ego ha nwetara..
N’ọdị nso a, e nweela nrụrịtaụka na soshal midia gbasara mmeri Peter Obi nwetara na Legọs Steeti, bụ ebe Bola Tinubu – onye zọrọ ọkwa onyeisiala na pati APC – chịburu dịka Gọvanọ.
Nrụrịtaụka a bụ gbasara agbụrụ, dịka ọtụtụ na-ekwu na ọ bụ maka agbụrụ Peter Obi mere ọtụtụ ndị Igbo ji akwado ya.
Ya bụ nrụrịtaụka abanyekwala na ndọrọndọrọ ọkwa Gọvanọ Labour Steeti, ebe Peter Obi na-akwado Gbadebo Rhodes-Vivour nke Labour Party, onye nne ya nakwa nwunye ya bụ ndị Igbo si mpaghara Ọwụwa Anyanwụ Naịjirịa.
Mana Obi kwuru na “ndị na-ewebata okwu gbasara agbụrụ mmadụ na ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị bụ ndị enweghị ihe ha nwere inye n’ezi ọchịchị obodo.” “Ndị Yoruba tụọrọ m vootu na Legọs karịrị n’ọnụọgụgụ.
Okwu ịkpa oke agbụrụ bụ ihe ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ji emesa ndị mmadụ uche ka ha ghara ịjụ ajụjụ ndị dị mkpa ha kwesịrị ịjụ tupu ha atụọ vootu.” Peter Obi kwuru na ya ọ bụghị iwu na ndị nkwado ya, a na-akpọ ‘Obidient Movement’, ga na-akwadorịrị naanị ‘Labour Party’, ọ kachasị na steeti dị icheiche ebe pati ahụ na-enweghị ndị pụtara ịzọ ọkwa Gọvanọ.
Ntuliaka maka ọkwa gọvanọ steeti nakwa ndị omeiwu steeti ga-adị n’ụbọchị Satọde, bụ ụbọchị iri na asato nke ọnwa Maachị 2023..
Onye isi ala Naijiria bu, Muhammadu Buhari kelere Xi Jinping maka nhọpụta ya ọzọ maka afọ ise nke atọ dịka onyeisi oche na onyeisi oche nke Central Military Commission (CMC) nke ndị mmadụ Republic of China.
                                                                                                                                     Onye isi ala ahụ kwenyere na n’okpuru nduzi nke President Xi, mmekọrịta dị n’etiti China na Nigeria, bụ nke malitere na 1971 mgbe mba abụọ ahụ guzobeworo n’ụzọ iwu kwadoro mmekọrịta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, gbasaa ngwa ngwa na azụmahịa abụọ na imekọ ihe ọnụ.
                                                   Onye isi ala na-atụkwasị obi na ọdịnihu nke mmekọrịta mmekọrịta a na China ga-aga n’ihu na-eto eto na njedebe na mpaghara nke agha, ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, azụmahịa, ego, mmanụ na gas yana imekọ ihe ọnụ na telivishọn, ugbo, mmepe akụrụngwa na ngalaba mmepụta.
                                                 Onye isi ala Buhari chọrọ ka gọọmentị na ndị China gaa n’ihu na udo, ọganihu na ọganihu n’okpuru nduzi nwere ike na ntụkwasị obi nke President Xi..
NKWA ONYEISIALA BU BUHARI N’APỤ APỤ KWERE NAIJIRIA MA MEKWA YA OLEE O NERE IKE.
Charles Soludo: Ị tụnyere omeiwu abụghị Apga, ọrụ mmepe agaghị eru mpaghara gị aka.
Aka na-achị Anambra steeti bụ Charles Soludo ekwuola na ya na ndị omeiwu steeti ahụ abụghị ndị otu Apga agaghị arụkọ ma ọ bụrụ na-atụnyere ha vootu na ntuliaka na-abịa.
Soludo kwuru nke a na nsonso a n’ ọgbakọ ya na ndị otu Apga nwere n’Ọka, isiobodo Anambara steeti tupu ntuliaka a kwadoburu ime n’abalị 11 nke ọnwa Maachị, afọ 2023 mana ihe onyonyo ya malitere wuwe na soshal midia ụbọchị Tọzde.
Ụlọọrụ na-ahazi ntuliaka tinyeburu ntuliaka gọvanọ nakwa ụlọomeiwu steeti n’abalị 11 nke ọnwa Maachị, afọ 2023 ma hihari ya gaa abalị 18 nke ọnwa Maachi iji nye ha o here ịhazi igwe Bivas maka ntuliaka ahụ.
N’ihe onyonyo ahụ nke ndị ntaakụkọ na ndị na-akwado pati ya gbakọrọ, Soludo kwuru na ọ na-atụ anya na ndị mmadụ ga-apụ tụọọ Apga vootu n’igwe sị, sịrị,, “Maka onye mụ na ya ga-anọ na-arụ ya ga-abụ onye Apga, Ị tụọrọ onye ọzọ, ị mara na ọ bụ sọ ụgwọọnwa ya ka ọ ga na-eri.” “ A kwụọ ya ụgwọọnwa ya, ọ laa be ya.” “ Onye nọ n’ụlọoemiwu anaghị arụ okporoụzọ,ọ naghị arụ ụlọọgwụ, ọ naghị ụlọakwụkwọ, maka ego ole ka o nwere.” BBC.
Njirimara ọrịa akịrị Ọrịa akịrị anaghị egosikarị onwe ya n’oge.
njirimara ya na-eyikwa nke ọrịa ndị ọzọ.
Ihe were anya e ji mara ọrịa akịrị bụ ihu aka na ụkwụ ịza aza.

FG na-akpọku steeti ka ha bube atụmatụ nchekwa  mmiri  ọnụnụ ụzọ.
Ụlọ ọrụ Federal Ministry of Water Resources kpọkuru ndị gọọmentị steeti ka ha na-ebute atụmatụ nchekwa mmiri , iji belata mmetọ.
Onye enyemaka onye isi, mmiri, ịdị ọcha na mmekorita nke ịdị ọcha, Oriakụ Abosede Orimoloye, kpọrọ oku a na ogbako maka mmepe nke atụmatụ nkwadebe maka mgbochi Cholera (EPR) na Asaba, Delta.
O kwuru na ndị na-eji mmiri ọzọ ewezuga ebe mmiri ọha kwesịrị ikpocha ma debe  isi mmiri ha ọcha  ugboro anọ n’ime otu afọ, na-ekwu na-eweputala usoro ọgbara ọhụrụ esi ekpocha ma na edebekwa mmiri ọcha.
O kwuru, mkpa atụmatụ nchekwa mmiri dị mkpa bụ ibelata mmetọ nke isi mmiri ọñụñụ, igbochi mmetọ n’oge nchekwa, nkesa na njikwa..
Turkey, Sweden na Finland nwere mkparịta ụka  maka NATO.
Turkey, Sweden na Finland amaliteghachila mkparịta ụka nke atọ maka nkwado Sweden na Finland ịbanye na NATO na mba atọ ahụ na-ekweta inwe nzukọ ndị ọzọ.
Onye isi mkparita uka nke Sweden na usoro ntinye aka bụ Oscar Stenstrom, kwuru na Tọzdee na Turkey ekwenyela na Sweden na Finland emeela ihe doro anya iji zute ihe  Ankara chọrọ.
“Anyị na-ahụ na Turkey ghọtara na ma Sweden na Finland emeela ihe doro anya na nkwekọrịta a, nke bụ ezigbo ihe ịrịba ama,” Stenstrom gwara ndị nta akụkọ n’isi ụlọ ọrụ NATO.
“Obere nzọụkwụ na-aga n’ihu, mkparịta ụka ahụ amaliteghachila ma anyị ekwenyela na anyị ga-aga n’ihu na-ezute ma enweghị m ike ikwu kpọmkwem mgbe.”.

Dịka onye enyemaka pụrụiche nke Onyeisiala na mgbasa ozi siri kwuo, Onyeisiala gosipụtara ọmịiko ya nke ukwuu n’ebe ndị ahịa ahụ na ezinaụlọ ha nọ, “ndị na-ata ahụhụ nke ọnọdụ ọjọọ a ma nọrọkwa n’amaghị ihe ha ga-eme na ndọghachi azụ nwa oge a.” Onyeisiala Buhari kwuru na o chegbukwara ya maka ọkụ ọgbụgba yiri nke a, nke mere n’ahịa Balogun a ma ama n’izuụka ole na ole gara aga, kpọkuzie ndị ọchịchị ka ha kpachapụ anya iji kwụsị ọgbaghara a.
Ka a na-enyocha oke na ihe kpatara mmebi ahụ, Onyeisiala Buhari toro ndị ọrụ mgbanyụ ọkụ Lagos steeti maka ịgbata ọsọ enyemaka, mazọputa ọdụ mmanụ ụgbọala na ụlọ ndị dị nso ebe ahụ..

Onyeisiala Naịjirịa bụ Muhammadu Buhari akpọkuola ndị Naịjirịa bi na Qatar ka ha kwado onyeisiala Naịjirịa bụ Bola Tinubu ka ọ na-achị ọchịchị n’abalị iri abụọ na itoolu n’ọnwa Mee.
                                                                                                                                                                                                         N’ikwu okwu na nnọkọ Town Hall na Doha, dịka akụkụ nke nleta ya na steeti Qatar, President Buhari kwuru na ọchịchị ya na-atụ anya ịkwado ntuli aka ziri ezi, nke doro anya na nke ziri ezi nke ga-agwụ na Saturday, March 11, na Gọvanọ na Ụlọ Nzukọ Ọchịchị.
                                                 Ya mere ọ kpọkuru ha ka ha “kwado ọchịchị Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu na-abata, ka Naijiria wee na-abụ ihe ngosi olileanya na ọganihu na kọntinent anyị na ihe atụ nke mba Africa ndị ọzọ ga-eṅomi.
                                                                                                                                                                                 N’ikwu ya n’ihu, Onyeisiala kwetara ọrụ ọma nke ndị Naijiria nọ na mba ụwa niile na-arụ na mmepe nke Naijiria, gbakwụnye na ọchịchị ya akwadola usoro iwu obodo, ma kwado ndị Nigerians in Diaspora Commission (NiDCOM) n’ụzọ niile.
imebe mmemme maka njikọ aka nke ndị Naijiria nọ na mba ọzọ maka ‘ndị nnọchianya’ iji nye oke ha maka mmepe obodo nna ha.
                                                                                                                              N’okwu nke ya, onye nnochite anya Naijiria na steeti Qatar, Yakubu Ahmed kelere President Buhari maka ime ntuliaka onyeisiala na nke omebe iwu nke ọma na February 25, 2023.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      O kwuru na usoro a egosila na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Naijiria siri ike n’ezie ebe ọ na-ekpe ekpere maka ntuli aka Gọvanọ na Ọchịchị na-aga nke ọma.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Onye nnọchi anya Ahmed gwara Onye isi ala na Naijiria na steeti Qatar anọgidewo na-enwe mmekọrịta ụmụnne abụọ kemgbe e guzobere mmekọrịta mba na 2013 na-achọpụta na ugbu a ihe dị ka ndị Naijiria 7,000 bi na Qatar, ma na-arụ ọrụ nke ọma n’akụkụ dị iche iche nke mgbalị mmadụ.
               O tokwara onye isi ala maka mgbanwe akụrụngwa na mba ahụ, agha ya na-emegide nrụrụ aka, na-ejikọta Nigeria ọnụ yana mgbasa ozi onye kwuo uche ya nke ọma na Africa.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        “Achọrọ m ikele gị maka nkatọ gị na-enweghị mgbagha maka ndị isi ala Africa nke chọrọ n’ezie ịnọ n’ọchịchị ruo mgbe ebighị ebi.
A na m arị gị izu ike kwesịrị ekwesị,” ka ọ gbakwụnyere..
Gọọmenti steeti Ekiti na ndị ọrụ ugbo Rice Farmers Association of Nigeria (RIFAN) na-arụkọ ọrụ iji kwalite mmepụta osikapa.                                         Nke a bụ onye ndụmọdụ pụrụiche nye gọvanọ n’ihe gbasara ọrụ ugbo, bụ Mazị Ebenezer Boluwade, na nzụkọ ya na ndị nnọchite anya (RIFAN).                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              O kwuru na ọrụ ugbo na mmepụta osikapa malitere n’Ekiti n’afọ 1945 site na ụdị Igbemo dị iche iche, ma kwupụta na-echegbu onwe ya na ụtụ steeti ahụ na-enye maka mmepụta osikapa obodo ka dị obere.
Dị ka Boluwade si kwuo,                                                                                                                       “Mgbakọta a bụ ịkekọrịta echiche maka otu esi eme ka mmepụta osikapa na steeti ahụ na gọọmentị ga-ejikọta ya na ndị na-eme ihe na mpaghara ahụ iji hụ na a na-akụ ihe ọkụkụ.                                                                                                                                                                                                                           “Anyị chọrọ ịhụ ka a na-akọ osikapa n’ọchịchị ime obodo anyị niile, anyị chọrọ ịhụ ndị ọrụ ugbo anyị na-amịpụta ụdị osikapa dị mma, na gọọmentị steeti ga-agba mbọ na-enweta ọganihu n’akụkụ niile.”                                                                                                             N’ikwu okwu na nzụkọ ahụ ụfọdụ ndị ọrụ ugbo kọwara ebumnobi gọọmentị dị ka ihe ọma maka ịkụ osikapa na steeti ahụ..
Ụlọikpe mkpesa dị n’Abuja ga-anọ taa bụ Wenezde kpebie ma ha a ga-enye ụlọọrụ ‘Independent National Electoral Commission’ (Inec) ikike ịga n’ihu hichapụ ihe niile dị n’igwe Bimodal Voter Accreditation System, iji were ya rụọ ọrụ n’ụbọchị Satọde abali iri na otu nke onwa Maachị.
Inec na-arịọ ka ụlọikpe nye ha ikike ime nke a ka ọ ghara igbochi ntuliaka nke ọkwa gọvanọ na ndị omeiwu steeti dị icheiche na Naịjirịa.
N’ụbọchị Tuzde,abali asaanke onwa Maachị, ka okwu ahụ pụtara n’ihu ndị ọkaikpe nke ụlọikpe mkpesa, dịka otu ndọrọndọrọ Peoples Democratic Party na Labour Party na-ekwu na Inec ekwesịghị ihichapụ BVAS ndị ahụ n’ihi na ọ bụ na ha ka ha ga-esi weta ihe akaebe ha ga-eji gosi na nrụrụaka dị na ntuliaka nke onyeisiala bụ nke e mere n’abali iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Febrụwarị.
N’ikpe ahụ, ọkaiwu Onyechi Ikpeazu (SAN) nọchitere anya otu LP na onye zọọrọ ha ọkwa onyeisiala bụ Peter Obi, ebe Emeka Etiaba (SAN) nọchitere anya Abubakar Atiku na otu PDP.
Mana Inec na-akọwa na ọ BVAS ndị ahụ ka ha kwesịrị iji mee ntuliaka ọkwa gọvanọ na ndị ụlọ omeiwu steeti dị icheiche n’ụbọchị Satọde na-abịanụ bụ abali iri na otunke onwa Maachị.
Tanimu Inuwa, bụ ọkaiwu Inec, gwara ụlọikpe ahụ sị: “Ọgbọ ntuliaka ọbụla nwere BVAS nke ya.
Anyị kwesịrị ihichapụ BVAS ndị a ma kwadebe ha maka ntuliaka ọzọ.” “Anyị ekwela nkwa na onweghị ihe ọbụla dị na BVAS ugbua nke ga-efu efu n’ihi na anyị echekwaala ha na ‘backend server’ anyị.” “Ọ bụrụ na e nye otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị abụọ a ohere inyocha BVAS ndị a ugbua, ọ ga-abụ ihe ndọghachi azụ na nkwado anyị na-eme maka ntuliaka nke na-abịanụ.” Ndị ọkaikpe ụlọikpe mkpesa kwuru na ha ga-enye mkpebi ha n’okwu a taa bụ Wenezde,abali asatọ nke ọnwa Maachị afọ 2023..
Onye zọrọ ọkwa onyeisiala Naịjirịa n’otu ‘Labour Party’ bụ Peter Obi ekwuola na ya ga-eso ndị ọkaiwu ya gaa ụlọikpe taa gbasara mkpesa ha na-eme maka nrụrụaka ha sị mere na ntuliaka ọkwa onyeisiala Naịjirịa n’abali iri abụọ na ise nke onwa Febrụwarị.
Peter Obi kwuru nke a site n’akara Twitter ya dịka ọ kọwara ihe mere na ọ gaghị enweike ịga steeti dị icheiche ma kwadoo ndị otu Labour Party na-azọ ọkwa Gọvanọ na steeti ndị ahụ.
“Taa ka m kwesịrị ịmalite njem nkwado maka ndị ‘Labour Party’ na-azọ ọkwa Gọvanọ na oche omeiwu na steeti dị icheiche.
Njem a kwesịrị ibuga m Nasarawa, Legọs, Enugu, Abia, Delta, Edo, Rivers, Plateau, na Borno Steeti,” Obi kwuru.
“Mana dịka Inec jụrụ ikwe ka anyị nyochaa akụrụngwa ndị e ji mee ntuliaka onyeisiala n’ụbọchị 25 nke Febrụwarị (nke gụnyere BVAS), aga m eso ndị ọkaiwu anyị gaa ụlọikpe taa.” Obi gwara ndị nkwado ya na steeti dị icheiche ka ha nyekwa ndị niile na-azọ ọkwa na Labour Party ụdị nkwado ha nyere ya na steeti dị icheiche.
“Dịka m na-agba mbọ iweghachite mmeri anyị, ọ dị mkpa ka ndị ụnụ tụọrọ onye ọbụla ma ọrụ, nwee ezi agwa, dị ike ọrụ ma nwee obi ọmaiko vootu,” Obi kwuru..
Onye a họpụtara ịchị Naịjirịa bụ BolaTinubu amalitela ịchọ ka Ụlọikpe Mkpegharị nye iwu ha ọ nweta ikike ịhụ ngwaọrụ ndị Independent National Electoral Commission (Inec) ji mee ntuliaka nke abali iri abuo na ise n’ọnwa Febrụwarị, 2023.
Onye ọkaiwu ya bụ Akintola Makinde, kwuru na ọ ga-adị mkpa ka ọ nyochaa, ma nweeike sete foto ụfọdụ n’ime ihe ndị e ji mee ntuliaka ahụ ihe kwadobe onwe ya maka ikpe ụfọdụ na-adapụta bụ ndị chọrọ ka akagbuo mmeri Tinubu na ntuliaka ahụ.
Makinde kwuru nke a n’ụbọchị Tuzde.
Cheta na Inec kụchapụrụ ụfọdụ mkpesa ndị pati PDP na LP mere n’ụlọikpe pụrụiche nke Presidential Election Petition Court.
Mkpesa ndị a gụnyere inye ha ohere ha ha nyocha ngwa ọrụ Bvas nke Inec nakwa arịọrịọ ka edobe ụfọdụ ngwaọrụ ndị ọzọ ma ghara ịkpa ya aka mana onye ọkaiwu Inec bụ , Tanimu Inuwa kwuru ka akụchapụ arịọrịọ ndị a dịka ọ kọwara na ime nke a ga-emetụta ntuliaka ọkwa gọvanọ na-abịa na Satọdee.
Ọ gbakwụnyere na e nwere ọdọ ntuliaka ruru 176,000 e mere ntuliaka na Naịjirịa ma kwuo na ha niile nwere igwe BVAS nke ha pụrụiche nke bụ na ịtọkọta ma malite ihazi ha maka mkpesa ga-esiri ha ike ịhazi n’ime obere oge a..
Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari ekwela osote Onyeisiala mba Iran nkwa njikere Naijiria dị ịkwalite mmekọrịta dị n’etiti mba abụọ ahụ.
Onyeisiala Buhari kwuru nke a oge osote Onyeisiala mba Iran bụ Mohsen Mansouri gara leta ya n’oge ọgbakọ United Nations na-eme na Doha, isi obodo steeti Qatar.
Dịka Onyeisiala siri kwuo, “Mụ na ndị Iran esorola m kpakọrịta kemgbe ọtụtụ afọ ọkachasị mgbe m bụ minista mmanụ ụgbọ ala wee ghọta obodo ahụ na ndị ya.
“Ya mere, a nam anabata nkwado mmekọrịta dị n’etiti mba anyị, ebe anyị nwere ihe mgbakwunye, karịsịa na mmepụta ike.” Onyeisiala gwakwara onye ọbịa ya gbasara ntuliaka e mere na Naịjirịa nso nso a na onyeisiala ọhụrụ ga-eweghara ọchịchị n’ihe na-erughị ọnwa atọ na-atụ anya na mmekọrịta siri ike o wulitere n’etiti mba abụọ ahụ ga-aga n’ihu na-adịgide adịgide na ọchịchị ọhụrụ ahụ.
Onye osote Onyeisiala Iran kwuru na obi dị ya ụtọ na ya na onye ndu Naijiria zutere, ghọta nke ọma na mba abụọ ahụ nwere akụ na ụba ọnatara chi na akụ na ụba si na mmadụ, ha nwere mkpa ijikọ ọnụ na mpaghara ndị ọzọ dịka ọrụ ugbo.
Ebe Iran nwere mmachi mba ụwa ugbu a maka ihe gbasara nuclear na ihe ndị ọzọ, Mazị Mansouri kwusiri ike na dịka ndị isi na mpaghara ha, ọ dị mkpa ka mba abụọ ahụ gbaa mbọ inwe ọtụtụ ezi mmekọrita, gbakwụnye na ụzọ ịga n’ihu bụ ịtọlite ​​​​ma wusie kọmishọn njikọ dị n’etiti mba abụọ ahụ n’ọkwa kachasị elu..
Honorebu.Isa Ashiru kpokuru ndi mmadu ka ha kwadebe ma puta tuo votu n’abali iri na otu nke onwa Febuwari,na agbanyeghi nsogbu obula.
             Dị ka ya si kwuo, ọ bụrụ na ndị bi na ndị bi na ha ga-enwe ike inweta maduna obodo ndị nwere ọganihu, mgbe ahụ, ha ji onwe ha na ezinụlọ ha kpebiri ịga na ntuli aka maka pdp.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Nke a bụ ihe edere na nkwupụta Reuben Buhari, onye isi mgbasa ozi, mgbasa ozi na mgbasa ozi, PDP steeti mkpọsa ma emere ya na akwụkwọ ozi na Kaduna.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             “Ọ bụ ezie na ndị mmadụ nwere ike ime ka mmadụ nwee mmetụta nke ntuli aka ikpeazụ na ikekwe na-eche ihe mere ha ga-eji mee ka ọ ghara ịnwụ ma nọrọ ụgwọ ọrụ ọ bụla maka onye ọ bụla.
                                                                                                                                                                                                  Votu maka PDP na-esote Satọdee na-esote, na-agbanyeghị ndị ọzọ, ga-ahụ na mmadụ niile gụchara.
                                                                                             ” Gubernatoria tetad ma keleela ndị bi na Kaduna ma na-akọ ha maka PDP n’abali iri abuo na ise February na usoro ahụ na-achasi ike na ụlọ iri na isii nke oche ndị nnọchi anya.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                               O kwusiri ike “anyị na-eme ka ihe si na ntuli aka gara aga ma na-esite na ntuli aka gara aga n’azụ anyị, anyị ga-enweta ihe isi ike ọ bụla nye ndị bi na Kaduna State,” ka o kwusiri ike.
                                                                                                                                                            Ya mere o ji ume ịtụ vootu ka ọ bụrụ ihe dị iche iche na ịjụ n’ụzọ ọ bụla n’ụzọ ọ bụla iji mebie nke ha taa maka echi nke nwere ọtụtụ ihe..
Ngalaba nhazi ntuliaka na Naịjirịa bụ ‘Independent National Electoral Commission’ (Inec) ekwela nkwa na ọdachi niile e nwere na ntuliaka onyeisiala n’abali iri abuo na ise nke ọnwa Febrụwarị agaghị adịkwa na ntuliaka nke ọkwa Gọvanọ a ga-eme na steeti dị icheiche n’abali iri na otu nke ọnwa Maachị afo 2023.
Onyeisioche Inec bụ Mahmood Yakubu kwere nkwa a oge ya na ndị welitere isi na Inec nwere ọgbakọ n’ụbọchị Satọde,abali ano nke onwa  Maachị.
Ọgbakọ ahụ na-abịa dịka ụbọchị olemole gachara Inec ji kpọpụta Bola Ahmed Tinubu nke pati ‘All Progressives Congress’ (APC) dịka onye meriri ntuliaka ọkwa Onyeisiala Naịjirịa.
Ntuliaka ahụ nwere ọtụtụ mperi dịka ndị mmadụ si kpesa nakwa dịka ụfọdụ otu ndị na-elekọta ntuliaka si kwuo.
Mperi ndị a gụnyere ndị ọrụ Inec abịaghị n’oge na ‘polling unit’ dị icheiche, enweghị akụrụngwa zuru ezu maka ntuliaka, enweghị ike iziga mpụtara ntuliaka gaa IReV dịka iwu si kwuo, dgz.
Nke a mere ka Atiku Abubakar onye zọrọ ọkwa onyeisiala n’otu ‘Peoples Democratic Party’ (PDP) nakwa Peter Obi onye nke ‘Labour Party’ kwuo na ha ga-aga ụlọikpe ịgbagha mmeri Tinubu.
N’ọgbakọ nke ụbọchị Satọde, Mahmood Yakubu kọwara na Inec atụleela ntuliaka nke gara aga, chọpụta ebe niile ha si rie mperi ma dozikwaa ha.
“Anyị atụleela teknụzụ anyị niile ma wulite ha iji hụ na ọdachi niile e nwere, ọ kachasị gbasara iziga mpụtara ntuliaka, agaghị adịkwa na ntuliaka nke ụbọchị 11 nke ọnwa Maachị,” ka Yakubu kwuru.
Ihe ise INEC ga-eme tupu ntuliaka ọkwa gọvanọ Ebe a ga-enwe ntuliaka Gọvanọ Inec kwuru na ntuliaka nke ọkwa gọvanọ ga-adị na steeti iri abuo na asato, mana ntuliaka maka ụlọ omeiwu steeti ga-adị na steeti niile.
Ụfọdụ ebe a na-emeghị ntuliaka maka ụlọ omeiwu etiti n’abali iri abuo na ise nke Febrụwarị, a ga-emezi ya n’abali iri na otu nke Maachị; ebe ndị a gụnyere mpaghara Enugu East n’Enugwu Steeti, Esan East/West na Igueben nke Edo Steeti.
Mpụtara ntuliaka nke ụlọ omeiwu etiti Dịka onyeisi Inec bụ Mahmood Yakubu si kwuo, akpọpụtala mpụtara ntuliaka maka oche omeiwu etiti ọnụgụgụ ya dị 423.
Nke a gụnyere oche sineti 98 nke mere ka ọ fọdụ mmadụ iri na otu ka oche sineti zuo; oche nari ato iri abuo na ise n’ụlọ omeiwu nta bụ ‘House of Representatives’, ọ fọdụ mmadụ iri ato na ise ka oche ụlọ omeiwu nta zuo.
Pati asaa nwetara oche na sineti ebe pati asatọ nwetara oche n’ụlọ omeiwu nta.
Lee etu okwe si gbaa na sineti: APC – 57; PDP – 29; LP – 6; SDP – 2; NNPP – 2; YPP – 1; APGA – 1.
N’ụlọ omeiwu nta, lee ndị nwetara mmeri: APC – 162; PDP – 102; LP – 34; NNPP – 18; APGA – 4; ADC – 2; SDP – 2; YPP – 1..
Nani ma ụlọikpe akagburu mpụtara ntuliaka e mere n’abalị iri abụọ na ise nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2023, Bola Ahmed Tinubu nke pati ‘All Progressives Congress’ ga-abanye n’oche dịka Onyeisiala Naijiria n’obi Gọọmentị Etiti bụ ‘Aso Rock’ dị n’Abuja, n’abalị iri abụọ na itolu nke ọnwa Mee, afọ a.
Mana ya bụ ije abụghị ụtaba achị n’aka agba egwu n’ihi n’ọrụ chere onyeisiala ọhụrụ n’oge a Naijiria nọ na nnukwu nsogbu ga-abụ dịmkpa n’okwu ma n’omume.
Lee ọrụ ụfọdụ ndị ọkachamara n’okwu ndọrọndọọ kwuru a na-atụ anya n’aka ga-eche onye ga-abanye n’ọrụ onyeisiala aka mgba: Jọstis Chukwudifu Oputa bụ onye nọ n’isi otu pụrụ iche e hiwere a kpọrọ ‘Oputa Panel” maka ịleba anya na mkpagbu na mmegide e megidere ndị mmadụ malite n’afọ 1984 rue afọ 1999 Obi adịghị ndị mmadụ mma dịka ntuliaka si gaa.
Ndị zọrọ ọkwa ahụ mana o ruteghị ha aka, na ndị na-akwado ha, anaghị achị ọchị.
Ọ bụ ọrụ dịịrị onyeisiala na-abata ‘ịchịtọkọta onye ọbụla ,., dịka Obodo nOtụ Onye ma ihe ekwe na-ak ụ n’okwu ndọrọndọrọ Ọchịchị bụ Dennis Ekemezie siri kwuo.
Ọ sịrị ” Ọ ga-ebidogodi n’ihe a kpọrọ ‘National Reconciliation nke Bishop Desmond Tutu nke South Africa na “Oputa Panel’,iji leta ọnya nke nkewa dị na Naijiria iji kpalite ụmụ NAijiria iji hụ na Naijiria bụ nke anyị.” Okenye ahụ bụ onye ji ọgbakọ udo National “Ka e nwe ọgbakọ ụmụ Naijiria maọbụ bọlite akwụkwọ ọgbakọ ọha Naijiria nke e mere n’oge nke Goodluck Jonathan maọbụ nke Jọstis Oputa mere.” E jighị ịgba agwa ya onyeọcha na obodo bụ igwe ugbua na Naijiria.
Ego adịghị, ọrụ adịghị, agụ na ụbịa na-asụ ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ akwụ.
Ekemezie sị,”Ndị Naijiria enwezịghịzi ntukwasi obi n’ego Naijiria.
” Ka a mara ihe a ga-eme ka ego Naijiria nwee ugwu soro chịwa n’ego ndị ọzọ nọ n’ụwa.” N’Ugwu Awụsa, ndị Boko Haram na-aka ike, n’Ọwụwa Anyanwụ a na-arịa nsogbu ndị na-eti mkpu nnwereonwe, Nna Ndịda Ndịda, ndị na-ezu ohi mmanụ agbịdị na-eme nke a.
Ntọ na mpụ dị ọzọ na-arịkwa ibe ya elu.
A na-atụ anya na onyeisiala ga-elebanye nke anya iji belta ya.
dịka Ekemezie si kọwaa, “E toro m n’Ugwu Awụsa, ọ bụ ihe na-eme n’Ugwu Azụsa mere m ji gbalata n’ihi na enweghịzị nchekwa zuru Naijiria ọnụ.” Malite n’afọ 2009 rue Julaị afọ 2015, mkpamkpa ha ebutela ọnwụ mmadụ ruru 20,000, ebe mmadụ dị otu nde 1.3 bụ ndị gbapụrụla ọsọ ndụ, dika ozi ngalaba na-ahụ maka ikike dịịrị onye n’otu United Nations isir kwuo, n’oakwụkwọ ha wepụtara n’afọ 2015.
Ịkpalite mmụọ ịbụ onye Naijiria n’ụmụamala Naijiria bụ ihe a na-ele anya onyeisiala ọhụrụ ga-elebanye anya.
Ụmu Naijiria bụ ndị e ji ịgbasi mbọ ike, nkwuwaokwu nakwa mmụta mara.
Mana n’afọ ole na ole gara aga, e ji ime mpụ, ịgba mgbere ọgwụ ike na nrụụaka mara NAijiria nke mere ka ọtụtụ jiri anya e ji ele onye ekpenta ele akwụkwọ njirimara nwaala nke Naijiria(Nigerian Passport) na mba ndị ọzọ.
Ekemezie kwuru mkpa ọ dị ịkpọlitekwa mmụọ Naijiria n’ime ụmụ Naijiria.
“Onye Naijiria na-aga ebe ọbụla n’ụwa, ị hụ ya ị mara na ọ bụ onye Naijiria.” “O nwee ọkịkaobi na ọ bụ onye Naijiria, na-emekwa ka onye Naijiria.” Njirimara onye Naijiria dịka o si kwuo bụ: “Onye Naijiria na-agbasi mbọ ike, hụ ala Naijiria n’anya, hụkwa ụmụnne ya n’anya.” A na-ahụta ngalaba ikpe dịka olile anya ọha ndị mmadụ maka inweta ikpe nkwụmatọ mana nsonso a, ụfọdụ ụmụ Naijiria na-enwe obi abụọ ịga ụlọikpe maka okwu dịịrị ha na ndị ọzọ.
Na nsonso a, ụfọdụ ụmụ Naijiria gụnyere onye so Peter Obi nke Labour Party zọọ ọkwa Onyeisiala Naijiria dịka Osote ya bụ Yusuf Datti kwuru na ọ kachaghị ya obi ị ga ụlọikpe ụlọikpe n’ọsịsa oku ụfọdụ ndị na-akpọ ka ndị mpụtara ntuliaka 2023 adịghị obi mma gaa ụlọikpe.
Ekemezie sịrị, “Ọ ga-adị mkpa na e mere ka ngalaba ikpe kwụrụ ekeresu ka ọ ga-abụ ekpe ikpe ike ọ bụrụ ikpenkwụmọtọ ka ndị mmadụ were nwee ntụkwasa obi na ngalaba ikpe.”.
