Onye nnọchiteanya mba Amerịka na Naịjirịa bụ Mary Beth Leonard ekwuola na mpụtara ntụliaka onyeisiala Naịjirịa emere ejughị ọtụtụ ụmụafọ Naịjirịa afọ.
N’akwụkwọ ozi ọ depụtara ka Leonard kwuru sị, ” O doro mmadụ niile anya na ntụliaka nke e mere n’abali iri abuo na ise nke ọnwa Febụwarị ejughị ndị Naịjirịa afọ”.
Ọ gara n’ihu kwuo sị, “N’ụbọchị ndị na-abịa, ọ ga-adị mma ka ndị Naịjirịa gbochie ihe ọbụla ka ebutere ha oke maka ọdịmma Naịjirịa, kama ha hapụ ka iwu Naịjirịa kpezie ihe gbasara ntụliaka a”.
Leonard ji ohere a gwa Inec ka ha hazie nsogbu ọbụla sitere na ntụliaka ahụ tupu ebido ntụliaka nke abali iri na otu ọnwa maachị.
O kelekwara Peter Obi na Atiku Abubakar maka ịkweta iji usoro iwu Naịjirịa kpezie nsogbu ha ma Kele kwa Bola Ahmed Tinubu maka ịnabata ikike ha nwere ịga ụlọikpe.
Cheta na e mere ntụliaka onyeisiala Naịjirịa n’abali iri abuo na ise nke ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2023, nke Ngalaba Inec jiri kpọpụta Tinubu nke otu APC dịka onye meriri ya bụ ntụliaka.
Agbanyeghị nke a ndị dịka Peter Obi nke Labour Party na Atiku Abubakar nke PDP ha na ya soro zọọ ya bụ ọkwa sị na ha anabataghị ya bụ mpụtara..
Ekele njirimara ndị Igbo -Nke a bụ ekele e ji mara ndị Igbo, ha ji enwe mmekọrịta karịsịa ma ha nọkọrọ ọnụ n’ime ọgbakọ dị iche iche.
I ji maa atụ bụ Chaa! Chaa!! Chaaa!!! Igbo kwenu! -Heee! Mụọnụ – Heee! Zụọnụ – Heee! Rienu! – Heee! Kachaanụ – Heee! Ekele oge ụbọchị – Ekele oge ụbọchị bụ ndị a na-ekele n’oge dị iche iche n’ụbọchị dịka n’ụtụtụ, n’ehihie nakwa n’abalị.
Iji maa atụ, “Ị bọọla chi?”; “Ị pụtala ụra?”; “Ụtụtụ ọma;” “Daalụ” Ehihe ọma, Ụhuruchi ọma, Ị batala ọrụ nke taa? Ka chi fo, Rahụ jụụ dgz.
Ekele ọrụ – Nke a bụ ekele ndị a na-ekele mgbe mmadụ na-arụ ọrụ, e nwekwara ike iji ya a gba mmadụ ume nke gụnyere Jisie ike, Ndewoo, Daalụ dgz.
Ekele ọrụ na-adịkwa iche site mpaghara Igbo dị iche iche.
Ndị mpaghara Enugwu na-ekwu , ‘Dejee’, ndị Bende n’Abịa steeti na-ekele, “Jọkwa”, ebe ndị Ngwa na-ekele , “Maazị”.
Ekele njem – Ekele a bụ nke ndị Igbo na-atụpụrụ onye na-eme njem dịka “Ije ọma”, “E jee a lọọ”, “Ije awele”, “ka ọ dị”, “ka okporoụzọ rubere gị isi” dgz.
E nwekwara nke e ji a nabata onye si njem bata dịka “Ị lọtala?”, “Nnọọ” dgz.
Ekele nkasi obi – Ọ bụ ekele ndị Igbo ji akasi onye nwere otu ọdachi maọbụ nke ọzọ obi n’ihe dakwasịrị ya dịka “Kara obi”, “Diwe”, “Ndo”, “Gharawa” dgz.
Ekele nri – Nke gụnyere ekele a na-ekwe mgbe ndị Igbo na-eri nri maọbụ mgbe ha richara nri dịka; “Bịa rie nri”, I meela, I sie, Daalụ na nri ụtọ a dgz.
Ndị Igbo nwekwara ụzọ dị iche iche ha ji egosipụta ekele na-abụghị site n’okwu ọnụ nke gụnyere Ikwekọrịta n’aka, Ife aka, ịkụkọta akupe ( ndị ichie), ibi ọma, itu mmadụ aha na ndị ọzọ.
Ha bu ndi a: 1)OKPOGHO 2)EGO IGWE 3)EHI 4)EGO 5)NNE EGO 6)MANILA Ihe ndị ọzọ Igbo ji eme ego Ọ bụghị nani ihe ndị a anyị gụp.ụtarala ka ndị mgbe ochie ji eme ego.
Ihe ndị ọzọ Igbo kpọrọ ego gụnyere: BBC.
Mposi mmadụ na-agba ama dị iche iche.
Ọ na-agbakwa ama onye ahụ dị na onye ahụ na-adịghị.
Nke a na-acha ezigbo akwụkwọ ndụ; o gosiri na onye ahụ na-eri nrị akwụkwọndụ karịa.
Nke a adịchaghị mma dịka ndị dọkịnta siri kwuo.
Nke a na-achatụkwa akwụkwọ ndụ maka ọ karịghị.
Nke a na-acha ụrọ ụrọ gosikwa onye ahụ dị.
Nke a na-eji oji gosikwara na ọnye ahụ na-aṅụ ọgwụ dị agha bụ nke nwere ayọnụ maọbụ na onye ahụ na-agba ọbara na mgbiri afọ ya ebe dịkara obi ya.
Nsị dị ọcha gosiri na ọnụnụilu onye ahụ kpochiri akpọchị.
Onye ahụ kwesiri ịga-ụlọọgwụ ozugbo.
Nsị meemee gosiri na onye ahụ na-eri ihe dị meemee maọbụ na ọ na-agba ọbara na mgbada eriri afọ ya.
Nke a gosiri na abụba karịrị onye ahụ n’ahụ maọbụ na ahụ ya anaghị anabata nrị ọfụma..
Uru egwu ọnwa bara na ọzụzụ,ọchịchị na njikọ ndị Igbo.
1)O bu n’oge egwu ọnwa ka a na-akọwara ụmụaka na ndi ntorobia usoro ọchịchị na omenala kwesịrị ekwesị.
2) Usoro ọchịchị na-apụta ihe n’oge egwu ọnwa maka na ndi okenye ga –anọrọ nke ha,ụmụaka anọkwara nke ha.Ọnọdụ a gana egosiputa n’ ọ bụ onye bụkarịsǃ okenye gana edu ha ma ha na-egwu egwu ọnwa.
3) “Ndị okenye na-akọrọ ụmụaka akụkọ iduu na ọba.
Akụkọ ndị abụghị ihe mere eme kama ha bụ akụkọ e ji akọwa na ihe ọjọọ jọrọ njọ.” 4)Nke ọzọkwa bụ iji aha ndị mere arụ n’obodo agụ egwu iji kwaa ha emu ka ndị ọzọ wee mụta ihe.
Uru ndị ọzọ egwu ọnwa na-abara ndị gboo bụ:.
Engligbo abụghị ihe ọjọọ, e kwesịrị ịkwado ya.
Engligbo: Ihe nke a putara bu asutu igbo asutu oyibo.
Engligbo na-enyelu onye na-amu asusu igbo aka ka omuta asusu Igbo nke oma.Mana a ga-agba mbo ka o ghara I naghalu anyi  asusu Igbo kpomkwem.
ILU IGBO ỤFỌDỤ NKE NA-EGOSI AKPARAMAGWA MMADỤ.
Nwaanyị makarịa di ya n’uzọ, ihe chere di ya, ewere ya.
Mpụtara: Onye ọmachancha akpachapụghị anya, ọ danye na nsogbu edowere onye ọzọ.
Wepụ aka enwe n’ofe , tupu ọ ghọọ aka mmadụ.
Mpụtara: Kwụsị ajọ agwa gị tupu ọ lapụta gị.
Otu onye siere igwe mmadụ nri, ọha ga-ericha nri ahụ mana igwe mmadụ siere otu onye nri, ọ gaghị erichanwu ya.
Mpụtara: Otu onye agaghị emeli ihe igwe mmadụ kwesiri ime.
Otu aka rụta mmanụ, o jezuo ọha.
Mpụtara: Otu onye agwa ya jọrọnjọ nwereike ịmetọsị agwa ndị ọzọ dị mma n’akụkụ ya.
Onye kpatara nkụ ahụhụ si ngwere bịara ya ọrụ.
Mpụtara: Onye kotere nsogbu, agbaala ọsọ ntaramahuhụ ga-eso ya..

Adebowale “Debo” Adedayo nke a na-akpọ aha oji eme ihe ejije  dị ka Mr Macaroni, onye na-eme ihe nkiri, onye na-agụ akwụkwọ na onye na-akwado ụmụ amaala Nigeria, dụrụ ndị na-eto eto  na Naijiria ọdụ ka ha ghara isonye na agha agbụrụ na ikwe ka ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị jiri ha mee ihe dị ka ụzọ isi kpata nsogbu.

US na-ezube ngwugwu ngwa agha nde $ 400 maka Ukraine.
United States na-eme atụmatụ ngwungwu enyemaka ndị agha $400 nde maka Ukraine nke a na-atụ anya na ọ ga-agụnye ngwa agha gụnyere Guided Multiple Launch Rocket System (GMLRS) maka ndị na-ebupụta HIMARS, ngwa agha maka Bradley Fighting Vehicles, yana àkwà mmiri ejiri ebu ụgbọ ala.
Isi mmalite kwuru na a na-atụ anya na ngwugwu enyemaka ahụ ga-abụ isi okwu n’etiti Onye isi ala US Joe Biden na onye isi ala German Olaf Scholz mgbe ha zutere na White House.
United States enyela Ukraine ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ijeri $ 32 iji chebe onwe ya megide Russia, nke wakporo ndị agbata obi ya na-akwado Western na Feb.
Biden na Scholz nwekwara ike imetụ aka na nchegbu na China nwere ike inye Russia enyemaka na-egbu egbu, onye isi nchịkwa kwuru.
Ọchịchị Biden na-akpọsa ndị ha na ha jikọrọ aka na ọ ga-ekwe omume ịmanye mmachi ọhụrụ na China ma ọ bụrụ na Beijing na-enye nkwado ndị agha na Russia, ndị ọrụ US na isi mmalite ndị ọzọ kwuru..
NEMA, NiMet na-achọ ihe iji belata iju mmiri  idei na-abịa.
Ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ National Emergency Management Agency (NEMA), Nigeria Hydrological Services Agency, na Nigerian Meteorological Services Agency (NiMet), na-enwe mkparịta ụka ugbu a iji gboo mkpa idei mmiri na-abịa n’ihu, e buru amụma na ọ ga-adakwasi mba a n’afọ a.
Onye isi oche NEMA, Mustapha Ahmed kwuru, na nzukọ ndị ọkachamara ọrụ ụbọchị abụọ na nkwadebe ọdachi metụtara ihu igwe na atụmatụ mbelata ihu igwe na 2023 na Abuja, NiMet na NIHSA ekwenyela na mwepụta amụma nke afọ a n’oge.
Mwepụta nke mbụ ga-akpali ime ihe n’oge megide ihe egwu ihu igwe n’ọtụtụ obodo adịghị ike n’ofe mba ahụ..
Gabon, Macron sonyere  na nzuko iji chebe oke ọhịa.
Onye isi ala Gabon Ali Bongo Ondimba kpọbatara onye isi ala France Emmanuel Macron na Libreville ya na ọtụtụ ndị isi obodo Central Africa na nzụkọ maka nchekwa nke oke ọhịa di na mpaghara ahụ, na mbido njem ụbọchị anọ na mpaghara ahụ.
“Ọ dịghị ego ka mma taa karịa itinye ego n’ime ọhịa anyị,” ka Bongo na-ekwu na Nzukọ Otu ọhịa, nke France na Gabon haziri.
Okwu ya bịara tupu ọtụtụ ndị isi ala ga-aga nzukọ gbasara ọhịa na Libreville, nke ga-elekwasị anya na ichekwa oke ọhịa nke na-ebe dum..

IBA Lassa: ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị nwụrụ na-eru otu naari na anọ.
Nigeria Centre for Disease Control (NCDC) ekwuola na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị nwụrụ n’ọrịa ļba Lassa na Naịjirịa n’afọ a eruola mmadụ  otu naari na anọ.
N’ime izu asatọ ya, akụkọ gbasara ọrịa iba Lassa, NCDC kwuru na ọnụọgụgụ  ruru narị isii na iri atọ na isii enwetara.
Edekọtara ngụkọta nke mmadụ 2,978 a na-enyo enyo site na Jenụwarị ruo February 26, 2023.
Agbanyeghị, na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị nwụrụ ugbu a, ụlọ ọrụ ahụike ọha kwuru na ọnụọgụ ọnwụ nke ntiwapụ ahụ guzoro na pasent 16.4.
Ọ gbakwụnyere na nke kachasị  nan di o metụtara na mba ahụ bụ afọ 21 ruo 30, yana oke nwoke na nwanyị maka ikpe enwetara bụ 10:9.
Nigeria Centre for Disease Control (NCDC) ekwuola na ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị nwụrụ n’ọrịa Lassa na Naịjirịa n’afọ a eruola mmadụ 104.
N’ime izu asatọ ya, akụkọ gbasara ọrịa ahụ ọkụ Lassa, NCDC kwuru na ọnụọgụgụ ọnụọgụgụ ruru narị isii na iri atọ na isii enwetara.
Edekọtara ngụkọta nke mmadụ 2,978 a na-enyo enyo site na Jenụwarị ruo February 26, 2023.

Ọtụtụ mmadụ ekwenyela na ha anwụọla ka mkpọmkpọ mmanụ gbawara n’obodo Rumuekpe dị n’okpuru ọchịchị Emuoha dị na steeti Rivaasi  na mpaghara ndida Naijiria.
Ihe a mere n’isi ụtụtụ Fraịde e kwenyere na ọ bụ ndị na-azụ ahịa nchacha mmanụ a na-ezu ohi n’ụzọ iwu na-akwadoghị na-arụ n’ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Niger Delta dị na mpaghara ahụ.

Onye zọrọ ọkwa Onyeisiala n’afa otu Labour paati bụ Maazị Peter Obi etoola ụmụafọ Naịjirịa ndị pụtara n’igwe isonye na ntuliaka onyeisiala na ndị ọgbakọ omebe iwu e mere n’abalị iri abụọ na ise n’ọnwa Febụwarị na nso nso a na Naịjirịa.
Onye ndoro-ndoro Labour paati kwuru na ya ga-agbagha usoro ntuliaka onye isi ala site n’ụzọ iwu iji nwetaghachi ikike ndị mmadụ.
Ọ kpọkuru ndị Naijiria na ndị na-akwado ya ka ha bụrụ ndị na-erube isi n’iwu ma ghara ịkpalite ime ihe ike nakwa na Naijiria Ọhụrụ ga-ekwe omume.
Onye bụbu gọvanọ Anambra Steeti ndịda ọwụwa anyanwụ Naijiria kwuru na ntuliaka ahụ enwezughị ihe ekwesịrị maka ntuliaka nwere ntụkwasị obi.
Ọ kpọkulu ụmụafọ Naịjirịa ka ha pụta ịtụ vootu maka ndị Labour Paati na ntuliaka nke ọkwa gọvanọ na ndị omebe iwu steeti n’abalị iri na otu nke ọnwa Maachị..
Onye isi oche ọchịchị nchere oge nke okpuru ọchịchị IdemilI North n’ime steeti Anambra, Maazị Chuks Igboanua, etoola ndị ọrụ nchekwa iwu okporo ụzọ bụ Federal Road Safety Corps (FRSC), maka mkpebi iwulite otu n’ime ụlọ ọrụ ha na mpaghara Idemili North.
Mgbe ọ gara n’isi ụlọ ọrụ kansụl ahụ dị n’Ogidi, Maazi Igboanua toro osote onye isi na-ahụ maka ngalaba ụlọ ọrụ kansụl Anambra steeti bụ Oriakụ G.
Oriakụ Omeke n’okwu ya, chetaara onye isi kansụl ahụ na ebumnuche ọbịbịa ya bụ ịkọwara ya mkpebi FRSC mere nso nso a ịrịọ steeti ọ bụla na Naijiria ka ha wulite ngalaba ụlọ ọrụ abụọ na mpaghara ha.
N’okwu ya, “Nke a ga-adị iche na ụlọ ọrụ iri na abụọ dị ugbu a na-ahụ maka ngalaba ndị nwere nkeji 725, yana ụlọ ọrụ ọdụ ndị emere ihe dị ka afọ atọ gara aga.” Oriakụ Omeke kwuru na o tinyere ngwa ọrụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ya dị ka onye isi na-ahụ maka FRSC na mpaghara kansụl iri abụọ na otu e nwere, ọ chọpụtara na Kansụl Idemili North pụrụ iche n’etiti kansụl ndị ọzọ, site na ntụle e mere.
A ga-echeta na onye isi ọhụrụ Corps Marshal nke FRSC, Dauda Ali na mmalite ọrụ ya n’ime afọ ọhụrụ a kpebiri itinyekwu mbawanye nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ site na iwulite Area Command n’ime steeti iri atọ na isii nke obodo a..
Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari kelere onye meriri na ntuli aka onyeisiala (2023), onye ji otu All Progressives Congress, (APC) Bola Tinubu.
N’ịzaghachi na rịzọlt ahụ ekwuputara n’isi ụtụtụ Wenezde, onyeisiala Buhari n’ozi kwuru: “Ana m ekele ya bụ Bola Ahmed Tinubu maka mmeri ya.
      Ndị mmadụ họpụtara ya, ọ bụ ya kacha mma maka ọrụ ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                  Mụ na ya na ndị otu ya ga-arụkọ ọrụ iji hụ na a ga-enyefe ọchịchị n’usoro.
“Ntuli aka ahụ bụ mmemme ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya kacha ukwuu n’Africa.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Na mpaghara nke nwere ndaghachi azụ na agha agha n’ime afọ ndị na-adịbeghị anya, nhoputa ndi ochichi a na-egosi mkpa ochichi onye kwuo uche ya na-aga n’ihu na ikike iji nyefee ndị mmadụ na-ejere ya ozi.
                                                                                                                                                                 “N’ime Naijiria, nsonaazụ na-egosi na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na-eto na mba anyị.
                                                                                                                   Ọ dịbeghị mgbe maapụ ntuli aka gbanwere nke ukwuu n’otu okirikiri.
Na ntuli aka onye isi ala, steeti na mpaghara niile n’ofe mba ahụ gbanwere agba.  Ụfọdụ n’ime unu nwere ike ịhụla ọnọdụ ebe obibi m n’etiti ha.
Onye meriri emeri eburughị steeti nke ya.
                                                                              Nke ahụ na-eme n’oge ntuli aka asọmpi.
A pụghị iji vootu na ndị nyere ha egwuri egwu.
                                                     Asọmpi dị mma maka ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya.
Obi abụọ adịghị ya na e mewo mkpebi ndị mmadụ na nsonaazụ anyị na-ele taa.
                                 “Nke ahụ apụtaghị na mmega ahụ enweghị mmejọ.
Dịka ọmụmaatụ, enwere nsogbu teknụzụ na nnyefe eletrọnịkị nke nsonaazụ ya.
                                N’ezie, a ga-enwe mpaghara ndị chọrọ ọrụ iji wetakwu nghọta na ntụkwasị obi na usoro ntuli aka.
                                                                                           Otú ọ dị, ọ dịghị nke ọ bụla n’ime okwu ndị e debanyere aha na-anọchite anya ihe ịma aka nye nnwere onwe na ikpe ziri ezi nke ntuli aka.
            “Amaara m na ụfọdụ ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na ndị na-eme ntuli aka nwere ike ha agaghị ekwenye n’echiche a.
                             Ọ bụrụ na onye ọ bụla na-eme ntuli aka kwenyere na ha nwere ike igosi wayo nke ha na-ekwu na e mere ha, wetazie ihe akaebe ahụ.
                                Ọ bụrụ na ha enweghị ike, mgbe ahụ, anyị ga-ekwubi na ntuli aka ahụ bụ n’ezie uche ndị mmadụ – n’agbanyeghị otú nke ahụ nwere ike isi sie ike maka ndị meriri ịnakwere.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Ọ bụrụ na ha chere na ọ dị ha mkpa ịgba aka, biko buru ya n’ụlọ ikpe, ọ bụghị n’okporo ámá.
                                                                                                   “Otú ọ dị, ime nke ikpeazụ pụtara na ha anaghị eme ya maka ọdịmma ndị mmadụ, kama ọ bụ ịgba ọkụ, itinye ndị mmadụ n’ụzọ nsogbu na ihe niile maka ọdịmma onwe onye.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                          “Mgbe ogo nke polarization na-esochi ntuli aka ọ bụla, ugbu a bụ oge ijikọta ọnụ ma mee ihe n’ụzọ kwesịrị ekwesị.
                                                                Ana m akpọku ndị niile na-azọ ọkwa ka ha cheta nkwa udo ha binyere aka ụbọchị ole na ole tupu ntuliaka.

                                                                                                                                                                                          “Ntuli aka ahụ siri ike n’akụkụ niile.
Ya mere mmeri a na-atọ ụtọ nke ukwuu na nnukwu pati anyị bụ APC na ndị na-akwado anyị na Naịjirịa na mba ụwa niile ga-atọ ya ụtọ.

                                                                  Mallam Evuti kọwara na bọọdụ ahụ ga-ahụ na ndị na-achọ pilgrim nwetara ụkpụrụ nke ime alajị ka ha nwee uru maka ego ha tara ahụhụ a na-akwụ iji rụọ ọrụ okpukperechi.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Ọ gbakwụnyere na a ga-azụ ndị pilgrim na-atụ anya na-akwụ ụgwọ site na kansụl mpaghara Abaji, Kwali, na Gwagwalada nakwa ndị debanyere aha site na usoro nchekwa Hajj Hajj na Satọde abali iri abuo na itolu nke Eprel ebe ndị debanyere aha site na Headquarters, Bwari, Kuje, na Abuja Municipal.
Ndị kansụl mpaghara ga-eme mmemme nkuzi ha n’ụbọchị ụka abali iri ato nke ọnwa a n’ogige Hajj na-adịgide adịgide dị na Bassan Jiwa, nso ọdụ ụgbọ elu Nnamdi Azikwe International Airport, Abuja.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Ọ gbakwụnyere na mmemme nhazigharị nke a na-eme n’usoro ga-enyere ndị njem na-eche echiche ka ha nwee nghọta maka mmemme alajị yana ụkpụrụ na amụma ọhụrụ ndị ọchịchị Saudi na National Hajj Commission of Nigeria (NAHCON) webatara maka njem alajị nke afọ a.

Ndị otu ahụ gosipụtara nke a na nnọkọ akụkọ na Tuzdee na Abuja, bụ nke Hoti Nigeria malitere na nke Netherlands kwadoro.

                               “Ọ bụ agha anyị ga-akpọsa megide ụmụ ahụhụ ndị a na anyị niile ebe a ga-enye ‘ngwa agha’ iji nweta ya,” ka o kwuru.
                                                         Dr Deola LordBanjor, Director Horticulture, Federal Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development, kwuru na nsogbu dị ugbu a na Tuta Absoluta malitere site na Gọmenti Mpaghara (Galama) na Kano.
                                                                                                                                                                          “Mgbe a kọrọ akụkọ ya, anyị malitere nyocha anyị wee chọpụta na ihe dị ka hectare 300 n’ime gọọmentị ime obodo ahụ naanị ihe a metụtara,” ka o kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 O kwuru na mịnịstrị ahụ matara na ndị ọrụ ugbo nọ na Galama nwere ike tufuo ihe dị ka ijeri naira 1.3 n’ụzọ akụ na ụba n’ihi oke ọrịa a.
                     “Anyị na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ na Tomato Growers, Processors and Marketers Association of Nigeria (NAPTAN) oge ọ bụla na nyocha ihe na-eme na steeti ndị ọzọ.

Na mkparịtaụka ya na ndi ntaakuko nwere, Onwusibe sị na obi dị ya ụtọ maka mmeri ahụ, na o kelere Chineke nakwa ndị Isiala Ngwa kwadoro ya.
Mgbe a jụrụ ya ma aha Peter Obi o nyere aka na mmeri ya, o kwuru n’ezie na Obi nyere aka na mmeri Labour pati n’Abia Steeti, kama na ihe ọzọ dị mkpa bụ agwa onye na-azọ ọkwa ahụ.
N’okwu ya “N’ezie Peter nyeere anyị aka maka na ọ bụ ezigbo mmadụ kama ihe ọzọ bụkwa omume onye na-azọ ọkwa.
“Ọ bụghị ikpojuo ndị ọjọọ n’ime pati gị, ị na-atụ anya ka i merie na ntuliaka.
“Ihe mere Labour pati jiri mee ọfụma na ntuliaka bụ na ike ọchịchị ọjọọ agwụla ndị Abia steeti.” Onwusibe gara n’ihu kwuo na ihe nyere ya mmeri bụ maka ọrụ ọma ọ rụụrụ ndị Isiala Ngwa North mgbe ọ na-anọchite anya ha n’ụlọomeiwu Abia steeti.
O kwuru na ọ rụrụ ihe ndị gụnyere ụlọọgwụ, ụlọakwụkwọ, ụlọazụmaahịa, gbapeere ha mmiri, igwe ọkụ latrik dgz.
O kwere ndị Isiala Ngwa North na South nkwa na ọ ga-arụrụ ha ọrụ karịa nke ọ rụrụ mgbe ọ nọ n’ụlọomeiwu steeti.
“Enwere ihe e kwesịrị ịrụ n’Isiala Ngwa a na-arụbeghi kamgbe a na-akpọ ‘dry port’.
Aga m ahụ na a rụrụ ya n’oge ọchịchị m.”.
Akụkọ fesara etu mgbọ egbe si tụgbuo otu nwa ọhụrụ ebe ụfọdụ na-ekwukwa na mgbọ tụguru nne nwaanyị mụrụ nwa ọhụrụ ahụ oge ha kwụ n’okporoụzọ na-eche ụgbọala ha ga-abanye.
Oge onye ntaakụkọ anyị jụrụ ndị uweojii Imo Steeti gbasara akụkọ a, ha kwuru na ha amalitela nnyocha, mana ihe ha chọpụtarala bụ na aka ndị ọrụ nchekwa ‘Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps’ (NSCDC) nwereike ịdị na ya bụ ihe.
Henry Okoye bụ ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị uweojii Imo steeti gwara onye ntaakụkọ anyị sị: “Ndị akaebe hụrụ ihe merenụ gwara anyị na ọ bụ mgbọ si n’egbe nke otu onye ọrụ NSCDC gbara tụrụ nwaanyị ahụ na nwa ya.
E bugara ha ụlọ ọgwụ ngwangwa ebe a nọrọ kwuo na nwa ahụ anwụọla.” “Mana ihe a ndị akaebe gwara anyị apụtaghị na anyị akwụsịla ime nnyocha iji mata kpọmkwem ihe merenụ.
Nnyocha ka na-aga n’ihu,” Okoye kwuru.
Akụkọ kwuru na nne na nwa ahụ mgbọ tụrụ nwụrụ, mana nwaanyị nke ọzọ mgbọ tụtara, bụ onye a na-eche na ọ bụ nne nwaanyị ahụ nwụrụ anwụ, anwụghị.
Otu onye hụrụ ebe ihe a mere gwara onye ntaakụkọ anyị na ihe a merenụ tụrụ ya n’anya n’ihi na ya na nwaanyị ahụ nwụrụ anwụ kelechara ya obere oge tupu ya bụ ihe emee.
“Ya na nne ya kwụ n’akụkụ ụzọ na-eche ụgbọala, nne ya ku nwa ọhụrụ ahụ.
Mụ na ha kwụ ebe ahụ ma kparịta nkata.
Mana oteghị aka m gara ịzụta ihe n’akụkụ okporoụzọ, lezikwaa otu ndị ahụ ka ha dina ala n’ozu.” Aka anyị adịghị n’ọnwụ nwata ahụ – NSCDC Imo Steeti Ndi ntaakuko kpọrọ ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị NSCDC Imo Steeti, bụ Lowell Chimeziri, n’ekwentị n’ụtụtụ Tọzde, mana ọ sị ka a kpọghachi ya azụ n’ihi na ọ nọ n’ọgbakọ.
Mana ụlọ ntaakụkọ Vanguard dere akụkọ ebe Chimeziri kwuru na aka ha adịghị n’ọnwụ nwata ahụ aha ya bụ Chidalu.
Chimeziri kwuru sị: “Anyị matara maka ọnwụ nwata ahụ oge ndị nwe ya bwetara mkpesa n’ụlọọrụ anyị ma na-ekwu na ọ bụ mgbọ si n’egbe onye otu anyị gburu ya, dịka ndịọrụ anyị nọ n’ụgbọala Hilux gbafere na mpaghara ‘Fire Service Roundabout’.” “Ihe ndị njọ n’akụkọ a bụ na ezinụlọ Chidaalu kwenyara na ndị nọ n’ime ụgbọala Hilux ahụ bụ ndịọrụ NSCDC, mana ọ bụghị eziokwu.
Ọbụghị otu a ka anyị si arụ ọrụ.” Chimeziri kwuru na e nwere ọtụtụ ụlọọrụ nwere ụgbọala hilux ọcha, ọ bụghị naanị ndị NSCDC, “onweghị mgbe a ga-eji ụdị ihe ọjọọ dị otu a tụnyere ngalaba NSCDC”, ka o kwuru.

ỌMỤMỤ N’ALA IGBO NA KA HA SI ELETA NWANYI MỤRỤ NWA.
E nwere aha di iche iche ndi Igbo n’aba iji gosi na uru dị n’imu nwa .Aha ndi ahụ gosikwara n’Igbo kwenyere n’ọmụmụ ma kwenyesie ya ike.Aha ndi ahụ bụ: Nwamaka,Nwabachili,Nwabụndo,Urunwa,Nwabụfo.
Ha ejighikwa nwayi mụrụ nwa egwu egwu.Nke a mere ha ji ele ya omugwo nke oma,site n’ime ihe ọ bụla ha kwesiri ime,ka o were gbasie ike.Ha na-agba mbo hụ na nwanyi ahụ gara ezigbo ụlọọgwu were mụọ nwa ma kwadoro ya ihe ọmụgwọ nke oma..
Ọmụgwọ Ọmụgwọ bụ ọmenaala Igbo bidoro kemgbe gboo nke ka na-eme ruo ugbua Ile ọmụgwọ n’omenala Igbo bụ oge nne na-abịa ileta nwa ya nwaanyị na nwa ọ mụrụ (nke bụ nwa nwa ya).
Ụfọdụ oge, ọ bụrụ na nwaanyị enweghịzị nne (ọ bụrụ na nne mụrụ ya anwụọla), nwunye nna ya maọbụ nne di ya ga-abị nọrọ n’ụlọ ya lee ya ọmụgwọ.
Ihe mere o ji bụrụ nwaanyị na-ele ọmụgwọ kama nwoke, bụ maka na a na-ewe ya na ọ bụ nwaanyị kacha mara ihe gbasara ya maka na ọ gabigala ọnọdụ ahụ n’onwe ya.
Oge ọmụgwọ bụ oge nne na-akụziri nwa ya nwaanyị ihe niile ọ ma maka ilekọta nwa a mụrụ ọhụrụ.
Ụfọdụ oge, ọ na-abụ nne mụrụ nwa laa, nne di ya abịa bido lewe ya ọmụgwọ nke ya.
Nwaanyị mụrụ nwa ọhụrụ na-eji ohere ọmụgwọ zuru ike ma nne ya na-elekọta nwa ya.
Uru ọmụgwọ bara Ọmụgwọ bụ oge nne, nwa ya na nwa nwa ọhụrụ ya na-eji enwe ezigbo mmekọrịta nke bekee kpọrọ ‘bonding’.
Maka nke a ka ọtụtụ ndị nne na-eji aga ebe ọbụla nwa ha nọ mụọ nwa, ma n’ụlọ maọbụ na mba ofesi, ịga nọkọọ ihe ruru ọnwa atọ maọbụ karịa.
Ọ ga-akuzikiri nwa ya nwaanyị ihe ubeakwa nwa ya pụtara, maọbụ akwa agụrụ maọbụ akwa mmekpa ahụ.
‘Ụmụnwaanyị anyị kajara akaja’ – Charly Boy Nri ekwesịrị iri n’ọmụgwọ Nwaanyị a na-ele ọmụgwọ nwere nri ndị ọ na-eri.

Ndị ọ bịara ileta ga-azụtara ya ihe onyinye dị icheiche dịka ego, akwa ọmụma, akpụkpọụkwụ, akpa, ihe nri dị icheiche, wee dịrị gawazie.

N’eziokwu omenala bụ ejirimara ndi, nke sitere n’aka nna nna were fere n’aka ụmụ ụmụ ma dirikwa n’aga.Nke a pụtara na omenala di ọkpụtọrọkpụ.

Onyeisiala Buhari na ndị Naijiria na-aṅụrị ọṅụ na Ista.
Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari esorola ndị Naijiria ọkachasị ndị otu Ndị Kraịst na-eme mmemme oge Ista, bụ nke na-echeta ọnwụ na mbilite n’ọnwụ Jizọs Kraịst.
Onye isi ala na-eji ohere ahụ kpọkuo ndị Naijiria niile ka ha nwee olile anya ụbọchị ka mma n’ihu, na-agbakwụnye na Nigeria ga-emeri ihe ịma aka ndị chere ya ihu, dịka Kraịst meriri ọnwụ.
Na ozi, onye ndu Naijiria kwuru: “M na-esonyere Ndị Kraịst nọ na Nigeria na gburugburu ụwa ime ememe Ista, bụ́ nke na-echeta ọnwụ na mbilite n’ọnwụ nke Jisọs Kraịst, nke na-egosi mmeri o meriri ọnwụ.
“N’ime obi Ista, bụ mmeri nke ìhè n’elu ọchịchịrị.

OTU  Dļ ICHE ICHE NA-ESONYE N’ỌCHļCHị N’ALA IGBO.
Ha bụ ndі a: Ndi nze Otu ọgbọ Ụmụọkpụ Otu  inyomdi Otu nzuzo.
Ọ bụ mmụọ ịkwụwa aka ọtọ, ike na ọganihu.
Mụọ a bụ mụọ nwoke na ike dimkpa.
Ikenga bụ atụrụatụ dịka ọ dị n’okpukerechi ndị ọzọ dị iche iche dị ụwa gbaa gburugburu site na okpukperechi ụka, Islam, Hinduism, Judaism na ndị ọzọ.
Ndị a niile nwechere atụrụatụ ha na-elejere anya mgbe ha na-efe chukwu.
N’omenala Igbo, a na-akpọ chi onye Ikenga.
Ikenga bụ aka nri mmadụ, nke pụtara obi ọcha, ikwuwa aka ọtọ na eziokwu.
Ihe eji anọchite anya Ikenga bụ atụrụatụ nwoke bu ihe n’isi ma jide ọdụ na oji n’aka abụọ.
Mgbe ụfọdụ ọ na-ebu mma abụọ nwere nko n’isi.
Mgbe ọzọ o burukwa atụrụatụ dịka isi ụmụanụ.
Ọ dị mkpa ịmata na ọbụghị osisi niile ka e ji atụ Ikenga.
  Ikenga ole ka e nwere? Nchọcha anyị nwere na-egosi na-enwere ụdịrị Ikenga dị iche iche.
Ikenga dike Ikenga a bụ ụdị nke ana enye onye kpara ike n’obodo.
Nke a na-abụkarị aturuatu mmadụ tukwu ọdụ nwere mpi na dịkwa egwu n’anya.
Ọ na ejikwa ọdụ na obejiri n’aka abụọ.
O na-ejikarị mma ahụ n’aka nri bụ nke akpọrọ aka Ikenga.
Ọ bụ onye tozuru okorobịa na-enwe ikenga.
Ikenga ọha Ikenga nke a na-adị nnukwu nwekwa atụrụatụ mmadụ na ụmụanụ n’ahụ ya.
Ọ na-ejikarị ọdụ n’aka ekpe, jide oji maọbụ mkpọrọ n’aka nri ya.
Ọ na-ebu nnukwu ibu maka a na-edowe ya na obodo maọbụ ama ndị nwe ya.
Otu onye anaghị enwe ya kama ọ bụ nke ọha.
Ikenga echichi Nke a bụ Ikenga a na-enye ndị chiri echichi n’ala Igbo.
Ikenga a gosiri ike na ọkwa pụrụiche.
Mgbe ụfọdụ a na-ejikwa igwe akpụ ụdị Ikenga a.
Ọ na-ejikarị ọdụ n’aka ekpe nke gosiri Ike na ọchịchị Ihe ana emere Ikenga A na-erekwa Ikenga tupu amalite itinye ya n’ọrụ.
Onye okenye n’ụmụnna chizuru echizu ka ọ bụ ọrụ ya ịmekwa Ikenga tupu e nye ya onye ọ bụ nke ya.
A na-anọ n’ihu ọha maọbụ ụmụ nna mekwa ya bụ Ikenga.
A na-eji ji, ọkụkọ, mmanya, ọjị na oseọjị achụrụ Ikenga aja izu ahụ.
Enwekwara ike iri oriri ụbọchị ahụ dika aka ruru onwe nwe ya bụ Ikenga.
Ya kpatara Igbo ji sị na Ikenga nwamgbenye na-atagbu onwe ya na ọjị.
Onye nye Ikenga ezigbo ihe, ogbutere ya nnukwu anụ.
Igbo sịkwa na Ikenga adighi ire awaa ya nkụ.
Na mgbe gboo ahụ, nwaanyị agaghị alụ di ma o rughi mgbede.
Ọtụtụ obodo na-emere ya ụmụagbọghọ ruru afọ iri abụọ maọbụ karịa.
A na-akpọ ya aha dị iche iche n’obodo dị iche iche dịka: iru mgbede, ịda mgbede maọbụ ịba mkpuke.
iru mgbede bụ emume nne na nna na-emere ụmụ ha ndị nwaanyị tozurula ịlụ di.” “Ọ bụ oge e ji akpọba ha n’ụlọ, leta ha anya nke ọma”.
Mgbe ahụ, ha agaghị arụ ọrụ ọbụla.
O nweghi ihe mgbakasị ahụ aga ekwe ka ọ metụta ha.
ọ bụ oge nwaanyị hụrụ nsọ ya izizi bụ mgbe o ji aga iru mgbede.

Gọvanọ Cross River steeti dị na ndịda Naijiria bụ Sinetọ Bassey Otu ewepụtala kọmitii na-enyocha mgbanwe mgbanwe mmadụ atọ.
Ekwuputara nhọpụta nke Gọvanọ na nkwupụta nke onye odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide, General Administrator bịanyere aka na Office of Secretary nke Gọọmenti Cross River State, Dr Innocent Eteng.
Nkwupụta a gosiri na onye bụbu odeakwụkwọ Gọọmenti steeti na onye bụbu Odeakwụkwọ Executive nke National Planning Commission nke Naijiria bụ Ntufam Fidelis Ugbo ga-abụ onyeisi oche nke kọmitii ahụ, ebe Prọfesọ Eyo Etim Nyong, bụ prọfesọ nke Petroleum Geology na kọmishọna ọsụ ụzọ bụ onye nọchitere anya Cross.
River State n’ime ụlọ mbụ nke Niger Delta Development Commission ga-eje ozi dịka onye otu.
Dịka nkwupụta a siri kwuo, onye odeakwụkwọ kọmitii a bụbu osote onye isi oche nke Cross River State University of Technology, CRUTECH na onye otu Philosophy of Education Society of Great Britain na nke Australia, Prọfesọ Anthony Owan-Enoh.
Enyere kọmitii a ikike inyocha na imekọrịta akụkọ mgbanwe ma nye onye gọvanọ otu ihe ahụ maka nyocha na ihe ndị ọzọ dị mkpa.
A ga-echeta na Gọvanọ n’oge okwu mmeghe ya kwere nkwa inye ndị obodo Cross River steeti ọchịchị kacha mma, na-ekwu na ọ dịghị efunahụ anyị nnukwu ọrụ a ga-arụrịrị na ibu nke atụmanya dị elu.
Ya mere, anyị ga-ejikwa oge dị irè iji degharịa ọnọdụ nke ọchịchọ ụlọ ọrụ anyị n’ikwekọ na nrọ anyị na-achịkọta ọnụ na ọdịnihu dị nsọ.
“Anyị dị njikere ịkụ n’ala na-agba ọsọ.
Ugbua, anyị emebela ma nyochaa maapụ ụzọ anyị dabara adaba iji duzie omume anyị ka anyị na-amalite.
Anyị na-agba mbọ ịgbanwe akụ na ụba steeti Cross River,” ka Gọvanọ ahụ gbakwụnyere..
Ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu Rivers steeti akwadola nhọpụta ndị kọmishọna anọ nke Gọvanọ Siminialayi Fubara zigara ha aha ha maka nyocha.
Mmadụ anọ ahụ bụ ndị otu onye isi ọchịchị steeti bụ Gọvanọ Nyesom Wike gara aga.
Ha bụ Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ, Prof.
Chinedum Mmon; Attorney-General na Commissioner maka ikpe ziri ezi, Prof.
Zacheaus Adango; Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ego bụ Maazị Isaac Kamalu; na Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ọrụ, Mazi.
Mgbakọ n’onwe ya bụ maka mgbasa n’abali ato nke onwa June.
Onye isi ụlọ ahụ, Mr Martins Amaehwule (PDP-Obio/Akpor 1), kwuru na nkwado ahụ dị mkpa iji mee ka ndị quartet nwee ike ịga n’ihu n’ọrụ ọma ha na-arụ na ọrụ nke steeti Rivers.
Amaehwule kwuru na ndị otu ọgbakọ 9th nwere echiche na ndị niile so na Council Executive State nke bụbu Gọvanọ Wike ga-edobe n’ọchịchị ọhụrụ.
Ọ kọwara na nke a bụ maka ikike ha, ịrụsi ọrụ ike na mmasị ha nwere ijere Rivers steeti ozi, ma kwukwa na ha niile mere nke ọma na ọchịchị Wike.
N’ịzaghachi, Kọmishọna Education họpụtara, Maazị Mmon, kwuru na ebumnobi ya maka ministri bụ ka ọ hazigharịa data na ozi ya.
“Nke a pụtara na ozi gbasara ụlọ akwụkwọ ọ bụla dị na steeti ahụ, ọnọdụ, ọnụ ọgụgụ ụmụ akwụkwọ ma ọ bụ ụmụ akwụkwọ na klaasị na afọ ha, na ndị ọzọ, ga-adị ngwa ngwa.
O kwuru, sị: “Nke a bụ ihe kacha m mkpa maka ozi ahụ, ọ bụrụkwa na m ga-emeli nke ahụ, m ga-emezu..

Edebere ụbọchị maka ịnakọta asambodo na ihe nrite nrite maka ndị nnata ịnara ha na Tọzdee,abali mbu nke onwa Juun.

Aka na-achị Kaduna steeti bụ Malam Uba Sani akwadola nhọpụta ndị isi ọchịchị a na-atụ anya na ha ga-edobe isi n’ọkwa na ọchịchị steeti ahụ.
Ekwuputara nhọpụta a na nkwupụta nke onye odeakwụkwọ mgbasa ozi nke Gọvanọ, CPS, Mohamed Lawal bịanyere aka na ya ma mee ka ndị nta akụkọ na Kaduna nweta ya.
Dị ka nkwupụta ahụ si kwuo, onye odeakwụkwọ gọọmentị steeti ahụ gara aga, Malam Balarabe Abbas ka ejidere n’ihi nnukwu ahụmahụ ya na ọchịchị iji nyere aka na nkwụsị nke nchịkwa ahụ.
Gọvanọ ahụ jigidekwara ọrụ nke ndị isi ndị ọzọ nọ n’ọchịchị Nasiru El-Rufai iji nye njikọ n’etiti gọọmentị abụọ ahụ.
Sani kwadokwara nhọpụta onye isi ọrụ ọhụrụ n’ime onye Sani Liman, bụ onye ọrụ ọgụgụ isi nwere ahụmahụ nke ukwuu na onye nchịkwa mara mma.
Ọ bụ onyeisi ndị ọrụ mbata na ọpụpụ, Kano State Command.
“A họpụtara Habiba Anana Shekarau ka ọ bụrụ onye isi ọrụ ọhụrụ.
Habiba, onye bụ odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide nke ugbu a, Ministry for Local Government Affairs nwere ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ na ọrụ obodo Kaduna.
Ọ bụ odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide, ọrụ izugbe, Ọfịs nke Secretary nke Gọọmenti steeti, odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide, Ụlọ Ọrụ Na-ahụ Maka Ọrụ yana odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide, Ministry of Housing and Urban Development.” Sani kwuru na nhọpụta ndị a bụ n’ihi na steeti Kaduna chọrọ aka tozuru oke na ndị maara ihe iji nyere ọchịchị ọhụrụ aka imezu ebumnuche ya.
“Gọvanọ ahụ gwara ndị a họpụtara ka ha hụ nhọpụta ha dị ka oku na-arụ ọrụ.
Ndị ezigbo mmadụ steeti Kaduna na-atụ anya nsonaazụ.
Ya mere, ha ga-akụrịrị ala.” Ka ọ na-ekele ha maka nhọpụta ha, Sani chọrọ nduzi nke Allah n’ọrụ ha.

Onyeisi otu a bụ Joe Ajaero kwuru nke a na mkparịtaụka ya ndị mgbasaozi Channels TV nwere.
“Ọ dịka gọomenti o gosila mmasị n’ịkparịtaụka.
Ha kpọtụụrụ anyị n’abalị anyị enwee nkwekọrịta izuta n’elekere abụọ nke ehihie taa (Wenezde).
“A ga-eleba anya n’ọtụtụ ihe, ị gaghị ewepu ‘subsidy’ ebe ị naghị arụpụta mmanụ, e nweghi ihe i hiwere iji chekwaa ọnụahịa ihe nwereike ịda n’ahịa, onye na-erebu ihe N10 ga-achọ irewezi ya N100.
O kwuru na ebumnobi Onyeisiala Tinubu dị mma kama a ga-achọ usoro ọzọ a ga-eji mee ya.
Onyeisiala Buhari kwesiri ịjụ ajụjụ ọfụma ma chọpụta etu ọ ga-esi emetụta ndị mmadụ tupu o wepu ya bụ ‘subsidy’.
Ajaero kwuru na ihe gọọmentị kwesịrị ime gụnyere; ịrụzi ọdọ ebe a na-esi mmanụ agbidi na Naịjirịa, ịrọpụta ọtụtụ ụzọ ọzọ ndị mmadụ ga-esi na-eme njem..

Igwe ụgbọ ala (convoy) Onyeisiala batara n’ime Presidential Villa n’ehihie Tuzdee ebe Osote onyeisiala Kashim Shettima nabatara ya, onye n’onwe ya maliteghachiri ọrụ n’isi ụtụtụ.

  Onye isi njikwa, Corporate Communications nke NMDPRA, Kimchi Apollo, na nkwupụta e wepụtara na Tuesday, kwuru na “Anyị na NNPC Limited na ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ọrụ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji kwe nkwa mgbanwe dị mma, ma hụ na emegideghi ndị na-azụrụ mmanụ ụgbọ ala na ụdị ọ bụla.”   Mmanụ Ụgbọala Dị Oge Ọbụla   Apollo na-emesi ọha na eze obi ike na enwere nnukwu ụgbọ ala PMS (petrol) iji gboo mkpa ebe nzukọ ahụ emeela ihe ndị dị mkpa iji hụ na ọwa nkesa na-akwụsịghị ma na-enweta mmanụ ọkụ n’ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri niile dị na mba ahụ.
  O kwuru “anyị na-akpọku ndị Naijiria ka ha nọrọ jụụ ma guzogide ọchịchọ ịkwakọba ihe n’ihi na ọ na-etinye nnukwu ihe ize ndụ nchekwa.
N’otu aka ahụ, a na-adụ ndị na-arụ ọrụ ọdụ ka ha zere ịkpakọba mmanụ ụgbọala na ịkpata ihe isi ike”, ọ dụrụ ọdụ.
  NMDPRA na-emesi ndị Naijiria niile obi ike na iwepụ ego enyemaka na PMS bụ nzọụkwụ iji wulite ọdịnihu ga-adịgide adịgide na ọganihu maka mba anyị.

Nke a dị n’akwụkwọ ozi ụlọ ọrụ Britain High Commission na Naịjirịa wepụtara.
N’ozi o degaara Onyeisiala Tinubu, His Majesty King Charles III kwughachiri nkwa ya n’ịzụlite njikọ siri ike na Naijiria.
Eze ahụ wee sị; “Ọ ga-amasị m ikele gị ekele dị ukwuu maka ịṅụ iyi ọrụ gị dị ka onye isi oche nke Repọblik nke Naijiria na iziga gị ihe ọma ọ bụla nwere ike ime ka ị na-ewere ọtụtụ ọrụ dị n’ọfịs gị.
“Dịka ndị mmekọ Commonwealth nwere njikọ miri emi, a na m atụ anya iwulite ọbụbụ enyi siri ike n’etiti obodo anyị n’oge ọchịchị gị.” Helen Grant OBE, Onye Nnọchiteanya Pụrụ Iche nke Prime Minister na ahia na Naijiria na mmụta ụmụ agbọghọ kwuru; “Ihe kacha m mkpa bụ ime ka azụmahịa anyị na itinye ego n’ahịa anyị sikwuo ike, iji nweta uru nke mba abụọ anyị dị ukwuu, ana m atụ anya ịrụkọ ọrụ n’akụkụ ọchịchị ọhụrụ ahụ iji kwalite ebumnuche ahụ.
“N’ime nke a, ala nna m, enwere m mmetụta ịhụnanya maka ndị ya, ọrụ m na-ahụ na nwa agbọghọ ọ bụla nwetara afọ iri na abụọ nke agụm akwụkwọ dị mma ga-anọgidekwa n’isi nke atụmatụ Naijiria m.” N’akụkụ nke ya, onye nnọchiteanya Britain na Naịjirịa bụ Richard Montgomery kwuru; “UK na-atụ anya ịrụ ọrụ na nchịkwa ọhụrụ ka anyị na-akwado Naijiria na-enwe ọganihu na nke na-agbanwe agbanwe, na-ewusi mmekọrịta anyị na azụmahịa, mmepe na nchekwa.” Onye ndu ndị nnọchianya UK n’oge ịṅụ iyi ọrụ ahụ n’Abuja bụ onye nnọchianya azụmaahịa Prime Minister na Naijiria na onye nnọchianya pụrụiche na agụmakwụkwọ ụmụ nwanyị, Helen Grant OBE MP na onyeisiala Britain na Naijiria , Dọkinta Richard Montgomery CMG..
Onye isi ala Bola Ahmed Tinubu GCFR ekwupụtala mwute maka ọnwụ onye guzobere Daar Communications, ndị nwe African Independence Television (AIT) na Raypower, Chief Raymond Dokpesi.
Dokpesi nwụrụ ụbọchị Mọnde n’ụlọọgwụ dị n’Abuja.
Na nkwupụta sitere n’ụlọ ọrụ ya na mgbede Mọnde, Onyeisiala kọwara ọnwụ nke onye mgbasa ozi dịka nnukwu mfu nye ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Naijiria na obodo ahụ.
“Ọnwụ nke High Chief Raymond Dokpesi bụ ihe mgbakasị ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ ọsụ ụzọ na mgbasa ozi nke mmadụ nwe.
Ntinye ego ya na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ bụ ihe mkpali mmụọ nye ọtụtụ ndị na-esote ya.
“Akụkọ nke mmalite nke ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Naijiria agaghị ezu ezu ma enweghị aha a ma ama dịka Dokpesi na mpaghara mgbasa ozi.
O kwuru, “E ji m ezi obi mwute na-akasi ndị njikwa na ndị ọrụ DAAR Communications na ezinụlọ nke onye ọchụnta ego, onye mgbasa ozi nwụrụ anwụ obi maka nnukwu mfu a,” o kwuru.
Nwa ya nwoke Raymond Dokpesi jnr kwupụtara ọnwụ ya.
Ọ kwuru na onye isi oche DAAR Communications nwụrụ na Mọnde, Mee 29 2023.
“Ọ bụ n’obi dị ukwuu na obi dị arọ ka anyị ji kwusaa ọnwụ nke High Chief Raymond Aleogho Anthony Dokpesi (Ezomo nke Weppa-Wanno Kingdom) bụ onye nwụrụ na abalị iri abụọ na itoolu ọnwa Mee, 2023.
High Chief Dokpesi bụ ezigbo di, nna, nna nna.
Ndị niile maara ya ga-eru ụjụ ya nke ukwuu.
“High Chief Dokpesi bụkwa onye ọchụnta ego a na-akwanyere ùgwù na onye ọchụnta ego, onye ọsụ ụzọ n’ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi, na onye ọrụ ebere nyefere ndụ ya n’ijere obodo ya ozi.” A mụrụ Dokpesi nwụrụ anwụ na abalị iri abụọ na ise ọnwa Ọktoba 1951 na Ibadan, Oyo Steeti, nne na nna ya sitere na Agenebode, Edo Steeti.
O jiri ụlọ ọrụ ya DAAR Communications banye ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Naijiria wee guzobe netwọk TV Naijiria bụ Africa Independent Television (AIT).
Dokpesi nwụrụ anwụ bụ onye isi oche kọmitii na-ahazi ọgbakọ mba nke otu People’s Democratic Party (PDP) na afọ 2015..
Ụlọ ọrụ Nigeria National Petroleum Company NNPC Limited, na-ekwu na ọ nabatalụ mkpebi nke gọọmenti etiti iwepụ ego enyemaka na Premium Motor Spirit, PMS nke pụtara mmanụ ụgbọ ala.

O kwuru  na now a ga-emegide ọganihu a chọrọ na akụ na ụba..

Ụlọikpe Kasị Elu nke Naijiria akagbuola mkpegharị nke Peoples Democratic Party (PDP), na-achọ ka a kagbuo onye isi ala Ahmed Tinubu na osote ya bụ Kashim Shettima na ntuli aka onyeisiala na February 25.
  Ụlọikpe ahụ kwadoro mkpebi ụlọikpe mkpegharị ikpe na ikpe mmadụ atọ n’aka Justice James Abundaga nọ n’isi ya, bụ ndị ji otu olu kwuo na PDP ekwesighi ikwu otu a.
  N’ịkpe ikpe ya n’ụbọchị Fraịde, ụlọikpe ukwu ahụ kwuru na PDP na-ekpe ekpere ka achụpụ Tinubu na Shettima n’ihi nhọpụta nke Shettima mere ugboro abụọ.
  Jọstis Adamu Jauro bụ onye nyere mkpebi ikpe ahụ dara  PDP nde naira abụọ,  maka ikwu otu a..
Ụlọ ikpe na-ahụ maka ntuliaka maka ntuliaka nke gọvanọ steeti Legọs akagbuola akwụkwọ mkpesa ndị All People’s Party, APP na Allied Peoples Movement, APM gbara maka ịma aka na nhọpụta Gọvanọ Babajide Sanwo-Olu dịka onye meriri na ntuliaka gọvanọ na abalị iri na asatọ ọnwa Maachị 2023.
Onye isi oche nke ụlọ ikpe mmadụ atọ, Justice Arum Ashom, wepụrụ akwụkwọ mkpesa ahụ na Wednesde ka ndị otu ahụ wepụrụ ya.
Ndị ọzọ so na ụlọ ikpe ahụ bụ Justice Mikail Abdullahi na Justice Igho Braimoh.
Ndị okaiwu nnọchiteanya maka pati abụọ a, Henry Bello na Francis Ese, gwara “ụlọikpe na ndị ahịa ha ekpebiela ịwepụ akwụkwọ mkpesa.” Ndị ọzọ zara ajụjụ n’arịrịọ abụọ a bụ Independent National Electoral Commission, INEC na All Progressive Congress, APC.
Ndị otu a rụrụ ụka n’arịrịọ ha dị iche iche na Gọvanọ Sanwo-Olu na osote ya, Obafemi Hamzat, erughị eru ịzọ ntuliaka nakwa na INEC emezughị n’usoro iwu ntuli aka na iwu 1999.
Mgbe a kpọrọ ikpe ahụ, onye ọkaiwu APM, Bello, gwara ụlọ ikpe ahụ na “mkpegharị maka iwepụ ya bụ n’ihi ihe anọ ma kwado ya site na nkwenye abụọ nke Yusuf Mamman Dantalle, Onye isi oche nke otu pati ahụ ṅụrụ iyi.” Ọ sịrị, “Onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi anyị enwekwaghị mmasị na akwụkwọ mkpesa ahụ wee gaa n’ihu kelee onye nke abụọ zara ajụjụ.
“Anyị na-arịọ ndị ụlọ ikpe ka ha bibie ngwa a.” Ọzọkwa, onye ndụmọdụ maka APP, gwara ụlọ ikpe ahụ na ya nwere ntụzịaka onyeisioche pati ahụ bụ Okey Nwosu ka ọ wepụrụ akwụkwọ mkpesa a.
Onye ọka iwu INEC, John Baiyeshe (SAN), emegideghị mkpesa ahụ mana ọ rịọrọ ụlọikpe ka ha chụpụ ya, ka ha ghara ibibi ya, n’ihi na pati ahụ abanyela n’okwu.
Ọka iwu maka Sanwo-Olu na Hamzat, Ayuba Kawu; na nke APC, Abiodun Owonikoko (SAN), emegideghịkwa atụmatụ ịwepụ.
N’ikpe ya, Ọkaikpe Ashom kwuru na “mmetụta nke ihe ndị gbara akwụkwọ ahụ kwuru bụ na a wepụrụ akwụkwọ mkpesa ahụ.
Ndị zara ajụjụ ahụ etinyela akwụkwọ nkwuputa nke enweghị mgbagha ma ha ajụghị.
“N’ịtụle ọkwa nke arịrịọ ahụ na na emechiela arịrịọ, anyị na-enye iwu ka ewepụ arịrịọ ndị ahụ.”.

Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari kwuru na gọọmentị Naịjirịa ga-aga n’ihu na-agba ndị agha ume ka ha wee kwalite ọrụ ha.O kwere nkwa a n’Abuja n’abalị Tuzdee na nri abalị Regimental nke ndị agha haziri iji kwanyere ya ugwu ka oge ọchịchị ya na-abịa na njedebe n’abalị iri abụọ na itoolu nke ọnwa Mee.Ndị agha Naịjirịa haziri mmemme nri abalị ahụ iji kelee ọchịagha ha maka nnukwu nkwado ha nwetara n’aka ya n’ime afọ asatọ gara aga.Mgbe ọ na-agwa ndị ọrụ na ndị nwoke mere emume ahụ okwu, Onyeisiala Buhari kwekwara nkwa inye ha nkwado ka ha na-aga n’ihu na-arụ ọrụ ha n’ichebe ókèala obodo ahụ.”Nye m, nri abalị a na-ahazi iji mee emume a pụrụ iche n’ihi na ọ na-enye m ohere ọzọ ịtụgharị uche nke ọma n’oge gara aga, ugbu a na ọdịnihu nke ndị agha anyị.“N’ihi ya, ndị agha nke Nigeria na ndị ọrụ nchekwa ndị ọzọ ga-anọgide na-eguzosi ike mgbe niile ma na-eche ihe ịma aka nchebe nke mba ahụ ihu.
N’ụzọ dị otu a, ọchịchị anyị, n’agbanyeghị na ọ na-ada n’oge na-adịghị anya, agaghị ahapụ ya n’inye ndị agha nkwado dị ha mkpa iji mee ka ha nwee ike ịrụ ọrụ ha nke ọma n’usoro iwu kwadoro,” ka o kwere nkwa.O kelere ha maka inye ọnọdụ echedoro anya maka mmemme nhoputa ndi ochichi nke 2023.“Biko kwe ka m jiri ohere a gosi ezi ekele m nye ndị isi na ndị agha nke ndị agha Naịjirịa maka iguzosi ike n’ihe, ịrụsi ọrụ ike, nraranye na ọrụ achọghị ọdịmma onwe ha nye mba anyị hụrụ n’anya.”Amaara m nke ọma nkwa na ịchụ àjà gị niile n’ịlụso ọtụtụ puku ihe ịma aka nchekwa na ntinye aka gị na ntuli aka na-aga nke ọma na mba anyị.“Otú ọ dị, ruo mgbe a ga-ewepụ okwu nke enweghị nchebe, ọtụtụ ihe ka na-achọsi ike n’aka ndị agha nke Nigeria,” Onyeisi ahụ kwukwara.Onye ndu Naijiria, bụ onye meghere ụlọ ọrụ Armed Forces Officers Mess ọhụrụ, bụ nke jere ozi dị ka ebe a na-eme ememe Tuesday, kpere ekpere maka ezumike nke mkpụrụ obi nke ndị isi na ndị agha nke ndị agha, ndị tụfuru ndụ ha n’ijere mba ahụ ozi.Ndị bịara na mmemme ahụ bụ odeakwụkwọ Gọọmenti nke Federation, Boss Mustapha, Onye isi ndị ọrụ na President, Prof.

Onye bụbu praịm minista mba Briten, Sir Tony Blair, ekwupụtala na ọ dị njikere ịkwado ọchịchị Asiwaju Bola Ahmed Tinubu na-abata n’ọkwa ọchịchị.Na nkwupụta mgbasa ozi nke ụlọ ọrụ nke Onye isi oche a họpụtara ahọpụta, kwuru na Blair nyere nkwa ahụ na Tuesday mgbe ọ gara leta onyeisi oche a họpụtara na Defence House, Abuja.O kwuru na Tony Blair Institute for Global Change, nke o hiwere, ga-abụ onye mmekọ dị njikere nke ọchịchị Tinubu karịsịa n’ịkwado ihe mgbaru ọsọ na nnyefe ya.O kwuru na kemgbe ọ hapụrụ ọrụ dịka praịm minista UK, ya na gọọmentị mba ụwa niile na-arụkọ ọrụ iji nyere ha aka ịrụzu ọrụ e nyere ha.Dị ka ya si kwuo, Blair Institute nwere ọrụ na Nigeria ma chee na ọ dị ya mkpa izute onye isi ala Nigeria na-abata iji ghọta ihe ndị nlekọta ahụ na-ebute ụzọ.”Anyị ga-achọ inye aka n’ụzọ ọ bụla na nchịkwa gị.
Naanị ihe anyị kwesịrị ịma ihe ndị isi na-ebute ụzọ ma nyere aka n’otu esi eme ya, “Blair gwara Tinubu onye ahọpụtara.O toro mgbasa ozi Tinubu na-elekwasị anya n’akụkụ ndị bụ isi nke nchekwa, akụ na ụba, ọrụ ugbo na ike, na-akọwa njikọ dị n’etiti ebe dị mkpa maka mmepe obodo ọ bụla.O kwuputara nchekwube ya na site n’ọchịchọ nke ndị ọchụnta ego na-egosi itinye ego na Naijiria, ọchịchị Tinubu nwere ike nweta nkwado ọ chọrọ iji kwalite mmepe akụ na ụba obodo.Otú ọ dị, Blair kwetara ọrụ siri ike n’ihu Tinubu na ndị isi ndị ọzọ, n’oge ọgba aghara zuru ụwa ọnụ.”Ịnọ n’ọchịchị taa n’ebe ọ bụla n’ụwa siri ike.
Ị nwere ihe na-eme gburugburu ụwa na-emetụta gị na nke ị na-enweghị ike ime ihe ọ bụla maka ya, “o kwuru.Onye isi ala a họpụtara ahọpụta Tinubu, na nzaghachi ya, kwupụtara ekele Blair maka nleta ahụ na maka onyinye ya ka ya na ndị ọchịchị ya rụkọọ ọrụ.O kwuru banyere ọhụụ dị n’etiti ya na Tony Blair Institute na mpaghara ha kacha mkpa, ma kwusiri ike na ọ dị mkpa ịlụso nsogbu ego ọgụ na mkpa ọ dị maka itinye ego na ọha mmadụ iji lụso ịda ogbenye ọgụ.“Ee, a na-ama anyị aka.
Ma olee ebe obi ike anyị dị? Anyị nwere ike iwepụ amaghị ihe, ọrịa na ịda ogbenye na Africa.
Anyị ga-agbasi mbọ ike ịhụ na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na-arụ ọrụ maka ndị anyị,” Tinubu kwuru.”Anyị ga-etinyekwu ego, tinye nkà na ụzụ ma mee ka ndị na-eyi ọha egwu nọrọ n’ọnụ mmiri n’ihi na enweghị nchebe dị irè, ọ dịghị nkwa ndị investors ga-abịa,” ka ọ gbakwụnyere.Onye isi ala a họpụtara kwere nkwa na ọ ga-enye ebe dị mma nke ga-agba ndị na-etinye ego ume ma meghee ohere maka ndị mmadụ.Tinibu sonyeere ya na nzụkọ ahụ site n’aka onyeisi ụlọ omebe iwu bụ Hon.

Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari na-eduzi nzukọ ikpeazụ nke Federal Executive Council maka ọchịchị dị ugbu a, na-eme na Council Chambers nke Presidential Villa, Abuja.
Osote onye isi ala, Ọkammụta Yemi Osinbajo, onye isi ndị ọrụ na President, Prọfesọ Ibrahim Gambari na onye isi ndị ọrụ obodo nke Federation, Dr Folashade Yemi-Esan so na ndị bịara nzukọ a.

Obere oge tupu nzukọ a amalite, Onye isi ala ṅụrụ iyi ndị Kọmishọna gọọmenti etiti asaa nke Revenue, Mobilisation, Allocation and Fiscal Commission (RMAFC).
Ndị a ṅụrụ iyi gụnyere Senator Ayogu Eze (Enugu State), Peter Opara (Imo State), Hawa Aliyu (Jigawa State) na Rakiya Haruna (Kebbi State).
Ndị ọzọ bụ Ismaila Agaka (Kwara State), Kolawole Abimbola (Oyo State) na Ayuba Ngako (Federal Capital Territory).
Osote onye isi ala Yemi Osinbajo nyekwara onye isi ala akụkọ banyere ngalaba mgbanwe ngalaba ahụike.
E debere kọmitii a, onye isi oche Osinbajo, ka o wepụta ụzọ iji nweta mkpuchi mkpuchi ahụike zuru ụwa ọnụ na mba ahụ.
N’ime ndụmọdụ ya gụnyere ịkwalite ego ngalaba ahụike karịa pasent 10.
Akwụkwọ ahụ nwere atụmatụ mmepe ogologo oge maka mba ahụ, nke a na-atụ anya na ọ ga-emejuputa ya site na nchịkwa ndị na-esote..
Ụlọakụ etiti Naịjirịa bụ Central Bank anapụla ụfọdụ ụlọakụ dị na Naịjirịa ikike ịrụ ọrụ dịka ebe nchekwa ego ndị mmadụ.
Nke a dị n’akwụkwọ ozi CBN wepụtara n’ọbaozi websaịt ha n’ụbọchị Tuzde abali iri abuo na ato nke onwa Mee, 2023 bụ onyeisi ha bụ Godwin Emefiela tinyere aka na ya.
Ndị nke a metụtara bụ ụlọakụ ‘microfinace bank’ otu narị na iri asaa na itoolu (179) na ụlọakụ mbinyeego a kpọrọ ‘mortgage bank’ anọ.
Emefiela kwuru na a na-apụrụ ndị ikike ha maka na ha hapụrụ ọrụ ha kwesịrị ịrụ mere e ji nye ha ikike ma rụwazie ihe ọzọ.
O kwuru na agwa ndị a kpara megidere iwu na-achịkwa ụlọakụ na Naịjirịa a kpọrọ ‘Banks and other financial institutions Acts (BOFIA) nke 2020.
Ụfọdụ ụlọakụ ndị o metụtara gụnyere; Atlas Microfinance Bank, Bluewhales Microfinance Bank, Everest Microfinance Bank, Igangan Microfinance Bank, Mainsail Microfinance Bank, Merit Microfinance Bank, Minna Microfinance Bank, Musharaka Microfinance Bank, Nopov Microfinance Bank, Ohon Microfinance Bank na ndị ọzọ.

Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ime ime obodo bụ Maazị Rauf Aregbesola emepeela ụlọ ọrụ nchekwa na nchekwa obodo nke NSCDC arụpụtara ọhụrụ na Sokoto steeti.
Maazị Aregbesola kwupụtara nnukwu mgbanwe ndị otu ahụ na-ahụ n’ime afọ abụọ gara aga.
Minista ahụ, nke onye odeakwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide nke Mịnịstrị ahụ nọchitere anya ya, Dr Shuaibu Belgori, nwere ekele maka idu ndú nke Corps n’okpuru Commandant General nke Corp, Ahmad Audi, maka mkpebi siri ike iji nwee ihe ịga nke ọma.
O kwuru na ọ bụ ihe kwesịrị ịrịba ama na NSCDC n’ime afọ ole na ole gara aga egosila na ọ dị njikere imetụta nchekwa obodo nke ọma.
“Nke a bụ site n’ịdị njikere ya, ọkachasị ngwa ngwa na ịkekọrịta ọgụgụ isi oge niile, mkpebi siri ike imezu iwu ya wee kpochapụ ụdị mpụ niile.
O kwuru, “Ndị otu ahụ na-agba mbọ zụlite ikike nke ndị ọrụ ya site na ọzụzụ na mmemme oge niile iji kwalite mmụọ ha maka ịrụ ọrụ ka mma,” o kwuru.
Mịnịsta ahụ mesiri ndị otu ahụ obi ike na gọọmentị ga-aga n’ihu na-akwado mbọ ha iji kwalite arụmọrụ ka mma dịka nzọụkwụ ọzọ iji kwalite nchekwa obodo.
Ọ gbara ndị ọrụ na ndị ikom nke Corps ume ka ha gbanahụ ọgba aghara na asọmpi na-enweghị isi ma hụ na mmekọrịta dị irè na ụlọ ọrụ mmanye iwu ndị ọzọ n’ịgbaso mgbagwoju anya nke gburugburu ebe nchekwa.
Mịnịsta ahụ kelere Gọvanọ Aminu Tambuwal, maka inye ndị otu ụlọ ọrụ ohere iji rụọ ọrụ nke ọma na steeti ahụ.
Na mbụ, onye isi ndị NSCDC General, Ahmed Audi, kọwara mmemme ahụ dị ka ihe ọzọ dị ịrịba ama na mbọ Corps iji nọgide na-anya isi n’ime ụlọ nchekwa obodo.
“Ihe anyị na-ahụ taa bụ ihe akaebe maka mkpebi anyị siri ike imetụta nke ọma na nchekwa steeti na obodo n’ozuzu ya.
“A na-emegharị ụdị ọrụ a n’ofe steeti na Federal Capital Territory,” Audi kwuru.
Ọ gbakwụnyere na NSCDC na-eme ọdịmma ndị ọrụ ihe kacha mkpa ma kpebisie ike na-aga n’ihu na-emepụta atụmatụ dị iche iche nke a na-akwado iji kwalite ọrụ ndị ọrụ na ịkwalite mmụọ ha.
Onye isi ndị NSCDC General, kelere Gọvanọ Tambuwal maka ịgba mbọ hụ na ndị ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ, na-ekwu na “O nwebeghị obere ihe kwalite arụmọrụ nke ikike Corps na steeti ahụ.” N’okwu ya, Gọvanọ Tambuwal kwuru na isi ụlọ ọrụ NSCDC ọhụrụ ga-enye aka n’ịhazigharị ma kwalite nchekwa na steeti ahụ.
Gọvanọ, onye Kọmishọna na-ahụ maka ọrụ na nchekwa, Abubakar Maikuddi nọchitere anya ya, kwuru na gọọmentị steeti ahụ na-eme ọtụtụ ihe n’inye nkwado ngwa ngwa ọ bụghị naanị nye NSCDC kamakwa ndị ọrụ nchekwa niile na steeti ahụ.
O nwere ekele maka nkwado ndị ọrụ nchekwa na steeti ahụ.
Tambuwal kwuru, “Ana m ekele gị nke ukwuu maka nkwado gị n’oge ọchịchị m na steeti ahụ, achọrọ m ime ka obi sie gị ike na àjà gị agaghị aga n’efu,” Tambuwal kwuru..

N’ikpe banyere ikpe ahụ, Oriakụ Rose Soji, onye isi oche nke ụlọ ikpe ahụ, kwuru na “Motion na ọkwa nke onye mbụ gbara akwụkwọ, New Nigeria Peoples Party (NNPP) na-ekpe ekpere ka ụlọikpe ahụ wepụ akwụkwọ mkpesa a kwadoro dịka e kpere ekpere.
O kwuru, sị: “A kagbuola arịrịọ a.
Na mbụ, onye ndụmọdụ ndị NNPP bụ Maazị Segun Ogodo, etinyela akwụkwọ ka ha wepụrụ ikpe ahụ ma gwa ụlọikpe maka mmasị onye ahịa ya ka ọ kwụsị akwụkwọ mkpesa ahụ.
“Pati bụ NNPP nke m na-anọchi anya egosila mmasị ịwepụ akwụkwọ mkpesa megide ndị zara ajụjụ ahụ, Pastor Ipinsigba, All Progressives Congress (APC) na INEC na ya mere ụlọikpe enyela akwụkwọ anamachọihe ahụ.
“Onye na-arịọ arịrịọ nke abụọ, Mazi.
Phillip Alonge, na mbụ wetakwara akwụkwọ iji kwụsị akwụkwọ mkpesa ahụ mana ọ pụtaghị n’ụlọ ikpe taa na akwụkwọ mkpesa ahụ yiri ka a gbahapụrụ.
Ọ bụrụ na onye nke abụọ na-arịọ arịrịọ abịaghị n’ihu ọha n’ụlọ ikpe n’ụbọchị ọzọ a yigharịrị, ụlọ ikpe nwere ikike ime ihe masịrị ya ma nwee ike ibibi akwụkwọ mkpesa ahụ,” ka o kwuru.
Onye ndụmọdụ onye zara ajụjụ ahụ, Mr Moradele Oke, kwuru na ya agaghị emegide ngwa ahụ.
“Nke a kwesịrị ịbụ usoro nke anọ anyị ga-apụta.

“Ihe ọ pụtara bụ na arịrịọ a na-akwụ ụgwọ n’ihi na onye na-arịọ arịrịọ nke abụọ ka na-edekọ ma nweere onwe ya ka a nụ ya,” ka o kwuru.

Gọọmenti Steeti Lagos na-eme ihe iji gbochie ide mmiri.

Onye odeakwụkwọ  maka gburugburu Maazi Olalekan Shodeinde, kwuru nke a n’oge ‘Downscaling Workshop on the Seasonal Climate Predictions and Socio-Economic Implications nke Steeti ahụ,’ nke e mere na Lagos.
O kwuru okwu site n’ọnụ Director, Drainage Enforcement and Compliance, Mr Mahmood Adegbite, kwuru na, NiMet, na Ministry weputara kwa afọ Seasonal Climate Predictions, SCP, na mbido afọ iji mee ka ọha na eze mara banyere mmekọrịta ọha na eze na akụ na ụba.
“N’oge a, anyị chọrọ ime ka obi sie gị ike na steeti anyị ga-aga n’ihu na-agbali usoro iji gbochie ide mmiri mmiri ozuzo ọ bụla.” Ọ gbara ndị bi na ya ume ka ha nọgide na-akwado mbọ gọọmentị na-agba site na ikpochapụ ọwa mmiri mgbe niile n’ihu ha iji hụ na mmiri ozuzo na-asọpụta n’efu yana kwụsị ịkwanye ihe mkpofu n’ime ọwa mmiri.

Kaduna: mela ka In-Vitro Fertilisation (IVF) dịkwuo ọnụ mma.
Ngalaba ụlọ ọgwụ n’ahụ maka ọmụmụ nke Ahmadu Bello University Teaching Hospital (ABUTH), Zaria, e mela ka In-Vitro Fertilisation (IVF) dịkwuo ọnụ mma maka ndị di na nwunye dara ogbenye, site na mmekorita ọha na eze.
In vitro Fertilization (IVF) bụ otu n’ime usoro dị iche iche e nwere iji nyere ndị nwere nsogbu ọmụmụ aka ịmụ nwa.
N’oge IVF, a na-ewepụ akwa n’ime akpa nwa nwanyị ma tinye ya na spam na ụlọ nyocha.

Adegoroye, onye kwuru na ọ na-adị ya ka afọ juputara na ikike ikike ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri abụrụla eziokwu, kwuru na ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri ahụ, bụ Port Multipurpose na Ilaje Local Government nke Ondo State, ga-abụ ndị investors site na Public Private Partnership (PPP), nke nwere iri ise oge nkwekọrịta afọ.
Onye isi ala Buhari jiri amara họpụta m onye minista ihe dị ka ọnwa iri gara aga, kpọmkwem n’abali isii nke onwa Julaị, 2022.
“Gọvanọ m, nwanne m nwoke na onye ndu, Arakunrin Rotimi Akeredolu, nyere m otu nnukwu ọrụ.

“N’onwe m, etinyere m nrụgharị okporo ụzọ Akure-Ado, na ndepụta ọrụ m.
Enwere m mmetụta afọ ojuju taa na m nyefere n’iwu e nyere m.
“Ana m ekele Chineke ma enwere m ekele maka Mr President na ndị òtù FEC karịsịa, onye ọrụ ibe m na nnukwu onye ozi na ozi m, Muazu Jaji Sambo, maka inyere m aka ime nke a.

O nwere ike ọ bụrụ akwara na-ekesa ọbara n’ahụ gbabiri n’ike.” Dọkịta ahụike ọha agụ gara n’ihu kọwa sị, “Ọbara mgbalielu nwere ike imetụta akụkụ ahụ e ji amụ nwa(reproductive system) ọkachasị n’ụmụnwoke.” ” O nwere ike ime ka nwoke ghara ịtụwali nwaanyị ime maọbụ ka ihe o jiri bụrụ nwoke ghara ịrụ ọrụ dịka o kwesịrị.” Dkta Maduka si kwuo, Ọbara mgbaliego nwere ike ịkpọnwụ akụkụ ahụ mmadụ n’ihi na ọbara anaghị agazi n’ụbụrụ ya dịka o kwesịrị.maọbụ mee ka mmadụ ghara ịhụzị ụzọ..

E higharịala ikpe Peter Obi na Labour Party maka ntuliaka 2023 gaa Fraịde abali iri na itolu nke onwa Mee afo, 2023.
Tupu ha a malite, ụlọikpe jụrụ ịnabata onye ga-anochite Labour Party, dịka patị a kewara ụzọ abụọ.
Ụlọikpe mere nke a maka mmadụ atọ, nke gụnyere Lamidi Apapa (onyeisioche LP machiri), ọkaiwu Julius Abure (bụkwa onyeisioche LP, nke ụlọikpe machiri), na onyeisi ndị ụmụnwaanyị LP nọ na-azọ onye ga-anọchite patị ahụ.
Ọkaiwu Livy (SAN) kwuru na ha enwetabeghi akwụkwọ ruru 70% n’aka Inec.
O jiri Inec ebe ahụ gwara ha Rivers steeti ma atụ, ebe o kwuru na onye ọrụ Inec sị na akwụkwọ EC8A adịghị.
O kwukwara na n’agbanyeghi na ha gara ụlọọrụ Inec ugboro ise, akụkọ ka ha na-anụ.
Ọkwaiwu Livy kwuru na o degara ọkaiwu na-anọchitere Inec, bụ Abubakar Mahmoud (SAN), ka o leba anya n’inweta akwụkwọ ndị ahụ, nke ụloikpe si ha wepụta kamgbe Maachị.
Mana Mahmoud kwuru na ọ gbakwojuru ya anya.

Ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwuru nke a n’oge mbipụta mbụ nke ọrịa Parkinson Symposium iji mee ncheta ụbọchị ọmụmụ Dr Adewunmi Desalu afọ iri asato ka ọ nwụsịrị, onye e kere ntọala ahụ.

n’ụwa niile, mmụba nke ọrịa a jikọtara ọnụ na ọnụ ọgụgụ na-arị elu nke ndị agadi n’ụwa niile.” Ọ rịọrọ gọọmentị ka ha gbasaa ihe ọmụma gbasara PD n’ụlọ ọgwụ niile, kụziere ndị mmadụ ihe mgbagwoju anya nke ọrịa ahụ, tinye ego n’ime atụmatụ nyocha, zụọ ndị ọkachamara n’ọrịa akwara ozi, na ịnye ụlọ ọgwụ na ngwa ọgbara ọhụrụ.

Onye omebe iwu, Solomon Maren, na-anọchite anya Mangu/Bokkos Federal Constituency na Plateau steeti akatọọla mwakpo ndị na-eyi ọha egwu na-adịghị akwụsị akwụsị na mpaghara ya.
Maren gwara ndị mebere ka ha nọrọ jụụ ma ghara ịnara iwu n’aka ha.
Onye omebe iwu a kwuru na nkwupụta na Abuja na Tọzdee, na ndị na-eyi ọha egwu gburu ihe karịrị mmadụ otu nari, ọkachasị ụmụ nwanyị na ụmụaka.
O kwuru na nke a mere n’otu abalị a wakporo ụlọ ha na-enweghị isi, bụ nke a gbara ọkụ n’akụkụ ihe nri, ebe nri na mkpụrụ osisi.
O kwuru,“Ahụrụ m na ọ dị mma n’oge a ime ka ụwa mara ihe ọjọọ na-eme na mpaghara m, n’ime ụbọchị abụọ gara aga, ebe a wakporo ihe karịrị otu nari mmadụ.” Maren kọwara ogbugbu ndị a dị ka nke karịrị akarị na mpaghara ntuli aka, na-ekwu na “e gburu ihe karịrị mmadụ nari abụọ n’ime ọnwa anọ gara aga tupu nke a na-adịbeghị anya.” O kwuru na gọọmentị nwere ike ịsị na ọ na-eme ike ya, na-agba ya ume ka o mee ike ya niile iji gbochie mwakpo ọzọ a na-alụso ndị obodo ahụ ọgụ.
Onye omebe iwu ahụ jara ụfọdụ ndị uwe ojii mma bụ ndị na-arụ ọrụ na-enweghị ngwa agha zuru oke, ma wepụta onwe ha iji zọpụta ndụ.

Gụọ kwa: Ndị minista akwadola ịrụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri na steeti Ondo Gọvanọ Akeredolu kwuru na “ịmepụta ọrụ ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri dị ezigbo mkpa nye gọọmentị steeti.” Gọvanọ ahụ kelere President Buhari na ndị otu FEC ndị ọzọ, kwuru na nkwenye a bụ nnukwu onyinye nkewa nke sitere n’aka ọchịchị Buhari.
Ọ sịrị; “Port Ondo bụ otu n’ime ọrụ kacha mkpa nke ọchịchị a.
Anyị kpebisiri ike ma na-agba mbọ imezu ọrụ a nke ga-edobe ala anyị n’ụzọ nke ọganihu akụ na ụba.
“Nrọ anyị maka ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri Ondo a bụ ije ozi dị ka ụzọ ụgbọ mmiri maka ngwa ahịa anyị, ihe anyị na-akọ n’ubi, na n’oge na-adịghị anya, bitumen anyị.
“Ọ bụ ebumnuche gọọmentị a iji hụ na ikike Ondo steeti na-ebuli elu yana na etinyere akụrụngwa niile dị mkpa iji mee ka nke a bụrụ eziokwu iji nweta nke a.” Gọvanọ Akeredolu kelekwara Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka njem ụgbọ njem, Mu’azu Sambo maka ntinye aka na ntinye aka ya, na-ekwu na ndị obodo ahụ nwere ekele maka ọrụ ya bara uru n’ihi na akụkọ ihe mere eme ga-adịrị ya mma.
“Anyị jikwa obi eziokwu mara ọrụ nke onye minista na-ahụ maka njem ụgbọ njem, nke anyị, Prince Ademola Adegoroye.
” Mgba na mbọ gị nwere mmetụta amalitela ịmị mkpụrụ nke mmepe na-adịgide adịgide.
N’ezie, ị gosila na ị bụ ezi onye nnọchiteanya nke ndị gị.
” Gọvanọ kwuru; “Anyị na-enwekwa ekele maka onye ọ bụla nwere, otu ụzọ ma ọ bụ ọzọ, nyere aka na usoro nke ịnweta nkwado a.
Anyị na-atụ anya na mmepe a ga-eme ka ume anyị dị ọhụrụ ma mee ka mmasị anyị wepụta ọrụ Port Ondo.
Dị ka anyị na-ekwu, anyị na-akụ osisi, n’okpuru ndò anyị nwere ike ghara izu ike.
Ka o sina dị, ọ bụ ihe kwesịrị ekwesị maka ọgbọ a ka na-amụbeghị.

Ndị otu ahụ kpọrọ oku a dịka ha katọrọ mwakpo na ogbugbu a na-eme na steeti ahụ na nso nso a nke a na-amatabeghị ndị ọchụ nta akụkọ.
Nke kacha ọhụrụ bụ ogbugbu nke United States, US, Embassy Staff, ndị uwe ojii na ndị ọzọ n’okporo ụzọ Atani-Osamala dị n’okpuru ọchịchị Ogbaru nke steeti ahụ.
Onye ndu otu ahụ, Prince Chris Azor, onye ji okpukpu abụọ dị ka onye na-ahụ maka ndị na-eme ihe nkiri na-abụghị steeti, Open Government Partnership, OGP, kọwara ihe merenụ dị ka ihe jọgburu onwe ya na nke kacha mma ịkatọ.
Comrade Azor kpọkuru gọọmentị Naịjirịa na steeti ka ha gbasie mbọ ike n’ịhụ nchekwa na nchekwa ụmụ amaala.
Ọ rịọkwara ndị uwe ojii Naịjirịa na ndị ọrụ nchekwa ndị ọzọ ka ha hụ na nwụchiri ndị ọchụ nta akụkọ ozugbo ma tọhapụ ndị ọzọ eji eji.
Onye na-akwado ikike mmadụ mgbe ọ na-ekwe nkwa nkwado zuru oke nke ndị otu ya n’ofe obodo ahụ, kpọkuru ụmụ amaala “ka ha na-enyere gọọmentị aka mgbe niile na nleba anya na nchịkọta ozi iji kwụsị ajọ mmiri ozuzo.” N’aha otu ahụ, Azor kwuputara ịkasi ezinaụlọ ndị mmadụ nwụnahụrụ obi karịsịa, ndị nnọchi anya US na ndị uweojii Naịjirịa..
Onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari ekwupụtala obi ekele maka ọnwụ nke ndị ọrụ ụlọọrụ mba Amerịka abụọ na ndị uweojii Naịjirịa abụọ so ha wakporo ndị oji egbe mere n’okpuru ọchịchị Ogbaru na steeti Anambra.

                                                                         N’oge a siri ike maka ezinụlọ nke ndị ahụ e gburu, Ụlọ ọrụ Embassy America na Nigeria Police Force, NPF, m na-akasi mba ahụ maka ihe omume dị mwute,” ka o kwuru.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         A kọwakwara onyeisiala Buhari n’otu aka ahụ maka ogbugbu e gburu ọtụtụ mmadụ na mpaghara Bwoi dị n’okpuru ọchịchị Mangu nke Plateau steeti, yana ọtụtụ ndị obodo n’obodo Adaka dị n’okpuru ọchịchị Makurdi nakwa n’ime obodo Ijaha nke dị n’okpuru ọchịchị Apa nke steeti Benue.
                Onye isi ala ahụ kwuru na ọ na-ewute ya nke ukwuu ịmụta gbasara ọnwụ ndị a jọgburu onwe ya ma na-ekwupụta ezi obi na-erubere ezinụlọ ndị ahụ ihe metụtara aka.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       “Anyị na-ekerịta iru újú nke ụlọ ọrụ ndị nnọchi anya America, ndị uwe ojii Nigeria, na obodo anyị dị na Plateau na Benue ma nọgide na-agba mbọ ịchụpụ ndị mere mwakpo a na iweta ha ikpe.
                                                                                                                                                                                            Ka Chineke nye ezinaụlọ ha ume ka ha nwee ike idi nhụsianya dị njọ,” ka Onye isi ala kwuru..
Onye isi ala Nana Akufo-Addo nke Ghana na-atụ anya na ọ ga-abụ onyeisi oche n’ihu ọha na mwepụta akwụkwọ ọhụrụ abụọ gbasara ihe nketa onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari na Fraịde,abali iri na itolu nke onwa Mee, na State House Conference Center,nke Abuja.
                                                   Dị ka Ambassador Babagana Kingibe, onye isi oche nke Kọmitii nhazi maka mmemme ahụ, ndị ọbịa ndị ọzọ a ma ama na-atụ anya na ngosi akwụkwọ ahụ gụnyere Bola Tinubu, onye isi ala Naijiria, na Senator Kashim Shettima, onye osote onye isi oche.
                                                                              Akwụkwọ ndị a maka ngosi ọha bụ: “STATE OF REPAIR: OTÚ MUHAMMADU BUHARI gbalịsiri ike gbanwee NIGERIA FOR THE BETTER” nke Anthony Goldman, onye bụbu odeakụkọ na onye bụbu onye nchịkọta akụkọ Africa nke Financial Times nke London; na “Ihe nketa nke MUHAMMADU BUHARI” nke Senator Abu Ibrahim, onye bụbu onye nnọchiteanya nke Southern Katsina Senatorial District na National Assembly..
Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari na-eduzi nzukọ nke Federal Executive Council, nke e mere na Council Chambers nke Presidential Villa, Abuja.
Osote onye isi ala bu, Prọfesọ Yemi Osinbajo, onye isi ndị ọrụ na President, Prọfesọ Ibrahim Gambari, na onye isi ndị ọrụ obodo nke Federation, Dr Folashade Yemi-Esan so na ndị bịara nzukọ a.
                                                                                                                                                                                        Ndị ọzọ bụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi na omenala, Lai Mohammed, Finance, Budget and National Planning, Zainab Ahmed, Justice, Abubakar Malami, na Agriculture, Muhammad Abubakar.
                                                                                                                                                                                    Ndị ọzọ bụ Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka ihe gbasara ụmụ nwanyị, Pauline Tallen, Aviation, Hadi Sirika, Communications and Digital Economy, Prof.
Isa Pantami, na Works and Housing, Babatunde Fashola, na ndị ọzọ.
A na-eche na nzukọ nke taa bụ nke ikpeazụ maka ọchịchị ugbu a, nke na-abịa na njedebe n’abali iri abuo na itolu nke onwa Mee.
                                                                                                                                                                                        A na-atụ anya na Council a ga-enwe nnọkọ valedictory na Wenezde na-abịa,abali iri abuo na ano nke onwa Mee.

Ụlọikpe mkpesa nke Presidential Election (PEPC) ga-amaliteghachi taa n’ụbọchị Wenezde n’Abuja, isi obodo Naijiria, ka ọ gaa n’ihu n’akwụkwọ mkpesa nke ndị Labour Party na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala, bụ Mazị Peter Obi.
Obi na-ama okwu ndị Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) kwupụtara ọkwa onyeisiala Ahmed Tinubu dịka onye meriri na ntuliaka onyeisiala n’afọ 2023.
                                                                                                     GỤỌ KWESỊRỊ: Ụlọikpe nhọpụta: Ụlọikpe akwụsịla arịrịọ Obi tupu ọ malite ikpe n’abali iri na asa nke onwa Mee.
                                                          N’ụbọchị ikpeazụ e yigharịrị tupu a nụ ya bụ Mee abali iri, Ndụmọdụ Peter Obi, Dọkịnta Livy Uzoukwu SAN, gwara ụlọikpe mkpesa na ya kwenyere na ndụmọdụ niile nyere ndị nke mbụ na nke anọ zara ajụjụ na a ga-eyigharị tupu ikpe ahụ ruo Wenezde abali iri na asaa.
iji kwe ka agbanwere usoro niile pụtara ìhè ma jee ozi maka ịnụ ihe.
                                                                                                                                                                                                  Ndụmọdụ nye INEC, Abubakar Mahmood SAN; Woke Olanipekum SAN maka Tinubu na Shetima; na Lateef Fagbemi nke All Progressives Congress (APC) kwadoro ụlọikpe nkwekọrịta ha niile maka mgbanwe azịza dị mkpa iji dịrị njikere maka nnabata n’ime ụbọchị ikpe ikpe na-abịa.
                         Onyeisi ọkaikpe nke ụlọikpe mkpesa maka ntuliaka onye isi ala, Justice Haruna Tsamani, ka ọ na-eyigharịrị ụbọchị iri na asa nke onwa Mee,eduzila ndị ndụmọdụ niile ka ha hụ na ha doziri okwu ndị a ga-ekpebi tupu ụbọchị ikpe na-abịa.
                                                                                                              Ka ọ dị ugbu a, a ga-anụ akwụkwọ mkpesa nke ndị People’s Democratic Party’s (PDP) na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala, Atiku Abubakar, n’abali iri na asato Tọzdee, onwa Mee, 2023..
Ikpe gbasara onye meriri ntuliaka ọkwa onyeisiala e mere na Naịjirịa n’abali iri abuo na ise nke ọnwa Febrụwarị afọ a na-aga n’ihu ugbua n’ụlọ ikpe mkpegharị Naịjirịa.
Ya bụ ikpe amalitelarị ma na-aga n’ihu ugbua dịka ndị ọkaikpe ise nọ n’isi yHa bụ: Haruna Simon Tsammani; Stephen Jonah Adah; Misitura Bolaji-Yusuf; Boloukuoromo Moses Ugo na Abba Bello Mohammed.

Mmadụ abụọ a bụ Atiku Abubakar nke Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) na Peter Obi nle Labour Party (LP).

Ọ bụghị naanị PDP na LP gbaghara mpụtara ntuliaka a, pati ndị ọzọ sobu gbaghaa ya gụnyere: Action Alliance (AA); Action Peoples Party (APP); na Allied People’s Movement (APM).

Otu ahuike mba uwa nyere ịdọ aka ná ntị n’ubochi Tuuzde maka iji ọgụgụ isi mmadụ (AI) maka ahụike ọha.
                                                                       Data nke AI na-eji ruo mkpebi, ha kwuru na ọ nwere ike bụrụ nke enweghị isi ma ọ bụ jiri ya mee ihe n’ụzọ na-ezighị ezi.
                                                       WHO kwuru na ọ na-anụ ọkụ n’obi maka ikike AI nwere mana ọ nwere nchegbu banyere otu a ga-esi jiri ya mee ka ịnweta ozi ahụike dịkwuo mma, dịka ngwá ọrụ na-akwado mkpebi na iji kwalite nlekọta nyocha.
                                                                                                                                                         Ndị nta akụkọ na-akọ na data ejiri zụọ AI nwere ike iwepụta ozi na-eduhie eduhie ma ọ bụ na-ezighi ezi na enwere ike iji ụdị ndị ahụ mee ihe n’ụzọ na-ezighị ezi.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Ọ bụ “dị mkpa” iji nyochaa ihe egwu dị n’iji ngwa ngwa ụdị asụsụ emepụtapụtara (LLMs), dị ka ChatGPT, iji chebe ma kwalite ọdịmma mmadụ na ichekwa ahụike ọha, òtù ahụike UN kwuru.

                                                                                                                                                                Gagdi kọwara Onye isi ala a họpụtara dị ka ezigbo onye Democrat nke kwenyere na egwuregwu ziri ezi na agaghị akwado mpaghara ọ bụla ewepụrụ.    O mere ka a mara nke a mgbe ya na ndị nta akụkọ na-akparịta ụka n’ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi n’Abuja, na-ekwu na ndị niile na-achọ ọkwá onye isi okwu nke hibere otu G7 anaghị emegide onye ọ bụla kama na-akwado ikpe ziri ezi na nha anya.

                                                            Ọ sịrị; “Ama m ụkpụrụ nke onye isi ala anyị họpụtara.
                                                                                                                                       Ọ bụ ya mere anyị ji na-awakpo pati ahụ maka na ọ bụ pati mere nkwupụta a.
                                                                                                                                “Asiwaju Bola Tinubu ekwela nkwa na ya ga-akwụghachi nkwụsi ike na nkwa.
                                                                                                                                  Ọ ga-akwụghachi ihe ị wetara na tebụl.
O meriri naanị otu Local Government na Kaduna State, Birnin Gwari.
                                                                          Na steeti ebe ị nwetara naanị otu ọchịchị ime obodo, ị na-enye steeti ahụ okwu okwu? “Echere m na ọ na-emebi ụkpụrụ nke Onye isi ala a họpụtara ahọpụta.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Ihe pati ahụ mere megidere nkwa na nkwa na ụzọ ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị Tinubu.
                                                                                                                               Anyị adịghị emegide onye ọ bụla.
Anyị anaghịkwa emegide Onye isi ala a họpụtara, n’ihi na n’ihe gbasara anyị, anyị anụbeghị ihe ọ bụla n’ọnụ ya.
Anyị anụbeghị ihe ọ bụla n’ọnụ ya gbasara ma o meela otu onye na-azọ ọkwa ma ọ bụ kwadoo ya.
                                                                                                           Mana anyị nụrụ n’ọnụ pati ahụ gbasara onye na-akwado nkwenye na e kenyere ha ya.
                                                                                                                   Ya mere anyị na pati ahụ nwere okwu ọ bụghị onye isi ala a họpụtara.” N’elu nkwa nke osote onye isi oche, Kaseem Shetima kwere ịkpọ ndị otu G7 niile ka ha nwee nkwekọrịta, Gagdi kwuru na ọ ka ga-enweta ya.
                                                                                                                                                                   O kwukwara na ọbụna onye “e tere mmanụ” na-azọ ọkwa ikwu okwu, Tajudeen Abbas bụkwa ụgbọ elu ka ọ gakwuru ya.
                                                   Gagdi kwuru; “Ahụla m VP-elect.
Ahụrụ m ya dị ka onye ndu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị nke ugwu ka m gwa ya otu ihe m bu n’obi ịzọ ọkwa ọkà okwu n’ihi na ruo ugbu a, ekwupụtabeghị m ya nke ahụ, m wee gwa ya ma kpee ekpere ma rịọ m nke ọma.
                                                                           Yabụ, ọ bụrụ na enwere njikọ ọ bụla gbasara onye ga-abụ onye na-ekwu okwu, ma ọ na-abịakwute anyị iji kwado Tajudeen Abbas, mụ na VP ekwubeghị nke ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 N’ime iwu ụlọ emezigharịrị nke na-akwalite ịtụ vootu votu, Gagdi kwuru na ụjọ anaghị atụ ya maka ya.
                                                                                      Agbanyeghị, o kwuru na ọ bụghị onye na-ekwuchitere G7 mana na ndị otu niile rịọrọ bụ Equity and Justice.
                                                                     Gagdi kwukwara na ndị otu G7 bụ ndị nwere otu echiche na-achọsi ike na ihe APC pụtara megidere ụkpụrụ pati ahụ, megidere ụkpụrụ otu ahụ.”.
Otu Nigerian Association of Resident Doctors, NARD, na-ekwu na ha ga-amalite ọrụ ịdọ aka ná ntị ụbọchị ise n’ụbọchị Wednesde.

Kọmishọna steeti Ogun na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ, azụmaahịa na itinye ego, Oriakụ Kikelomo Longe, dụrụ ndị ntorobịa ọdụ ka ha chọpụta ohere dị n’ịkpa azụ̀ ka ha wee nwee ike were ha n’ọrụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                  Longe kwuru nke a na mmeghe ọzụzụ izuụka atọ na azụmaahịa azụrụ azụ nke emere n’Abeokuta.
                                                                                                Ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ teknụzụ Incubation Center, TIC, na mmekorita ya na German Agency for International Cooperation, GIZ haziri mmemme a.
                     Dị ka Longe si kwuo, inyocha ihe ndị nwere ike ime n’ịkụ azụ̀ ga-enye ha ohere ịbụ ndị na-arụ ọrụ onwe ha, karịsịa n’ọnọdụ enweghị ọrụ na-ejupụta na mba ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Kọmishọna nke onye isi ngalaba na-ahụ maka nkwalite ụlọ ọrụ na mịnịstrị ahụ nọchitere anya ya bụ Kehinde Akintomide kwuru na ịbanye n’ịkụ azụ nwere ike inyere ndị ntorobịa aka itinye aka na mmepe ụlọ ọrụ na steeti ahụ.
                                                                                                                                    O kwuru na enwere ike ime nke a site n’inye ngwaahịa ndị dị mkpa n’agbụ ahịa azụ̀ bara uru maka ụlọ ọrụ na-arụ ọrụ na steeti ahụ.
                                     O toro ndị TIC na GIZ maka ịhazi mmemme a haziri iji zụọ ndị ntorobịa na ụmụ nwanyị iri ano nọ n’agbata afọ iri na ise ruo iri atọ na ise maka ịzụ azụ azụ nakwa inye ndị sonyere ya ike na ngwa mmalite.
                                                                                                                                                                                Ọ gara n’ihu kwuo na ọzụzụ a ga-enye aka n’inyere ndị ntorobịa na-enweghị ọrụ aka ịghọ ndị ọchụnta ego.
                                                                       N’ịkọwapụta ọzụzụ a mepere emepe, onye njikwa Centre, TIC, Abeokuta, bụ Maazị Ifelayo Adejoro, dụnyere ndị sonyere na ya ka ha were ohere ndị ọzụzụ ahụ nyere na-emeziwanye onwe ha.
                                                                                                                                                                                        N’okwu ya, onye ndụmọdụ teknụzụ, nkwalite ọrụ, mmepe nka maka ọrụ ntorobịa5 GIZ, Maazị Amile Terlumun kwuru na a haziri ọzụzụ a iji nyere ndị ntorobịa na-enweghị ọrụ aka ka ha wee nwee nnukwu ọrụ.
                                                                                                                                                                     O kwuru na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ agbasiwo mbọ ike n’ịweta ọnọdụ dị mma maka mmemme ọzụzụ na inye ike na-aga nke ọma.
Mmadụ abụọ n’ime ndị so na ya bụ Osiniyi Abolanle na Qudus Bello kelere ndị haziri ahazi ma kwe nkwa na ha ga-etinye ihe ọmụma ha nwetara n’ịmalite ịkụ azụ̀..
Mịnịsta na-ahụ maka egwuregwu na mmepe ndị ntorobịa Naijiria, bụ Maazị Sunday Dare etoola amamihe nke ndị ndu nyere ndị otu National Youth Service Corps, NYSC Scheme nakwa ndị Naijiria na ndị mmadụ na-enweghị mgbagha butere ihe oriri ya kemgbe afọ iri ise ugbu a.
                             Mịnịsta bụ onye toro nke a na mmemme mmeghe nke NYSC na iri ise e mere n’Abuja n’ụbọchị Mọnde kwuru na atụmatụ a emeela nnukwu uru na mmepe obodo kemgbe ọ malitere afọ iri ise gara aga.
                                                                                                                                                                               O mere ka a mara na atụmatụ National Youth Service Corps, NYSC kwadoro okwukwe na ebumnobi ya ma kwadoo mkpa ya na mmepe obodo.
Dare kọwara NYSC dị ka otu ndị ntorobịa na-ahụ maka n’Afrịka kọwara n’ihu na “nlegharị anya nke ndị isi ala na ndị isi ala gara aga akwalitela atụmatụ a n’agbanyeghị ọgbaghara ndị na-eyi ndụ ya egwu.
                                                                                                                                                                               NYSC enweela mmetụta bara oke uru n’akụkụ dị iche iche nke mmepe obodo, gụnyere inye obodo ime obodo ahụike ahụike, ma nyekwa aka n’akụkọ ifo na agụmakwụkwọ na akụrụngwa ime obodo.
                                                                                                                                                                                      “Enweela omume dị mma na ịdị mma, mba ahụ hụkwara amamihe dị egwu sitere n’aka ndị ntorobịa n’oge ọrịa COVID-19 na tupu mgbe ahụ n’oge nje Ebola na ọrịa AIDS.”                                                                                                                                                                          Mgbe ọ na-eto onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari onyinye na atụmatụ a n’ime afọ asatọ gara aga, Dare nwekwara ekele onyeisi oche maka ihe ùgwù ijere obodo ahụ ozi dịka onye minista na-ahụ maka egwuregwu na mmepe ntorobịa.
                                                                                                                                  Ya mere ọ kpọkuru ndị ndu atụmatụ a ka ha hụ emume afọ iri ise dị ka ohere iji wepụta atumatu iji wusie atụmatụ a ike, mee ka ọ dịgidere, na ịgbasawanye ọrụ ya iji kwalite onyinye ya iji kwalite mmepe obodo..
Kọmitii nchịkwa nwa oge ekwupụtala na njem egwuregwu Super 6 nke Nigeria Professional Football League ga-eme n’abali ato nke onwa June  ruo abali iri na otu na Lagos, Nke a bụ nke IMC mere ka a mara n’ozi o nyere onye ntaakụkọ anyị n’ụbọchị Mọnde.
                                                                    Ebe otu isii nke ọ bụla na-agba ibe ya, ngụkọta nke egwuregwu iri na ise ga-eme n’ime ụbọchị ise, na-enwekwa ụbọchị n’efu n’etiti ụbọchị egwuregwu.
Dịka onye isi, Operations, IMC, Davidson Owumi siri kwuo, ntụlegharị nke usoro ihe omume a kwadoro na Nigeria Football Federation iji nabata asọmpi na Federation Cup.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              “Site na asọmpi nke Federation Cup nke iri bna isii na nkeji iri na ise nke emere maka abali iri abuo na anon a abali iri abuo na asato, anyị chere na Super 6 enweghị ike ijide ụbọchị mbụ n’ihi na ụfọdụ ndị otu nwere ike iru eru maka asọmpi ahụ na-agakwa.
                                                                          Iso na iko Federation,” Owumi kwuru.
A na-atụ anya na ndị otu ga-erute Lagos abali mbu nke onwa Juun, ebe ndị isi egwuregwu ga-abata n’echi ya.
