Onye isi oche nke Abuja Chamber of Commerce, Mr Al-Mujtaba Abubakar, etoola onye isi oche nke Dangote Refinery, Alhaji Aliko Dangote maka itinye ego na mmepe nke nnukwu ụlọ ọrụ na Africa.
                                                                                                                                                                    Abubakar na nkwupụta kwuru, ACCI ghọtara mkpa itinye ego a n’ịmepụta ọrụ ọhụrụ, ịkwalite akụ na ụba Nigeria, na ịkwalite ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ na gas nke obodo.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Ọ rụtụrụ aka na ntinye ego a na-atụ anya na ọ ga-adọta isi obodo mba ofesi wee belata nke ukwuu ndabere Nigeria na mbubata mmanụ.
                      Onye isi ACCI toro n’ọhụụ Dangote na ntinye aka n’ịgbanwe akụ na ụba Nigeria na-agbakwụnye na ntinye ego a bụ ihe na-agbanwe egwuregwu maka mpaghara mmanụ na gas nke Nigeria na ihe akaebe nke mkpebi Dangote iji mepụta uru na-adịgide adịgide maka Nigeria na Africa.
Abubakar kwuru na Chamber na-eme mmemme pụtara ìhè ma na-agba ndị ọchụnta ego ndị ọzọ ume ka ha gbasoo ụzọ ya n’itinye ego na Naijiria.
                                    Ụlọ nrụpụta Dangote, nke dị na Lekki Free Trade Zone na Legọs steeti, ga-agbanwegharị ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ na gas nke Naijiria.
                                           Ụlọ ọrụ nnụcha a, nke ga-enwe ike nchacha barel 650,000 kwa ụbọchị, ọ bụghị naanị na ọ ga-emepụta mmanụ ụgbọala na mmanụ dizel dị elu, kamakwa petrochemicals na mmanụ ụgbọ elu.
                                                                                                                                                                                           A na-atụkwa anya na ụlọ ọrụ Dangote refinery ga-enye ohere maka mmepe nkà na ụzụ na ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, na ịkwalite ọdịnaya mpaghara na ụlọ ọrụ mmanụ na gas..
Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ọdụ ụgbọ elu nke Naijiria ebidola ọgbakọ ụbọchị anọ nke National Aviation Conference nke isiokwu ya bụ Sustainability of the Aviation Industry na Nigeria, dịka akụkụ nke mbọ iji kwalite ntinye aka nke ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu na-enye akụ na ụba Nigeria.

                                                                                                                                                                      Mazị Meribole gbakwụnyere na a malitere ọtụtụ ọrụ, gụnyere ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu na ọrụ ndozigharị, na mmecha nke ọdụ ụgbọ elu ọhụrụ nke mba ụwa, kwa, ibuga akụrụngwa nchekwa na nchekwa nke ụwa na akụrụngwa ewepụtara maka ọdụ ụgbọ elu n’etiti ndị ọzọ.
                                                              N’okwu nnabata ya, onye isi nchịkwa, bụ Federal Airports Authority of Nigeria, Captain Rabiu Yadudu kwuru na ụgbọ elu aghọwo azụmahịa dị oke mkpa na Nigeria na ụwa dum, na Naijiria kwadoro nkwado nke ngalaba ahụ site n’ịgbanwe ya, izute ya.
                                       “Ebumnobi anyị bụ isi nke ịmepụta na ịhazi ogbako a bụ iji nye ndị niile na-arụ ọrụ ụlọ ọrụ iji gbakọta ọnụ, iji kparịta ihe ịma aka ndị na-emegide ọganihu na mmepe nke ụlọ ọrụ ụgbọ elu nke mba ahụ, yana inye ngwọta dị mma maka nsogbu ndị dị otú ahụ.
”      “Ọ bụ ebumnobi anyị ka anyị jiri nnọkọ a gosi ohere itinye ego dị na ụlọ ọrụ ahụ, iji dọta ndị na-atụ anya itinye ego, bụ ndị na-achọ imeghachi nnukwu ego na ntinye ego ha.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Onye isi oche, kọmitii Sineti na-ahụ maka ụgbọ elu, Sinetọ Biodun Olujimi mesiri ndị na-ahụ maka ọrụ na ndị ọchụnta ego obi ike na Sineti ga-ahụ na ha ga-eme iwu ndị ga-enyere aka itolite ngalaba ụgbọ elu.
                                                                                                                                                                  N’oge mmeghe nke ogbako ahụ, ndị na-ahụ maka ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ụgbọ elu chọpụtara ụfọdụ ihe ịma aka na-eche ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị ka ọnụ ahịa tiketi dị elu, okwu mmanụ ụgbọ elu, nkwụsị nke ndị ọrụ ụgbọ elu ugboro ugboro na nhazi nke ụgbọ elu so na nsogbu ndị a na-atụ anya na a ga-edozi.
            Ọzọkwa ogbako ahụ ga-aga n’ihu na-eje ozi dị ka ahịa mepere emepe, ma ọ bụ ebe nzukọ maka ụlọ ọrụ nzuzo iji banye n’ụwa nke ohere itinye ego na nwetaghachi azụ na ntinye ego ha..
Otu Peoples Democratic Party, PDP, na Kaduna Steeti akatọọla ebubo nkwusioru nke onye isi otu ha bụ Sinetọ Ahmed Makarfi, na-akọwa ihe a dị ka aka mmadụ ole na ole na-eduhie eduhie.
                                                                                                                                                                                                     E boro Sinetọ Makarfi ebubo na ọ na-eme ihe megidere otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
                                                                                                                           Onye isi oche pati steeti ahụ, Maazị Felix Hyet bụ onye kwuru nke a mgbe ọ na-agwa ndị nta akụkọ gbasara mmepe n’ụlọ ọrụ PDP Secretariat dị na Kaduna, kagburu ebubo eboro ebubo na Sinetọ Makarfi na-eme ihe megidere otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
                                                                                     O kwuru na ngalaba nke iri ise na asaa nke akwụkwọ iwu pati ahụ na-ekwu na ọ bụ naanị National Leadership nke pati ahụ nwere ikike ị kwụsịtụ onye isi nke Makarfi, na-ekwusi ike na “nkwụsị ahụ a na-ekwu na nkwusioru ahụ enweghị mmetụta na a ga-atụfu ya.”                                                                      Maazị Hyet rụrụ ụka na, n’oge ntuliaka izugbe gara aga, ọ bụ Makarfi duru ndị otu pati ma mefuo nnukwu ego n’oge mkpọsa PDP na ndị ọchịchị ime obodo niile na steeti ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                              “Ya mere, Senator Makarfi enweghị ike ịsị na ọ bụ akụkụ nke mmemme mgbochi ọ bụla dịka ebubo,” Onye isi oche ahụ kwuru.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     Onye isi ala ahụ kwuru ihe ndị mbụ nke onye nrụpụta ụlọ, onye turu anya na asọmpi ihu na Jollof, 2021, na-akwadebe efere ọnụ nke meriri ihe nrite nhọrọ, wee dozie asọmpi ogologo oge na Ghana nke obodo Africa kwesịrị inwe akara azụmaahịa maka ya.
                       Onye isi ala Buhari kwenyere na mbanye na ọchịchọ nke Hilda Baci emeela ka mmasị na nghọta dị iche iche nke nri Nigeria dị iche iche, dịka akara ngosi omenala ọzọ, nke nwere nnukwu uru njem nlegharị anya, na-atụ anya na ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto ga-agbaso nzọụkwụ ya.
                                               Onye isi ala na-ekele ndị na-akwado Hilda Baci Cook-a-thon, ndị ọrụ gọọmentị, gụnyere Gọvanọ Babajide Sanwo-Olu nke Legọs steeti, ndị ama ama si egwu egwu na ihe nkiri, na ndị na-akwado onye isi nri maka nkwado niile wetara otuto.

Haaland agbatala goolu iriise na out na asọmpi niile nke  ugbu a, mana onye na-agbachitere Real Antonio Rudiger gbachiri nkịtị na egwuregwu mbụ ha gbara onwe ha  1-1 na Tuzidee gara aga.
Mana Erling, anyị enweghị ike ichefu gi.Ọ dị afọ 22 na ọ bụ nke mbụ ọ gbara  bọọlụ na agabta  ọkara nke ikpeazụ nke Champions League, “Guardiola gwara ndị nta akụkọ tupu egwuregwu ebido .
“Na nke mbụ ị ga-aga na Bernabeu, otu n’ime ọkwa kachasị elu, megide otu ụlọ ọrụ kachasị elu nke nwere ezigbo ndị na-agbachitere ya, ndị na-agba ọsọ na ndị na-agba ọsọ, oge ọzọ ga-adị ntakịrị mfe.” “Ọ bụrụ na ndị otu ahụ nwere ike igwu egwu nke ọma na ngalaba ụfọdụ n’ụzọ anyị si eche na Wednesde, ikekwe ọ ga-adịrị ya mfe.”.

Democratic Alternative Party kpọrọ oku ka  akagbuo ntuli aka onye isi ala 2023.
N’ime ụbọchị ole na ole ka a ga-ewebata ọchịchị ọhụrụ na Naịjirịa, otu ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị a na-akpọ Democratic Alternative DA akpọkuola onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari ka ọ kagbuo ntuliaka onyeisiala n’afọ 2023 ma hazie nke ọhụrụ.
Otu ahụ kwuru na ezighi ezi nke Independent National Electoral INEC Commission INEC wepụrụ ya isonye na ntuliaka ahụ.
Na mkparịta ụka ndị nta akụkọ na Abuja, isi obodo Naijiria, onye na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala nke Democratic Alternative DA Mr.
Victor Okechukwu Vishnay kwukwara na, aha ya na akara pati ya  bu nke ewebatagh na ntuli aka 2023 n’agbanyeghị na ha sonyere  na ntuli aka 2019.
“Dịka onye ndoro-ndoro ochichi  maka onye isi ala Democratic Alternative na dị ka nwa amaala obodo Naijiria, anyị niile hụrụ obodo a n’anya ma taa ana m arịọ onye Naijiria ọ bụla nwere ezi uche nke agbụrụ ọ bụla na okpukperechi ka ọ sonyere m n’ịkpọ onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari ka ọ bịa.
Kagbuo ntuli aka nke 2023 gara aga ka eme e ntuliaka ọzọ, “Vishnay kwuru.
Ọ gbakwụnyere na “ọgụ a, anyị anaghị ebu ngwa ọgụ mana onye ọ bụla ga-anọdụ ala ma ghọta na anyị chọrọ mgbanwe na obodo a.”.

  “A haziri ha nke ọma iji chọpụta ndị ndu ruru eru bụ́ ndị nwere ike imeri ihe ịma aka na-eche mba anyị ihu nke ọma.

Central Bank of Nigeria kwuru na ndebanye aha na ikpo okwu nkwenye ya enweghị ụbọchị ngwụcha.
                                                                                       Ụlọ akụ kachasi kwupụtara nke a mgbe ọ na-emeghachi omume maka nzọrọ na ọnụọgụ ego Bank Verification Number, BVN, nyere ndị ahịa na-agwụ mgbe afọ iri gachara.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       Na nkwupụta nke Ag.
Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ mgbasa ozi Corporate Isa AbdulMumin, CBN gwara ndị ahịa ụlọ akụ ka ha gaa n’ihu na-eji BVN.
Nkwupụta ahụ na-agụ: “A dọtara uche nke Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) na akụkọ na-atụ aro na Bank Verification Number (BVN) nke ụlọ akụ nyere na nkwado nke Nigeria Inter-Bank Settlement System (NIBSS) na-agwụ mgbe afọ iri gachara.
”                                                                                                                           “N’adịghị ka nkwupụta ndị a, anyị chọrọ ịkọwapụta na BVN ewepụtara na Nigeria enweghị ụbọchị njedebe.
                                                                     Ozugbo ejidere biometrics nke onye ahịa wee debanye aha na nchekwa data nke NIBSS, BVN na-adị ndụ.
                                                                        Agbanyeghị, usoro iwu maka BVN nke CBN wepụtara na 2021 kwuru na ndị ahịa nwere ike ịgbanwe naanị ndekọ ha n’ihi ọnọdụ ụfọdụ edepụtara n’akwụkwọ ahụ na mgbe ndị isi dị mkpa kpochapụrụ ya.
                                                                                                                                                                     “Ya mere, anyị na-agba ndị ahịa ụlọ akụ na mba ahụ ume, karịsịa ndị usoro ahụ ejidela biometrics, ka ha gaa n’ihu na-eji njirimara ha pụrụ iche ka ha na-adị ndụ ha niile.”.

Ngalaba haziri ntuliaka a bụ ‘Independent National Electoral Commission’ (Inec) kwuru na Tinubu nwetara vootu dị 8,794,726 iji turu ugo ma bụrụ onyeisiala ọhụrụ Naịjirịa, ebe Atiku nwetara vootu 6,984,520; Peter Obi nwetara vootu 6,101,533.
Kedu ndị mere mkpesa a n’ụlọikpe? Dịka Inec kpọpụtara Tinubu dịka onyeisiala ọhụrụ Naịjirịa ma nyekwa ya asambodo mmeri, Atiku, Obi, nakwa mmadụ abụọ ọzọ – Solomon Okangbuan nke pati Action Alliance (AA), Nnadi Charles Osita nke ‘Action Peoples Party (APP), na Chichi Ojei nke pati Allied Peoples Movement (APM) – kwuru na ha ekwenyeghị na mkpọpụta ahụ Inec mere.
Ha ise wegara akwụkwọ mkpesa n’ụlọikpe iji gbaghaa mpụtara ntuliaka ahụ Ine kpọrọ.
Atiku kwuru na Inec agbasoghi usoro iwu ntuliaka na nhazi ntuliaka ahụ, ya mere ha chọrọ ka ụlọikpe nye iwu ka a napụ Tinubu asambodo mmeri Inec nyere ya.
O bokwara ebubo na Tinubu etozughị iso zọọ ọkwa onyeisiala Naịjirịa n’ihi ebubo ibu ọgwụike bụ nke e boro ya na mba US ọtụt afọ gara aga.
Atiku chọrọ ka ụlọikpe kpọpụta aha ya dịka onye meriri ntuliaka ahụ, ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụ ya gbara onye nke abụọ.
N’aka nke ọzọ, Peter chọrọ ka ụlọikpe kagbuo ntuliaka ahụ kpamkpam ka Inec hazigharịa ntuliaka ọzọ, bụ nke Rinubu na ndị APC agaghị eso zọọ.
Obi kwukwara na Tinubu enwetazughị vootu zuru oke n’isi obodo Naịjirịa bụ Abuja dịka iwu Naịjirịa si kwuo.
Solomon Okangbuan nke pati AA na-arịọ ụlọikpe ka ha kagbuo ntuliaka ahụ n’ihi na Inec nupuru isi na mkpebi ụlọikpe ma wepụ aha ya na ndị ga-eso zọọ ya bụ ọkwa.
Na mkpesa nke ya, Nnadi Osita nka APP boro ebubo na Tinubu nyere ndịọrụ Inec ego akazụ ka ha wee mee nrụrụaka na ngụkọ mpụtara ntuliaka na steeti nakwa okpuru ọchịchị dị icheiche.
Osita bokwara ebubo na Tinubu na APC nyere ọtụtụ ndị bịara ịtụ vootu ego iji zụrụ vootu ha, ma kwukwaa na ndị na-ekweghị ịnara ego ahụ, e gbochiri ha ịtụ vootu.
Chichi Ojei, bụ naanị nwaanyị so zọọ ọkwa ahụ chọrọ ka ụlọikpe napụta Tinubu asambodo mmeri nke Inec nyere ya maka na o tozughi ịzọ ọkwa onyeisiala na Naịjirịa dịka iwu Naịjirịa nakwa iwu ntuliaka si nye ntuziaka.
Ole mgbe a ga-ekpebi ikpe a? Dịka iwu si dị, a na-atụ anya na mpụtara ụlọikpe a ga-apụta ma ọ gachaa ụbọchị otu nari na iri asato e ji wetara ha mkpesa.
Mana ebe ọ bụ na ọ bụghị n’otu ụbọchị ka mmadụ anọ a wegara mkpesa ha n’ụlọikpe, mkpebi ụlọikpe gbasara mkpesa anọ a nwereike ịpụta icheiche.
Mana ọ bụghị n’ụlọikpe mkpegharị ka ya bụ ikpe ga-ebi.
Ohere dị maka iwega ya n’ụlọikpe kachasị, bụ ebe e kwesịrị ileba ya anya ma nye mkpebi n’ime ụbọchị iri isii.
Nke a pụtara na njem ụlọikpe a nwereike ịkụrụ ọnụ n’ime ọnwa asatọ..
Aka na-achị Osun steeti bụ Ademola Adeleke ekwuola na mmeri ya n’ụlọikpe bụ n’aka Chukwu na ndị Osun ka ya na-enyefe ya.
Adeleke depụtara nke a n’akara Twitter ya ebe o gosiri etu obi dị ya na ya bụ mmeri.
O kwuruna mmeri ya gosiri na ọ bụ ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya n’ezie.
Edemede a nwere ihe ndị si na Twitter.
Anyị na-achọ ka i nye anyị ikike tupu e tinye ihe ọbụla, dịka akụrụngwa cookies na tekịnụzụ ndị ọzọ nwereike ịdị na ya.
I nwereike ịgụ Twitter iwu cookie na iwu nzuzo tupu ị nabata ya.
Iji kirie ihe nọ n’ime ya, họrọ ‘nabata na gaa n’ihu’.

Ha kachapụrụ mkpesa ndị pati APC na Gboyega Oyetola ma kwuo na ọ bụ Adeleke meriri ntuliaka ahụ nke bụ na ọ bụ ya ga-achị steeti ahụ kpọmkwem.
Adeleke emeriela Oyetola n’ụlọikpe kachasị iji bụrụ gọvanọ Osun steeti Ihe ikpe ha gbadoro ụkwụ Ụfọdụ ihe ndị APC rụtụrụ aka na mkpesa ha bụ na e binyere aka karịa n’ụfọdụ be.
Mana ụlọikpe ahụ kpebiri na Gboyega na APC enwelighi ike igosi ihe ịgba ama na-enweghi ụta ọbụla gosiri na e binyere aka karịa ọnụ ọgụgụ maka na ha egosighi akwụkwọ e ji denye aha ndị tụrụ vootu kama ọ bụ naanị igwe BVAS bụ ihe w ji ama ọnụọgụgụ ndị tụrụ vootu kpọmkwem na ntuliaka dịka iwu ntuliaka 2022 siri kwuo.
Ha kwuru na Gboyega na APC bụ naanị ndị mmadụ na otu onye ọrụ INEC ka ha chekwubere ma kpọpụta dịka ndị aka ebe.
Na mkpebi ha; “Akwụkwọ e ji edenye aha ka dị mkpa iji mata ọnụọgụgụ debanyere aha n’ebe a na-atụ vootu dị 774 a na-agbagha mana iji gosi ndị pụtara kpọmkwem ibinye aka ụbọchị ntuliaka, naanị ọnụọgụgụ BVAS ka a ga-ewe”.
Jọstis Agim kwuru; “Ụlọikpe a enweghi ike iwere okwu naanị otu onye na ihe ha depụtara n’akwụkwọ dịka ihe ịgba ama na e binyere aka karịa.
N’okwu gbasara agụmakwụkwọ Adeleke, ụlọikpe ahụ kpebikwara na ndị mere mkpesa egosighi ihe aka ebe gosiri na Adeleke ji asambodo adịgboroja dịka ụlọakwụkwọ ebe ndị ọ gara ekwughi na asambodo ya bụ nke adịgboroja Ha kwukwara na okwu gbasara asambodo ya bụ ihe ụlọikpe kpebiri kamgbe afọ 2019.

Oyetola na APC buuru mkpesa gaa ụlọikpe kachasị dịka ha chọrọ ụlọikpe ahụ mezie mkpebi ikpeazụ n’okwu a kpọm kwem.

                             Ọzụzụ a bụ otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị bụ The Refuge Foundation bụ onye kesarakwa ndị ga-erite uru nri fatịlaịza.
                                                                Onye guzobere otu ahụ bụ Oriakụ Ogonna Kanu, bụ onye kwuru okwu na ọzụzụ otu ụbọchị ahụ kwuru na ntinye aka dị mkpa iji kwado ndị IDP maka oge ihe ọkụkụ nke afọ a.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Ndị chụpụrụ n’ụlọ nna ha n’afọ 2011 n’ihi esemokwu obodo dị n’etiti ndị Afahaeduok na Ukpata megide obodo ha – Udung Ukung na Kansụl Oron.
Dị ka ya si kwuo, “Refuge Foundation na-elekwasị anya na ndị a chụpụrụ na Nigeria – ya bụ, ndị a na-amanye n’ụlọ ha n’ihi otu ihe ma ọ bụ ọzọ.                  “Anyị chọpụtara na ọnụ ọgụgụ buru ibu nke ndị a na-amanye chụpụrụ bụ ndị ọrụ ugbo na nke ahụ bụ isi ihe na-akpata ego.
                                                     Anyị malitere itinye aka na itinyekwu ihe ọmụma n’ihe ha nwere na ọrụ ugbo.
                                                                                                                                    “Anyị kwenyesiri ike na ha ga-eji ihe ọmụma anyị nyere ha mee ihe nke ọma n’ihi na tupu anyị amalite ya, anyị chọpụtara na ha nwere ugbo n’ebe ha bi ebe ha na-akọ ihe.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       “Anyị mekwara ihe iji mara ụdị ihe ọkụkụ ndị ha na-akụ ngwa ngwa na ihe ịma aka ha ka anyị wee ghara ịbịa na-egbu oge ha.”    Otú ọ dị, Kanu gbara ndị IDP ume ka ha ghara inwe olileanya na ndụ n’ihi ihe ịma aka ha dị ugbu a, kama ka ha jiri nkà ọ bụla ha nwere ike mee ka ndụ ha ka mma.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         Ọ gara n’ihu kpọkuo gọọmentị, otu, na ndị ọgaranya Naijiria ka ha na-enyekwara ndị IDP n’ofe mba ahụ aka site na ijikọ ntọala ahụ ma ọ bụ iso ha na-akpakọrịta.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Onye na-erite uru, Oriakụ Nkoyo Bassey, kelere otu NGO maka ọzụzụ a n’oge a, gbakwụnye na ihe ọmụma a nwetara ga-enye aka n’ịkwalite ihe ọkụkụ ya maka owuwe ihe ubi nke ọma n’oge a.
                                                                                                                                                                                               Onye ọzọ na-erite uru bụ Maazị Effanga Ofose toro ntọala ahụ maka ọrụ achọghị ọdịmma onwe ha naanị, ọkachasị maka inye ha ihe ọmụma na ikesa fatịlaịza ruru puku iri ise na mmadụ iri ise.

Ụlọikpe mkpesa ntuli aka nke onye isi ala ka edobere ka ịmalite tupu ọ nụ arịrịọ ndị sitere na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke 2023 emere n’abali iri abuo na ise nke Febuwari.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           Ụlọ ikpe ikpe dị n’Abuja, ga-anụ akwụkwọ mkpesa na-ama nkwupụta nke onyeisi oche-ahọpụtara Ahmed Tinubu nke All Progressives Congress (APC).
Ụlọ ọrụ Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC), n’ụbọchị mbu nke onwa Maachị, kpọpụtala Tinubu ka ọ bụrụ onyeisiala n’ihi na ndị otu ya nwetara ọtụtụ vootu n’ime ntuliaka ahụ.
                                                                                                                                                                                           Tinubu gbara nde asato na uma asato iji merie Atiku Abubakar nke Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) onye nwetara nde isii na uma itolu, Peter Obi nke Labour Party (LP) chịkọbara nde isii na uma otu na mmadụ iri na ise ndị ọzọ.
                                                                                                                         N’ịgbaghara nsonaazụ ahụ, onye na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala n’otu pati People’s Democratic Party PDP bụ Atiku Abubakar na onye otu ya na Labour Party bụ Maazị Peter Obi gbara akwụkwọ dị iche iche na-achọ ka e nye iwu kagbuo ntuliaka ahụ ma ọ bụ kwupụta na ha bụ ndị meriri na ntuliaka ahụ.
Atiku bụ onye gbachiri ekpere asaa ya n’ihe mgbakwasị ụkwụ ise, rịọrọ Ụlọikpe ntuli aka Onyeisiala ka ha kwupụta na ya bụ onyeisiala.
                                     N’aka nke ọzọ, Atiku gbara ụlọikpe ume ka ọ kagbuo ntuli aka ahụ ma nye iwu ka e mee ntuli aka ọhụrụ n’ihi ebubo eboro ebubo na-ezighi ezi na puku kwuru puku ụlọ ọrụ ntuli aka.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                      N’arịrịọ ha, Atiku na PDP rụrụ ụka n’abali mbu nke onwa ọnwa Maachị bụ mgbe e kpọpụtara Tinubu dịka onye meriri na ntuliaka ahụ, INEC ebufebeghị ma bulite rịzọọtụ niile na data nzere sitere na ngalaba ntuliaka.
                                                                                                                                   Onye na-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala nke Labour Party bụ Maazị Peter Obi, bụ onye bịara nke atọ na ntuliaka ahụ, boro ebubo na ntuliaka ahụ bụ ihe dị iche iche na-ezighi ezi gụnyere erughị eru nke Tinubu na onye zọọ ọkwa ya bụ Kashim Shettima ịzọ ọkwa ntuliaka ahụ.

Ndị otu Senate South-East Caucus, agbaala ndị All Progressives Congress (APC) ume ka ha kpọchie ndị isi oche Senate nke Mgbakọ nke iri na South-East.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 Nke a dị n’akwụkwọ ozi binyere aka n’Abuja n’ụbọchị ụka na ngwụcha ọgbakọ ọgbakọ.
                                                                                                                  N’ịgụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ, Sen.
Ifeanyi Ubah (YPP-Anambra) kpọkwara onye isi ala a họpụtara ahọpụta, Sen.
Bola Tinubu ka ọ hụ na e kenyere ọkwa ahụ na South-East.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  “Nchịkọta nchịkwa nke Tinubu na-abata ga-edozi nsogbu a site n’ịhụ na a na-enye ndị South-East ohere ịmepụta onyeisi oche Senate ọzọ.
                  “Onye isi oche a họpụtara kwesịrị ịdị na-echebara oge dị na Nigeria ma hụ na mba ahụ na-aga n’ihu na-aga n’ihu n’akụkụ nha anya, ịdị n’otu na ikpe ziri ezi na njem nke Naijiria (Hausa, Igbo, Yoruba) na mpaghara geopolitical.
                                                                                                                             “Site n’akụkụ akụkụ nke South-East site n’ịmepụta ndị na-azọ ọkwa onyeisi oche nke ndị isi ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị tupu ntuli aka n’ozuzu, nanị ụzọ a ga-esi kwụọ ụgwọ mpaghara ahụ ma nye echiche nke ịbụ onye bụ ka mpaghara ahụ mepụta nke ọzọ.
                                                                                             Onye isi oche Senate.
“Nke a ga-eweghachi obi ike nke ndị si South-East na South-South geo-political zones na n’ezie ndị Nigeria niile na ịdị n’otu nke obodo.”                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             Otu ahụ gbakwụnyere: “APC ga-ebuli elu karịa mmasị primordial na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
                                                                                                           “Ọ ga-ezere onye mmeri na-ewere ọrịa niile ma na-achụso ethno-okpukpe inclusivity na a siri ike, virile, dịrị n’otu, na-aga n’ihu, ọganihu, ziri ezi na ezi onye kwuo uche mba.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    “Agọnarị ndị South-East ohere imepụta onye isi ala Naijiria kemgbe 1966.
“South-South ewepụtala onye isi ala afọ isii ma nweekwa osote onye isi oche Senate na nchịkwa na-apụ apụ.”                                                                                                                                                                                                                    “Naanị mpaghara ndịda na-enwetabeghị ihu ọma bụ South-East.
“South-West nwere Onye isi ala, North-East nwere osote onye isi ala.
                              Ọ bụ naanị na obere ọnọdụ n’oge a nwere ike ime ka ndị South-East nwee ohere ịbụ onye isi oche nke Senate iri.
                                                                      “Anyị ekpebiela n’otu ịkwado ndị na-achọ South-East nke APC.
“Anyị na-agbasi mbọ ike ma kemgbe gbasaa mkparita uka anyị na ndị omebe iwu ndị ọzọ nwere ezi uche ahọpụtara iji gbakọta na South-East iji hụ na ikpe ziri ezi, ikpe ziri ezi na ịdị n’otu nke obodo ahụ na-emeri”.

 Otú ọ dị, ọ dịghị ihe e meriri ma.

Asọmpi nke nkeji iri na ise ga-ewepụta ndị anọ nke ọkara ikpeazụ, ndị ga-erukwa ozugbo dị ka ndị nnọchi anya Africa na asọmpi iko mba ụwa nke FIFA U17 nke afọ a.

Ọ bụ osote onye na-ekwuchitere ọnụ na-ekwuchitere nzuko ahụ duziri nzukọ a.
Na vidiyo na-efe efe, ndị otu ahụ nwere ntuli aka n’otu n’otu kwadoro nchụpụ ọkà okwu n’ihi ọtụtụ ebubo eboro ya.

N’ikpeazụ, ụlọ ahụ nọchiri osote onye na-ekwuchitere kwụsịtụrụ na Mandela Obasi, bụ onye e ṅụrụ iyi ozugbo dị ka onye nnọchiteanya ọhụrụ.

Onye ọrụ ụlọọrụ nhazi ntuliaka Naijirịa bụ Independent National Electoral Commission (Inec) nke aha ya bụ Hudu Yunusa Ari, bụkwa onye Inec kwụsiri ọrụ nwa mgbe nta abụrụla onye e ji eji ugbua.
Ozi n’aka ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị uweojii Naijirịa bụ Olumuyiwa Adejobi gbara ama nke a n’ụbọchị Tuzde a ma kwuo: “Ndị uweojii Naijriịa na-agba ama na awụchiela ọkaiwu Hudu Yunusa-Ari bụ onye rụrụ ọrụ dịka Resident Electoral Commissioner (REC) n’Adamawa steeti nke a sị kpọpụtara aha onye zọọrọ All Progressives Congressọkwa gọvanọ na ntuliaka mgbakwunye maka ọkwa gọvanọ e mechapụrụ na steeti ahụ.” “Ọkaiwu Ari onye ndị ngalaba uweojii Police Election Planning, Monitoring, and Evaluation Team nwụchiri n’Abuja n’ụbọchị Tuzde.
Bụ ụbọchị nke abụọ n’ọnwa Mee 2023 bụzị onye a na-enyocha ugbua iji mara ihe mere o jiri kpaa ụdịrị agwa a sị ọ kpara.” Nke a na-abịa dịka Ari kwuchapụrụ na mkparịtaụka ya na BBC nwere n’ụbọchị Tuzde ebe ọ nọ kwuo na ọ ga-enyefe onwe ya n’aka ndị uweojii Naijirịa.
Cheta na Inec kwụsiri Ari ọrụ nwa mgbe nta dịka e mechapụrụ ntuliaka mgbanwunye n’Adamawa steeti ebe a sị na ọ kpọpụtara aha Aishatu Dahiru Ahmed (Binani) nke APC dịka onye mmeri mana Inec kpụchapụrụ mkpọpụta ahụ ma kwuo na ọ nweghi ikike ime nke a ma mechaa kpọpụta aha gọvanọ Ahmadu Fintiri nke Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) dịka onye mmeri n’ezie.
E nyere ndị ọru nchekwa iwu ka ha nwụchie Ari dịka enweghi onye hụrụ ya maọbụ nụ olu ya kemgbe izu abụọ gara aga..
Otu abụọ jikọrọ ndị ọrụ oyibo ọnụ na Naijiria bụ Nigeria Labour Congress (NLC) na Trade Union Congress (TUC) ngalaba nke Enugwu ekwuola na ọbụghị ndị ọrụ niile na-enweta ya bụ ego opekatampe ụgwọ ọnwa bụ puku naịra iri atọ nke a na-akpọ ‘minimum wage’ na Bekee.
Ha gbakọrọ n’ụbọchị Tuzde n’ama Okpara Square dị n’Enugwu dịka a na-eme mmemme ụbọchị ndị ọrụ ma kọwa ihe ndị na-akpa ha.
Onyeisi NLC n’Enugwu bụ Maazị Fabian Nwaigbo na ogbo ya nke TUC bụ Maazị Ben Asogwa gwara ndi ntaakuko Igbo n’ama emume a na obi adịghị ha mma na ụfọdụ ndị nkuzi na ndị ọrụ okpuru ọchịchị anaghị eri ego opekatampe ahụ gọọmentị nyere iwu ya.
Ha rịọrọ gọọmentị Enugwu ka ọ hazie ya bụ ihe kpam kpam tupu ndị ọhụrụ abata n’ọchịchị.
Ọtụtụ ndị ọrụ oyibo gbakọrọ n’Okpara Square ma rịọ gọmenti etiti ka o welie aka n’ego ndị ọrụ iji mee ka ụgwọ ọnwa ndị ọrụ zuoro ha igbo mkpa.
Onye nchịkọta otu ndị ntaakụkọ nke NUJ Enugwu bụ Sam Udekwe rịọrọ ka ndị ntaakụkọ na-agbasa eziokwu ma gbaara akụkọ ụgha.
Ya bụ mmemme ụbọchị ndị ọrụ e kwesịburu ime n’ụbọchị Mọnde bịara bụrụ n’ụbọchị Tuzde na steeti ahụ maka nchekwa ndụ na akụnụba ndị Enugwu..
Onye zọrọ ọkwa onyeisiala Naịjirịa na ntuliaka 2023 n’otu Labour Party, bụ Peter Obi, akọwaala ihe mere oge ọ gara njem na mba Briten n’ọdị nso a dịka akụkọ kwuru na ndị ọrụ nchekwa jichiri ya nwa.
Akụkọ ahụ wuru ewu ihe dịka izuụka abụọ gara aga ma kwuo na ndị ọrụ nchekwa mba Briten jichiri Peter Obi maka na o ji akwụkwọ adigboroja banye na mba ahụ, ebe ụfọdụ sị na ihe e ji jichie ya bụ maka na e nwere onye ọzọ ji aha ya banye na mba ahụ.
Na mkparịtaụka nke ya na ụlọ ntaakụkọ Arise TV nwere n’ụbọchị Mọnde, Obi kwuru na akụkọ ahụ niile na-efegharị enweghị nke bụ eziokwu.
Nke a bụ nke mbụ Peter Obi na-ekwu okwu banyere akụkọ kpọmkwem ihe mere ya na London.
O kwuru na oneghị ihe ọbụla merenụ karịa nnyocha nke ndị ọrụ nchekwa na-enyocha onye ọbụla tupu ọ banye na UK.
“Ihe niile ahụ erughị nkeji 20 tupu m gawakwa ebe m na-aga n’ụbọchị ahụ,” Peter Obi kọwara.
“Ihe merenụ bụ na ndị ọrụ ‘immigration’ lere akwụkwọ m anya ma sị na ha chọpụtara ihe na-edochaghị ha anya nke mere o ji kwesị ekwesị ka ha lekwuo ya anya.” “Onye ọrụ nchekwa ahụ ji olu nwayọ na nkwanye ugwu wee kọwaara m na ọ dịka onwere onye ji aha m nọrọ na mba UK, ma gwakwa m ka uche m dị n’ihe na-emenụ.” Gbasara ebubo nke otu onye a ma ama na mpaghara Niger Delta bụ Asari Dokubo boro ma kwuo na ya nwere ihe akaebe na-egosi na Peter Obi bụ nwaafọ na mba Solomon Island bụkwa ebe o nwere ụlọ, Obi kwuru na ebubo ahụ bụ asị.
“Amaghị m ebe Solomon Island dị.
Enweghị m ụlọ ọbụla n’ebe ọbụla karịa na Naịjirịa nakwa na London bụ ebe m biri ọtụtụ afọ.
Mba ọbụla a hụrụ ụlọ ọbụla n’aha Peter Obi, ọ bụghị eziokwu,” ka ọ kọwara.
Obi tinyekwara ọnụ n’ebubo nke Mịnịsta mgbasaozi Naịjirịa bụ Lai Mohammed boro ya na osote ya bụ Datti Baba-Ahmed na ha na-achọ ịkụsa ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na Naịjirịa nke bekee na-akpọ ‘treason’.
O kwuru na ọ bụ ihe mwute na gọmentị Naịjirịa na-emefu ego n’ihe enweghị isi nke kpatara Lai Mohammed ji mefuo ego gawa mba Amerịka nakwa UK bụ ebe ọ nọrọ bo ya ebubo ‘treason’.
Obi kwukwara na foto na-efegharị na soshal midia nke na-ekwu na ya gara leta onyeisiala a họpụtara ọhụrụ bụ Bola Tinubu nke APC bụ foto adigboroja.
“Onweghị mgbe m gara hụ Tinubu, ihe ndị a bụcha akụkọ ụgha a na-ekesa iji ghọgbuo ndị nkwado m,” ka o kwuru..
Onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Micheal Imoudu National Institute for LABOR Studies, MINILS, Issa Aremu etoola Onyeisiala Bola Tinubu maka ịhọpụta onye bụbu onye mgbasa ozi mgbochi nrụrụ aka, Mallam Nuhu Ribadu ka onye ndụmọdụ nchekwa mba, NSA.
  Aremu kwuru na mmepe ahụ bụ olile anya ọhụrụ n’etiti ndị Naijiria na nhazigharị ngalaba nchekwa nke onye bụbu onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari bidoro ga-esiwanye ike.
O mere nlebanya a na Ilorin, isi obodo Kwara State nke North Central Nigeria mgbe ya na ndị nta akụkọ na-akparịta ụka n’akụkụ 2023 Ilorin Emirate Durbar.
  Mgbe ọ na-ekele Mallam Ribadu dị ka onye ndụmọdụ nchekwa mba nke iri, NSA, Aremu kwuru na “dabere na ahụmịhe na ikike,  Ribadu tozuru oke maka ọrụ inye onye isi ala ndụmọdụ n’ihe gbasara nchekwa obodo.”   “Dịka onye otu 2008 Senior Executive Course (SEC 30) nke National Institute for Policy and Strategic Studies (NIPPS) Kuru Jos, Mallam Ribadu kpugheere ya nke ọma maka ọrụ nke iwulite Naijiria ka mma.”   Aremu kwuru na “A na-anwale ya na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ka ọ mara na ihe dị n’ihe ize ndụ na-eweghachi olileanya maka ndụ echekwara na ihe onwunwe maka Nigeria na ndị Nigeria,” Aremu kwuru.
  Onye isi oche ahụ kwuru na n’ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya, ọ dị mkpa ka ụmụ amaala nwee mmetụta na-adịgide adịgide site na nkwado mgbe niile maka ndị isi a họpụtara ahọpụta na atụmanya ziri ezi maka ezigbo ọchịchị, na-agbakwụnye na President Tinubu ahọpụtala ugbu a n’etiti ndị kacha mma maka Nigeria nke ga-enwerịrị ike.
Otu onye isi otu All Progressives Congress (APC) na Delta bụ Oriakụ Veronica Adesotu arịọla onyeisiala Bola Tinubu ka ọ hụ na ndị inyom na-anọchi anya ha nke ọma na ọchịchị ya.
Adesotu, onye bụ onye malitere otu APC Female Aspirants 2022/2023 Forum mere mkpesa ahụ na Tọzdee na Abuja.
O kwuru na site n’ime nke a, Onye isi ala Tinubu ga-enye ụmụ nwanyị ohere itinye aka nke ọma n’oke ha na mmepe obodo.
Ọ sịrị; “APC Female Aspirants Forum nwere n’ogige ya ụmụ nwanyị nwere ikike ọgụgụ isi dị njikere iwepụta ọgụgụ isi na ume dị mma maka uto obodo.” Ọ sịkwara na nsonye ha n’ụlọọrụ gọọmentị na ọkwa ndị ọzọ dị oke mkpa iji kwalite obodo na iwepụta atụmatụ olileanya ọhụrụ nke Tinubu.
O kwuru na “ndị inyom APC na-eguzosi ike n’ihe kwenyere na Tinubu ga-emeri na ntuli aka nke Febụwarị 25 ọbụna mgbe ụfọdụ ndị nọ n’òtù ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ya na-enwe obi abụọ n’ikike ya.” Adesotu, onye bụbu onye na-azọ oche Aniocha North na ụlọ ọgbakọ omebe iwu Delta kwuru na ndị ndọrọndọrọ ọchịchị ụmụ nwanyị nọ na APC bụ ndị kwụnyere Tinubu kwesịrị ka e jiri nhọpụta ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị kwụọ ụgwọ ya.
Ọ dụrụ Onye isi ala Tinubu ọdụ ka ọ gbanahụ mmetụta n’ịhọrọ ndị ozi ya na ndị isi ndị ọzọ n’ọchịchị ya, na-ekwu na ọ bụ naanị ndị otu pati kwesịrị ntụkwasị obi kwesịrị ka a ga-atụle.
Adesotu kwuru na oge eruola ka Tinubu kpochapụ aha ya na mgbasa ozi ọjọọ niile a na-ebuso ya tupu ntuli aka site n’itinye atumatu na mmemme ga-eme ka ọdịmma ndị Naijiria dịkwuo mma.
O kwuputara nchekwube ya na dịka o mere mgbe ọ na-achị Legọs steeti, Onye isi ala Tinubu ga-eme akụkọ ihe mere eme wee tụgharịa akụ na ụba Naijiria..
Ndị isi otu Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) n’Edo steeti etoola Onyeisiala Bola Tinubu maka mkpebi ya iwepụ ego n’aka mmanụ ụgbọala.
Onye isi oche nke steeti ahụ, Dr.
Tony Aziegbemi, nyere otuto ahụ na Tọzdee, n’oge mkparịta ụka na ndị nta akụkọ na Benin City, isi obodo steeti ahụ.
Aziegbemi kwuru na “atụmatụ akụ na ụba abụọ a ga-enye mba ahụ ihe karịrị puku ijeri naira abụọ.” Otú ọ dị, ọ dọrọ aka ná ntị na ihe ndị na-enye aka na-esi na mwepụ ego a ga-eme ka ọ bụrụ ihe ịga nke ọma nke atumatu akụ na ụba.
“Atụmatụ akụ na ụba abụọ a bụ ụzọ kachasị mma isi na-aga gburugburu akụ na ụba nke agbadala.
Yabụ, mgbe m hụrụ ezigbo amụma akụ na ụba site n’ebe dị anya, m ga-amata, “Aziegbemi kwuru.
N’otu aka ahụ, onyeisioche pati ahụ tokwara ọchịchị Gọvanọ Godwin Obaseki na-edu ọchịchị PDP n’Edo steeti maka imezu nkwa ha kwere ndị mmadụ.
O kwuru na Gọvanọ Obaseki bụ gọvanọ a ghọtahiere nke ọma na mba ahụ, kwusie ike na ọ bụ ya kacha meere steeti ya na ụmụ amaala ya karịa gọvanọ ọ bụla ọzọ.
Aziegbemi depụtara ụfọdụ mmemme ndị mmadụ gbadoro ụkwụ na ọchịchị ahụ gụnyere mgbanwe mmụta mmụta, ahụike na teknụzụ ebe a na-azụ ndị ntorobịa n’ịmụ injinia sọftụwia.
Ọ gbakwụnyere, “N’ime afọ ise na-abịa n’Edo, anyị ga-enwe ihe karịrị 15,000 ndị injinia software zụrụ azụ nke ga-ewepụta mmemme maka ụlọ ọrụ dịka Google na ndị ọzọ.”.
Onye chịburu Naịjirịa bụ Muhammadu Buhari akọtọla akụkọ n’akụkụ ụfọdụ na ya arịọla onyeisiala bụ Bola Tinubu ka ọ ghara inyocha ndị bụbu ndị ọchịchị.
N’ozi Garba Shehu, ọnụ na-ekwuru onye isi ala Buhari, wepụtara, onye bụbu onyeisiala kwuru na akụkọ ndị dị otú ahụ bụ adịgboroja.
“Ọ bụrụ na a ga-ekwere na mgbasa ozi soshal midia, onye bụbu onyeisiala Muhammadu Buhari na-arịọ onye ga-anọchi anya ya bụ Bola Ahmed Tinubu ka ọ ghara inyocha ụfọdụ ndị isi ọchịchị ya mbụ.
“Ọ bụ adịgboroja, ka anyị ghara ikwurịta ya ma ọ bụ nye ya ume ma ọ bụ ikuku mgbasa ozi.
Nke a bụ akụkọ adịgboroja, ọ nweghịkwa ihe ọzọ.
“Ekele dịrị, ọ dịghị onye ọzọ ma e wezụga ndị isi abụọ n’ime ụlọ ha zutere, yabụ na ọ dịghị onye nọ ebe ahụ ịkọ mkparịta ụka ha,” o kwuru.
Garba Shehu kwuputara na onye bụbu onyeisiala agaghị etinye aka na ọchịchị obodo ugbu a bụ Bola Tinubu nọchiri anya ya.
“Dị ka o kwere mee, Onye isi ala mbụ chọrọ ka ọ nọrọ n’èzí ka ọ ghara ịdọpụ uche nchịkwa ọhụrụ ahụ.
“Ọ họọrọ ịla na Daura na-atụ anya ịchọta ụdị jụụ ọ chọrọ maka onwe ya mana ọ ghọtara na ọ bụghị otú ahụ, ndị ọbịa na-agbakọta n’ụtụtụ, ehihie na abalị, ọ kwagara n’ebe dị anya karị.
Ọ gbakwụnyere, “Ọ ka bụ ọchịchọ ya ka a hapụ ya ka ọ nweta ezumike ọ chọrọ, na ka ndị ọchịchị Tinubu nwee ọnọdụ kwesịrị ekwesị iji rụọ ọrụ na mmezu nke nkwa ha kwere,”  ọ gbakwụnyere..
Onye isi ala Bola Tinubu agwala ndị Naijiria ka ha ghara ịdị ngwa ngwa n’ịchọ ngwọta maka ihe ịma aka na-eche mba ahụ ihu, na-ekwu na ọ na-eme ka nwa ọhụrụ na nzọ ụkwụ ya.
Tinubu kwuru nke a n’obí Alake na Paramount Ruler nke Egbaland, Oba Adedotun Aremu Gbadebo, mgbe ọ gara leta ndị eze ọdịnala na steeti ahụ.
N’okwu ya, Onyeisiala gwara ndị Naijiria ka ha soro ya gaa n’ihe ọ kpọrọ nzọụkwụ okwukwe.
“Ka anyị gabiga nzọụkwụ okwukwe ndị a.
Ana m ewere nzọụkwụ nwa dị ka onyeisi oche.
Obodo a bụ naanị obodo anyị nwere.
Abụrụla m onye gbara ọsọ ndụ ma amaara m ihe ịbụ onye gbara ọsọ ndụ pụtara,” o kwuru.
Tinubu mesiri ndị Naijiria obi ike na ya kpebisiri ike imezu nkwa mkpọsa niile, na-akpọ maka ekpere ka o mezuru ebe ekpere ‘Emilokan’ ya.
O kwuru, “Ebe m nwetaworo ebe ekpere ‘Emilokan’, ihe m na-arịọ bụ ekpere maka obodo a.
Ekpebisiri m ike inyere obodo a aka, na-eduzi ụgbọ mmiri nke mba na imezu nkwa niile e kwere.
“Anọ m ebe a ka m na-ekwe nkwa mkpọsa ahụ.
Ọ nweghị ihe dị iche n’etiti anyị na onye ọ bụla ọzọ nke ọha Naijiria.
Ekwuru m ya na France, na anyị bụ ụmụ otu nne na nna, bi n’otu ụlọ, mana anyị na-ehi ụra naanị n’ime ụlọ ihi ụra dị iche iche.
“Ka anyị dịrị n’otu, ọ dịghị ihe ndọpụ uche.
Anyị ga-erute ebe dị mma na mba ahụ.
Ihe niile dị n’aka anyị ime akụkọ ihe mere eme na m ga-eme nke ahụ.
Site n’amara nke Chineke, anyị ga-aghọrọ mkpụrụ nke ọrụ anyị.
Naijiria ga-ahụ mgbanwe dị mma.” Mgbe ọ na-ekwu okwu na ọbịbịa ya na steeti Ogun, Tinubu kwuru na ọ bụ naanị na ọ chọrọ ịzọba n’ime, kwuo na ugbu a ọ ma ihe ịbụ onyeisiala pụtara.
O kwusiri ike na olile anya na Naijiria ka mma emeghachila ya na ọ gaghị ada.
“Ekpebisiri m ike na m ga-abịa ebe a iji kelee onye ndu ukwu, Oba Gbadebo na anyị niile nọ ebe a.
“Aremo ( Olusegun Osoba) well done; Dimeji Bankole, ime oma, (Ibikunle) Amosun, imere nke oma.
Onye isi oche nke otu anyị, enwere m ekele, ọ dịkarịa ala, anyị napụtara n’agbanyeghị ihe isi ike nke enweghị ego na mmanụ ọkụ; Ana m ekele gị.
“Nleta a, amaghị m na ọ ga-adị ka nke a.
Naanị ihe m chọrọ bụ ịpụnarịa n’ime wee pụọ; ugbu a amatala m nke ọma ihe ọ bụ ịbụ onye isi ala.
Olileanya ahụ agaghị ada ma ọlị.
Olileanya ahụ ga-ebunye ọkụ gị… “Biko, anyị chọrọ ekpere gị, anyị chọrọ nkwado gị, anyị chọrọ ntinye aka gị ka ọganihu akụ na ụba nke mba a na-emepe ga-emetụta onye ọ bụla n’ime unu nke ọma,” Onye isi ala ahụ nyefere..
Osote onyeisiala Naijiria, Kashim Shettima ekwela ndị Naijiria obi ike na ọchịchị onye isi ala Bola Ahmed Tinubu ga-edozi nsogbu akụrụngwa e ji enyere ndụ aka na mba ahụ.
VP Shettima nyere mmesi obi ike na Wenezde mgbe ọ na-asọpụrụ Shehu nke Borno, Abubakar Ibn Garbai El-Kanemi na Maiduguri, isi obodo Borno Steeti.
O kwuru na a ga-edozi nsogbu niile gbasara akụrụngwa na mba ahụ gụnyere okporo ụzọ Gamboru Ngala, Dikwa nakwa okporo ụzọ Damboa dị na Borno steeti.
Onye osote onye isi ala gwara ndị nta akụkọ okwu mgbe ha kwanyere eze ukwu ugwu.
Ọ sịrị: “Anyị soro Onye isi ala, Gọvanọ ga-ekwanyere Eze Ukwu, bụ Shehu nke Borno ugwu.
O welitere ụfọdụ okwu na-agbawa obi na-eche ọha mmadụ ihu, ọkachasị gbasara ụkọ akụrụngwa.
“Anyị zigaara ya ihe kacha mma Onye isi ala Bola Ahmed Tinubu.
“Shehu kwuru okwu gbasara okporo ụzọ ndị ekwesịrị ka e dozie ozugbo, ọkachasị okporo ụzọ Gamboru Ngala na Dikwa.
n’ezie a ga-ekwu na nke Damboa ga-ekwukwa.
“Anọ m ebe a iji mesie ya ( Shehu) obi ike maka nkwado kacha elu nke President Bola Ahmed Tinubu.
Anyị ga-alanarị nsogbu niile na-eche anyị ihu dị ka ndị mmadụ.
” N’okwu nke ya, Gọvanọ Borno steeti bụ Babagana Zulum tolitere omume ọma nke osote onye isi ala dịka onye mmadụ, onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, gbakwụnye na ịbụ nleta mbụ osote onye isi ala Shettima na steeti ahụ, “Nleta a dị oke egwu.
dị mkpa nye ndị Borno na ọ bụ ụlọ na-abịa maka nwa anyị nwoke.” N’okwu nke ya, Shehu nke Borno, Abubakar Ibn Garbai El-Kanemi, onye kwuru na Kanuri toro osote onye isi ala dịka nwa nwoke kwesịrị ekwesị nke Borno steeti, na-ekwusi ike na ịhụnanya osote onyeisiala nwere gosipụtara na nnukwu nkwado ha nyere ya.
Shehu rịọrọ nkwado nke ọchịchị Bola Tinubu ka o mee ka nsogbu okporo ụzọ ọjọọ na nsogbu nchekwa dị na steeti na mba ahụ.
O kwere nkwa na ndị obodo steeti ahụ na-akwado ọchịchị ahụ.
Osote onye isi ala natakwara onye okenye steeti Borno bụ Muhammadu Indimi n’ụlọ ya Maiduguri..
Ụlọikpe dị na mba India enyela ụmụnwaanyị na-arụ naanị ọrụ ezinaụlọ ikike iketa oke nhatanha n’akụ dị ha.
N’ikpe nke Ụlọikpe Ukwu dị na Madras na Tamil Nadu steeti, India, kpebiri na nsonso a, ụlọikpe ahụ kwuru na “ọrụ nwaanyị na-arụ n’ụlọ dịka ịlekọta ezinaụlọ na ụmụaka na nke nwoke na-arụ ịkpata ihe ezinaụlọ ya na-eri pụtara na ” ha abụọ nwere nketa nhatanha n’ihe a kpatara n’ezinaụlọ ahụ.” Mkpebi ahụ ihe pụtara ihe n’ikpe dị n’etiti di na nwunye lụrụ onwe ha n’afọ 1965 naTamil Nadu.
Nke nwoke hapụrụ India ga biri na Saudi Arabia ebe o nwetara ọrụ, ebe nwunye ya nọ n’ India na-elekọta ezinaụlọ ha.
Nwaanyị ahụ anaghị akpata ego kama o ji ego dị ya na-ezilata zụọ ọtụtụ ụlọ na ọla.
Oge di ya lọtara n’afọ 1994,o boro nwunye ya ebubo na ọ chọrọ ịkpakọrọ akụnaụba ya ma gbaa ya akwụkwọ n’ụlọikpe sị ka o nyeghachi ya akụnaụba( ụlọ anọ a zụrụ n’aha nwaanyị ahụ, ọla nakwa ihe onyinye ndị ọzọ o nyere ya dịka nwunye ya).
Nwoke ahụ sịrị na ọ bụ ya nyere nwaanyị ya ego o ji zụọ ihe ndị a ahụ nile, na ịhe nke a pụtara bụ na ya nyere ya ka o jidere ya ihe ndị ahụ nile.
Nwoke ahụ boro ebubo na nwaanyị ya zoro ọla ndị ahụ ma chọọ inyefe akụnaụba ndị ahụ nwoke ọzọ ya na ya na-ayị ka ọ na-elekọta.
N’afọ 2007, nwoke ahụ nwụrụ mana ụmụ ya gara n’ ihu n’ikpe ahụ.
N’abalị 21 nke ọnwa Juun afọ 2023, ụlọikpe kwubiri na nwunye nwoke ahụ “soro kpata akụ ahụ a na-azọ n’ihi na ọ na-arụ ọrụ ezinaụlọ nke nyere di ya ohere ịrụ ọrụ nke ya were kpata ego, na ya mere na akụ ọ kpara bụ ha abụọ nwe ya nhatanha”.
Ndị ọkacharamara n’iwu n ‘India kwuru na mkpebi ahụ ga-adị ire na nanị na steeti e kpebiri ya.
Ha kwuru na ọ ga-erua n’Ụlọikpe Kachasị na mba ahụ tupu mpaghara mba ahụ n’ile etinye n’ọrụ..
Gọvanọ Osun steeti bụ Ademola Adeleke agwaala ọha ka ha nọrọ jụụ dịka ọgbaghara dapụtacjhara n’akụkụ Osogbo nke steeti ahụ bụ ebe ọ gara sonye emume ekpere maka emume ụka alakụba nke Eid-El-Kabir.
Ụfọdụ ihe onyonyo na-efegharị na soshal midia gosiri ka obere ọgbaghara malitere ịda n’ama ekpere ahụ mana o dochaghi anya ihe nọ na-eme ebe ahụ.
Ọtụtụ kepukepu dapụtara ka akụkọ a malitere ifesa mana ozi si n’aka gọọmentị steeti ahụ kwuru na ihe ahụ mere ebe ahụ bụ ‘atụmatụ ndị nwara igbu gọvanọ” steeti ahụ.
Ozi ha kwuru na gọvanọ Ademola Adeleke na-arịọ ọha ka ha nọrọ jụụ “dịka ọ gbalahụrụ atụmatụ ndị chọrọ igbu ya n’ime ama ekpere Eid nke Osogbo.” N’ozi a nke ọnụ na-ekwuru Adeleke bụ Olawale Rasheed zipụtara, o kelere Chukwu maka etu o si zọọ ndụ gọvanọ ahụ na ndị otu ya ma nye ndị ọrụ nchekwa iwu ka a nwụchịe ndị nọ n’isi atụmatụ ahụ.
Ozi a bokwara ebubo ma rụọ pati All Progressives Congress, APC aka dịka ọ kpọrọ ihe a mere “nkata akpara akpa iji wakpoo gọvanọ na’ama ekpere nke si n’aka ndị APC”.
Ozi a gakwara n’ihu rụọ sịnetọ Ajibola Bashiru aka dịka o kwuru na ọ bịara nọchịe ebe gọvanọ kwesịrị ịnọ ma jụ ịpụ ebe ahụ agbanyeghi na a rịrọrọ ya ugboro ugboro.
A gara n’ihu kọwa na ụfọdụ ndị pati PDP nwara ịgbachitere gọvanọ natara iti ihe nke mere ya bụ ọgbaghara jiri dapụta.
Gọọmentị steeti kọwara na ndị agbaro bucha ngwa ọgụ wụbatara n’ihe ama ekpere ahụ ma gbaa ama na ozi si n’aka ndị ọrụ nchekwa kọwara na ndị ahụ bịara igbu gọvanọ ahụ.
Ọtụtụ ihe onyonyo pụtara ebe gọvanọ ahụ na-agbapụ ama ekpere ahụ.
Otu APC nke nọ na Osun arụọla gọvanọ Ademola Adeleke na ndị ha kpọrọ ‘ndị agboro” na-akwado otu PDP aka ma na-ekwu na ha bụ ndị agboro na ndị ọrụ nchekwa wụbata ama ekpere nke Okebale Osogbo.
Dịka onyeisi oche APC bụ Sooko Tajudeen Lawal siri kwuo, ọ kọwara na n’ime ozi onye ọrụ mgbasaozi ha bụ Kola Olabisi zipụtara na gọvanọ ahụ na ndị ọrụ ya wụbatara ama ekpere ahụ gwaa otu onyeisi obodo ahụ bụ Tunde Badmus nakwa sịnetọ Ajibola Bashiru ka ha bilie ebe ha nọ ma chọọ ebe ọzọ tukwuru.
Ha boro ebubo na e ji aka ike chọrọ ịkwapụ Badmus na Sịnetọ Bashiru ebe ha nọ n’ama ekpere ahụ ma kwukwa na gọvanọ nyere iwu ka a nwụchịe ha abụọ.
Ha gara n’ihu kwuo na okwu isi na a nwara igbu gọvanọ bụ “okwu na achịtaghị aja” maka kwuo na nke a bụ n’ihi gọvanọ apụtaghị ma ncha n’ụgbọala ya..
N’ime abalị nke abụọ so ọgbaghara na-ada na France bụ nke dapụtara n’ihi egbe ndị uweojii gbara otu nwata nwoke onye ọkwọ ụgbọala dị afọ 17, ndị uweojii anwụchịela mmadụ 150 iji dajụọ ihe na-eme ahụ.
Ndị uweojii gbara nwata nwoke a nke aha ya bụ Nahel M egbe ebe ọ nọ ha nso ma jụ irubere iwu okporoụzọ isi.
N’obodo Nanterre bụ ebe a gbara Nahel egbe, ndị mmadụ ji iwe mụnye ụgbọala ndị uweojii ọkụ dịka ndị uweojii tụrụ gaasị anya mmiri akwa ebe ahụ iji chụsaa ndị mmadụ.
N’akụkụ Mons-en-Barœul nke Lille, ndị mmadụ wubara ama ọgbakọ nọ ebe ahụ wakpoo ya ma mụnye ya ọkụ.
Minista na-ahụ maka ihe na-eme n’ime obodo kọwara ihe a mere dịka ‘abalị nke ọtụtụ tigbuo zọgbuo dapụtara megide mba anyị” Onyeisiala Emmanuel Macron sonyere ọgbakọ gbatagbata e hibere maka ihe a ma kwuo na ya bụ agwa “enweghi isi”.
Nahel bụ onye agbụrụ France na Algeria dịka otu onye siri gwaa ụlọ ntaakụkọ Reuters.
Nnyocha ha gosiri na ndị na-anwụkarị n’aka ndị uweojii na mba ahụ na-abụkarị ndị isi ojii maọbụ ndị agbụrụ Arab.
Ụdịrị ihe dị etu a emebuola na mba ahụ n’afọ 2005 mgbe ọgbaghara so ngagharịiwe dapụtara na ihe mmadụ abụọ nwụrụ ebe ha na-agba ọsọ ka ha gbafuoro ndị uweojii..
Onyeisiala Bola Ahmed Tinubu GCFR ga-eme njem na Ogun steeti na Tọzdee, abalị iri abụọ na itoolu ọnwa Juun, 2023.
Onye ndu Naijiria ga-eleta ndị eze steeti ahụ, Alake nke Egbaland, Oba Adedotun Gbadebo, na Abeokuta, isi obodo steeti yana onye ọchịchị Awujale na Paramount nke Ijebuland, Oba Sikiru Adetona na Ijebu-Ode.
Onye enyemaka Gọvanọ Dapo Abiodun bụ Babatunde Olaotan kwupụtara nke a n’ozi ịkpọ òkù ezigara ndị isi na ndị nkwado All Progressives Congress (APC) n’ụbọchị Wenezde.
“Gọvanọ Dapo Abiodun – CON ji obi ụtọ na-akpọ gị ka ị nabata Onye isi ala, Bola Ahmed Tinubu – GCFR onye ga-eleta anyị echi, 29th nke June, 2023 na Ijebu-Ode na Abeokuta.
“Ndị isi pati anyị niile, ndị okenye na ndị nkwado na Ogun East Senatorial District kwesịrị ịgbakọ n’ebe Awujale n’elekere 8:30 nke ụtụtụ ebe ndị isi otu anyị, ndị okenye, ndị otu na ndị nkwado na Ogun Central na Ogun West ga-ezukọ n’ebe Alake n’elekere 10:30 nke ụtụtụ.” A ga-echeta na nleta ikpeazụ nke President Tinubu na steeti ahụ bụ na Jenụwarị 25, 2023, mgbe ụgbọ oloko mkpọsa onyeisiala ya wakporo Abeokuta, isi obodo Ogun State..
Otu jịkọrọ ndị Yoroba a kpọrọ Afenifere akpọkuola onyeisiala Bola Ahmed Tinubu ka o jiri ọsọ kwụsị atụmatụ itinye ego n’ụgwọ ọkụ latrik nakwa itinye ụtụisi maka ndị nwere ụgbọala na “atụmatụ mmekpa ahụ” ndị ọzọ Gọọmentị na-akwado itinye.
Ozi nke odeakwụkwọ mgbasaozi otu Afenifere bụ Jare Ayayi binyere aka ma zitere NDI NTA AKUKO Igbo n’ụbọchị Tozde kwuru na nke ga-eme ka ọnọdụ ihe isi ike nke ụmụ Naijiria nọ na ya kawanye njọ.
Ajayi, onye sịrị na nnu na-achọzị ịṅa ofe kwuru sị, “Afenifere tooro ụfọdụ nzọpụ ụkwu nke ọchịchị Tinubu zọpụrụ n’ime otu ọnwa o jiri banye n’ọkwa maka na ha nwere ike ịkwalite ụmụ Naijiria n’ọdịnihu mana ọ dị mkpa ịhụ na ndị mmadụ ekubighị tupu ihe ọma a na-atụ anya ya abịa ,ṅdị mmadụ na-ekubizi ume n’ihi ụfọdụ atụmatụ Tinubu.” Afenifere rụtụrụ aka na “ndị ụlọọrụ na-ekesa ọkụ latrik bụ ‘Electricity Distribution Companies’ (Discos) mara ọkwa na ha ga-eji pasent 40% bulie ego ọkụ latrik malite n’abalị mbụ nke ọnwa Julai, afọ 2023.
“N’otu aka ahụ ụlọọrụ Gọọmentị Etiti na-anakọ ụtụisi bụ Federal Government Joint Tax Board’ kwukwara na onye ọbụla nwere ụgbọala ga-amalite ịkwụ otu puku naira kwa afọ iji nweta asambodo na-egosi na ọ bụ ya nwe ụgbọala.” Afenifere bụ ndị gbarụrụ ihu maka atụmatụ ndị a,sịrị na e nwelarị ụtụisi dị iche iche ụmụ Naijiria na-akwụ dịka akwụkwọ ikike ịkwọ ụgbọala, akwụkwọ ụgbọala tozuru ịgba n’okporoụzọ.
Afenifere katọkwara atụmatụ ọhụrụ nke Ụlọakụ Etiti (CBN)wepụtara nke nyere ndị ụlọakụ ọha iwu ka ha nata ndị ahịa ha akara soshal midia ha, sị na nke a bụ ụlọọrụ gọọmentị ịta ndị mmadụ ahụhụ maka gọọmentị ịkpụ afọ n’ala n’ọrụ ha.” Otu ahụ rụtụrụ aka na-agbanyeghị na gọọmentị tinyere iwu ka onye ọbụla nwere ekwentị tinye akara njirimara nwamala bụ ‘National Identity Number (NIN)’ na akara ụlọakụ ya Bank Verification Number (BVN), sị na ọ bụ ụzọ ha ga-esi ebelata nsogbu ndị ntọ, na nsogbu ndị ntọ ka na-aga n’ihu kemgbe afọ anọ e tinyere ya bụ iwu..
Ụlọikpe mba Briten ekpebiela na atụmatụ gọọmentị mba ahụ ibuga ndị na-agba ọsọ ndụ gbatara mba ahụ mba Rwanda megidere iwu.
Ọkaikpe Lord Burnett bụ onye kwupụtara mkpebi Ụlọikpe Mkpegharị mba ahụ mere ụbọchị Tozde sịrị na, “Mkpebi nke ndịisi Ụlọikpe na-ekwu na usoro nhazi mbịarambịara Rwanda etozughị etozu nke mere na ụfọdụ ndị na-agba ọsọ ndụ e ziga ha Rwanda nwere ikpe akpọghachiha mba ha bụ ebe e nwere ikpe ịkpagbu ha.” Otu na-agba mbọ maka ikike ndị na-agba ọsọ ndụ a kpọrọ ‘Asylum Aid’ etoola mkpebi Ụlọikpe Mkpegharị Briten sị na “O gosiri mkpa iso usoro iwu nakwa ime onye ka e mere ibe ya n’ebe okwu ikike dịịrị onye dị.” Mana Praim Minista Briten bụ Rishi Sunak kwuru na ya ekwetaghị na mkpebi ahụ, na ha ga- agbbagha n’ụlọikpe.
Cheta na Gọọmentị Briten wepụtara atụmatụ iziga ndị na-agba ọsọ ndụ gbatara Briten mba Rwanda dị n’Ọwụị̀a Anyanwụ Afrika bụ ebe ha ga-anọ enyocha ma ihe na-eyi ndụ egwu ọ na-achụ ha n’ezie tupu a nabata ha mba Briten maọbụ zichighaa ha mba ha si..
A na-atụ anya na Onyeisiala mba Fransị bụ Emmanuel Macron ga-akpọ ọgbakọ nke ndị isi ọchịchị mba ahụ iji tulee ma a ga-etinye ọnọdụ gbatagbata iji kwụsị ọgbaaghara na’aga n’ihu ugbua na mpaghara dị icheiche.
Nke a na-abịa dịka ọgbaaghara na mba Fransị banyere ụbọchị nke atọ ugbua dịka ndị uweojii gbagburu otu nwata nwoke aha ya bụ Nahel M, onye dị afọ 17 dịka ọ jụrụ ịkwụsị oge ndị uweojii na-ajụ ya ajụjụ n’okporoụzọ.
Ọtụtụ ndị mmadụ, tinyere onyeisiala Macron, akatọọla etu ndị uweojii si gbuo nwata nwoke ahụ ma kwuo na a malitela nnyocha maka ya, mana otu jikọrọ ndị uweojii kwuru na ọ dịghị mma etu onyeisiala si katọọ ndị uweojii na-echeghị ka mpụtara nnyocha ahụ pụta.
Osote onyeisi Sineti mba Fransị bụ Roger Karoutchi depụtara n’akara Twitter ya na ọ ga-abụ nnukwu mmehie ma ọ bụrụ na gọọmentị etinyeghị ọnọdụ gbatagbata Ọnọdụ gbatagbata bụ akụrụngwa gọọmentị na-eji egbochi ọnọdụ ọbụla nwereike itinye mba ha maọbụ mpaghara ọbụla n’ihe egwu.
ọ na-enye ndị ọrụ nchekwa ohere ịmachi mkpagharị n’ebe ụfọdụ ma gbochikwaa ndị mmadụ ịgbakọ ebe ọbụla.
Ka ọ dị ugbua, ọtụtụ ụgbọala, ụlọahịa nakwa ụlọ dị icheiche, ọ kachasị nke ndị gọọmentị alaala n’iyi, dịka ndị ntorobịa na-eme ngagharịiwe na-agba ihe niile ha hụrụ ọkụ.
Mana akụkọ kwuru na ndị ekperima jikwa ohere ahụ na-awakpo ụlọahịa ndị mmadụ na-ebukọrọ ihe dị ebe ahụ.
Otu nwaanyị onye nwere ụlọahịa ebe ọ na-ere sịgaretị gwara ndi nta akuko na ya hụrụ ndị ntorobịa wakporo ụlọahịa ya n’abalị ụbọchị Mọnde, kpokọrọ sịga niile ọ na-ere.
Ndị uweojii sị na ha ejichiela ihe ruru mmadụ 667 bụ ndị so emebi ihe n’ọgbaaghara ahụ.
Onyeisiala Emmanuel Macron ahapụkwala ọgbakọ nke ọ na-esonye na ya n’obodo Brussels nke mba Belgium iji laghachi Fransị maka ọgbaaghara a.
Chetakwa na ọgbaghara dakwara na Fransị n’ọnwa Maachị afọ a, dịka gọọmentị wepụtara atụmatụ ọhụrụ gbasara ịkwụ ụgwọ ndị larala ezumike nka..
Onyeisiala mba Sierra Leone bụ Julius Maada Bio enwetala mmeri na ntuliaka ọkwa onyeisiala mba ahụ bụ nke e mere n’ụbọchị Satọde, Jun 24, 2023.
Ụlọọrụ nhazi ntuliaka bụ ‘Electoral Commission of Sierra Leone’ kpọpụtara na Bio nke ‘Sierra Leone Peoples Party (SLPP) nwetara vootu 1,566,932, nke bụ pasentị 56 na ụma nke vootu niile a tụrụ na ntuliaka ahụ.
Onye gbara onye nke abụọ bụ Samura Kamara nke ‘All Peoples Congress’ (APC) nwetara vootu 1,148,262 nke bụ pasentị 41 na ụma nke vootu niile a tụrụ.
Dịka iwu si dị, mmadụ ga-enwetarịrị vootu gafere pasentị 55 iji bụrụ onyeisiala, ma ọ bụghị ya a ga-enwe agba nke abụọ nke ntuliaka ahụ.
Mana nke a na-abịa dịka ndị otu nlekọta ntuliaka dị icheiche nke gụnyere ndị ‘European Union’ nakwa ‘Commonwealth’ kwuru na ntuliaka ahụ nwere ụfọdụ nrụrụaka, ma bụrụkwa nke ọgbaghara dị icheiche dị na ya.
Ndị APC boro ebubo na ndị ọrụ nchekwa gbara egbe n’ogige isi ụlọọrụ ha oge Mazi Kamara na-agwa ndị ntaakụkọ okwu ebe ahụ n’ụbọchị Sọnde.
Kamara bokwara ebubo na e nwere izu ohi vootu nakwa ịkpachị ndị mmadụ ịtụ vootu na mpaghara ụfọdụ.
Mana ụlọọrụ ECSL kwuru na ha tinyere atụmatụ dị icheiche iji gbochie nrụrụaka na ntuliaka ahụ..
Gọvanọ Gombe steeti bụ Muhammadu Yahaya kelere ndị Alakụba nọ na steeti ahụ na n’akụkụ ụwa niile maka mmemme emume Eid Al-Adha nke afọ a, na-akpọku ha ka ha na-ejupụta mmụọ ịchụ aja, nrube isi na ndidi.
Gọvanọ, n’ozi Sallah ya zigaara ndị mmadụ, kwuru na ọ dị mkpa ka a na-arịọsi uche Chineke arịrịọ ike n’ọnọdụ niile.
Ọ dụnyere ndị Alakụba ume ka ha na-ekpe ekpere maka udo, nchekwa na ọganihu nke steeti na mba n’ozuzu, karịsịa oge ọhụrụ.
Gọvanọ Yahaya, bụkwa onye isi oche otu ndị gọvanọ steeti ugwu, gbara ndị ụka Alakụba ume ka ha jiri oge ahụ na-esetịpụ aka nkwado na igosi ịhụnanya na ezi agbata obi dịka onye amụma Ibrahim (AS) gosipụtara ma kwadoo onye amụma Muhammad (PBUH).
Ọ sịrị; “Ka anyị na-eme ememme Eid el-Kabir, achọrọ m ịdọ anyị aka ná ntị ka anyị tụgharịa uche na ozi na nkuzi nke oge nke na-akụzi nrubeisi zuru oke, nrubeisi na enweghị onwe.
Anyị ga-emerịrị ụkpụrụ nke Islam nke na-akwalite udo, ndidi, obi umeala, na ịhụnanya.” Gọvanọ Yahaya kwuru na ndị Alakụba kwesịkwara ịnọgide na-achụ àjà maka uto na mmepe nke Gombe State na Nigeria, karịsịa n’oge a dị egwu.
Gọvanọ Gombe steeti kelere ụlọ ọrụ ọdịnala, obodo na ndị isi okpukperechi, na ndị obodo niile maka nkwado na nghọta ha.
Ọ kwughachiri mkpebi ọchịchị ya ka ọ gaa n’ihu na-enye nduzi dị mma ma mee ka uru ndị e nwetara ugbu a dekọrọ maka echi ka mma..
Onye isi ala Bola Tinubu esola ndị Naijiria ṅụrịa ọṅụ ka ha na-eme mmemme Eid Al-Adha.
N’ozi e wepụtara na Tuzdee, Onyeisiala gwara ndị Alakụba na ndị Naijiria ndị ọzọ ka ha mụbaa ọrụ ọma ha.
Ọ sịrị: “M na-esonyere ndị Alakụba nọ na Naịjirịa na n’ụwa niile na emume Eid Al-Adha.
Anyị ga-ekele Chineke Pụrụ Ime Ihe Nile maka amara ịhụ Eid ọzọ.
“Ka anyị na-emikpu onwe anyị n’ọńụ nke oge a ma na-eme emume, ka anyị cheta ndị nwere ike ha agaghị enwe ohere dị ka anyị.
“Na-abịa dị ka njedebe nke mmemme okpukpe na-ewe ụbọchị iri mbụ nke ọnwa Islam nke Dhul Hijjah, Eid-el-Kabir na-agba anyị ume dị ka ndị Alakụba ime ebere na ọmịiko n’ebe ụmụ mmadụ ibe anyị nọ.” Àjà Onye isi ala Tinubu nyekwara ndị Naijiria ka ha na-etu mmụọ ịchụ aja n’ọnọdụ nke oge.
“Eid Al-Adha bụ ememe nke ịchụ àjà na nrubeisi zuru oke nye Allah dị ka ihe atụ n’omume pụrụ iche nke onye amụma Ibrahim.
“Enweghị mmetụta dị ukwuu nke ọrụ e dekọrọ n’akụkọ ihe mere eme na-abụghị ihe atụ mara mma nke onye amụma Ibrahim n’ịchụ naanị nwa ya nwoke Ismail dị ka àjà nye Allah.
“Ụzọ kacha mma anyị ga-esi gosi ihe atụ a bụ n’otú anyị si akpa àgwà n’ihe gbasara ụmụ amaala ibe anyị nakwa n’ọrụ anyị na-arụ n’obodo anyị anyị hụrụ n’anya.
Anyị aghaghị imbibe ma gosipụta ụkpụrụ ndị ahụ dị na ndụ onye amụma Ibrahim, ya bụ; nraranye zuru oke nye Allah, ndidi, ndidi, ntachi obi, achọghị ọdịmma onwe onye nanị, ịhụnanya na ọmịiko.
“N’oge a, ka anyị gbalịsie ike na-amụba omume ọma site n’obiọma anyị nye ndị Alakụba ibe anyị na ndị ọzọ site n’inyere na ịkwado ndị na-adịghị ike na ndị na-adịghị ike na obodo anyị.
Site n’ime otú ahụ, anyị na-egosipụta ụkpụrụ na omume ọma nke okwukwe anyị.” o kwuru.
Ihe ịma aka Onye isi ala mesiri ndị Naijiria obi ike na ihe ịma aka na-eche mba ahụ ga-agabiga.
“Ugbu a, obodo anyị na-enwe ụfọdụ ihe ịma aka karịsịa na ọnọdụ akụ na ụba anyị na-agbasi mbọ ike na nsogbu ịma aka nchekwa.
“Mgbe m na-ekweta na ihe ndị a niile, achọrọ m ime ka obi sie gị ike na ha abụghị ndị a na-apụghị imeri emeri.
Mụ na ndị otu m na-arụ ọrụ ehihie na abalị, na-edozi ihe ngwọta.
Anyị amalitela na mkpebi ndị e mere ugbu a, iji gbanwee akụ na ụba anyị ma wepụ ihe mgbochi niile na uto.
“Dịka anyị na-anabata ihe ịma aka ndị dị ugbu a, anyị ga-eji ume na olileanya ọhụrụ chere ọdịnihu ihu site n’inwe obi ike na echi anyị ga-aka mma ma na-egbuke egbuke.
Ọ kwara ndị Naịjirịa niile na-eme emume ezumike nke ọma..
Onyeisiala Bola Tinubu ekwupụtala obi ekele ya dị ukwuu nye ndị Naijiria maka nnabata dị ukwuu a nabatara ya na Legọs na Tuzdee, na-ebugara ndị Naijiria niile obi ụtọ ya n’oge mmemme Eid-al-Adha.
Onyeisiala ahụ nwetara nnabata ọgbaghara site n’aka nnukwu igwe mmadụ ndị Naijiria ka ọ laghachiri Legọs, ka ọ gara njem abalị asaa ya na mba ofesi.
Ọ gara Paris, France ịga nzụkọ ahụ na “A New Global Financing Pact” ma meekwa nleta nzuzo na London, United Kingdom.
Ka ndị otu Onye isi ala Tinubu siri na Ikeja na-aga n’ụlọ obibi ya dị na Bourdillon, Ikoyi, ndị Legọs kwụwara n’okporo ụzọ si Murtala Muhammed International Airport (MMIA), ji ịnụ ọkụ n’obi na-efegharị ma na-egosipụta ọṅụ ha.
Nke a bụ nleta mbụ Onye isi ala gara Legọs kamgbe ewepụtara ya dị ka onye isi ala Naịjirịa nke iri na isii na Mee 29, 2023.
Mgbe ọ bịarutere na ngalaba onyeisi oche nke MMIA, Gọvanọ Babajide Sanwo-Olu nke Lagos State, onyeisi ndị ọrụ na President, Femi Gbajabiamila, Acting Inspector-General of Police, Olukayode Egbetokun, National Security Adviser, Nuhu Ribadu, Senators na nnọchiteanya si Lagos.
Steeti, yana ndị isi pati ahụ nabatara Onyeisi Tinubu nke ọma.
Ngalaba 81 nke ndị agha Naịjirịa na ndị ọrụ sitere na ndị agha mmiri Naịjirịa na ndị agha ụgbọ elu Naịjirịa gbakwasara ya ugwu, ebe ndị otu guzoro na Lagos State Council for Arts and Culture na-anabata ndị ọbịa.
Onye isi ala Tinubu kwesịrị isonyere ndị ụka Alakụba ibe ya maka ekpere Eid ụbọchị Wednesde na Ogige Ekpere Eid Obalende, nke dị na Dodan Barracks, bụbu oche ọchịchị Naijiria..
Ihe karịrị nde mmadụ abụọ na ọkara ndị Alakụba si n’akụkụ ụwa niile, gụnyere Naijiria, taa Tuzdee  ọnwa Juun dị n’abalị iri abụọ na asaa gbakọtara n’ugwu Arafat nke Saudi Arabia ime akụkụ kachasị mkpa na mmemme Hajj.
Ndị njem ala nsọ gụnyere 95,000 ndị mere njem nke afọ a si Naijiria na 3,740 si Steti Kwara dị na mgbago ugwu Naiiria.
Ụbọchị Arafah bụ otu n’ime ụbọchị kachasị mkpa na kalenda ndị Alakụba.
Ọ bụ ụbọchị nke itoolu nke ọnwa Dhul Hijjah na ụbọchị tupu Eid al-adha.
Pụrụ iche na kacha mma ụbọchị A na-ewere ụbọchị Arafah dị ka ọnụ ọgụgụ kasị elu nke mmega ahụ Hajj, n’ihi na a na-ewere ụbọchị ahụ dị ka ụbọchị pụrụ iche na nke kachasị mma n’ime ụbọchị 365 nke afọ.
A na-atụ anya na ndị njem ala nsọ ga-anọ n’ugwu nsọ a site n’ụtụtụ ruo n’oge mgbede (site n’ọwụwa anyanwụ ruo na nso anyanwụ dara) ma a na-atụkwa anya na ha ga-arịọsi arịrịọ ike zuru oke taa ebe ndị na-adịghị eso Hajj na-adụ ọdụ ka ha buru ọnụ n’ụbọchị a.

Anyị ga-eleba anya n’ihe e meworo ma wuo ya elu.

Garba Shehu bụbu ọnụ na-ekwuru Muhammadu Buhari bụbu Onyeisiala Naịjirịa akọwaala ihe mere ha jiri aghara iwepụ ego enyemaka mmanụ ụgbọala bụ ‘subsidy’.
Shehu kwuru nke a n’ime otu ọnwa Buhari nyefere Bola Tinubu ọchịchị onyeisiala sị na ha mere iji chere oge kachasị mma.
“Anyị hazichara atụmatụ iwepu ego enyemaka mmanụ ụgbọala ma dosa ya maka oge kachasị mma iji wepụ ya.
“Ọ dịghị mma iwepụ ya n’oge obi kooro onye ọbụla n’elu na Naịjirịa, o nweghi onye ndu uche ya zuruoke ga-akwanye nkụ n’ọkụ na-enwu enwu.” Mgbe a jụrụ ya ihe mere Onyeisiala Tinubu jiri wepụ ya n’otu ntabi anya ọ bara ọchịchị, Shehu na ọ naanị ọchịchị banyere ọhụrụ nwereike ime nke a.
“Ịgwa gị eziokwu Buhari agaghị eme ụfọdụ mkpebi ga-amaja obodo na ngwụcha ọchịchi ya maka na APC chọrọ imeri na ntuliaka.” O kwuru na a gaara achụpụ pati nọ n’ọchịchị n’ọkwa ma ọ bụrụ na ha mere mkpebi banyere mwepu ‘subsidy’ mmanụ ụgbọala.
“Ugbua ntuliaka gachara ma e nwee onye ndu aka siri ike nwereike idu obodo gaa n’ihu.
Obi siri anyị ike na ọ ga-eme mkpebi ndị a siri ike banyere akunaụba.
Shehu gara n’ihu kwuo na ọ bụ eziokwu na Buhari ewepughi ego enyemaka mmanụ ụgbọala kama na o nwere ego enyemaka ndị ọzọ o wepụrụ.
Ndị a gụnyere; ‘subsidy ọkụ latrik’, nke fatịlaịza, nke ndị njem ala nsọ, nke mmanụ dịzụlụ nakwa nke kerozin..

Dọkịta Tajudeen Abbas kwuru na ọ bụ ihe nwute nke ukwuu na ndị mmadụ na ezinaụlọ ha hụrụ onwe ha n’ọnọdụ siri ike.
Ọkà okwu ahụ nwere ọmịiko n’ebe ndị bi na Trademore Estate maka ihe ọjọọ ahụ merenụ.
O chetara na ụlọ ọrụ gọọmentị nke ahụ metụtara tupu oge mmiri ozuzo mara ọkwa nye ọha na eze maka idei mmiri n’akụkụ ụfọdụ nke mba ahụ, na-ekwu na ọha na eze ga-aṅa ntị n’ịdọ aka ná ntị dị otú ahụ.
Ọkà okwu Abbas kpọkuru ndị ọchịchị ka ha gbanahụ n’ọrụ iji gbochie nlọghachi nke ihe ahụ merenụ.
Ọ kwughachiri mkpa ọ dị ka ọha na eze mee ihe niile dị mkpa iji zere ebe idei mmiri na-enwe.
Ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ihe mberede FCT (FEMA) ekwuola na Fraịde kwuru na mmadụ 116 bụ idei mmiri ahụ metụtara..
Ndị otu Commonwealth Observer Group gbasara n’ofe Sierra Leone ka ha hụ ntuli aka ya ka ebe ntụli aka meghere na mba ahụ.
Onye isi oche otu ahụ, onye bụbu osote onye isi ala Naijiria, Ọkammụta Yemi Osinbajo nọ na isi obodo, Freetown, ịhụ ndị mbụ mere ntụli aka ha.
Ọkammụta Osinbajo kwuru na “Ọ bụ ụbọchị ntuli aka na Sierra Leone.
N’oge chi ọbụbọ, agara m ọtụtụ ụlọ ọrụ ịtụ vootu ma m nọ ugbu a n’ebe etiti obodo Freetown, na-ele anya ka ndị ntuli aka na-eji ikike ha eme ihe.
Ndị otu m ndị ọzọ na-agbasa na mba ahụ iji gbaa akaebe na ilekọta omume nke usoro ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya.
” Ọ duru ndị Commonwealth Observer Group na Fraịde gaa na Bintumani Conference Center ebe ha zutere Commissioners nke Independent Commission for Peace and National Cohesion na Human Rights Commission nke Sierra Leone.
Ha gara n’ọnụ ụlọ ọnọdụ ha wee kparịta ihe ha chọpụtara gbasara ọnọdụ tupu ntuliaka, nchegbu na nkwado ha.
Ndị so na Commonwealth Observer Group bụ onye bụbu onyeisiala Naịjirịa bụ Goodluck Jonathan.
Ndị Sierra Leone na-atụ vootu na ntuli aka izugbe na-eso mkpọsa ọgba aghara nke ime ihe ike mebiri.
Ụlọ ọrụ mepere n’ime oge n’ọtụtụ ebe ịtụ vootu mana ịtụ vootu, n’ihi njedebe n’elekere 5.00 nke mgbede GMT, malitere n’isi ụtụtụ na Wilberforce Barracks, ebe ịtụ vootu na isi obodo Freetown.
Ihe dị ka nde mmadụ 3.4 ka a na-atụ anya ịhọpụta n’etiti mmadụ iri na atọ ga-azọ ọkwa onyeisiala, gụnyere Julius Maada Bio nke nọ n’ọchịchị.
Ndị ntuli aka ahụ na-ahọrọ onye isi ala, ndị omeiwu na ndị kansụl na ntuli aka nke ise nke mba West Africa kemgbe agha obodo kwụsịrị n’afọ 2002..
Onye ndeba aha nke Joint Admissions and Matriculation Board JAMB, Ọkammụta Ishaq Oloyede kwuru na ụmụ akwụkwọ dị 557,626 bụ ndị na-achọ nnabata n’ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu site na nde na ụma asatọ abanyela n’ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu n’ofe mba ahụ na usoro nbanye akwụkwọ afọ 2022.
Ọkammụta Oloyede kwuru nke a na Nzuko amụma 2023 na nnabata n’ime ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum dị na Abuja Satọde.
Onye na-edeba aha ahụ gbakwụnyere na usoro nnabata 2022 ka na-aga n’ihu n’ihi ohere enyere ụfọdụ ndị isi na ngalaba ahụ iji mee nnabata.
Ọkammụta Oloyede bụ onye kagburu echiche ndị ọha na eze na-enye nnabata nke JAMB, kwuru na nnabata na-adabere na nnweta nke ndị na-eme ntuli aka, yana ihe achọrọ ọkwa ise dị ka UTME bụ naanị maka nnabata ogo.
“Dị ka ọnwa June 19, ụlọ akwụkwọ mahadum anabatala ndị 557,626 mana ka anyị na-ekwu taa, nnabata ahụ ruru 600,000 ka anyị na-achọ ihe dị ka 700,000.
Nke a bụ n’ihi na nnabata ka na-aga n’ihu.
“Anyị na-anụ maka akara mbelata nke JAMB mana nke bụ eziokwu bụ na ọ bụghị onye kacha mma nwetara akara kacha elu na UTME bụ onye kacha mma.
“Nbanye sitere na nsonaazụ ọkwa ise O’ nke onye ndoro-ndoro nwere n’ihi na anyị na-eji UTME maka ọkwa nnabata.
JAMB ebidobeghị nnabata kemgbe afọ 2016,” o kwuru.
Ọdịiche dị na nnabata N’ikwu okwu banyere oghere dị na ohere nnabata na ihe kpatara na anabataghị ndị a na-eme ntuli aka, Oloyede kwuru na nkwụsi ike nke nhọrọ mmemme na adabaghị nke ọchịchọ na ọkọnọ bụ ihe kpatara ya.
O depụtakwara enweghị mmasị na ohere ndị dị ugbu a na ndị na-aga ikpe (No O’ larịị results ma ọ bụ na-echere nsonaazụ) dị ka ndị na-ahụ maka oghere nnabata na ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị.
Dị ka ya si kwuo, “ndị ọrụ ahụ ghaara ụlọ ọrụ ụgha iji chọpụta akara UTME Minimum Tolerable UTME, nke a na-akpọkarị ‘Cut-off marks'” Onye ode akwụkwọ na-adịgide adịgide nke, Federal Ministry of Education, David Adejo, gbara ndị na-ahụ maka aka aka ka ha hụ na izi ezi, nghọta, na ịza ajụjụ n’ime usoro nnabata nke kpebiri ọdịnihu nke nde ụmụ akwụkwọ.
Adejo kpọkuru ndị na-etinye aka na nnabata ka ha hụ na ha nwere ntụkwasị obi na usoro a ka a ghara ịgọnarị onye ọ bụla, yana onye kwesịrị ekwesị, ka e nyere ya.
“Mịnịstrị na-ahụ maka agụmakwụkwọ gọọmentị etiti ekpebiela na ụkpụrụ bụ isi nke mịnịstrị ahụ bụ imeghe ma nke a bụ JAMB nyere site na itinye aka na UTME.
” JAMB ga-ahụrịrị na ịdị ọcha na iguzosi ike n’ezi ihe nke ule na nnabata ga-adabere na ụkpụrụ ekwenyero iji mekwuo nkwubi okwu, nghọta na izi ezi.
“Njirimara maka nnabata ka JAMB dị oke mkpa na ụlọ ọrụ niile ga-erubere ha isi ka anyị kwesịrị ịrapara na oke akwadoro maka nnabata,” o kwuru.
Ozi ọma Na ozi obi ụtọ, odeakwụkwọ Executive, nke National Universities Commission (NUC), Prof.
Abubakar Rasheed toro òtù ahụ maka ọrụ ya n’ịhụ na ịdị ọcha na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ.
Rasheed, onye nọchitere anya osote odeakwụkwọ nke kọmiti ahụ, Chris Maiyaki kwere nkwa na kọmiti ahụ na-akwado JAMB iji mezuo iwu ya.
O kwuru na nzụkọ amụma bụ oge na-agbanwe egwuregwu maka ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na-ebute ụzọ na ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ.
N’otu aka ahụ, onyeisi oche, otu JAMB Equal Opportunity Group, bụ Prof.
Peter Okebukola toro JAMB ma tokwa ndị òtù ahụ maka mmasị n’agụmakwụkwọ nke ndị na-ahụ anya na ndị ọzọ na-ahụ maka ahụ ike.
Okebukola kwuru na n’ime afọ ole na ole gara aga, ndị ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ahazila nnabata nke mmadụ 2,700 ndị nwere nsogbu anya, ndị nọ n’ụlọ ọrụ mgbazi na ndị na-achọ Down syndrome.
Ọ gbakwụnyere na usoro agụmakwụkwọ dị elu nke Naijiria bụ ‘ịkwagharị na ịma jijiji’ nke ngalaba agụmakwụkwọ dị elu nke Africa, ya mere ọ dị mkpa iji nweta ihe dị mma karịsịa n’akụkụ usoro nnabata..
Onye isi ala Bola Tinubu na Fraịde mechiri njem ọrụ ya na Paris, France, n’oge nke o nwere ikere oke na nzụkọ maka ”A New Global Financing Pact” nke Onye isi ala France Emmanuel Macron kwadoro.
  Ewezuga nsonye ya na mmemme ahụ ebe ọ nọchitere anya Naijiria nke ọma, Onyeisiala Tinubu mekwara nnukwu nzukọ n’akụkụ ya na ndị isi obodo na gọọmentị ibe ya, ndị isi azụmaahịa zuru ụwa ọnụ na ndị isi nke ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ na-ahụ maka ego na mmepe na mba ụwa.
  Nzuko ahụ nyere Onye isi ala ohere nke ịkọwapụta, na ọkwa zuru ụwa ọnụ, nkwado ya maka ịgbasa oghere mmefu ego, ikpe ziri ezi nke akụ na ụba maka Africa ka ụwa na-eme ngwa ngwa nke mgbanwe ike na ngwa ngwa nke ilebara nsogbu ndị siri ike nke ịda ogbenye na mgbanwe ihu igwe.
  Onye isi ala Tinubu, onye e mere atụmatụ ịlaghachi n’Abuja n’ụbọchị Satọde, ga-agakwa London, United Kingdom, maka nleta nzuzo dị mkpirikpi.
  Onye isi ala ga-alọghachi na obodo n’oge maka mmemme Eid-el-Kabir na-abịa..

Ọ bụ naanị n’Abia, Enugwu na Ebonyi ka e mere ntuliaka ndị a.
A bịa n’Ebonyi steeti ọ bụ APC, APGA, PDP na LP nwetara oche n’ụloomeiwu steeti ahụ.

Abia dịka steetị ndị ọzọ hụtara ọtụtụ mgbanwe pụrụiche na ntuliaka a, dịka Labour Party (LP) na-anọbughi n’ọchịchị nwetere mmeru n’ọkwa Gọvanọ nakwa ọtụtụ ndị n’ụlọomeiwu.

Akụkọ na-eru anyị ntụ ugbua na-ekwu na a hụla okporo ‘Titanic Submersible’ a na-achọ achọ kemgbe ụbọchịụka.
Ụgbọmmiri a kpọrọ ‘Titanic Submersible’ zọpụrụ ije n’ikperemmiri Newfoundland dị na mba Kanada gawa ebe ụgbọmmiri ‘Titanic’ kụsara ọtụtụ afọ gara aga.
Ndị ọrụ gbatagbata kwuru na ha ahụla mpekere akụkụ ụgbọmmiri ahụ ise na nso n’ebe Titanic nke ochie kpọkasịburu.
Ha sịrị na ụgbọmmiri ahụ ‘gbara’ nke butere ọdachi ahụ.
Rear Admiral Mauger nke US Coast Guard, onye gbaara ndị ntaakụkọ ama a n’abalị Tọzde kwuru na ọ ga-esi ike nweta ozu mmadụ ise nọ n’ime ụgbọmmiri ‘Titan Submersible’.
Rear Admiral Mauger gara n’ihu kwuo na ụgbọmmiri itoolu ka nọ n’ebe a hụrụ okpokoro ụgbọmmiri ahụ kpọkasịrị.
Ọ sịkwara, “Anyị nwere ndị ọrụ ahụike, ndị tekụnụzụ.” Anyị ga-amalite ikposa ndị ọrụ n’awa iri abụọ na anọ na-abịa.” “Ebe a bụ ebe dị oke egwu, ịrụ ọrụ ebe a siri ike.” Ọ gara n’ihu tie ezinaụlọ ndị ọ metụtara aka n’obi, sị ha kara obi nabata na mmadụ ise ahụ achịsala ọwa..
Ndị ọrụ nchekwa nzuzo Naịjirịa agbaala ama ma kpọkuo ndị mmadụ ka ha kee nkwụcha n’oge emume ‘Eid-El-Kabir’ nke ga-adị n’izuụka ọzọ, maka na e nwere ndị na-akpa nkata ịwakpo ụlọ okpukperechi dị icheiche n’oge emume a.
Eid-El-Kabir bụ emume pụrụ iche maka ndị okpukperechi Islam, nke bụ oge ha ji egbu Ebini, na-akpọkwa oriri na nkwari.
Peter Afunanya, ọnụ na-ekwuru ndị DSS, wepụtara akwụkwọ ozi ebe ọ gbara ama a n’ụbọchị Tọzde.
Afunanya dọrọ ndị isi ahịa na ụlọ mgbakọ dị icheiche ka ha kee nkwụcha ma mụrụ anya iji gbochie atụmatụ ndị ekperima a chọrọ ibutere ụmụ Naịjirịa ihe anyammiri.
Ọ gara n’ihu kwuo na ndị DSS nakwa ndị ọrụ nchekwa ndị ọzọ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ iji gbochie ọdachi ọbụla n’oge emume Salah.
Emume Eid-El-Kabir nke afọ a ga-abụ n’ụbọchị 27 na 28 nke ọnwa June.
Ụbọchị ahụ na-abụkarị ezumike ọrụ na Naịjirịa.
N’ọnwa Julaị afọ 2015,mmadụ itoolu nwụrụ dịka ndị ọgụ Boko Haram tụrụ ogbunigwe n’ụlọ ekpere ndị Islam na Yobe Steeti.
Afunanya kwukwara na ndị ọrụ ncheka nke gụnyere ndị DSS wakporo ụfọdụ ogige ndị ekperima na Nasarawa na Kogi Steeti n’ime ụbọchị olemole gara aga, jide ụfọdụ ndị ekperima ahụ ma gbukwaa ndị ọzọ.
Nke a gụnyere Abubakar Muhammad onye e ji Abu Direba mara, onye na-atụ mgbere egbe na ngwaọgụ, bụ onye e jidere n’okporoụzọ si Abuja gawa Keffi, Nasarawa steeti.
Onye nke ọzọ bụ Kabir Bala, onye e ji Okwo mara, bụ onye si n’ụlọ mkpọrọ gbaa ọsọ ma hibe otu ndị ekperima na mpaghara Ejule nke dị n’okpuru ọchịchị Ofu na Kogi Steeti.

Onyeisiala Bola Tinubu nọọrọ n’ụbọchị Mọnde 19 Juun họpụta ndịisi ọrụ nchekwa ọhụrụ na Naịjirịa dịka ọ chụrụ ndị nke ochie.
Ndị a gụnyere onyeisi ndịagha ala (chief of Army Staff), onyeisi ndịagha ụgbọmmiri (Chief of Naval Staff), onyeisi ndịagha ụgbọelu (Chief of Air Staff), onyeisi nchekwa (Chief of Defence Staff), onyeisi ndị uweojii (Inspector General of Police) na onyeisi ndụmọdụ nchekwa (National Security Adviser).
Onyeisiala Naijiria, Bola Ahmed Tinubu, ahọpụtala ndị isi ọrụ nchekwa ọhụrụ, Inspector-General of Police na  Comptroller-General of Customs.
Ọ kwadokwara ezumike nka ndị isi ọrụ nchekwa niile, onyeisi ndị uwe ojii, ndị ndụmọdụ na Comptroller-General nke kọstọm nakwa ndị nnọchi anya ha ozugbo.

Onyeisiala kwadokwara nhọpụta Adeniyi Bashir Adewale dịka onye na-ahụ maka kọmpụta.
